Estas se centran en parámetros operativos y decisiones de negocio basadas en políticas de riesgo, así como en el cumplimiento de obligaciones derivadas de las leyes; como las que previenen el blanqueo de capitales, la financiación del terrorismo, el fraude fiscal y el uso abusivo o fraudulento de la cuenta; por las que se podría limitar el acceso a la cuenta y, en última instancia, cerrarla.Entre otras circunstancias, las causas de cierre pueden ser: el uso inapropiado de la cuenta, el incumplimiento grave de alguno de los Términos y Condiciones, cualquier comportamiento contrario a las normas generales de conducta previstas entre el cliente y el banco. También se podría limitar el acceso a la cuenta o a una parte de los fondos cuando nos veamos obligados a ello por parte de las autoridades competentes.Se ha limitado el acceso a mi cuenta, ¿cómo puedo contactar con N26 al respecto?Para cumplir con todas las normas a las que estamos sujetos como entidad bancaria regulada, tenemos la obligación de realizar revisiones periódicas sobre algunas de las transacciones y cuentas de nuestros clientes. A veces, como resultado de estas revisiones podríamos limitar el acceso a tu cuenta de N26.Ten en cuenta que este proceso es totalmente legítimo y busca garantizar la seguridad de nuestros clientes y sus cuentas. Si dicho proceso llegara a aplicarse, te enviaríamos un email informándote de los pasos a seguir. Es normal que puedas tener preguntas y estamos aquí para ayudarte, por lo que es importante que te comuniques respondiendo directamente al email (pestaña nueva) en el que se te notifica del proceso, como te indicamos a continuación:Inicia sesión en tu app N26.Ve a Mi cuenta > Ayuda > Mensajes de N26.Abre el mensaje en cuestión y pulsa el botón Responder que hay al final del mensaje.Si ya no puedes acceder a tu cuenta, puedes responder directamente desde la bandeja de entrada de tu email.Me han notificado del cierre de mi cuenta, ¿qué hago?Si tienes consultas sobre el estado de tu cuenta o sobre los fondos restantes, ponte en contacto respondiendo directamente al email en el que se te notifica del cierre, siguiendo los pasos que acabamos de indicar.Te pedimos que tengas en cuenta que nuestros especialistas de Atención al Cliente no podrán asistirte vía chat, ya que la información que tienen al respecto es muy limitada porque, por motivos legales y de protección de datos, no podemos compartir cierta información a través del chat.  * En caso de haber abierto la cuenta antes del 17/04/2019 y tener un IBAN que empieza por DE, la información se establece en el punto 19 de las respectivas Condiciones Generales Comerciales (pestaña nueva).

question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren’t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you’ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to 👤 My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten
answer: Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter! Wenn du deine Adresse bereits bestätigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen. Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht bestätigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestätigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Meine Karte läuft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte für meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: How does N26 Business Smart work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs €4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.It’s not yet possible to switch between accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: ¿Puedo abrir una cuenta N26 en mi país?
answer: Ofrecemos cuentas por todo el mundo: en España, Alemania, Austria, Francia, Italia, Irlanda, los Países Bajos, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia y Suiza.Para sentar unas bases aún más sólidas de nuestro negocio en el futuro, trabajamos en la experiencia de nuestro servicio, las ofertas de productos y los procesos.Ante la abrumadora demanda de productos bancarios digitales de N26, vamos a limitar temporalmente el número de nuevas cuentas bancarias que podemos ofrecer cada mes. ACTUALIZACIÓN: 25 oct. 11:00Mercados abiertos para cuentas Estándar y Premium: Alemania, Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, España, Francia, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, Países Bajos, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia & SuizaMercados abiertos solo para cuentas Premium: N/AMercado cerrado para todo tipo de cuentas: N/AMercados cerrados: ItaliaPuedes abrir tu cuenta si cumples con nuestros requisitos. Nuestros productos y servicios varían dependiendo del país. Si ya tienes una cuenta abierta y te mudas a un país en el que N26 no está disponible durante 18 meses o más, contacta con atención al cliente.

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‘DE’ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‘Direct Debits’: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don’t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space’s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‘Spaces’ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‘Space Settings’ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' » Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' » Accept the T&C's » Enter your confirmation PIN » Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‘cog icon’)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on “Send money”Select “Bank transfer”Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: Wie eröffne ich mein N26 Konto?
answer: Du kannst ein N26 Konto in der App (auf deinem Smartphone) oder in der WebApp (neuen Tab) eröffnen, wenn du:mindestens 18 Jahre alt bistin einem unterstützten Land lebstein kompatibles Smartphone besitztein unterstütztes Ausweisdokument hastnoch kein Konto bei uns hastdich in einer unserer unterstützten Sprachen verifizieren kannst (Deutsch, Englisch, Spanisch, Französisch, Italienisch).So meldest du dich an:Nachdem du deine Email, persönlichen Daten und die Lieferadresse bestätigt hast, wähle deinen gewünschten Kontotypen aus. *Weise deine Identität nach und verknüpfe dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto.Ab jetzt kannst du über SEPA oder FPS Überweisungen dein Konto aufladen oder über CASH26 Bargeld auf dein Konto einzahlen (wenn du in Deutschland, Österreich oder Italien bist).Nach einigen Tagen erhältst du deine Mastercard per Post.Falls du noch mehr erfahren möchtest, kontaktiere uns gerne.*Wenn deine Bonität die Mindestanforderungen erfüllt, kannst du ein N26 Konto eröffnen. Falls nicht, können wir dir möglicherweise ein N26 Flex Konto (nur in Deutschland) anbieten. Diese Entscheidung wird automatisch berechnet. Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Du erreichst uns im Chat täglich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

question: Latest updates on our customer service availability
answer: We are reachable at our normal opening hours, from 07:00 - 23:00 hrs daily, including Sundays and public holidays.If you need to block your card in an emergency, you will be able to do so in your N26 app, or by calling our automated emergency hotline at +44 2035 107126.Any further updates to availability and waiting times will be published on this page.

question: ¿Cómo crear un Espacio Compartido?
answer:
Para crear un espacio compartido:Crea un espacio en la sección Espacios. 
Pulsa sobre el icono de ''Espacio'' en la parte inferior de la pantalla.
Lee la información con detalle y pulsa en ''Invitar nuevo miembro''.
Selecciona el contacto de la lista de usuario de N26 que deseas añadir. Si esta persona tiene una cuenta de N26 pero no aparece en la lista, te recomendamos que le preguntes si tiene la opción de visibilidad para otros usuarios activada en la app. Puedes hacerlo desde Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Configuración personal > Información personal. 
Quizá sea necesario que introduzcas su nombre completo, tal y como lo tiene en la cuenta.
Revisa la información acerca del poder notarial (en la sección legal) y cuando lo hayas leído, marca la casilla para indicar que estás de acuerdo con los términos y condiciones y para garantizar a esa persona el poder notarial.
Introduce tu PIN de confirmación.
Pulsa sobre el participante que vas a añadir.
Confirma la notificación ''Enviar invitación'' que te llegará a tu dispositivo vinculado.Más sobre Espacios Compartidos¿Qué son los Espacios Compartidos?¿Cómo añadir y eliminar participantes en un Espacio Compartido?

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come. With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we’re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We’re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account. Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: Perché il mio conto è temporaneamente bloccato?
answer: In conformità con il quadro regolamentare europeo per le banche, N26 è tenuta a effettuare controlli tecnici di routine sui conti dei suoi clienti. Essendo un’istituzione regolamentata, questo fa sì che i depositi contenuti sul tuo conto N26 siano al sicuro.La maggior parte delle volte questi controlli avvengono molto rapidamente, senza che tu possa vederli. A volte possono richiedere un tempo più lungo, durante il quale potresti temporaneamente non poter accedere al tuo conto.A supervisionare questo processo c’è un team dedicato, specializzato nella conduzione di revisioni tecniche di questo tipo e che lavora diligentemente per ridurre al minimo qualsiasi interruzione. Per questo motivo, il Supporto Clienti di N26 non è in grado di fornire ulteriori informazioni sul tuo conto tramite  chat o di accelerare il processo.Ti preghiamo di avere pazienza mentre completiamo questi passaggi. Il nostro team ti contatterà  non appena il processo di revisione tecnica sarà completato.

question: ¿Cómo presentar una reclamación?
answer: Si necesitas soporte técnico o tienes alguna preguntaSi necesitas ayuda con tu cuenta, disputas de pagos con tarjeta, cambiar tus datos o simplemente quieres hacer una pregunta, descubre cómo contactar a N26 aquí.Presentar una ReclamaciónLamentamos que desees presentar una reclamación. Investigaremos tu caso y nos pondremos en contacto contigo a través del correo electrónico registrado en tu cuenta para compartir los hallazgos de la investigación y el resultado de tu reclamación. Nuestro equipo de Atención al Cliente podrá ayudarte a remitir tu reclamación a través del chat mencionado anteriormente, pero si deseas enviar tu reclamación a través de tu correo electrónico podrás hacerlos las siguientes direcciones:Atención en Inglés: complaints@n26.com (pestaña nueva)Atención en Castellano: reclamaciones.es@n26.com (pestaña nueva), o si tu cuenta tiene un IBAN que comienza con (DE) a reclamaciones@n26.com (pestaña nueva)Por favor ten en cuenta que estas direcciones de correo electrónico son de uso exclusivo para la gestión de reclamaciones y quejas. De lo contrario, nuestro departamento de Atención al Cliente (pestaña nueva) está disponible todos los días y te ayudará a resolver tus dudas a la brevedad.Si deseas enviar una reclamación asegurate de incluir los siguientes detalles en tu correo electrónico:Una descripción detallada de tu reclamación y del producto o servicio involucrado.La fecha en la que comenzó el incidente motivo de la reclamaciónToda la documentación suplementaria que ayude a respaldar su petición (ejemplo: capturas de pantalla, correos electrónicos enviados, etc.)Una descripción de la resolución que espera obtener tras la reclamaciónLe pedimos que tenga en cuenta que solo podremos atender reclamaciones sobre una cuenta cuando nos contacta desde el correo electrónico registrado en su cuenta N26. Si la reclamación es enviada por un representante legal deberá estar acompañada del correspondiente mandato emitido por un notario.Excepcionalmente y en caso de que no tenga acceso a enviar la reclamación a través de los medios telemáticos previstos, le recomendamos que revise en los términos y condiciones de su cuenta o el reglamento de la sucursal para obtener más información sobre las opciones de envío en formato no digital. Nuestra dirección postal alemana es:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinSobre el tratamiento de tu reclamación: Nos pondremos en contacto contigo a través del correo electrónico registrado en tu cuenta y en caso de que necesitemos más detalles sobre la reclamación los solicitaremos también por correo electrónico.Plazo de resolución de las reclamacionesTodas las reclamaciones que traten asuntos vinculados a servicios de pago, se resolverán en un plazo máximo de 15 días hábiles de acuerdo a lo determinado en las normas de PSD2 vigentes. Este plazo será prorrogable hasta un mes en casos excepcionales y siempre que te comuniquemos el motivo de la prórroga.Para el resto de las reclamaciones los plazos de resolución serán los siguientes:Alemania y Austria - 15 días hábilesResto de países europeos - 15 días hábilesIrlanda - 40 días hábilesFrancia - 56 díasReino Unido - 56 días España - 60 díasItalia - 60 díasDe no tener una respuesta por tu parte a nuestra comunicación relacionada con tu solicitud, procederemos a cerrarla. En caso de recibir una respuesta posterior, abriremos una nueva solicitud y te indicaremos el nuevo número de referencia de tu reclamación.Si no quedas satisfecho/a con el resultado de tu reclamaciónUna vez vencido el plazo y en caso de no estar conforme con el resultado de tu reclamación, siempre podrás someterla a los organismos correspondientes según los Términos y Condiciones de tu cuenta N26:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinLegislación aplicableEn materia de legislación española aplicable a la protección de clientela y normas de transparencia, puedes encontrar toda la información necesaria en la página oficial del Banco de España (pestaña nueva).Reglamento:Reglamento para la defensa del Cliente de N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en España. (pestaña nueva)

question: ¿Qué es una cuenta N26 Estándar?
answer: La cuenta N26 Estándar es una cuenta corriente digital e intuitiva que puedes contratar en cuestión de minutos, directamente desde tu móvil. Es sencilla, transparente y te permite recibir, enviar y gastar dinero con seguridad. La cuenta N26 Estándar es gratuita*, por lo que te ofrece una solución sencilla y asequible para todas tus necesidades financieras.¿Qué incluye una cuenta N26 Estándar? Nuestra cuenta N26 Estándar incluye las siguientes ventajas y funciones:Cuenta corriente gratuita*: Nuestra cuenta N26 Estándar es de uso gratuito (*a partir de un saldo de 50 000 €, puede que se aplique una comisión de custodia).Tarjeta virtual: La cuenta incluye una tarjeta virtual gratuita que tiene un número PAN completo y es compatible con Apple o Google Pay para realizar compras online y en establecimientos.Mastercard física de N26: Por 10 € más, puedes recibir una tarjeta de débito física de N26 Estándar (te advertimos de que necesitarás un saldo mínimo de 10 € en tu cuenta para posibilitar la fabricación y el envío de la tarjeta).Pagos y transferencias: Puedes enviar y recibir transferencias SEPA empleando tu app móvil de N26. Además, puedes realizar envíos instantáneos de dinero a otros clientes de N26 a través de MoneyBeam.Productos financieros adicionales: Si cumples los requisitos, también puedes solicitar productos financieros adicionales, p. ej., descubierto, crédito, ahorro, etc.CASH26: Retira e ingresa dinero en efectivo utilizando nuestra función CASH26 (Términos y condiciones de DE, AT e IT).Servicio de Atención al Cliente: Puedes contactar con nuestro increíble Servicio de Atención al Cliente mediante el chat de la app o abriendo un chat desde nuestro sitio web o web app.Para abrir una cuenta N26 Estándar, encontrarás las instrucciones en este artículoNuestra nueva cuenta N26 Estándar incluye una tarjeta de débito virtual gratuita. Con una cuenta estándar activa, puedes realizar pagos online y en establecimientos. Además, puedes añadir la tarjeta virtual a tu wallet de Apple o Google Pay.Puedes encontrar los datos de tu tarjeta virtual en la app N26, donde también encontrarás tu número PAN completo y los datos de tu tarjeta virtual para realizar compras online.

question: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
answer: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet our requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: How to order my extra card?
answer: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: “Always losing things?” > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs €10 for standard shipping and €25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of €10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.ℹ️ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

question: Bank documents—a guide to what's available
answer: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reason—you can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and they’re perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Here’s how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening and—if you wish—it can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Here’s how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees you’ve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. You’ll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipient’s full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmation—the PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (Relevé d'Identité Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank information—full name, legal address, IBAN and BIC—specific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‘Add money’ button.

question: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?
answer:
Es gibt verschiedene Möglichkeiten, dich mit unserem Kundenservice in Verbindung zu setzen. Die beste Möglichkeit ist, einen sicheren Chat zu öffnen, während du in der App eingeloggt bist. So können wir deine Identität verifizieren und dir spezielle Informationen und Unterstützung anbieten.Im Chat erreichst du uns täglich von 07:00–23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.So kontaktierst du uns über die AppWie du mit uns chatten kannstÖffne einen Kundendienst-ChatDer Chat wird eröffnet, sobald du dich eingeloggt hastWie du uns anrufen kannst
(nur für Premiumkonten)Wir können dich nur mit unserem Kundenservice in Kontakt bringen, wenn du uns unter der in deinem Konto registrierten Nummer anrufst. Wenn du eine neue Rufnummer registrieren möchtest, befolge die Schritte auf dieser Seite: Wie ändere ich meine Rufnummer?Bitte beachte: Um uns telefonisch zu kontaktieren, brauchst du ein N26 Premiumkonto (You, Smart oder Metal).Unterstützung per Telefon (nur Premium)Du hast keinen Zugriff auf die App?Du bist noch kein N26 nutzer?Wenn du noch kein Konto bei uns hast, jedoch allgemeine Fragen zu unseren Produkten und Dienstleistungen hast, kannst du entweder unten einen Besucher-Chat eröffnen oder uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com schicken (die Wartezeit für E-Mails ist zurzeit länger als üblich).Du hast keinen zugriff mehr auf dein konto?Du hast dein Smartphone verloren oder ist es kaputt? Hast du Probleme, dich in die App einzuloggen und auf dein Konto zuzugreifen? Das tut uns leid und wir unterstützen dich bei der Lösung deines Problems, wenn du unten einen Besucher-Chat öffnest oder uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com schickst (die Wartezeit für E-Mails ist zurzeit länger als üblich).Du möchtest deine persönlichen Daten ändern? Befolge die Anweisungen auf dieser Seite:
Wie ändere ich meine Rufnummer, Adresse oder andere persönliche Daten?Bitte beachte: Zu deiner Sicherheit können wir dir bei Fragen zu personenbezogenen Daten nur helfen, wenn du einen Kundenservice-Chat startest, während du in der App eingeloggt bist.Öffne einen Besucher-ChatBitte beachte: Wir werden dir nicht helfen können, falls du unseren Standort besuchst. Bitte kontaktiere uns nur auf den genannten Kanälen. Vielen Dank für dein Verständnis.

question: Warum bekomme ich keinen Kredit?
answer: Bei der Beantragung eines N26 Credit fragen wir dich im Rahmen unserer Prüfung nach deiner persönlichen und finanziellen Situation. Wenn N26 nicht dein Hauptkonto ist, musst du dich sicher in dein Online-Bankkonto bei einer anderen Bank einloggen, um mit dem Antrag fortzufahren.Für dein zweites Bankkonto akzeptieren wir nur Banken aus dem Land, aus dem du dich bewirbst (so können z. B. französische Kunden nur ein französisches Bankkonto und deutsche Kunden nur ein deutsches Bankkonto hinzufügen).Wir schauen uns auch deine aktuelle SCHUFA-Kreditwürdigkeit an. Diese Anfrage wird auf deiner SCHUFA-Auskunf notiert, ist aber nur für dich sichtbar und wirkt sich nicht negativ auf deines SCHUFA-Score aus. Aber nicht nur dein SCHUFA Score ist ausschlaggebend: Wir benötigen auch Informationen über dein monatliches Einkommen, unter Ausschluss von Zahlungen der öffentlichen Hand (z. B. Arbeitslosen- oder Kindergeld).Sobald du einen Antrag an uns gesendet hast, kannst du deine Antworten 90 Tage lang nicht mehr ändern (auch dann nicht, wenn sich deine Bonität verbessert). Du musst dann bis zum Ablauf der 90 Tage warten, um einen weiteren Kredit zu beantragen.Das Ergebnis wird automatisch berechnet. Wir können keine manuelle Überprüfung vornehmen, ob wir dir einen anbieten können.Kontaktiere uns gerne für weitere Informationen.

question: ¿Cómo contactar con N26?
answer:
Hay varias formas de contactar con nuestro Servicio de Atención al Cliente, pero la mejor opción es abrir un chat seguro cuando inicias sesión en la app. Esto nos permitirá verificar tu identidad y proporcionarte información y asistencia específicas.Estamos disponibles todos los días, de 7:00 a 23:00 (CET), domingos y festivos incluidos.Cómo contactarnos a través de la appCómo chatear con nosotrosAbrir un chat de ayudaEl chat se iniciará en cuanto inicies sesión.Como llamarnos
(solo para cuentas Premium) Solo podemos ponerte en contacto con nuestro Servicio de Atención al Cliente si nos llamas desde el número registrado en tu cuenta. Si tienes que registrar un nuevo número de móvil, sigue los pasos que se te indican en esta página: Cómo cambiar mi número de móvil.Nota: para contactarnos por teléfono móvil necesitarás una cuenta premium N26 (You, Smart o Metal).Asistencia telefónica (sólo premium)¿No tienes acceso a la app?¿Aún no eres cliente de N26? Si no tienes una cuenta en nuestra entidad, pero tienes preguntas generales acerca de nuestros productos y servicios, puedes abrir un chat de visitante a continuación o enviarnos un email a support@n26.com (puede que tardemos más tiempo en responderte al email).¿Has perdido el acceso a tu cuenta? ¿Se ha perdido o se ha roto tu móvil? ¿Tienes problemas para iniciar sesión en la app y acceder a tu cuenta? Sentimos lo que te ha pasado; te ayudaremos a resolver tu problema si abres un chat de visitante a continuación o envías un email a support@n26.com (puede que tardemos más tiempo en responderte al email).¿Necesitas cambiar tus datos personales? Sigue las instrucciones que se te indican en esta página.
¿Cómo cambiar mi número de móvil, dirección u otros datos personales?Nota: por tu seguridad, solo podemos ayudarte con preguntas relacionadas con datos personales si inicias un chat de ayuda habiendo iniciado sesión en la app.Abrir un chat de visitante

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: Come dare il mio feedback o suggerire un nuovo prodotto?
answer: Inviamo spesso brevi sondaggi per richiedere feedback, ma la partecipazione è volontaria e anonima. Per domande individuali o suggerimenti, puoi inviare i tuoi commenti a ideas@n26.com (nuova tabella). Siamo sempre grati a chi dedica qualche minuto del suo tempo per aiutarci a migliorare.E se dovessi essere insoddisfatto di uno dei nostri prodotti o servizi, puoi anche presentare un reclamo.

question: Wie kann ich den Nachweis über die Herkunft der Gelder für mein Konto erbringen?
answer: Als voll lizenzierte Bank muss N26 routinemäßige technische Prüfungen der Kundenkonten durchführen. Als reguliertes Institut können wir so sicherstellen, dass das Geld auf N26 Konten sicher und geschützt bleibt.Mitunter kann es vorkommen, dass wir uns aufgrund der Ergebnisse dieser Routineprüfungen an einen Kontoinhaber wenden müssen, um einen Nachweis über die Herkunft der Gelder auf dem Konto zu erhalten, dies ist eine Praxis im Einklang mit den deutschen Bankvorschriften.Wenn dies der Fall ist, werden wir dich ausschließlich über die E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren, die mit deinem N26 Konto verknüpft ist. In dieser E-Mail erhältst du klare Anweisungen, wie du diese Dokumente einreichen kannst, z. B. Scans oder Fotos von Quittungen, Gehaltsabrechnungen, Rechnungen oder Zahlungsaufforderungen.Sei stets aufmerksam und vergewissere dich, dass solche E-Mails von N26 kommen – wir werden dich nie nach deinen N26 Kontodaten, deinem Passwort oder anderen Daten fragen, die du im Rahmen deines Verifizierungsprozesses mitgeteilt hast.

question: Comment synchroniser ou désynchroniser mon smartphone de mon compte ?
answer:
Remarque : Pour utiliser votre compte N26, vous devez posséder un smartphone :・ iPhone (modèle 5S ou plus récent équipé de iOS11 ou version supérieure)
・ Android (version 6.0 ou supérieure)Nous ne prenons pas en charge les appareils équipés des systèmes d'exploitation Amazon Fire et Oxygen OS.Remarque : Il n’est possible de connecter qu’un seul appareil mobile par compte.Quand faut-il connecter mon smartphone à mon compte N26 ?Vous devez synchroniser votre smartphone lors de l’ouverture d’un compte ou le désynchroniser lorsque vous faites l'acquisition d’un nouvel appareil ou d’un nouveau numéro de téléphone avant de synchroniser votre nouvel appareil à votre compte.Comment synchroniser mon smartphone à mon compte N26 ?Connecter mon téléphone la première foisPour synchroniser votre smartphone la première fois :Connectez-vous à l’application mobile et confirmez votre numéro de téléphone.Saisissez le code à 4 chiffres que nous vous enverrons par SMS (nouvel onglet) et la synchronisation se fera automatiquement.Connecter un nouvel appareilRemarque : Il n’est possible de synchroniser qu’un seul smartphone par compte.Si vous souhaitez synchroniser un nouvel appareil, vous devez d'abord désynchroniser votre ancien smartphone pour des raisons de sécurité (nouvel onglet).Pour désynchroniser votre smartphone :Allez dans la rubrique 👤 Mon compte,sélectionnez Sécurité etDésynchroniser votre téléphone.Si vous n’avez pas accès à votre ancien smartphone :Allez dans la rubrique 👤 Mon compte,puis Sécurité,nous vous enverrons un e-mail vous expliquant les étapes à suivre.Si vous vous connectez à votre compte avec un nouvel appareil, vous recevrez deux codes par SMS :Un code à 6 chiffres pour vous connecter à votre compte.Un code à 4 chiffres pour connecter votre smartphone à votre compte.Vous aurez besoin du code à 6 chiffres pour vous connecter à votre compte, ensuite vous pourrez connecter votre appareil à l’aide du code à 4 chiffres.Si vous changez uniquement de carte SIM mais conservez votre smartphone, vous n’aurez pas besoin de synchroniser/désynchroniser votre appareil.

question: ¿Cómo saber cuál es mi IBAN o número de cuenta?
answer: Puedes encontrar tu IBAN y tu número BIC en los extractos de tu cuenta o en el apartado 👤 Mi cuenta en la app o WebApp (pestaña nueva) (en caso de que no hayas activado tu tarjeta y necesites ingresar dinero en tu cuenta).Puedes compartir la información de forma sencilla haciendo clic en el botón de compartir que encontrarás en 👤 Mi cuenta. También puedes descargar en formato PDF la información bancaria. Para hacerlo, entra a tu cuenta desde la WebApp (pestaña nueva) y haz clic en el icono de la nube en la esquina superior derecha de las Transacciones.Todos nuestros códigos IBAN (pestaña nueva) españoles empiezan por ES seguido de un código de control de 2 dígitos, luego nuestro código de entidad financiera 1563 2626, después 2 dígitos de control y, por último, tu número de cuenta de 10 dígitos.Sin embargo, nuestro IBAN alemán empieza por (DE), el italiano por (IT) seguido de un código de control de 2 dígitos, luego nuestro código de entidad financiera 10011001 y terminan con tu número de cuenta de 10 dígitos (empieza por 26).Si tienes tu dispositivo vinculado y una tarjeta activa, ahora puedes ver toda la información de tu tarjeta desde tu app N26, permitiéndote realizar pagos por internet sin la necesidad de tener tu tarjeta física N26 MasterCard contigo. Para esto, simplemente sigue las instrucciones a continuación:Ve a Tarjetas y pulsa en 'Configuración de la tarjeta', busca tu tarjeta activa y haz clic en 'Detalles de la tarjeta'Usa tu reconocimiento dactilar, facial o PIN de desbloqueo del teléfono para mostrar los detalles completos de su tarjetaLa pantalla estará disponible durante 1 minuto.

question: ¿Cómo cambiar el PIN de la tarjeta?
answer: Si no sabes cuál es tu PIN, recuerda que en N26 no te enviamos tu código PIN por correo, sino que tú creas el PIN de tu tarjeta en el momento de activarla. Si lo has olvidado o simplemente quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo fácilmente en cuestión de segundos desde tu app N26.Primero asegúrate de que tu móvil está vinculado a tu cuenta (pestaña nueva) y de que has activado tu tarjeta (pestaña nueva). Después abre tu app N26 y haz lo siguiente:Entra en la pestaña Tarjetas;ve a Configuración de la tarjeta y selecciona la tarjeta en cuestión;selecciona Cambiar PIN;introduce el token de tu tarjeta, que es un número de 10 dígitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta (o por atrás, en las tarjetas N26 You y Metal);elige tu nuevo PIN y confirma.Por último, tienes que hacer una retirada en un cajero para que se grabe el cambio (similar a cuando la activas por primera vez).PIN incorrecto o no válidoPor motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ningún PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, dirección u otra combinación con dígitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el número que has elegido no es válido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinación diferente.Si introduces un PIN incorrecto tres veces seguidas, la tarjeta se bloqueará automáticamente por motivos de seguridad. Si te pasa esto, abre un chat con Atención al Cliente desde la app para que te ayudemos.El código PIN de tu tarjeta no es el mismo que tu PIN de confirmación (pestaña nueva), pero si tú quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.Si has cambiado el PIN pero te da error al pagar, revisa el paso 6 más arriba.

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs €9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It’s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of €9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you’re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don’t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you’re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help get your money back.

question: What does the court ruling BGH XI ZR 26/20 mean for N26 customers?
answer: On April 27, 2021, the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (Bundesgerichtshof, BGH) ruled on [translation] “the impermissibility of clauses that feign the consent of a customer to changes in the Terms & Conditions of a bank.”Am I entitled to a reimbursement?On the bases of this ruling, customers with a private membership plan (N26 Standard/Smart/You/Metal), created before March 12, 2020, are entitled to reclaim the “Gambling Fee” introduced and charged by us. For those customers who are entitled to reclaim it, the fee (for the customer group in question) has no longer been charged since November 5, 2021.Customers who registered after March 12, 2020 actively consented to the “Gambling Fee” included in the Terms & Conditions, which were already updated at this time, which is why these customers are not entitled to a reimbursement of said “Gambling Fee”. Customers with an N26 Business membership plan (N26 Business Standard/ Business Smart/Business You/Business Metal) are furthermore not entitled to reclaim this fee, as they do not fall under the customer group covered by the ruling (consumers).Requesting a reimbursement as a current customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to login to the N26 app and launch a verified live chat in the app or web app.Requesting a reimbursement as a former customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to send an email to support@n26.com (new tab). For a direct, simple resolution please follow these guidelines:Subject of email: “Reimbursement pursuant to BGH XI ZR 26/20”Send the email from your registered email address.Include your full name in the email as well as an alternative IBANAttach a clear, double-sided photo/scan of one of your ID documents, including the edges.Please include your consent to the following: “I hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.“

question: ¿Puedo abrir una cuenta si vivo fuera de la zona euro?
answer: Si vives en Dinamarca, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Noruega, Polonia, Suecia o Suiza tienes la posibilidad de abrir una cuenta con nosotros. Te ofrecemos: La opción de elegir entre una cuenta N26 Estándar o N26 Business. Una cuenta en euros, un IBAN alemán, transferencias SEPA o Moneybeam.Conversión de moneda con la tarjeta de débito Mastercard. Servicio de atención al cliente en español, inglés, alemán, italiano o francés. Envío gratuito de la primera tarjeta Mastercard o envío exprés por 20€.Transferencias a otras divisas con Wise. (Para cuentas Estándar). Con las cuentas Business no se pueden hacer transferencias en moneda extranjera (pestaña nueva) desde la app, sino que tendrías que visitar la página de Wise (pestaña nueva) para ello.5 retiradas gratuitas en la zona euro (1.7% de comisión para retiradas en otra divisa.)0.1% de reembolso de tus pagos con tarjeta (con la cuenta Business) y del 0,5% (con la Metal Business) de forma mensual.2 espacios además de la cuenta principal. Un bonus por cada amigo que se abre la cuenta con tu invitación de nuestra promoción ''Invita a un amigo''.Pagos ''sin contacto'' utilizando Google Pay y Apple Pay.Consejos para las transacciones entrantes y salientes:Para recargar tu cuenta con tu moneda local, te recomendamos convertirla utilizando Wise (desde la app o su website (pestaña nueva).), o a través de tu banco local. Te recomendamos escoger tu divisa local para obtener la mejor tasa de cambio en los pagos con tu tarjeta Mastercard o en retiradas de efectivo (en caso contrario se pueden aplicar alguna comisión). Para enviar transferencias a cuenta en Euros, usa la app para hacer una transferencia SEPA. Para cuentas que nos son en euros, utiliza Wise desde la app.**Ten en cuenta que Wise no está disponible para cuentas N26 Business (solo es posible realizar transferencias SEPA en euros.)

question: How to block a Direct Debit?
answer: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as “DocuSign”.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

question: How to find my IBAN or account number?
answer: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or in 👤 My Account from the mobile app or WebApp (new tab) (if you haven’t activated your card and need to top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by the check digits (two numbers), then our bank code 10011001 and end with your 10-digit account number (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button in 👤 My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the WebApp (new tab) and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select Forgot? in the app or Forgot your password? (new tab) in the WebApp (new tab) during login. We’ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a “passphrase” rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase “hard to guess, easy to remember”. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you’ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How to order my extra card?
answer: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: “Always losing things?” > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs €10 for standard shipping and €25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of €10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.ℹ️ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

question: Combien coûte un compte bancaire N26 ?
answer: Aucuns frais de tenue de compte ne vous sont facturés pour votre compte N26*.Pour les services supplémentaires, certains frais additionnels peuvent être facturés selon la région :Tarifs en Allemagne (nouvel onglet)Tarifs en Autriche (nouvel onglet)Tarifs en France (nouvel onglet)Tarifs en Espagne (nouvel onglet)Tarifs en Italie (nouvel onglet)Tarifs dans le reste de l'Europe (nouvel onglet)*Sous réserve de respect des conditions minimales requises (nouvel onglet) lors de la vérification de votre solvabilité réalisée avant l'ouverture d'un compte courant N26. Les utilisateurs ne remplissant pas ces conditions et résidant en Allemagne peuvent ouvrir un compte N26 Flex.

question: What does N26 do with my tax information?
answer: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.  Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rules As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth. Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number. Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved. For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating “permanent home” as a stronger form of attachment than “temporary residence”). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification number Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each country’s tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.  The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authorities As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France. Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN. We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information. Our recommendation Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines. We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick “Add new tax country”, indicate whether you’re a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if you’re tax resident in more than one country), click “Add new tax country” and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.We’re unable to advise you on your tax status. If you’re unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.

question: Warum ist mein Online-Einkauf fehlgeschlagen?
answer: Manche Online-Zahlungen müssen per Push-Nachricht bestätigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Übersicht über die möglichen Ursachen für eine fehlgeschlagene Online-Zahlung und wie du sie beheben kannst.Du kannst nur so viel Geld ausgeben wie du auf deinem Konto hast. Zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein oder beantrage einen Dispokredit, um über genug Guthaben zu verfügen.Falls du eine Online-Zahlung per Push-Nachricht bestätigen musst, stelle sicher, dass dein Smartphone verknüpft ist. Du kannst Zahlungen nur auf deinem verknüpften Gerät bestätigen.Falls du die Push-Nachricht für die Zahlungen innerhalb von 5 Minuten nicht bestätigen konntest, starte den Bezahlvorgang noch mal.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verknüpfte Smartphone gesendet.Überprüfe deine Karteneinstellungen. Online- und Auslandszahlungen müssen aktiviert sein.Stelle sicher, dass du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast. Falls du die Zahlung per WLAN nicht abschließen kannst, benutze deine mobilen Daten und versuche es erneut.Falls du iOS benutzt, deaktiviere den Nicht-Stören-Modus.Deaktiviere alle Adblocker in deinem Browser.Wenn du Probleme hast, mit deiner Karte zu zahlen, kannst du folgende Schritte befolgen, um eine Fehlerbehebung durchzuführen:Geh in die Karteneinstellungen, der Karte mit der du etwas zahlen möchtestSetzte alle Limits auf 0 EUR und deaktiviere online und AuslandszahlungenSperre deine KarteLog dich aus der app aus und anschließend wieder einEntsperre deine KarteSetze deine Limits wieder auf die alte VerfügungWarte 5 Minuten und versuche erneut zu zahlenSolltest du anschließend weitere Probleme mit der Zahlung haben gibt es folgende Möglichkeiten:Ein Sicherheitsmechanismus ist angesprungen und du musst bis zu 12 Stunden warten beim gleichen Händler eventuell bis zu 24 Stunden, bis du deine Karte wieder verwenden kannst. Es besteht auch die Möglichkeit, dass die Transaktion nicht von unserer Seite zurückgewiesen wurde. In diesem Fall hat entweder der Zahlungspartner deine Karte abgelehnt oder konnte keine Verbindung mit unserem System herstellen. Um dies auszuschließen kannst du uns gerne kontaktieren.Gut zu wissen: Die Maestro-Karte kann nicht für Online-Zahlungen verwendet werden. Falls der Betrag auf der Website des Anbieters von dem Betrag in der Push-Mitteilung abweicht, kann das an Kursschwankung bei der Umrechnung einer Fremdwährung in Euro liegen.Falls du dennoch Probleme mit der Online-Zahlung hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking. (neuen Tab)

question: Wie benutzt man Spaces?
answer: Um deine Spaces zu nutzen, musst du den Bereich 'Spaces' in deiner mobilen App oder Web-App von N26 aufrufen. Auf der 'Spaces'-Startseite kannst du Spaces einsehen, eingeben und erstellen.Erstelle einen Space:Tippe auf der "Spaces"-Startseite auf "Einen neuen Space erstellen".Wähle eine der untenstehenden Optionen aus:"Für ein Ziel sparen" – Gib einen Sparzielbetrag und ein Zieldatum ein (optional)."Geld teilen" – Ermöglicht dir die Erstellung eines "Shared Space"."Jetzt erstellen, später entscheiden" – Erstelle einfach einen Space, dem du später Ziele oder Regeln hinzufügen kannst.Personalisiere anschließend deinen Space mit einem Namen und einem Bild.Dir steht nun mit dem Space ein Unterkonto zur Verfügung, um deine Finanzen besser kontrollieren zu können. Jetzt kannst du deine "Spaces" nutzen!Geld zwischen Spaces verschieben:Halte dein "Hauptkonto" oder einen anderen Space gedrücktZiehe dann das Geld in den Space, in den du es verschieben möchtest, und lass los.Anschließend kannst du den Betrag bestätigen, woraufhin dein Kontostand sofort aktualisiert wird.Sperre deinen Space:Du kannst einen Space jederzeit über deine mobile und Web-App sperren und entsperren. Du kannst kein Geld in einen oder aus einem gesperrten Space bewegen.Begib dich in den Space, den du sperren/entsperren möchtest.Tippe auf "Verwalten".Wähle anschließend "Spaces sperren" oder "Spaces entsperren".Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein.Der Space wird sofort gesperrt oder entsperrt.Blende den Kontostand deines Spaces aus:Du kannst den Betrag innerhalb des Spaces vom Gesamtkontostand deines Kontos ausblenden.Begib dich in den Space, für den du den Kontostand ausblenden möchtest.Tippe auf das Zahnradsymbol "Einstellungen" (obere rechte Ecke).Wähle "Kontostand des Spaces ausblenden".Verwalte deine Spaces:Du kannst Regeln und Sparziele anlegen und die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel" aktivieren. Klicke in der Rubrik "Space" auf "Verwalten".Um ein Sparziel zu erstellen, wähle "Mein Ziel erstellen" (du kannst dies auch später noch bearbeiten).Gib einfach einen Zielbetrag und ein Fälligkeitsdatum ein und dann "Ziel festlegen".Um Aufrundungen zu aktivieren/deaktivieren, wähle "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Aktiviere "Aufrundungsregel aktivieren".Du erhältst die Möglichkeit, dein Kleingeld mit den Faktoren x1, x2, x3 und x5 des Betrags zu multiplizieren, der von deinen restlichen Kartentransaktionen abgezogen wird.Du kannst innerhalb eines Spaces Regeln anlegen, um automatisch Geld zwischen deinen Spaces und deinem Hauptkonto zu bewegen:Tippe auf "Eine Regel erstellen".Wähle die Spaces oder das Hauptkonto, zwischen denen du Geld überweisen möchtest.Wähle den Betrag, den du verschieben möchtest.Wähle die Häufigkeit und das Datum und bestätige dann deine Auswahl.Du kannst diese Regel auch löschen, indem du auf Bearbeiten und dann auf dasLöschsymbol neben der Regel tippst.

question: Account in conjunction with §§ 30 ff. ZKG
answer: The account ICW §§ 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6€ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you don’t have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.  Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form you’ll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto Klosterstraße 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce we’ve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we’ll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract we’ll open a Basiskonto for you. You’ll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That’s the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didn’t meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

question: Wie sperre ich die kontaktlose Bezahlfunktion meiner Karte?
answer: Derzeit nur für iOS-Nutzer in der mobilen App verfügbar. Kontaktloses Bezahlen ist sehr praktisch. Vielleicht bevorzugst du es jedoch, diese Zahlungsmethode zu deaktivieren, um unberechtigte Transaktionen mit deiner Karte zu verhindern. Deshalb kannst du jetzt gezielt NFC-Zahlungen für deine Karte deaktivieren:Gehe auf Karten.Wenn du mehrere Karten hast, wische nach rechts, bis die gewünschte Karte erscheint.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Schalte die Funktion Kontaktlose Bezahlung aus.Die von dir vorgenommenen Änderungen werden sofort auf die von dir gewählte Karte angewendet. Beachte bitte, dass sich diese Einstellungen auf deine physische Karte beziehen. Zur Verwaltung deiner Einstellungen für Google Pay und Apple Pay haben wir spezielle Artikel für dich zusammengestellt. Falls de Probleme mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlfunktion hast, lerne hier, wie du sie beheben kannst.

question: Come posso proteggere la mia identità?
answer: Per proteggere ed evitare l'uso improprio dei tuoi dati personali, tieni presente che:Non ti chiederemo mai di verificare la tua identità per conto di altre persone o società. Ciò include verifiche per contratti di affitto di appartamenti, linee di credito o offerte di lavoro (compresi i lavori con N26). Completa il processo di verifica solo se desideri aprire un conto bancario N26.Come proprietario dell'account, solo tu dovresti creare e avere accesso ai tuoi dati di accesso.Non creare mai un conto bancario N26 con un indirizzo email e una password predefiniti. Se usi le credenziali di accesso che ti sono state fornite, queste credenziali possono essere utilizzate per raggiungere le tue informazioni personali e legali. Inoltre, non accedere mai ad un account N26 che non è il tuo.Non inviare mai i dati del tuo documento di identità a destinatari sconosciuti o non verificati.N26 può richiedere determinati documenti quando una transazione è soggetta a un controllo di routine. Invia una documentazione valida solo agli account di posta elettronica N26 verificati.N26 non chiederà mai il nome utente, la password o i codici PIN al di fuori dell'app N26. Non fornire mai queste informazioni in un sito Web o un'app esterna, anche se sembra correlata a N26.Se avessi ricevuto una richiesta sospetta da una terza parte o pensi che i tuoi dati di accesso N26 possano essere compromessi, non esitare a contattarci.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can’t be used for online purchases.

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Security.Name and sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You’ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it’s really you changing your information so we can’t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account and select Settings then Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: What if my balance is negative?
answer: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships. Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited. In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

question: Meine Karte läuft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?
