answer: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erhältst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten. Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren möchtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine persönlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Wenn deine Karte bald abläuft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestätigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu. Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit gültig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die Möglichkeit, deine Adresse zu bestätigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gemäß den örtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte für meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don’t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback? Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.  N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant’s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn’t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26 You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp. Go to the ‘Home’ tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute Tap ‘Get help with this transaction’ and follow the steps provided. Important: If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you’ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You’ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.  If you select a transaction but the ‘Get help’ button doesn’t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you’ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you’ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you’ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we’ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
answer: Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App nutzen wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.Hier erfährst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter 👤 Mein Konto > Persönliche Details > Persönliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein Häkchen setzen bei "Anderen N26 Kunden in meinen Kontakten erlauben, mich für Überweisungen einfach zu finden".

question: Perché devo inviare altri documenti?
answer: Dopo aver avviato il processo di verifica per aprire il tuo conto corrente N26 e aver ricevuto un'email da parte nostra con la richiesta di ulteriori informazioni per procedere con la tua registrazione, leggi le informazioni sottostanti come supporto per andare avanti con la procedura.N26 è una banca regolamentata e in alcune situazioni potremmo aver bisogno di informazioni aggiuntive dai nostri clienti per procedere con l'iscrizione. Si tratta di una richiesta standard conforme ai requisiti legali e normativi. Dovrai fornirci documenti specifici per aprire un conto corrente N26.Sappiamo che queste informazioni sono molto personali e ti assicuriamo che le informazioni che ci invii rimarranno rigorosamente riservate. Inoltre, verranno utilizzate solo per adempiere ai nostri obblighi legali.Quali documenti devo inviare?Per i titolari di un conto con IBAN ItalianoSe sei possessore di un conto corrente N26 con IBAN italiano e hai ricevuto una comunicazione da parte nostra con la richiesta di fornire documentazione aggiuntiva, ti preghiamo gentilmente di rispondere al messaggio entro la scadenza indicata. Qui di seguito, ti indichiamo i documenti che potrebbero essere necessari al fine di verificare le informazioni richieste. Ti ricordiamo che, se non risponderai alla nostra richiesta o se i documenti inviati non saranno validi o leggibili, alcune funzionalità del tuo conto potrebbero essere ristrette. 1. Un documento che attesti la tua residenza, come ad esempio:Certificato di residenzaDocumentazione per il vistoDocumentazione su attività di studio in corso (iscrizione all'università o a un corso professionale a lungo termine)Libretto di circolazione del tuo veicoloQualsiasi altro documento emesso negli ultimi 90 giorni e intestato a tuo nome che possa provare il tuo indirizzo di residenzaI residenti in Italia possono scaricare il certificato di residenza a questo indirizzo (nuova tabella) se in possesso di SPID/CIE o CNS, selezionando → Certificati → "Richiedi per te stesso" → “di Residenza” → "In bollo con esenzione dal pagamento dell'imposta fino al 31/12/2022 ai sensi dell'art. 62, comma 3, del CAD"→ e selezionare “Desidero ricevere il certificato alla email” per riceverlo via email o “Desidero scaricare il certificato” per scaricarlo.2. Un documento che attesti il tuo indirizzo di domicilio, se differente da quello di residenza, come ad esempio:Bolletta del gas, acqua, internet o luce emessa negli utlimi 90 giorni e intestata a tuo nomeContratto di affittoQualsiasi altro documento intestato a tuo nome che possa provare il tuo indirizzo di domicilio3. Qualsiasi documento che possa certificare la principale fonte di reddito, come ad esempio:Contratto di lavoro o busta paga più recenteDichiarazione dei redditi (Certificazione Unica o Modello 730 o Modello Redditi Persone Fisiche)Prova della pensione di vecchiaia o del sussidio di disoccupazione (NASpI/Reddito di Cittadinanza)Ricevuta di prestazione occasionaleStato patrimoniale e reddituale (es. estratto conto bancario)Locazione immobiliare/atto di compravendita immobiliare/redditi passivi/rendite maturate sostenute da eventuali atti pubblici e/o contrattiDichiarazione rilasciata dal principale fornitore di servizi relativi a valute virtuali (VASP) utilizzato dalla data di apertura del conto4. Qualsiasi documento che possa certificare la tua principale origine dei tuoi fondi, se aggiuntiva o diversa dalla tua fonte di reddito, come ad esempio:Estratto conto bancario e/o estratto conto deposito/intermediazione titoliInformazioni su vendite di asset finanziari, plusvalenzeEredità/Lascito/DonazioneTrust/Fondo PatrimonialeAltri contratti che possano certificare l'origine dei tuoi fondi5. Se hai un conto N26 business, abbiamo anche bisogno di un documento che attesti la tua partita IVA, come ad esempio:Certificato Attribuzione Partita IVAEstratto dalla Camera di Commercio / Visura Camerale (solo per ditte individuali)Una fattura emessa negli ultimi 90 giorni a nome della tua società unicaTi assicuriamo che i tuoi dati rimarranno strettamente riservati e verranno utilizzati solo nell'esecuzione delle attività prescritte dalla legge.Come posso inviarvi queste informazioni?Prima di tutto, accedi alla tua app mobile N26, seleziona l’icona Supporto > Messaggi da N26.Qui troverai la nostra comunicazione. Ti preghiamo di leggere attentamente le istruzioni riportate nel messaggio, e di selezionare Rispondi. Quando risponderai, dovrai inviare scansioni, fotografie e/o screenshot di ogni documento richiesto, con una descrizione dettagliata. Tutto deve essere chiaro e leggibile e non superare i 25 MB totali.Importante: inviare informazioni false e/o inaccurate è un reato penale. Se le informazioni non sono veritiere o incomplete non potremo accettare la tua richiesta.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select Forgot? in the app or Forgot your password? (new tab) in the WebApp (new tab) during login. We’ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a “passphrase” rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase “hard to guess, easy to remember”. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you’ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Was ist eine Sicherheitsfußzeile und warum haben wir eine solche eingefügt?
answer: Eine Sicherheitsfußzeile ist eine personalisierte Nachricht, die am Ende von E-Mails und digitalen Dokumenten eingefügt wird und als Echtheitssiegel dienen soll.Durch das Hinzufügen deines vollständigen Namens am Ende jeder E-Mail möchten wir dir helfen, zwischen legitimen E-Mails von N26 und Phishing-E-Mails von Betrügern zu unterscheiden. Auch wenn eine Sicherheitsfußzeile nicht eindeutig beweisen kann, dass eine E-Mail von einer verifizierten Quelle stammt, trägt sie dazu bei, das Risiko von Deceptive Pishing – der häufigsten Art von Phishing-Angriffen – zu verringern.Was ist Deceptive Phishing?Deceptive Phishing ist der illegale Versand von generischen Phishing-E-Mails an eine große Anzahl unbekannter Personen mit dem Ziel, unter Vortäuschung falscher Angaben an vertrauliche Informationen zu gelangen.Wie wird dies erreicht? Betrüger kontaktieren ihre Zielpersonen unter dem Vorwand, für renommierte Unternehmen zu arbeiten. Den Zielpersonen wird dann mit Markenbildern, zeitkritischen Szenarien und irreführender Sprache ein falsches Gefühl der Sicherheit vorgegaukelt. Sobald sie an der Angel hängen, versuchen die Betrüger, ihre Opfer dahingehend zu manipulieren, dass sie auf ihre Forderungen eingehen.Wie kannst du dich schützen?Achte besonders auf E-Mails, die du von Banken, Kunden, Arbeitgebern usw. erhältst. Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, etwas zu unternehmen, handele nie aus einem Impuls heraus, sondern überlege immer genau, bevor du handelst. Wenn du das Gefühl hast, dass etwas nicht stimmt, solltest du dieses Gefühl Ernst nehmen. Achte auf Rechtschreib- und Grammatikfehler, fahre mit dem Mauszeiger über versteckte URLs (klicke nicht darauf), überprüfe die Absenderangaben und informiere dich genauer darüber – ein schneller Online-Check kann dir helfen, die Identität eines Absenders zu verifizieren.Wenn du eine verdächtige E-Mail, einen verdächtigen Smartphone-Anruf und/oder eine verdächtige SMS im Namen von N26 erhalten hast, leite dein Anliegen an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com weiter. Wenn du Fragen zu deinem Konto klären möchtest, kannst du über unsere mobile App mit uns chatten.Erfahre mehr über:Wie du verdächtige Phishing-Angriffe meldest (neuen Tab)Wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und verhindern kannst (neuen Tab)So schützt du dich vor Social Engineering (neuen Tab)

question: Redondeo
answer: La función del permite a los usuarios premium redondear cada pago con tarjeta a la cifra entera inmediatamente superior y transferir la diferencia al espacio que elijan.El redondeo no te harán incurrir en descubierto, de modo que solo se realizará mientras tengas saldo suficiente para cubrir el redondeo.Solo puedes tener un redondeo activo al mismo tiempo, que se transferirá al Espacio que tú elijas.Puedes desactivar la función del en cualquier momento.Si cierras el espacio donde tengas habilitado el redondeo, la función se deshabilitará hasta que vuelvas a habilitarla desde un espacio activo.¿Cómo utilizar el Ahorro por ?Activar el es rápido y sencillo; solo tienes que iniciar sesión en la app del móvil o la WebApp de N26:Ve a «Espacios».Selecciona el espacio en el que quieres que se ingrese el .Pulsa/haz clic en «Administrar --> Administrar redondeos».Pulsa el botón de «Administrar redondeos» hasta que cambie a color verde.Elige el multiplicador y pulsa/haz clic en Confirmar.¡Empieza a ahorrar en tu próxima compra con tu tarjeta de débito de N26!

question: Bereavement & probate
answer:
How can I inform N26 about a death? In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceased’s bank accounts. The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: sucesiones@n26.comFax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en España -Sucesiones-
Paseo de la Castellana 43
28046 Madrid, ESPANAN26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en España 
c/o N26 Bank GmbH -Sucesiones-
Rungestr. 22 
10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on: Who is the deceased? If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account. Please always provide us with the official version: Certificado literal de defunción.How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.  A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance or establishment of an  inventory) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us. We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings. Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you. What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?  Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country. However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en España is located in Spain. As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be disabled. As well as any regular payments such as standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates will not be executed anymore.Further, please be aware we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax of the assets belonging to the estate. It might be necessary to complete a certain set of questions in order to release assets with N26.We also recommend getting in touch with the relevant tax authorities in your country, in order to fulfil local tax requirements (if any). We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceased’s account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death? There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes. It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited. Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this. For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service. 
I am the heir or beneficiary, how can I obtain a certificate of assets (Certificado de Posiciones)? 
For the probate proceedings in Spain a certificate from the bank is regularly needed. The so-called “Certificado de Posiciones” is a summary of the account status on the day of death. N26 can provide beneficiaries with this document:If you are mentioned in the deceased’s testament or you can claim your rights on the applicable succession law. In most cases the following documentation shall be present:  A certificate from the Spanish testament register entry is needed: Certificación de Registro General de Actos de Última Voluntad (RGAUV)  if the RGAUV-certificate is positive and a testament has been made by the deceased, we need a copy of that testament If the RGAUV-certificate is negative and no testament has been established, we require documents that prove your family relationship with the deceased. These can be for instance birth or marriage certificates For legal reasons, we may require further documentation on which the beneficiaries will be informed. N26 will communicate all necessary steps accordingly and individually. Please note that balance statements or regular account confirmations (downloaded from the N26 App or within the customers online banking) do not fulfil the requirements of a certificate of assets (Certificado de Posiciones).

question: How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here’s how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV.   * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‘Add money’ button.

question: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
answer: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience. You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the Apple App Store (new tab) or the Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‘DE’ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‘Direct Debits’: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don’t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space’s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‘Spaces’ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‘Space Settings’ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' » Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' » Accept the T&C's » Enter your confirmation PIN » Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‘cog icon’)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on “Send money”Select “Bank transfer”Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
answer: No problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card. My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it’s important that we know who our customers are. That’s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We’ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities. If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won’t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Come si crea uno Spazio Condiviso?
answer: Per creare uno Spazio Condiviso:Crea uno Spazio nella sezione Spaces della tua app N26.Seleziona l’icona +, nell’angolo in alto a destra della pagina, e clicca su 'Risparmiare insieme'.Cerca e seleziona l’utente N26 da invitare nella tua lista di contatti. Se l'utente N26 non appare nella tua lista di contatti, ti raccomandiamo di contattare la persona in questione e verificare che abbia dato il consenso per essere visibile ad altri utenti N26 tramite app. Per rendersi visibili bisogna entrare nella sezione: Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali> Informazioni personali.Leggi e accetta le condizioni generali del servizio e clicca su “Rilascia la procura”.Inserisci il tuo PIN di confermaConferma la notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato per inviare l’invito al partecipante.Scopri di piùCosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

question: Chargeback: Wie du eine Kartenzahlung stornieren kannst
answer: Du hast auf deinem monatlichen Kontoauszug von N26 eine Kartenzahlung entdeckt, die du nicht getätigt hast? Oder hast du etwas online bestellt, aber nie erhalten? Keine Sorge! Dieser Artikel hilft dir, genau diese Probleme zu lösen.Was bedeutet Chargeback? Das Chargeback-Verfahren bezeichnet eine Ausgleichsbuchung. Dabei wird der Betrag, den der Händler fälschlicherweise abgebucht hat, auf die bei der Zahlung genutzte Karte zurückgebucht. Der Ausgleich wird geleistet, sobald der Erstattungsantrag des Käufers erfolgreich abgewickelt wurde. N26 bietet das Chargeback-Verfahren über Mastercard an. So kannst du Transaktionen stornieren lassen, die nicht von dir getätigt wurden oder bei denen der Händler etwas Falsches gebucht hat. Falls du zum Beispiel online einen Artikel bestellt, diesen aber nicht zum angegebenen Lieferdatum erhalten hast, kannst du über Chargeback von Mastercard dein Geld zurückverlangen.So funktioniert das Chargeback-Verfahren mit N26Du kannst eine Transaktion über die N26 Web-App oder die mobile App stornieren lassen.Gehe in den Home Bereich und wähle die Transaktion aus, die du reklamieren möchtest.Dann wähle Erhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung.Wichtig: Falls du das Chargeback-Verfahren aufgrund einer unautorisierten Buchung nutzen willst, musst du zuerst deine Karte sperren und eine neue Karte bestellen, um weiteren Kartenmissbrauch zu verhindern. Vorher können wir deinen Erstattungsantrag nicht bearbeiten. Du hast die Möglichkeit, deine alte Karte direkt in der App zu sperren und im Anschluss eine neue zu bestellen.Du hast eine Transaktion ausgewählt, die Option “Erhalte Hilfe zu dieser Zahlung” wird jedoch nicht angezeigt? Dann ist die Transaktion noch nicht vollständig autorisiert und du musst warten, bis daraus eine Buchung wird. In diesem Artikel erfährst du, was Autorisierungen und Buchungen sind (neuen Tab).Falls du dein Konto bereits geschlossen und keinen Zugang zur App hast, dann schreibe unserem Support eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab) von deiner bei der Registrierung genutzten E-Mail-Adresse.Antworten auf häufig gestellte Fragen rund um das Chargeback-Verfahren haben wir in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab) für dich aufgelistet.

question: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (“IRS”).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we’ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States? 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being “subject to tax” in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you’re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don’t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (“SSN”) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn’t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: ¿Cómo cancelar mi suscripción Premium?
answer:
Las suscripciones a las cuentas N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal  tienen una duración inicial de un año y se renuevan automáticamente después de los primeros 12 meses. Después, pasan a ser indefinidas.Puedes cancelar la renovación automática en cualquier momento, durante los primeros 12 meses de suscripción.Después de esta renovación, la suscripción pasa a ser indefinida, pero puedes cancelarla cuando lo desees.En este artículo te explicamos la diferencia entre revocación, cancelación de la suscripción y cancelación de la renovación de tu suscripción. Tienes 3 opciones:Revocar el contrato de tu suscripción durante el plazo de revocación de 14 días (este es un plazo legal, puedes solicitarlo poniéndote en contacto con nosotros).Cancelar la renovación de tu contrato cuando quieras antes de que finalice el primer contrato de 12 meses poniéndote en contacto con nosotros a través del chat.Cancelar el contrato de tu suscripción cuando lo desees (puedes cancelarlo de inmediato y sin limitaciones contactando con nosotros a través del chat).Pasar de una cuenta Premium a otra Premium Si quieres, ahora puedes cambiar de una cuenta premium a otra de categoría inferior sin necesidad de pasarte a una cuenta Estándar para conservar todos tus Espacios, redondeos, ingresos, tarjetas y pagos actuales.Para ello, inicia sesión en la app del móvil, ve a Mi cuenta y abre los datos de tu Suscripción. Seleccionando Modificar Suscripción podrás elegir otra suscripción premium que se ajuste a tus necesidades. RevocaciónPuedes revocar el contrato de tu suscripción durante el plazo de revocación de 14 días. Este plazo comienza en cuanto se cobra la primera comisión mensual. Solo tienes que contactarnos y te ayudaremos. Si revocas cualquiera de nuestros planes premium, podrás volver a contratar la misma u otra categoría.Cancelar la renovación de tu contratoTu suscripción premium N26 tiene un periodo inicial de 12 meses.  Pasados los primeros 12 meses, el contrato se renovará automáticamente y pasará a tener un período indefinido, a menos que te pongas en contacto con nosotros y pidas cancelar la renovación.Puedes solicitarlo en cualquier momento antes de tu fecha de renovación de 12 meses; además, te notificaremos de la renovación por email 8 semanas antes de que se cumplan estos 12 meses.Si decides cancelar tu renovación, podrás seguir utilizando tu Mastercard N26 y todas las ventajas de tu suscripción premium hasta que expire tu contrato. También seguirás disfrutando de tu seguro (para N26 You y N26 Metal) mientras sigas pagando la comisión del contrato. Después, se te emitirá una tarjeta virtual en la fecha del aniversario del contrato en cuanto pases a una cuenta gratuita. El saldo mínimo obligatorio es de 10 €. No hace falta que contactes con nosotros, se tramitará automáticamente.Cancelar tu contrato cuando lo deseesSi quieres rescindir tu contrato una vez transcurrido el plazo de 14 días, contáctanos. Si escoges esta opción con N26 You o N26 Metal, dejarás de tener las ventajas del seguro y tus tarjetas premium Smart, You y Metal también se desactivarán.Si quieres cerrar tu cuenta de forma permanente, consulta nuestro artículo sobre ¿Cómo cerrar la cuenta?Preguntas Frecuentes sobre la cancelación de una cuenta premium de N26¿Tengo que cerrar mi cuenta para cancelar mi suscripción premium?
No. Simplemente puedes cambiar tu suscripción en la app N26 y tu nueva cuenta se creará al instante.¿Qué pasa con mi IBAN si cancelo su suscripción premium?
Cambiar tu suscripción no afecta a tus datos bancarios, por lo que tu IBAN se mantendrá sin cambios.

question: ¿Qué es una cuenta N26 Business?
answer: N26 Business es una solución sencilla y asequible para todas tus necesidades financieras comerciales. La cuenta N26 Business es una cuenta corriente digital, segura e intuitiva que puedes contratar en cuestión de minutos. Es sencilla, transparente y gratuita*; te permite recibir pagos de clientes, enviar dinero y pagar con seguridad, separando tus finanzas comerciales completamente de tus finanzas personales. Nuestras cuentas comerciales están concebidas para autónomos y profesionales independientes que trabajan por cuenta propia (es decir, que no puedes tener el nombre de una empresa en tu cuenta ni tu tarjeta). Actualmente, no se puede cambiar de una cuenta personal a una comercial, así que decide qué cuenta es más adecuada para ti antes de abrirla.¿Qué incluye una cuenta N26 Business?Nuestra cuenta N26 Business incluye las siguientes ventajas y funciones:Cuenta Business gratuita*: Puedes abrir una cuenta N26 Business online de forma gratuita, sin comisiones de administración (*a partir de un saldo de 50 000 €, puede aplicarse una comisión de custodia).Tarjeta virtual: La cuenta incluye una tarjeta virtual gratuita con fines exclusivamente comerciales. La tarjeta virtual tiene un número PAN completo y puede vincularse a tu wallet de Apple o Google para realizar compras online o en establecimientos. También puedes retirar dinero con Apple o Google Pay en cajeros con función contactless.Mastercard física de N26: Por 10 € más, puedes recibir una Mastercard física de N26 Estándar (te advertimos de que necesitarás un saldo mínimo de 10 € en tu cuenta para posibilitar la fabricación y el envío de la tarjeta).Tarjeta Maestro: Si también necesitas una tarjeta para tus gastos privados y estás sujeto a los Términos y condiciones de DE, AT y NL, puedes pedir una tarjeta Maestro por otros 10 € adicionales.Pagos y transferencias: Puedes enviar y recibir transferencias SEPA empleando tu app móvil de N26. Además, puedes realizar envíos instantáneos de dinero a otros clientes de N26 a través de MoneyBeam. A diferencia de otras cuentas, las transferencias en monedas extranjeras no pueden realizarse a través de la app con N26 Business. Para eso, puedes visitar Wise (pestaña nueva).Reembolsos Business: Cada mes, recibirás un reembolso del 0,1 % por cada pago que hayas realizado con la tarjeta.No obstante, los pagos de empresa a empresa (B2B) no son compatibles con la cuenta N26 Business.

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then “add a new recipient”,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You’ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you’ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select “Send Money” then choose “Bank Transfer”. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: ¿Cómo retirar e ingresar dinero en efectivo con CASH26?
answer: Disponible para las cuentas abiertas en España, Alemania, Austria, Italia y Grecia.Lo único que necesitas es tu móvil vinculado. Abre el mapa de CASH26 en la app y haz zoom para encontrar el establecimiento más cercano. Una vez en el establecimiento, crea un código de barras CASH26 y enséñalo en la pantalla de tu móvil a la persona que haya en el mostrador, diciendo que quieres depositar o retirar dinero con nuestro socio Viacash:¿Cómo sacar dinero sin tarjeta con CASH26?Desde la pestaña Tarjetas de tu app N26, selecciona CASH26 > Retirada.Elige la cantidad que quieres retirar (máximo 200 €/retirada y 900 €/24 horas).Introduce tu PIN de confirmación (pestaña nueva) y confirma la transacción en la notificación push. Muestra el código de barras en la pantalla de tu móvil. La persona que te atienda lo escaneará y te dará el dinero.¿Cómo ingresar dinero en efectivo en N26?Desde la pestaña Tarjetas de tu app N26, selecciona CASH26 > Depósito.Elige la cantidad que quieres ingresar (mínimo 50 €).Introduce tu PIN de confirmación (pestaña nueva) y confirma la transacción en la notificación push. Muestra el código de barras en la pantalla de tu móvil a la persona que te atienda para que lo escanee y entrégale el dinero. Puede tardar hasta 10 minutos en verse reflejado en el saldo de tu cuenta en la app N26.¡Importante!El código de barras dura solo 10 minutos. Si no lo usas a tiempo, caducará y tendrás que generar uno nuevo. Si te equivocas en la cantidad, puedes borrarlo pulsando el icono de la papelera en la esquina superior derecha (o dejar que caduque) y generar uno nuevo.No es necesario que realices ninguna compra en el establecimiento para depositar o retirar dinero.Lee este otro artículo para conocer los detalles y los límites de CASH26.

question: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift rückgängig machen?
answer: Eine Rücklastschrift bedeutet nicht, dass dein Vertrag mit dem Händler gekündigt wurde.Du hast die Möglichkeit, eine Lastschrift in der App bis zu 8 Wochen nach der Belastung selbst rückgängig zu machen. Nachdem du in der App auf Rücklastschrift getippt hast, dauert es bis zu 2 Bankarbeitstage, bis Lastschriftbetrag wieder gutschrieben wird.Lastschrift in meinem Hauptkonto rückgängig machen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einÖffne deine Umsatzliste und wähle die entsprechende Lastschrift ausTippe auf RücklastschriftLastschrift in einem Space mit IBAN (Unterkonto) rückgängig machen:Du kannst in der App auch eine SEPA-Rücklastschrift für deine Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN beantragen:Logge dich in die mobile App von N26 einTippe auf Spaces (Unterkonten)Gehe zum Space, in dem du eine Lastschrift rückgängig machen willstWähle die entsprechende Transaktion ausTippe auf Rücklastschrift*Für Länder mit einer anderen Hauptwährung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landeswährung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempfängers die Gebühren für den Währungsumtausch sowie den endgültigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Das gilt für folgende Länder: Bulgarien, Kroatien, Tschechien, Dänemark, Ungarn, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, Rumänien, Schweden, Schweiz

question: Where can I use my Maestro card?
answer: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLet’s get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can’t be used for online purchases and it’s not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each ATM transaction using your Maestro is €2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). You can order your Maestro card directly in the app.If you’re having issues using your Maestro, first check that your card settings are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and we’ll look into it for you.

question: Come collegare o scollegare il mio smartphone al conto?
answer:
Dovrai associare uno smartphone quando crei un conto per la prima volta, se hai acquistato un nuovo dispositivo o se hai cambiato numero di telefono.Tieni presente che se cambi solo la tua SIM ma mantieni il tuo telefono, non sarà necessario associare nuovamente il tuo dispositivo.Controlla i Requisiti di sistema per l’app N26 (nuova tabella).Come faccio ad associare il mio smartphone al conto?Per associare un nuovo smartphone al tuo conto N26, ti servirà la tua N26 Mastercard fisica. Come associare uno smartphone per la prima voltaPer collegare il tuo smartphone a un conto N26 per la prima volta:effettua l'accesso all'app N26. Ti verrà chiesto in automatico di confermare il tuo numero di telefono;inserisci il codice di 4 cifre che ti invieremo via SMS (nuova tabella) per collegare il tuo telefono.Se vuoi collegare un nuovo dispositivo, devi prima scollegare il tuo vecchio smartphone per motivi di sicurezza (nuova tabella).Come dissociare il tuo vecchio dispositivoaccedi a 👤 Il mio conto sulla tua app N26 clicca su Sicurezza;seleziona Dissocia il telefonoQualora non avessi accesso al tuo vecchio telefono:Accedi all tua WebAppaccedi a 👤 Il mio conto;clicca su Sicurezza;Seleziona Dissocia il telefonoriceverai subito un'email contenente maggiori informazioni.Come associare un nuovo dispositivo
Ricorda: puoi collegare solo uno smartphone alla volta per ogni conto. Segui i passaggi indicati sopra per scollegare il tuo vecchio telefono.Accedi alla tua app N26Verifica i tuoi dati di accesso con il codice SMS a 6 cifreSeleziona “Associa ora il dispositivo”Apri l’email di convalida che riceverai sul tuo dispositivoClicca su “Conferma” nel messaggioSarai poi reindirizzato alla tua app, dove dovrai richiedere un nuovo codice via SMSInserisci il codice di 4 cifre che ti invieremo via SMSInserisci il tuo PIN di confermaIl tuo dispositivo è adesso associato al conto.

question: Warum war eine Zahlung höher als erwartet?
answer: Ganz gleich, ob es sich um eine Kartenzahlung oder eine Lastschrift handelt – wenn eine Zahlung höher ausfällt als ursprünglich gedacht, kommt dir das erst einmal verdächtig vor. Es gibt jedoch ein paar Gründe, warum der tatsächlich abgebuchte Betrag vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:  Es handelt sich um eine Transaktion inklusive einer KautionEs handelt sich um eine Transaktion in einer FremdwährungIn beiden Fällen kann es so aussehen, als sei eine Zahlung zu hoch. Sehen wir uns die beiden Szenarien genauer an: Du fährst in den Urlaub und mietest am Flughafen ein Auto. Du bezahlst die Mietwagengebühr mit deiner N26 Mastercard. Der abgebuchte Betrag fällt jedoch höher aus, weil die Autovermietung auch die Kaution für den Mietwagen autorisiert, also geblockt hat. Wenn du am Ende deines Urlaubs den Mietwagen unversehrt zurückbringst, erlischt die Autorisierung und der Betrag ist auf deinem Konto nach maximal 30 Tagen wieder voll verfügbar. Mehr über den Unterschied zwischen Autorisierungen und tatsächlichen Buchungen erfährst du hier.Du bestellst ein Produkt in einem Onlineshop und zahlst mit deiner Karte. Der Onlineshop sitzt außerhalb der Eurozone und bietet ausschließlich Zahlungen in Fremdwährungen an, zum Beispiel Dollar oder Pfund. Je nach aktuellem Wechselkurs kann der gebuchte Betrag auf deinem Konto von der ursprünglichen Summe abweichen. Dies lässt sich aufgrund von Schwankungen auf dem Devisenmarkt nicht vermeiden. Mehr zu Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen erfährst du hier.In beiden Fällen berechnen wir keine Zinsen für die Differenz.Keines der beiden Szenarien trifft zu und du bist sicher, dass du zu viel bezahlt hast? Wenn die Transaktion sicher nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, können wir dir helfen, dein Geld zurückzubekommen.

question: Warum wurde meine Überweisung in der N26 App noch nicht ausgeführt?
answer: Du brauchst deine Bestätigungs-PIN für alle Transaktionen, egal ob MoneyBeam, Daueraufträge oder CASH26. Deine Überweisung bleibt ausstehend, bis du sie per Push-Nachricht in der App bestätigst oder abbrichst.Deine Bestätigungs-PIN unterscheidet sich von deiner Karten-PIN, aber du kannst für beide die gleiche Zahlenkombination verwenden. Sobald du dein Smartphone verknüpft hast, wirst du aufgefordert, die Bestätigungs-PIN zu erstellen (die Karten-PIN legst du erst bei der Aktivierung der Karte fest).Wenn du deine Bestätigungs-PIN sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird sie aus Sicherheitsgründen gesperrt. Du kannst sie in der App wiederherstellen.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder. Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take. Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details. 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can’t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You’re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our T&Cs (new tab) or § 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes. According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you’d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We’re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don’t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don’t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Kann ich ein Konto eröffnen, wenn ich außerhalb der Eurozone wohne?
answer: Wenn du in Polen, Schweden, Dänemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island oder der Schweiz lebst, kannst du ein N26 Konto eröffnen. Wir bieten dir:Die Wahl zwischen einem Standard-Konto oder N26 Business.Ein Konto in Euro, eine deutsche IBAN und Überweisungen per SEPA oder MoneyBeam.Einen günstigen Wechselkurs mit deiner Mastercard Debitkarte.Kostenloser Versand deiner Mastercard oder Expressversand für 25€.Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen mit Wise (neuen Tab) (mit dem Standard-Konto).3-5 gebührenfreie Abhebungen am Geldautomaten (1.7% Gebühr auf Abhebungen in Fremdwährungen).0.1% Cashback auf alle Kartenzahlungen ( bei N26 Business).2 zusätzliche Spaces zu deinem HauptkontoEinen Bonus für alle Freunde, die du über unser Freundschaftswerbungsprogramm erfolgreich zu N26 einlädst.Kontaktlose Zahlungen mit Google Pay und Apple Pay.Tipps für ein- und ausgehende Zahlungen:Damit du stets den günstigsten Wechselkurs erhältst, empfehlen wir dir, bei Einkäufen und Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard stets deine Landeswährung auszuwählen (andernfalls können zusätzliche Gebühren anfallen).Um Geld in deiner Landeswährung auf dein Euro-Konto einzuzahlen, empfehlen wir dir eine SEPA-Überweisung über die Wise-Website (neuen Tab), unser Partner für Geldtransfers in Fremdwährungen. Alternativ kannst du auch über deine örtliche Bank Geld überweisen.Ausgehende Überweisungen auf Euro-Konten kannst du ganz einfach über die Standardfunktion in der N26 App tätigen. Überweisungen auf Konten in Fremdwährungen kannst du über Wise auch in der App tätigen.**Bitte beachte: Wise ist nicht für N26 Business verfügbar (nur SEPA-Überweisungen in Euro).

question: How to change my card limits?
answer: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:€1,000 for withdrawals from ATMs€5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500€ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050€ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:€20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: Come gestire la mia visibilità come utente N26?
answer: Per poterti offrire l'accesso a tutte le opzioni presenti nell'app, N26 associa i tuoi dati con altri utenti N26.Per gestire il tuo consenso ad essere visibile come utente N26, puoi andare nell’app su 👤 Il mio conto > Profilo > Informazioni personali. Successivamente dovrai solo spuntare o rimuovere la spunta dalla casella “Consenti ai miei contatti che utilizzano N26 di trovarmi facilmente per effettuare bonifici.”Gli utenti N26 che hanno deciso di rendersi visibili appariranno nella tua lista contatti. Allo stesso tempo, se ti sei reso visibile, anche tu apparirai nella lista contatti di altri utenti N26. Perchè devo essere visibile ad altri utenti N26?Puoi avere accesso a tutte i nostri prodotti presenti nell'app, come ad esempio Moneybeam, che ti permette di trasferire denaro in maniera instantanea senza utilizzare un IBAN, ma solo selezionando un nome dalla tua lista dei contatti. Viceversa, puoi anche richiedere un trasferimento da uno dei tuoi contatti, il quale dovrà solo accettare (o declinare) la richiesta. Renderti visibile ti permetterà, inoltre, di usare Spazi Condivisi, sottoconti tramite i quali potrai condividere denaro con altri utenti N26.

question: How does N26 Business work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.It’s not yet possible to switch between accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: Who is a Politically Exposed Person?
answer:
A politically exposed person is a natural person who occupies or has ceased to occupy important public offices less than a year ago. Their family members and people with whom they have close relations should also be included in this category.Individuals who occupy or have occupied important public office are:President of the Republic, President of the Council, Minister, Vice-Minister and Undersecretary, President of the Region, Regional Councillor, Mayor of a provincial capital or metropolitan city, Mayor of a municipality with a population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants and similar offices in foreign states;Member of Parliament, Senator, Member of the European Parliament, Regional Councillor and similar offices in foreign states;Member of the central governing bodies of political parties;Judge of the Constitutional Court, magistrate of the Court of Cassation or the Court of Auditors, State Councillor, other members of the Administrative Justice Council for the Sicilian Region and similar offices in foreign states;Member of the governing bodies of central banks and independent authorities;Ambassador, chargé d'affaires and equivalent offices in foreign States, senior officer of the armed forces and similar offices in foreign States;Member of the administrative, management or control bodies of companies controlled, even indirectly, by the Italian State or by a foreign State or controlled, predominantly or wholly, by the Regions, by provincial capitals and metropolitan cities and by municipalities with a total population of not less than 15,000 inhabitants;General Manager of ASL and of the hospital company, of the university hospital company and of the other bodies of the national health service.Director, deputy director and member of the management body or equivalent functions in international organizations.
Family members of politically exposed persons are: parents; spouse or person in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation;children and their spouses and persons linked to their children in a civil partnership or de facto cohabitation.The persons with whom PEPs are known to have close relations are:natural persons linked to the politically exposed person due to the joint effective ownership of legal entities or other close business relationship;natural persons who only formally hold total control of a notoriously established entity, de facto, in the interest and for the benefit of a politically exposed person.

question: How to create a Shared Space?
answer:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the ‘Learn more’ information and tap the ‘Invite new member’ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you’ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‘Accept power of attorney’ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the ‘Send Invite’ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand N26 Insurance allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the “Insurance” banner you find. You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp. How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim. Am I eligible? N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can’t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: Wie verknüpfe ich mein N26 Konto mit PayPal?
answer:
Wenn du möchtest, kannst du dein N26 Konto mit deinem PayPal-Konto verknüpfen und so von einer Reihe von Vorteilen profitieren.Du kannst in Echtzeit dein Konto aufladen sowie schnelle Zahlungen senden und empfangen – und zwar auch absolut sichere Weise, ohne deine Bankdaten oder die Nummer deiner N26 Karte angeben zu müssen.Hier erfährst du, wie du dein N26 Konto mit PayPal über dessen Website verknüpfen kannst:Klicke oben auf der Seite auf Wallet.Wähle Karte oder Konto verknüpfen.Klicke auf Konto verknüpfen.Folge den bereitgestellten Anweisungen.
Wenn du stattdessen die mobile PayPal-App nutzt:Klicke oben rechts auf Einstellungen.Wähle Karte oder Konto verknüpfen.Klicke auf das Pluszeichen (+) und wähle Konto aus.Gib deine Bankdaten ein und bestätige diese.
Achte darauf, deinen Vor- und Nachnamen genau so einzugeben, wie er auf deinem N26 Konto erscheint, da sonst die Verknüpfung mit PayPal fehlschlägt.Sobald dein N26 Konto bestätigt ist, erhebt PayPal zwei geringe Gebühren, die dir dann innerhalb von 2–3 Werktagen auf dein Konto zurückerstattet werden.An diesem Punkt musst du einfach die Höhe der zurückerstatteten Gebühren eintragen, dich in dein PayPal-Konto einloggen und die Verknüpfung deines N26 Kontos von deinem Wallet aus bestätigen.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive. Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What’s a “banking day”?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn’t arrived — where is it?So what if you’ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn’t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can’t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder. Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take. Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details. 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can’t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You’re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our T&Cs (new tab) or § 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes. According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you’d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We’re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don’t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don’t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Why isn’t my photo verification working?
answer: ℹ️ Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review the guide (new tab) we’ve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photo verifications fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure you’re the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesn’t go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, we’ll send you your N26 Mastercard. Deliveries take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.

question: Du bist Opfer eines Betrugs geworden? Kontaktiere uns.
answer:
Du hast per Banküberweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen Betrüger überwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschließlich für die oben beschriebenen Fälle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortäuschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du N26 Kunde bist und eine autorisierte oder unautorisierte Kartenzahlung in deiner Transaktionshistorie reklamieren willst, nutze bitte unseren dafür vorgesehenen vollumfänglichen Service in der App! Die obige Hotline hilft ausschließlich bei Banküberweisungen an ein verdächtiges Konto mit einer N26 IBAN.Hast du eine SMS mit einem verdächtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link öffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empfängst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu öffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab) Die geöffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine persönlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie außerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, für N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verdächtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zusätzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu bestätigen. Bestätige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der Zahlungsempfänger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verdächtigen Link geöffnet habe?Ändere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zunächst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort ändern. Alternativ kannst du im Login–Bildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den nächsten Schritten.Falls du persönliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto geschützt bleibt. Bitte schicke außerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (neuen Tab) (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung oder sogar eine autorisierte Zahlung anfechten willst, die du mit deiner N26 Mastercard gemacht hast, kannst du dein Geld zurückbekommen. Erfahre Schritt-für-Schritt, wie du eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren (neuen Tab) kannst.Was tun bei einer unautorisierten Zahlung?Falls du eine unautorisierte Zahlung in deinem Konto hast, musst du eine neue Karte bestellen, damit dein Konto sicher bleibt und um weitere unautorisierte Zahlungen zu verhindern. Logge dich in die N26 App ein, und gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Neue Karte bestellen. Wähle dabei Verloren oder Gestohlen, je nachdem was zutrifft. Wenn die Karte die ganze Zeit in deinem Besitz war, musst du noch mal bestätigen, dass du die Zahlung nicht selbst gemacht hast. Falls nötig, melde den Fall auch bei der Polizei. Folge diesen Schritten, um die Zahlung zu reklamieren.Wie schütze ich mein Konto vor BetrugHier sind einige Tipps, wie du dich vor Betrug schützen kannst:Nutze ausschließlich Geldautomaten von vertrauenswürdigen BankenKaufe online nur bei vertrauenswürdigen Shops und WebseitenÄndere regelmäßig deine Online-Passwörter und PINsVertraue keinen Nachrichten oder E-Mails, die vorgeben von N26 zu sein und dich auffordern, deine Kartennummer oder Kontodaten zu teilen, oder die verdächtige Links enthaltenN26 wird dich außerhalb der N26 App oder Web App nie nach deiner Kartennummer oder Kontodaten fragenÄndere deine Karteneinstellungen in der N26 App. Deaktiviere z.B. Online-Zahlungen, Auslandszahlungen, Bargeldabhebungen oder passe deine Zahlungslimits an dein normales Kaufverhalten an.Vermeide Zahlungen per Magnetstreifen, wenn möglich. Stattdessen empfiehlt sich die Zahlung per Chip und PIN oder per digitales Wallet. Bewahre dein Karte immer in einem sicheren Ort auf
Nützliche Links:Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeinträchtigt wurde?Was ist Phishing?

question: How to block a Direct Debit?
answer: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as “DocuSign”.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

question: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
answer: No problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card. My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

question: Comment encaisser un chèque ?
answer:
N26 est une banque 100 % numérique. Tous nos services s'effectuent en ligne et nous ne disposons pas d'agences bancaires. À ce titre, il n'est pas possible de déposer un chèque sur votre compte N26, et nous n'émettons pas de chéquiers.
Nous proposons de nombreuses façons d'alimenter votre compte N26 (nouvel onglet) facilement, rapidement et directement depuis votre smartphone.

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: Demande de remboursement : qu’est-ce que c’est et comment contester une transaction par carte ?
answer:
Votre relevé bancaire mensuel N26 comporte-t-il une transaction par carte que vous n’avez pas effectuée ? Vous avez passé une commande en ligne, mais ne l’avez jamais reçue ?
