For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (including CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.There’s always a €2 fee if you use your Maestro card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2€. Check our pricing lists if you’ve been charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: Cosa fa N26 con le mie informazioni finanziarie?
answer: Questo materiale è stato preparato esclusivamente per fini informativi e non intende fornire e non dovrebbe essere utilizzato per consulenze fiscali, legali o contabili.N26 raccoglie le tue informazioni principalmente per due motivi: per soddisfare i requisiti di conoscenza del cliente e per la segnalazione obbligatoria alle amministrazioni fiscali competenti. Obbligo di identificare i nostri clienti in base alle cosiddette norme "Know Your Customer".Come qualsiasi istituto finanziario, ai sensi delle leggi fiscali applicabili, siamo tenuti a raccogliere da te informazioni rilevanti in materia fiscale al fine di identificarti. Questi includono principalmente il tuo nome, indirizzo di residenza, paese o paesi di residenza fiscale, codice fiscale o equivalente, nonché luogo e data di nascita.Di seguito troverai le informazioni generali relative alle definizioni di residenza fiscale e numero di identificazione fiscale.Residenza fiscaleIn linea generale, un individuo ha un solo Paese di residenza (indirizzo di residenza). Tuttavia, un individuo può risiedere a fini fiscali in due o più Paesi. Questo perché i Paesi utilizzano criteri diversi (forme di vincolo) per determinare la residenza fiscale. Questi criteri possono includere, ma non solo, la presenza fisica prolungata, la nazionalità, la proprietà di beni, ecc. Se esiste un trattato fiscale tra i Paesi, le disposizioni decisive normalmente contenute in tale trattato assegneranno la residenza fiscale a uno dei Paesi in questione.Ad esempio, se hai una abitazione permanente nel Paese A e una residenza temporanea nel Paese B, le disposizioni decisive previste dal trattato fiscale tra i Paesi A e B possono stabilire che sei residente fiscale nel Paese A, dove hai una abitazione permanente, piuttosto che nel Paese B, dove hai una residenza temporanea (trattando la "abitazione permanente" come una forma di vincolo più forte della "residenza temporanea"). L’analisi per determinare la residenza fiscale si basa sui fatti e, in caso di dubbi, devi chiarirlo con l’amministrazione fiscale e/o il tuo consulente fiscale.Codice fiscale:Il numero di identificazione del contribuente (codice fiscale) è una combinazione unica di lettere o numeri assegnata dal Paese di residenza fiscale. Il TIN ti identifica ai fini dell’applicazione delle leggi fiscali del tuo paese di residenza fiscale. I TIN sono utili anche per identificare i contribuenti che investono in altri Paesi. Le specifiche del TIN (cioè il numero di lettere, i numeri e la loro sequenza) sono stabilite dalle amministrazioni fiscali di ciascun paese. Sebbene la maggior parte dei paesi emettano i TIN, alcuni non lo fanno. Il portale dello scambio automatico dell'OCSE (nuova tabella) fornisce informazioni utili sui TIN (in particolare, dove trovarli e le loro specifiche) rilasciati da molti Paesi che partecipano allo scambio automatico di informazioni in materia fiscale. In caso di dubbio sul tuo TIN, però, ti consigliamo di consultare il tuo consulente fiscale o l’amministrazione fiscale.Obbligo di comunicare alle autorità fiscali competenti le informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti di alcuni clienti.Come qualsiasi istituto finanziario siamo tenuti a segnalare regolarmente le informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti all'amministrazione fiscale responsabile. A seconda del tuo IBAN, l'amministrazione fiscale di destinazione potrebbe essere quella tedesca, italiana, spagnola o francese.Le segnalazioni più importanti sono quelle previste dal Common Reporting Standard (nuova tabella) (CRS) e dal Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (nuova tabella) (FATCA). Se sei residente fiscale in un Paese che applica il CRS e/o negli Stati Uniti, l'autorità fiscale ricevente scambia le informazioni ricevute da N26 con il tuo Paese di residenza fiscale nell'ambito delle procedure di scambio automatico di informazioni previste dal CRS e dal FATCA.Per permettere a N26 di adempiere ai suoi obblighi di segnalazione, in particolare quelli per quanto riguarda il CRS e il FATCA, dobbiamo raccogliere informazioni fiscalmente rilevantiaccurate e aggiornate (i cosiddetti dati di autocertificazione). I dati dell'autocertificazione comprendono il nome, l'indirizzo di residenza, paese o paesi di residenza fiscale, il codice fiscale, il luogo e la data di nascita. Se sei residente fiscale negli Stati Uniti (U.S. Person), dovresti fornire anche il tuo TIN statunitense (nuova tabella). A questo link (nuova tabella) è possibile trovare maggiori informazioni sul FATCA e su ciò che è necessario fare per determinare se si è un soggetto statunitense (U.S. Person) e quindi se si deve fornire il proprio TIN statunitense.Siamo tenuti a effettuare controlli regolari per assicurarci che le tue informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti memorizzate nel nostro sistema siano corrette (cosiddetta "due diligence continua"). Se la due diligence dovesse rivelare inesattezza, ti contatteremo per ottenere informazioni accurate e aggiornate.La nostra raccomandazioneTieni presente che siamo tenuti, in ultima istanza, ad applicare misure restrittive sul tuo conto nel caso in cui non fossimo in grado di ottenere informazioni accurate e aggiornate ai fini CRS e FATCA sopra descritti entro le scadenze applicabili.Ti consigliamo di controllare e aggiornare regolarmente le tue informazioni fiscalmente rilevanti. Non dimenticare che non farlo può avere anche conseguenze dirette nei tuoi confronti, come ad esempio l'applicazione di sanzioni da parte dell'amministrazione fiscale. Per verificare e aggiornare le tue informazioni nella tua app N26:Vai a Dettagli del conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscaliClicca su "Aggiungi nuovo Paese fiscale", indica se sei un soggetto statunitense (U.S. Person) e segui le istruzioni.Per aggiungere un ulteriore Paese fiscale (se sei residente fiscale in più di un paese), clicca su "Aggiungi nuovo Paese fiscale" e segui le istruzioniRimuovere il Paese fiscale esistente è possibile solo dopo aver aggiunto un nuovo Paese fiscaleInformazione importantePuoi sempre controllare le informazioni fiscali che abbiamo attualmente su di te andando su: Dettagli del conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscaliIn ogni caso i tuoi dati personali verranno conservati in sicurezza e utilizzati esclusivamente per adempiere a requisiti CRS, FATCA e simili.Non possiamo darti consigli sulla tua situazione fiscale. In caso di dubbi, è bene discutere la questione con un consulente fiscale e/o con l'amministrazione fiscale.

question: How to use Spaces?
answer: To start using your Spaces, you’ll want to go to the ‘Spaces’ section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the ‘Spaces’ homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap ‘Create a new space’ in the ‘Spaces’ homepageSelect one of the below options:‘Saving for a goal’ - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).‘Sharing money’ - Allows you to create a ‘Shared Space’.‘Create now, decide later’ - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now let’s start using ‘Spaces’!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your ‘Main Account’ or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the ‘manage’Then press ‘Lock Space’ or ‘Unlock Space’Enter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the ‘Settings’ cog (top-right corner)Select ‘Hide space balance’.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap ‘Manage’:To create a savings goal, select ‘Create my goal’ (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then ‘Set goal’To enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select ‘Manage Round-UpsToggle ‘Enable Round-Ups’You will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap ‘Create a rule’Choose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

question: How to use Google Pay?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don’t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We’ll ask you to confirm your payment via push message during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn’t set it up yet, you’ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If you’re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don’t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn’t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

question: Est-ce que je peux commander un chéquier ?
answer: En tant que banque mobile, tous les services que propose N26 s'effectuent de façon numérique depuis votre mobile ou sur votre espace client en ligne. Pour cette raison, N26 n'émet pas de chéquiers car nous proposons d'autres moyens pratiques de réaliser vos transactions en toute simplicité, sans avoir à vous déplacer en agence.Vous pouvez alimenter votre compte et effectuer des paiements :Par virement bancairePar MoneyBeam (les virements instantanés entre comptes N26)Par carte bancaireEn domiciliant votre salaire en fournissant votre RIB à votre employeur

question: Come posso restituire un bonifico SEPA al mandante?
answer: A partire dal 17 marzo 2020, i clienti di altre banche potrebbero richiedere il riaccredito di bonifici SEPA inviati ai conti di clienti N26.Tramite la propria banca, il mandante di un bonifico SEPA può, quindi, richiedere al beneficiario la restituzione dell’importo inviato. Questa richiesta apparirà sotto forma di notifica push sul dispositivo associato del cliente N26. Così come avviene con la conferma di un bonifico in uscita tramite l’app di N26, visualizzerai l’opzione di rifiutare oppure accettare di restituire l’importo. La richiesta verrà automaticamente rifiutata se ignorata per 15 giorni.Se, invece, la richiesta viene accettata, l’importo verrà inviato al mandante. Considera, inoltre, che una volta accettata la richiesta, non sarà possibile modificare la propria scelta. Se sul conto principale non è presente un saldo sufficiente, non si potrà accettare la richiesta.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‘Sharing Money’Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:“Advanced electronic signature” will pop-up. Tap “sign”Check both “Advanced electronic signature” and “Power of attorney”, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: ¿Por qué es seguro N26?
answer: Para proteger tu cuenta utilizamos una arquitectura de seguridad de 3 capas:Inicio de sesión seguro. Al iniciar sesión con la aplicación o con la Web App (pestaña nueva), se requiere introducir el usuario y la contraseña o reconocimiento dactilar o facial (dependiendo de tu smartphone). Por favor, elige una contraseña segura y no reveles tus datos a nadie.PIN de confirmación. Se trata de un código de 4 dígitos que necesitarás cada vez que hagas una transferencia o quieras vincular o desvincular tu móvil. Este lo estableces cuando hayas conectado tu smartphone a tu cuenta por primera vez. Podrás modificarlo tú mismo desde la app cuando quieras.Mensajes push. Para cualquier pago entrante o saliente, un mensaje push aparecerá en el smartphone que esté vinculado, al igual que para confirmar y finalizar una transacción. También implementamos 3D Secure para protegerte contra el fraude en compras online.Cada vez que contactes con nosotros te haremos una serie de preguntas de seguridad para asegurarnos de que eres tú. Pero, por supuesto, nunca te preguntaremos el número de tu tarjeta, el código de verificación (CVV), la contraseña ni los PIN de confirmación o de la tarjeta.También hemos tomado medidas para proteger tu información: almacenamos la mínima información imprescindible sobre ti, solo durante el tiempo mínimo al que estamos obligados por ley, y la borramos cuando deja de ser necesaria para nuestros productos o servicios. Puedes descargar tu información personal hasta 6 meses después del cierre de tu cuenta. Encontrarás más información en nuestra Política de Privacidad (pestaña nueva).

question: Hai ricevuto un messaggio o una telefonata sospetta?
answer: Nel pieno della pandemia globale, EasyJet ha rivelato che le informazioni personali e i dettagli di viaggio di 9 milioni di clienti erano stati rubati in un cyberattacco altamente sofisticato. Nella prima metà del 2021, i dati personali di più di 530 milioni di utenti Facebook provenienti da oltre 100 paesi sono stati messi in vendita online. Alcuni giorni dopo, altri 500 milioni di utenti LinkedIn hanno visto le loro informazioni personali apparire sul Dark Web. Questi dati includevano informazioni come nomi, date di nascita, numeri di telefono e indirizzi email.Cosa c'entra questo con N26? Nonostante ciò non abbia alcun impatto diretto su N26, o sulla sicurezza del tuo conto bancario, i cyber-criminali possono utilizzare le informazioni ottenute da attacchi rivolti ad altre aziende per perpetrare attacchi di phishing su larga scala.Il phishing è una tecnica utilizzata per ottenere dati sensibili, che possono poi essere utilizzati per scopi fraudolenti. Prendendo le sembianze di entità fidate, i truffatori sono in grado di manipolare le persone affinché condividano i loro dati personali. Lo fanno prendendo di mira le proprie vittime attraverso i canali di comunicazione digitale che tutti noi usiamo quotidianamente, come email, SMS, telefonate e social media.In quanto banca digitale che sta crescendo in popolarità, i clienti di N26 in passato sono stati presi di mira da campagne di phishing, durante le quali i truffatori inviavano messaggi spesso contenenti link a siti web che assomigliano molto alla WebApp di N26. Anche se all'apparenza possono sembrare convincenti, questi siti web sono fraudolenti e in nessun modo collegati a N26. In alcuni casi, gli aggressori possono falsificare il nostro short code inviato tramite SMS, il che può far apparire i loro messaggi nello stesso thread di SMS inviati in precedenza da N26. Lo stesso discorso vale per le telefonate, in quanto i truffatori sono in grado di camuffare il numero di telefono del mittente e di renderlo uguale a quello della banca.Se pensi di essere stato vittima di una truffa online o telefonica, o avessi semplicemente il sospetto che i tuoi dati personali siano compromessi, contatta subito il nostro Supporto Clienti a support@n26.com.Cosa sta facendo N26 a questo proposito? Il nostro personale addetto alla sicurezza monitora continuamente i futuri attacchi, in modo da poter assicurare che qualsiasi sito web fraudolento venga disattivato il più rapidamente possibile, e facendo sì che noi come azienda possiamo proteggere il tuo conto.Mentre noi continuiamo a prendere precauzioni per proteggere i tuoi conti e le tue informazioni personali, anche tu puoi fare molte cose per proteggerti. Ecco alcune cose da tenere a mente se hai ricevuto un messaggio sospetto:Se hai ricevuto un SMS da qualcuno che sostiene di rappresentare N26, ricorda sempre che noi non ti contatteremo mai attraverso questi canali.Se hai ricevuto una telefonata sospetta da un presunto rappresentante di N26, ricorda che noi non ti chiederemo mai di fornirci i dati di accesso del tuo conto o i dettagli della tua carta. I messaggi di testo che ti invitano a chiamare un numero sono sempre di natura fraudolenta. Non cliccare su nessun link e non fornire nessun dato personale. Non ti daremo mai istruzioni per fare qualcosa tramite SMS.Se hai dubbi sulle informazioni che sono state condivise con te, o sospetti di essere stato condotto su un sito fraudolento, procedi con cautela. Se ti è stato chiesto di chiamare un numero, o di inviare un messaggio a un indirizzo email, cerca le informazioni di contatto e vedi se corrisponde a un'azienda legittima.Se non sei sicuro, fai uno screenshot del messaggio e mettiti in contatto con il nostro staff del Supporto Clienti tramite l'opzione di chat nella tua app N26, o invialo a support@n26.com. Siamo sempre qui per aiutarti!

question: Can I have my pension credited to my N26 account?
answer:
N26 Bank AG - Sign-ups before 26/03/2020 with German IBANHaving your pension credited to your N26 account is very simple.
This is what you need to do:Fill out online and sign the form provided by INPS;After filling out and signing the form, please send it to support@n26.com via email (please remember to use your registered email account to send the form). We will fill out the rest of the form and send it back to you in a few days.
Please note that you might find references to Citibank N.A in the form. Citibank N.A is an intermediary bank that credits INPS pensions to bank accounts located abroad. N26 Bank AG, Italian Branch - Sign-ups after and including 26/03/2020 with Italian IBANUnfortunately, at the moment it is not possible to receive pension to the N26 account for customers with an Italian IBAN. We will update all our customers and provide additional details and instructions as soon as the service is available.In case you encounter payment delays please contact our Customer Support via chat.

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They’re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that’s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you’ve received an unexpected message:If you’ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you’ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you’re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We’re always here to help!

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above €150 will be charged with a 12.50€ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than €150.The maximum fee is €100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
answer: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in 👤 My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

question: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
answer: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: ¿Cómo cambiar los límites de mi tarjeta?
answer: Puedes configurar los límites de tu tarjeta en la app móvil de N26 o en tu banca online. Cada modificación que lleves a cabo se aplicará inmediatamente a la tarjeta seleccionada.Para cambiarlos en la app móvil:Inicia sesión y ve a TarjetasDesliza hacia un lado hasta que encuentres la tarjeta que quieras modificarPulsa Ajustes de la tarjetaPulsa Límites diariosPara cambiarlos en tu banca online:Inicia sesión (pestaña nueva) y ve a Mi cuentaEn el título Tarjetas, haz clic en la tarjeta que quieras modificarLímites de la tarjetaEl límite diario hace referencia a las últimas 24 horas (no al día natural) y está fijado en:1.000 € para retiradas en cajeros5.000 € para pagos en comercios u onlineEl límite semanal hace referencia a la semana natural y está fijado en:2.500€ para retiradas en cajerosEl límite mensual hace referencia al mes natural y está fijado en:20.000 € para pagos en comercios u online¿Prefieres verlo en vídeo? Echa un vistazo al tutorial (pestaña nueva) en nuestro canal de YouTube N26 Support (pestaña nueva).

question: How to use Google Pay?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don’t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We’ll ask you to confirm your payment via push message during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn’t set it up yet, you’ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If you’re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don’t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn’t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can’t be used for online purchases.

question: N26 Cashless - Competition for Italian customers
answer:
What is it?N26 Cashless is a new promotion designed for N26 customers residing in Italy whose purpose is to encourage the use of the N26 debit card for digital payments.The competition will be active from March 1st to June 30th, 2021.Who can participate?
Registration for N26 Cashless is open and automatic for all N26 customers residing in Italy (except N26 Business customers) and who have given their consent to marketing communications.In order to participate in the promotion and prize draw, customers must:Have an open and active N26 accountNot have incurred in foreclosures, seizures or other limitations of the current accountThe mentioned conditions are valid for the entire duration of the competition and failure to comply may lead to exclusion from the final prize draw.How does it work?
N26 customers enrolled in the program will reach the threshold to participate in the final prize draws by making transactions with their Mastercard associated with the N26 account via POS (either contactless, or with chip and pin) or with Apple Pay and Google Pay.Online payments and ATM withdrawals are excluded from the transaction count.What are the prizes?Based on the number of transactions carried out during the period of validity of the competition (1st March - 30th June 2021), participants will be able to access the draws for 3 prizes:At least 20 transactions > 20€ Amazon gift card At least 50 transactions > 50€ Amazon gift card At least 90 transactions > 90€ Amazon gift card If participants make a number of transactions that correspond to different thresholds, they participate in the drawing of prizes for both thresholds reached.(For example, if you carry out 60 payments during the duration of the competition, you participate in the draw for both 20€ and 50€ Amazon voucher.)The prize draw will take place by August 31, 2021.In the event of a win, customers will receive an official communication within their "Messages" inbox of ​​the N26 App.Prize competition valid from 01/03/2021 to 30/06/2021. Prize money 4,160 € F.C. VAT. To consult the complete rules, visit www.n26.com (new tab). Amazon.co.uk Gift Card is not a sponsor of this promotion. Restrictions applied. More details on amazon.it/gc-legal (new tab).

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
answer: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

question: What to do if my card is lost or it’s been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App. Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab). You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: Come noleggiare un’auto con la tua carta N26
answer:
Generalmente, per poter noleggiare un’auto è obbligatorio che il guidatore principale sia in possesso di una carta di credito. Tuttavia, considerato il crescente utilizzo di altre tipologie di carte da parte dei consumatori, alcune compagnie di autonoleggio hanno introdotto la possibilità di noleggiare auto anche con le carte di debito.
Con la tua carta Mastercard N26, quindi, sarai in grado di noleggiare auto presso un numero sempre crescente di compagnie. Qui di seguito troverai i nomi di alcune delle agenzie alle quali potrai rivolgerti:AlamoAvisCentauroEnterpriseEuropcarFireflyJoy rentLocautoMaggioreSicilyByCarThrifty car rentalPrima di noleggiare un veicolo, ti suggeriamo di contattare la compagnia di tuo interesse: le condizioni per il noleggio sono a discrezione delle singole agenzie, quindi i requisiti possono variare a livello locale e nazionale.Ricorda, inoltre, di verificare se l’agenzia accetta carte di debito non solo al momento della prenotazione, ma anche al momento del ritiro del veicolo. In aggiunta, a volte può essere richiesto che la carta abbia i dati in rilievo.
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:nel caso in cui venga addebitato un importo imprevisto o ingiustificato, sarà necessario contattare ed, eventualmente, avviare una contestazione direttamente con l’agenzia in questione. Nel caso la contestazione abbia un esito negativo, possiamo offrire la nostra assistenza per avviare una nuova contestazione tramite Mastercard.sulla carta di debito verrà addebitato (e non autorizzato, come avviene per le carte di credito) il deposito cauzionale, il cui importo varia a seconda delle tipologia di auto e dall’agenzia. La cauzione sarà, poi, riaccreditato sul tuo conto dopo la restituzione dell’auto e la verifica delle sue condizioni.

question: Qu’est-ce que le formulaire web N26 pour les demandes relatives au RGPD?
answer: La protection des données personnelles et financières de nos clients est l’une de nos priorités absolues, c’est pourquoi nous fournissons un outil sûr pour traiter ces demandes. Notre formulaire web N26 pour les demandes relatives au RGPD permet à tous les clients et anciens clients N26 (dont le compte est désormais clôturé) et à leurs représentants autorisés de contacter N26 en toute sécurité en cas de questions sur les données personnelles. Comment ça marche ?Le formulaire web (nouvel onglet) doit être utilisé lorsqu’un client ou un ancien client N26 souhaite exercer ses droits lui-même ou par l’intermédiaire d’un représentant autorisé en vertu du Règlement général sur la protection des données (« RGPD »).Vous pourrez notamment exercer:Le droit d’accès de la personne concernée, en vertu de l’article 15 du RGPD (nouvel onglet)Le droit à l’effacement (« droit à l’oubli »), en vertu de l’article 17 du RGPD (nouvel onglet)Le droit d’opposition, en vertu de l’article 21 du RGPD (nouvel onglet)Vous devriez recevoir une réponse de notre équipe dans un délai de 30 jours calendaires.Lorsque vous remplirez le formulaire web, il vous sera demandé de saisir: Votre pays de résidenceVotre statut N26 (client, ancien client, représentant autorisé)Votre type de demandeVotre nom, votre prénom et votre adresse emailEn tant qu’ancien client N26 ou représentant autorisé, dois-je fournir d’autres informations?Les anciens clients et leurs représentants autorisés sont tenus de télécharger des documents supplémentaires afin de confirmer leur identité et de s’assurer que le destinataire des données est réellement habilité à les recevoir.Voici les documents requis:Anciens clients: copie de la pièce d’identité / du passeportReprésentants autorisés : copie de la pièce d’identité / du passeport et une procuration signéeUne fois le formulaire rempli dans son intégralité, cliquez sur Soumettre pour envoyer votre demande.Pourquoi une vérification manuelle de la carte d’identité / du passeport est-elle nécessaire pour les anciens clients ou les représentants autorisés de N26?Essentiellement, nous demandons une copie de la pièce d'identité pour valider l'identité et pour nous assurer que les données personnelles, y compris les informations financières, ne tombent pas entre de mauvaises mains. Un examen manuel de l'identité est effectué lorsqu'il est nécessaire de vérifier l'identité d'une personne, et qu'il ne nous est pas possible de le faire conformément à notre cadre de vérification standardisé. Étant donné que l'identité des anciens clients et représentants autorisés n'est pas vérifiable via leurs interactions avec notre Espace client en ligne ou notre application, nous devons être en mesure de vérifier leur identité en utilisant d'autres moyens.Vous avez des questions à ce sujet ?N'hésitez pas à contacter notre service client à l'adresse suivante : support@n26.com (nouvel onglet).

question: Relevé d’identité bancaire
answer: Qu’est-ce que le relevé d’identité bancaire, ou RIB ?Le relevé d’identité bancaire, également appelé RIB, est un document qui confirme que votre compte est enregistré à votre nom. Il contient votre nom et prénom, votre adresse, l’IBAN et le BIC de votre compte et la date d’ouverture de votre compte.Parallèlement, vous pouvez demander une attestation de domiciliation bancaire qui peut contenir, sur demande, le solde de votre compte N26 et les coordonnées de vos cartes actives, qui seront à moitié cachées par des astérisques pour des raisons de sécurité.Comment obtenir un RIB ?Depuis l’espace client en ligne N26 (PDF) : cliquez sur l’icône de téléchargement (nouvel onglet)* et sélectionnez l’option Téléchargez votre RIB. Le document au format PDF sera généré automatiquement.Pour obtenir un relevé d’identité bancaire contenant votre solde et votre numéro de carte : cliquez sur l’icône de téléchargement (nouvel onglet)*, dans la section Attestations bancaires, sélectionnez les options  solde de compte actuel et/ou le numéro de vos cartes actives, puis cliquez sur Demander. Vous recevrez le PDF dans la section Messages de N26 (nouvel onglet) dans un délai de 24 heures.Pour obtenir votre RIB officiel selon les régulations de la Banque de France, cliquez sur l’icône de téléchargement* depuis l’espace client en ligne N26, faites défiler vers le bas jusqu’à RIB et cliquez sur Demander.* L’icône de téléchargement est le carré avec une flèche vers le bas, situé à gauche du bouton « Recevoir ».

question: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
answer: Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es ändern möchtest, wähle in der App beim Login Vergessen? oder Passwort vergessen? (neuen Tab) in der WebApp (neuen Tab). Wir senden dir einen Link an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse, damit du ein neues Passwort erstellen kannst. Stelle sicher, dass dein neues Passwort unseren Anforderungen entspricht:Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen für unsere Passwörter. Wir berechnen die Stärke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur Passwörter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.Wir empfehlen, dass du anstatt eines Passworts eher eine Passphrase (einen Satz) verwendest, im Sinne von “schwer zu erraten, einfach zu erinnern”.Wenn unser System dein Passwort nicht akzeptiert, füge weitere Buchstaben hinzu, verwende eine Kombination von Sonderzeichen und Zahlen und achte darauf, dass du zwischen Groß- und Kleinschreibung variierst.Wenn du dein Passwort sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird dein Kontozugriff vorübergehend gesperrt. Nach 30 Minuten kannst du es erneut versuchen.Du erreichst uns im Chat täglich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

question: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
answer: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you’re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to €50 don’t require a card PIN. For amounts over €50 or cumulative transactions above 150€ you’ll need to enter your card PIN. Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won’t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn’t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised. In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure. One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a “trusted beneficiary” so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: 2 mois d’essai gratuit de notre compte N26 Smart
answer: Admissibilité: tous les marchés EU Testez N26 Smart pendant 2 moisVous avez toujours souhaité tester notre compte N26 Smart ? Vous pouvez désormais profiter deux mois d’essai gratuit sans engagement !Notre essai gratuit N26 Smart vous donnera accès à nos transactions premium incluses dans notre compte N26 Smart et vous permettra de découvrir les avantages de vos transactions quotidiennes.Qu’inclut notre essai gratuit N26 Smart ?Essai gratuit de 60 jours : Si vous êtes un nouveau client N26 Standard, profitez de notre essai gratuit de 60 jours pour découvrir N26 Smart.Annulez en tout moment : Pendant votre essai gratuit, il vous est possible d’annuler en tout moment et de profiter des avantages pendant 60 jours (vous serez automatiquement rétrogradé à un compte N26 Standard après 60 jours).Continuez à utiliser N26 Smart : Pour continuer à utiliser notre compte N26 Smart, il vous suffit de payer les frais mensuels de 4,90 €. Si vous changez d’avis après la fin de l’essai gratuit, il vous est toujours possible de repasser à un compte N26 Standard.Profitez des avantages de notre compte N26 Smart : Pendant vos 60 jours d’essai gratuit de N26 Smart, vous pourrez profiter des avantages suivants :Espaces (jusqu’à 10)Jusqu’à 10 Espaces PartagésIBAN pour les EspacesJusqu’à 5 retraits au distributeur automatique de billets gratuits par moisArrondissement des épargnesProfitez des offres et des réductions des partenairesAssistance téléphoniqueImportant :Si vous continuez à utiliser notre compte N26 Smart, des frais de 4,90 € seront prélevés le lendemain de votre essai gratuit. Cependant, il vous est possible de repasser à un compte N26 Standard en tout moment.De plus, après le passage à un compte N26 Smart, vous pourrez recommander sans frais (une seule fois) une nouvelle carte virtuelle en couleur et conserver votre carte transparente. Veuillez noter que votre carte virtuelle sera désactivée.Comment profiter de l’essai gratuit de N26 Smart ?Si vous avez été invité à un essai gratuit de notre adhésion N26 Smart, vous pourrez en profiter en suivant les instructions ci-dessous. Depuis la notification push : Appuyez sur la notification push.Lorsque l’application N26 s’ouvre, votre invitation pour un essai gratuit apparaît automatiquement. Appuyez sur « Continuer » pour poursuivre.Veuillez lire et accepter les conditions générales de l’offre, puisAppuyez sur « Confirmer l’achat » : vous pouvez maintenant profiter de l’essai et un message de confirmation s’affichera ! Depuis l’application N26 : Ouvrez l’application N26.Vous trouverez l’offre d’essai gratuit pour N26 Smart en haut de votre écran d’accueil. Appuyez sur « En savoir plus ». L’écran d’invitation expliquant en détail l’offre d’essai gratuit s’ouvrira. Appuyez sur « Continuer » pour poursuivre.Veuillez lire et accepter les conditions générales de l’offre, puisAppuyez sur « Confirmer l’achat » : vous pouvez maintenant profiter de l’essai ! Remarque : Si vous avez reçu un email vous invitant à démarrer l’essai, nous vous recommandons de l’ouvrir depuis votre téléphone portable et d’appuyer sur le bouton « Démarrer l’essai gratuit ». Cela ouvrira automatiquement l’application N26 et chargera la page d’invitation. Vous pouvez également vous connecter à votre application mobile N26 et suivre les instructions ci-dessus.

question: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in € (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we don’t currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.You’ll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you’ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.ℹ️  Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can’t cover a direct debit* when it’s due, it’ll bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It’s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you’re eligible for an Overdraft directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is €9.

question: What are Cards for Spaces?
answer: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds in the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space: You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select ‘Main account’ or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you’d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you’ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‘Hide space balance’.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‘DE’ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

question: How to invite friends to join N26?
answer: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
answer: You’ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether MoneyBeam, standing orders, or CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either Confirm or Cancel it via push message in the app.Your Confirmation PIN differs from your card PIN but you can use the same number for both. You’ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after connecting your smartphone (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by changing it in the app.

question: ¿Cómo funciona Apple Pay?
answer: Disponible en España, Alemania, Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia, SuizaApple Pay te permite realizar pagos con tu teléfono móvil y así no tener que llevar tu tarjeta Mastercard a todas partes.Hemos creado un vídeo (pestaña nueva) para ayudarte a configurar tu Mastercard N26 con Apple Pay.Aquí tienes algunos consejos a tener en cuenta:La región de tu iPhone coincide con el país al que fue enviada tu primera tarjeta Mastercard (puedes chequear tu región entrando en Ajustes, después en General y finalmente en Idioma y Región de tu iPhone).Si has perdido tu iPhone y no eres capaz de encontrarlo utilizando Encontrar Mi iPhone, siempre puedes acceder a tu iCloud y eliminar todos los dispositivos con Apple Pay mediante un ordenador, ya sea Mac o PC. Además, deberías encender el Modo Perdido para bloquear tu Mastercard en Apple Pay. Los pagos con tu tarjeta física seguirán funcionando.Si tu Mastercard N26 desaparece inesperadamente de Apple Wallet, puede que sea porque has cerrado tu sesión de iCloud, desactivado el Código de Acceso o el Touch ID, restablecido los ajustes de fábrica a través de iTunes, o eliminado todo el contenido y configuración de tu dispositivo. En cualquier caso, siempre puedes volver a añadir tu tarjeta. Ten en cuenta que tu tarjeta no se eliminará si actualizas el sistema operativo, restableces la configuración personal o apagas el modo Encontrar Mi iPhone.Para compras en tienda o bien online, deberás autorizar tus pagos vía Touch ID o utilizando el Código de Acceso. Si estás utilizando Apple Watch, las autorizaciones se realizarán haciendo doble clic en el botón lateral. Si estás utilizando un Mac, la autorización se realizará mediante el Touch ID que hay en la Touch Bar que encontrarás en el extremo superior derecho del teclado.Asegúrate de que tu dispositivo cumple los requisitos técnicos necesarios visitando Apple Support (pestaña nueva).Si eres un usuario de N26 Metal o N26 Business You, podría pasar que la imagen de tu tarjeta que se muestra en el Apple Wallet diga N26 You (para los clientes de Metal) y N26 Business (para los clientes de Business You). Ya estamos trabajando para resolver esto, pero de momento puedes estar tranquilo que esto no afecta a la usabilidad de Apple Pay ni a tu membresía premium.

question: Wird meine Lastschrift abgebucht, wenn ich kein Geld auf dem Konto habe?
answer: Wenn dein Guthaben nicht ausreicht, um eine fällige Lastschrift zu decken*, wird sie zurückgegeben und dir wird eine Gebühr von 3 € berechnet. Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus gerät, werden Überziehungszinsen in der Höhe von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verzögert werden.Um diese Gebühr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App prüfen, ob dir ein Dispokredit zur Verfügung steht.IBANs für Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die Lastschriftüberweisung abgewiesen und dir eine Gebühr in Höhe von 3 € berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht möglich ist, deinen Space zu überziehen.*Für Länder mit einer anderen Hauptwährung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landeswährung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempfängers die Gebühren für den Währungsumtausch sowie den endgültigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienDänemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRumänienSchwedenSchweizDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Was ist MoneyBeam?
answer: Durch einen MoneyBeam kannst du deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld senden, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Du kannst auch einen MoneyBeam von deinen Kontakten anfragen, um Geld zu erhalten. Um MoneyBeam nutzen zu können, müssen du und deine Kontakte als N26 Nutzer sichtbar sein.Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden: Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeamWähle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder füge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einGib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein und bestätige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhältst. Um einen MoneyBeam anzufragen:Tippe auf Geld erhalten > MoneyBeam anfragenWähle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder füge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einSobald der Kontakt deine Anfrage bestätigt, erhältst du deinen angefragten BetragDas Limit für MoneyBeams liegt bei 1000€ pro Transaktion und 5000€ pro 24 Stunden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Ein GIF als zusätzlichen Verwendungszweck hinzufügen:Wenn du MoneyBeam nutzt, kannst du GIFs als zusätzlichen Text beim Verwendungszweck versenden. Sobald der MoneyBeam abgeschlossen ist, wird dem Empfänger auf dem Startbildschirm ein Film-Emoji als Präfix auf der eingehenden Überweisung angezeigt, sodass er weiß, dass an die Überweisung ein GIF angehängt ist. Der Empfänger kann das GIF zusammen mit dem Verwendungszweck in den Überweisungsdaten einsehen.Die GIFs werden dir direkt von Giphy, Inc. zur Verfügung gestellt und nicht von N26. Bitte beachte, dass Giphy ein US-amerikanisches Unternehmen ist, das deine personenbezogenen Daten in den USA verarbeitet. Informationen darüber, wie Giphy deine personenbezogenen Daten verarbeitet, findest du in der Datenschutzrichtlinie von Giphy (neuen Tab).  Um einen MoneyBeam mit einem GIF zu senden:Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeam.Wähle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder füge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einWähle GIF hinzufügen und suche nach dem GIF, das du hinzufügen möchtest, entweder per Suchfeld oder einfach scrollend.Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein und bestätige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhältst.

question: Where is my refund?
answer:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement. For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren’t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you’ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to 👤 My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: Quelles sont mes limites de dépenses ?
answer: Paiements par carte en magasin et en lignePlafond quotidien : 5 000 €Plafond mensuel : 20 000 €Retraits au distributeur automatique de billetsUn plafond quotidien de 1 000 € s’applique aux pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Grèce, Irlande, Italie, Islande, Lettonie, Liechtenstein, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Norvège, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slovénie, Suède et Suisse.Un plafond quotidien de 400 € s’applique aux pays suivants : Togo, Congo, Bénin, Côte d’Ivoire, Kenya, Cameroun, Nigeria, Sénégal, Algérie, République centrafricaine, Gambie, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisie et Ouganda.Le plafond hebdomadaire de 2 500 € s’applique à tous les pays (sauf France).Un plafond hebdomadaire de 1 050 € s'applique en FranceVirementsPlafond journalier pour les virements MoneyBeam : 1 000 €Virements SEPA entrants : Illimité Virements SEPA sortants : IllimitéVirements SEPA instantanés entrants : 100 000 € par virementVirements SEPA instantanés sortants : 2 000 € par virementCash26Le montant maximum est de 200 € par retrait et de 900 € par 24 heures. Aucun montant minimum de retrait n’est imposé.Le montant minimum est de 50 € par dépôt et le montant maximum est de 999 € par 24 heures.Les retraits et dépôts sont limités à 999 € pendant 24 heures.

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you’re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to €50 don’t require a card PIN. For amounts over €50 or cumulative transactions above 150€ you’ll need to enter your card PIN. Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won’t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn’t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You’re probably familiar with using only  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you’ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication? When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you’ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?  First, you’ll need to update your phone’s operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you’re unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don’t have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we’ll be glad to help you out.What if I can’t remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you’ve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you’ll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you’ve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can’t receive SMS for other reasons?If you don’t have access to your registered phone number – either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen – please contact our customer service via live chat and we’ll be glad to help you out.Why can’t I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn’t support the latest app version, you won’t be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we’ll send to your account's registered phone number.You’ll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: Upfront Payments for Premium membership plans
answer: Your membership contract is valid for one year, after which it automatically renews for an indefinite period until you cancel it—this can be done at any time (see below). We’ll notify you 2 months before your contract is due to be renewed indefinitely.Which billing options are available to me?You can choose to pay for your annual membership fee on a monthly basis, or pre-pay multiple months (e.g. 6 or 12 months) to receive a discount. This doesn’t affect the length of your annual contract.For example, if you choose to prepay 6 months at a time, you’ll make one payment for the first 6 months of your yearly contract when your membership begins, and a second payment in 6 month’s time for the second half of your yearly contract.How and when can I pay?Your membership will become active and you’ll receive full access to your premium benefits only after you pay the first membership fee. You can choose to pay your first fee by using a debit or credit card, Apple Pay or Google Wallet, which will give you instant access to your premium features right after you’ve verified your identity. Alternatively, you can choose to top up your account balance, and we'll automatically deduct the first membership fee from your account.If we haven’t received your payment for the first membership fee (i.e., your first monthly fee or your first prepayment) within the first 15 days after you’ve proved your identity, we’ll deduct this fee automatically from your N26 account at that time and grant you access to your premium benefits. After this, your membership fee will be automatically deducted from your N26 account according to the billing option you’ve selected.How can I cancel my N26 membership?You can stop the automatic renewal of your membership at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via support chat. If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires.
