CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam’s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is €50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to €999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you’ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately. If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is €200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to €900 in any 24-hour period. There’s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of €2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.

question: Where to find your Tax ID
answer: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If you’re from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If you’re a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TIN’s are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben über die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If you’re a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des Procédures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authorities’ database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If you’re a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TIN’s are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If you’re a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TIN’s are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If you’ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

question: Quels sont les avantages du compte N26 You?
answer: Une carte physique Mastercard N26 sans frais : Choisissez parmi cinq nouvelles couleurs lors de la commande de la carte : Rhubarbe, Océan, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.Carte virtuelle supplémentaire : Commandez une carte virtuelle supplémentaire sans frais depuis l’application !Carte physique supplémentaire : Commandez une carte physique N26 YOU supplémentaire au prix unique de 10 € via l’application N26.Espaces : 10 Espaces (sous-comptes) supplémentaires pour organiser vos finances.Espaces Partagés : Invitez vos amis à rejoindre vos Espaces (sous-comptes) pour partager et gérer ensemble des fonds.Assistance téléphonique dédiée : Pour toute question, veuillez contacter notre Service Client dédié.Retraits gratuits aux distributeurs automatiques de billets dans le monde entier : Réglez vos achats en ligne et en magasin avec votre Mastercard N26 You, évitez les frais bancaires cachés et profitez de zéro commission bancaire à l’étranger. Vous pouvez également retirer de l’argent sans frais dans n’importe quelle devise dans les distributeurs automatiques de billets du monde entier.Ensemble d’assurances proposées par Allianz Global Assistance* : Une assurance qui inclut une large gamme d’avantages personnels et financiers tels que :Assurance-voyage : Remboursement des frais médicaux à l’étranger, des frais liés aux annulations de voyage après une urgence médicale, des frais engagés en cas de retard de vol de plus de 4 heures, des frais en cas de retard de bagages enregistrés de plus de 6 heures et des frais d’expatriation sanitaire.Sauvetage dans la neige et en montagne : Profitez d’une couverture pour les frais de recherche, de sauvetage, de premier transport et les frais médicaux en cas d’accident lors d’un séjour en montagne.Voitures, vélos et scooters en libre-service : Couverture en cas de dommages ou de vol de véhicules loués auprès de sociétés de moyens de transport en libre-service.Pour retrouver plus d'informations sur N26 You, nous vous invitons à lire nos Conditions Générales d’Utilisation (nouvel onglet).Par ailleurs :La carte N26 You (nouvel onglet) est une Mastercard sans détails en relief sur la face avant, pour plus de confidentialité. Seul votre nom est inscrit à l’avant de la carte, les détails de votre carte sont imprimés au verso : vous y trouverez votre numéro de carte, sa date d’expiration, le code de vérification CVV et le Token, le code d’identification de votre carte à 10 chiffres.Si vous êtes déjà un utilisateur N26 et que vous passez à N26 You, les frais d'adhésion mensuels de 9,90 € par mois sont prélevés directement sur votre compte N26, en fonction de la date à laquelle vous avez activé votre N26 You Mastercard (par exemple si vous avez activé votre carte le 5 janvier, nous continuerons à vous facturer le 5 de chaque mois). Si vous êtes un nouvel utilisateur N26, le premier débit est retardé de 15 jours après avoir complété votre vérification d'identité pour vous laisser la possibilité d’alimenter votre compte N26 avant qu’il ne soit effectué. À partir du deuxième prélèvement, le débit se fera à la date de la validation de votre vérification d'identité. Cela signifie que si vous avez ouvert votre compte en fin de mois, vos deux premières mensualités seront prélevées le mois suivant. Vous pouvez désormais payer vos frais mensuels pour les comptes Premium à l’avance pour les 6 mois ou l’année suivant le contrat. Si vous choisissez l’option de paiement anticipé, vous profiterez d’une réduction sur les frais mensuels de tenue de votre compte Premium (Smart / You / Metal), proportionnelle à la période de facturation souhaitée.Lors de l’ouverture de votre compte, vous trouverez les options de paiement anticipé et les charges associées dans votre application N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe, dénomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise membre du Groupe Allianz.

question: How to use Apple Pay?
answer:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don’t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.We’ve made a video (new tab) to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If you’ve lost your iPhone and aren’t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won’t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you’re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you’re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

question: Warum wurde meine Überweisung in der N26 App noch nicht ausgeführt?
answer: Du brauchst deine Bestätigungs-PIN für alle Transaktionen, egal ob MoneyBeam, Daueraufträge oder CASH26. Deine Überweisung bleibt ausstehend, bis du sie per Push-Nachricht in der App bestätigst oder abbrichst.Deine Bestätigungs-PIN unterscheidet sich von deiner Karten-PIN, aber du kannst für beide die gleiche Zahlenkombination verwenden. Sobald du dein Smartphone verknüpft hast, wirst du aufgefordert, die Bestätigungs-PIN zu erstellen (die Karten-PIN legst du erst bei der Aktivierung der Karte fest).Wenn du deine Bestätigungs-PIN sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird sie aus Sicherheitsgründen gesperrt. Du kannst sie in der App wiederherstellen.

question: How to block my N26 card?
answer: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to the Cards tab and select Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you’re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to €50 don’t require a card PIN. For amounts over €50 or cumulative transactions above 150€ you’ll need to enter your card PIN. Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won’t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn’t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: Puis-je télécharger l’application N26 sur mon téléphone ?
answer: Chaque version d’une application mise à jour peut être utilisée pendant 180 jours. Durant cette période, une version plus récente sera disponible. Pensez à toujours mettre à jour votre application pour obtenir la plus récente afin d’avoir la meilleure expérience client possible. Vous pouvez vérifier et télécharger la dernière version de l'application N26 depuis l'App Store (nouvel onglet) d’Apple ou depuis le Google Play Store (nouvel onglet).Veuillez prendre en compte qu’il existe des exigences minimales requises sur les téléphones afin d’assurer un usage correct. Les exigences en question sont listées ci-dessous :iPhone:Un iPhone 5s ou plus récentiOS 12 ou plus récentVous pouvez retrouver votre version iOS dans "Réglages" > "Général" > "Informations" Android:Android 6.0 ou plus récent. Pour connaître votre version d'Android : "Paramètres" > "À propos du téléphone"Prise en charge native des services Google

question: Adresse de résidence et impôts en France
answer:
Si vous vivez actuellement en France, vous êtes probablement un résident fiscal français. En règle générale, votre résidence fiscale est le pays/la juridiction dans lequel/laquelle vous vivez. Dans certains cas, vous pouvez être résident fiscal dans plusieurs pays/juridictions à la fois ou ne pas être résident fiscal français.Pour en savoir plus sur la résidence fiscale, veuillez consulter votre conseiller fiscal ou le portail de l’échange automatique d’informations de l’OCDE (nouvel onglet).
Si votre résidence fiscale se situe hors de France, nous pouvons être légalement tenus de transmettre certaines informations concernant vos comptes financiers à la Direction des finances publiques. Celle-ci peut échanger ces informations avec les autorités fiscales d’une ou plusieurs autres juridictions en vertu d’accords intergouvernementaux pour l’échange d’informations sur vos comptes financiers ou du droit local. 
En tant qu’établissement financier, nous ne sommes pas autorisés à fournir des conseils fiscaux. Votre conseiller fiscal sera peut-être en mesure de vous aider à répondre à des questions spécifiques liées à votre résidence fiscale. Vous trouverez également plus d’informations, notamment une liste des juridictions qui ont signé des accords d’échange automatique d’informations, ainsi que des détails sur les informations demandées, sur le portail de l’échange automatique d’informations de l’OCDE (nouvel onglet).
Le décret n° 2016-1683 du 5 décembre 2016, basé sur la Norme commune de déclaration (« NCD ») de l’OCDE, exige que N26 France collecte et déclare à la Direction des finances publiques certaines informations sur un titulaire de compte dont la résidence fiscale se situe hors de France. Chaque juridiction a ses propres règles pour définir la résidence fiscale, et les juridictions ont fourni des informations sur la manière de déterminer si vous êtes résident dans la juridiction concernée sur le site internet suivant : Portail de l’échange automatique d’informations de l’OCDE.  (nouvel onglet)

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come. With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we’re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We’re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account. Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: ¿Cómo declarar mi cuenta N26 para los impuestos en Francia?
answer: (aplica a los residentes en Francia)De acuerdo con el Código de Impuesto General Francés, todos los residentes franceses estarán obligados a declarar cualquier cuenta bancaria que hayan abierto, usado o cerrado el último año sobre el año en el que hayan recibido ingresos, esto incluye tu cuenta en N26. Para hacerlo:En tu declaración de impuestos, marca la casilla de Cuenta Extranjera abierta, usada o cerrada (8UU) (Compte étranger ouvert, utilisé ou fermé).Completa el formulario Cerfa n° 3916 (pestaña nueva) y añádelo a tu declaración de impuestos.Puedes encontrar más información sobre cómo declarar tu cuenta N26 (pestaña nueva) en nuestro blog.

question: ¿Cómo funciona Espacios?
answer: Espacios es una funcionalidad de las cuentas premium que te permite definir objetivos, crear y personalizar espacios y transferir dinero entre ellos al instante. Espacios está disponible en la app y en la WebApp (pestaña nueva).Además de tu cuenta (o espacio) principal, puedes crear y eliminar tantos espacios adicionales como desees, pero el número de espacios que puedes tener activos simultáneamente dependerá de tu tipo de cuenta: hasta 10 espacios adicionales con N26 You, N26 Smart y N26 Metal.Los extractos bancarios de tu cuenta principal incluirán todas las transacciones enviadas a un espacio o recibidas del mismo. Puedes descargar dichos extractos desde la página de confirmación.Únicamente tu cuenta principal podría tener un saldo negativo (si tienes disponibilidad de un descubierto). Los saldos de tus Espacios no pueden ser negativos, de modo que solo puedes transferir lo que está disponible en un espacio en particular.Solo puedes usar el saldo de tu cuenta principal para las transacciones con tarjeta, por lo que deberías transferir fondos hacia tu cuenta principal antes de realizar una compra, si fuera necesario.Para mover el dinero entre espacios, mantén pulsado sobre un espacio, arrástralo y suéltalo sobre otro. Una vez elijas la cantidad y confirmes, el balance se actualizará inmediatamente.Puedes bloquear y desbloquear los espacios siempre que quieras desde la app, para ello sólo necesitas tu PIN de confirmación. Aunque tengas un espacio bloqueado, seguirás teniendo la posibilidad de transferirle dinero. Si lo que necesitas es retirar dinero de ese espacio, primero tendrás que desbloquearlo. Si quieres, también puedes ocultar del balance principal la cantidad que tienes en el espacio. Para ello, entra en el espacio, pincha en los 3 puntos de la esquina superior derecha y después sobre ''Ocultar el espacio del saldo''.Ahora puedes bloquear transferencias desde un espacio específico. Simplemente vaya a la configuración del espacio, toque Bloquear transferencias a la cuenta principal u otros espacios e ingrese su PIN de confirmación.Ahora también puedes eliminar un espacio, incluso con una tarjeta vinculada a él, desde la configuración del espacio.Hace poco hemos añadido una nueva función para Espacios que se llama Reglas.RedondeoLa función del Redondeo permite a los usuarios premium redondear cada pago con tarjeta a la cifra entera inmediatamente superior y transferir la diferencia al espacio que elijan.El redondeo no te harán incurrir en descubierto, de modo que solo se realizará mientras tengas saldo suficiente para cubrir el redondeo.Solo puedes tener un redondeo activo al mismo tiempo, que se transferirá al Espacio que tú elijas.Puedes desactivar la función del Redondeo en cualquier momento.Si cierras el espacio donde tengas habilitado el redondeo, la función se deshabilitará hasta que vuelvas a habilitarla desde un espacio activo.

question: N26 Bank's Wise Terms of Use
answer:
Please choose the country corresponding with the T&Cs of your N26 account below to view our Wise terms of use:GermanyWise terms of use (new tab)SpainWise terms of use (for accounts created before April 16th, 2019) (new tab)
Wise terms of use (for accounts created on or after April 16th, 2019) (new tab)ItalyWise terms of use (for accounts created before March 26th, 2020 with DE IBAN) (new tab)Wise terms of use (for accounts created on or after March 26th, 2020 with IT IBAN) (new tab)FranceWise terms of use (new tab)Rest of EuropeWise terms of use (new tab)

question: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas obtenir de crédit ?
answer: Lors de votre demande de crédit, nous vous posons une série de questions sur votre situation personnelle et financière. Il vous sera probablement demandé de vous connecter à votre autre compte bancaire directement depuis l’application N26 pour continuer votre demande (obligatoire en Allemagne, si votre compte N26 n'est pas votre compte principal).Cet autre compte doit exclusivement être un compte que vous détenez auprès d’une banque du pays depuis lequel vous faites votre demande de crédit. Si vous faites votre demande en France, le compte secondaire pris en compte dans l’évaluation de votre demande de crédit devra ainsi être dans une banque française, en Allemagne le compte secondaire devra être allemand.(Pour l’Allemagne) Nous contrôlons également votre score de crédit actuel auprès de l'organisme Schufa, même si nous possédons déjà des informations vous concernant qui nous ont déjà été fournies par Schufa. Notre demande d’informations auprès de cet organisme n'exerce aucune influence sur votre score lui-même. Votre score de crédit n’est pas l’unique critère de notre évaluation, nous vérifions aussi vos revenus mensuels sans compter les aides sociales (chômage, allocations familiales, etc).Une fois la demande de crédit envoyée via l’application, vous ne pourrez pas modifier votre demande pendant 90 jours, et ce, même si votre situation évolue entre temps. Il vous faudra donc attendre la suppression de votre première requête pour faire une nouvelle demande de crédit.Votre éligibilité à l’obtention d’un crédit est étudiée par un système automatique intégré à notre application.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: Comment être visible auprès des autres utilisateurs N26 ?
answer: Pour pouvoir utiliser toutes les fonctionnalités de votre application, vous et vos contacts devez être visibles en tant qu’utilisateur N26.  Lorsque vous nous autorisez à le faire, nous accédons à votre répertoire pour identifier vos contacts qui utilisent également N26.Pour modifier votre visibilité en tant que client N26 auprès de vos contacts, vous pouvez à tout moment activer ou désactiver cette option depuis votre application N26. Pour cela, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Mon compte > Information personelles > Coordonnées. Vous pouvez ensuite cocher ou décocher la case “j’accepte d’être facilement identifiable par mes contacts qui utilisent N26 pour recevoir des virements."Parmi tous vos contacts, ceux qui sont également clients N26 seront visibles dans votre liste de contacts de l’application N26. De la même façon, vous apparaitrez dans leur liste de contacts, vous identifiant comme étant client N26. Pourquoi être visible auprès des autres utilisateurs N26 ?Vous pouvez notamment effectuer des transactions en temps réel sans saisir d’IBAN grâce à Moneybeam, en sélectionnant seulement le nom du destinataire dans votre liste de contacts. Vous pouvez également demander de l'argent aux personnes de votre liste de contacts qui n'ont plus qu'à accepter (ou refuser) votre demande.De plus, en étant visible auprès des autres utilisateurs vous pouvez utiliser les Espaces Partagés. Cette fonctionnalité vous permet de partager des espaces avec d'autres utilisateurs N26 sélectionnés dans votre liste de contacts.

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you’ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.ℹ️  Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Deposit fee
answer: From July 2022, we have decided to no longer collect this feeFor every N26 account (except N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal) opened on or after 19.10.2020, and exceeding a balance of 50.000€, a 0,5% deposit fee per year applies, as was outlined in your terms and conditions during the account sign up process. Please find here (new tab) the related terms and conditions.The deposit fee will be calculated by tracking the balance of your account on a daily basis, for each day of the month. Every day that your balance exceeds the threshold of 50.000€, a 0,5% per annum fee will be applied to the excess of the account balance. The fee will be charged directly from your account at the beginning of each month for the previous 30 days. If your account balance might exceed the above mentioned threshold, and you don’t want to incur this fee, there are two ways that you can prevent yourself from being charged: Upgrade to N26 You (new tab), N26 Business You (new tab), N26 Metal (new tab)or N26 Business Metal  (new tab)For our German customers, open an EasyFlex Savings account (new tab) and transfer your excess funds there (please take note of eligibility requirements)

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called “Lookalike-Audiences” are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user. In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called “hashing” is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‘GDPR’) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available. You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called ‘lookalike audiences’ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called “hashing” is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‘GDPR’) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available. You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

question: How to upgrade to Metal?
answer: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the delivery and accept the N26 Metal T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you’re already a N26 You member, you don’t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: How to close my account?
answer: We’re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We’d love to keep you as a customer—tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account. If you’ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here’s what to do:Make your account balance €0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is €0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You’ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you’re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or “as soon as possible”Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we’ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
answer: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking
answer: Wofür steht PSD2?Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (“PSD2”) ist eine überarbeitete europäische Richtlinie und ermöglicht dir, über regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen über regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzuführen.Das bedeutet, dass du regulierten Drittanbietern über eine dedizierte Schnittstelle Zugang zu deinem Konto erlauben kannst:Du kannst über einen Kontoinformationsdienst (KID) Daten verschiedener Bankkonten an einem Ort zusammenführen und sie über regulierte Drittanbieter verwalten;Du kannst bei einem Einkauf auf einer Website einen Zahlungsauslösedienst (ZAD) nutzen.Der sichere Datenaustausch erfolgt im Hintergrund über unseren Partner Token.io.Wie funktioniert's?Nutzt Du einen regulierten Drittanbieter, wie einen Kontoinformationsdienst oder einen Zahlungauslösedienst, wirst Du über Token.io zur N26 App weitergeleitet, um die jeweilige Zugriffsanfrage zu bestätigen. In unserer Datenschutzerklärung (neuen Tab) informieren wir Dich über die Zwecke, die involvierten Parteien und die rechtlichen Grundlagen für die notwendige Datenverarbeitung, um unsere Verpflichtungen im Rahmen der überarbeiteten Zweiten Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie zu erfüllen.FAQsWarum kann ich keinen Drittanbieter mit meinem Konto verlinken?Wenn der Drittanbieter keine Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vorgenommen hat, muss er zunächst über unseren Partner Token.io die Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vornehmen.Wie kann ich eine Zugriffsbestätigung, die ich einem regulierten Drittanbieter gewährt habe, widerrufen?Um eine Zugangsbestätigung zu widerrufen, die Du einem regulierten Drittanbieter gewährt hast, musst Du Dich direkt an den regulierten Drittanbieter wenden.*gilt für alle Länder im EWR.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10€). Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0€ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25€ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Wie zahle ich Geld auf mein Konto ein?
answer: Sobald du dich erfolgreich verifiziert hast, kannst du auf verschiedene Weisen Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen:CASH26 (verfügbar in Deutschland, Österreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland): Zahle Bargeld über unsere Partnergeschäfte direkt auf dein Konto ein. MoneyBeam: Erhalte sofort Geld von anderen N26 Nutzern.Debitkarte: Du kannst Geld von einem anderen Bankkonto auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du die Karteninformationen in der App hinterlegst. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Anschließende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils Beträge zwischen 20 € und 450 € pro Monat auf dein Konto einzahlen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren können.Apple Pay oder Google Pay (neuen Tab): Lade Geld auf dein N26 Konto, indem du Apple Pay (für iOS-Geräte) oder GPay (für Android-Geräte) verwendest. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Anschließende Einzahlungen kosten 3 % des Einzahlungsbetrags. Du kannst jeweils Beträge zwischen 20 € und 450 € auf dein N26 Konto überweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren können.SEPA-Überweisung: Die Überweisung muss in Euro und innerhalb des SEPA-Raums erfolgen. Dafür brauchst du nur deine IBAN und deinen Namen, wie er auf deinem registrierten Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, eingeben. Bitte beachte auch dabei folgende Punkte:Wenn du per SEPA-Überweisung Geld auf dein N26 Konto einzahlst, stelle sicher, dass der Empfängername deinem Namen entspricht so wie er auf dem Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, das du bei der Kontoeröffnung für deine Verifizierung verwendet hast. (Insbesondere, wenn du ein N26 Business Konto hast - wir akzeptieren keine Firmennamen.)Eine eingehende Überweisung wird in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als Echtzeitüberweisung getätigt wurde, andernfalls benötigt eine Überweisung einen Bankarbeitstag bzw. zwei Werktage. Ab 1. Juli 2020 gilt für eingehende SEPA-Echtzeitüberweisung ein Limit von 100.000€. Für normale eingehende SEPA-Überweisungen besteht kein Limit.In Frankreich muss die erste Zahlung auf dein N26 Konto von einem Konto erfolgen, das dir gehört. (In allen anderen Ländern ist es nicht nötig, dass das andere Bankkonto dir gehört.)6. iDEAL: (nur in den Niederlanden) für Kunden mit niederländischen AGB verfügbar und mit einem iDEAL Konto. Die erste Einzahlung ist kostenlos. Weitere Einzahlungen kosten 1,5 % des eingezahlten Betrags. 7. GiroPay (sofort): Nur in Deutschland verfügbar für Kunden, die den deutschen AGB unterliegen und die über ein GiroPay-Konto verfügen.8. EPS (sofort): Nur in Österreich verfügbar für Kunden, die den österreichischen AGB unterliegen und die über ein EPS-Konto verfügen.9. Bancontact (sofort): Nur in Belgien verfügbar für Kunden, die den belgischen AGB unterliegen und die über ein Bancontact-Konto verfügen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you’ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don’t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: Comment verrouiller ma carte N26 ?
answer: Vous pouvez verrouiller et déverrouiller votre carte à tout moment depuis votre application mobile N26. Rendez-vous dans la section Cartes puis Paramètres de votre carte. Sélectionnez la carte concernée, puis cliquez sur Verrouiller.Dans la même section, vous pouvez également décider de bloquer les paiements par carte, en ligne et/ou à l’étranger.Cela vous permet d’avoir un contrôle total sur votre carte et de vous protéger contre les transactions frauduleuses. Vous devriez toujours verrouiller votre carte si quelque chose semble suspicieux ou si vous l’égarez momentanément. Vous pourrez la déverrouiller plus tard si tout va bien.Si vous n’avez pas accès à votre application mobile N26, ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter à votre espace client en ligne, vous pouvez également demander à bloquer votre carte bancaire ou les transactions sortantes de votre compte en nous appelant au +33 1 88 45 02 39.

question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it’s important that we know who our customers are. That’s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We’ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities. If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won’t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab). In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the “Substantial Presence Test” (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.“Substantial Presence Test” means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6. In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you: A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn’t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don’t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000€, and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500€. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can’t withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
answer:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercard’s exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesn’t charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercard’s rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
answer: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations. Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions. Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.

question: Dove trovare il codice di identificazione fiscale
answer: Il tuo Codice di Identificazione Fiscale (TIN, dall'inglese Tax Identification Number) è univoco, e rilasciato dall'autorità fiscale al momento della registrazione nel paese in cui tu, come individuo, sei un contribuente.Dove trovare il TIN può variare a seconda del paese in cui sei soggetto alla tassazione. Ti preghiamo di notare che il TIN di ogni paese può essere diverso. Ad esempio, se sei nel Regno Unito puoi pensare al tuo TIN come al tuo National Insurance Number (NIN). per i cittadini tedeschi:Se sei residente in Germania e sei registrato presso le autorità fiscali locali, ti verrà fornito un TIN a 11 cifre ovvero Steueridentifikationsnummer. Non confondere questo con il tuo Codice Fiscale a 9 cifre, o Steuernummer.I TIN non sono riportati nei documenti di riconoscimento ufficiali, ma puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:La lettera che hai ricevuto dall'Ufficio Federale Centrale delle Imposte per il rilascio del tuo TIN o IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben über die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Calcolo dei redditiDichiarazione dei redditi da lavoro dipendenteScopri di più su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini francesi:Se sei residente in Francia e sei obbligato a dichiarare le tasse lì, le autorità fiscali francesi emetteranno un TIN a 13 cifre o SPI (Simplification des Procédures d'Imposition) una volta che ti sarai registrato nel database delle autorità fiscali. Questi numeri iniziano con 0, 1, 2 o 3.Puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Sul tuo modello di dichiarazione dei redditi prestampatoInoltre, puoi trovarlo sui tuoi avvisi fiscali e di imposta sulla proprietàScopri di più su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini italiani:Se sei residente in Italia, il TIN o Codice fiscale (composto da 16 caratteri) è valido solo se registrato nell'Anagrafe tributaria italiana gestita dall'Agenzia delle Entrate. Se non hai un TIN, dovrai presentare la richiesta in qualsiasi ufficio dell'Agenzia delle Entrate.I TIN non sono riportati nei documenti di riconoscimento ufficiali, ma puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Il TIN è presente sulla tua tessera sanitaria personale (Tessera sanitaria/Codice Fiscale).Puoi trovare il tuo TIN anche sulla tua carta TIN.Scopri di più su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella). per i cittadini spagnoli:Se sei residente in Spagna, il tuo TIN è unico a fini fiscali e doganali. Il tuo TIN spagnolo è composto da nove caratteri (l'ultimo carattere è una lettera ai fini di controllo). I TIN vengono emessi dal Ministero dell'Interno e possono variare a seconda che tu sia una persona fisica con cittadinanza spagnola o meno.A seconda delle tue circostanze, puoi trovare il tuo TIN nei seguenti luoghi:Carta d'identità personaleCarta d'identità elettronicaCarta di residenza per stranieriNuova patente (dal 2004)Carta di identificazione fiscaleTessera previdenzialeScopri di più su come localizzare il tuo TIN, o su come richiederlo, qui (nuova tabella).Informazione importante:Il formato del codice fiscale che può essere inserito nell'app N26 dipende dal paese in cui ti trovi. Ciò significa che se risiedi in Germania devi inserire il tuo TIN tedesco.Puoi controllare le informazioni fiscali che hai salvato sul tuo conto andando su:Il mio conto > Profilo > Informazioni fiscali.Se hai inserito il paese in cui sei soggetto d'imposta ma non il tuo numero d'identificazione fiscale, rimuovi il paese dalla lista che ti viene mostrata nell'applicazione, inserisci nuovamente il paese e inserisci nuovamente il tuo numero d'identificazione fiscale.Scopri di più su come utilizziamo le tue informazioni fiscali qui (nuova tabella).

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: How to prove my identity?
answer: As a licensed bank, it’s important that we know who our customers are. That’s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We’ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in a different country (new tab)As a fully-licensed and regulated bank, N26 must adhere to strict industry standards and guidelines when it comes to the verification of all potential customers. These vary by nationality, which is why we are only able to conduct the important step of identity verification with specific types of identity documentation for specific nationalities. If your identity documents are not currently supported, it means we won’t be able to offer you an account with us at this time. That said, we're always adding new documents to this list, so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Qu’est-ce qu’un compte N26 Business ?
answer: Le compte N26 Business est une solution simple et abordable pour tous vos besoins financiers quotidiens. Le compte N26 Business est un compte courant numérique sûr et intuitif que vous pouvez ouvrir en quelques minutes. Simple, transparent et gratuit*, ce compte N26 Business vous permet de recevoir des paiements de vos clients, d’envoyer de l’argent et de dépenser en toute confiance tout en gardant vos finances professionnelles complètement séparées de vos finances personnelles. Nos comptes Business sont conçus pour les auto-entrepreneurs et les indépendants qui exercent leur activité en nom propre (le nom de votre société ne peut donc pas figurer sur votre compte ou votre carte). Il est actuellement impossible de passer d’un compte personnel à un compte Business. Vous devez donc vous assurer que ce compte vous convient avant de l’ouvrir. Que comprend un compte N26 Business ?Notre compte N26 Business présente les avantages et fonctionnalités suivants :Compte Business gratuit* : Le compte N26 Business peut être ouvert gratuitement en ligne sans frais de tenue de compte (*si le solde du compte est de 50 000 € ou plus, des droits de garde peuvent être prélevés).Carte virtuelle N26 : Ce compte N26 Business vous donne droit à une carte virtuelle gratuite destinée à un usage professionnel uniquement. Cette carte virtuelle gratuite comporte un numéro PAN complet et peut être ajoutée à vos portefeuilles Apple ou Google pour les achats en ligne et en magasin. Vous pouvez également utiliser des distributeurs automatiques de billets sans contact pour retirer de l’argent avec Apple ou Google pay.Carte physique N26 Mastercard : Pour 10 € supplémentaires, vous pouvez recevoir une carte physique N26 Mastercard (veuillez noter que vous devez disposer d’au moins 10 € sur votre compte pour la fabrication et l’envoi de la carte).Carte Maestro : Si vous avez également besoin d’une carte pour vos dépenses privées, les clients basés en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas peuvent commander une carte Maestro pour 10 € supplémentaires.Paiements et virements : Vous pouvez effectuer et recevoir des virements SEPA en utilisant votre application mobile N26. Vous pouvez également envoyer de l’argent instantanément à d’autres clients N26 en utilisant Moneybeam. Contrairement à d’autres comptes, les virements en devise étrangère ne sont pas possibles avec N26 Business depuis l’application. En revanche, vous pouvez le faire sur Wise (nouvel onglet).Cashback avec N26 Business : Vous recevez 0,1 % de cashback tous les mois sur vos paiements effectués en utilisant la carte. Veuillez noter que les paiements B2B (business to business) ne peuvent pas être effectués avec un compte N26 Business.

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you’re able to see what’s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you’ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can’t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days. Sometimes you’ll see both payments at the same time–the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn’t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab). Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

question: Wie lege ich eine Beschwerde ein?
answer: Brauchst du Hilfe oder hast du eine Frage? Wenn du Hilfe mit deinem Konto benötigst, eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren willst oder persönliche Daten aktualisieren willst, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter!Eine Beschwerde einreichenWir bedauern, dass du eine Beschwerde einreichen möchtest. Wir werden dein Anliegen prüfen und dir unsere Ergebnisse und die endgültige Antwort per E-Mail übermitteln.Unser Kundenservice kann dir beim Einreichen einer Beschwerde per Live-Chat behilflich sein. Möchtest du die Beschwerde jedoch per E-Mail einreichen, schreibe bitte an eine der folgenden E-Mail-Adressen in deiner bevorzugten Sprache:Deutsch beschwerden@n26.com (neuen Tab)Englisch complaints@n26.com (neuen Tab)Bitte beachte: Diese Adressen sind lediglich für die Einreichung einer Beschwerde gedacht. Für Kundenanfragen bitten wir dich, den Kundenservice (neuen Tab) zu kontaktieren. Unser Kundenservice ist täglich für dich da und kann dein Problem schnell lösen.Wenn du eine Beschwerde einreichst, benötigen wir folgende Informationen von dir:Das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung, mit dem bzw. mit der  du nicht zufrieden bistEine Beschreibung des Sachverhalts und wann das Problem aufgetreten istDu kannst auch Unterlagen einreichen, die im Zusammenhang mit deiner Beschwerde stehen Das gewünschte Ergebnis der BeschwerdeWir können kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur an die E-Mail-Adresse übermitteln, die mit deinem N26-Konto verknüpft ist. Wird die Beschwerde durch einen Vertreter eingereicht, muss ihr auch ein spezielles notariell beglaubigtes Vollmachtsformular beigefügt sein.Bitte kontaktiere uns via App oder per E-Mail, da wir dir nicht helfen können, wenn du unser Büro aufsuchst. Falls du uns nicht via App oder per E-Mail kontaktieren kannst, schicke uns bitte eine schriftliche Beschwerde (per Brief) an folgende Adresse:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWir bestätigen dir den Erhalt deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail und prüfen anschließend den Sachverhalt. Sofern wir weitere Informationen von dir benötigen, wird sich unser Complaint Management Team direkt per E-Mail an dich wenden und dir erklären, welche Informationen wir zusätzlich brauchen. Sobald unser Team dein Anliegen geprüft hat, teilen wir dir per E-Mail eine endgültige Entscheidung mit.Bearbeitungszeit einer BeschwerdeAlle Beschwerden, die Zahlungsdienste wie Überweisungen und Kartentransaktionen betreffen, werden innerhalb von 15 Werktagen gemäß der Europäischen Richtlinie über Zahlungsdienste II (PSD2) gelöst. Falls wir mehr Zeit bei der Bearbeitung deiner Beschwerde benötigen, dann werden wir dich darüber informieren. Wir müssen dich innerhalb von 35 Werktagen über unsere Entscheidung informieren.Für alle anderen Beschwerden gelten unterschiedliche Fristen. Diese sind abhängig von den AGB jenes Landes, in dem du dein N26-Konto eröffnet hast. Deutschland und Österreich - 15 WerktageAndere europäische Länder - 15 WerktageIrland - 40 WerktageFrankreich - 56 KalendertageVereinigtes Königreich - 56 KalendertageSpanien - 60 KalendertageItalien - 60 KalendertageWenn wir keine Antwort von dir erhalten, schließen wir möglicherweise deine Beschwerde. Wenn du dich zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt wieder meldest, erstellen wir einen neuen Fall und teilen dir die neue Referenznummer für deine Beschwerde mit.Wenn du mit dem Ausgang deiner Beschwerde unzufrieden bistSolltest du mit der von uns angebotenen Lösung nicht zufrieden sein, hast du die Möglichkeit, dich an eine unabhängige dritte Instanz zu wenden. Es stehen dir beispielsweise folgende Schlichtungsstellen zur Verfügung:die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbankdie Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin)Eine vollständige Liste von Streitbeilegungs- und Schlichtungsstellen findest du in unserem Imprint (neuen Tab).

question: N26 supporta i bonifici SWIFT?
answer: Sì, ma per il momento solo bonifici SWIFT in entrata.I bonifici SWIFT in uscita non sono ancora possibili. Seguici sui social media #N26 e sul nostro Blog (nuova tabella) per essere tra i primi a sapere se ci saranno dei cambiamenti.Scopri qui come effettuare bonifici in valuta estera con N26.Scopri qui quanto tempo occorre per un bonifico SWIFT in entrata.Quanto costa un bonifico SWIFT?Per i bonifici in entrata superiori a 150 € verrà applicata una commissione di 12,50 € + lo 0,1% dell’importo ricevuto.Non si applicano commissioni ai bonifici in entrata inferiori a 150 €.La commissione massima è di 100 € per transazione.A chi viene applicata la commissione?Se hai aperto un conto prima del 07/07/2021 e hai un IBAN tedesco, la commissione viene applicata a te se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart o Business You. (Ciò significa che non viene applicata a N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal e N26 Business Metal.)Se hai aperto un conto prima del 07/07/2021 e hai un IBAN spagnolo, la commissione viene applicata se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You. (Ciò significa che non viene applicata ai conti N26 Metal o N26 Business Metal.)Se hai aperto un conto dopo il 07/07/2021, la commissione viene applicata indipendentemente dal tuo IBAN se hai un conto N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You. (Ciò significa che non viene applicata ai conti N26 Metal o N26 Business Metal.)

question: What is a Virtual Card?
answer: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account you’ll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10€ to activate the card). An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10€ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on ‘Get an additional card’.Select ‘Virtual’ at the top, then tap ‘Choose’ at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap ‘Generate virtual card’.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect ‘cards’Locate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select ‘card details’You will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

question: Wie funktioniert Google Pay?
answer: Verfügbar in Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Belgien, Dänemark, Finnland, Irland, Norwegen, Polen, Slowakei, Schweden, Schweiz, Österreich, Estland, Griechenland, Lettland, Litauen, Niederlande, Portugal.Mit Google Pay kannst du mit deinem Smartphone bezahlen und musst so deine Mastercard nicht ständig bei dir tragen.Google Pay ist in allen Shops, die kontaktlose Zahlungen (NFC) unterstützen, sowie in Online-Shops verfügbar. Halte einfach dein Smartphone in die Nähe des kontaktlosen Terminals und deine Zahlung wird automatisch verarbeitet. Wenn du online bezahlst, wähle Google Pay als Zahlungsmethode aus. Wir werden dich beim Abschluss des Bezahlvorgangs per Push-Nachricht auffordern, deine Zahlung zu bestätigen.So geht's:Um deine N26 Mastercard zu deinem Google Wallet hinzuzufügen, lade die Google Pay App herunter und wähle Hinzufügen, um deine Kartendaten einzugeben. Du brauchst Android 5.0 (Lollipop) oder höher sowie ein NFC-fähiges Smartphone.Logge dich in die N26 App ein un gehe zu Karten > Karteneinstellungen > Zu Google Pay hinzufügen. Du wirst dann zur Google Pay App weitergeleitet. Einige Tipps:Google Pay erfordert eine Bildschirmsperre. Falls du diese noch nicht eingerichtet hast, wirst du dazu aufgefordert, bevor du deine Mastercard zur Google Pay App hinzufügst.Falls dein Smartphone mit einer Schutzhülle versehen ist, musst du diese zum Bezahlen eventuell entfernen. Manche Zahlungsterminals erkennen dein Smartphone möglicherweise nicht, wenn die Schutzhülle zu dick ist.Wenn das Zahlungsterminal dich dazu auffordert, deine Karte (erneut) vorzuzeigen, dann hast du dein Smartphone möglicherweise zu schnell wieder weggenommen oder nicht nah genug an das Terminal gehalten. Versuche es einfach erneut.

question: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
answer: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, you’re now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and you’ll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs. RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.  At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and we’ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you’ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you’re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of €10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
