If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

question: Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
answer: Gli Spazi Condivisi rappresentano un modo nuovo e facile per utenti N26 di condividere denaro. Questi Spazi possono essere utili per suddividere il costo delle utenze, per pianificare una vacanza oppure per organizzare l’acquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o parente.Spazi Condivisi è un’opzione disponibile per gli utenti N26 premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You e N26 Business Metal), i quali possono creare uno Spazio e invitare altri utenti a prenderne parte.Tutti gli utenti N26 possono essere invitati a partecipare ad uno Spazio.Il proprietario dello Spazio diventa proprietario del denaro depositato.Il proprietario dello Spazio può invitare fino a 10 partecipanti oppure decidere di rimuoverli.IBAN italiano e Spazi CondivisiSpazi Condivisi è un nuovo, semplice, modo per i clienti N26 di condividere le spese e mettere soldi da parte insieme. Questi spazi separati dal conto principale possono essere utilizzati per qualsiasi scopo, dal pagamento delle bollette alla pianificazione delle vacanza fino all'acquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o un familiare.Puoi utilizzare gli Spazi Condivisi con il tuo IBAN italiano: basta seguire i passaggi sull'app N26 per Spazi Condivisi e invitare i tuoi amici stretti e parenti a iniziare a utilizzare questa funzionalità.Spazi Condivisi è disponibile per i clienti N26 premium (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You e N26 Business Metal) che possono sia creare Spazi Condivisi che invitare altri partecipanti nei loro spazi.I partecipanti devono avere un conto N26, il tipo di sottoscrizione non è rilevante.I clienti N26 Standard e N26 Business Standard possono partecipare a due Spazi Condivisi al massimo.Il proprietario dello spazio condiviso è anche il proprietario del denaro che vi è depositato.Il proprietario può invitare fino a 10 partecipanti e rimuoverli dal suo spazio separato dal conto principale in qualsiasi momento.Come creare Spazi Condivisi:Per creare degli Spazi Condivisi segui questi passaggi (se hai già una conto premium con N26):Apri la tua app N26 e vai nella sezione Spaces nella barra di navigazione in basso. Tocca l'icona + e clicca su 'Risparmiare insieme'.Leggi le informazioni contenute in Scopri di più e clicca su Continua.Dai un nome al tuo spazio condiviso. Cerca e seleziona dalla lista dei contatti i clienti N26 che desideri invitare. Se la persona che vuoi invitare ha un conto N26 ma non appare sulla lista dei contatti, ti consigliamo di chiedergli se ha dato il consenso per essere visibile ad altri clienti N26 tramite l'app nella sezione il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni personali.Se necessario, inserisci il loro nome completo come dovrebbe apparire sulla lista.Dopodiché dovrai leggere e firmare i Termini e condizioni:Apparirà il pop-up "Firma Elettronica Avanzata". Tocca "Firma".Spunta entrambe le voci "Firma Elettronica Avanzata" e "Procura", poi conferma.Inserisci il PIN di conferma e dai l'ok.A questo punto puoi inviare l'invito ai tuoi contatti N26. Potrai iniziare subito ad aggiungere denaro o a gestire lo spazio condiviso per includere più persone.

question: Was ist das N26 Webformular für DSGVO-Anfragen?
answer: Der Schutz der personenbezogenen und finanziellen Daten unserer NutzerInnen genießt bei uns oberste Priorität. Daher stellen wir unser N26 Webformular zur Verfügung, das es allen N26 NutzerInnen, ehemaligen N26 NutzerInnen (deren Konto inzwischen geschlossen ist) und ihren Bevollmächtigten ermöglicht, uns auf einem sicheren Weg zu kontaktieren, wenn sie Fragen zu ihren personenbezogenen Daten haben.Wie funktioniert das?Das Webformular (neuen Tab) sollte verwendet werden, wenn N26 NutzerInnen oder ehemalige N26 NutzerInnen ihre Rechte gemäß der Datenschutzgrundverordnung ("DSGVO") selbst oder durch eine bevollmächtigte Person ausüben möchten.Du kannst insbesondere folgende Rechte wahrnehmen:Recht auf Zugriff der betroffenen Person nach Art. 15 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf Löschung ("Recht auf Vergessenwerden") gemäß Art. 17 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Recht auf Widerspruch nach Art. 21 DSGVO (neuen Tab)Du kannst innerhalb von maximal 30 Kalendertagen mit einer Antwort von unserem zuständigen Team rechnen.Wenn du das Webformular ausfüllst, wirst du aufgefordert, Folgendes einzugeben:Dein WohnsitzlandDeinen N26 Status (NutzerIn, ehemalige/r NutzerIn, Bevollmächtigte/r)Deinen AntragstypName, Nachname und E-Mail AdresseMuss ich als ehemalige/r N26 NutzerIn oder als Bevollmächtigte/r noch etwas angeben?Ehemalige NutzerInnen und ihre Bevollmächtigten müssen weitere Unterlagen hochladen, um ihre Identität nachzuweisen und sicherzustellen, dass der Empfänger der Daten tatsächlich dazu berechtigt ist.Folgende Unterlagen sind erforderlich:Ehemalige NutzerInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / ReisepassesBevollmächtigte VertreterInnen: Kopie des Personalausweises / Reisepasses und eine unterschriebene Bevollmächtigung Sobald das Formular vollständig ausgefüllt ist, klicke auf Senden und sende deine Anfrage ab.Warum ist für ehemalige N26 KundInnen und Bevollmächtigte eine manuelle Überprüfung des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses notwendig?Wir fragen eine Kopie des Personalausweises bzw. Reisepasses an, um die Identität zu überprüfen und sicherzustellen, dass personenbezogene Daten und finanzielle Informationen nicht in falsche Hände gelangen. Eine solche manuelle Überprüfung ist erforderlich, wenn die Identität einer Person überprüft werden muss und unser standardisiertes Verfahren zur Identitätsprüfung nicht angewendet werden kann. Da die Identifizierung von ehemaligen KundInnen und Bevollmächtigten nicht in der App oder der Web-App vorgenommen werden kann, da sie keinen Zugang darauf haben, müssen wir hier auf eine manuelle Überprüfung zurückgreifen. Fragen oder Bedenken hierzu?Unser Kundenservice hilft dir gerne weiter. Schreibe uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They’re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that’s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you’ve received an unexpected message:If you’ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you’ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you’re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We’re always here to help!

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised. In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure. One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a “trusted beneficiary” so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts? N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.  What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders. In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted. How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed. 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.  I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

question: Comment utiliser la version numérique de ma carte ?
answer: Effectuez des achats avec votre smartphoneAjoutez simplement votre carte N26 à votre compte Apple Pay ou Google Pay afin d'effectuer des achats auprès de commerçants acceptant ce moyen de paiement. Vous pouvez activer cette fonctionnalité avant même que votre carte n'arrive chez vous mais aussi une fois que vous aurez reçu et activé votre carte.Il vous suffit de suivre les étapes suivantes : Connectez-vous à votre compte N26Allez dans l'onglet "Cartes"Sélectionnez "Paramètres de la carte" puis choisissez celle que vous souhaitez utiliser (en faisant glisser l'écran à gauche si vous avez plusieurs cartes)Sélectionnez "Ajouter à Cartes" ou "Ajouter à G Pay".A noter :Si vous recommandez une carte ou adhérez à un compte premium (et attendez donc votre nouvelle carte) sans bloquer votre carte actuelle, vous devrez utiliser Apple Pay ou Google Pay avec celle-ci en attendant que votre nouvelle carte arrive.Accédez aux informations de votre carte, directement depuis l'application N26.Si vous avez besoin d'accéder aux informations de votre carte mais que vous ne l'avez pas avec vous, il vous suffit d'accéder à votre application N26. Pour ce faire, il est nécessaire :- d'avoir le smartphone synchronisé à votre compte.- d'avoir activé cette carte.Voici les étapes à suivre :Ouvrez l’application et allez dans l’onglet “Cartes"Sélectionnez “Paramètres de la carte” afin de trouver votre carte active (si vous en avez plusieurs, faites glisser l’écran vers la gauche).Une fois la carte choisie, sélectionnez “Informations de la carte”. Vous serez invité à vous identifier en déverrouillant votre appareil par identification biométrique ou avec le code de votre smartphone.Les données complètes de votre carte apparaissent pendant 1 minute avant de disparaître automatiquement.

question: FATCA - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin de certaines informations de votre part ?
answer:
En tant qu’établissement de crédit, N26 est tenue de communiquer directement au Département du Trésor des Etats-Unis et à l’Internal Revenue Service (IRS) des informations sur les comptes détenus par les contribuables américains ou par des entités étrangères dans lesquelles les contribuables américains détiennent une participation substantielle selon le FATCA. FATCA signifie Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act et est une législation conçue pour prévenir l'évasion fiscale. Introduit par l'IRS, l'objectif du FATCA est d'encourager une meilleure conformité fiscale en empêchant les personnes américaines d'utiliser des banques étrangères et d'autres organisations financières afin d'éviter l'imposition américaine sur leurs revenus et leurs actifs. Vous pouvez trouver plus d'informations sur le FATCA sur le site Web de l'IRS : www.irs.gov (nouvel onglet)En effet, contrairement à la plupart des autres pays, le système fiscal américain prélève l'impôt sur le revenu des personnes résidant sur le territoire national, mais également des citoyens américains vivant à l’étranger. À l’inverse, dans une majorité de pays, seules les personnes résidant sur le territoire national sont soumises aux impôts du pays de résidence. Les expatriés en sont donc exemptés.Dans le cadre du FATCA, et pour que nous puissions déterminer avec précision si votre compte doit faire l’objet d’une déclaration auprès du fisc américain, nous vous demanderons de nous communiquer les informations suivantes :Si vous êtes citoyen des États-Unis (binationaux compris) ou si vous êtes titulaire d’une carte verte en cours de validité
Si vous êtes imposable aux États-Unis
Être «assujetti à l'impôt» aux États-Unis ne signifie pas nécessairement que vous payez l'impôt sur le revenu des particuliers aux États-Unis. Cela signifie que la loi fiscale américaine vous oblige à produire une déclaration de revenus et à déclarer vos revenus (mondiaux) à l'IRS, même si vous ne payez aucun impôt américain.
Votre numéro d’identification fiscale américain (nouvel onglet) (si vous êtes effectivement imposable aux États-Unis)
Vous pouvez dans ce cas nous fournir votre numéro de sécurité sociale américain (SSN en anglais) ou votre Numéro individuel de contribuable américain (ITIN en anglais).De plus, si votre compte indique un lieu de naissance américain ou un numéro de téléphone américain ou si vous mettez en place un ordre de virement permanent aux États-Unis, la législation FATCA nous oblige à supposer que vous êtes soumis au FATCA, jusqu'à ce que vous nous prouviez le contraire.Si votre situation fiscale vient à changer, vous pourrez à tout moment modifier les informations concernées depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > Paramètres > Paramètres personnels > Informations fiscales.

question: Bankdokumente – Diese Belege sind verfügbar
answer:
N26 heißt nicht ohne Grund die mobile Bank – du kannst  deinen Kontoauszug, deine Bankdaten und andere Bankdokumente automatisch herunterladen. Bei den folgenden Bankdokumenten handelt es sich um offizielle Dokumente, die ohne Unterschrift gültig sind:Dein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, auf dem du deinen aktuellen Kontostand sowie eingehende und ausgehende Transaktionen auf deinem N26 Konto einsehen kannst. Auch dein vollständiger Name, deine IBAN und deine BIC stehen auf dem Bankdokument. So kannst du es herunterladen.Deine Bankdaten (oder: Kontobestätigung) belegen, dass dein Bankkonto unter deinem Namen registriert ist. Dieses Bankdokument beinhaltet deinen vollen Namen, dein Geburtsdatum, deine IBAN und BIC, das Datum der Kontoeröffnung und – falls gewünscht – deinen aktuellen Kontostand und deine Kartennummer (die beiden letzten Angaben sind in der Regel nicht zu sehen). So kannst du deine Bankdaten anfordern.Die Gebührenabrechnung ist ein Dokument, auf dem alle von N26 erhobenen Gebühren des letzten Jahres aufgelistet sind.In der Web-App: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*, tippe auf Entgeltaufstellung, wähle je nach Bedarf 6 Monate oder 12 Monate und klicke im Anschluss auf Anfrage. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden erhältst du eine PDF in deinem Posteingang unter Nachrichten von N26.Der Überweisungsbeleg bestätigt, dass du eine Zahlung von deinem N26 Konto getätigt hast. Darin enthalten sind dein vollständiger Name, deine (im N26 Konto registrierte) Adresse, deine IBAN und BIC, der Überweisungsbetrag, das Datum, der Verwendungszweck sowie der vollständige Name, die IBAN und die BIC des Empfängers.In der mobilen und der WebApp: Gehe im Home-Bereich auf die Überweisung und wähle Überweisungsbestätigung herunterladen. Die PDF wird automatisch erstellt.Die Kartenzahlungsbestätigung wird genutzt, um eine Zahlung mit deiner N26 Mastercard zu bestätigen. Du kannst den Kontoauszug des entsprechenden Monats vorweisen.RIB (Relevé d'Identité Bancaire in Französisch) ist ein Bankdokument speziell für französische Behörden. Es enthält die wichtigsten Bankdaten, wie deinen vollständigen Namen, deine Adresse sowie IBAN und BIC.In der WebApp: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab) Symbol*, scrolle runter bis RIB - Relevé d’Identité Bancaire und klicke auf den Anfrage Button.   
* Das Download Symbol ist ein Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil. Es befindet sich links vom ‘Geld erhalten’ Button.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10€). Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0€ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25€ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Bank information—your N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‘Add Money’ button.

question: Chi sono le Persone Politicamente Esposte?
answer:
Le Persone Politicamente Esposte sono persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche. Sono da includere in questa categoria anche i loro familiari e le persone con le quali intrattengono stretti legami d’affari.Per persone fisiche che occupano o hanno cessato di occupare da meno di un anno importanti cariche pubbliche si intendono:Presidente della Repubblica, Presidente del Consiglio, Ministro, Vice-Ministro e Sottosegretario, Presidente di Regione, Assessore regionale, Sindaco di capoluogo di provincia o città metropolitana, Sindaco di comune con popolazione non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Deputato, senatore, parlamentare europeo, consigliere regionale e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Membro degli organi direttivi centrali di partiti politici;Giudice della Corte Costituzionale, magistrato della Corte di Cassazione o della Corte dei conti, consigliere di Stato, altri componenti del Consiglio di Giustizia Amministrativa per la Regione siciliana e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Membro degli organi direttivi delle banche centrali e delle autorità indipendenti;Ambasciatore, incaricato d'affari e cariche equivalenti in Stati esteri, ufficiale di grado apicale delle forze armate e cariche analoghe in Stati esteri;Componente degli organi di amministrazione, direzione o controllo delle imprese controllate, anche indirettamente, dallo Stato italiano o da uno Stato estero o controllate, in misura prevalente o totalitaria, dalle Regioni, da comuni capoluoghi di provincia e citta' metropolitane e da comuni con popolazione complessivamente non inferiore a 15.000 abitanti;Direttore generale di ASL e di azienda ospedaliera, di azienda ospedaliera universitaria e degli altri enti del servizio sanitario nazionale.Direttore, vicedirettore e membro dell'organo di gestione o soggetto svolgenti funzioni equivalenti in organizzazioni internazionali;Vengono identificati come familiari di persone politicamente esposte: i genitori; il coniuge o la persona legata in unione civile o convivenza di fatto;i figli e i loro coniugi e le persone legate ai figli in unione civile o convivenza di fatto.
I soggetti con i quali le PEP intrattengono notoriamente stretti rapporti sono:le persone fisiche legate alla persona politicamente esposta per via della titolarità effettiva congiunta di enti giuridici o di altro stretto rapporto di affari;le persone fisiche che detengono solo formalmente il controllo totalitario di un'entità notoriamente costituita, di fatto, nell'interesse e a beneficio di una persona politicamente esposta.

question: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
answer: From the 17th March, customers from other banks can request—at their bank institution—the return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, you’ll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you don’t have sufficient funds in your Main Account, you’ll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab). If you’d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We’ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we’ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I’ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe. What if I’ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one. Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: What's an insolvency and what can I do?
answer: An insolvency is a situation in which the debtor is unable to fulfil his financial obligation to the creditor(s). How this is going to affect your N26 account depends on whether you have a p-account and whether we received an insolvency application or insolvency opening. FAQWhy is my account seized although I have a clearance (unseizing) from my insolvency manager?Your account is seized because we received a garnishment. If the garnishment is issued by one of the insolvency creditors, the insolvency manager has to inform us accordingly. In this case we will unseize your account. If, however, the garnishment is based on a claim which emerged only after the insolvency proceedings, the seizure will be maintained. Since we cannot be sure if the garnishment is valid or not, your account will be seized again until we've received a written confirmation to release your account from your insolvency manager.The insolvency manager ordered for my account to be released/ the insolvency proceedings are over. Why does my account remain seized?In order to release the account we require written confirmation from the insolvency manager directly. It can take a few days until they send it to us and we receive it. Until then your account remains seized. If you have a p-account, you can use your funds to the extent of your monthly allowance.Is it possible to convert my p-account back to my normal account whilst I have an active insolvency?You can revert your p-account to a normal bank account at any time. We recommend that you make sure we have a written confirmation to release your account from the insolvency manager.Is it possible to pay out a new garnishment whilst I have active insolvency proceedings?In that case you can only issue a transfer order for the new garnishment in agreement with the insolvency manager.

question: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (including CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.There’s always a €2 fee if you use your Maestro card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2€. Check our pricing lists if you’ve been charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: Bereavement & probate
answer:
How can I inform N26 about a death? In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceased’s bank accounts. The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: service.succession@n26.comFax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH -Service Succession-
Rungestr. 22 
10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on: Who is the deceased? If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account. How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.  A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know?If you are facing certain proceedings or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us. We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings. Occasionally we’re inquired by a notary in charge of the succession. In this case we will provide the notary with all necessary information for your convenience. We recommend providing any notary in charge with our address details. Please refrain from sending us original documents via mail at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you or your notary in charge. What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?  Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country. However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH is located in Germany. When it comes to the relationship between the deceased’s bank and the beneficiaries, other legal requirements may be applicable than usually in your home country.As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be blocked.Please note that standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates on the account generally continue to exist after the death of the account holder. Heirs or authorised representatives must have these revoked or deleted. Further, we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax in Germany of the assets belonging to the estate.We will notify the beneficiaries or their notary in charge in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceased’s account with N26.
I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death? There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes. It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited. Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this. For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.

question: Transferencias inmediatas con MoneyBeam
answer: Haciendo un MoneyBeam, puedes enviarles dinero a tus contactos en tiempo real y sin necesidad de introducir tus datos bancarios. También puedes pedirles un MoneyBeam a tus contactos para recibir dinero de ellos. Para poder utilizar MoneyBeam, tú y tus contactos tenéis que ser visibles como usuarios de N26.Para enviar un MoneyBeam: Pulsa Enviar dinero > MoneyBeamSelecciona a un contacto de tu lista o agrégalo introduciendo su número de teléfono o dirección de email.Indica el importe y el concepto de la transacciónIndica tu PIN de confirmación y confirma el mensaje push que recibirás. Para solicitar un MoneyBeam:Pulsa Recibir dinero > Solicitar MoneyBeamSelecciona a un contacto de tu lista o agrégalo introduciendo su número de teléfono o dirección de email.Indica el importe y el concepto de la transacciónCuando tu contacto confirme tu solicitud, recibirás el importe solicitado.El límite de los MoneyBeams es de 1000 € por transacción y de 5000€ cada 24 horas.Añade un GIF como referencia adicional:Puedes enviar GIF como texto de referencia adicional cuando utilices MoneyBeam. Cuando se complete el MoneyBeam, el beneficiario podrá ver un emoji animado como prefijo de la transferencia recibida en la pantalla de inicio para informarle de que la transferencia tiene un GIF adjunto. El beneficiario puede ver el gif en los datos de la transferencia junto con el texto de referencia.Giphy, Inc. te proporciona los GIF directamente, y no N26. Ten en cuenta que Giphy es una empresa estadounidense que puede tratar tus datos personales en EE. UU. Encontrarás información sobre cómo trata Giphy tus datos personales cuando adjuntas y envías GIF en la Política de Privacidad de Giphy (pestaña nueva).  Para enviar un MoneyBeam con un GIF:Selecciona Enviar dinero y, a continuación, MoneyBeam.Selecciona a un contacto de tu lista o añade uno introduciendo su número de móvil y su dirección de email.Introduce un importe y una referencia.Selecciona Añadir GIF y busca o desliza el GIF que quieres añadirIntroduce tu PIN de confirmación y confirma la notificación push que recibirás.

question: Was ist eine Insolvenz und was kann ich tun?
answer: Eine Insolvenz bezeichnet die Situation eines Schuldners, der nicht mehr in der Lage ist, seine Zahlungsverpflichtungen gegenüber einem Gläubiger zu erfüllen. Das hat Folgen für dein N26 Konto, die vom Status deines Kontos und vom Stadium des Insolvenzverfahrens abhängen. Dein Konto kann ein P-Konto sein (oder nicht) und das Insolvenzverfahren kann im Stadium des Antragsverfahrens oder Eröffnungsverfahrens sein. FAQWarum wurde mein Konto gesperrt, obwohl ich eine Freigabe vom Insolvenzverwalter habe?Dein Konto ist gesperrt, weil uns ein Pfändungs- und Überweisungsbeschluss für dein Konto zugestellt wurde. Kommt die Pfändung von einem deiner Insolvenzgläubiger, dann muss uns der Insolvenzverwalter darüber in Kenntnis setzen und die Sperre wird aufgehoben. Wenn es sich um eine Forderung handelt, die erst nach nach Beendigung des Insolvenzverfahrens entstanden ist, dann ist die Pfändungsmaßnahme zulässig und die Sperre bleibt aufrechterhalten. Da wir wir nicht sicher sind, ob die neue Pfändungsmaßnahme gültig ist oder aufgrund des Insolvenzverfahrens zurückzuweisen ist, bleibt dein Konto wieder gesperrt, bis wir vom Insolvenzverwalter eine schriftliche Freigabeerklärung für dein Konto erhalten haben. Der Insolvenzverwalter hat die Freigabe des Kontos angeordnet/ das Insolvenzverfahren ist beendet. Warum bleibt mein Konto gesperrt?  Um die Sperre aufzuheben, benötigen wir ein offizielles Schreiben von dem Insolvenzverwalter. Es kann sein, dass es einige Tage dauert, bis der Insolvenzverwalter uns dieses Schreiben zusendet und es bei uns eingeht. Bis dahin bleibt dein Konto gesperrt. Falls du ein P-Konto hast, kannst du über dein Guthaben im Rahmen des Pfändungsfreibetrages verfügen.Ist es möglich, bei aktiver Insolvenz mein P-Konto in mein normales Konto umzuwandeln?Du kannst jederzeit den Pfändungsschutz von deinem Konto entfernen. Wir empfehlen dir zuvor sicher zu stellen, dass uns eine Freigabe deines Insolvenzverwalters für dein Konto vorliegt.Ist es möglich, eine neue Pfändung in einem aktiven Insolvenzverfahren auszuzahlen?Die Ausführung des Überweisungsauftrages kann nur mit Zustimmung des Insolvenzverwalters erfolgen.

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand N26 Insurance allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the “Insurance” banner you find. You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp. How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim. Am I eligible? N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can’t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‘Sharing Money’Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:“Advanced electronic signature” will pop-up. Tap “sign”Check both “Advanced electronic signature” and “Power of attorney”, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: How to revoke my loan application?
answer: N26 Credit revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.We’ll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so it’s best to chat with us about this. We’ll take it from there and let you know via email when it’s done.Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

question: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (“IRS”).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we’ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States? 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being “subject to tax” in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you’re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don’t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (“SSN”) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information

question: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
answer: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost. How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs €9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It’s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of €9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you’re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: ¿Cómo abrir una cuenta en N26?
answer:
Puedes abrir una cuenta en N26 desde la app (en tu smartphone) o la Web App (pestaña nueva) siempre y cuando:tengas al menos 18 años.residas en un país en el que operamos.tengas un smartphone compatible.tengas un documento de identidad aceptado.cuentes con un número de identificación fiscal, según el art. 202 de la Ley General Tributaria 58/2003.no tengas ya una cuenta con nosotros.seas capaz de verificar tu identidad en uno de los idiomas en los que operamos: español, inglés, francés, italiano y alemán.
Así funciona el proceso de registro para una cuenta bancaria N26:Después de confirmar tu email, tu información personal y tu dirección de envío, elige el tipo de cuenta* que quieres.Verifica tu identidad y conecta tu smartphone con tu nueva cuenta. Al ser un nuevo registro, puedes ingresar dinero en tu cuenta directamente desde la app con una tarjeta de débito. Solo tendrás que indicar los detalles de tu tarjeta de débito y elegir la cantidad que quieres depositar entre 20 € y 150 €. Una vez que tu cuenta tenga el saldo mínimo requerido (pestaña nueva), produciremos tu primera tarjeta N26 totalmente gratis.Si quieres más información, sigue este enlace para contactar con nosotros.
*Si cumples todos los requisitos, puedes abrir tu cuenta bancaria N26. Si no cumples con los requisitos mínimos, podemos ofrecerte una cuenta N26 Flex (solo en Alemania). Esta decisión se calcula a través de un proceso automático.Nuestro chat de atención de al cliente está disponible de 7:00 a 23:00 todos los días, incluyendo domingos y festivos. ¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 € por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Infórmate más sobre este tema (pestaña nueva).

question: Épargner avec « Les -Arrondis »
answer: La fonctionnalité « Arrondis » permet aux clients premium d’arrondir à l’euro supérieur toutes les transactions par carte. La différence est automatiquement versée sur le sous-compte de leur choix.Les arrondis à l’euro supérieur ne vous mettront pas à découvert. Si le solde de votre compte n’est pas suffisant pour couvrir l’arrondi, celui-ci n’aura pas lieu.Vous ne pouvez activer la fonctionnalité « Arrondis» qu’une seule fois dans un des sous-comptes de votre choix, et non plusieurs fois en même temps.Vous pouvez annuler cette fonctionnalité à tout moment.Si vous clôturez un sous-compte dans lequel sont versées les sommes arrondies, la fonctionnalité sera automatiquement désactivée jusqu’à ce que vous l’activiez de nouveau.Comment utiliser la fonctionnalité « Arrondis » pour votre épargne ?L’activation de la fonctionnalité « Arrondis » est rapide et facile. Il suffit de vous connecter à l’application mobile N26 ou à l’espace client en ligne :Accédez à l’onglet Espaces.Sélectionnez l’espace dans lequel vous souhaitez économiser de l’argent avec les Arrondis.Appuyez/cliquez sur Gérer--> Gérer les arrondis.Faites basculer le bouton Gérer les arrondis sur le vert.Choisissez votre multiplicateur, puis appuyez/cliquez sur Confirmer.Commencez à économiser sur votre prochain achat effectué avec votre carte de débit N26 !

question: Marketing Communication Settings
answer: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

question: Wie kann ich meine Identität schützen?
answer: Um deine persönlichen Daten zu schützen und deren Missbrauch zu vermeiden, beachte bitte Folgendes:Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identität im Namen anderer Personen oder Unternehmen zu überprüfen. Dazu gehören Überprüfungen für Wohnungsmietverträge, Kreditvergaben oder Stellenangebote (einschließlich Stellen bei N26). Führe den Verifizierungsprozess nur durch, wenn du ein N26 Bankkonto für dich selbst eröffnen möchtest.Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du allein deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen können. Erstelle niemals ein N26 Bankkonto mit einer vordefinierten E-Mail-Adresse und einem vordefinierten Passwort. Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, können diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine persönlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. Logge dich auch nie in ein N26 Konto ein, das nicht deines ist.Sende deinen Ausweis oder Reisepass nicht an unbekannte oder nicht überprüfte Empfänger.Es kann sein, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen, wenn deine Transaktion einer Routineprüfung unterzogen wird. Sende nur gültige Unterlagen an verifizierte N26 E-Mailadressen.Wir werden dich außerhalb der N26 App niemals nach deinem Benutzernamen, Passwort oder PIN-Code fragen. Stelle diese Informationen niemals auf einer externen Website oder App zur Verfügung, auch wenn sie N26 ähnelt.Solltest du jemals Zweifel haben, eine verdächtige Anfrage von einem Dritten erhalten, oder vermuten, dass dein N26 Login missbraucht worden sein könnte, zögere bitte nicht damit, uns zu kontaktieren.

question: Come richiedere il rimborso di un addebito diretto?
answer: Il rimborso di un addebito diretto non annulla il contratto che hai con l'esercente.Puoi richiedere un rimborso per l'addebito diretto SEPA direttamente nell'app fino a 8 settimane dopo l'addebito. Le addebito diretto sarà accreditato sul tuo conto entro 2 giorni bancari.Richiesta di rimborso per un addebito diretto sul mio conto principale:Effettua l'accesso nell'app mobile N26Apri l'elenco delle transazioni e seleziona l'addebito diretto in questioneSeleziona RimborsoRichiesta di rimborso per l'addebito diretto nel mio spazio IBAN (sottoconto):Puoi anche richiedere il rimborso per un addebito diretto nel tuo Spaces per cui è stato assegnato un IBAN:Effettua l'accesso nell'app mobile N26Premi SpacesVai allo spazio per cui desideri rimborsare un addebito direttoSeleziona la transazione di addebito diretto in questioneSeleziona Rimborso**Solo per i paesi fuori dall'Eurozona: Se stai impostando un addebito diretto nella tua valuta nazionale, sarà la banca ricevente a dettare il tasso del cambio e l'importo finale che verrà riscosso da noi. Di seguito puoi trovare l'elenco dei paesi:BulgariaCroaziaRepubblica CecaDanimarcaUngheriaIslandaLiechtensteinNorvegiaPoloniaRomaniaSveziaSvizzera

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then “add a new recipient), some details like the recipient’s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn’t delete your transaction history with them

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it’s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Metal?
answer: ℹ️Verfügbar in Deutschland, Österreich, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Polen, Schweden, Dänemark, Norwegen, Island und Liechtenstein.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: Wähle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus drei neuen Farben: Bernstein, Schwarz und Schiefer.Zusätzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusätzliche virtuelle Karte!Zusätzliche physische Karte: Bestelle über deine N26 App eine zusätzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Gebühr von 10 €.Spaces: 10 zusätzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 Metal Mastercard online sowie in Geschäften, vermeide versteckte Bankgebühren und profitiere von gebührenfreien Auslandsüberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst darüber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit gebührenfrei Bargeld in jeder Währung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an persönlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: Rückerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, für Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugverspätung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Verspätung des aufgegebenen Gepäcks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten für medizinische Rücktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erhältst eine Versicherung für Such- und Rettungsmaßnahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unfällen während einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz für Schäden oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Du kannst N26 Metal mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Denke an Folgendes, wenn du dich für N26 Metal (neuen Tab)interessierst:Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Gebühr 15 Tage nach deiner Identitätsprüfung berechnet. Danach wird dir deine monatliche Gebühr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet.Bitte überweise nach deiner Verifizierung genug Guthaben auf dein Konto, damit die erste monatliche Gebühr abgedeckt ist, um deine Metal Karte zu erhalten.Wenn du vorher N26 You Mitglied warst, bleiben alle Einkäufe und Reisen versichert, die du mit deiner N26 You Mastercard bezahlt hast.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgebühr monatlich oder im Voraus für die nächsten 6 Monate oder für 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich für die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig für den von dir gewünschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt.Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Abrechnungsoptionen (monatlich, halbjährlich oder jährlich) und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und gehört zur Allianz Group.

question: Mi tarjeta ya ha caducado, pero no he recibido una nueva
answer: ¡No te preocupes, nosotros te ayudamos! Si ya has confirmado tu dirección y han transcurrido más de 20 días, contacta con el Servicio de Atención al Cliente. Puedes hacerlo en la sección de Ayuda de la app. Si todavía no has confirmado tu dirección, inicia sesión en tu cuenta de N26 en la app y busca un banner debajo de tu tarjeta caducada. Sigue los pasos para confirmar dónde quieres recibir tu tarjeta de sustitución. Mi tarjeta caduca pronto, ¿qué debo hacer?¿Puedo seguir utilizando mi tarjeta cuando haya caducado?¿Cuánto cuesta obtener una tarjeta de sustitución de mi tarjeta que caduca o ha caducado?

question: My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times. Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card and we’ll send it to you. If you don’t see that message, don’t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you’ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don’t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Why can’t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone’s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone’s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don’t see your friend’s name on MoneyBeam but you know they’re an N26 user, they most likely haven’t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don’t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: What is a N26 Flex account?
answer: Our N26 Flex account is neither an N26 Standard or premium membership account. We offer you the Flex account if your SCHUFA credit score isn't sufficient for you to open an N26 Standard account. You cannot select the N26 Flex account yourself. It will be visible to you before you open your account and the decision of offering you the Flex account is taken automatically based on your SCHUFA credit score, which we receive from SCHUFA when you try to open your account with us. If you think we have not considered your correct SCHUFA credit score and want to have a human review of this automated decision, you can get in touch with us by email to support@n26.com from the email address you signed up with requesting a review of the decision before accepting the N26 Flex account offer. Please note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account sign-up process.Once you reach out to us, we can let you know if your SCHUFA credit score was the reason for offering you the Flex account. You can then contact SCHUFA regarding your SCHUFA credit score, in case you want to confirm with SCHUFA if your credit score correctly reflects your creditworthiness.We will only be able to offer you an N26 standard (new tab) account or a premium membership (new tab) account once your SCHUFA credit score is updated to a higher score. You can then try again and see if we can offer you an N26 standard (new tab) account or a premium membership (new tab) account.If you want to have a human review of this automated decision, please reach out to support@n26.com from the email address you signed up with requesting a review of the decision before accepting the N26 Flex account offer. Please note:The N26 Flex account has a monthly fee of €6. You will be informed about the monthly fee before opening your account and we will debit this fee directly from your account. The first fee will be debited once your account balance reaches at least €6 or after 15 days, whichever happens first, and then monthly after thatThe N26 Flex account cannot be combined with an N26 Business, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal, N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal account.Cash withdrawals at ATMs or one of our 9,000 CASH26 (new tab) partner stores each cost €2. Both withdrawal types are debited immediately.

question: Wie kann ich mein Konto schließen?
answer: Du willst dein N26 Girokonto kündigen? Das finden wir natürlich schade.
