For the time being, we’re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here’s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use: AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could’ve been charged an ATM fee.

question: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
answer: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost. How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab), then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you’ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: Wie kann ich Feedback geben oder ein neues Produkt vorschlagen?
answer: Wir bei N26 möchten Banking einfach, transparent und flexibel machen. Deshalb freuen wir uns jederzeit über Kundenfeedback, um N26 weiterzuentwickeln. Du vermisst ein bestimmtes Feature in der App und fragst dich “Wie kann ich Feedback geben”? Schreib uns einfach eine E-Mail an ideas@n26.com (neuen Tab)! Über diese Adresse sammeln wir alle Verbesserungsvorschläge, Ideen und Wünsche.Je nach Nachfrage berücksichtigen wir deine Vorschläge in der Produktentwicklung. In der Vergangenheit haben wir auf diese Weise schon einige neue Features eingeführt – Feedback geben lohnt sich also! Übrigens führen wir regelmäßige Umfragen durch, an denen du anonym teilnehmen kannst. Und solltest du mal unzufrieden sein, kannst du uns auch eine Beschwerde schicken. Ganz gleich, wie du Feedback geben willst – wir sind dankbar, dass du dir die Zeit nimmst!

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren’t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you’re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Security.Name and sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You’ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it’s really you changing your information so we can’t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account and select Settings then Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: Why isn't my video verification working?
answer: Tips for a successful video verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of our supported countries to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver’s licenses or residence permits can’t be used). Also, the document shouldn’t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'll need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery of your card. Please note that this is not a fee: your first card after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. Deliveries take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Wie lange dauert eine Überweisung?
answer: Eingehende SEPA-Echtzeitüberweisungen auf N26 Konten erfolgen in Echtzeit, solange sie von einer Bank stammen, die Echtzeitüberweisungen unterstützt. Überweisungen können jedoch manchmal verzögert werden, wenn sie aufgrund von SEPA-Banking-Vorschriften überprüft werden müssen.Gewöhnliche SEPA-Überweisungen gehen innerhalb von höchstens zwei Werktagen ein. Bitte beachte, dass sich der Zeitrahmen auf maximal drei Werktage verlängert, wenn die Überweisung kurz vor einem Wochenende oder Feiertag vorgenommen wird.Eingehende SWIFT-Überweisungen dauern bis zu vier Werktage, bis sie eintreffen.Ausgehende SEPA-Echtzeitüberweisungen erfolgen in Echtzeit. Gewöhnliche ausgehende SEPA-Überweisungen dauern bis zu zwei Werktage. Ausgehende Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen mit unserem Partner Wise dauern bis zu vier Werktage. Ausgehende SWIFT-Überweisungen werden nicht unterstützt.Was ist ein "Bankarbeitstag"?Ein Bankarbeitstag entspricht aufgrund der Öffnungszeiten der beteiligten Banken zwei Werktagen. Jeder Tag unter der Woche, der kein Feiertag ist, gilt als Werktag.Warum ist meine Überweisung nicht angekommen?Was passiert, wenn alles Obenstehende berücksichtigt wurde und die Überweisung immer noch nicht ausgeführt wurde? In solchen Fällen kann nur die auftraggebende Bank eine interne Nachforschung einleiten.Leider können wir bei N26 keine eingehenden Überweisungen untersuchen, nur ausgehende Überweisungen. Dessen ungeachtet findest du hier eine Liste der möglichen Gründe, warum eine Überweisung fehlschlagen könnte.Weitere InformationenAll unsere SEPA-Überweisungen werden über ein System namens TARGET2 (neuen Tab) abgewickelt. Dieses System bearbeitet Bankzahlungen werktags von 7:00 Uhr bis 18:00 Uhr europäischer Standardzeit. An den folgenden Tagen macht TARGET2 Urlaub: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. Dezember (1. Weihnachtsfeiertag) und 26. Dezember (2. Weihnachtsfeiertag).

question: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
answer: Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App nutzen wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.Hier erfährst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter 👤 Mein Konto > Persönliche Details > Persönliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein Häkchen setzen bei "Anderen N26 Kunden in meinen Kontakten erlauben, mich für Überweisungen einfach zu finden".

question: CRS - La razón por la que pedimos cierta información a nuestros clientes
answer: N26, al igual que toda institución financiera, está obligado a remitir información a las Administraciones Tributarias sobre cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de los residentes fiscales en otro país.La Normativa CRS (Common Reporting Standard o Estándar Común de Reporte) es un sistema de intercambio automático de información tributaria entre los países adheridos, elaborado por la OCDE (Organización para la Cooperación y el Desarrollo Económicos).Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:¿En qué país o países declaras impuestos?  Tienes tu residencia fiscal en un país extranjero y por lo tanto declaras impuestos en este país, donde tienes tu residencia personal. Si vives en más de un país, hay reglas para la determinación de la residencia incluidas en los convenios fiscales y las leyes tributarias del país relevante, que nos ayudarán a determinar tu residencia fiscal. Puede que hayas tenido tu residencia fiscal en más de un país a lo largo de un año, en ese caso, vamos a necesitar conocer tu número de identificación fiscal de cada uno de estos países para poder enviar tu información a las autoridades correspondientes. 2. ¿Cuál es tu número de identificación fiscal (TIN) de cada país?La emisión y el formato del Número de Identificación Fiscal (TIN) depende cada país. En los países de la Unión Europea, la Comisión Europea ha publicado una guía con los documentos de cada país (pestaña nueva), lo que puede ayudarte a identificar cuál es el tuyo. En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu información fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesión ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Configuración personal > Información de impuestos y actualiza tu información.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to connect your smartphone to your account. If you didn’t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you’ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it’s likely that you’ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzufügen oder davon entfernen?
answer: So entfernen Besitzer einen Teilnehmer aus einem Shared Space:Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-Übersicht.Tippe auf den Pfeil rechts neben des Namen des jeweiligen Teilnehmers in der Teilnehmerliste (iOS). Wenn du ein Android-Gerät verwendest, tippe einfach auf den Namen des Teilnehmers.Tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".Bestätige die Mitteilung auf dem nächsten Bildschirm und tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".So trittst du einem Shared Space bei:Tippe in der Spaces-Übersicht auf "ausstehend" und das Shared Spaces Symbol.Lies dir die Aufklärung zu Shared Spaces durch und gehe zur nächsten Seite über Kontovollmachten.Sieh dir die Informationen zur Kontovollmacht (die rechtliche Übersicht) an. Sobald du die AGB durchgelesen und verstanden hast, tippe auf das Kästchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein.Bestätige auf deinem verknüpften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Kontovollmacht akzeptieren".Du brauchst genügend freie Spaces, um eine Einladung zu einem Shared Space annehmen zu können. Sonst kannst du nur weitermachen, wenn du einen anderen Space löschst.Es ist auch nicht möglich, einen Space mit demselben Namen oder Bild wie dem des Shared Spaces zu verwenden. Du kannst Einladungen nur annehmen, wenn du den Namen oder das Bild des anderen Spaces änderst.So verlässt du einen Space:Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-Übersicht.Tippe in den Einstellungen auf "Shared Space verlassen".Bestätige die Mitteilung auf der nächsten Seite und tippe auf "Space verlassen":Shared Spaces lassen sich durch die N26 App oder WebApp erstellen und bearbeiten.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it—you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you’ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‘Cards’ from the bottom right-handTap ‘Card Settings’ and select the relevant cardSelect ‘Reset PIN’Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you’ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction—in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences—such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn’t accepted, simply try again a different combination. If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you’ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Security.Name and sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You’ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it’s really you changing your information so we can’t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account and select Settings then Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: Wie ändere ich meine Telefonnummer?
answer: Für eine reibungslose Nutzung deines N26 Kontos ist es wichtig, dass du deine persönlichen Daten immer auf dem neuesten Stand hältst. Deine Telefonnummer kannst du wie folgt ändern:Gehe zu: 👤 Mein Konto > Persönliche Details > Persönliche DatenBeachte, dass du dein verknüpftes Handy benutzen musst, um deine Telefonnummer zu ändern.

question: What to do if my card is lost or it’s been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App. Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab). You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: How can I download the confirmation for a SEPA transfer?
answer: If you have sent a bank transfer from your N26 account and need confirmation of the sending or receipt, you can download the PDF file with the transaction data from your mobile app or WebApp. That's how:Log into your N26 appFrom the list of transactions, select the bank transfer for which you want to download the confirmationClick on "Download transfer confirmation"As soon as you choose this option, the document will automatically be downloaded to your smartphone or pc.What data will I find in the transfer confirmation?In the confirmation of the transfer you will find the bank details of the sender and recipient of the transfer, including the amount of the transaction and the date on which it was made.

question: Pourquoi mon compte est-il temporairement bloqué ?
answer: Conformément à la réglementation bancaire européenne, N26 doit effectuer des contrôles de routine sur les transactions afin d’assurer la sécurité des comptes de clients. En tant qu’institution réglementée, cela nous permet de protéger les fonds de votre compte N26.Généralement, ces contrôles sont effectués très rapidement, sans même que vous vous en aperceviez. Parfois, cela peut prendre plus de temps et votre compte peut alors être temporairement indisponible.Ce processus est supervisé par une équipe spécialisée dans la conduite de contrôles de cette nature, qui travaille assidûment pour limiter les désagréments. Pour cette raison, notre Service Client N26 n’est pas en mesure de fournir des informations supplémentaires concernant votre compte sur le Livechat, ni d’accélérer la procédure.Veuillez faire preuve de patience pendant que nous effectuons ces démarches. Notre équipe vous contactera dès la fin de la procédure de contrôle.

question: How to create a Shared Space?
answer:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the ‘Learn more’ information and tap the ‘Invite new member’ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you’ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‘Accept power of attorney’ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the ‘Send Invite’ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German). Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the “Owner”, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space: Owns all the funds within a Shared Space. Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime. Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner’s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they’ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space. N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Quanto tempo occorre per inviare denaro con Wise?
answer:
Una volta creato un trasferimento Wise, visualizzerai la data stimata per il trasferimento. Prima di inviare il bonifico, assicurati sempre che i dati del beneficiario siano corretti.Se il trasferimento Wise non va a buon fine, ti invieremo un messaggio push al riguardo. L’importo ritornerà sul tuo conto pochi giorni dopo.Non è possibile annullare personalmente un bonifico, ma se avrai bisogno di farlo potrai metterti in contatto con il supporto Wise, che lo farà per te. Tieni presente che il trasferimento può essere annullato solo fino a quando Wise non ha movimentato i tuoi fondi. Una volta che il denaro è stato inviato al destinatario, non è più possibile cancellare il bonifico.
 
I dettagli del destinatario possono essere modificati solo prima che Wise elabori il tuo bonifico e trasferisca il denaro. Dopo che i tuoi soldi sono stati spostati, i dettagli del destinatario non possono più essere modificati. Se avessi bisogno di assistenza, ti consigliamo di metterti in contatto con il supporto di Wise.Wise non addebita alcuna commissione extra in caso di pagamento restituito e nemmeno noi. Tuttavia, alcune banche partecipanti addebitano commissioni, nel qual caso Wise detrarrà tale importo dal denaro restituito conformemente alle relative Condizioni di utilizzo (nuova tabella).Ragioni comuni del mancato trasferimento:Errore nei dettagli del trasferimento (ad es. quando si inseriscono il nome del destinatario o le informazioni del conto).Caratteri speciali o troppi caratteri nel nome del destinatario o nel campo di riferimento.Limiti raggiunti o pagamenti online non attivi nelle impostazioni della carta.Non sono possibili trasferimenti in valuta estera con il conto N26 Business or N26 Business You o se il destinatario è un conto business.

question: Wie kann ich mein Konto schützen?
answer: Die Sicherheit deines Kontos und deiner Daten hat bei uns höchste Priorität. Falls du jemals den Verdacht hast, dass deine N26 Login-Daten nicht mehr sicher sind oder dass jemand einen Chat in deinem Namen eröffnet, ist es äußerst wichtig, dass du sofort dein N26 Anmeldepasswort änderst. Logge dich dafür in die App ein und gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort ändern. Bitte wähle ein sicheres Passwort aus und halte es geheim.Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du alleine deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen können. Mehr Informationen darüber, wie du deine Identität schützen kannst, findest du in unserem Artikel “Wie kann ich meine Identität schützen?”.Wenn du glaubst, dass dein Konto in irgendeiner Form gefährdet ist oder unerlaubte Änderungen vorgenommen wurden, kontaktiere uns bitte umgehend.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‘Forgot Password’ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
answer: Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gemäß FATCA verpflichtet, dem “Internal Revenue Service” (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen geführt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische Staatsangehörige ausländische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden. Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier. (neuen Tab)Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer Staatsangehöriger unter anderem so definiert:Staatsangehöriger der USA (auch bei doppelter Staatsangehörigkeit)Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer gültigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den “Substantial Presence Test” erfüllt (siehe unten).Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer Staatsangehöriger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.“Substantial Presence Test” bedeutet:Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.ODERDu warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.Darüber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enthält:US-amerikanische Staatsangehörigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USAGeburtsort in den USAPostanschrift oder Postfach in den USAUS-amerikanische RufnummerDaueraufträge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wirdFür den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US Staatsangehörigen anzusehen:Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine ähnliche Eigenerklärung undeinen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine Staatsangehörigkeit oder Nationalität eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der Bestätigung über den Verlust deiner Staatsbürgerschaft.

question: Que faire si j’ai perdu ma carte ou si les données de ma carte ont été compromises ?
answer: Si vous avez perdu votre carte ou si vous pensez que vos données ont été compromises, vous pouvez la verrouiller et la déverrouiller à tout moment depuis l'application N26.Verrouillez la carte temporairement ou désactivez-la définitivement en recommandant une nouvelle carte dans l'application N26 ou l'espace client en ligne (nouvel onglet).Si vos données ont été compromises, veuillez suivre les étapes suivantes :Accédez à l’onglet "Cartes"Faites défiler vers la droite avec votre doigt jusqu'à ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez désactiver ou verrouiller temporairement.Sélectionnez "Paramètres de la carte"Enfin, si vous souhaitez bloquer définitivement votre carte, sélectionnez "Commander une nouvelle carte".De cette façon, vous avez le contrôle total de votre carte et vous pouvez vous protéger contre les transactions non-autorisées.Si vous avez le moindre soupçon, vous devez immédiatement verrouiller votre carte. Vous pourrez toujours la déverrouiller par la suite.

question: N26 Bank's Wise Terms of Use
answer:
Please choose the country corresponding with the T&Cs of your N26 account below to view our Wise terms of use:GermanyWise terms of use (new tab)SpainWise terms of use (for accounts created before April 16th, 2019) (new tab)

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits up to €100.000 held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud? N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
answer: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Combien coûte le remplacement de ma carte arrivant à expiration ou périmée ?
answer: Les cartes de remplacement sont gratuites pour tous les clients N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal.Si vous avez ouvert votre compte avant les dates suivantes, la nouvelle carte et la livraison sont gratuites dans les pays où les services proposés par N26 sont disponibles (nouvel onglet) :16.02.2021 (clients domiciliés dans la Grande Europe)25.02.2021 (clients domiciliés en Italie ou en Espagne)11.03.2021 (clients domiciliés en France)18.03.2021 (clients domiciliés en Allemagne, en Autriche ou en Suisse)Si votre compte a été créé après cette date, votre carte de remplacement coûtera le même prix qu’une nouvelle carte.Si vous résidez dans un pays non supporté par N26, veuillez contacter notre Service Client via le Livechat ou par téléphone afin que nous puissions passer la commande pour vous. La livraison en dehors de ces pays (nouvel onglet) peut entraîner des frais supplémentaires. Combien de temps cela prendra-t-il ?Toutes les cartes de remplacement sont expédiées par livraison standard. Cette livraison est gratuite et peut prendre jusqu’à 15 jours ouvrés. Dans les zones rurales ou difficiles d’accès, cela peut prendre plus de temps. Pour suivre l’avancée de l’expédition, il vous suffit d’accéder à l’écran d’accueil de votre application mobile N26.Ma carte arrive à expiration, que dois-je faire ?Puis-je continuer à utiliser ma carte après son expiration ?Ma carte est déjà périmée mais je n’ai jamais reçu de carte de remplacement

question: Warum ist der Zugriff auf mein Konto vorübergehend gesperrt?
answer: Gemäß den europäischen Bankvorschriften muss N26 routinemäßige technische Überprüfungen von Kundenkonten durchführen. Als reguliertes Institut können wir so sicherzustellen, dass das Geld auf deinem N26 Konto sicher und geschützt bleibt.In den meisten Fällen erfolgen diese Prüfungen innerhalb kürzester Zeit, ohne dass du davon etwas mitbekommst. Gelegentlich kann dies aber auch länger dauern, sodass du vorübergehend keinen Zugriff auf dein Konto hast.Dieser Prozess wird von einem eigens dafür zuständigen Team überwacht, das auf die Durchführung solcher technischen Überprüfungen spezialisiert ist und alles daran setzt, Unterbrechungen möglichst kurz zu halten. Aus diesem Grund ist es unserem Kundenservice-Team von N26 nicht möglich, weitere Auskünfte zu deinem Konto per Live-Chat zu erteilen oder den Vorgang zu beschleunigen.Wir bitten dich um etwas Geduld, während wir den Vorgang abschließen. Unser Team wird sich bei dir melden, sobald der technische Überprüfungsprozess abgeschlossen ist.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10€). Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0€ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25€ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
answer: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet our requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: Relazione informativa CRR
answer: Di cosa si tratta?La Direttiva sui requisiti patrimoniali (CRR, Capital Requirements Regulation) è una direttiva UE. Tra le altre cose, stabilisce l'obbligo per gli istituti di credito di pubblicare una relazione informativa su base annuale (art. 433 del CRR).Perché la relazione informativa non è stata pubblicata nel nostro Support Center o su qualche altra pagina del sito web?N26 Bank GmbH non è obbligata a pubblicare la relazione CRR sul proprio sito web. L'art. 434 del CRR (nuova tabella) prevede che la pubblicazione avvenga esclusivamente su un "mezzo di comunicazione appropriato", delegando dunque la decisione a ciascun istituto di credito.N26 Bank GmbH pubblica il suo CRR su www.bundesanzeiger.de (nuova tabella).

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it’s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Bereavement & probate
answer:
How can I inform N26 about a death? In the event of a bereavement, the descendants have to deal with many bureaucratic tasks. One of them is the settlement of the deceased’s bank accounts. The easiest way to contact N26 in this matter is by email. Alternatively, it is possible to send an inquiry via letter or (if applicable via fax):Email: servizio.successioni@n26.comPEC: successioni@pec.n26.com Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana  -Servizio Successioni-
Via Filippo Sassetti 32 - 20124 Milano (MI), ITALIAN26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana 
c/o N26 Bank AG -Servizio Successioni-
Klosterstr. 62 - 10179 Berlin, GERMANY
Please inform us on: Who is the deceased? If possible, please attach a death certificate as this is the most reliable way we can identify any associated bank account. How can we contact the beneficiaries?Name, address and email address of the contact person are highly appreciated, so we can get in contact with the beneficiaries.  A callback is unfortunately not possible.Is there anything we should already know? If you are facing certain proceedings (i.e. rejection of the inheritance or establishment of an  inventory) or you have specific documents already available, it can be helpful to share them with us. We will get back to you or the beneficiaries with information on the further proceedings. Please refrain from sending us original documents via post at this stage. Whenever we require an original, we will notify you. What happens to an N26 account if the account holder dies?  Due to regional differences in laws and regulation, the proceeding can vary depending on the country. However, any account with N26 Bank GmbH, Succursale Italiana is located in Italy. As soon as we learn of the death of one of our customers, the associated cards and online banking and any access to the app will be disabled. As well as any regular payments such as standing orders or SEPA direct debit mandates will not be executed anymore.Further, please be aware we are in principle legally obligated to notify the tax authority responsible for inheritance tax of the assets belonging to the estate. It might be necessary to complete a certain set of questions in order to release assets with N26.We recommend getting in touch with the relevant tax authorities in your country, in order to fulfil local tax requirements (if any). We will notify the beneficiaries in any case which exact documents they need to provide in order to settle the deceased’s account with N26.I am a customer, can I take precautionary measures in the event of my death? There are various ways in which you can ensure that your assets are distributed according to your wishes.It is therefore strongly advisable for anyone who is more intensively involved in drawing up a will to seek legal assistance from a lawyer, a notary or a tax advisor. This applies in particular if larger assets are to be inherited. Our customer service or the experts in our probate department cannot offer you further advice on this. For any further information on a specific situation please seek professional assistance from a suitable advisory service.

question: ¿Cómo pasar a Metal?
answer: Disponible en España, Alemania, Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los Países Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia. Si tienes una cuenta N26 o eres miembro de N26 Smart o N26 You, puedes mejorar tu cuenta y hacerte miembro de N26 Metal desde la app: para eso pulsa sobre la pestaña Explora y después sobre N26 Metal.Consulta el método de envío, el color (negro carbón, arena coralina o gris pizarra) y acepta los Términos y Condiciones de uso (pestaña nueva). Después tendrás que confirmar la solicitud con tu PIN de confirmación y tu nueva tarjeta estará en camino.El envío estándar puede tardar hasta 15 días laborables.La cuota mensual es de 16,90€ y será deducida directamente de tu cuenta bancaria de forma mensual el día que te registraste.Todas las compras que hayas realizado con N26 You seguirán estando cubiertas.Si ya eres miembro de N26 You, no tendrás que pagar adicionalmente la mensualidad de N26 You en este contrato.Puedes pedir una segunda tarjeta N26 You y asociarla a tu cuenta a través de la app de N26, pagando solo una cuota de 10€.¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 € por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Infórmate más sobre nuestro programa Invita a un amigo.

question: Wie lade ich Freunde zu N26 ein?
answer: Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald du dein Konto vollständig eröffnet hast. So funktioniert's:Logge dich in die App ein.Tippe auf Entdecken.Unter Mach mehr aus deinem N26 Konto findest du den Bereich Lade Freunde ein.Tippe auf deinen persönlichen Empfehlungscode, um ihn zu kopieren und wähle aus auf welchem Weg du den Code teilen möchtest.Du kannst bei Bedarf eine Nachricht an deinen Freund hinzufügen oder die Vorgabe nutzen.Tippe auf Senden!Erfahre mehr darüber, wie du Geld verdienen kannst, indem du N26 deinen Freunden empfiehlst (verfügbar in ausgewählten Ländern).

question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: Comment partager les dépenses avec MoneyBeam ?
answer: Éligibilité : Disponibles sur iOS pour tous les marchés de l’UE. La fonctionnalité sera disponible pour Android dans les prochaines semaines.Partagez la note à plusieursGrâce à notre dernière fonctionnalité « Partagez la note à plusieurs », vous pouvez facilement partager les dépenses entre amis et membres de la famille depuis votre application N26. Qu’il s’agisse de partager l’addition au restaurant ou de participer à un cadeau d’anniversaire, vous pouvez l’utiliser pour tout achat partagé avec d’autres personnes. Vous pouvez même partager les dépenses domestiques, comme une facture de services publics ou des articles pour votre maison.Pour toute transaction par carte, vous pouvez diviser la facture en parts égales ou saisir des montants personnalisés pour chaque personne qui participe à l’achat. Vous pouvez partager les dépenses avec n’importe qui, qu’il soit ou non client N26.Comment utiliser « Partagez la note à plusieurs »Vous devez d’abord effectuer un achat avec votre carte N26. Ensuite, pour partager la facture, suivez les étapes ci-dessous :Une fois votre achat effectué, ouvrez votre application N26.Localisez la transaction dans la rubrique « Accueil », appuyez dessus et choisissez ‘Partager la facture’.Ajoutez les personnes avec lesquelles vous partagez les coûts (pour les non-clients N26, vous devrez indiquer leur nom).Une fois que vous avez terminé, appuyez sur le bouton vert en bas de l’écran pour confirmer les montants partagés.Les non-clients N26 recevront un message contenant vos coordonnées bancaires pour vous envoyer le montant convenu.Enfin, appuyez sur ‘Confirmer’ pour envoyer les demandes restantes aux autres clients N26 qui la recevront via MoneyBeam.Important :Demandes aux clients N26 : Cela fonctionnera comme une demande MoneyBeam normale.Demandes aux non-clients N26 : Vous recevrez un modèle standard avec votre IBAN que vous pourrez modifier. Vous pouvez ensuite l’envoyer via n’importe quelle autre plateforme de messagerie sur votre appareil (par exemple email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Ces demandes ne peuvent pas être suivies depuis l’application.Consultez le montant restant à payer : Les clients N26 et vous-même pourrez consulter le montant total à partager et le montant restant à payer. Si le montant total de l’achat n’est pas égal au montant partagé, un message d’avertissement s’affichera (mais vous pourrez tout de même continuer).Jusqu’à 20 demandes MoneyBeam : Vous pouvez demander de l’argent jusqu’à 20 fois et envoyer jusqu’à 3 demandes par contact avec MoneyBeam. Si votre limite a été atteinte, un message s’affichera.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder. Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take. Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details. 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can’t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You’re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our T&Cs (new tab) or § 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes. According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you’d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We’re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don’t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don’t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Pourquoi je ne peux pas accéder à certains services ou produits ?
answer: Nous collaborons avec différents partenaires afin de proposer des services financiers innovants supplémentaires. Certains de nos partenaires, tout comme N26, doivent vérifier votre identité, c’est pourquoi nous leur fournissons les informations à notre disposition concernant votre identité, à condition que vous nous ayez préalablement donné votre accord.Voici les raisons les plus fréquentes pour lesquelles vous ne pouvez pas accéder à certains produits ou fonctionnalités :Vos documents d’identité ont expiré ou ne sont pas acceptés (c’est par exemple le cas pour certains passeports qui ne disposent pas de tous les éléments de sécurité nécessaires).Vous êtes imposable (nouvel onglet) aux Etats-Unis. Dans ce cas là vous ne pourrez pas utiliser nos produits d’investissement ou d’épargne. Si vous n’êtes pas imposable aux Etats-Unis, il est possible que vous deviez changer votre numéro de téléphone s’il commence par le code pays nord-américain (+1). Si le problème persiste, veuillez contacter notre Service Client depuis le Livechat de votre application afin que nous puissions vous aider.Le produit ou service en question n'est pas encore disponible dans votre pays.

question: ¿Cómo recibir mensajes push?
answer: Te mandamos mensajes push para finalizar transferencias (como por ejemplo MoneyBeam) o para confirmar servicios (como CASH26). Si no estás recibiendo estos mensajes, primero verifica que las notificaciones están activadas tanto en tu móvil como en la app. Después prueba nuestras soluciones dependiendo del teléfono que tengas:iOSElimina la aplicación y reinicia tu smartphone. Descárgate e instala la última versión de la app en la App Store de Apple y conecta tu smartphone de nuevo.Verifica si ha iniciado sesión en tu app N26Asegúrate de que los mensajes estén activados en los ajustes generales para esta app en concreto.AndroidElimina la aplicación y reinicia tu smartphone. Descarga e instala la última versión de la app N26 en la Google Play Store y conecta tu smartphone de nuevo.Ve a Mi cuenta y activa las notificaciones pulsando Configuración de la app y luego Notificaciones.Huawei y Xiaomi: entra en Ajustes, después Ajustes Avanzados y finalmente en Ajustes de Batería. Elige la app N26 como una app protegida.OnePlus: Selecciona la opción de optimizar la batería y después la app N26; finalmente no desactiva tal optimización.Oppo: deshabilita las opciones de optimización de la batería para la app y bloquéalo en el Resumen de apps recientes.

question: What are N26 Installments?
answer: Eligibility requirements: Only available to customers who have opened their account in Italy with a German (DE) IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks, giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note, interest rates are dependent on the credit risk assessment made by N26. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual Interest Rate: From 7.99% to 13.99% (credit risk scoring dependent)Eligible Purchase Amount: From €20 - €200N26 Installments Duration: The N26 Installments duration is from 3 to 6 months, with the first installment taken out immediately after confirmation and the option of early loan repayment (the interest rate is charged monthly).Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment How to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the ‘Explore’ tab and tap on 'N26 Installments' under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting ‘Options’ (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap ‘N26 Installments’When you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using N26 Installments:First you will be provided with information about N26 InstallmentsThen you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept all checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, you’ll be credited an amount equal to the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. We’ll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (you’ll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your loan with N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in full

question: ¿Cómo dividir gastos compartidos con MoneyBeam?
answer: Elegibilidad: todos los mercados de la UE, disponible para iOS. La función estará disponible para Android en las próximas semanas.Dividir la cuentaCon nuestra función «Dividir la cuenta», puedes dividir gastos compartidos entre amigos y familiares en tu app N26. Dividir la cuenta en un restaurante o poner tu parte para un regalo de cumpleaños: puedes utilizarla para cualquier compra en la que compartas gastos con otras personas. Incluso puedes dividir los gastos domésticos, como las facturas de consumos o la compra de artículos para el hogar.Por cada transacción con tarjeta que realices, tienes la opción de dividir la factura a partes iguales o introducir importes personalizados para cada persona que contribuye a la compra en grupo. Puedes dividir gastos con cualquiera, sea o no cliente de N26.Cómo utilizar «Dividir la cuenta»Primero debes utilizar tu tarjeta de N26 para realizar una compra; a continuación, cuando quieras dividir la factura, sigue estos pasos:Después de realizar la compra, abre la app N26Busca la transacción en la pestaña «Inicio», pulsa sobre ella y selecciona «Dividir factura»Añade a las personas con las que vas a dividir el gasto (si no son clientes de N26, tendrás que introducir su nombre)Cuando lo tengas todo listo, pulsa el botón verde de la parte inferior de la pantalla para confirmar los importes divididosLas personas que no sean clientes de N26 recibirán un mensaje con tus datos bancarios para que envíen la cantidad acordadaPor último, pulsa «Confirmar» para enviar el resto de solicitudes a las personas que sí sean clientes de N26, que recibirán una solicitud a través de MoneyBeamImportante:Solicitudes a clientes de N26: Funcionan como una solicitud de MoneyBeam normal.Solicitudes a personas que no sean clientes de N26: Recibirás una plantilla estandarizada con los datos de tu IBAN, que podrás editar. Esta puede enviarse a través de otra plataforma de mensajería de tu dispositivo (p. ej., email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Te advertimos de que estas solicitudes no pueden rastrearse en la app.Ver la cantidad que falta por pagar: Los clientes de N26 y tú podréis ver la cantidad total a dividir y cuánto falta por pagar del total de la factura. Si el importe total de la compra no es igual al importe dividido, verás un mensaje de advertencia (no obstante, tendrás la opción de continuar de todos modos).Máximo de 20 solicitudes de MoneyBeam abiertas: Puedes tener hasta 20 solicitudes de MoneyBeam abiertas al mismo tiempo y un máximo de 3 solicitudes abiertas con un solo contacto. Si has alcanzado el límite, verás un mensaje que te lo indicará.

question: What does the court ruling BGH XI ZR 26/20 mean for N26 customers?
answer: On April 27, 2021, the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (Bundesgerichtshof, BGH) ruled on [translation] “the impermissibility of clauses that feign the consent of a customer to changes in the Terms & Conditions of a bank.”Am I entitled to a reimbursement?On the bases of this ruling, customers with a private membership plan (N26 Standard/Smart/You/Metal), created before March 12, 2020, are entitled to reclaim the “Gambling Fee” introduced and charged by us. For those customers who are entitled to reclaim it, the fee (for the customer group in question) has no longer been charged since November 5, 2021.Customers who registered after March 12, 2020 actively consented to the “Gambling Fee” included in the Terms & Conditions, which were already updated at this time, which is why these customers are not entitled to a reimbursement of said “Gambling Fee”. Customers with an N26 Business membership plan (N26 Business Standard/ Business Smart/Business You/Business Metal) are furthermore not entitled to reclaim this fee, as they do not fall under the customer group covered by the ruling (consumers).Requesting a reimbursement as a current customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to login to the N26 app and launch a verified live chat in the app or web app.Requesting a reimbursement as a former customer:To request a reimbursement we kindly ask our customers to send an email to support@n26.com (new tab). For a direct, simple resolution please follow these guidelines:Subject of email: “Reimbursement pursuant to BGH XI ZR 26/20”Send the email from your registered email address.Include your full name in the email as well as an alternative IBANAttach a clear, double-sided photo/scan of one of your ID documents, including the edges.Please include your consent to the following: “I hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.“

question: How to contact N26?
answer:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while you’re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once you’re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Don’t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you don’t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while you’re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We won’t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab), then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you’ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we’ll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn’t charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient’s name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient’s name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren’t active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren’t possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login. Your login details of both the mobile and WebApp (new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN. This 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then change it in the app yourself after that.Push messages. For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added 3D Secure to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we’ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we’ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We’ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: ¿Por qué no he recibido el código de sincronización por SMS?
answer: Para los clientes de iOS que no reciban nuestros SMS de vinculación: puede que tengas activada la función que filtra nuestros SMS. Para encontrar nuestro mensaje en iMessage, ve a Filtros en la parte superior izquierda y selecciona Remitentes desconocidos.Para vincular tu smartphone con tu cuenta se requiere un código de sincronización. Si no has recibido el SMS con el código de sincronización por alguna razón, puedes volver a solicitarlo desde la app hasta 5 veces (espera al menos 30 segundos entre una y otra).Si ya lo has solicitado las 5 veces y sigues sin recibirlo, la app no te dejará solicitar otro en 24 horas por motivos de seguridad. Si eso pasa, puedes elegir entre esperar las 24 horas o contactar con nuestro servicio de Atención al Cliente por chat para que te ayudemos.Si tu prefijo internacional pertenece a un país de fuera de la UE, es probable que necesites contactarnos para recibirlo.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (“tapping” your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions: Go to Cards. If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you’ve chosen.

question: Comment obtenir un crédit ?
answer: N26 Crédit vous permet de souscrire à un crédit personnalisé à tout moment, directement depuis votre application N26. Selon votre pays de résidence, vous pouvez demander de 1 000 € à 50 000 € ; les remboursements peuvent s’échelonner sur une période de 6 à 84 mois. Afin de vous proposer les meilleures offres de prêts possibles, nous travaillons en collaboration avec des partenaires spécialistes du crédit. En Allemagne, il s’agit d'Auxmoney et en France, de Younited Credit.Pour demander un crédit à la consommation, rendez-vous dans la section dédiée au crédit sous la rubrique Découvrir de votre application. Vous serez alors redirigé(e) vers notre partenaire Younited Credit.Voici les étapes de l’obtention d’un crédit :Demandez un crédit à tout moment depuis votre application dans la section Découvrir puis Produits financiers N26. Nous vous demanderons alors de répondre à quelques questions à propos de votre demande de crédit mais aussi de votre solvabilité. Vous devrez peut-être fournir les coordonnés d’un compte bancaire supplémentaire.Vérifier votre identité. En Allemagne, nous avons besoin de vérifier votre identité, grâce à votre carte d’identité ou votre passeport. Nous pouvons aussi vous demander un justificatif de domicile (par exemple une facture d’électricité de moins de 3 mois). Si vous êtes un résident non européen, il faudra en plus nous envoyer une photo de votre permis de séjour. Ce n’est pas le cas si vous résidez en France.Modifiez votre demande selon les résultats de l’étude de crédit. Nous conservons vos réponses pendant une période de 90 jours. Vous pouvez effectuer de nouvelles demandes de crédit pour financer de nouveaux projets, à tout moment. Dès que vous avez finalisé votre demande, vous pouvez nous la soumettre pour une étude immédiate. Nous vous adresserons ensuite une offre finale que vous pouvez accepter ou refuser et supprimer.Acceptez la proposition. Si vous acceptez notre offre, vous devrez signer le contrat pendant un appel vidéo réalisé avec l’un de nos agents ou, en France uniquement, vous pouvez confirmer l'acceptation de votre contrat de crédit directement dans votre application N26.Vous serez averti par une notification dès lors que le montant de votre prêt sera disponible sur votre compte courant N26. En Allemagne, les fonds vous seront versés en quelques minutes. En France, cela peut prendre jusqu’à 7 jours.Selon le plan de votre crédit N26, les taux d'intérêt annuels effectifs varient entre 1,99 % et 19 %. En plus des intérêts, des frais de dossier uniques seront directement déduits du montant versé. Si vous souhaitez modifier le plan de votre Crédit N26, ou si des retards sont enregistrés dans le paiement de vos mensualités, des frais supplémentaires peuvent s'appliquer conformément aux Conditions d’Utilisation Générales de N26 Crédit (nouvel onglet).

question: Where can I use my Maestro card?
answer: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLet’s get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can’t be used for online purchases and it’s not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each ATM transaction using your Maestro is €2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). You can order your Maestro card directly in the app.If you’re having issues using your Maestro, first check that your card settings are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and we’ll look into it for you.

question: Was ist MoneyBeam?
answer: Durch einen MoneyBeam kannst du deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld senden, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Du kannst auch einen MoneyBeam von deinen Kontakten anfragen, um Geld zu erhalten.
