Um MoneyBeam nutzen zu können, müssen du und deine Kontakte als N26 Nutzer sichtbar sein.Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden: Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeamWähle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder füge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einGib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein und bestätige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhältst. Um einen MoneyBeam anzufragen:Tippe auf Geld erhalten > MoneyBeam anfragenWähle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder füge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einSobald der Kontakt deine Anfrage bestätigt, erhältst du deinen angefragten BetragDas Limit für MoneyBeams liegt bei 1000€ pro Transaktion und 5000€ pro 24 Stunden.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Ein GIF als zusätzlichen Verwendungszweck hinzufügen:Wenn du MoneyBeam nutzt, kannst du GIFs als zusätzlichen Text beim Verwendungszweck versenden. Sobald der MoneyBeam abgeschlossen ist, wird dem Empfänger auf dem Startbildschirm ein Film-Emoji als Präfix auf der eingehenden Überweisung angezeigt, sodass er weiß, dass an die Überweisung ein GIF angehängt ist. Der Empfänger kann das GIF zusammen mit dem Verwendungszweck in den Überweisungsdaten einsehen.Die GIFs werden dir direkt von Giphy, Inc. zur Verfügung gestellt und nicht von N26. Bitte beachte, dass Giphy ein US-amerikanisches Unternehmen ist, das deine personenbezogenen Daten in den USA verarbeitet. Informationen darüber, wie Giphy deine personenbezogenen Daten verarbeitet, findest du in der Datenschutzrichtlinie von Giphy (neuen Tab).  Um einen MoneyBeam mit einem GIF zu senden:Tippe auf Geld senden > MoneyBeam.Wähle einen Kontakt aus deiner Liste oder füge einen hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail-Adresse angibstGibt einen Betrag und einen Verwendungszweck einWähle GIF hinzufügen und suche nach dem GIF, das du hinzufügen möchtest, entweder per Suchfeld oder einfach scrollend.Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein und bestätige die Push-Mitteilung, die du erhältst.

question: How to deposit and withdraw cash with CASH26
answer: Available for accounts opened in Germany, Austria, Spain, Italy, and Greece.Withdrawing and depositing cash in retail stores with CASH26 is easy––all you need is your smartphone! Simply open the CASH26 map in your N26 app and zoom in to find the nearest participating store. Once you’re there, generate a CASH26 barcode from your N26 app, and show it to the cashier to make your deposit or withdrawal right at the counter. Use CASH26 to withdraw money without a debit card With CASH26, you can withdraw money from your bank account in minutes using just your phone—there’s no need to have your N26 card on hand. Simply head to the Cards tab in your N26 app, then tap CASH26 > Withdrawal and choose the amount you want to withdraw. Next, enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Your N26 app will generate a barcode to show the cashier, who will scan it and hand over your cash. Simple as that! You can withdraw up to €200 each time, with a maximum withdrawal limit of €900 within 24 hours. How to deposit cash into your N26 account with CASH26Open your app and go to the Cards tab, then tap CASH26 > Deposit. Next, choose the amount you want to deposit, with a minimum of €50. Enter your confirmation PIN (new tab), and confirm your transaction on the pop-up screen. Once you’re ready, show your CASH26 barcode to the cashier to scan, and hand them the cash. Your CASH26 deposit will be credited to your N26 account within 10 minutes. Here’s what else you need to know when using CASH26Your CASH26 barcode is only valid for 10 minutes. If you don’t make your deposit or withdrawal in time, the code will expire and you’ll need to generate a new one. If you enter the wrong amount by mistake, you can delete it by tapping the trash can icon in the upper right corner of your screen. Or, simply let the barcode expire and then generate a new one.You don’t need to purchase anything in the partner store in order to make deposits or withdrawals with CASH26. N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.For more information on limits and other details, check out this article (new tab).

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‘Shared Spaces’ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‘Shared Space’.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‘Shared Space’, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‘owner’ or the person who created the ‘Shared Space’ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‘visible’ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner’s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‘Shared Spaces’ add participant flow.You’ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up … Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‘learn more’ information and tap the ‘invite new member’ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the “legal screen” so be sure to read all the information within the ‘Grant Power of Attorney’ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C’s then tap ‘Grant Power of Attorney’ button.Tap ‘Send invite’ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‘send invite’ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‘Participants’ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant’s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‘revoke power of attorney’.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‘revoke power of attorney’.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab). In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the “Substantial Presence Test” (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.“Substantial Presence Test” means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6. In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you: A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Geld abheben und einzahlen mit CASH26 – So geht’s
answer: Für Konten verfügbar, die in Deutschland, Österreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland eröffnet wurden.Dein verknüpftes Smartphone ist alles, was du brauchst. Öffne die CASH26 Karte in deiner App und nutze die Zoom-Funktion, um ein teilnehmendes Geschäft in deiner Nähe zu finden. Sobald du vor Ort im Laden bist, kannst du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellen und ihn auf deinem Smartphone an der Kasse vorzeigen.Wie kann ich Geld mit CASH26 abheben?Öffne in deiner N26 App den “Karten”-Tab und wähle CASH26 > Bargeld abheben.Wähle den Betrag, den du abheben willst (maximal 200 € pro Abhebung sowie 900 € innerhalb von 24 Stunden). Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) ein und bestätige die Transaktion über das Popup-Fenster. Zeige den Strichcode auf deinem Smartphone-Bildschirm an der Kasse vor. Der Kassierer bzw. die Kassiererin wird den Code einscannen und dir das Bargeld aushändigen. Wie kann ich Geld auf mein N26 Konto einzahlen mit CASH26?Gehe in deiner N26 App auf den “Karten”-Tab und wähle CASH26 > Bargeld einzahlen.Wähle den Betrag, den du einzahlen willst (mindestens 50 €).Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) ein und bestätige die Transaktion im Popup-Fenster. Zeige den Strichcode auf deinem Smartphone-Bildschirm an der Kasse vor und überreiche das Bargeld.Es kann es bis zu 10 Minuten dauern, bis das eingezahlte Bargeld in deinem Kontostand in der N26 App zu sehen ist.Wichtig!Der Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gültig. Er verliert seine Gültigkeit, wenn du ihn nicht rechtzeitig nutzt. In diesem Fall musst du einen neuen Strichcode erstellen. Falls du einen falschen Betrag eingibst, kannst du ihn löschen, indem du auf das Papierkorb Symbol oben rechts tippst (oder den Code ablaufen lässt) und dann einen neuen Barcode erstellst. Du musst im Geschäft nichts kaufen, wenn du Bargeld einzahlen oder Geld abheben willst.Mehr über CASH26 sowie Einzahl- und Abhebelimits erfährst du in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab).

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe’re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your and provide our findings and final response via email. Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)French litiges@n26.com (new tab)Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person. If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe’ll contact you via email to confirm that we’ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling times All complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days Spain - 60 Calendar Days Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our decision relating to a complaint about an N26 bank account and/or N26 services, you may wish to consider further advice from independent consumer arbitration services*.  *Please note that these services cannot perform any actions on N26 accounts and will only offer the possibility of an out-of-court dispute resolution in German. The arbitration procedure is not a fast-track procedure and can take up to 6 months.Schlichtungsstelle bei der Deutschen Bundesbank (Arbitration Body via the German Federal Bank) Link (new tab).Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht – BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority) Link (new tab).For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab).

question: What are IBANs for Spaces subaccounts?
answer:
Available to Premium customers in Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, and Switzerland.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:With our IBANs for Spaces feature, your individual Spaces have become even more useful. Spaces on their own are a great way to help you save money for different savings goals. Once you assign an IBAN to a Space, it then becomes able to receive incoming transfers directly into the Space, and you can use a Space with an assigned IBAN to pay your outgoing direct debits.What are IBANs for Spaces?IBANs for Spaces allows customers with a premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) who opened their N26 account in Germany and who have a ‘DE’ IBAN to assign a unique IBAN to a Space; making it eligible to receive and send certain transfers. 
Below you can find an overview of the features available with assigning an IBAN to your Space or Spaces:Add an IBAN to your Spaces: You can assign a unique IBAN to an existing or new Space. Shared Spaces are unable to have an IBAN assigned.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can assign up to 10 Spaces their own unique IBAN (10 in total, not at a time), allowing for even more control over your finances. Please note, once 3 Spaces have been assigned to an IBAN, a 24-hour time limit will activate until a Space can be assigned a new unique IBAN.Receive bank transfers: You can receive transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN.Send bank transfers: You can make transfers directly from a Space with an assigned IBAN.Pay outgoing ‘Direct Debits’: You can use your unique Space IBAN to pay outgoing direct debits, directly from your Space. If you don’t have enough funds to cover the amount of the direct debit, the transfer will get rejected and a fee charged to your main account.View your Spaces IBAN Details: You can view each Space’s IBAN, which you can then use to receive credit transfers and pay for your direct debits. To do this simply login to the mobile or web app, go to your ‘Spaces’ section and select the Space you wish to view the IBAN details of. Go into the ‘Space Settings’ and you can see the IBAN and BIC at the top of the screen.How to add an IBAN to a Space:You can add an IBAN to your Spaces by completing the following steps:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap 'Spaces' to go to the Space MenuSelect the Space you wish to assign a unique IBANTap the 'cog icon' at the top right-hand side of the screen to go into 'Space Settings'Navigate through the app flow:Select 'Set-up IBAN' » Read the info and tap 'Add IBAN to ...' » Accept the T&C's » Enter your confirmation PIN » Tap 'Got it' on the final screen.How to remove an IBAN from a Space:In order to remove an IBAN from the Space you will need to delete the Space itself and move any remaining funds into either your main account or another Space. To delete a Space with an IBAN, please do the following:Login to the N26 mobile-appTap on 'Spaces'Select the Space with an IBAN you wish to delete (remember this will completely delete the Space and any money must be moved)Go into the 'Space Settings' (click on the top right ‘cog icon’)Under 'Manage' you will the 'Empty & delete space' optionTap this and confirm you wish to delete the SpaceSelect your main account or another Space to move the remaining balance tooFinally tap 'Delete' on the screen to confirm.You can send outgoing SEPA transfers from your Spaces that have an IBAN assigned. To do this, please follow the below steps:Go into the Space you wish to send a transfer from and tap on “Send money”Select “Bank transfer”Select the contact you wish to send money tooConfirm the amount you wish to send and enter a reference (optional)Enter your confirmation PIN and Confirm to complete the transferYou can receive incoming credit transfers directly into a Space with an assigned IBAN. Please note all transfers sent to you should always be in the name of the account holder.

question: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
answer:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if it’s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And ‘try before you buy’ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, you’ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90€. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on “continue” to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick “Confirm Purchase” : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on “Learn More” This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on “continue” to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click “Confirm Purchase” : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the “Start free trial” button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

question: ¿Cómo funciona 3D Secure?
answer: 3D Secure te protege de fraudes en pagos online y se activa automáticamente cuando activas tu tarjeta en la app. No requiere contraseñas adicionales.Cuando hagas un pago online utilizando tu Mastercard, 3D Secure confirma la transacción en 5 minutos mediante un mensaje push en la aplicación. Si no ves la transacción, prueba algunos de estos consejos para solucionarlo.Importante: el mensaje push solo se enviará al smartphone vinculado.Si haces una compra desde tu teléfono, verás una transacción pendiente en la app. Pulsa en el icono de la campana y aparecerá un mensaje push en tu pantalla para que confirmes y finalices tu compra. Después, vuelve a la página del vendedor. Deberías ver la confirmación de tu compra en unos instantes.

question: Comment clôturer mon compte ?
answer: Si vous décidez de fermer votre compte bancaire N26, nous tenons d'abord à vous dire que nous aurions aimé pouvoir continuer à vous compter parmi nos clients.  Nous allons maintenant vous accompagner dans la clôture de votre compte bancaire N26.Si vous possédez un compte premium, peut-être souhaitez-vous plutôt passer à un compte N26 Standard gratuit et sans aucun engagement ? Pour en savoir plus, cliquez ici (nouvel onglet).  (nouvel onglet)Pour fermer définitivement votre compte N26, voici la marche à suivre : Si le solde de votre compte est positif, effectuez un virement de la somme restante vers un autre compte avant d’initier la clôture de votre compte. Si le solde de votre compte est négatif, veuillez alimenter votre compte N26 (nouvel onglet). Votre solde doit être à 0 pour faciliter la fermeture de votre compte N26. N'oubliez pas de vérifier le solde de vos sous-comptes Espaces si vous utilisez cette fonctionnalité. Appuyez ici pour lancer la procédure de clôture du compte en ligne (nouvel onglet). Vous devrez vous connecter pour vérifier votre identité, ensuite l’application vous guidera dans la clôture de votre compte N26.Détruisez votre carte en la coupant à l’aide de ciseaux. Découpez la puce et la bande magnétique, puis jetez les morceaux séparément.Vous ne parvenez toujours pas à clôturer votre compte ?Si vous avez un IBAN italien ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter à votre compte et qu’une erreur s’affiche lors du processus de clôture de votre compte en ligne, contactez-nous par email à l'adresse (nouvel onglet)support@n26.com (nouvel onglet) en utilisant l’adresse e-mail liée à votre compte. Veuillez joindre à cet email le formulaire de clôture de compte (nouvel onglet) contenant les informations suivantes :La demande de clôture de votre compte à une date précise ou « dès que possible » ;Votre nom ;L'IBAN de votre compte N26 ;L'IBAN du compte vers lequel vous souhaitez transférer le solde restant de votre compte si celui-ci est positif. Il doit s'agir d'un compte bancaire de la zone euro.

question: Wie behalte ich meine täglichen Ausgaben im Blick?
answer: Wir sortieren deine Transaktionen automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Insights an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen über Einzelhändler und Zahlungsgründe, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach ändern, indem du die Transaktion auswählst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste auswählst.Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags für Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#Bücher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugefügt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzufügst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzufügen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerwünschte Tags zu entfernen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Frequently asked questions about the p-account
answer:
What does a p-account cost?The conversion to a p-account is free of charge and doesn't entail additional monthly fees. Already existing fees, such as account usage and premium subscription fees, will still apply.How can I increase my monthly allowance?In order to increase the basic allowance of your p-account, we’ll need a completed certificate from an authority or appropriate body under § 850k (5) Code of Civil Procedure. This also applies to a one-time increase (e.g. for forwarding a rent deposit loan). You can get this certificate issued from the following authorities:Your employerThe institution making payment of the child benefits (Familienkasse)A nonprofit debtor and insolvency advisory bodyThe job centerLawyersPlease send us the original certificate by post to:N26 Bank GmbH
Claims
Klosterstraße 62
10179 Berlin GermanyHow can I convert my p-account back to my normal account?In order to convert your p-account back to your normal account you can send us an email from your registered email address to support@n26.com with the following information:Your first name and surnameYour N26 IBANConfirm that you want to convert your p-account to your normal account.In case you still have an active garnishment, please be aware that your account will be seized immediately and your funds transferred to the creditor.What is the legal p-account allowance?The legal p-account allowance is €1.340.If you don’t spend your entire allowance, your unspent allowance will automatically be transferred to the next month for up to 3 months in total.If you receive funds on your N26 account in a given month, your unspent allowance from the previous month will be added on top of the new funds (but max. 1340€). So if you have a monthly income of 1340€ or higher and you don’t spend all of it, your allowance can accumulate to up to 3 x 1340€ = 4020€.If you don’t receive any funds on your N26 account in a given month, your allowance is equal to the unspent allowance from the previous month. If you’ve spent your entire allowance and don’t receive any funds in the next month you won’t have any allowance left.You can check your current allowance at any time in the N26 app under: My Account > P-Account status

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: Mit der Funktion „Round-up Savings“ können Premiumkunden jede von ihnen getätigte Kartentransaktion auf den nächsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung führt nicht zu einer Überziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du über kein ausreichendes Guthaben verfügen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgeführt.Du kannst immer nur eine „Round-up“-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl überweisen.Du kannst die Funktion „Round-up“ jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schließt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die „Round-up“-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.Wie kann ich die "Aufrundungsregel" nutzen?Die Aktivierung der "Aufrundungsregel" geht schnell und einfach. Logge dich dazu einfach in die mobile App oder Web-App von N26 ein:Gehe zum Bereich "Spaces".Wähle den Space, auf den die Differenz zum aufgerundeten Betrag (das Restgeld) fließen soll.Tippe/Klicke auf "Verwalten" --> "Aufrundungsregel verwalten".Schalte die Funktion "Aufrundungsregel verwalten" auf grün.Wähle den Multiplikator und tippe/klicke anschließend auf "Bestätigen".Spare direkt bei deinem nächsten Einkauf mit deiner N26 Debitkarte!

question: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (including CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.There’s always a €2 fee if you use your Maestro card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2€. Check our pricing lists if you’ve been charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It’s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you’ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant’s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
answer: Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch für Kredite an unsere Kunden zur Verfügung zu stellen (sofern diese über eine entsprechende Bonität verfügen). Für die nicht im Kundengeschäft benötigte Liquidität ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europäischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschließlich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir öffentlich-rechtliche Kunden hauptsächlich in Deutschland (Städte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das heißt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.Und wir tätigen auch keine Spekulationsgeschäfte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

question: Cos'è CASH26?
answer: Disponibile per i conti aperti in Spagna, Germania, Austria, Italia e Grecia.CASH26 è una funzione integrata nell'app N26 che ti permette di depositare contanti sul tuo conto N26 e prelevare denaro con il tuo smartphone, senza carta e senza sportello.Tutto quello che devi fare è recarti in uno degli oltre 2000 punti vendita CASH26 in tutta Italia (tra cui Carrefour Iper, Market, Express, PENNY, PAM e Panorama), generare un codice a barre CASH26 e mostrarlo alla persona alla cassa dallo schermo del tuo smartphone collegato. Leggi questo articolo per sapere come prelevare e depositare contanti sul conto con CASH26.Funzionalità CASH26Depositare contantiIl codice a barre ha una durata di soli 10 minuti; se non lo usi in tempo, scadrà e dovrai generarne uno nuovo.Quando depositi il denaro, sarà disponibile immediatamente, anche se potrebbero volerci fino a 10 minuti prima che sia visibile nel saldo del tuo conto nell'app N26.Quanto denaro in contanti posso depositare con CASH26?L'importo minimo è di 50 € per deposito e quello massimo è di 999 € ogni 24 ore.A prescindere dalla somma, si applica una commissione dell'1,5% sull'importo totale.Prelevare contanti con lo smartphoneNon appena viene generato il codice a barre CASH26, l'importo selezionato viene detratto immediatamente dal saldo del conto. Se cambi idea e cancelli il codice prima di usarlo, oppure se lo lasci scadere dopo 10 minuti, il denaro tornerà immediatamente nel tuo conto.Quanto denaro in contanti posso prelevare con CASH26?Il limite massimo è di 200 € per ogni prelievo e di 900 € ogni 24 ore. Non c'è un importo minimo di prelievo. Puoi anche prelevare soltanto un centesimo.I prelievi con CASH26 sono privi di commissioni e senza spese aggiuntive.

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10€N26 Metal cards: 45€Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30€N26 Metal: 65€Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of €50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional €10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least €10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: Come posso scaricare la ricevuta di un bonifico SEPA?
answer: Se hai inviato un bonifico dal tuo conto N26 e necessiti di una conferma dell’avvenuto invio o ricezione, puoi scaricare il file PDF con i dati della transazione dalla tua app mobile o WebApp. Ecco come: Accedi alla tua app N26Dalla lista delle transazioni, seleziona il bonifico per il quale desideri scaricare la confermaClicca su “Scarica il PDF del bonifico”Non appena sceglierai questa opzione, la ricevuta verrà automaticamente scaricata sul tuo smartphone o pc.Quali dati sono presenti nella ricevuta PDF del bonifico?Nella ricevuta del bonifico troverai i dati bancari del mittente e del ricevente del trasferimento, comprensivi dell’importo della transazione e la data in cui è stata effettuata.Ti ricordiamo inoltre, che nella ricevuta non troverai nè il CRO (Codice Riferimento Operazione) nè il TRN (Transaction Reference Number).

question: What you need to know about the Italian IBAN
answer: IMPORTANT - Currently new customers signing up in Italy will receive an Italian IBAN. For our existing customers in Italy with a German IBAN, as soon as we have information to share on how and when you can obtain an Italian IBAN, we will get back in touch. Why didn’t N26 offer an Italian IBAN from the beginning?Theoretically, having a German IBAN in Italy shouldn’t be an issue under EU law which states that all EU IBANs should be accepted, regardless if it’s from a different country than your country of residence. However, we’ve been listening to our customers and know that this isn’t always the case. To make things easier, we’ve now decided to offer our Italian customers their own local Italian IBAN.Can I receive my salary/social/unemployment benefit/pension?You can indeed receive incoming transfers in Euros to the Italian IBAN associated with your N26 account.Can I create Direct Debits?Yes, you can. Simply provide the relevant company with your N26 IBAN to set up Direct Debits.Can I create Standing orders?Yes, you can. Standing orders can be set up in the N26 app via the "Transfers" section.When trying to send a transfer to my N26 Italian IBAN, the sending bank said the account details aren't recognised. What is the issue?It's possible that the sending bank doesn't yet have our new Italian BIC in their system. Please contact the sending bank so they can update their database and process your transfer.Can I deposit cash on my N26 account?Our customers in Italy can use CASH26 to withdraw and deposit cash through our partner stores. You can see how this works by visiting our Support Center here.Does anything change in terms of the fees or cost related to using the account (price list)?Offering an Italian IBAN won't change the costs associated with your account. You can check the price list with all relevant information here (new tab).Is it true that if I open an account now, I won’t have to pay the stamp duty?A stamp duty of €34.20 is due on accounts with an annual average balance exceeding €5,000 (subject to subsequent changes to the law). It is paid by the Bank on bank statements until June 30th, 2022. Unless the promotion is extended, the annual stamp duty will be paid by the customer from July 1st, 2022. It will be charged on the customer's account by direct debit. Customers will not not need to provide any kind of declaration.

question: What is the maximum I can spend?
answer: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: €5,000Monthly limit: €20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of €1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of €400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of €2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of €1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: €1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limit Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: €100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: €2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is €200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to €900 in any 24-hour period. There’s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is €50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to €999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: Wie kann ich den Nachweis über die Herkunft der Gelder für mein Konto erbringen?
answer: Als voll lizenzierte Bank muss N26 routinemäßige technische Prüfungen der Kundenkonten durchführen. Als reguliertes Institut können wir so sicherstellen, dass das Geld auf N26 Konten sicher und geschützt bleibt.Mitunter kann es vorkommen, dass wir uns aufgrund der Ergebnisse dieser Routineprüfungen an einen Kontoinhaber wenden müssen, um einen Nachweis über die Herkunft der Gelder auf dem Konto zu erhalten, dies ist eine Praxis im Einklang mit den deutschen Bankvorschriften.Wenn dies der Fall ist, werden wir dich ausschließlich über die E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren, die mit deinem N26 Konto verknüpft ist. In dieser E-Mail erhältst du klare Anweisungen, wie du diese Dokumente einreichen kannst, z. B. Scans oder Fotos von Quittungen, Gehaltsabrechnungen, Rechnungen oder Zahlungsaufforderungen.Sei stets aufmerksam und vergewissere dich, dass solche E-Mails von N26 kommen – wir werden dich nie nach deinen N26 Kontodaten, deinem Passwort oder anderen Daten fragen, die du im Rahmen deines Verifizierungsprozesses mitgeteilt hast.

question: How to order my Maestro card?
answer: Only applies to Germany, Austria and the NetherlandsYou need our German, Austrian or Dutch Terms & Conditions to order a Maestro (new tab) card. Just login to your account and go to:Cards Tap: Get an additional Card Then tap: Maestro Then tap Choose to order the card The Maestro card is free of charge only for N26 Smart, N26 You and N26 Metal customers, while it costs 10€ for N26 Standard customers. Maestro is a widely adopted payment system which allows you to make payments using a Maestro card in stores. All our Mastercards as well as our Maestro cards are debit cards.For more information about the delivery timeline please go to our dedicated article.

question: Qu’est-ce que le hameçonnage?
answer: Le hameçonnage est une méthode simple et efficace que les hackers utilisent pour obtenir vos informations confidentielles. Une fois ces informations obtenues, ils peuvent les utiliser pour usurper l’identité de leurs victimes et perpétrer différents types de fraudes en leur nom. Si vous souhaitez en savoir plus, veuillez cliquer (nouvel onglet) ici (nouvel onglet) pour lire notre article de blog sur la manière de reconnaître et d’éviter les attaques de hameçonnage.Comment signaler des emails et des messages suspectsN26 ne vous enverra jamais de messages d’avertissements urgents par SMS ou emails vous demandant de vous connecter à votre compte et de partager des données utilisateur confidentielles. Nous ne vous enverrons jamais d’ultimatum, et nous ne vous demanderons jamais de vous authentifier ou de vérifier vos données en dehors de nos canaux de communications sécurisés.Emails suspectsSi vous recevez un email suspect, ne cliquez sur aucun lien et ne téléchargez aucune pièce jointe.Afin de nous aider dans notre enquête, nous vous prions :de nous transférer simplement l’email suspect à l’adresse support@n26.com ;OUd’enregistrer, si possible, l’email suspect en tant que fichier « eml » et de nous l’envoyer. Avec la plupart des fournisseurs de services de messagerie, les emails sont automatiquement enregistrés dans ce format lorsqu’ils sont téléchargés. En nous envoyant l’email suspect dans ce format, vous nous permettez de déterminer la véritable origine du message et de le signaler aux organisations compétentes. Si vous rencontrez des difficultés pour enregistrer l’email à ce format, pas de problèmes. Dans ce cas, envoyez-nous simplement la conversation de l’email suspect à l’adresse indiquée ci-dessus. Veuillez ne pas nous envoyer de captures d’écran, car nous ne pouvons pas utiliser ce type d’informations. Supprimez l’email de votre boîte mail.SMS suspectsSi vous recevez un SMS suspect, ne cliquez sur aucun lien et ne donnez aucune information demandée.Afin de nous aider dans notre enquête, nous vous demandons de suivre les étapes suivantes :Prenez une capture d’écran du message que vous avez reçu et envoyez-la à : support@n26.com.Assurez-vous que le message complet est entièrement visible, en incluant le numéro de téléphone de l’expéditeur et la date/l’heure de l’envoi.Si nous vous confirmons que le SMS reçu constitue effectivement une tentative d’hameçonnage, bloquez le numéro de téléphone.Supprimez le message de votre téléphone mobile.Appels téléphoniques suspectsSi vous recevez un appel suspect, qu’il provienne ou non de l’un de nos numéros de téléphone, ne fournissez aucune donnée personnelle ou relative à votre compte ou à la carte associée. Dans certains cas, grâce à l’usurpation du numéro de téléphone, les escrocs sont capables de masquer le numéro de téléphone de l’expéditeur, le faisant passer pour celui de la banque.Pour cette raison, si vous pensez avoir été victime d’une escroquerie téléphonique ou avoir fourni vos données personnelles, veuillez contacter immédiatement notre service client à l’adresse support@n26.com.Comment signaler un site internet frauduleuxIl peut arriver que vous tombiez sur un site internet se faisant passer pour N26 afin de promouvoir et de vendre des services frauduleux. Parfois, des sites prétendument affiliés à N26 utilisent également notre logo. Ils vous offriront peut-être un crédit ou des offres promotionnelles limitées dans le temps. Il est important de bien noter que ce n’est pas parce qu’un site contient « N26 » dans son adresse URL qu’il est forcément légitime.Si vous avez l’impression d’être sur un site frauduleux, arrêtez votre activité sur le site et faites la chose suivante :Vérifiez la barre d’adresse et assurez-vous que l’adresse URL est bien: https://app.n26.com/login. Si ce n’est pas le cas, copiez l’URL et signalez-le immédiatement à: support@n26.com.

question: What if my balance is negative?
answer: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships. Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited. In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We’ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you’re in complete control: go to 👤 My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you.  It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank. As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.  How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You’ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it’s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: We offer repayment plans if you can’t repay your overdraft or loan with N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Here’s how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you’re going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don’t accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It’s then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if it’s negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

question: Come chiudere il conto?
answer: Hai deciso di chiudere il tuo conto N26? Continua a leggere questo articolo per scoprire come procedere. Se hai un conto premium, potrai scegliere se chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto o semplicemente cancellare la tua sottoscrizione (nuova tabella) e passare a N26 Standard.Ecco come fare per chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto:Se non hai un IBAN italianoSe hai un saldo positivo, trasferisci i fondi rimanenti su un altro conto prima di iniziare il processo di chiusura. Se hai un saldo negativo, per prima cosa dovrai trasferire (nuova tabella) il denaro mancante sul conto N26 in modo da portare il tuo saldo a 0.Clicca qui per avviare il processo elettronico di chiusura del conto (nuova tabella). Dovrai effettuare l'accesso alla tua app N26 per verificare la tua identità, dopodiché l'applicazione ti guiderà attraverso il processo di chiusura del tuo conto.Distruggi la tua carta, per esempio tagliandola con delle forbici. È necessario tagliare il chip e la banda magnetica, e poi smaltire i pezzi separatamente.Se hai un IBAN italianoNel caso in cui tu abbia un IBAN italiano o se non riesci a effettuare l'accesso al tuo conto, puoi inviarci un’email all’indirizzo support@n26.com (nuova tabella) dal tuo indirizzo email registrato, allegando questo modulo di cancellazione (nuova tabella) contenente le seguenti informazioni:una dichiarazione in cui richiedi la chiusura del tuo conto. Potrai indicare una data specifica o specificare che desideri che la chiusura avvenga "il più presto possibile";il tuo nome;il tuo IBAN N26;un altro IBAN all'interno dell’area SEPA (Area unica di pagamenti in euro) per trasferire il tuo saldo residuo nel caso in cui sia positivo (sia che si tratti di denaro presente in uno spazio o sul tuo conto principale).

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It’s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you’ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant’s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Comment ouvrir un compte N26 ?
answer:
Ouvrir un compte N26 est simple et ne prend que quelques minutes. Pour être éligible à un compte N26, vous devez :avoir au moins 18 ansêtre résident permanent de l'un des pays où N26 est présentavoir un téléphone portable compatibleposséder un document d’identité accepté par nos servicesne pas avoir un compte N26parler l'une des langues parlées par notre Service Client : français, anglais, allemand, espagnol ou italien.Voici comment se déroule l’ouverture d’un compte N26 :Inscrivez-vous en renseignant les informations personnelles demandées et votre adresse email, puis choisissez un mot de passe. Ensuite, vous devrez choisir le compte que vous souhaitez ouvrir*.Après avoir validé votre adresse email, vous pourrez procéder à la vérification de votre identité directement depuis votre application N26 et synchroniser votre smartphone.Dès que la vérification de votre identité est validée, vous pouvez alimenter votre compte N26 par virement SEPA, en utilisant CASH26 (si vous êtes client en Allemagne, Autriche et en Italie) ou en demandant de l'argent à un ami (par Moneybeam).
Si vous ouvrez un compte en France, votre premier virement pour alimenter votre compte doit être effectué depuis un autre compte ouvert à votre nom et domicilié dans la zone SEPA.Après quelques jours, selon le mode de livraison choisi, vous recevrez votre Mastercard N26 par courrier. Si vous souhaitez obtenir plus de renseignements, contactez-nous. Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 à 23:00 h.*Uniquement si vous remplissez toutes les conditions d'éligibilité à l'ouverture d'un compte (nouvel onglet). Si ce n'est pas le cas, nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir de compte pour le moment. La décision est prise par un système automatique.

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you’ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‘Cards’ tab. You can mark the reason as “lost” or “stolen” based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you’ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).  How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here’s a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you’ll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don’t arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard’s chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date 
In this scenario, Mastercard’s chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place. You received a delivery, but it doesn’t correspond with what you ordered 
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn’t receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here’s some guidance on what to say:Dear XX, I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction: Amount: €{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank. If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help––this is the fastest way to get your money back. Here’s a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them: Dear XX, I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below: Merchant name: {insert merchant name} Amount of original, authorized transaction: €{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: €{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward. The merchant told me that they’ve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven’t received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction. How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That’s why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits––all right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‘Discreet Mode (new tab)’ option to securely access your account in public. Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you’re always aware of what’s happening on your account. Plus, we’re always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud. How does card fraud occur? A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that’s been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if: You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase Your online shopping account is hacked Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud? Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: Warum war eine Zahlung höher als erwartet?
answer: Ganz gleich, ob es sich um eine Kartenzahlung oder eine Lastschrift handelt – wenn eine Zahlung höher ausfällt als ursprünglich gedacht, kommt dir das erst einmal verdächtig vor. Es gibt jedoch ein paar Gründe, warum der tatsächlich abgebuchte Betrag vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:  Es handelt sich um eine Transaktion inklusive einer KautionEs handelt sich um eine Transaktion in einer FremdwährungIn beiden Fällen kann es so aussehen, als sei eine Zahlung zu hoch. Sehen wir uns die beiden Szenarien genauer an: Du fährst in den Urlaub und mietest am Flughafen ein Auto. Du bezahlst die Mietwagengebühr mit deiner N26 Mastercard. Der abgebuchte Betrag fällt jedoch höher aus, weil die Autovermietung auch die Kaution für den Mietwagen autorisiert, also geblockt hat. Wenn du am Ende deines Urlaubs den Mietwagen unversehrt zurückbringst, erlischt die Autorisierung und der Betrag ist auf deinem Konto nach maximal 30 Tagen wieder voll verfügbar. Mehr über den Unterschied zwischen Autorisierungen und tatsächlichen Buchungen erfährst du hier.Du bestellst ein Produkt in einem Onlineshop und zahlst mit deiner Karte. Der Onlineshop sitzt außerhalb der Eurozone und bietet ausschließlich Zahlungen in Fremdwährungen an, zum Beispiel Dollar oder Pfund. Je nach aktuellem Wechselkurs kann der gebuchte Betrag auf deinem Konto von der ursprünglichen Summe abweichen. Dies lässt sich aufgrund von Schwankungen auf dem Devisenmarkt nicht vermeiden. Mehr zu Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen erfährst du hier.In beiden Fällen berechnen wir keine Zinsen für die Differenz.Keines der beiden Szenarien trifft zu und du bist sicher, dass du zu viel bezahlt hast? Wenn die Transaktion sicher nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, können wir dir helfen, dein Geld zurückzubekommen.

question: ¿Dónde invierte N26 mi dinero?
answer: Como regla general, nos esforzamos para que los depósitos de nuestros clientes sean otorgados en forma de préstamo a nuestros propios clientes (siempre y cuando dispongan de una solvencia apropiada). En cuanto a la liquidez que no se utiliza para los clientes, nuestra estrategia de inversión es de bajo riesgo.Invertimos el dinero de nuestros clientes con el Deutsche Bundesbank (Banco Federal Alemán) y otros bancos europeos dentro de la eurozona, únicamente con un buen tipo de riesgo y a corto plazo. Además, refinanciamos colectivos de derecho público principalmente en Alemania (ciudades y municipios) e invertimos en bonos de estado en euros.No somos una institución de trading y por lo tanto no comerciamos para obtener beneficios a corto plazo.No nos involucramos en la especulación; ni con comida, divisas extranjeras, bitcoins u otras clases de activos.

question: What's a p-account?
answer: A p-account is a legal protection against garnishments which can be applied to any account type that we offer. If you have a German IBAN you are generally entitled to convert your N26 account to a p-account. This means that in case you have an active garnishment, you'll have a monthly allowance of normally €1.340 which remains accessible to you and inaccessible to the creditor on a per month basis. An active alimony garnishment can decrease that amount. Please note, however, that we need to report the conversion of your account into p-account to SCHUFA AG.You may decide to convert your N26 account to a p-account in case your N26 account has been garnished. Please note that in this case we are obligated by law to seize your account. You will simultaneously receive a detailed in-app message from us to your Messages with N26 with all information regarding your garnishment and the options available to you. We encourage you to read it carefully so you are also informed about your other options, before making a decision.Find out more about how to get a p-account.

question: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
answer: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet our requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‘Forgot Password’ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Ablaufen und Ersatz von Karten: Häufig gestellte Fragen
answer: Wenn deine N26 Mastercard abgelaufen ist oder bald ablaufen wird, erhältst du in diesem Artikel alle Informationen, wie du eine neue bestellst, sowie die damit verbundenen Kosten und die Versandzeiten. Bevor du mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte fortfahren möchtest, empfehlen wir dir, dass deine persönlichen Daten korrekt und auf dem neuesten Stand sind.Meine Karte läuft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Wenn deine Karte bald abläuft, logge dich bitte in der App in dein N26 Konto ein, gehe zum Tab Karten und suche nach einem Banner unter der entsprechenden Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestätigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen. Wir senden sie dir dann zu. Wenn diese Nachricht nicht erscheint, mach dir keine Sorgen. Das liegt wahrscheinlich daran, dass deine Karte noch einige Zeit gültig ist. Zu gegebener Zeit hast du die Möglichkeit, deine Adresse zu bestätigen.Sobald deine Karte bei dir eintrifft, musst du diese erst aktivieren, bevor du sie nutzen kannst. Vergiss nicht, deine alte Karte zu vernichten und sie gemäß den örtlichen Recyclingrichtlinien zu entsorgen.Bitte beachte: Wenn du deine neue Mastercard erhalten und aktiviert hast, musst du deine Zahlungsdaten für alle deine Abos und wiederkehrenden Zahlungen aktualisieren. Auf diese Weise kannst du verhindern, dass deine zukünftigen Zahlungen abgelehnt werden.Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten Gültigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Du erhältst eine neue Karte mit einer anderen Nummer sowie einem neuen Ablaufdatum.Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte für meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Ersatzkarten sind für alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erhältlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten eröffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den Ländern, in denen N26 verfügbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europäischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, Österreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ansässig bist, das nicht von N26 unterstützt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung für dich vornehmen können. Der Versand außerhalb dieser Länder (neuen Tab) kann mit zusätzlichen Kosten verbunden sein. Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten für ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In ländlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch länger dauern. Um über den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.Kein Problem, wir helfen wir gerne weiter! Wenn du deine Adresse bereits bestätigt hast und seither mehr als 20 Tage vergangen sind, wende dich bitte an den Kundenservice. Dies kannst du im Support-Bereich der App erledigen. Wenn du deine Adresse noch nicht bestätigt hast, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und suche nach einem Banner unter deiner abgelaufenen Karte. Folge den Schritten, um zu bestätigen, wohin wir deine Ersatzkarte schicken sollen.

question: Verwahrentgelt
answer: Seit Juli 2022 erheben wir kein mehrFür jedes Konto (außer N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Metal und N26 Business Metal Konten), das am 19.10.2020 oder später eröffnet wurde und einen Kontostand von über 50.000 € aufweist, wird ein von 0,5 % pro Jahr erhoben, wie bereits bei der Kontoeröffnung in den Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen erläutert.Den relevanten Teil der AGB kannst du hier (neuen Tab) einsehen.Das wird auf Basis des täglichen Kontostandes für jeden Tag des Monats berechnet. An jedem Tag, an dem dein Kontostand den Schwellenwert von 50.000 € überschreitet, wird eine Gebühr von 0,5 % pro Jahr auf den überschüssigen Kontostand erhoben.Die Gebühr wird zu Beginn eines jeden Monats für die vorangegangenen 30 Tage direkt von deinem Konto abgebucht.Wenn dein Kontostand den oben genannten Schwellenwert übersteigt und du diese Gebühr nicht zahlen möchtest, gibt es zwei Möglichkeiten, wie du sie vermeiden kannst:Du kannst dir ein Upgrade auf N26 You (neuen Tab), N26 Business You (neuen Tab), N26 Metal (neuen Tab) oder N26 Business Metal (neuen Tab) holenUnsere deutschen Kunden können ein EasyFlex Savings Konto (neuen Tab) eröffnen und ihr überschüssiges Guthaben dorthin überweisen (bitte beachte die Voraussetzungen)

question: N26 prend-elle en charge les virements SWIFT ?
answer: Oui, mais uniquement les virements SWIFT entrants.Les virements SWIFT sortants ne sont pas encore possibles.
