Suivez-nous sur les réseaux sociaux #N26 et notre blog (nouvel onglet) pour être parmi les premiers à savoir quand ce changement aura lieu.Apprenez ici à effectuer des virements en devises étrangères avec N26.Découvrez ici le délai de traitement d’un virement SWIFT entrant.Combien coûte un virement SWIFT ?Pour les virements entrants de plus de 150 €, les frais s’élèvent à 12,50 € + 0,1 % du montant reçu.Aucun frais n’est facturé pour les virements entrants de moins de 150 €.Le montant maximum des frais est de 100 € par transaction.À qui s’appliquent les frais ?Si vous avez ouvert un compte avant le 07/07/2021 et que vous possédez un IBAN allemand, ces frais vous seront facturés si vous êtes titulaire d’un compte N26 Business Standard, N26 Business Smart ou N26 Business You. (Ces frais ne s’appliquent donc pas aux comptes N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal et N26 Business Metal.)Si vous avez ouvert un compte avant le 07/07/2021 et que vous possédez un IBAN espagnol, ces frais vous seront facturés si vous êtes titulaire d’un compte N26 Business Standard, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Standard, N26 Smart ou N26 You. (Ces frais ne s’appliquent donc pas aux comptes N26 Metal ou N26 Business Metal.)Si vous avez ouvert un compte après le 07/07/2021, ces frais vous seront facturés, quel que soit votre IBAN, si vous êtes titulaire d’un compte N26 Business Standard, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Standard, N26 Smart ou N26 You. (Ces frais ne s’appliquent donc pas aux comptes N26 Metal ou N26 Business Metal.)

question: Perché la verifica foto non funziona?
answer: ℹ️ Valido per tutte le regioni eccetto GermaniaInnanzitutto, assicurati di aver abilitato la geolocalizzazione. Quindi, esamina la guida (nuova tabella) che abbiamo creato per aiutarti a scattare le foto migliori.La maggior parte delle foto verifiche non riesce a causa della cattiva qualità dell’immagine. Ecco alcuni suggerimenti:Esegui il processo in un ambiente luminoso e utilizza un telefono cellulare con una buona fotocamera.Se utilizzi un dispositivo Android, assicurati di avere una messa a fuoco automatica adeguata.Scatta il selfie all'altezza degli occhi (la fotocamera dovrebbe essere alla stessa altezza dei tuoi occhi).Assicurati di essere l’unica persona nella foto e che il documento sia ben visibile.Controlla il tuo documento.Accettiamo solo foto del documento originale (fotocopie o screenshots non vengono accettate).Mantieni il tuo documento su una superficie piatta ed assicurati che sia completamente visibile.Metti ben a fuoco il tuo documento, facendo sì che gli ologrammi di sicurezza siano visibili quando richiesto.Posiziona il documento in modo che tutti i bordi siano allineati alla cornice predefinitaAssicurati che il documento non sia danneggiato. Se il tuo documento è molto deteriorato, contatta il nostro supporto clienti per selezionarne un altro.Verifica che il documento non sia scadutoAccettiamo documenti diversi in base alla tua nazionalità. Verifica qui (nuova tabella) i documenti supportati.Se scatti una foto del tuo documento d’identità o di te stesso e il primo tentativo non va a buon fine, puoi riprovare.Una volta completata la verifica, ti invieremo la tua Mastercard N26. La consegna richiede fino a 10 giorni.La chat è disponibile dal lunedì alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

question: Quels sont les avantages du compte N26 Metal ?
answer: Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, France, Espagne, Italie, Belgique, Estonie, Finlande, Grèce, Irlande, Lettonie, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Pays-Bas, Portugal, Slovaquie et Pologne, Suède, Danemark, Norvège, Islande, et Liechtenstein.Une carte physique Mastercard N26 sans frais : Choisissez parmi trois nouvelles couleurs lors de la commande de la carte : Ambre, Noir et Ardoise.Carte virtuelle supplémentaire : Commandez une carte virtuelle supplémentaire sans frais depuis l’application !Carte physique supplémentaire : Commandez une carte physique N26 YOU supplémentaire au prix unique de 10 € via l’application N26.Espaces : 10 Espaces (sous-comptes) supplémentaires pour organiser vos finances.Espaces Partagés : Invitez vos amis à rejoindre vos Espaces (sous-comptes) pour partager et gérer ensemble des fonds.Assistance téléphonique dédiée : Pour toute question, veuillez contacter notre Service Client dédié.Retraits gratuits aux distributeurs automatiques de billets dans le monde entier : Réglez vos achats en ligne et en magasin avec votre Mastercard N26 Metal, évitez les frais bancaires cachés et profitez de zéro commission bancaire à l’étranger. Vous pouvez également retirer de l’argent sans frais dans n’importe quelle devise dans les distributeurs automatiques de billets du monde entier.Offres partenaires exclusives (nouvel onglet) : Profitez des offres et des remises partenaires premium sur des marques de renommée mondialeEnsemble d’assurances proposées par Allianz Global Assistance* : Une assurance qui inclut une large gamme d’avantages personnels et financiers tels que :Assurance-voyage : Remboursement des frais médicaux à l’étranger, des frais liés aux annulations de voyage après une urgence médicale, des frais engagés en cas de retard de vol de plus de 4 heures, des frais en cas de retard de bagages enregistrés de plus de 6 heures et des frais d’expatriation sanitaire.Sauvetage dans la neige et en montagne : Profitez d’une couverture pour les frais de recherche, de sauvetage, de premier transport et les frais médicaux en cas d’accident lors d’un séjour en montagne.Voitures, vélos et scooters en libre-service : Couverture en cas de dommages ou de vol de véhicules loués auprès de sociétés de moyens de transport en libre-service.Comparez N26 Metal (nouvel onglet) avec nos autres comptes pour choisir celui qui vous convient le mieux !Informations supplémentaires sur N26 Metal (nouvel onglet) :Nous vous enverrons votre carte N26 Metal automatiquement dès que le solde de votre compte vous permettra de régler la première mensualité de 16,90 €. Nous vous invitons donc à alimenter votre compte si cela est nécessaire.Les détails de votre carte sont imprimés au verso de la Mastercard N26 Metal, notamment votre numéro de carte, votre code CVV et votre numéro Token à 10 chiffres.Les frais d'adhésion de 16,90 € sont déduits chaque mois de votre compte N26, en fonction de la date de votre souscription à N26 Metal. Si vous êtes un nouvel utilisateur N26, le premier débit est retardé de 15 jours après avoir complété votre vérification d'identité pour vous laisser la possibilité d’alimenter votre compte N26 avant que ce prélèvement ne soit effectué. À partir du deuxième prélèvement, le débit se fera à la date de la validation de votre vérification d'identité. Cela signifie que si vous avez ouvert votre compte en fin de mois, vos deux premières mensualités seront prélevées le mois suivant.Si vous aviez un compte N26 You auparavant, tous les achats et réservations effectués avec votre Mastercard N26 You restent assurés.Vous pouvez désormais payer vos frais mensuels pour les comptes Premium à l’avance pour les 6 mois ou l’année suivant le contrat. Si vous choisissez l’option de paiement anticipé, vous profiterez d’une réduction sur les frais mensuels de tenue de votre compte Premium (Smart / You / Metal), proportionnelle à la période de facturation souhaitée.Lors de l’ouverture de votre compte, vous trouverez les options de paiement anticipé et les charges associées dans votre application N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe, marque déposée d'AWP P&C S.A. - succursale néerlandaise, membre du groupe Allianz.

question: Wie speichere ich die Daten eines Überweisungsempfängers?
answer: Jedes Mal, wenn du eine Überweisung an einen neuen Empfänger in der App erstellst (klicke im Startbildschirm auf den Tab Geld senden, anschließend auf Banküberweisung und schließlich auf Einen neuen Empfänger hinzufügen), werden einige Daten wie der Name des Empfängers und die IBAN automatisch in deiner Kontaktliste für zukünftige Überweisungen gespeichert. Du kannst auch Kontakte löschen oder deinen Transaktionsverlauf mit ihnen einsehen:iOS: Tippe auf die drei Punkte links, um den Kontakt zu löschen.Android: Tippe auf die drei Punkte rechts, um den Kontakt zu löschen.Beachte, dass das Löschen eines Kontakteintrags den zugehörigen Transaktionsverlauf nicht löscht.

question: Wie ändere ich meine Telefonnummer, Adresse oder andere persönliche Daten?
answer: Für eine reibungslose Nutzung deines N26 Kontos ist es wichtig, dass du deine persönlichen Daten immer auf dem neuesten Stand hältst. Zum Beispiel musst du Zugriff auf deine Telefonnummer haben, um dein Handy mit deinem N26 Konto verknüpfen zu können. Deine persönlichen Daten kannst du wie folgt ändern:Telefonnummer: Ändere deine Telefonnummer direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App. Beachte, dass dein Handy dafür mit deinem N26 Konto verknüpft sein muss. Gehe zu: 👤 Mein Konto > Persönliche Details > Persönliche Daten. E-Mail-Adresse: Kontaktiere uns im Live Chat in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab). Adresse: Kontaktiere uns im Live Chat aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab). Anschließend schicken wir dir eine E-Mail. Antworte auf diese E-Mail und füge eine der folgenden Unterlagen als Anhang hinzu:Kopie deines neuen Reispasses oder Kopie beider Seiten deines neuen Personalausweises mit der neuen Adresse.Kopie deiner offiziellen Meldebestätigung (nicht älter als 6 Monate)Versorgerrechnung (Strom-, Wasser-, Gas- oder Festnetz-) nicht älter als 3 Monate.Name & Geschlecht: Kontaktiere uns via Live Chat in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab). Anschließend schicken wir dir eine E-Mail. Antworte auf diese E-Mail und füge beide der folgenden Unterlagen als Anhang hinzu:Kopie deines neuen Reispasses oder Kopie beider Seiten deines neuen Personalausweises.Kopie einer offiziellen Bestätigung der Namens- bzw. Geschlechtsänderung (Heiratsurkunde bzw. geänderte Geburtsurkunde). Nachdem wir dir die Änderung bestätigt haben, kannst du auch eine neue N26 Karte bestellen.Nationalität: Kontaktiere uns via Live Chat in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab). Anschließend schicken wir dir eine E-Mail. Antworte auf die E-Mail und füge als Anhang eine Kopie deines neuen Reispasses oder eine Kopie beider Seiten deines neuen Personalausweises.Lieferadresse: Du kannst diese Information jederzeit direkt in der App ändern. Gehe einfach zu: 👤 Mein Konto > Persönliche Details. Steuerinformationen: Du kannst diese Information jederzeit direkt in der App ändern: bring mich jetzt dahin (oder gehe zu: 👤 Mein Konto > Persönliche Details).

question: Why can’t I get a loan?
answer: Applies to Germany and FranceWhen applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isn’t your main account, you’ll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where you’re applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).We’ll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This search will appear on your SCHUFA report but is only visible to you and won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isn’t the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).Once you’ve sent an application to us, you’re unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). You’ll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.The decision is then calculated through an automated process. We cannot perform manual checks.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

question: Combien de temps met un virement bancaire ?
answer: Les virements SEPA instantanés entrants vers des comptes N26 sont instantanés, à condition qu’ils soient envoyés par une banque qui prenne en charge les virements instantanés. Cependant, les virements peuvent parfois être retardés s’ils doivent être vérifiés en raison des réglementations bancaires SEPA.Les virements SEPA ordinaires entrants sont effectués sous 2 jours ouvrés maximum. Si un virement est effectué juste avant un weekend ou jour férié, le délai de traitement sera prolongé de 3 jours ouvrés maximum.Les virements SWIFT entrants prennent jusqu’à 4 jours ouvrés pour arriver. Les virements instantanés SEPA sortants sont envoyés de manière instantanée. Les virements SEPA sortants ordinaires prennent jusqu’à 2 jours ouvrés. Les virements en devises étrangères sortants avec notre partenaire Wise peuvent prendre jusqu’à 4 jours ouvrés. Les virements SWIFT sortants ne sont pas pris en charge.Qu’est-ce qu’un « jour ouvrable » ?Un jour ouvrable correspond à deux jours ouvrés en raison des heures d’ouverture des banques impliquées. N’importe quel jour de la semaine qui n’est pas un jour férié est considéré comme un jour ouvrable.Mon virement n’est pas arrivé – où est-il ?Si vous avez pris en compte les informations précédentes et le virement n’a toujours pas été effectué ? Dans ce cas, seule la banque émettrice peut lancer une investigation interne.Malheureusement, chez N26, nous ne pouvons pas enquêter sur les virements entrants, uniquement sur les virements sortants. Mais vous pouvez toujours consulter cette liste de raisons potentielles pour lesquelles un virement pourrait échouer.Informations complémentairesLe système avec lequel nous envoyons tous nos virements SEPA s’appelle TARGET2 (nouvel onglet), il traite les paiements tous les jours ouvrés de 07:00 à 18:00 GMT et est fermé les jours suivants: 1er janvier (Jour de l’an), Vendredi saint, lundi de Pâques, 1er mai, 25 décembre (Noël) et 26 décembre.

question: What to do if my card is lost or it’s been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App. Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab). You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: ¿Cuándo llega mi tarjeta?
answer: Dependiendo del destino, el envío puede tardar hasta 15 días laborables. El período de entrega varía en las islas de España, Francia e Italia. Si el envío falla y nos devuelven la tarjeta, te lo comunicaremos por email.Tu primera tarjeta es gratuita con N26 Smart, You y Metal. Con N26 Estándar tendrás una tarjeta virtual gratuita (a no ser que decidas pedir una física por 10 €). Tu tarjeta se fabricará y enviará si el saldo de tu cuenta es de 0 € o más después de cobrarte la primera comisión mensual. Cuando te pasas a un contrato premium, la primera comisión se cobra de inmediato. Si te has suscrito a un contrato premium directamente, la primera comisión se cobrará en cuanto recargues tu cuenta para cubrir la comisión, a más tardar, 15 días después de verificar tu identidad. Si se ha cobrado la primera comisión y tienes un saldo negativo, tendrás que recargar tu cuenta para activar la fabricación y el envío de tu tarjeta.Se te notificará en los Mensajes de la app y a través de un banner en la pantalla de inicio, que te mostrará el estado de la entrega. Nota:El saldo mínimo extraordinario no es una comisión, sino un requisito necesario para activar la producción y el envío de tu tarjeta.Puede solicitar su tarjeta con envío exprés.Mi dirección no es correcta. Para cambiar la dirección de envío (pestaña nueva) entra en el 👤 Mi Cuenta > Información personal > Dirección > Dirección de envio. Actualiza tu información y pide una tarjeta nueva, en caso de que ya hayas tenido una tarjeta activa anteriormente. Si esta es tu primera tarjeta, entonces contacta con nosotros por chat y te pediremos una nueva.Han pasado más de 10 días desde que verifiqué mi identidad. Verifica la dirección de envío. Si es correcta, por favor contáctanos vía chat para que podamos pedirte una nueva tarjeta.Necesito mi tarjeta de inmediato. Si el envío de tu tarjeta falla por segunda vez, o bien si necesitas utilizarla con urgencia, quizá quieras plantearte pedir el envío express.Consejos para un envío con éxito:Si tu dirección contiene caracteres especiales, contáctanos mediante el chat de la app.Solo enviamos las tarjetas a direcciones residenciales (no se admiten direcciones comerciales).En la dirección de entrega, no utilices espacios cuando escribas el código postal.Asegúrate de que no falta información esencial (por ejemplo, el nombre en tu buzón si vives en Alemania o el número de edificio, número de escalera y código de la puerta, si corresponde). Si te vas a quedar temporalmente en algún lugar (con un amigo o en un Airbnb), asegúrate de incluir el nombre en el buzón que pertenece al inquilino principal del departamento.Si te vas a mudar a algún lugar y esta es tu primera tarjeta, asegúrate de seleccionar el país y la dirección a donde te mudarás y deseas recibir tu tarjeta N26.

question: Cos'è il modulo online N26 per le richieste GDPR?
answer:
Tenere al sicuro i dati personali e finanziari dei nostri clienti è una delle nostre priorità, motivo per il quale ti mettiamo a disposizione uno strumento sicuro per processare le richieste correlate ai dati personali. Il nostro modulo online N26 per le richieste GDPR permette ai clienti ed ex clienti N26 (i quali conti sono attualmente chiusi) e ai loro rappresentanti autorizzati con richieste relative ai dati personali, di contattare N26 in maniera sicura.Come funziona?Il modulo online (nuova tabella) viene utilizzato quando un cliente N26 o un ex cliente N26 vuole esercitare, in prima persona o attraverso un rappresentante autorizzato, dei diritti previsti dal Regolamento generale sulla protezione dei dati (GDPR).In particolare, potrai esercitare i seguenti diritti: Diritto di accesso dell'interessato ai sensi dell'art. 15 GDPR (nuova tabella) Diritto alla cancellazione ("diritto all'oblio"), ai sensi dell'art. 17 GDPR (nuova tabella) Diritto di opposizione ai sensi dell'art. 21 GDPR (nuova tabella)Puoi aspettarti di ricevere una risposta dal Team di N26 entro 30 giorni lavorativi.Quando compili il modulo, ti verrà chiesto di indicare:Nome, cognome e indirizzo emailIl tuo paese di residenzaIl tuo status attuale (cliente, ex cliente, rappresentante autorizzato di un cliente/ex cliente)Il tipo di richiestaDevo fornire altri documenti se sono un ex cliente N26 o un rappresentante autorizzato?Agli ex clienti e ai loro rappresentanti autorizzati viene richiesto di caricare ulteriori documenti per legittimare la loro identità e assicurare che il destinatario dei dati abbia il diritto di riceverli.Ecco quali sono i documenti necessari:Ex clienti: copia del documento d’identità o passaportoRappresentanti autorizzati: copia del documento d’identità o passaporto e una procura (generale) firmata Una volta compilati tutti i campi del modulo, clicca su Invia per farci pervenire la tua richiesta.Perché è necessario il controllo della carta di identità o del passaporto degli ex clienti di N26 o dei rappresentanti autorizzati?Richiediamo una copia della carta di identità o del passaporto per verificare l’identità e garantire che le informazioni personali, comprese quelle finanziarie, non finiscano nelle mani sbagliate.
Il controllo manuale dei documenti viene eseguito quando è necessario verificare l’identità di una persona e non siamo in grado di farlo con il nostro sistema di verifica standard tramite l’app N26. Questa verifica è necessaria al fine di identificare gli ex clienti e gli eventuali loro rappresentanti autorizzati che non hanno più accesso all’app N26.Domande o dubbi su questo argomento?Puoi contattare il nostro servizio clienti tramite support@n26.com (nuova tabella).

question: Devo pagare le tasse negli Stati Uniti?
answer: In quanto banca autorizzata, siamo obbligati a riportare all’IRS informazioni sui conti tenuti dai contribuenti statunitensi secondo le disposizioni FATCA, una legislazione delineata dal US Department of Treasury e dal US Internal Revenue Service con lo scopo di incoraggiare l’adempimento fiscale ed di impedire che i soggetti statunitensi si rivolgano a banche estere o altri enti creditizi per evitare la tassazione statunitense sulle loro entrate e sul loro patrimonio.Troverai maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA (nuova tabella)qui (nuova tabella).Nell’ambito FATCA, vengono definiti soggetti statunitensi, ad esempio:i cittadini degli Stati Uniti (inclusi i possessori di doppia cittadinanza)i residenti negli Stati Uniti (ad es. i possessori di un valido permesso di soggiorno per gli USA oppure le persone che superano il “Substantial Presence Test” - maggiori informazioni qui di seguito)Se non sai se sei un soggetto statunitense, ti suggeriamo di rivolgerti ad un consulente fiscale.Il “Substantial Presence Test” prevede che:tu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni nell’anno solare in corsoOPPUREtu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni negli ultimi 3 anni solari, da calcolare nel seguente modo:(almeno 31 giorni nell’anno solare in corso) + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA l’anno scorso) diviso per 3 + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA l’anno precedente) diviso per 6.Inoltre, se il tuo conto presenta almeno uno dei seguenti dati:cittadinanza statunitense o residenza statunitenseluogo di nascita statunitenseindirizzo postale o indirizzo di residenza statunitense, incluse le caselle postalinumero di telefono statunitensebonifici ricorrenti verso un indirizzo o un conto statunitensesaremo obbligati a considerarti un soggetto statunitense a meno che non tu fornisca i seguenti documenti:un modulo  W-8BEN o un'autocertificazione di simile valore eun passaporto non statunitense o un altro documento identificativo emesso da un altro governo, che riporti il possesso di una cittadinanza o nazionalità diversa da quella statunitensenel caso fossi nato negli USA, una copia del tuo Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to connect your smartphone to your account. If you didn’t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you’ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it’s likely that you’ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: How to activate my card?
answer: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! You’ll have to activate your card whether it’s your first N26 card, a replacement card, or you’ve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card you’re activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, you’ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction — in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail — for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card — you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then you’ll still be able to activate that new card.

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe’re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and will thoroughly investigate it. We'll provide our findings and final response via email. Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via live chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:German beschwerden@n26.com (new tab)English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Please note: These inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve your issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account. If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarised power of attorney form.Please note: Only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person. If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe’ll contact you via email to confirm that we’ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. For all other complaints, different time frames apply based on the country of your account Terms & Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days Spain - 60 Calendar Days Italy - 60 Calendar Days We may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties, such as:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht – BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can’t cover a direct debit* when it’s due, it’ll bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It’s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you’re eligible for an Overdraft directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is €9.

question: Was ist CASH26?
answer: Für Konten verfügbar, die in Deutschland, Österreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland eröffnet wurden.CASH26 ist ein integriertes Feature in deiner N26 App, mit dem du über dein Smartphone Geld von deinem N26 Konto abheben und einzahlen kannst – komplett ohne Karte und Geldautomat.Geh einfach in eines unserer über 12.100 Partnergeschäfte in Deutschland (inkl. REWE, Penny und dm) und 2.600 Partnergeschäfte in Österreich (inkl. dm, Billa, Billa Plus, und PENNY), erstelle einen CASH26 Strichcode auf deinem verknüpften Smartphone und zeige ihn an der Kasse vor.Wie du Geld mit CASH26 einzahlen bzw. über CASH26 Geld abheben kannst, erfährst du in diesem Artikel.Wie funktioniert CASH26?CASH26 EinzahlungDer Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gültig. Falls du ihn nicht innerhalb dieser Zeit nutzt, verfällt er und du musst einen neuen erstellen. Wenn du Geld über CASH26 einzahlst, kannst du sofort darauf zugreifen. Es kann jedoch sein, dass der Betrag erst bis zu 10 Minuten später in deinem Kontostand erscheint.Wie viel Geld kann ich einzahlen?Der Mindestbetrag für eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 €. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 € einzahlen.Es fällt eine Transaktionsgebühr von 1,5 % des Einzahlbetrags an – ganz gleich, wie viel oder wenig Geld du einzahlst.Zusätzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit für Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in Höhe von 999€ pro 24 Stunden.Mit CASH26 Geld abhebenSobald du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellst hast, wird der Betrag, den du abheben willst, von deinem Kontostand abgezogen.Falls du dich umentscheidest und den Code vor der Nutzung löschst oder ihn nach 10 Minuten verfallen lässt, wird der Betrag deinem Kontostand sofort wieder gutgeschrieben.Wie viel Geld kann man abheben?Das Abhebelimit beträgt 200 € pro Transaktion sowie 900 € innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag – du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Abhebungen mit CASH26 sind für alle unsere Konten kostenlos, außer für das N26 Flex Konto. Bei diesem entfällt auf jede Abhebung eine Gebühr von 2€. Zusätzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit für Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in Höhe von 999€ pro 24 Stunden.

question: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
answer:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if it’s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And ‘try before you buy’ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, you’ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90€. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on “continue” to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick “Confirm Purchase” : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on “Learn More” This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on “continue” to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click “Confirm Purchase” : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the “Start free trial” button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

question: Come passare a N26 Smart?
answer: Valido per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Polonia, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia.Puoi scegliere N26 Smart quando effettui la registrazione iniziale, oppure, se hai già un conto corrente N26 standard, puoi effettuare il passaggio tramite l’app mobile.Per passare a N26 Smart direttamente dall’app mobile, entra nella sezione Esplora e seleziona Ottieni N26 Smart. Ordinando una nuova carta, potrai scegliere uno tra i nostri cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Dopodiché, scegli il metodo di consegna (nuova tabella) che preferisci e accetta i Termini e Condizioni di N26 Smart. Fatto: la tua carta è già in arrivo!La consegna standard richiede fino a 10 giorni lavorativi mentre con la consegna express (nuova tabella) bastano solo 3 giorni lavorativi.Il canone di 4,90€ verrà detratto direttamente dal tuo conto ogni mese nello stesso giorno in cui hai effettuato il passaggio.Puoi ordinare una carta N26 Smart aggiuntiva direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10€.

question: Wie kann ich mich ausweisen?
answer: Als Bank müssen wir wissen, wer du bist. Deshalb musst du uns ein zulässiges Ausweisdokument vorzeigen, wenn du ein Konto eröffnen oder bestimmte Produkte nutzen möchtest.Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identität über andere Personen oder Unternehmen nachzuweisen. Wir haben einige Tipps gesammelt, um deine Identität zu schützen.Du kannst uns deinen Ausweis mit zwei verschiedenen Methoden zeigen: Foto oder Video. Welches der beiden Verfahren gewählt wird, hängt von deiner Nationalität, deinem Ausweisdokument und dem Land deines Wohnsitzes ab:Ich lebe in Deutschland (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Spanien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in Italien (neuen Tab)Ich lebe in einem anderen Land (neuen Tab)Als voll lizenzierte und regulierte Bank muss sich N26 bei der Verifizierung der Identität aller potenziellen Kunden an strenge Branchenstandards und Richtlinien halten. Da diese je nach Nationalität variieren, können wir den wichtigen Schritt der Identitätsprüfung nur mit bestimmten Arten von Ausweisdokumenten für bestimmte Nationalitäten durchführen.Wenn deine Ausweisdokumente derzeit nicht von uns akzeptiert werden, heißt das, dass wir dir aktuell kein Konto bei uns anbieten können. Wir fügen jedoch laufend neue Ausweisdokumente zu dieser Liste hinzu. Es lohnt sich also, regelmäßig einen Blick darauf zu werfen, ob dein Ausweisdokument bereits hinzugefügt wurde.Falls dein Wohnsitz in Deutschland liegt und du die Foto- oder Videoverifizierung aufgrund einer Behinderung nicht abschließen kannst, beginne bitte mit der Registrierung deiner Daten und kontaktiere dann unseren Kundensupport. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Du erreichst uns im Chat täglich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

question: How to invite friends to join N26?
answer: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
answer: ℹ️ Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when considering N26 Metal (new tab):If you’re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Perché c'è una lista d'attesa per aprire un conto?
answer: Per solidificare ancora di più le fondamenta della nostra attività in futuro, ci stiamo concentrando su come migliorare ancora di più l'esperienza di servizio con noi, le offerte e i processi, per continuare ad essere la tua prima scelta negli anni a venire. A causa della richiesta esponenziale di prodotti bancari digitali N26, dovremo mettere dei limiti temporanei al numero di nuovi conti bancari che possiamo offrire ogni mese.  Per questo motivo abbiamo dovuto temporaneamente mettere in pausa la possibilità di aprire un conto per i nuovi clienti in alcuni mercati. Ti invitiamo ad iscriverti alla nostra lista d'attesa e ti ricontatteremo non appena potremo offrirti il conto che desideri.Questa pausa avrà un impatto sui clienti esistenti?Questa pausa temporanea per l'apertura di nuovi conti non inciderà in alcun modo sui clienti N26 esistenti e puoi aspettarti la stessa esperienza di banking digitale fluida, protetta e sicura sullo smartphone che conosci e ami di sempre.Stiamo lavorando sodo per rendere la procedura quanto più semplice possibile per chi cerca di aprire un conto e speriamo di poter dare la possibilità d'iscriversi a tutti i clienti interessati molto presto.Come saprò quando avrò di nuovo la possibilità di aprire un conto?Se hai provato ad aprire un conto ma non sei riuscito a farlo, il miglior modo per rimanere aggiornato è iscriversi alla nostra lista d’attesa. Ti ricontatteremo non appena potremo metterti disposizione il conto che desideri.Continuiamo a vedere una domanda enorme per il nostro prodotto e vogliamo assicurarci di poter offrire a tutti i clienti sulla nostra lista d'attesa un accesso equo all'esperienza bancaria N26 contattandoli in base al principio "primo arrivato, primo servito" non appena possiamo offrire di nuovo un conto. Posso aprire un conto N26 nel mio paese?

question: Warum sind einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen für mich nicht verfügbar?
answer: Wir arbeiten mit vielen Partnern zusammen. Bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen setzen voraus, dass du auch deren Anforderungen erfüllst. Die häufigsten Gründe, warum du für bestimmte Produkte nicht in Frage kommst:Abgelaufene oder nicht unterstützte Ausweispapiere (z. B. bestimmte Pässe, denen Sicherheitsmerkmale fehlen).Du bist in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig. In diesem Fall kannst du bestimmte Anlage- oder Sparprodukte nicht nutzen. Wenn dies nicht der Fall ist, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat, damit wir deine Kontodaten einsehen können. Möglicherweise musst du deine Telefonnummer wechseln, wenn sie mit einer nordamerikanischen Vorwahl beginnt (+1).

question: How to block my N26 card?
answer: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to the Cards tab and select Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive. Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What’s a “banking day”?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn’t arrived — where is it?So what if you’ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn’t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can’t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: ¿Cómo mantener seguros mis datos bancarios online?
answer:
Ya sea para comprar, utilizar servicios bancarios o administrar tu bandeja de entrada, estos consejos te ayudarán a que tú y tus datos estéis protegidos en el ciberespacio.Mantén actualizada la app de N26 y el sistema operativo del móvil con las últimas correcciones de fallos.Utiliza el escáner de huellas digitales o el reconocimiento facial para iniciar sesión.
Crea contraseñas seguras con letras, números y símbolos, y nunca utilices la misma para varias cuentas.Nunca publiques datos personales sensibles online o en las redes sociales.Ten cuidado con las redes wifi públicas o compartidas; elige siempre conexiones seguras WPA2 en lugar de las conexiones WEP y utiliza una VPN siempre que puedas.Elige proveedores de email con filtros de seguridad y spam, además de autenticación de doble factor, como Gmail y Yahoo!Mucho ojo con las ofertas demasiado buenas para ser reales: probablemente no lo sean.Compra solo en sitios web de confianza o vendedores de prestigio.Comprueba que los sitios web sean seguros: busca el candado junto a la URL y examina las credenciales haciendo clic en él.Permite la ubicación en tu app de N26 para que podamos detectar las transacciones irregulares que puede que no hayas realizado.Si crees que te pueden haber robado los datos de la cuenta o la tarjeta, cambia la contraseña y consulta nuestro artículo sobre ¿Qué hacer si mi cuenta pudiera verse comprometida?

question: Qual è il tasso di cambio che applicate?
answer:
Quando utilizzi la carta N26 per effettuare transazioni in valuta estera, verranno applicati i tassi di cambio di Mastercard all'intero importo di acquisto.Buone notizie: N26 non addebita alcun costo aggiuntivo per le transazioni in valuta estera!Puoi controllare le tariffe di Mastercard qui: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (nuova tabella)
Potrai anche controllare il tasso di valuta applicato a una transazione già effettuata sull’app N26 e sul sito web tramite i dettagli del pagamento, dalla lista delle transazioni.
Ricorda che i tassi di cambio sono dinamici e cambiano continuamente. Per questo, il valore di una transazione può cambiare fino a quando l'importo finale dell'acquisto non viene addebitato.

question: Wie bestelle ich eine Maestro Card?
answer: Gilt für Deutschland, Österreich und die NiederlandeDu benötigst unsere deutschen, österreichischen oder niederländischen AGB um zusätzlich zu deiner N26 Mastercard auch eine Maestro Karte bestellen. Logge dich in dein Konto ein und gehe zu:KartenTippe auf: Zusätzliche Karte erhalten Tippe auf: MaestroTippe dann auf: Auswählen. Die Maestro-Karte ist für Kunden von N26 Smart, N26 You und N26 Metal kostenlos, während sie für Kunden von N26 Standard einmalig 10€ kostet. Maestro ist wie Mastercard ein weit verbreitetes Zahlungssystem, durch das du mit einer entsprechenden Maestro Card in Geschäften bezahlen kannst. Sowohl unsere Mastercard als auch unsere Maestro-Karten sind Debitkarten.Mehr zum Thema Lieferzeiträume erfährst du hier.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: ¿Cómo pasar a N26 You?
answer: Disponible en España, Alemania, Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los Países Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia. Si tienes una cuenta en N26, puedes pasarte a N26 You desde la aplicación: desliza hacia la izquierda hasta llegar a la pestaña Explorar y después N26 You.Hay 5 colores nuevos entre los que elegir para pedir tu tarjeta: aguamarina, pomelo, arena, grafito y océano.Después de elegir tu forma de envío y de aceptar los Términos y Condiciones (pestaña nueva) y una vez hecho esto, tu nueva tarjeta estará en camino.El envío estándar tarda hasta 10 días hábiles, mientras que el envío express tarda 3 días hábiles.La cuota de la membresía es de 9,90 € al mes y la cargaremos directamente a tu cuenta cada mes en el día que realizaste el cambio de cuenta.Puedes pedir una segunda tarjeta N26 You y asociarla a tu cuenta a través de la app de N26, pagando solo una cuota de 10€.¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 € por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Infórmate más sobre nuestro programa Invita a un amigo.

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can’t cover a direct debit* when it’s due, it’ll bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It’s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you’re eligible for an Overdraft directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is €9.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab). If you’d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We’ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we’ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I’ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe. What if I’ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one. Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Warum ist meine SEPA Überweisung fehlgeschlagen?
answer: Um eine Überweisung zu erhalten, musst du dem Absender deinen vollständigen Namen (so, wie er auf dem von dir zur Verifizierung bereitgestellten Ausweisdokument steht) und deine IBAN angeben. Deine IBAN findest du in deinen Kontoauszügen und in 👤 Mein Konto (in der mobilen App oder der Web-App (neuen Tab)).Der Name des Empfängers auf dem Überweisungsauftrag unterscheidet sich von dem Namen auf seinem Konto (der Name muss auf seinem Ausweisdokument stehen).Der Name des Empfängers ist ein Firmenname und nicht ein persönlicher bzw. Kontoname (gilt für N26 Business).Die IBAN ist falsch.Du erhältst keine Push-Nachricht zur Bestätigung deiner Überweisung.Es wurde ein unzulässiger Verwendungszweck festgestellt. N26 ist dazu verpflichtet, routinemäßige Transaktionsprüfungen durchzuführen (siehe § 10 GwG (neuen Tab)). Infolgedessen können wir Unterlagen zur Überprüfung des Ursprungs oder der Herkunft dieser Transaktionen anfordern. Das kann dazu führen, dass die Gutschrift verzögert oder nicht stattfindet.Unterstützte eingehende ÜberweisungenSEPA-ÜberweisungenSEPA-EchtzeitüberweisungenÜberweisungen in Fremdwährungen mit WiseSWIFT-ÜberweisungenUnterstützte ausgehende ÜberweisungenSEPA-ÜberweisungenSEPA-EchtzeitüberweisungenÜberweisungen in Fremdwährungen mit WiseBitte beachte die geschätzten Zeitrahmen für die verschiedenen Überweisungsarten.

question: How does N26 Business Metal work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs €16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate. Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app. Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It’s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Comment créer et modifier un virement permanent ?
answer: Lorsque vous effectuez un virement sortant depuis l'application mobile N26 ou depuis votre espace client en ligne, vous avez la possibilité d'en faire un virement permanent.Après avoir entré les informations nécessaires pour effectuer votre virement et avant de le valider, vous avez la possibilité de cocher la case "Virement permanent ?".Vous pourrez alors choisir la fréquence ainsi que l’intervalle de temps pendant lequel vous souhaitez effectuer votre virement permanent.Pour visualiser vos virements déjà planifiés dans l'application mobile N26 :Accédez à votre liste de transactions sur l'écran principal.Cliquez sur les trois traits en haut à droite de votre écran et sélectionnez Virements Permanents.Vous aurez alors accès à tous les détails de vos virements permanents.Vous pouvez également annuler et/ou modifier les détails de vos virements permanents. Pour annuler un virement permanent, il vous suffit de cliquer sur le virement concerné puis sur l’icône ‘corbeille’ en haut à droite de votre écran.ℹ️ Veuillez noter qu'en cas d'échec d'un virement permanent en raison de fonds insuffisants, nous ne tenterons pas d’effectuer à nouveau le virement - vous devrez le faire manuellement. Cependant, les prochains virements permanents prévus seront traités normalement.

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (“PSD2”) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you’ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them. *applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: Warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
answer: Wir bieten dir Banking in Echtzeit. Das bedeutet, dass du immer siehst, was in deinem Konto passiert. Es gibt zwei Transaktionsarten, die bei einem Kauf in einem Geschäft oder im Internet stattfinden:Autorisierungen: Ein Betrag, der von einem Einzelhändler oder Verkäufer blockiert oder reserviert wird. Das kann alles Mögliche sein – von der morgendlichen Tasse Kaffee bis hin zu Hotel- oder Mietwagenbuchungen (einschließlich Kautionen).Buchungen: Der tatsächliche Betrag, der von deinem Konto abgeht. Die Tasse Kaffee wurde endgültig von deinem Konto abgebucht, du hast deine Kaution nach dem Auschecken im Hotel zurückerhalten oder das Auto unversehrt zurückgegeben.Sobald eine Autorisierung bestätigt wird, können wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder rückgängig machen. Danach passiert eins dieser drei Dinge: Die Autorisierung wird zu einer Buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verfällt (und kehrt nach spätestens 12 Tagen automatisch auf dein Konto zurück. Bei Kautionen für Autovermietungen kann es bis zu 30 Werktage dauern.) Bitte beachte:Manchmal siehst du sowohl die Autorisierung als auch die endgültige Buchung, wenn es am Zahlungsterminal technische Probleme gibt oder die Verbindung während des Vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. Aber keine Sorge – am Ende erlischt die Autorisierung. Wenn das nach 12 Tagen noch nicht passiert ist, helfen wir dir dabei, dein Geld zurückzubekommen (neuen Tab).Autorisierungen für Verifizierungen sind in der Regel sehr kleine Beträge, mit denen geprüft wird, ob deine Karte aktiv ist (z.B. im Google Play Store). Dieses Geld wird auf dein Konto zurücküberwiesen.Die Höhe einer Autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen Gründen (neuen Tab) von der endgültigen Buchung abweichen.

question: Why do I need to send additional documents?
answer: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS → Certificates → "Request for yourself" → flag "of Residence" → "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" → and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description. Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

question: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around €2. For the time being, we’re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here’s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use: AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could’ve been charged an ATM fee.

question: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
answer: If you go to an ATM that does not dispense the money you attempted to withdraw or you forgot to retrieve your dispensed cash and the amount is still deducted from your account, it is more than likely that the amount deducted from your balance is only an authorization. This means that the amount is blocked or reserved to be debited by the merchant and once the merchant debits the amount this is called a settlement of the transaction.If your transaction was not successful the authorization normally expires within a matter of hours - or a maximum of 12 working days - and is then automatically credited to your account again (You can see whether a transaction has been settled when it appears on your downloadable monthly statement, not only in your transaction list in the app). This means that if the amount appears on your monthly statement and/or hasn’t been credited back to your account after 12 working days, you can file a chargeback with us.In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row. You can also check the following steps, incase there is another reason you did not receive the money from the ATM:Check your card limits in your card settings and make sure ATM withdrawals are active.Make sure that you personal limits are set higher than the amount you want to withdraw.Please be aware that you can only withdraw as many funds as you have deposited on your account. Otherwise, if you don’t have an overdraft, the withdrawal will be rejected.The fixed maximum daily (24 hours rolling) withdrawal amount is 1000€, and the fixed weekly withdrawal limit per week is 2500€. Some ATMs have their own limits in place, so it can happen that you can’t withdraw your daily limit at once.

question: Todesfall & Verlassenschaft
answer:
Wie wird N26 über einen Todesfall informiert? Im Trauerfall müssen sich die Nachkommen mit vielen bürokratischen Aufgaben auseinandersetzen. Eine davon ist die Abwicklung der Bankkonten des oder der Verstorbenen.In Österreich wird in der Regel ein Notar als Gerichtskommissär bestellt. Der Kommissär oder die Kommissärin erreicht uns postalisch, per Fax oder per E-Mail. (Bitte mit Scan oder PDF eines entsprechenden Anschreibens im Anhang):E-Mail: verlassenschaft@n26.com Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank GmbH - Nachlassbearbeitung 
Rungestraße 22 
10179 Berlin, GERMANYWenn möglich, bitten wir um eine Sterbeurkunde oder ein vergleichbares Dokument, da wir nur so ein zugehöriges Bankkonto sicher identifizieren können. Was passiert mit einem N26-Konto, wenn der Kontoinhaber stirbt?  Aufgrund regionaler Unterschiede kann die Vorgehensweise je nach Land variieren.Sobald wir vom Tod eines Kunden erfahren, werden die zugehörigen Karten und das Online-Banking sowie jeglicher Zugang zur App gesperrt.Bitte beachte, dass Daueraufträge oder SEPA-Lastschriftmandate auf dem Konto in der Regel auch nach dem Tod des Kontoinhabers weiter bestehen. Erben oder Berechtigte müssen diese widerrufen oder löschen lassen.Darüber hinaus sind alle deutschen Banken grundsätzlich gesetzlich verpflichtet, das in Deutschland für die Erbschaftsteuer zuständige Finanzamt über das zum Nachlass gehörende Vermögen zu informieren.Wir teilen den Begünstigten in jedem Fall mit, welche Unterlagen sie vorlegen müssen, um das Konto des Verstorbenen bei N26 schließen und Guthaben überweisen zu können. Ich bin Kunde, kann ich für den Fall meines Todes vorsorgen? 
Es gibt verschiedene Möglichkeiten, wie du sicherstellen kannst, dass dein Vermögen im Todesfall nach deinen Wünschen verteilt wird. Das Testament ist eine der gängigsten Möglichkeiten.Es ist jedem, der sich intensiver mit der Erstellung eines Testaments beschäftigt, dringend anzuraten, sich von einem Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater beraten zu lassen. Dies gilt insbesondere, wenn größere Vermögenswerte vererbt werden sollen. Unser Kundenservice oder die Experten unserer Nachlass- und Rechtsabteilung können dir hierzu jedoch keine Beratung anbieten. Für nähere Informationen zu deiner konkreten Situation wende dich bitte an einen Rechtsanwalt, Notar oder Steuerberater oder an eine andere geeignete Beratungsstelle.

question: Comment fonctionnent les paiements sans contact ?
answer: Les paiements sans contact de votre carte fonctionnent via une antenne NFC (communication en champ proche). Si vous rencontrez des problèmes avec vos paiements sans contact, voici quelques solutions :Vérifiez si les paiements sans contact sont autorisés dans les paramètres de votre carte.Si votre carte est nouvelle, veuillez retirer de l’argent au distributeur automatique de billets ou effectuer un paiement en tapant votre code PIN. Ensuite, vous pourrez effectuer des paiements sans contact.Les paiements sans contact de votre carte (NFC) de moins de 50 € peuvent être effectués sans code PIN. Pour les paiements de plus de 50 € ou des transactions cumulées supérieures à 150 € vous devez saisir le code PIN de votre carte.Demandez au commerçant si le terminal est compatible avec les paiements sans contact.Les cartes N26 Metal ont leur antenne NFC au verso de la carte. Veuillez vous assurer de présenter le verso de la carte devant le terminal pour utiliser l’antenne NFC (en utilisant le recto, cela ne fonctionnera pas).Vérifiez que vous présentez votre carte directement du côté compatible avec l’antenne NFC face au terminal de paiement. Si vous retirez votre carte trop vite ou si vous ne la présentez pas assez proche du terminal, réessayez.Si le paiement sans contact ne fonctionne pas, veuillez toujours insérer votre carte et taper votre code PIN pour finaliser le paiement.

question: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
answer:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way. How does it work? The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide? Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of Attorney Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a person’s identity, and it’s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework. As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means. Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

question: Wie überweise ich in Fremdwährungen?
answer: Wir arbeiten mit Wise zusammen, um einfache Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen (neuen Tab) zu ermöglichen. Wise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte Gebühren.Um eine Überweisung mit Wise durchzuführen, logge dich zunächst in deiner mobilen App ein:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.Wähle Auslandsüberweisung.Füge einen neuen Empfänger hinzu oder wähle einen bestehenden Kontakt aus. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzufügst, kannst du die gewünschte Währung auswählen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. Gib den Betrag und die Bankverbindung des Empfängers an.Schließe die Überweisung mit deiner Bestätigungs-PIN ab.Wenn wir deine gewünschte Währung noch nicht anbieten, besuche bitte die Wise Website (neuen Tab)für eine noch größere Auswahl. Du kannst dich mit deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse einloggen, indem du auf Passwort vergessen? klickst. Du wirst eine E-Mail von Wise erhalten, mit der du dein Passwort erstellen kannst. Damit kannst du dich einloggen und die Überweisung abschließen. Bitte beachte, dass du zuerst dein Wise-Konto mithilfe der N26 App erstellen musst, indem du versuchst, den Anweisungen in der N26 App für Fremdwährungsüberweisungen zu folgen. Andernfalls wirst du nicht die E-Mail von Wise für die Zurücksetzung deines Passworts erhalten.Bitte beachte auch, dass mit dem N26 Business, Business You und N26 Business Metal Konto in der App weder Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen, noch Überweisungen an Unternehmen möglich sind.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Wise unterstützt Überweisungen nur in der Hauptwährung eines Landes. Das bedeutet zum Beispiel, dass nach Indien keine USD-Transaktionen ausgeführt werden können.

question: Come utilizzare MoneyBeam?
