answer: Grazie a MoneyBeam, puoi inviare denaro ai tuoi contatti in tempo reale senza dover inserire le loro coordinate bancarie. Puoi anche richiedere un MoneyBeam ai tuoi contatti per ricevere del denaro. Per utilizzare MoneyBeam, tu e i tuoi contatti dovete essere visibili come utenti di N26.Per inviare un MoneyBeam:Vai su Inviare denaro > MoneyBeamSeleziona un contatto dalla tua lista o aggiungine uno inserendo il suo numero di telefono e il suo indirizzo emailInserisci un importo e una causaleImmetti il tuo PIN di conferma e conferma il messaggio push che riceverai Per richiedere un MoneyBeam:Vai su Ricevere denaro > Richiedere MoneyBeamSeleziona un contatto dalla tua lista o aggiungine uno inserendo il suo numero di telefono e il suo indirizzo emailInserisci un importo e una causaleNon appena il contatto confermerà la tua richiesta, riceverai l'importo richiestoIl limite per MoneyBeams è di € 1000 per transazione e di € 5000 ogni 24 ore.Aggiungi una GIF come riferimento aggiuntivo:Puoi inviare GIF quando utilizzi MoneyBeam. Una volta che il MoneyBeam è completato, il beneficiario potrà vedere nella schermata Home un’emoji come prefisso sul bonifico ricevuto, indicando così che al bonifico è stata allegata una GIF. Il beneficiario potrà visualizzare la GIF nei dettagli del bonifico insieme al testo di riferimento.Le GIF ti vengono fornite direttamente da Giphy, Inc. e non da N26. Ti preghiamo di notare che Giphy è un'azienda con sede negli Stati Uniti che può trattare i tuoi dati personali. Puoi trovare informazioni su come Giphy tratta i tuoi dati personali quando alleghi e invii GIF nell'Informativa sulla privacy di Giphy (nuova tabella).  Per inviare un MoneyBeam con una GIF:Seleziona Invia denaro e poi MoneyBeam.Seleziona un contatto dalla tua lista o aggiungilo inserendo il suo numero di telefono e l'indirizzo email.Inserisci un importo e un riferimento.Seleziona Allega GIF e cerca o scorri la GIF che vuoi allegare.Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma e conferma la notifica (push) che riceverai.

question: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
answer: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in 👤 My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

question: Wie behalte ich meine täglichen Ausgaben im Blick?
answer: Wir sortieren deine Transaktionen automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Insights an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen über Einzelhändler und Zahlungsgründe, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach ändern, indem du die Transaktion auswählst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste auswählst.Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags für Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#Bücher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugefügt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzufügst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzufügen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerwünschte Tags zu entfernen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you’ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don’t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you’ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.ℹ️  Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Wie schützt N26 mein Geld?
answer: Gesetzliche EinlagensicherungDie  (neuen Tab)Entschädigungseinsrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH (neuen Tab) schützt alle Einlagen bis zu 100.000 € in den Mitgliedsstaaten der Europäischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz ist N26 gesetzlich verpflichtet, Mitglied einer Einlagensicherung zu sein. N26 ist Mitglied der Entschädigungseinrichtung deutscher Banken GmbH.Wie erkennt und überwacht N26 Betrugsversuche?N26 verfügt über ein Spezialteam, das sich auf die Überwachung und Identifizierung verdächtiger Transaktionen auf unserer Plattform konzentriert. Mithilfe fortschrittlicher statistischer Modelle und Algorithmen sowie Verhaltensanalyse sorgt unser Team dafür, dass dein Geld stets in sicheren Händen ist.Was unternimmt N26, wenn betrügerisches Verhalten bei einem Kunden festgestellt wird?Wenn unser Expertenteam Unregelmäßigkeiten aufdeckt, ergreifen wir alle gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen Maßnahmen zur Schadensbegrenzung. Dazu zählen mitunter die Schließung der Konten und die Meldung derselben an die Behörden. Falls verdächtige Transaktionen auf Geldwäsche, Terrorismusfinanzierung oder eine andere Straftat hinweisen, meldet N26 diese Aktivitäten unverzüglich der deutschen Zentralstelle für Finanztransaktionsuntersuchungen (“Financial Transaction Investigation Unit”; FIU) oder lokalen Aufsichtsbehörden.Wie hat N26 in die Sicherheit der Bank investiert?Ende 2019 haben wir unser Trust-and-Safety-Team zusammengestellt. Dessen Mitglieder sind im Bereich der IT-Sicherheit tätig und für den Schutz der Nutzer sowie deren Daten gegen Cyberkriminalität verantwortlich. Darüber hinaus hat N26 die Größe des eigenen AML-Teams und der Einheit für Finanzkriminalität verdoppelt sowie Transaktionsüberwachungsprozesse und -plattformen etabliert. Diese Maßnahmen ermöglichen es uns, schädliche Aktivitäten auf Grundlage historischer Daten aufzudecken und zu verhindern. So können wir Kriminellen immer einige Schritte voraus sein. Wir investieren stark in Technologie und KI. Neben Verhaltensanalyse setzen wir auch auf fortschrittliche statistische Modelle und Algorithmen.

question: Why isn't my video verification working?
answer: Tips for a successful video verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of our supported countries to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver’s licenses or residence permits can’t be used). Also, the document shouldn’t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'll need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery of your card. Please note that this is not a fee: your first card after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. Deliveries take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It’s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you’ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant’s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‘Shared Spaces’ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‘Shared Space’.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‘Shared Space’, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‘owner’ or the person who created the ‘Shared Space’ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‘visible’ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner’s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‘Shared Spaces’ add participant flow.You’ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up … Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‘learn more’ information and tap the ‘invite new member’ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the “legal screen” so be sure to read all the information within the ‘Grant Power of Attorney’ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C’s then tap ‘Grant Power of Attorney’ button.Tap ‘Send invite’ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‘send invite’ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‘Participants’ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant’s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‘revoke power of attorney’.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‘revoke power of attorney’.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: Wie kann ich meinen Kredit vorzeitig zurückzahlen?
answer: Du kannst dein N26 Credit Darlehen immer vorzeitig zurückzahlen. Beachte, dass eine Vorfälligkeitsentschädigung von bis zu 1 % anfällt. Wenn deine verbleibende Kreditlaufzeit weniger als 12 Monate beträgt, liegt die Entschädigung bei bis zu 0,5 % des vorzeitig zurückgezahlten Betrages.Kontaktiere uns per Chat, um eine vorzeitige Rückzahlung zu beantragen; wir werden dir eine genaue Berechnung der Vorfälligkeitsentschädigung zukommen lassen.*Dies gilt nur für Darlehen mit N26. Für auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) oder Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99), kontaktiere den jeweiligen Partner bitte direkt.

question: ¿Cómo puedo cambiar mi número de teléfono?
answer: Mantener tu número de teléfono actualizado es esencial porque lo necesitas para vincular tu móvil o para enviar y recibir transferencias inmediatas por MoneyBeam (pestaña nueva). Puedes actualizarlo directamente desde la app N26:Ve a 👤  Mi Cuenta > Información personal > Datos personalesEso sí, este cambio mediante el proceso automático solo es posible desde tu móvil vinculado y con autenticación biométrica (por reconocimiento facial o huella dactilar).

question: How can I prevent fraud via SMS?
answer: Did you get a text message followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt.How does the scam work?You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one https://app.n26.com/login (new tab)The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App > My Account > Settings > Security > Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,  send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comDo I need to confirm a transaction to be able to receive a refund?Absolutely not! We would never instruct you to authorise a transaction that you did not initiate. Never confirm transactions if you do not recognise a recipient's name or IBAN in the case of debit transfers; an email or phone number in the case of a MoneyBeam payment; and a merchant's name in the case of a card transaction.How to recognise N26 official communications?We will never send you links via SMS: never trust an SMS from us that contains a link! N26 usually sends verification codes via "AUTHMSG"; these codes will always originate from this sender. These codes are used to access the App or to associate the device with the account. Never share your OTP (One Time Password) codes with anyone!Our primary means of communication are live chat, email and our premium customer phone line.We do not call our customers, unless (in very specific cases) a call has been requested by a customer themselves.Therefore, if after clicking on a link, you’re informed that you will be contacted shortly by an N26 agent due to an unsuccessful operation, be wary of impending phone calls!How do scammers find out my personal information?In today’s day and age, it’s likely that your personal data is publicly available online. Think social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. It’s often the case that sensitive data is left unsecured. Scammers exploit people's vulnerability by collecting information and using it to their advantage.

question: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich Daueraufträge?
answer: Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine Überweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.Bevor du die Überweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein Häkchen bei einer Box setzen, um die Überweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. Zunächst gibst du den Empfänger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im nächsten Schritt das Häkchen bei: “Als Dauerauftrag merken?”. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall für deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.So kannst du deine bestehenden Daueraufträge in der App sehen und verwalten:Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte über deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.Ein blaues Fenster öffnet sich, in dem du "Daueraufträge" auswählen kannst.Hier kannst du deine Daueraufträge löschen oder verändern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu löschen, tippe auf den gewünschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.ℹ️ Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgeführt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszuführen. Du kannst die Überweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der nächste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it—you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you’ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‘Cards’ from the bottom right-handTap ‘Card Settings’ and select the relevant cardSelect ‘Reset PIN’Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you’ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction—in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences—such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn’t accepted, simply try again a different combination. If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you’ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren’t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you’re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: Can I keep using my card after it has expired?
answer: No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benötigen
answer:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gemäß des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen Behörden in der Europäischen Union Informationen über Kundenkonten zur Verfügung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen Ländern steuerpflichtig sind.Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard für den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur Bekämpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen Behörden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher Vermögenswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 Länder haben sich erklärt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner über ihre Vermögenswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.Damit wir feststellen können, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen Behörden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, müssen wir dich fragen:In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen Ländern hast, greifen für gewöhnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden Länder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren Ländern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, müssen wir wissen, um welche Länder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen Behörden zuverlässige Informationen zur Verfügung stellen können.
Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (“TIN”) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den Ländern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung (neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten veröffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen Ländern identifizieren kannst.Falls sich deine Lebenslage verändert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich dafür einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Persönliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

question: When will my card arrive?
answer: Standard delivery takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge if it's your first card after opening the account (except for N26 Standard*) or upgrading to a premium membership. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up to date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.Express delivery takes up to 3 working days. In addition to the banner on the home screen of your N26 mobile app, you will also receive an email with a tracking link to check the progress of your card delivery. Learn more in our dedicated article about express delivery.Please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed before taking further action. Your first card after opening the account or upgrading to a premium membership is always free. For the following ones, a replacement fee may apply.How to make sure my card is on it's way?You need to verify your identity when opening an N26 account. Please be sure you have completed this process by logging into your account. Once this process is complete your account is activated and in order to receive your card, you will need to top up your account. The amount you need to top up your account (new tab) by is dependent on your membership type (e.g. Standard, N26 You etc.). You can see more details in number 3 below.Check your shipping details. In case your details are incorrect, please update them directly (new tab) in the mobile app: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping Address.It must be a residential address (businesses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox. If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the 'additional info' in your mobile app.Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, floor number and door code to the 'additional address info' in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you're moving soon please consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you'll move to.If it is your very first N26 card, please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app. If you had an activated card before, please reorder it directly in the app.3. Your first N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal card is free of charge. For N26 Standard it will be a free virtual card (unless you decide to order a physical one for 10€). Your card is produced and shipped if your account balance remains at or above 0€ after the first monthly fee was charged. The first premium membership fee is charged immediately when upgrading. If you sign up for a premium membership, the first fee will be charged after you topped up your account to cover the fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. If the first fee was charged and you have a negative account balance, you must top up your account in order to trigger the production and shipment of your card.You will be notified in the app via Messages and through a banner on the home screen that will show you the delivery progress. Please note:The one-time minimum balance is not a fee but a necessary requirement to trigger the production and delivery of your card.For express delivery the fee of 25€ will be deducted from your account as soon as the card is shipped. Please make sure that your account balance covers these fees.How to use my card before it physically arrives?Before the card arrives in the mail you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants who support this payment method. You can learn more about how to use your card digitally.Why didn't I receive my card within the estimated timeframe?Simply double-check the estimated delivery date in the home screen of the N26 app or web app. If the estimated delivery date has been exceeded, please contact us via live chat from within the app or web app (new tab).

question: Kann N26 mein Konto schließen?
answer: Kurz gesagt: ja.Wir können dein Konto auf drei Arten schließen (mit einer Kündigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese Kündigungen sind endgültig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen über den Hintergrund einzelner Kündigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht rückgängig machen. Du kannst deine Geschäftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von Gründen, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden Vertragsgebühren müssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.2 Monate KündigungsfristWir sind berechtigt, jede Geschäftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von Gründen zu kündigen (siehe § 19 Abs. 1 unserer AGB (neuen Tab) oder § 675h BGB).14 Tage KündigungsfristWir können jede Geschäftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen kündigen (siehe § 19 Abs. 3 unserer AGB (neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende Gründe hierzu vorliegen. Solche Gründe sind:Nutzung eines Privatkontos für geschäftliche Zwecke Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur für den persönlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle Überweisungen, die sich auf Honorare für erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als Geschäftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto für diesen Zweck nutzen möchtest, eröffne bitte ein N26 Business oder N26 Business You Konto.Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen für eine routinemäßige Hintergrundprüfung. Wir sind eine Bank, deshalb überprüfen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die Geschäftsbeziehung zu kündigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen müssen. -Missbräuchliches Verhalten gegenüber N26-Mitarbeitern. Wir tolerieren kein missbräuchliches Verhalten gegenüber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von Körperverletzung oder allgemeines missbräuchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zuständigen Behörde gemeldet.Fristlose KündigungWir können jede Geschäftsbeziehung auch außerordentlich kündigen (siehe § 19 Abs. 3 unserer AGB (neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne Vorankündigung und ohne Kündigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes für eine solche Kündigung. Solche Gründe sind:Falsche Angaben gegenüber N26 über deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines KreditsDu kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegenüber N26 nicht zurückzahlenNichterfüllung der Forderungen von N26 bezüglich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder Verstärkung von Sicherheiten, § 13 (2) unserer AGB (neuen Tab)).

question: What is a N26 Business Account?
answer: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you can’t have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of €50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional €10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least €10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&C’s, can order a Maestro card for an additional €10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are: ATM withdrawals: €2,500	In-store or online payments: €5,000 The monthly limit for payments is €20,000. You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expenses The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are: MoneyBeam to N26 customers: €1,000Instant transfers: €100,000Outgoing transfers: No limits N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website. Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business Metal ?
answer: Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Irlande, Islande, Islande, Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Norvège, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slovénie et Suède.N26 Business Metal coûte 16,90 € par mois et est conçu pour les auto-entrepreneurs et les indépendants qui exercent leur activité en nom propre. Le nom de votre société ne peut donc pas figurer sur votre compte ou votre carte.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (nouvel onglet): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Pour l’instant, il n’est pas possible de passer d’une offre de compte personnel à un compte Business (ou vice versa). Il est donc important de savoir si le compte N26 Business Metal correspond à vos besoins (nouvel onglet).Le compte N26 Business Metal est conçu spécialement pour les auto-entrepreneurs et non pour les entreprises ou autres personnes morales. Ce compte permet de gérer vos dépenses professionnelles avec un compte bancaire et une carte de débit à votre nom.Le compte a un coût de 16,90 € par mois. Ce compte premium inclut : des garanties d'assurance et d'assistance N26 Business Metal fournies par Allianz, qui couvrent vos voyages professionnels et vos outils de travail, mais ce compte vous permet également de retirer de l’argent en devises étrangères sans frais supplémentaires, aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez.La carte N26 Business Metal est une Mastercard conçue exclusivement pour une utilisation professionnelle. Vous bénéficiez de 0,5 % de cashback sur tous vos achats effectués avec votre carte N26 Business. Le montant du cashback est calculé de façon mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois. Il faut alors compter jusqu’à 7 jours avant que le montant du cashback apparaisse sur votre relevé de compte.N’étant pas possible d’avoir deux compte N26 en même temps, nous vous conseillons de commander une Maestro (disponible en Autriche et en Allemagne) pour vos dépenses privés.Votre compte N26 Business Metal ne vous permet pas d’effectuer de virements en devises étrangères.Pour le moment, les prélèvements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business Metal. Vous pouvez choisir cette offre à l’ouverture de votre compte ou directement depuis votre application si vous êtes déjà client N26 Business*Allianz Global Assistance Europe, dénomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise membre du Groupe Allianz.

question: Ma pièce d'identité n'est pas acceptée et je n'arrive pas à ouvrir un compte N26
answer:
Un établissement bancaire doit vérifier votre identité avant de vous permettre d'ouvrir un compte bancaire. Selon votre pays de résidence et votre nationalité, différentes pièces d'identité peuvent être acceptées dans le cadre de cette procédure de vérification. 
Vous retrouverez ici la liste des pièces d'identité acceptées lors de la procédure de vérification d'identité si vous résidez en France. 
Si vous résidez dans un autre pays que la France, voici la liste des documents d'identité acceptés (nouvel onglet) pour la vérification de votre identité :
Je vis en Allemagne (nouvel onglet) Je vis en Espagne (nouvel onglet) Je vis en Italie (nouvel onglet) Je vis dans un autre pays (nouvel onglet)
Si votre pièce d’identité n'est pas prise en charge, nous ne serons pas en mesure de vous proposer l'ouverture d'un compte bancaire.

question: Bankdaten – Deine N26 Kontobestätigung
answer: Was ist eine Kontobestätigung?Eine Kontobestätigung – auch Bankbescheinigung genannt – ist ein Dokument, das dich als InhaberIn deines Bankkontos ausweist. Auf der Kontobestätigung sind dein Vor- und Zuname, dein Geburtsdatum und deine Bankdaten wie die IBAN und das Datum der Kontoeröffnung zu sehen.Auf Wunsch kann deine Bankbestätigung auch deinen aktuellen Kontostand und die Nummern deiner aktiven Karten auflisten. Aus Sicherheitsgründen werden diese Bankdaten teilweise mit Sternchen verdeckt.Wie beantrage ich meine Kontobestätigung?Klicke in der Web-App auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol* und wähle Bankdaten herunterladen. Eine PDF-Datei wird automatisch erstellt. Wenn du eine Kontobestätigung inklusive deines aktuellen Kontostands und deiner Kartennummer(n) erhalten willst, klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*. Unter Kontobestätigung kannst du auswählen, ob du deinen aktuellen Kontostand und/oder die Kartennummer(n) deiner aktiven Karte(n) mit anzeigen lassen willst. Klicke dann auf Anfrage. Die PDF wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden unter Nachrichten von N26 (neuen Tab) in deiner App erscheinen.* Das Download-Symbol ist das Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil, links neben dem ‘Button “Geld erhalten”.

question: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (including CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.There’s always a €2 fee if you use your Maestro card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2€. Check our pricing lists if you’ve been charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: Was sind Echtzeit-Überweisungen?
answer: Alle N26 Kunden haben nun die Möglichkeit, Echtzeit-Überweisungen zu verwenden. Im Gegensatz zu den üblichen SEPA-Überweisungen, die innerhalb von zwei Werktagen bearbeitet werden, werden Echtzeit-Überweisungen innerhalb von Sekunden übermittelt und empfangen.Eine Echtzeit-Überweisungen kann von Vorteil sein, wenn du eine dringende Überweisung tätigen musst (sie dauert etwa 10 Sekunden). Für unsere Standardkunden, die Echtzeit-Überweisungen nutzen, fällt jedoch eine Gebühr an, die vor der Bestätigung der Überweisung angezeigt wird. Wenn die Überweisung also bis zu 2 Tage warten kann, dann ist eine normale SEPA-Überweisung wahrscheinlich besser geeignet. Für unsere Premiumkunden ist die Echtzeit-Überweisungen gebührenfrei.Obwohl diese Überweisungen in Echtzeit durchgeführt werden, können sie sich aufgrund von Bearbeitungszeiten, Embargos usw. verzögern (genau wie reguläre Überweisungen). Bei wichtigen Zahlungen, wie z. B. Einzahlungen oder Anzahlungen sollte man deshalb am besten im Voraus zahlen, um externe finanzielle Verluste aufgrund von Verzögerungen zu vermeiden.Wie funktioniert das?Logge dich in die N26 App ein und tippe auf Geld senden > Banküberweisung.Gib als nächstes den Namen und die IBAN des Empfängers ein sowie ggf. einen Verwendungszweck.Tippe auf Überweisung und wähle zwischen Echtzeitüberweisung und Standardüberweisung.Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein.Bestätige die Überweisung in der App.Die Echtzeitüberweisung wird innerhalb von ca. 10 Sekunden verarbeitet und beim Empfänger eingehen.Bitte beachte: Wenn die Bank des Empfängers nicht am SCT-Echtzeitverfahren teilnimmt, hast du nicht die Möglichkeit, eine Echtzeitüberweisung durchzuführen. Wichtige Informationen:**Für die Nutzung von Echtzeit-Überweisungen wird bei N26 Standard eine Gebühr erhoben. Die Gebühr wird direkt im Anschluss als separate Transaktion verrechnet und die Gebühr fällt je nach Land unterschiedlich aus:Deutschland und Österreich – 0,49 €Spanien – 1,99 €Italien, Frankreich und Rest Europas – 0,99 €Der Höchstbetrag, den du mit per Echtzeit-Überweisungen versenden kannst, beträgt 2.000 € fünfmal pro Tag bei einem Tageshöchstbetrag von 10.000 €.Wenn du eine Echtzeit-Überweisungen für eine wichtige Zahlung (Einzahlung, Bußgeld, Anzahlung) verwenden möchtest, solltest du die Zahlung eventuell im Voraus vornehmen, um eine Verzögerung durch eine mögliche Ablehnung oder Sperrung zu vermeiden.Wenn du Waren oder Dienstleistungen per Echtzeit-Überweisungen bezahlst, achte immer darauf, dass du die Empfängerdaten und -legitimationen überprüfst, bevor du die Transaktion bestätigst. Es empfiehlt sich immer, vor Betrügereien auf der Hut zu sein.Bitte beachte: Derzeit nehmen nicht alle Banken am Echtzeit-Überweisungen teil. Wenn die Empfängerbank nicht daran teilnimmt, hast du nicht die Möglichkeit, deine Überweisung in Echtzeit durchzuführen.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to connect your smartphone to your account. If you didn’t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you’ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it’s likely that you’ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can’t be used for online purchases.

question: Where can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: With your N26 Mastercard you have a certain number of free ATM withdrawals in accordance with our Fair Use Policy. You can also use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) to find ATMs that are free of charge. Withdrawals via CASH26 are always free of charge in participating stores.*For customers in Spain: Some ATM operators in Spain might charge an independent fee of around €2. For the time being, we’re unable to prevent this fee from being charged, but we can help you to get your money back if you contact us via chat directly in the app. In the meantime, here’s a list of all the banks whose ATMs are free to use: AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Find here more reasons why you could’ve been charged an ATM fee.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (“tapping” your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions: Go to Cards. If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you’ve chosen.

question: Why was I charged a Gambling Fee?
answer: The Gambling Fee to the amount of 3% applies to all private customers who registered for an account after March 12, 2020, or who have a Business membership plan (regardless of the date on which said plan took effect).Customers with such a membership plan are charged the Gambling Fee when making use of the services of the following gambling providers:LotteriesSports bettingOnline casinosHorse racingOther gambling activitiesPlease note that this includes both incoming and outgoing applicable Mastercard transactions. The 3% Gambling Fee is charged after the applicable transaction is processed. For example: if you win or convert your remaining chips back to money, the merchant will send the balance in another transaction where the 3% Gambling Fee will be charged again.Good to know:The 3% Gambling Fee appears on your transaction list and balance statement, linked to the original and any subsequent transaction from the gambling merchant.The fee we have charged is related to Mastercard transactions you’ve processed at certain relevant merchants (no matter which country you place the bet) and can’t be refunded. Some of our customers will not have to pay the Gambling Fee, as a result of the ruling of the Federal Court of Justice of Germany (BGH XI ZR 26/20).

question: What are Cards for Spaces?
answer: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds in the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space: You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select ‘Main account’ or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

question: Where is my refund?
answer:
In most cases, your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:On the WebApp (new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.
On the mobile app: If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement. For Androids, you'll find the option under Insights (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).The amounts blocked as a car rental deposit can take up to 30 days to return to your account while a refund of a card payment will be automatically credited to your account within a maximum of 14 days.

question: Come attivare la carta?
answer: Attiva la tua Mastercard N26 direttamente dall'app e inizia subito ad utilizzarla! Dovrai attivare la nuova carta sia che si tratti della tua prima carta N26, di una carta sostitutiva o che tu abbia effettuato il passaggio a una carta N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal.Una volta ricevuta per posta la tua carta, assicurati che il tuo smartphone sia associato al tuo conto, poi:Apri la tua app N26Vai alla sezione "Carte" nel menù in basso e trova la carta che vuoi attivareTocca "Impostazioni" e poi "Attiva"Inserisci il numero di 10 cifre che trovi sulla parte anteriore o posteriore della tua carta e scegli il tuo codice PINPer attivare la carta su N26 Web, seleziona "Attiva carta" dalla schermata principale.Ricorda, per abilitare i pagamenti contactless (NFC) e utilizzare la carta per i tuoi acquisti online, dovrai prima effettuare una transazione con chip e codice PIN presso un negozio o uno sportello ATM.Se ricevi per posta più carte, perché ad esempio la consegna è stata ritardata e ne hai richiesta più di una, puoi attivare solo la carta più recente. Tuttavia, se hai un conto premium e hai richiesto una carta aggiuntiva, potrai comunque attivare quella nuova carta.

question: Pourquoi la vérification de mon identité par photo ne fonctionne pas ?
answer: ℹ️ S'applique à tous les pays sauf à l'AllemagneAvant toute chose, vérifiez que l’option de géolocalisation est bien activée sur votre smartphone. Ensuite voici quelques conseils (nouvel onglet) pour réussir la vérification de votre identité.La plupart du temps la vérification échoue à cause de la qualité des photos.Assurez-vous de réaliser les photographies de vos documents dans un lieu suffisamment éclairé et sur une surface plate pour éviter les reflets. Utilisez un appareil photo de qualité.Si vous utilisez Android, assurez vous de la qualité de l’autofocus.Si vous utilisez Android, vous pouvez activer ou désactiver le flash en fonction de la luminosité ambiante.Prenez une photo de vous-même (un selfie) et de votre document d'identité, en vous assurant que rien ne cache votre visage et en plaçant l’objectif de votre téléphone à la hauteur de vos yeux.Veillez à ce que vous soyez la seule personne à apparaître sur votre selfie et que votre document d'identité soit entièrement visible.Vérifiez vos documentsNous n’acceptons que les photos de l’original de votre document d’identité.Le document d’identité principal que vous devez nous présenter peut être votre passeport ou votre carte d’identité s'ils sont acceptés par nos services.Gardez votre document bien à plat pendant la prise de vue et assurez-vous que toutes les informations sont lisibles.Assurez-vous que votre document n’est pas abimé.Si votre selfie ou les photos de votre document d'identité ne sont pas d’une qualité suffisante, recommencez la procédure de vérification d’identité depuis le début.Dès que la vérification de votre identité est terminée, nous enverrons votre Mastercard N26. En attendant de la recevoir, vous pourrez immédiatement synchroniser votre téléphone avec votre compte.Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 7:00 à 23:00 h.

question: How to upgrade to N26 You?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 You during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of €9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: How to protect my identity?
answer: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

question: What does N26 do with my tax information?
answer: This material has been prepared for informational purposes only, and is not intended to provide, and should not be relied on for, tax, legal or accounting advice.N26 collects your information mainly for two reasons: to satisfy know-your-customer requirements and mandatory reporting to the responsible tax administrations.  Requirement to identify our customers under the so-called Know Your Customer rules As any financial institution, we are required under the applicable tax laws to collect tax relevant information from you to identify you for tax purposes. These mainly include your name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, tax identification number or its equivalent as well as place and date of birth. Please find below general information on the definitions of tax residence and tax identification number. Tax residenceGenerally, an individual will only have one country of residence (residence address). However, an individual may be resident for tax purposes in two or more countries. This is because countries use different criteria (forms of attachment) to determine residence for tax purposes. These criteria may include but not limited to, prolonged physical presence, nationality, ownership of property etc. If there is a tax treaty between the countries, the tie-breaker rules normally contained in such a treaty will allocate tax residence to one of the countries involved. For example, if you have a permanent home in Country A and a temporary residence in Country B, the tie-breaker rules in the tax treaty between Country A and B may stipulate you are a tax resident of Country A where you have a permanent home rather than in Country B where you have a temporary residence (treating “permanent home” as a stronger form of attachment than “temporary residence”). The analysis to determine tax residence is fact based; therefore, if unsure, you need to clarify this with your tax administration and/or tax advisor.Tax identification number Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) is a unique combination of letters or numbers assigned to you by your country of tax residence. TIN identifies you for purposes of administering the tax laws of your country of tax residence. TINs are also useful for identifying taxpayers who invest in other countries. TIN specifications (i.e. number of letters, numbers and their sequence.) are set by each country’s tax administrations. While most countries issue TINs, there are some that do not.  The Automatic Exchange Portal of the OECD (new tab) provides useful information on the TINs (especially, where to find them and their specifications) issued by many countries participating in the automatic exchange of information for tax matters. However, in the case of doubt about your TIN, we recommend consulting your tax advisor or tax administration.Requirement to report tax relevant information of certain customers to the responsible tax authorities As any financial institution, we are required to report tax relevant information to the responsible tax administration on a regular basis. Respective to your IBAN, the receiving tax administration could be that of Germany, Italy, Spain or France. Most notable are the reports under Common Reporting Standard (new tab) (CRS) and Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (new tab) (FATCA). If you are a tax resident in a country that applies CRS and/or in the US, the receiving tax authority exchanges the information received from N26 with your country of tax residence as part of the automatic exchange of information procedures under CRS and FATCA.To enable N26 to meet its reporting obligations, especially those with respect to CRS and FATCA, we need to collect accurate and up-to-date tax relevant information from you (so-called self-certification data). Self-certification data includes name, residence address, country or countries of tax residence, TIN as well as place and date of birth. If you are a tax resident in the US (US Person), you should also provide your US TIN (new tab). Please follow this link (new tab) to find out more about FATCA and what you may need to do to determine whether you are a US Person and therefore, should provide us your US TIN. We are required to conduct regular checks to ensure that your tax relevant information stored in our system is accurate (so-called ongoing due diligence). If the due diligence reveals inaccuracies, we reach out to you to obtain accurate and up-to-date information. Our recommendation Please note we are required, as a last resort, to apply restrictive measures on your account in case we are unable to obtain accurate and up-to-date information for CRS and FATCA purposes described above within the applicable deadlines. We recommend checking and updating your tax relevant information on a regular basis. Please do not forget that not doing so may also have direct implications for you such as the tax administration imposing penalties directly on you. To check and update your information, in your N26 app:Go to My Account > Personal Details > Tax infoClick “Add new tax country”, indicate whether you’re a US Person and follow further instructionsTo add an additional tax country (if you’re tax resident in more than one country), click “Add new tax country” and follow the instructionsRemoving the existing tax country is possible only after you have added a new tax countryImportant informationYou can always check the tax information we've currently on you by going to: My Account > Personal Settings > Tax Info.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfilment of CRS, FATCA and similar requirements.We’re unable to advise you on your tax status. If you’re unsure, please discuss the matter with a tax advisor and/or tax administration.

question: What is the maximum I can spend?
answer: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: €5,000Monthly limit: €20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of €1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of €400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of €2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of €1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: €1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limit Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: €100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: €2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is €200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to €900 in any 24-hour period. There’s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is €50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to €999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: Why isn’t my photo verification working?
answer: ℹ️ Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review the guide (new tab) we’ve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photo verifications fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure you’re the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesn’t go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, we’ll send you your N26 Mastercard. Deliveries take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.

question: Mi tarjeta caduca pronto, ¿qué debo hacer?
answer: Si tu Mastercard de N26 ha caducado o va a caducar próximamente, en este artículo encontrarás toda la información sobre cómo pedir una nueva, los costes asociados y los plazos de envío. Antes de pedir una nueva tarjeta, te recomendamos que compruebes que todos tus datos personales son correctos y están actualizados.Si tu tarjeta caduca pronto, inicia sesión en tu cuenta N26 en la app, ve a la pestaña Tarjetas y busca un banner debajo de la tarjeta correspondiente. Sigue los pasos para confirmar dónde quieres recibir tu tarjeta de sustitución y te la enviaremos. Si no ves ese mensaje, no te preocupes. Seguro que tu tarjeta todavía tiene tiempo de validez, así que cuando llegue el momento adecuado tendrás la opción de confirmar tu dirección.Cuando llegue tu tarjeta, tendrás que activarla antes de poder utilizarla. No olvides destruir tu tarjeta antigua y tirarla siguiendo las normas locales de reciclaje.¿Puedo seguir utilizando mi tarjeta cuando haya caducado?¿Cuánto cuesta obtener una tarjeta de sustitución de mi tarjeta que caduca o ha caducado?Mi tarjeta ya ha caducado, pero no he recibido una nueva

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can’t cover a direct debit* when it’s due, it’ll bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It’s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you’re eligible for an Overdraft directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is €9.

question: How to find my IBAN or account number?
answer: You can find your IBAN and BIC number on your balance statements or in 👤 My Account from the mobile app or WebApp (new tab) (if you haven’t activated your card and need to top up your account).All our IBANs start with DE (Germany ), IT (Italy), or ES (Spain) followed by the check digits (two numbers), then our bank code 10011001 and end with your 10-digit account number (start at 26).You can easily share your information through the share button in 👤 My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the WebApp (new tab) and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of Transactions.Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: What is CASH26?
answer: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 app––no debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-store––it’s that simple. Plus, you don’t have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam’s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is €50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to €999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you’ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately. If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is €200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to €900 in any 24-hour period. There’s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of €2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.

question: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
answer: Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):Germany:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal : 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. You can also withdraw for free using CASH26. Outside of Germany, in the eurozone you receive unlimited free ATM withdrawals in euros.Austria:Free and unlimited ATM withdrawals (including CASH26).Switzerland, Italy, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe:N26 Standard and N26 Business: 3 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 Smart and N26 Business Smart: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy). A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. For withdrawals in currencies other than the euro an exchange rate of 1.7% applies.N26 You and N26 Business You: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal: 8 free ATM withdrawals per month in euros (free and unlimited ATM withdrawals in Italy. A charge of €2 applies to each withdrawal beyond this limit. Free ATM withdrawals in currencies other than the euro.CASH26: If you have Italian, Spanish or Greek T&C's, you can also use CASH26*.There’s always a €2 fee if you use your Maestro card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands). If you have our N26 Flex account every withdrawal costs 2€. Check our pricing lists if you’ve been charged an ATM fee.*N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: Qu’est-ce qu’un message de sécurité en pied de page et pourquoi en avons-nous intégré un ?
answer: Un message de sécurité en pied de page est un message personnalisé ajouté au bas des emails et des documents numériques, qui sert de sceau d’authenticité.En ajoutant votre nom complet au bas de chaque email, notre objectif est de vous aider à distinguer les emails légitimes envoyés par N26 des emails de phishing envoyés par des fraudeurs. Un message de sécurité en pied de page ne peut prouver avec certitude qu’un email provient d’une source vérifiée. Il permet néanmoins de réduire le risque de phishing, le type d’attaque par hameçonnage le plus courant.Qu’est-ce que le phishing ?Le phishing est une pratique illégale qui consiste à envoyer des emails génériques à un grand nombre de personnes inconnues, dans le but d’obtenir des informations confidentielles sous de faux prétextes.Comment y parvenir ? Les fraudeurs contactent leurs cibles en leur faisant croire qu’ils travaillent pour des entreprises connues. Ils leur font ensuite croire qu’ils sont en sécurité grâce à des images de marque, des situations d’urgence et des propos trompeurs. Une fois les cibles appâtées, les fraudeurs essaient de les manipuler pour qu’elles se plient à leurs exigences.Comment vous protéger ?Faites très attention aux emails que vous recevez de banques, de clients, d’employeurs, etc. Si vous êtes invité à faire quelque chose, n’agissez jamais par impulsion, mais réfléchissez bien avant d’agir. Si vous soupçonnez un problème, ne l’ignorez pas. Observez les fautes d’orthographe et de grammaire, survolez les URL cachées (ne cliquez pas dessus), vérifiez les coordonnées de l’expéditeur et faites des recherches. Un contrôle rapide en ligne peut vous aider à vérifier l’identité de l’expéditeur.Si vous avez reçu un email, un appel téléphonique et/ou un SMS suspect au nom de N26, contactez notre Service Client à l’adresse support@n26.com. Pour discuter de problèmes liés à votre compte, veuillez nous contacter par Livechat depuis l’application mobile.En savoir plus sur :Comment signaler des suspicions d’attaques de phishing (nouvel onglet)Comment reconnaître et éviter les attaques de phishing (nouvel onglet)Comment se protéger de l’ingénierie sociale (nouvel onglet)

question: Why do I need to send additional documents?
answer: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements.
