The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: What is my PIN number?
answer:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codes—your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun fact—you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. You’re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab). If you’d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We’ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we’ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I’ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe. What if I’ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one. Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26 (new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Wie kann ich zu N26 You upgraden?
answer:
Verfügbar in Österreich, Belgien, Dänemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Irland, Italy, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Spanien, Schweden.N26 You ist über die Erstanmeldung eines Kontos oder über ein Upgrade in der App verfügbar, wenn du bereits ein Standard-Konto hast. Um dich zu N26 You upgraden, logge dich einfach in die App ein, tippe auf den "Entdecken" am unteren Bildschirmrand und wähle dann "Entdecke N26 You". Du kannst zwischen 5 neuen Farben wählen: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Wähle dann deine bevorzugte Versandmethode aus, akzeptiere die N26 You AGB (neuen Tab) und schon ist deine neue Karte zu dir unterwegs!Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu zehn Werktage, Expresslieferungen drei Werktage.Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 9,90 € wird jeden Monat am Tag des Upgrades direkt von deinem Konto abgebucht.Du kannst eine zusätzlich N26 You Karte für eine einmalige Gebühr von 14€ in deiner N26 App bestellen.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Come posso bloccare la banda magnetica della mia carta?
answer: Ci sono diversi modi per effettuare un pagamento con carta: contactless ("poggiando" la tua carta), tramite chip con PIN e tramite banda magnetica, ovvero, passando la carta nella fessura del lettore. Le transazioni tramite banda magnetica sono sempre meno diffuse, ma alcuni esercenti richiedono ancora questo metodo di pagamento.Perché dovrei bloccare le transazioni con banda magnetica?Un numero piuttosto consistente di transazioni fraudolente avviene proprio strisciando la banda magnetica della carta. Alcuni esercenti dispongono di sistemi illegali per copiare le informazioni della tua carta, che poi usano per effettuare transazioni fraudolente. Questo processo è noto come "skimming". Bloccando le transazioni tramite banda magnetica puoi proteggerti da un simile rischio.Come faccio a bloccare/sbloccare le transazioni tramite banda magnetica?Per bloccare le transazioni tramite banda magnetica: Vai su Carte. Se possiedi più carte, scorri verso destra finché non compare la carta interessata.Vai su Impostazioni carta.Vai su banda magnetica.Disattiva Attiva banda magnetica.Qui puoi anche riabilitare l'uso della banda magnetica. Le modifiche vengono applicate istantaneamente per la carta selezionata.

question: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
answer: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You’re probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you’ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you’ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers’ data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

question: Comment passer à l’offre N26 You?
answer: Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, France, Espagne, Italie, Belgique, Estonie, Finlande, Grèce, Irlande, Lettonie, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Pays-Bas, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slovénie, Pologne, Suède, Danemark, Norvège, Islande, Liechtenstein.Si vous possédez déjà un compte N26 standard, vous avez la possibilité de passer au compte N26 You, directement depuis votre application. Pour cela, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Découvrir en bas de l’écran d’accueil. Dans la section Passer à un compte premium, vous verrez une bannière N26 You. Appuyez sur En savoir plus, puis sur Choisir ce compte.Vous avez la possibilité de choisir votre carte parmi les 5 nouvelles couleurs disponibles : Rhubarbe, Océan, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.Une fois le mode de livraison de votre carte choisi et après avoir accepté les Conditions Générales d’Utilisation N26 You (nouvel onglet), vous devez confirmer votre commande à l’aide de votre code de validation.Le délai de livraison standard peut prendre jusqu’à 10 jours ouvrés. La livraison express se fait en 5 jours ouvrés maximum (ce délai dépend de l’heure de votre commande et inclut le temps nécessaire à la fabrication de votre carte).Les frais d'adhésion de 9,90 € sont prélevés directement de votre compte N26 chaque mois, en fonction de la date de votre souscription à N26 You.Vous souhaitez parler de nous à vos amis ? Recevez 15 € à chaque fois que l’un d’entre eux nous rejoint. Découvrez notre programme de parrainage.

question: Kann N26 mein Konto schließen?
answer: Kurz gesagt: ja.Wir können dein Konto auf drei Arten schließen (mit einer Kündigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese Kündigungen sind endgültig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen über den Hintergrund einzelner Kündigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht rückgängig machen. Du kannst deine Geschäftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von Gründen, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden Vertragsgebühren müssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.2 Monate KündigungsfristWir sind berechtigt, jede Geschäftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von Gründen zu kündigen (siehe § 19 Abs. 1 unserer AGB (neuen Tab) oder § 675h BGB).14 Tage KündigungsfristWir können jede Geschäftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen kündigen (siehe § 19 Abs. 3 unserer AGB (neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende Gründe hierzu vorliegen. Solche Gründe sind:Nutzung eines Privatkontos für geschäftliche Zwecke Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur für den persönlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle Überweisungen, die sich auf Honorare für erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als Geschäftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto für diesen Zweck nutzen möchtest, eröffne bitte ein N26 Business oder N26 Business You Konto.Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen für eine routinemäßige Hintergrundprüfung. Wir sind eine Bank, deshalb überprüfen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die Geschäftsbeziehung zu kündigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen müssen. -Missbräuchliches Verhalten gegenüber N26-Mitarbeitern. Wir tolerieren kein missbräuchliches Verhalten gegenüber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von Körperverletzung oder allgemeines missbräuchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zuständigen Behörde gemeldet.Fristlose KündigungWir können jede Geschäftsbeziehung auch außerordentlich kündigen (siehe § 19 Abs. 3 unserer AGB (neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne Vorankündigung und ohne Kündigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes für eine solche Kündigung. Solche Gründe sind:Falsche Angaben gegenüber N26 über deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines KreditsDu kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegenüber N26 nicht zurückzahlenNichterfüllung der Forderungen von N26 bezüglich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder Verstärkung von Sicherheiten, § 13 (2) unserer AGB (neuen Tab)).

question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: PSD2 - Authentification Forte du Client
answer: Comment fonctionne l’Authentification Forte du Client (SCA) ?L’Authentification Forte du Client (SCA) constitue une protection supplémentaire pour tous les clients N26 en établissant une authentification à deux facteurs. Grâce à l’authentification à deux facteurs, nous ajoutons une nouvelle mesure de sécurité lorsque vous vous connectez à votre compte N26. Vous êtes probablement habitué à utiliser uniquement votre mot de passe pour vous connecter à votre compte, avec l'authentification à deux facteurs, vous aurez maintenant besoin soit d'une confirmation depuis votre appareil synchronisé soit d'un code SMS pour vous connecter à votre compte.Lorsque vous vous connectez à votre compte N26 à partir d’un navigateur Web ou d'un appareil non synchronisé à votre compte, vous serez invité à confirmer votre connexion depuis une notification envoyée sur votre téléphone synchronisé ou vous devrez saisir un code envoyé par SMS au numéro de téléphone lié à votre compte. Après avoir confirmé votre connexion, vous pourrez alors vous connecter à votre compte N26. Lorsque vous vous connectez à votre compte N26 à partir de votre appareil synchronisé, l'authentification à deux facteurs est déjà automatiquement activée. Par conséquent, il vous suffit de saisir votre identifiant et votre mot de passe pour vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronisé.Pourquoi le SCA est-il introduit ?Le SCA est introduit dans le cadre de la deuxième Directive européenne sur les services de paiement (PSD2) qui s'applique à toutes les banques européennes. L'objectif de cette directive est d'améliorer la sécurité et la confidentialité des comptes et des données des clients. Pour en savoir plus, vous pouvez consulter l'article de notre blog consacré à PSD2. (nouvel onglet)

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You’ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you reorder a card. You’ll then receive a tracking link by email. If you’re not home during the delivery and your mailbox can’t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it’ll be returned to us. We’ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It’s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It’s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it’s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn’t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can’t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25€Reordering your card: 30€Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30€N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25€Reordering your card 65€

question: How to activate my card?
answer: Activate your N26 Mastercard right from the N26 app and start using it right away! You’ll have to activate your card whether it’s your first N26 card, a replacement card, or you’ve upgraded to an N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal card.Once you receive your card in the mail, just make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and then:Open your N26 appGo to the Cards tab and swipe until you see the card you’re activatingTap Card Settings and then ActivateEnter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your card and choose your PIN numberTo activate your card on the WebApp (new tab), just select Activate card from the homescreen.FYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with your card, you’ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction — in a store or at an ATM.And if multiple cards come in the mail — for example, delivery was delayed and you received more than one card — you can only activate the most recent card. However, if you have a premium account and order a spare card then you’ll still be able to activate that new card.

question: My ID wasn’t accepted and I can’t open an account with N26
answer: As a fully-licensed bank, we’re required to verify your identity before allowing you to open an account. Depending on your country of residence and nationality, different forms of identification may be accepted during the verification process. You can find our list of accepted IDs for the identity verification here (new tab) if you live in France.If you live outside of France, here’s the list of IDs you can submit to verify your identity:I live in Germany (new tab)I live in Spain (new tab)I live in Italy (new tab)I live in another country (new tab)If your ID isn’t supported, we won’t be able to open a bank account for you.

question: What is a suspicious login attempt?
answer: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If you’ve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all that’s needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account → Settings → Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If you’d like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

question: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
answer:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest “Split the bill” feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where you’re sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on ‘Home’ tab, tap it and choose ‘Split the bill’Add the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, you’ll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap ‘Confirm’ to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests can’t be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

question: Come posso pagare bollettini e ricariche telefoniche dalla mia app?
answer: A partire dal 1 Settembre potrai pagare bollettini postali, PagoPA, MAV/RAV, il bollo auto ed effettuare ricariche telefoniche direttamente dall’app mobile con la carta di debito N26.Questo servizio è fornito in collaborazione con PayTipper SpA, un istituto di pagamento che dal 2019 è partner del gruppo Enel X.Come effettuare pagamenti verso terze parti nell’app mobile: Accedi all’app N26 e seleziona “Dal mio conto"Clicca su “Altri pagamenti”Nel menù dovrai selezionare il pagamento che desideri effettuare (Ricarica telefonica, PagoPA, Bollettini postali, MAV o RAV, Bollo auto)Sarai poi reindirizzato al sito del fornitore del servizio dove potrai effettuare il pagamentoIl servizio non è fornito direttamente da N26 ma da terze parti. Per questo, utilizzando questo metodo di pagamento, sarai soggetto al trattamento dei dati personali, termini e condizioni ed eventuali commissioni non dipendenti da N26. In alcuni casi il servizio potrebbe essere offerto solo in italiano.Se hai bisogno di assistenza per un pagamento o vuoi richiedere il rinvio della ricevuta, dovrai contattare direttamente l’assistenza clienti del fornitore del servizio che hai scelto. Clicca qui per metterti in contatto con PayTipper (nuova tabella)Di seguito puoi trovare i contatti dell’assistenza clienti per i principali operatori telefonici (fai riferimento ai rispettivi siti web per orari di apertura ed eventuali costi del servizio):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

question: CRS - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin d’informations de votre part ?
answer:
N26 suit la norme d’échange automatique de renseignements (CRS en anglais), comme tout établissement de crédit. Nous sommes donc tenus de communiquer directement aux autorités fiscales de l'Union Européenne les informations des comptes financiers détenus par nos clients résidents fiscaux dans d'autres pays.CRS signifie Common Reporting Standard ou Echange Automatique de Renseignements.
Le CRS a été élaboré par l'Organisation de coopération et de développement économiques (OCDE). C'est une norme mondiale de déclaration pour l'échange automatique d'informations (AEOI). 
L'objectif du CRS est de permettre aux autorités d'avoir une meilleure compréhension des actifs financiers détenus à l'étranger par leurs résidents pour lutter contre la fraude fiscale. 
Plus de 90 pays ont accepté de partager des informations sur les actifs et les revenus des résidents en conformité avec le CRS.Afin que nous puissions déterminer avec précision si un compte doit être déclaré aux autorités fiscales pour le CRS, nous devons vous demander :1. Le(s) pays dans le(s)quel(s) vous êtes imposable Vous êtes normalement «résident fiscal» et donc soumis à l'impôt sur vos revenus dans le pays où vous avez un logement. Si vous résidez dans plus d'un pays, il existe normalement des «règles de départage» incluses dans les conventions de double imposition et dans les lois fiscales des pays concernés qui vous aident à déterminer où vous êtes résident fiscal. Il se peut que vous soyez résident fiscal dans plus d'un pays au cours d'une année. Dans ce cas, nous aurions besoin de connaître chaque pays et chaque numéro d'identification fiscale afin de communiquer les informations exactes aux autorités fiscales compétentes.2. Votre numéro d’identification fiscale (NIF) pour chaque pays auquel vous êtes fiscalement rattaché.
L’attribution et le format d’un NIF diffèrent d’un pays à l’autre. Si vous résidez au sein de l’Union Européenne, vous pourrez trouver le vôtre en consultant ce guide (nouvel onglet) mis à disposition par la Commission Européenne.Si votre situation fiscale vient à changer, vous pourrez à tout moment modifier les informations concernées depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > Paramètres > Paramètres personnels > Informations fiscales.

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: Scadenza e sostituzione delle carte: domande frequenti
answer: Se la tua Mastercard N26 è scaduta o scadrà a breve, in questo articolo troverai tutte le informazioni su come ordinarne una nuova, i relativi costi e tempi di spedizione. Prima di procedere con il riordino di una nuova carta, ti consigliamo di verificare che tutti i tuoi dati personali siano aggiornati e corretti.La mia carta sta per scadere, cosa devo fare?Se la tua carta sta per scadere, accedi al tuo conto N26 nell'app, vai alla sezione Carte e cerca un banner sotto la carta corrispondente. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva e te la invieremo. Se questo messaggio non compare, non preoccuparti. Probabilmente è perché la tua carta sarà valida ancora per un periodo; quando sarà il momento giusto vedrai l’opzione per confermare il tuo indirizzo.Una volta ricevuta la tua carta, prima di poterla utilizzare la dovrai attivare. Non dimenticare di distruggere la tua vecchia carta e di buttarla via secondo le linee guida locali per il riciclo.Attenzione: una volta ricevuta e attivata la tua nuova Mastercard, ricordati di aggiornare le tue informazioni di pagamento per tutti i tuoi abbonamenti e i pagamenti ricorrenti. In questo modo eviterai che i tuoi pagamenti futuri vengano rifiutati.Posso continuare a usare la mia carta dopo che è scaduta?No, la data di scadenza della tua carta ha una funzione importante e non potrai più utilizzarla dopo il mese di scadenza. Riceverai una nuova carta con un numero diverso e una nuova data di scadenza.Quanto costa la sostituzione della mia carta scaduta o in scadenza?La carta sostitutiva è gratuita per tutti i clienti possessori di un conto N26 Smart, You e Metal.Se hai aperto il tuo conto prima delle seguenti date, sia la nuova carta che la spedizione al tuo indirizzo sono gratuiti nei paesi in cui N26 è disponibile (nuova tabella):16/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale nella Grande Europa)25/02/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Italia o Spagna)11/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Francia)18/03/2021 (Clienti con indirizzo legale in Germania, Austria o Svizzera)Se il tuo conto è stato creato in seguito, la tua carta sostitutiva avrà lo stesso costo di una carta nuova.Se attualmente ti trovi in un Paese non supportato da N26, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono, così possiamo effettuare l’ordine per te. La consegna al di fuori di questi Paesi (nuova tabella) potrebbe comportare un costo aggiuntivo. Quanto tempo ci vorrà?Tutte le carte sostitutive delle carte scadute o in scadenza vengono spedite tramite consegna Standard. Richiede fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed è gratuita. Nelle zone rurali o difficili da raggiungere potrebbe volerci più tempo. Per rimanere aggiornato sui progressi nella consegna, vai alla schermata Home della tua app mobile N26.La mia carta è già scaduta ma non ho mai ricevuto una sostituzioneNessun problema, ci pensiamo noi! Se hai già confermato il tuo indirizzo e sono passati più di 20 giorni, ti preghiamo di contattare il Supporto Clienti. Puoi farlo nella sezione Supporto nell'app. Se non hai ancora confermato il tuo indirizzo, effettua l'accesso al tuo conto N26 nell'app e cerca un banner sotto la tua carta scaduta. Segui i passaggi per confermare dove vorresti ricevere la tua carta sostitutiva.

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you’d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you’ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‘Hide space balance’.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‘DE’ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

question: Wie viel kostet ein N26 Konto?
answer: Ein N26 Bankkonto ist kostenlos.* Je nach Region können zusätzliche Gebühren anfallen: Preise in Deutschland (neuen Tab)Preise in Österreich (neuen Tab)Preise in Frankreich (neuen Tab)Preise in Spanien (neuen Tab)Preise in Italien (neuen Tab) Preise im übrigen Europa (neuen Tab)* Sofern unsere Mindestanforderungen (neuen Tab) erfüllt werden. Falls wir dir kein N26 Konto anbieten können, kannst du möglicherweise ein N26 Flex Konto eröffnen.

question: Paramètres de communication marketing
answer: En tant que client N26, vous pouvez activer ou désactiver nos Communications marketing depuis l’application mobile et l’espace client en ligne N26. Vous pouvez ainsi choisir de recevoir ou non des offres personnalisées sur les produits et fonctionnalités N26, ainsi que des mises à jour sur les offres de nos partenaires N26 et d’autres recommandations. Pour accéder aux depuis l’application mobile et l’espace client en ligne, procédez comme suit :Mon compteParamètres de l’applicationCommunications publicitairesVous trouverez ci-dessous une explication concernant chaque option de communication marketing vous permettant ainsi de mieux gérer les paramètres souhaités. Vous trouverez des informations relatives aux traitements des données à caractère personnel concernés dans la politique de confidentialité N26.Notifications push:Si vous activez les notifications push, vous recevrez des offres personnalisées pour les produits et fonctionnalités N26, des mises à jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et d’autres recommandations. Si vous désactivez les notifications push, vous ne recevrez plus le contenu susmentionné. Important : L’activation/désactivation des notifications push n’affecte que le contenu relatif aux offres personnalisées pour les produits et fonctionnalités N26, ainsi que les mises à jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et autres recommandations. Par conséquent, même si vous désactivez cette option, vous recevrez toujours des notifications push contenant des informations pertinentes pour l’utilisation de votre compte bancaire N26 (par exemple, les transactions récentes, les nouvelles fonctionnalités de votre compte bancaire). Mises à jour intégrées à l’application:Si vous activez les mises à jour intégrées à l’application, vous recevrez des offres personnalisées pour les produits et fonctionnalités N26, des mises à jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et d’autres recommandations. Ces mises à jour sont de petites bannières qui s’affichent dans le flux de transactions. Si vous désactivez les mises à jour intégrées à l’application, vous ne recevrez plus le contenu susmentionné. Important : L’activation/désactivation des mises à jour intégrées à l’application n’affecte que le contenu relatif aux offres personnalisées pour les produits et fonctionnalités N26, ainsi que les mises à jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et autres recommandations. Par conséquent, même si vous désactivez cette option, vous recevrez toujours des mises à jour intégrées à l’application pour l’utilisation de votre compte bancaire N26 (par exemple, les transactions récentes, les nouvelles fonctionnalités de votre compte bancaire). Emails:Si vous activez l’option d’envoi d’emails, vous recevrez des offres personnalisées pour les produits et fonctionnalités N26, des mises à jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et d’autres recommandations. Si vous désactivez l’option d’envoi d’emails, vous ne recevrez plus le contenu susmentionné. Important : L’activation/désactivation de l’option d’envoi d’emails n’affecte que le contenu relatif aux offres personnalisées pour les produits et fonctionnalités N26, ainsi que les mises à jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et autres recommandations. Par conséquent, même si vous désactivez cette option, vous recevrez toujours des emails contenant des informations relatives à l’utilisation de votre compte bancaire N26 (par exemple, les transactions récentes, les nouvelles fonctionnalités de votre compte bancaire). LivechatSi vous activez l’option de Livechat, vous recevrez des offres personnalisées pour les produits et fonctionnalités N26, des mises à jour sur les offres des partenaires N26 et d’autres recommandations, par exemple à la fin d’une conversation avec le Service Client N26. Si vous désactivez l’option de Livechat, vous ne recevrez plus le contenu susmentionné. Important : Cette option n’affecte pas votre accès au Service Client N26, y compris au Livechat N26. Dans tous les cas, vous pourrez toujours accéder au Livechat du Service Client et bénéficier d’une assistance pour vos demandes. Partenaires commerciaux:Lorsque vous activez l’option Partenaires commerciaux, vous autorisez N26 à envoyer votre adresse email de manière chiffrée (email hashing) à ses Partenaires commerciaux (Google Ireland Limited et Facebook Ireland Limited) afin de vous éviter de recevoir des publicités N26 et d’aider N26 à mieux définir ses groupes cibles. Si vous désactivez cette option, N26 n’enverra pas votre adresse email à ses Partenaires commerciaux, toutefois vous pourrez éventuellement recevoir des publicités N26 qui vous semblent non pertinentes . Pour plus d’informations sur les Partenaires commerciaux, veuillez consulter cet article.

question: How to download my Statement of Fees
answer: The Statement of Fees is part of the Payment Accounts EU Directive that provides banking customers the ability to access an overview of their past fees.A Statement of Fees is available at any given time for all of our current customers. For current customers, login to the webapp (new tab), then click on the download icon and scroll down to 'Statement of Fees'. Select 'Request' and you’ll receive an email to your registered email address (can take around 5 minutes). From there simply follow the instructions to download your Statement of Fees.For former customers, you can download this statement up to 6 months after closing your account, using the following form (new tab).You will need the following information:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the accountthe registered email address of the accountthe date (month and year) you created and closed your account (please check your verification email).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.* For Business accounts cash back amounts will not be shown

question: Warum wurde mir eine Geldautomatengebühr berechnet?
answer: Geldautomatengebühren können aus verschiedenen Gründen anfallen:Für jede Auszahlung, die über unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine Gebühr von 2 €. Diese Gebühr erscheint als separate Transaktion in deiner Umsatzanzeige. Wir informieren dich per Push-Nachricht, wenn du nur noch wenige kostenlose Auszahlungen zur Verfügung hast.Einige Betreiber von Geldautomaten erheben ihre eigenen Gebühren. In deiner Umsatzanzeige erscheint diese Gebühr in derselben Transaktion wie die Abhebung, also eingerechnet in den Abhebungsbetrag. Darauf haben wir keinen Einfluss, wir können sie weder ablehnen noch rückgängig machen. Sollten zusätzliche Gebühren anfallen, wirst du vor dem Ende einer Auszahlung informiert und kannst die Auszahlung sofort stornieren. Kunden in Spanien können können hier eine Lösung finden.Abhebungen in Fremdwährungen können gebührenpflichtig sein. Beim N26 Standard und N26 Smart Konti fällt eine Gebühr von 1,7% des ausgezahlten Betrages an. Diese Gebühr entfällt für N26 You, N26 Metal, Business You- oder N26 Business Metal-Mitglieder.Nutzung deiner Maestrocard für Abhebungen am Geldautomaten. Hier fällt sowohl für nationale als auch für internationale Abhebungen eine Gebühr von 2 € an. Maestro ist nur in Deutschland, Österreich und den Niederlanden erhältlich.Wenn du unser N26 Flex Konto hast, kosten Abhebungen 2€. Gut zu wissen:Um gebührenfreie Automaten in deiner Nähe zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du die Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche (neuen Tab) verwenden. Wähle dazu in den erweiterten Suchoptionen “keine Nutzungsgebühr” aus.Alle Automaten, die im Geldautomatenfinder angezeigt werden, unterstüzen Mastercard.Eine Übersicht unserer Angebote und Gebühren findest du auf unserer Website (neuen Tab).

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We’ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you’re in complete control: go to 👤 My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you.  It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank. As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.  How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You’ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it’s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: How to change my card limits?
answer: You can set your card limits in the N26 mobile app or via the web app. Any changes you make will be applied to your chosen card right away.To make changes in the mobile app:Log in and go to CardsKeep swiping until the desired card appearsTap on Card settingsTap on Daily limitsTo make changes via the web app:Log in (new tab) and go to My AccountUnder the heading Cards, click on the desired card where you can change the limitsCard limitsThe daily limit relates to the past 24 hours (and not to the calendar day) and amounts to:€1,000 for withdrawals from ATMs€5,000 for payments in stores or onlineThe weekly limit is calculated on fixed calendar weeks and amounts to:2,500€ for withdrawals from ATMs (1,050€ for France)The monthly limit is calculated on fixed calendar months and amounts to:€20,000 for payments in stores or onlinePrefer video over text? Watch the tutorial (new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube (new tab) channel.

question: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-Überweisung?
answer: Ausgehende Überweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausführen. Ausgehende Überweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in deinem Online Banking erstellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.Wähle Banküberweisungen und dann Neuer Kontakt.Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des Empfängers ein und wähle Weiter.Gib den Betrag ein und wähle Weiter.Gib bei Bedarf einen Verwendungszweck ein und wähle Weiter.Überprüfe die Zusammenfassung deiner Überweisung. Hier kannst du auch entscheiden, ob es eine Terminüberweisung werden soll oder ein DauerauftragKlicke Absenden und bestätige mit deiner Bestätigungs-PIN.Zum Schluss erhältst du in deinem verknüpften Handy eine Push-Mitteilung, um die Überweisung zu bestätigen. Sobald die Überweisung bestätigt wurde, können wir sie nicht rückgängig machen oder die Daten des Überweisungsempfängers ändern.Falls du die Überweisung nicht bestätigen kannst, überprüfe bitte, dass:Du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast.In den Einstellungen deines Handys Push-Mitteilungen aktiviert sind.Du dein verknüpftes Handy verwendest.Sobald deine Überweisung gesendet wurde, kannst du in der App eine Überweisungsbestätigung als PDF herunterladen:Gehe in deine Umsatzliste.Finde deine Überweisung und tippe auf diese.Scrolle nach unten zu den Informationen zur Transaktion tippe auf Überweisungsbestätigung.Du kannst ausgehende SEPA-Überweisungen auch direkt aus deinen Spaces mit zugewiesenen IBANs vornehmen. Gehe dafür einfach in den Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN, wähle "Geld senden" und dann "Banküberweisung". Das wird dann wie eine normale ausgehende Zahlung gehandhabt.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: How to contact N26?
answer:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while you’re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once you’re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Don’t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you don’t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken? Are you having issues logging into the App and accessing your account? We are sorry to hear this and we will help you resolve your issue if you open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Need to change your personal data? Follow the instructions in this page, How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?Please note: for your safety, we can only help you with questions regarding personal data if you start a Support chat while you’re logged into the App.Open a visitor chatPlease note: We won’t be able to assist you in case you visit our location. Please only use our designated channels in order to contact us.

question: Wo kann ich meine Maestro Card einsetzen?
answer: Nur verfügbar für Kunden mit unseren deutschen, österreichischen oder niederländischen AGB.Deine Maestro kann nicht für Online-Einkäufe verwendet werden und ist nicht in das deutsche Electronic Cash- (EC-) oder Girocard-System eingebunden.Du kannst sie nicht für Apple Pay or Google Pay verwenden.Aber du kannst deine Karte an Geldautomaten oder Geschäften verwenden, die das Maestro-Symbol tragen. Jede Abhebung am Geldautomaten mit der Maestrocard kostet 2 € (bei Fremdwährungen zuzüglich einer Gebühr von 1,7% auf den abgehobenen Betrag).Du kannst deine Maestro Card direkt in der App bestellen.Wenn du Probleme mit deiner Maestrocard hast, prüfe zuerst, ob deine Karteneinstellungen aktiviert sind. Wenn nichts blockiert ist, kontaktiere den Kundendienst per Chat und wir werden uns darum kümmern.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm (neuen Tab).

question: Probiere N26 Smart 2 Monate kostenlos
answer:
Du wolltest schon immer mal unser N26 Smart Konto ausprobieren, bist dir aber nicht sicher, ob es etwas für dich ist? Jetzt kannst du 2 Monate lang kostenlos und unverbindlich testen, ob unser Smart Konto zu dir passt!Wenn du es ausprobierst, erhältst du Zugang zu allen Premium-Banking-Funktionen, die in unserem Smart Konto enthalten sind. Entdecke, wie du mehr aus deinen täglichen Bankgeschäften herausholst.Was ist in der kostenlosen Testphase für Smart enthalten?60 Tage kostenlos testen: Wenn du ein Neukunde von N26 Standard bist, kannst du von unserem 60-tägigen kostenlosen Test von Smart profitieren.Jederzeit stornieren: Du kannst während deiner kostenlosen Testphase jederzeit stornieren und trotzdem die Vorteile über die vollen 60 Tage hinweg genießen (nach 60 Tagen wirst du automatisch wieder auf Standard zurückgestuft).Bei Smart bleiben: Wenn du dich für unser N26 Smart Konto entscheidest, dann brauchst du nichts weiter zu unternehmen. Die monatliche Gebühr in Höhe von 4,90 € wird automatisch abgebucht. Wenn du deine Meinung änderst, kannst du nach dem Ende der kostenlosen Testphase jederzeit wieder auf Standard zurückstufen.Profitiere von den Vorteilen unseres Smart Kontos: Während deines 60-tägigen kostenlosen Tests von Smart stehen dir folgende Vorteile zur Verfügung:Spaces (bis zu 10)Bis zu 10 Shared SpacesIBAN für Spacesbis zu 5 kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten pro MonatRound-up SavingsPartnerangebote und RabatteTelefonischer Support
Wichtig:Wenn du bei deinem N26 Smart Konto bleibst, wird die Gebühr in Höhe von 4,90 € am ersten Tag nach der kostenlosen Testphase abgebucht. Ein Downgrade ist aber trotzdem jederzeit möglich.Zusätzlich erhältst du nach dem Upgrade ein Angebot, deine digitale Karte einmalig kostenlos als bunte Karte nachzubestellen. Gleichzeitig behältst du deine transparente Karte. Bitte beachte, dass deine digitale Karte dann deaktiviert wird.Wie erhalte ich Zugriff auf die kostenlose Smart-Probemitgliedschaft?Wenn du eine Einladung für eine kostenlose Testversion unserer Smart-Mitgliedschaft erhalten hast, kannst du auf diese zugreifen, indem du folgende Anweisungen befolgst.Von der Push-Nachricht aus: Tippe auf die Push-Nachricht.Wenn sich die N26 App öffnet, erscheint automatisch deine Einladung, in der das kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft erläutert wird. Klicke auf "Bestätigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke anschließend auf "Kauf bestätigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen. Eine Nachricht bestätigt dir, dass der Abschluss erfolgreich war! Von der N26 App aus: Öffne die N26 App.Der Zugangspunkt für die kostenlose N26 Smart-Probemitgliedschaft wird dir oben auf deinem Home Bildschirm angezeigt. Tippe auf "Mehr erfahren". Daraufhin erscheint ein Fenster mit der Einladung, in der das kostenlose Testangebot im Detail erklärt wird. Klicke auf "Bestätigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke auf "Kauf bestätigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen! Anmerkung: Wenn du eine E-Mail mit einer Einladung für eine Probemitgliedschaft erhalten hast, empfehlen wir dir, diese von deinem Smartphone aus zu öffnen und auf die Schaltfläche "Kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft starten" zu klicken. Dadurch wird automatisch die N26 App geöffnet und die Einladungsseite aufgerufen. Alternativ kannst du dich in die mobile App von N26 einloggen und den obigen Schritten für den Zugriff von der App aus folgen.

question: Come bloccare un addebito diretto?
answer: Prima di inviarci il modulo per bloccare un addebito diretto, ti preghiamo di notare quanto segue:Identificativo del creditore e riferimento del mandato: dovrai specificare sia l’identificativo del creditore che il codice di riferimento del mandato. Puoi ottenere queste informazioni nei dettagli della transazione dell'ultimo addebito diretto nell'app o contattando l'esercente (attenzione, non bastano l'IBAN e il nome dell'esercente).Allegati inferiori a 25 MB: quando rispondi con il modulo necessario, ti preghiamo di assicurarti che complessivamente i tuoi allegati non superino i 25 MB.Firma del documento: se puoi, apponi la tua firma autografa al modulo che ci invii. Tuttavia, accettiamo anche:Firma elettronica: deve essere la stessa del documento che hai usato per aprire il tuo conto N26.Firma digitale: se apponi sul documento una firma digitale che possiamo verificare, la firma è considerata valida. Le firme digitali possono essere create tramite operatori come "DocuSign".Infine, è importante notare che cancellando un addebito diretto impedisci solo i pagamenti, ma non estingui il contratto che hai con l'esercente.Come blocco un addebito diretto?Ti invitiamo a seguire gli step descritti in seguito, compilare il modulo e metterti in contatto con il nostro team del Supporto Clienti tramite chat o telefono.Per favore, scarica e compila questo modulo (nuova tabella).Compila il modulo e specifica cosa intendi bloccare, ad es., identificativo del creditore, codice di riferimento del mandato e blocco totale. Puoi trovare queste informazioni negli addebiti diretti precedenti per lo stesso esercente nel tuo elenco delle transazioni.Assicurati di includere una firma (autografa, elettronica o digitale).Dopodiché dovrai metterti in contatto con il nostro team del Supporto Clienti tramite live chat (per essere verificato direttamente) o telefonicamente, così i nostri agenti potranno aiutarti a portare a termine la procedura. Compila il modulo anticipatamente per accelerare la procedura!

question: How do contactless payments work?
answer: Contactless payments on your card function through near field communication (NFC). Learn If you’re experiencing issues with contactless payments, keep the following in mind:Check if contactless payments are enabled in your card settings.If your card is new, be sure that you used it at an ATM or with Chip & PIN before. Only then you can use it for contactless payments, too.Contactless payments on your card (NFC) up to €50 don’t require a card PIN. For amounts over €50 or cumulative transactions above 150€ you’ll need to enter your card PIN. Ask the merchant if the payment terminal actually supports contactless payments.N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the back side of the card. Make sure to hold the back side of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won’t work).Make sure your card is held directly onto the NFC-compatible surface of the payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn’t hold it close enough, just try again.If contactless is not working, please always try to use the Chip & PIN method to complete your payment.

question: CRR Disclosure Report
answer: What is it ?The Capital Requirements Regulation (CRR) is an EU law. Among others, it states an obligation for credit institutions to publish a disclosure report on an annual basis (Art. 433 CRR).  Why is the Disclosure Report not published in our Support Center or somewhere else on our website?N26 Bank GmbH is not obliged to publish the CRR report on our website. Art. 434 (new tab) CRR only requires an “appropriate medium” and therefore leaves the decision up to each credit institution.N26 Bank GmbH publishes its CRR in www.bundesanzeiger.de (new tab)

question: Was sind Shared Spaces?
answer: Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk für eure Liebsten organisieren möchtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es möglich.Premium-Kunden (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You oder N26 Business Metal) können einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.Alle N26 Nutzer können teilnehmen, unabhängig von ihren Kontotypen.Dem Besitzer gehören alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

question: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
answer: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or WebApp (new tab) to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isn’t rewarded because the invited friend hasn’t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

question: How to download my personal data?
answer: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We’ve added a data export option to the WebApp (new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you’re in complete control: go to 👤 My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you.  It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank. As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.  How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form (new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided to us after account closure. To request this information, complete a data request form (new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You’ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure it’s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU (new tab)) (EU (new tab)).

question: What to do if my card is lost or it’s been compromised?
answer: If your card is lost or you suspect that it might have been compromised, you can block and unblock your card (new tab) at any time in the N26 App. Lock the card temporarily or disable it permanently (depending on the case) and reorder a new one (new tab) within the N26 App or the web app.If your card has been compromised, follow these steps:Go to the 'Cards' tabTap 'Card Settings'Swipe right until you see the card you want to temporarily disable or block.Finally, if you wish to block your card entirely, select 'Order a new Card'This way, you have full control of your card and you can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions (new tab). You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

question: What are “Messages” ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That’s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We’ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you’ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you’ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We’ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can’t initiate a conversation, but you’ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn’t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we’ll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: Come posso ordinare una carta aggiuntiva?
answer: Clicca qui, se vuoi sostituire la tua carta invece di ordinarne una aggiuntiva.Come posso ordinare una carta aggiuntiva:Accedi al tuo conto N26Vai su: EsploraSeleziona: Carta aggiuntiva > MastercardScegli il colore e il tipo di spedizione che preferisciConferma l’operazione e effettua il pagamentoLa carta aggiuntiva ha un costo di 10€ con consegna standard e di 25€ con consegna express. Per attivare la produzione e la consegna della carta, dovrai versare un importo minimo una tantum di 10€ sul tuo conto. Maggiori informazioni sono presenti qui.ℹ️ La carta aggiuntiva è disponibile per i clienti con una membership premium (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) nei seguenti paesi: Germania, Francia, Italia, Spagna, Austria, Danimarca, Islanda, Liechtenstein, Norvegia, Polonia, Svezia, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Paesi Bassi.

question: How to change my confirmation PIN?
answer: Step by Step Instructions:iPhoneAndroidStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINStep 1Open your N26 app, tap the My Account icon on the top right of your screenStep 2Scroll down and tap on SecurityStep 3Choose Change confirmation PINStep 4Enter your card token: the 10-digit number on the front or back of your card.Step 5Create and confirm your new confirmation PINThe confirmation PIN is the code you use to confirm transfers or any other transactions you make from your N26 app. If you aren’t sure what it is, remember that you created your own confirmation PIN when you paired your smartphone (new tab) with your account for the first time.If you’ve forgotten your PIN code or want to change it, you can do so at any time. Simply follow these steps:Open your N26 app, go to 👤 My Account, then Settings, and then tap Security or click Choose Change confirmation PINEnter your card token, the 10-digit number that appears below your name on the front of your card (for N26 Smart, You, and Metal cards, the number appears on the back)Create and confirm your new confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, you'll have to reset it before trying again.For security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences, such as 1111, 1234 or 4321. If the number you chose fails, please try again with a different combination.Remember that your confirmation PIN is not the same as your debit card PIN, (new tab) although you can certainly choose the same PIN code for both if you wish.

question: Come posso tenere traccia delle mie spese quotidiane?
answer: Le transazioni vengono ordinate automaticamente e i risultati visualizzati in Statistiche (angolo in alto a destra dell'app mobile) in ordine di:Categorie: Raccogliamo informazioni sui rivenditori e sulle causali di pagamento al fine di migliorare la categorizzazione (come ad es. bancomat, cibo e generi alimentari, shopping). Se, ad esempio, mandi un Moneybeam con il testo di riferimento Pranzo, verrà inserito nella categoria Bar e ristoranti. Se secondo te una categoria non è adatta, puoi modificarla semplicemente selezionando la transazione e scegliendo una categoria dall'elenco a discesa.Hashtag: Abbiamo anche aggiunto degli hashtag standard per gli orari delle transazioni (#weekend), i tipi di transazioni (#libri), o i luoghi degli acquisti (#berlino). Puoi ordinare ulteriormente le transazioni aggiungendo degli hashtag personali: tocca una transazione e poi l'icona della matita per aggiungere un tag (ad esempio #viaggio_portogallo #ognimese) o rimuoverne uno.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking sécurisé
answer:
Qu’est-ce que la Directive DSP2?La 2ème Directive sur les Services de Paiement 2 (« DSP2 ») est une directive européenne révisée qui vous permet d’accéder aux informations de votre compte ainsi que d’effectuer des paiements de manière sûre et sécurisée par l'intermédiaire de prestataires de services de paiement régulés.Cela signifie que vous pouvez autoriser des prestataires de services régulés à accéder directement aux données de votre compte grâce à une interface dédiée : Vous pouvez permettre à un service d'information sur les comptes (SIC) de regrouper les données de vos différents comptes bancaires, puis de regrouper ces comptes au même endroit (via une application comme un agrégateur de comptes par exemple);Vous pouvez payer en toute sécurité en ligne sur tous les sites internet qui proposent des services d'initiation de paiement (SIP).L'échange de données se fait en arrière-plan via notre partenaire Token.io.Comment cela fonctionne ?Si vous commencez à utiliser un service de paiement tiers comme un service d’information sur les comptes ou un service d'initiation de paiement, vous serez redirigés vers l’application N26 via Token.io pour confirmer votre demande.Notre politique de confidentialité (nouvel onglet) vous informe des objectifs, des parties prenantes et du cadre légal concernant le traitement des données nécessaire au respect de nos obligations dans le cadre de la Directive Européenne révisée sur les Services de Paiement. FAQPourquoi est-ce je n’arrive pas à lier un prestataire de service à mon compte?
Si un prestataire de service n’est pas intégré avec notre interface, le prestataire devra mettre en place une telle intégration avec notre partenaire Token.io. Comment révoquer l’autorisation d’accéder aux informations de mon compte donnée à un prestataire de service?
Vous pouvez simplement contacter le prestataire de service en question pour révoquer l’autorisation que vous leur avez donnée.*s’applique à tous les pays de l’EEA.

question: Geld abheben und einzahlen mit CASH26 – So geht’s
answer: Für Konten verfügbar, die in Deutschland, Österreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland eröffnet wurden.Dein verknüpftes Smartphone ist alles, was du brauchst. Öffne die CASH26 Karte in deiner App und nutze die Zoom-Funktion, um ein teilnehmendes Geschäft in deiner Nähe zu finden. Sobald du vor Ort im Laden bist, kannst du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellen und ihn auf deinem Smartphone an der Kasse vorzeigen.Wie kann ich Geld mit CASH26 abheben?Öffne in deiner N26 App den “Karten”-Tab und wähle CASH26 > Bargeld abheben.Wähle den Betrag, den du abheben willst (maximal 200 € pro Abhebung sowie 900 € innerhalb von 24 Stunden). Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) ein und bestätige die Transaktion über das Popup-Fenster. Zeige den Strichcode auf deinem Smartphone-Bildschirm an der Kasse vor. Der Kassierer bzw. die Kassiererin wird den Code einscannen und dir das Bargeld aushändigen. Wie kann ich Geld auf mein N26 Konto einzahlen mit CASH26?Gehe in deiner N26 App auf den “Karten”-Tab und wähle CASH26 > Bargeld einzahlen.Wähle den Betrag, den du einzahlen willst (mindestens 50 €).Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN (neuen Tab) ein und bestätige die Transaktion im Popup-Fenster. Zeige den Strichcode auf deinem Smartphone-Bildschirm an der Kasse vor und überreiche das Bargeld.Es kann es bis zu 10 Minuten dauern, bis das eingezahlte Bargeld in deinem Kontostand in der N26 App zu sehen ist.Wichtig!Der Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gültig. Er verliert seine Gültigkeit, wenn du ihn nicht rechtzeitig nutzt. In diesem Fall musst du einen neuen Strichcode erstellen. Falls du einen falschen Betrag eingibst, kannst du ihn löschen, indem du auf das Papierkorb Symbol oben rechts tippst (oder den Code ablaufen lässt) und dann einen neuen Barcode erstellst. Du musst im Geschäft nichts kaufen, wenn du Bargeld einzahlen oder Geld abheben willst.Mehr über CASH26 sowie Einzahl- und Abhebelimits erfährst du in diesem Artikel (neuen Tab).

question: Pourquoi n’ai-je pas reçu le code de synchronisation par SMS ?
answer: Si vous êtes client iOS et que vous n’avez pas reçu notre SMS de synchronisation, il se peut que vous ayez activé une option de filtrage. Pour trouver notre message dans iMessage, allez dans Filtres en haut à gauche et sélectionnez Expéditeurs inconnus.Si vous n’avez pas reçu par SMS le code nécessaire à la synchronisation de votre téléphone avec votre compte, vous pouvez demander l’envoi d’un nouveau code depuis votre application, et ce, jusqu’à 5 fois. Veuillez patienter 30 secondes avant chaque nouvelle demande. Au delà de ces 5 essais, pour des raisons de sécurité, vous devrez attendre 24h avant de demander un nouveau code. Si vous vous retrouvez dans cette situation, nous vous invitons à patienter 24 heures ou à contacter notre service client par Livechat. Si vous possédez un numéro de téléphone en dehors de l’Union européenne, nous vous invitons à nous contacter directement par Livechat.

question: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
answer: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to ideas@n26.com (new tab). We’re always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also file a complaint.

question: How to contact N26?
answer:
There are several ways you can reach out to our customer support team, but the best option is always opening a secure chat while you’re logged into the App. This will allow us to verify your identity, and provide you with specific information and support.We are available every day from 07:00 to 23:00 CET, including Sundays and bank holidays.How to contact us through the AppHow to chat with usOpen a support chatThe chat will start once you’re logged inHow to call us
(only for Premium accounts)We can only connect you with our customer support team if you call us from the number registered in your account. If you need to register a new phone number, follow the steps in this page: How to change my phone number?Please note: to contact us by phone you need to have an N26 Premium account (You, Smart, or Metal).Call Support (Premium Only)Don’t have access to the App?Not an N26 customer yet?If you don’t have an account with us, but you have general questions about our products and services, you can either open a visitor chat below or send us an email to support@n26.com (wait time for email may be longer).Lost access to your account?Is your phone lost or broken?
