CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.It’s not yet possible to switch between accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: How much does an N26 account cost?
answer: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If we’re not able to offer you an N26 account based on our minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open an N26 Flex account.

question: ¿Cómo puedo contratar el Seguro N26?
answer: El nuevo Seguro a la carta de N26 les ofrece a todos los clientes de N26 una cobertura contra hurto, robo, hurto con allanamiento, daños accidentales y daños por penetración de líquidos para sus móviles, tabletas, portátiles, relojes inteligentes y otros dispositivos electrónicos. Puedes contratar el seguro directamente desde la app N26, sin ningún tipo de papeleo, y podrás cancelarlo cuando lo desees.¿Cómo funciona?Si quieres contratar el Seguro a la carta de N26 para dispositivos electrónicos, solo tienes que iniciar sesión en tu app N26, ir a Explorar y hacer clic en el banner «Seguro».A continuación, la app te pedirá que indiques los datos de tu dispositivo, selecciones la tarifa mensual o anual y confirmes tu solicitud. La cobertura de tu móvil se activará el día que contrates la póliza y podrás cancelarla cuando lo desees desde tu app N26 o desde la WebApp.¿Cómo notificar un siniestro?Cuando inicies un siniestro en la app N26, se te redirigirá a la notificación del siniestro en el portal online de Simplesurance (pestaña nueva). Inicia sesión con tu Número de Póliza y tu PIN, que encontrarás en la póliza del seguro que recibiste a través de tus Mensajes de N26.Cada cliente tiene derecho a notificar un máximo de dos siniestros por año. Después del segundo siniestro tramitado con éxito, el seguro caducará automáticamente.Si quieres más información, consulta los Términos y Condiciones que recibirás en tus Mensajes de la app en cuanto contrates el seguro. También puedes ponerte en contacto con support@simplesurance.de si quieres más información sobre tu póliza o siniestro.¿Puedo contratarlo?El Seguro N26 está disponible para todos nuestros clientes. Sin embargo, los clientes de N26 Metal no pueden contratar un seguro de teléfono porque ya disfrutan de esta cobertura dentro de las ventajas del plan N26 Metal. Por favor, procura tener la última versión de la app N26. Actualmente, el Seguro N26 está disponible para clientes de N26 de Austria, Bélgica, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Letonia, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Países Bajos, Portugal, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, España y Alemania.Esta póliza no cubre los dispositivos adquiridos fuera de Europa.

question: Wie kann ich mit N26 spenden?
answer: N26 hat sich immer an der Seite humanitärer Organisationen im Kampf gegen Hunger und Ungerechtigkeit engagiert. Ab jetzt gestaltet sich das Spenden von deinem N26 Konto aus noch einfacher. Du kannst jetzt eine Spende an eine von uns ausgewählte Liste von gemeinnützigen Organisationen senden, direkt von deiner N26 App aus. Der Gesamtbetrag wird per Banküberweisung an die ausgewählte gemeinnützige Organisation gesendet.Um eine Spende an eine Wohltätigkeitsorganisation zu senden, führe bitte folgende Schritte aus:Tippe auf dem Home Bildschirm deiner App auf Geld sendenWähle Spenden und dann Weiter ausWähle eine gemeinnützige Organisation aus der Liste aus Wähle Weiter aus, um zu spendenGib den Spendenbetrag ein und bestätige die Transaktion mit deiner PINBitte beachte: In vielen Fällen reicht ein Zahlungsnachweis aus, um den Steuerabzug deiner Spenden im Rahmen deiner persönlichen Einkommenserklärung geltend machen zu können. Solltest du jedoch eine formelle Spendenbescheinigung von der Wohltätigkeitsorganisation benötigen, bitten wir dich, dich direkt mit dieser in Verbindung zu setzen (mit deinem Zahlungsnachweis), da Spendenbescheinigungen nur von Wohltätigkeitsorganisationen und nicht von N26 ausgestellt werden dürfen.

question: Wie verwende ich Apple Pay?
answer: Verfügbar in Belgien, Dänemark, der Slowakei, Deutschland, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Norwegen, Österreich, Polen, Portugal, Schweden Slowenien, Spanien, in der SchweizApple Pay ermöglicht dir, mit dem Smartphone zu bezahlen, so dass du deine Mastercard nicht überallhin mitnehmen musst.Wir haben ein Video (neuen Tab) erstellt, das dir hilft, deine N26 Mastercard mit Apple Pay einzurichten. Hier sind einige Tipps, die du beachten solltest, wenn deine Zahlung nicht funktioniert:Deine iPhone-Region muss dem Land entsprechen, in das deine Mastercard zuerst geliefert wurde (du kannst deine Region überprüfen, indem du Einstellungen/Allgemein/Sprache und Region auf deinem Handy auswählst).Wenn du dein iPhone verloren hast und es nicht mehr über die Funktion Mein iPhone finden wiederfindest, kannst du jederzeit auf deine iCloud zugreifen und alle Apple Pay-Geräte über den Webbrowser auf einem Mac oder PC entfernen. Zusätzlich solltest du den Verloren-Modusaktivieren, um deine Mastercard für Apple Pay zu sperren. Zahlungen mit deiner physischen Karte sind weiterhin möglich.Wenn deine N26 Mastercard unerwartet aus dem Apple Wallet entfernt wird, kann dies daran liegen, dass du dich von deiner iCloud abgemeldet, den Passcode oder die Touch-ID deaktiviert, dein Gerät über iTunes auf die Werkseinstellungen zurückgesetzt oder alle Inhalte und Einstellungen von deinem Gerät gelöscht hast. In allen Fällen kannst du deine Karte einfach wieder hinzufügen. Beachte, dass die Karte nicht entfernt wird, wenn du dein Betriebssystem aktualisierst, deine persönlichen Geräteeinstellungen zurücksetzt oder Mein iPhone finden deaktivierst.Für Einkäufe in Geschäften oder online musst du deine Zahlung per Touch ID oder mit deinem Passwort autorisieren. Wenn du Apple Watch verwendest, erfolgen Autorisierungen durch einen Doppelklick auf die seitliche Taste. Und wenn du deinen Mac verwendest, autorisiere deine Zahlung mit der Touch ID über die Touch Bar in der oberen rechten Ecke deiner Tastatur.Stelle sicher, dass dein Gerät die technischen Anforderungen erfüllt, indem du den Apple Support (neuen Tab)besuchst: iPhone 6 oder neuer, iPhone SE: verfügbar in Apps, Geschäften und onlineApple Watch verknüpft mit iPhone 5 oder neuer: verfügbar in Apps und GeschäfteniPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: verfügbar in Apps und onlineMacs ab 2012 (andere Macs als das MacBook Pro mit Touch Bar und Touch ID erfordern ein iPhone oder Apple Watch): verfügbar online

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‘Sharing Money’Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:“Advanced electronic signature” will pop-up. Tap “sign”Check both “Advanced electronic signature” and “Power of attorney”, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: What if my balance is negative?
answer: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships. Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited. In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

question: Comment suivre mes dépenses quotidiennes ?
answer: Toutes les transactions que vous effectuez sont automatiquement classées et nous vous permettons d’accéder aux gestion de vos dépenses (accessibles depuis le symbole en haut à droite de l’écran de votre application mobile).Vos transactions sont classées grâce aux :Catégories. Nous utilisons les informations transmises par les marchands et le libellé des transactions pour améliorer la classification de vos transactions (Retrait, Shopping, Logement & Charges…). Si vous réalisez par exemple une transaction MoneyBeam avec le libellé Repas de midi, celle-ci sera automatiquement affectée à la catégorie Bars et restaurants. Vous pouvez à tout moment ajuster la catégorie correspondant à une transaction. Pour cela, sélectionnez la transaction et choisissez ensuite la catégorie qui lui correspond parmi les suggestions proposées.Hashtags. Des hashtags par défaut sont associés à vos transaction selon le moment où elles ont été effectuées (#weekend), selon le type de produit acheté (#books) ou le lieu de l’achat (#berlin). Vous pouvez créer vos propres hashtags : il vous suffit de sélectionner une transaction, puis d’appuyer sur le pinceau pour personnaliser votre hashtag (#cadeau_anniv ou #touslesmois) ou supprimer ceux que vous n’utilisez pas.Vous souhaitez parler de nous à vos amis ? Recevez 15 € à chaque fois que l’un d’entre eux nous rejoint. Découvrez notre programme de parrainage.

question: Comment inviter un ami à rejoindre N26 ?
answer: Depuis le 1er octobre, nous sommes en train d'améliorer notre programme de parrainage N26. C'est pour cette raison que nous avons supprimé ces informations de l’application avant d’effectuer ces changements. Les invitations et les adhésions effectuées avant le 1er octobre donneront toujours le droit à des primes. Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de communiquer une date précise pour la reprise des parrainages.

question: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
answer:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest “Split the bill” feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where you’re sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on ‘Home’ tab, tap it and choose ‘Split the bill’Add the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, you’ll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap ‘Confirm’ to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests can’t be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs €9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It’s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of €9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you’re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don’t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you’re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help get your money back.

question: N26 Kontoauszug herunterladen – so funktioniert’s
answer: Was ist ein Kontoauszug? Ein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, das den Gesamtsaldo sowie alle ein- und ausgehenden Transaktionen von deinem Bankkonto anzeigt. Dazu gehören Überweisungen, Lastschriften, Kartenzahlungen usw. Außerdem sieht man in deinem Kontoauszug den Namen und Nachnamen des Kontoinhabers sowie die IBAN und BIC des Kontos. So findest du deinen Kontoauszug:In der mobilen N26 App (als PDF): Tippe auf die drei horizontalen Linien oben rechts in deinem Home-Bildschirm. Tippe dann auf Kontoauszüge.Du kannst auch Kontoauszüge für einzelne Spaces herunterladen: Öffne dazu den Space im “Spaces”-Tab und tippe auf das Einstellungen-Icon oben rechts. Tippe dann auf Kontoauszug.In der Web-App (als PDF): Tippe auf das Download-Icon (neuen Tab)* und wähle den relevanten Monat unter Kontoauszüge. In der Web-App (als CSV): Tippe auf das Download-Icon (neuen Tab)* und gib unter CSV das Start- und Enddatum des Zeitraums an, für den du einen Kontoauszug benötigst. Tippe dann auf CSV herunterladen.   * Das Download-Icon ist das Quadrat mit einem Pfeil, der nach unten zeigt. Du findest ihn links von “Geld erhalten”.

question: Remboursement d'un paiement par carte litigieux (rétrofacturation) FAQ
Come funziona 3D Secure?
answer: 3D Secure ti protegge dalle frodi online con carta. Si attiva automaticamente quando attivi la tua carta nell’app. Non servono password aggiuntive.Ogni volta che effettui un pagamento online con la tua Mastercard, 3D Secure ti conferma la transazione entro 5 minuti tramite un messaggio push. Se non vedi la transazione, prova alcuni suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemi che abbiamo raccolto.Ricorda: la notifica push sarà inviata solo allo smartphone collegato al conto.Se effettui un acquisto utilizzando lo smartphone, nell’app verrà visualizzata una transazione in sospeso. Tocca l’icona della campana per visualizzare il messaggio push per confermare e finalizzare l’acquisto. Poi torna al sito web dell’esercente. Dovresti vedere una conferma dell’avvenuto acquisto entro pochi secondi.

question: How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here’s how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV.   * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‘Add money’ button.

answer: Was ist ein Kontoauszug? Ein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, das den Gesamtsaldo sowie alle ein- und ausgehenden Transaktionen von deinem Bankkonto anzeigt. Dazu gehören Überweisungen, Lastschriften, Kartenzahlungen usw. Außerdem sieht man in deinem Kontoauszug den Namen und Nachnamen des Kontoinhabers sowie die IBAN und BIC des Kontos. Tippe dann auf Kontoauszüge.Du kannst auch Kontoauszüge für einzelne Spaces herunterladen: Öffne dazu den Space im “Spaces”-Tab und tippe auf das Einstellungen-Icon oben rechts. question: Come i miei soldi sono protetti ad N26
answer: Lo  (nuova tabella)Schema di Compensazione delle banche private tedesche (nuova tabella) assicura tutti i depositi fino a 100.000 € posseduti negli Stati membri dell'Unione Europea. In qualità di titolare di una licenza bancaria, N26 Bank è legalmente tenuta ad essere membro di uno Schema di Compensazione. N26 è un membro dello Schema di Compensazione delle banche private tedesche.In che modo N26 rileva e monitora le frodi?N26 dispone di un team di specialisti il cui lavoro si concentra sul monitoraggio e l’identificazione di transazioni sospette sulla nostra piattaforma. Con l’aiuto di modelli statistici e algoritmi avanzati, assieme ad analisi comportamentali, il nostro team di specialisti fa in modo che i tuoi soldi siano sempre in buone mani.Quali iniziative intraprende N26 quando rileva azioni fraudolente nelle attività dei propri clienti?Non appena il nostro team di esperti rileva un’attività irregolare, prendiamo tutte le misure previste dalla legge per ridurne l’impatto e prevenire ulteriori danni. Ciò implica anche chiudere e denunciare alle autorità i conti bancari sui quali si verificano attività illegali. Se delle transazioni sospette fanno pensare a un riciclaggio di denaro, finanziamenti a organizzazioni terroristiche o qualsiasi altro atto criminale, N26 segnala immediatamente tali attività all’Unità di intelligence finanziaria tedesca (Financial Transaction Investigation Unit, FIU) o alle autorità locali di vigilanza.Quali sono i modi in cui N26 ha investito sulla sicurezza?Alla fine del 2019 abbiamo creato il nostro team dedicato ai temi Trust e Sicurezza. Questo team lavora con il team dedicato alla Sicurezza informatica e il loro operato consiste nel garantire la sicurezza degli utenti, dei loro conti e dei loro dati, proteggendoli dai criminali informatici. Inoltre, N26 ha raddoppiato la dimensione della propria Unità Antiriciclaggio (AML) e dell’Unità contro i crimini finanziari, creando procedure per il monitoraggio delle transazioni e delle piattaforme. In questo modo possiamo rilevare e prevenire le attività illegali basandoci sullo storico dei dati, che in ultima istanza ci permette di essere sempre diversi passi avanti rispetto ai malfattori. Investiamo significativamente nella tecnologia e nell’intelligenza artificiale per implementare modelli e algoritmi avanzati, assieme ad analisi comportamentali.

question: 2 Months N26 Smart Free Trial
answer:
Eligibility: All EU marketsEver wanted to try out our N26 Smart account, but not sure if it’s for you? Well now you can enjoy 2 whole months for free - And ‘try before you buy’ - to see if our Smart account works for you, with no commitment!If you want to take part in our N26 Smart free trial, you will have access to our premium banking features included with our Smart account. And see the value by getting more out of your everyday banking.What is included in our Smart free trial?60 day free trial: Eligible N26 customers can take advantage of our 60 day Smart free trial.Cancel at any point: At any point during your free trial, you’ll be able to cancel and still enjoy the benefits for the full 60 days (you will be automatically downgraded back to Standard after 60 days)Continue with Smart: If you decide our N26 Smart account is for you, then you can take no action to continue with our Smart account and pay the monthly fee of 4,90€. If you change your mind after the free trial is over, you can always downgrade back to Standard.Enjoy the benefits of our Smart account: You can use the following benefits during your 60 day Smart free trial:Spaces (up to 10)Up to 10 Shared SpacesIBAN for Spaces (DE customers only) Up to 5 free ATM withdrawals/ monthRound-ups SavingsEnjoy partner offers and discountsPhone supportHow to access the Smart free trial?If you have been invited to a Free Trial of our Smart membership, you will be able to access it by following the instructions below. From the push notification: Tap on the push notificationWhen the N26 app opens, your invitation explaining the free trial offer will open automatically. Click on “continue” to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, please read and accept the Terms and Conditions, thenClick “Confirm Purchase” : you are officially part of the trial now, and will see a success message! From the N26 app: Open the N26 appYou will see the Smart Free Trial offer entrypoint at the top of your home screen. Tap on “Learn More” This will open the invitation screen explaining the free trial offer in detail. Click on “continue” to proceedYou will see a summary of the offer, read and accept the Terms and Conditions, then
Click “Confirm Purchase” : you are officially part of the trial now! Note: If you received an email inviting you to start the trial, we recommend opening it from your phone and clicking the “Start free trial” button. This will automatically open the N26 app and load the invitation page. Otherwise, login to your N26 mobile app and follow the app flow above.

question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte étranger ouvert, utilisé ou fermé).Complete the Cerfa n° 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: How to request the average annual balance
answer:
In the beginning of January 2022, you will receive your average annual balance for 2021 in your (new tab)Messages (new tab). You do not need to submit a request. Same thing for the average annual balance of the years 2020 and 2019.If you need your average annual balance for a year prior to 2019, please contact our Customer Service team via chat.Why do I need it?The average annual balance is used to fill out the ISEE form, report your N26 bank account with a German IBAN to the Italian tax authorities when this balance is greater than 5.000€, prove your creditworthiness, and access programs or receive special benefits from the Italian government based on your financial situation.You can request the ISEE form by filling out the DSU form, which is essential for accessing some of the tax breaks offered by the Italian government.The value of the average annual balance, which is self-certified by the bank account holder without the need for paper documentation, must be entered in the FC.2 section of the ISEE form, under “bank and postal accounts and deposits”. You should enter the type of financial asset held and the bank account balance into this field.How do I calculate it?The average annual balance is the amount obtained by dividing the sum of the daily balances of the current account by 365, regardless of the effective duration of the calendar year (leap years), and of the number of days in which the account has been active or had a positive balance, as defined by the italian Tax Authority (new tab) and in the instructions (new tab) for completing the Single Tax Declaration 2020 of the Ministry of Labor and Social Policies.FAQs on Average annual balanceIf I have an account with a German IBAN and my average balance is over € 5,000, do I have to declare it to the tax authority?Yes, you will have to fill in the Rw part of the tax return and pay VAT, a fixed amount tax of € 34.20. Click here (new tab) for more information on this.I would like to receive a PDF document with the value of my average annual balance. Is it possible?We remind you that there are no legal provisions that require banks to provide this type of certification.
We have decided to send the average annual balance as a private message, in order to make this data easily accessible and downloadable by all customers.
However, your bank statement is sufficient as official proof in the event of an explicit request by the authorities, therefore we are unable to provide any document signed by the bank in PDF or similar format.

question: How to change my phone number?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

question: Bankdokumente – Diese Belege sind verfügbar
answer:
N26 heißt nicht ohne Grund die mobile Bank – du kannst  deinen Kontoauszug, deine Bankdaten und andere Bankdokumente automatisch herunterladen. Bei den folgenden Bankdokumenten handelt es sich um offizielle Dokumente, die ohne Unterschrift gültig sind:Dein Kontoauszug ist ein Dokument, auf dem du deinen aktuellen Kontostand sowie eingehende und ausgehende Transaktionen auf deinem N26 Konto einsehen kannst. Auch dein vollständiger Name, deine IBAN und deine BIC stehen auf dem Bankdokument. So kannst du es herunterladen.Deine Bankdaten (oder: Kontobestätigung) belegen, dass dein Bankkonto unter deinem Namen registriert ist. Dieses Bankdokument beinhaltet deinen vollen Namen, dein Geburtsdatum, deine IBAN und BIC, das Datum der Kontoeröffnung und – falls gewünscht – deinen aktuellen Kontostand und deine Kartennummer (die beiden letzten Angaben sind in der Regel nicht zu sehen). So kannst du deine Bankdaten anfordern.Die Gebührenabrechnung ist ein Dokument, auf dem alle von N26 erhobenen Gebühren des letzten Jahres aufgelistet sind.In der Web-App: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab)-Symbol*, tippe auf Entgeltaufstellung, wähle je nach Bedarf 6 Monate oder 12 Monate und klicke im Anschluss auf Anfrage. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden erhältst du eine PDF in deinem Posteingang unter Nachrichten von N26.Der Überweisungsbeleg bestätigt, dass du eine Zahlung von deinem N26 Konto getätigt hast. Darin enthalten sind dein vollständiger Name, deine (im N26 Konto registrierte) Adresse, deine IBAN und BIC, der Überweisungsbetrag, das Datum, der Verwendungszweck sowie der vollständige Name, die IBAN und die BIC des Empfängers.In der mobilen und der WebApp: Gehe im Home-Bereich auf die Überweisung und wähle Überweisungsbestätigung herunterladen. Die PDF wird automatisch erstellt.Die Kartenzahlungsbestätigung wird genutzt, um eine Zahlung mit deiner N26 Mastercard zu bestätigen. Du kannst den Kontoauszug des entsprechenden Monats vorweisen.RIB (Relevé d'Identité Bancaire in Französisch) ist ein Bankdokument speziell für französische Behörden. Es enthält die wichtigsten Bankdaten, wie deinen vollständigen Namen, deine Adresse sowie IBAN und BIC.In der WebApp: Klicke auf das Download (neuen Tab) Symbol*, scrolle runter bis RIB - Relevé d’Identité Bancaire und klicke auf den Anfrage Button.   
* Das Download Symbol ist ein Rechteck mit einem nach unten zeigenden Pfeil. Es befindet sich links vom ‘Geld erhalten’ Button.

question: ¿Cómo ganar dinero al invitar a mis amigos a N26?
answer: Ten en cuenta que para recibir tu recompensa, tu amigo debe realizar una primera transacción con su tarjeta (comprar en una tienda, retirar efectivo en un cajero automático o realizar un pago online, PayPal no incluido) por un valor igual o superior al de la recompensa de la invitación. Recuerda que la cantidad de la recompensa puede tardar hasta 60 días en depositarse en tu cuenta. Puedes empezar a invitar amigos en cuanto tienes acceso a tu cuenta.Para saber la recompensa que recibes por cada invitación, simplemente ve a la sección Invitar amigos :Inicia sesión en tu cuentaDesde la pantalla principal, pulsa en Explorar (tu app) o sobre el icono 👤 Mi Cuenta (WebApp) situado en la esquina superior derecha y después en Pulsa en Invitar AmigosPulsa en Código de invitación para copiarlo y selecciona una de las opciones disponibles para compartirlo.Escribe un mensaje a tu amigo o envía el mensaje predeterminado.Pulsa Enviar.Para que tú recibas la recompensa, tu amigo debe cumplir los siguientes requisitos:Registrarse siguiendo tu enlace o código de invitación.Hacer una transacción con la tarjeta Mastercard por un valor igual o superior al bono de recompensa. Una transacción elegible puede ser una compra en un establecimiento, una retirada en un cajero o un pago online (excepto por PayPal).Verás el bono en tu cuenta N26 en un plazo de 60 días. Puedes consultar el estado de tu invitación en la app o la Web App.En total, puedes recibir hasta un máximo de €1500 invitando amigos.Si tu recompensa no te ha llegado todavía, también hemos recolectado las posibles razones.*El enlace no caduca y se puede usar infinitas veces. Los códigos y enlaces de invitación se deben utilizar solo para fines personales y no comerciales. Esto significa que puedes compartir tu enlace de invitación con tus contactos personales a través de las redes sociales, siempre y cuando tú seas el/la propietario/a principal del contenido. N26 tiene derecho a cancelar el programa de invitación en cualquier momento.Por el momento, pueden recibir recompensas por invitar a amigos los clientes con cuentas en uno de los países siguientes: Alemania, Austria, España.

question: ¿Cómo cambiar mi PIN de confirmación?
answer: Instrucciones paso a paso:iPhoneAndroidPaso 1Inicia sesión en tu aplicación N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2Desplázate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciónPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el número de 10 dígitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciónPaso 1Inicia sesión en tu aplicación N26 y ve a Mi cuenta en la esquina superior derechaPaso 2Desplázate hacia abajo y pulsa sobre SeguridadPaso 3Selecciona Modificar PIN de confirmaciónPaso 4Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (el número de 10 dígitos de tu tarjeta)Paso 5Crea y guarda tu PIN de confirmaciónEl PIN de confirmación es el que usas para confirmar las transferencias o cualquier otra operación que hagas desde la app. Si no sabes cuál es, quizá te ayude a recordarlo que tú creas tu propio PIN de confirmación cuando vinculas tu móvil (pestaña nueva) por primera vez.Si lo has olvidado o quieres cambiarlo, puedes hacerlo cuando quieras desde la app:Ve a 👤 Mi cuenta y luego Seguridad.Selecciona Cambiar PIN de confirmación.Introduce el token de tu tarjeta (es un número de 10 dígitos que aparece bajo tu nombre en la parte de delante de tu tarjeta; o por atrás, en las tarjetas N26 Smart, You y Metal).Crea y confirma tu nuevo PIN de confirmación.Si introduces el PIN de confirmación erróneamente 6 veces seguidas, tendrás que restablecerlo antes de volver a intentarlo.Por motivos de seguridad, no aceptamos ningún PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, dirección u otra combinación con dígitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el número que has elegido no es válido, vuelve a intentarlo utilizando una combinación diferente.Recuerda que tu PIN de confirmación no es el mismo que el código PIN de tu tarjeta; (pestaña nueva) pero, si tú quieres, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos.

question: Come contattare N26?
answer:
Ci sono diversi modi per contattare il nostro Supporto Clienti, ma l'opzione migliore è sempre aprire una chat sicura quando effettui l'accesso all'app. Questo ci permetterà di verificare la tua identità e fornirti informazioni e supporto specifici.La nostra chat è disponibile tutti i giorni dalle 07:00 alle 23:00, anche la domenica e nei giorni festivi.Come contattarci tramite appCome chattare con noiApri una chat di assistenzaLa chat inizierà non appena effettui l'accesso.Come chiamarci
(solo per conti Premium)Possiamo metterti in contatto con il nostro Supporto Clienti solo se ci chiami al numero registrato nel tuo conto. Se devi registrare un nuovo numero di telefono, segui i passaggi descritti in questa pagina: Come cambiare il mio numero di telefono.Attenzione: per contattarci al telefono devi possedere un conto N26 premium (You, Smart o Metal).Supporto telefonico (solo premium)Non hai accesso all'app?Non sei ancora cliente di N26?Se non hai un conto con noi ma hai domande di carattere generale sui nostri prodotti e servizi, puoi aprire una chat visitatore qui sotto oppure inviarci un email a support@n26.com (il tempo di attesa per l'e-mail potrebbe essere più lungo).Hai perso l’accesso al tuo conto?Il tuo telefono è smarrito o si è rotto? Stai riscontrando problemi per effettuare l'accesso nell'app e accedere al tuo conto? Siamo spiacenti di sapere questo problema e ti aiuteremo a risolverlo se aprirai una chat visitatore qui sotto o se ci invierai un'e-mail a support@n26.com (il tempo di attesa per l'e-mail potrebbe essere più lungo).Devi modificare i tuoi dati personali? Segui le istruzioni riportate in questa pagina.
Come posso cambiare il mio numero di telefono, l'indirizzo o altri dati personali?Attenzione: per la tua sicurezza possiamo aiutarti con domande relative ai dati personali solo se apri una chat di assistenza una volta effettuato l'accesso all'app.Apri una chat visitatoreNota bene: non siamo in grado di assisterti se ti presenterai di persona nei nostri uffici. Ti preghiamo di utilizzare solo i nostri canali designati per contattarci.

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it—you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you’ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‘Cards’ from the bottom right-handTap ‘Card Settings’ and select the relevant cardSelect ‘Reset PIN’Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you’ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction—in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences—such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn’t accepted, simply try again a different combination. If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you’ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It’s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you’ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant’s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Come posso creare Regole per i miei Spaces?
answer: Nell’ambito dei tuoi Spaces puoi decidere le tue Regole: puoi preimpostare trasferimenti periodici verso i tuoi Spaces e risparmiare tempo e denaro in modo molto semplice.Se vuoi impostare una Regola dalla webapp, effettua un bonifico con Spaces e poi seleziona “Ripeti questa operazione”. Per cancellare una regola, clicca sui 3 puntini indicanti le impostazioni. Da lì, vedrai tutte le regole attive. Clicca sull’icona del cestino per cancellare la regola. Se vuoi modificare una regola esistente, puoi semplicemente eliminarla dalle impostazioni dello Space in cui l’hai creata e crearne una nuova. Dai dispositivi Android effettua un bonifico e seleziona “Ripeti questa operazione”. In alternativa, dalla sezione Spaces, seleziona i tre puntini e poi “crea regola”. Da questo punto, segui i passaggi successivi fino a confermare le informazioni inserite.Dai dispositivi iOS, entra nella sezione Spaces e seleziona “crea regola”. Basterà inserire le informazioni richieste e confermare. Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le regole per i tuoi Spaces ed eventuali ordini di bonifici verranno elaborati allo stesso orario (0100 UTC) se impostate per lo stesso giorno. Accertati di avere fondi sufficienti per coprire queste transazioni ed evitare che non vengano eseguite. Se non riesci a coprire l’importo richiesto, basterà impostare le transazioni in date differenti in base alle tue priorità.

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (“PSD2”) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you’ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them. *applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: ¿Qué es un embargo y qué puedo hacer?
answer: ¿Cómo funciona un embargo?Un embargo es una orden judicial emitida por una entidad estatal o una Corte donde se informa a la entidad bancaria que tienes una deuda por pagar. Como consecuencia, N26 tiene la obligación de retener los fondos en tu cuenta para posteriormente transferirlos al acreedor (entidad pública o cuenta especificada por el juzgado).Los acreedores pueden ser la Agencia Tributaria, la Seguridad Social o cualquier oficina de la administración pública y las Cortes como resultado de un proceso judicial.Cuando bloqueamos el saldo en tu cuenta como consecuencia del embargo, recibirás un mensaje con la siguiente información:AcreedorNúmero del embargo Saldo a embargarSaldo embargado en tu cuenta¿Qué puedo hacer en esta situación?En primer lugar, te recomendamos comunicarte con el acreedor para llegar a un acuerdo de pago o para que levanten el embargo si lo consideran pertinente. N26 no puede tomar ninguna acción al respecto, ya que estamos obligados legalmente a efectuar el embargo y transferir los fondos, salvo que recibamos una orden de levantamiento de embargo en el tiempo determinado por la ley.Puedes realizar el pago mediante otra cuenta o a través de tu cuenta N26, aunque el dinero no se liberará hasta que el acreedor no confirme la recepción del pago.Protección de salarios y de subsidios estatalesSi recibes tu salario en tu cuenta N26, se debe aplicar una protección especial sobre un porcentaje dependiendo de tus ingresos.Sin embargo, normalmente hay que informar de esta situación al acreedor, quien notificará a N26 el levantamiento de los fondos correspondientes.¿En cuánto tiempo transfiere N26 los fondos embargados al acreedor?La transferencia de los fondos se ejecuta en tiempos diferentes dependiendo del tipo de acreedor que ha ordenado el embargo. Normalmente son 20 días (Cortes o Hacienda) y 10 días para embargos provenientes de la Seguridad Social. Los fondos se transfieren directamente a la entidad o al juzgado que ha emitido la orden; no se pueden transferir a terceros ni al deudor en ningún caso (salvo si se levanta el embargo).

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don’t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback? Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.  N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant’s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn’t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26 You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp. Go to the ‘Home’ tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute Tap ‘Get help with this transaction’ and follow the steps provided. Important: If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you’ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You’ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.  If you select a transaction but the ‘Get help’ button doesn’t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you’ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you’ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you’ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we’ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts? N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.  What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders. In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted. How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed. 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.  I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It’s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you’ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant’s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above €150 will be charged with a 12.50€ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than €150.The maximum fee is €100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
answer: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience. You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the Apple App Store (new tab) or the Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes. By disguising themselves as trusted entities, scammers are able to manipulate people into sharing their personal data. They’re able to accomplish this by targeting people through digital communication channels that we all use on a daily basis, such as: email, SMS, phone call and social media.
 
As a digital bank that’s growing in popularity, N26 customers have been targeted by phishing campaigns, during which attackers send messages, often containing a link to websites that looks very much like the N26 web-app. While they may be convincing on the surface, these websites are malicious in nature, and are in no way connected to N26. In some cases, attackers may spoof our SMS short-code, which can cause their messages to appear in the same thread as messages sent previously by N26. We ask you to remain vigilant, and contact us immediately if anything seems out of the ordinary.What is N26 doing about this? Our security personnel are continuously monitoring for future attacks, so that they can ensure any fraudulent websites are deactivated as quickly as possible, and so that we as a company can keep your account safe.As we continue to take precautions to protect your accounts and personal information, there is plenty you can do to protect yourself. Here are some things to keep in mind if you’ve received an unexpected message:If you’ve received an SMS from someone claiming to represent N26, always remember that we will never initiate contact with you via any such channels.Text messages containing a call to action are always malicious. Do not click on any links or provide any of your personal data. We will never instruct you to do anything via SMS.If you have doubts about information that has been shared with you, or you suspect you may have been led to a fraudulent site, proceed with caution. If you’ve been asked to call a number, or send a message to an email address, research the contact data and see if it corresponds to a legitimate company.If you’re ever unsure, take a screenshot of the message and get in touch with our Customer Support staff via the Chat option in your N26 app, or send it to support@n26.com. We’re always here to help!

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort your transactions and display our findings in Insights (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we’ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn’t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We’ve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: Il mio addebito diretto andrà a buon fine se non ho fondi sufficienti?
answer: Se il saldo non copre l’addebito diretto alla scadenza, questa operazione verrà annullata e ti verrà addebitata una commissione di € 3. Se hai il saldo in negativo, ti verrà addebitata una tassa per lo scoperto pari all’8,9%. Non è possibile ritardare un addebito diretto.Per evitare che succeda in futuro, puoi ricaricare il tuo conto (nuova tabella) o verificare immediatamente se sei idoneo a uno scoperto di conto bancario N26 nell’app (disponibile in Germania e Austria).*Solo per i paesi fuori dall'Eurozona: Se stai impostando un addebito diretto nella tua valuta nazionale, sarà la banca ricevente a dettare il tasso del cambio e l'importo finale che verrà riscosso da noi. Di seguito puoi trovare l'elenco dei paesi:BulgariaCroaziaRepubblica CecaDanimarcaUngheriaIslandaLiechtensteinNorvegiaPoloniaRomaniaSveziaSvizzera

question: Warum konnte mein Wise-Konto nicht verknüpft werden?
answer: Der häufigste Grund dafür, dass Kunden ihr Wise-Konto nicht mit ihrem N26 Konto verknüpfen können, ist, dass sie ihre persönlichen Informationen auf ihrem Wise-Konto nicht vollständig angegeben haben.Falls du ein Konto direkt bei Wise eröffnet hast und dieselbe E-Mail-Adresse benutzt hast wie für dein N26 Konto, jedoch deine persönlichen Informationen nicht vollständig ausgefüllt hast, können wir dein Konto nicht mit N26 verknüpfen.Bitte logge dich unter (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/d (neuen Tab)e in dein Wise-Konto ein oder benutze ihre App und stelle sicher, dass du deinen vollen Namen, Adresse, Geburtsdatum und Handynummer vollständig angegeben hast.Falls du dein Passwort für dein Wise-Konto vergessen hast, gehe zu (neuen Tab)https://wise.com/de (neuen Tab) und wähle ‘Passwort vergessen’, um es zurückzusetzen und auf dein Konto zuzugreifen.Falls du dich nicht erinnern kannst, ob du ein Konto bei Wise eröffnet hast, solltest du trotzdem versuchen dich einzuloggen, indem du dein Passwort zurücksetzt. Es könnte sein, dass es von einem anderen Partner eröffnet wurde oder einfach eine Weile her ist.

question: Quelle est la fréquence des retraits gratuits ?
answer:
Les retraits d’espèces avec votre Mastercard sont régis par les Conditions Générales d’Utilisation qui s’appliquent à votre pays (celui où votre carte a été livrée) :
Allemagne : Dans les distributeurs en Allemagne : N26 Standard et N26 Business : 3 retraits gratuits par mois en euros. 
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.N26 Smart et N26 Business Smart: 5 retraits gratuits par mois en euros.
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.N26 You et N26 Business You : 5 retraits gratuits par mois en euros. 
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.N26 Metal et N26 Business Metal: 8 retraits gratuits par mois en euros. 
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.En dehors de l’Allemagne, dans la zone euro : retraits illimités et gratuits en euros.Pour les retraits en devises étrangères :N26 Standard et Smart, N26 Business et Business Smart: des frais de change de 1,7% s’appliquent à chaque retrait.N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal et N26 Metal : retraits illimités sans frais de change.En utilisant CASH26 (nouvel onglet)Autriche: Retraits gratuits et illimités en euros (CASH26 (nouvel onglet) inclus).Italie, France, Espagne, Pays-Bas et le reste de l’Europe :Dans les distributeurs de votre pays et dans les autres pays de la zone euro : N26 Standard et N26 Business : 3 retraits gratuits par mois en euros.
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Business Smart et N26 Business You : 5 retraits gratuits par mois en euros. 
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.N26 Metal et N26 Business Metal: 8 retraits gratuits par mois en euros. 
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.Pour les retraits en devises étrangères :N26 Standard, N26 Smart et N26 Business, N26 Business Smart : des frais de change de 1,7% s’appliquent à chaque retrait.N26 You, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal et N26 Metal : retraits illimités sans frais de change.
Suisse :Pour les retraits en devise locale : des frais de change de 1,7% s’appliquent à chaque retrait.Dans les pays de la zone euro : N26 Standard et N26 Business : 3 retraits gratuits par mois en euros. 
Des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à chaque retrait au-delà de cette limite.
Si vous utilisez une carte Maestro (nouvel onglet), des frais de 2 € s’appliquent à tous les retraits d’espèces. Avec un compte N26 Flex, chaque retrait est soumis à des frais de 2 €. Cette carte est uniquement disponible en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas.Pour plus de détails concernant les frais appliqués aux retraits (nouvel onglet), veuillez consulter nos Tarifs (nouvel onglet).

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: Was ist N26 Business?
answer: Verfügbar in Österreich, Belgien, Dänemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Slowakei Spanien, Schweden und der Schweiz.Es ist aktuell noch nicht möglich, zwischen verschiedenen Konten zu wechseln, daher musst du entscheiden, ob N26 Business das Richtige für dich ist:Das N26 Business Konto ist für Selbständige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur für den geschäftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erhältst jeden Monat (0,1 % | 0,5 %) Cashback auf alle mit deiner Karte getätigten Zahlungen. Alle während des Monats erhaltenen Zahlungsrückerstattungen werden vom Gesamtzahlungsbetrag abgezogen, um den Cashback zu berechnen. Die Rückerstattungen beziehen sich möglicherweise auf eine Zahlung im selben oder im Vormonat. Der Vorgang beginnt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis dies auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht möglich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu führen. Wenn du also auch eine Karte für private Ausgaben benötigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine Maestrocard zu ordern (erhältlich in Deutschland, Österreich und den Niederlanden).Der Cashback wird monatlich ausgestellt, die dafür berechtigten Transaktionen eines bestimmten Monats werden im darauffolgenden Monat verarbeitet, beginnend am 15. Tag. Bitte rechne damit, dass es bis zu 7 Tage dauern kann, bis die Cashback-Gutschrift in deinem N26 Business Konto erscheint.Wie beim N26 Bankkonto ist das Konto gebührenfrei und wir decken bestimmte Bargeldabhebungen im Rahmen unserer Fair Use Policy ab. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Konten sind Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen mit N26 Business nicht aus der App möglich. Das kannst du über TransferWise (neuen Tab) machen.Firmenlastschriften (Business to Business oder B2B) sind mit dem N26 Business Konto nicht möglich.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Comment puis-je fournir une preuve de l’origine des fonds pour mon compte ?
answer: En tant que banque entièrement agréée, N26 doit effectuer des contrôles de routine sur les comptes utilisateurs. En tant qu’institution réglementée, cela nous permet de protéger les fonds des comptes N26.Parfois, les résultats de ces contrôles de routine peuvent demander que nous contactions un titulaire de compte pour demander une preuve de l’origine des fonds sur le compte, ce qui est une pratique conforme à la réglementation bancaire allemande.Dans tous les cas, nous ne vous contacterons toujours qu’à l’adresse email associée à votre compte N26. Cet email vous fournira des instructions claires sur la manière d’envoyer ces documents, qui peuvent être des numérisations ou des photos de reçus, de fiches de paie, de factures ou d’instructions de paiement.Soyez toujours vigilant et vérifiez que cet email provient bien de N26. Nous ne demanderons jamais les coordonnées de votre compte N26, votre mot de passe ou toute information communiquée dans le cadre du processus de vérification.

question: How to report an insurance claim?
answer: Your N26 You (new tab) and N26 Metal (new tab) membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to 👤 My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren’t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you’re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: Come si fa un bonifico SEPA?
answer: Puoi inviare bonifici verso tutti i paesi dell'area SEPA (se la banca ricevente accetta trasferimenti in euro).I bonifici in uscita possono essere effettuati tramite la versione mobile e web dell’app N26 in questo modo:Dalla schermata principale, vai nella sezione Dal mio conto. Seleziona Dal mio conto, Bonifico bancario e poi Aggiungi nuovo beneficiario. Inserisci il nome e l'IBAN del beneficiario e seleziona Continua.Inserisci l'importo e seleziona Avanti.Aggiungi un messaggio se necessario, oppure seleziona Salta.Controlla i dati del bonifico nell’apposita schermata.Nella stessa schermata puoi scegliere la data in cui vuoi che il bonifico venga inviato oppure salvarlo come ordine permanente.Seleziona Invia e conferma con il tuo PIN di Conferma.Dovrai, infine, confermare o annullare il bonifico tramite notifica push dal tuo dispositivo associato.Una volta che il bonifico viene confermato nella app, non possiamo più annullarlo o cambiare i dettagli del beneficiario.Se non riesci a confermare l’invio del bonifico tramite app, dovresti accertarti di quanto segue:hai una connessione internet stabilehai abilitato le notifiche push sul tuo dispositivo (le notifiche si abilitano dalle impostazioni del dispositivo e non dall’app N26) stai usando il dispositivo associato Dopo aver inviato il bonifico, potrai scaricare il PDF relativo alla transazione in questo modo: Vai alla tua lista di transazioni.Individua e seleziona il bonifico. Scorri verso il basso, fino a Informazioni sul bonifico e seleziona Conferma di trasferimentoPuoi inviare bonifici SEPA direttamente dai tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale con un IBAN assegnato. Basta andare nello Space con l'IBAN assegnato, selezionare "Invia denaro" e poi "Bonifico bancario". Funzionerà come un normale pagamento in uscita.

question: Wie speichere ich die Daten eines Überweisungsempfängers?
answer: Jedes Mal, wenn du eine Überweisung an einen neuen Empfänger in der App erstellst (klicke im Startbildschirm auf den Tab Geld senden, anschließend auf Banküberweisung und schließlich auf Einen neuen Empfänger hinzufügen), werden einige Daten wie der Name des Empfängers und die IBAN automatisch in deiner Kontaktliste für zukünftige Überweisungen gespeichert. Du kannst auch Kontakte löschen oder deinen Transaktionsverlauf mit ihnen einsehen:iOS: Tippe auf die drei Punkte links, um den Kontakt zu löschen.Android: Tippe auf die drei Punkte rechts, um den Kontakt zu löschen.Beachte, dass das Löschen eines Kontakteintrags den zugehörigen Transaktionsverlauf nicht löscht.

question: PSD2 - un Open Banking sicuro
