answer: Cos’è la PSD2?La Direttiva sui Servizi di Pagamento 2 («PSD2») è la nuova direttiva europea  che ti consente di accedere alle informazioni sul tuo conto e di effettuare la disposizione di ordini di pagamento tramite  terze parti autorizzate in modo sicuro e protetto.Questo  significa che puoi autorizzare  terze parti ad accedere alle informazioni del tuo conto tramite un’interfaccia dedicata.Puoi abilitare un servizio d’informazioni sui conti t (AIS) per riunire i dati relativi ai  tuoi conti bancari che possiedi e gestirli attraverso fornitori terzi certificati;Puoi pagare in modo sicuro su  qualsiasi sito che offre servizi di pagamento (PIS).Lo scambio di dati avviene tramite il  nostro partner - Token.io.Come funziona?Se decidi di utilizzare  un servizio di pagamento come il servizio di informazione sui conti oppure il servizio di disposizione di ordini di pagamento, verrai reindirizzato all'app di N26 tramite Token.io per confermare la richiesta di accesso.Nella nostra Informativa sulla privacy (nuova tabella) ti informiamo sulle finalità, le parti coinvolte e le basi giuridiche del trattamento dei dati necessari per adempiere ai nostri obblighi nel quadro della nuova direttiva europea sui servizi di pagamento.Domande frequenti Perché non riesco a collegare terze parti al mio conto?Se una terza parte non ha effettuato l'integrazione con la nostra interfaccia dedicata, dovrà farlo  attraverso il nostro partner Token.io. Come posso revocare il consenso conferito ad una singola terza parte?Dovrai contattare la terza parte in questione direttamente e richiedere la revoca del consenso.*si applica a tutti i paesi EEA.

question: ¿Qué son los Espacios Compartidos?
answer: Con los Espacios Compartidos ahora puedes compartir dinero de forma rápida y fácil. Estos espacios se pueden usar para lo que sea, tanto para compartir facturas como para planear vacaciones u organizar el cumpleaños de un amigo o familiar.Los Espacios Compartidos están disponibles para los usuarios con plan premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You y N26 Business Metal), los cuales pueden crear e invitar a otros a su Espacio.Puede participar en un espacio cualquier usuario de N26, tenga la cuenta que tenga. El administrador del espacio es el dueño legal del dinero de ese espacio. El administrador puede invitar hasta 10 participantes y puede eliminarlos siempre que quiera. Como todos los Espacios, los Espacios Compartidos no tienen un IBAN o tarjeta asociada a ellos.

question: How to close my account?
answer: We’re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We’d love to keep you as a customer—tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account. If you’ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here’s what to do:Make your account balance €0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is €0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You’ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you’re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or “as soon as possible”Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we’ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: How can I provide proof of origins of funds for my account?
answer: As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to reach out to an account holder to ask for proof of the origin of the funds in the account, which is a practice in line with German banking regulations. Whenever this may be the case, we will only ever contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on how you will be able to submit these documents, which can include scans or photos of receipts, payslips, invoices or payment instructions. Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26 - we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or any details shared in your verification process.

question: Is N26 Closing All US Accounts?
answer:
Is N26 closing all US accounts? N26 has made the decision to sharpen its focus on its European business and will no longer be available to customers in the US after January 18th, 2022.  What will happen next?US customers have been sent a formal notification email to the email address connected to their account. This notification gives notice of account closure date alongside detailed next steps about how to withdraw funds from the account and how we will ensure that money is safely returned to account holders. In the meantime, all account and app functionality will continue to work, so customers can still spend or withdraw the money in their account until it is closed. All Axos Bank® sponsored US N26 accounts will continue to receive FDIC insurance protection on a pass-through basis up to the applicable legal limit until they are closed.No other markets in which N26 operates are impacted. How do I withdraw my money from my account?If you have money in your account (including in Spaces), please consider the following ways that you can withdraw money out of the account:Provide your N26 account number and routing number to your alternative bank and, from your alternative bank, request an debit ACH transfer out of your N26 account 
Withdraw cash for free from your account at over 55,000 Allpoint® ATM locations (new tab).Alternatively, you can withdraw cash from any ATM where Visa or Plus is accepted, (fees and surcharges may apply). Please be aware that there is a $1,500 daily withdrawal limit
Spend the money normally using your debit card or Apple/Google Pay until January 18th, 2022.
Contact N26 customer support via live chat or phone and provide your alternative bank account number and routing number, so we can assist you with closing your N26 account and sending your remaining funds via ACH transfer.What other actions do I need to take?In addition to transferring your money prior to your account being closed on January 18th, 2022, please consider these key actions you may want to take:If you have direct deposit or any recurring payment set up for your N26 account, please contact your employer or the merchant to update the account information to an alternative bank account.
If you have money in your Spaces, please move it to your main account to ensure that all money is withdrawn before your account is closed. 
If you have Round-Up rules or scheduled external bank transfers on your account, please cancel them before your account is closed.What happens after January 18th, 2022?All US N26 accounts will be closed on January 18th, 2022. If you do not take any action before January 18th, 2022 and still have money in your account, we will issue a paper check to the address we have on file with your remaining account balance. Please allow at least 14 business days for the check to be processed and mailed out.Will I still be able to access my app and transaction details once the account is closed?No. Once we close the account you will not be able to log into the N26 app or directly access historic account information. We advise you to (new tab)download your account statement before the account is closed.Will you keep my data even though you have closed my account?US laws and regulations require that certain data be retained for a period of time after account closure.  I have another question - how can I speak to customer service?Please contact us via email at support-us@n26.com (new tab)

question: Was tun, wenn meine Kontosicherheit beeinträchtigt wurde?
answer:
Betrugshotline - Kontaktiere uns.Du hast per Banküberweisung (SEPA oder SWIFT) Geld an einen Betrüger überwiesen, der eine N26 IBAN hat? Ruf uns an! +49 30 22957300. Servicezeiten: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Bitte beachte, dass die Hotline ausschließlich für die oben beschriebenen Fälle vorgesehen ist. Wenn du ein anderes Anliegen hast, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice.Bitte beachte, dass wir keine ausgehenden Anrufe auf dieser Leitung vornehmen, sondern nur Anrufe entgegennehmen. Falls jemand vortäuschen sollte, dich von dieser Nummer anzurufen, gehe bitte nicht darauf ein. Wenn du denkst, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, ändere als Erstes dein Passwort. Danach kannst du je nach Situation verschiedene Maßnahmen ergreifen:Was sollte ich tun, wenn mir eine Transaktion auf meinem Konto verdächtig vorkommt?Wenn du eine verdächtige Transaktion bemerkst, erfahre mehr dazu in unserem Artikel: Wie reklamiere ich eine Transaktion?"
Danach solltest du sofort unser Kundenserviceteam kontaktieren, entweder direkt über die N26 App oder per E-Mail an support@n26.com (neuen Tab).Wenn du lieber telefonieren möchtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zurück und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erkläre uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.Um unsere Sicherheitsmaßnahmen auch über unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.Die einzelnen Fälle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir außerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,Was sollte ich tun, wenn ich meine Karte verloren habe oder denke, dass meine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden?Wenn du deine N26 Karte verloren hast, sie dir gestohlen wurde oder du denkst, dass deine Kartendaten missbraucht wurden, solltest du deine Karte sofort in deiner N26 App sperren und eine neue beantragen, damit dein Geld sicher bleibt.Was passiert, wenn ich mein gekoppeltes Gerät verloren habe? Könnte in diesem Fall jemand auf mein Konto zugreifen?Wenn du dein gekoppeltes Gerät verloren hast oder es dir gestohlen wurde, kannst du dich darauf verlassen, dass man auf deine N26 App nur unter Eingabe des richtigen Passworts oder mit Fingerabdruck- oder Gesichtserkennung zugreifen kann. Wenn du ein neues Gerät hast, hilft dir unser Kundenserviceteam gerne dabei, es mit deinem N26 Konto zu koppeln.Was ist, wenn ich eine Idee habe, um die Sicherheit bei N26 zu verbessern?Mehr darüber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall schützen, erfährst du in unserem Blog (neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel über Sicherheit bei N26 (neuen Tab).Du erreichst uns im Chat täglich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

question: How does 3D Secure work?
answer: 3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It’s automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard for which 3D Secure authentification is necessary, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the troubleshooting tips we've collected.Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you’ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant’s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

question: Comment déclarer son compte N26 aux impôts français ?
answer: (S’applique aux résidents français)Conformément au Code général des impôts, vous êtes tenu de déclarer tout compte bancaire ouvert à l’étranger si vous l'avez ouvert, utilisé ou fermé au cours de l'année pour laquelle vous déclarez vos revenus. Cela s’applique donc pour votre compte N26.Cela signifie que si vous avez ouvert votre compte N26 en décembre 2019, vous devez déclarer votre compte lors de votre déclaration de revenus gagnés en 2019, en 2020. De la même façon, si vous avez ouvert votre compte en mars 2020, vous devrez le déclarer avec vos revenus de 2020, en 2021.Pour ce faire :Au moment de remplir les informations relatives à vos “revenus et charges” demandées lors de l’Étape 3, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Divers. Vous devrez cocher la case “Comptes à l’étranger, reprise de réductions ou de crédit d’impôt”.Dans la fenêtre "Déclarations annexes” qui apparaît, cochez la case correspondant au formulaire N°3916 “Déclaration par un résident d’un compte ouvert, détenu, utilisé ou clos à l’étranger”.Ensuite, accédez au formulaire en cliquant sur “Annexe n°3916”, accessible en haut à gauche de votre écran de télédéclaration.En cliquant sur l’Annexe, indiquez d’abord combien de comptes vous souhaitez déclarer. Indiquez “1” si votre compte N26 est le seul compte à l’étranger que vous avez ouvert, utilisé ou clos en 2020.Remplissez le formulaire en indiquant les informations ci-dessous pour votre compte N26.Retrouvez une aide détaillée, étape par étape, en lisant l'article de notre blog (nouvel onglet) prévu à cet effet.

question: Comment demander le remboursement d'un prélèvement automatique ?
answer: Le remboursement d’un prélèvement automatique n’annule pas le contrat conclu avec le commerçant.Vous pouvez demander le remboursement d’un prélèvement automatique SEPA dans votre application N26 dans les 8 semaines suivant le débit. Le prélèvement automatique sera crédité sur votre compte N26 sous deux jours ouvrables.Demander le remboursement d’un prélèvement automatique sur mon compte courant :Connectez-vous à l’application mobile N26Ouvrez votre liste de transactions et sélectionnez le prélèvement automatique en question.Sélectionnez RemboursementDemandez le remboursement d’un prélèvement automatique dans mon Espace avec IBAN (sous-compte) :Vous pouvez également demander le remboursement d’un prélèvement automatique dans vos Espaces associés à un IBAN :Connectez-vous à l’application mobile N26Appuyez sur EspacesAccédez à l’Espace dans lequel vous souhaitez recevoir le remboursement d’un prélèvement automatiqueSélectionnez la transaction de prélèvement automatique dans votre liste de transactionsSélectionnez Remboursement**Bon à savoir pour les pays en dehors de la zone euro : si vous mettez en place un prélèvement automatique avec un marchand et qu’il est facturé dans la devise locale de votre pays, le taux de change appliqué (et donc le montant final débité sur votre compte N26) est défini et collecté par la banque qui reçoit votre paiement. Voici la liste des pays concernés : BulgarieCroatieDanemarkHongrieIslandeLiechtensteinNorvègePologneRépublique TchèqueRoumanieSuèdeSuisse

question: What is my PIN number?
answer:
First things first: at N26 there are two different PIN codes—your Confirmation PIN and your Card PIN. Fun fact—you create both of them yourself.Your Confirmation PIN (new tab) is used to confirm all actions made within the app, such as transfers, password changes, CASH26, etc. You set it up from the app when you pair your smartphone for the first time.You can change it from My Account > Security > Change your Confirmation PIN.
Your Card PIN (new tab) is used to make withdrawals and pay in shops with your card. You set it up from the app right after receiving and activating your N26 card.You can change it from Cards > Card settings > Reset PIN. If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, or Estonia you must make an ATM withdrawal to fully set your new PIN number.Important:We'll never send you a PIN via post or any of our communications channels. You’re the only one who should ever know your PINs.For security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1994, 1331, or 1234). If the number you chose is incorrect, please try a different combination.For further details about these PINs, visit the corresponding Support Center articles linked above.

question: Wie bestelle ich eine extra Karte?
answer: Klicke hier, wenn du deine Karte ersetzen willst, anstatt eine zusätzliche Karte zu bestellen.So kannst du eine extra Karte bestellen:Logge dich in dein N26 Konto einGehe zu: Entdecken Wähle: Zusatzkarte > MastercardWähle deine bevorzugte Farbe und VersandartTippe: Bestätigen und BezahlenDie Zusatzkarte kostet 10€ per Standardversand und 25€ per Expresslieferung. Um die Produktion und Lieferung der Karte auszulösen, benötigst du außerdem einen einmaligen Mindestbetrag in Höhe von 10€ auf deinem Konto. Mehr dazu erfährst du hier.ℹ️ Die Zusatzkarte ist verfügbar für Kunden mit einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in den folgenden Ländern: Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Österreich, Dänemark, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, Schweden, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Griechenland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Niederlande.

question: Come ricaricare il mio conto?
answer: Dopo aver aperto il tuo conto N26, puoi ricevere accrediti fin da subito nei seguenti modi:Bonifici SEPA. Invia bonifici SEPA in EURO oppure imposta bonifici ricorrenti verso il tuo conto per essere sicuro che il tuo saldo sia sempre positivo oppure, in casi più urgenti, puoi ricevere bonifici istantanei*. Il tempo di accredito è fino a 2 giorni lavorativi.Accredito stipendio. Fai trasferire le tue entrate fisse sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA. Ti basterà fornire l'IBAN al mandante. Carta di debito, credito o prepagata. Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto inserendo nell'app N26 i dettagli della carta associata ad un tuo altro conto. Il servizio di accredito istantaneo del Conto consente di ricaricare un importo compreso tra 20 € e 450 € al mese. Il primo deposito è gratuito, sui depositi successivi sarà applicata una commissione dell' 3 %. Le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate. Apple Pay o Google Pay (nuova tabella). Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto utilizzando Apple Pay (per dispositivi iOS) o GPay (per dispositivi Android). Puoi scegliere di depositare tra 20 € e 450 €. Il primo deposito è gratuito, sui depositi successivi sarà applicata una commissione dell' 3 %. Le carte prepagate così come le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate. CASH26. (valido per Italia, Spagna, Grecia, Germania e Austria). Con CASH26 puoi versare contanti sul tuo conto N26 semplicemente recandoti presso i supermercati convenzionati.MoneyBeam. Con MoneyBeam puoi ricevere denaro da altri utenti N26 in tempo reale.iDEAL (valido solo nei Paesi Bassi). Per clienti con Termini e Condizioni olandesi e un account iDEAL. Il primo deposito è gratuito. Sui seguenti depositi sarà addebitata una commissione pari all'1,5% dell'importo del deposito.GiroPay (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Germania per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni tedeschi un conto Giropay.EPS (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Austria per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni austriaci e un conto EPS.Bancontact (istantaneo): Disponibile solo in Belgio per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni belgi e un conto Bancontact.*Per ricevere un bonifico istantaneo è necessario che il mittente selezioni questa tipologia di bonifico e che la banca emittente la supporti. Altrimenti verrà accreditato entro 2 giorni lavorativi. Il limite massimo per bonifici SEPA istantanei in entrata è di 100.000 €. Non viene applicato alcun limite ai normali bonifici SEPA in entrata.

question: Why can’t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone’s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone’s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don’t see your friend’s name on MoneyBeam but you know they’re an N26 user, they most likely haven’t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don’t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‘Sharing Money’Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:“Advanced electronic signature” will pop-up. Tap “sign”Check both “Advanced electronic signature” and “Power of attorney”, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: How to invite friends to join N26?
answer: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: Come funziona Spaces?
answer: Spaces è una funzionalità per conti Premium che ti permette di creare diversi spazi nel tuo conto principale, per mettere da parte del denaro. Puoi personalizzare ogni spazio a tuo piacimento e trasferire denaro dal tuo conto principale allo spazio, in tempo reale. Spaces è disponibile via app e WebApp (nuova tabella) in tutti i paesi.Oltre al tuo conto corrente principale, puoi creare degli spazi aggiuntivi tutte le volte che vuoi, ma ricorda che il numero di spazi attivi che puoi avere dipende dalla tipologia di conto che possiedi: fino a 10 spazi per i conti N26 You, N26 Smart e N26 Metal.Inoltre, l’estratto conto del tuo conto principale, includerà anche le transazioni inviate a uno spazio specifico e quelle ricevute da esso.Solo il tuo spazio principale (conto corrente principale) può avere un saldo negativo, nel caso in cui lo scoperto di conto sia disponibile per te. Tutti gli altri spazi non possono avere un saldo negativo, puoi trasferire negli spazi soltanto un ammontare di denaro effettivamente disponibile.Per effettuare una qualsiasi transazione con la tua Mastercard, potrai usare soltanto il saldo disponibile nel tuo conto principale. Ti suggeriamo quindi di trasferire nel tuo conto principale denaro sufficiente per effettuare la transazione, prima che questa avvenga.Sposta denaro da uno space all'altro tenendo premuto sul tuo account principale e trascinandolo nel tuo space. Una volta confermato l’ammontare, il tuo saldo attuale verrà aggiornato subito dopo.Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno space in qualsiasi momento dal tuo dispositivo mobile e dalla tua app web. Dovrai solo confermare l'operazione con il tuo PIN di conferma. Se uno space è bloccato, sarai comunque in grado di trasferire denaro verso di esso. Se devi prelevare denaro da uno space bloccato, dovrai prima sbloccarlo.Puoi anche aprire i dettagli della transazione dalla lista movimenti Spaces, esattamente come nel tuo conto principale.Puoi tenere nascosto il saldo presente in uno Space al saldo totale sul conto. Per fare questo, entra nello Space, seleziona i tre puntini in alto a destra e poi "nascondi il saldo dello spazio".Adesso puoi anche bloccare i trasferimenti da uno Space. Vai alle impostazioni dello Space e seleziona Blocca i trasferimenti al conto principale o ad altri Spazi e inserisci il tuo PIN di Conferma per convalidare l'opzione.Potrai anche cancellare definitivamente uno Space, sempre dal menù Impostazioni dello Space stesso.Spaces include una opzione chiamata Regole, con le quali potrai gestire il tuo tempo e il tuo denaro in maniera molto semplice.Round-Up Savings:Con la funzione “Round-Up Savings”, i clienti Premium possono far arrotondare tutte le transazioni con carta alla cifra tonda in euro più prossima, mettendo ogni volta da parte la differenza in uno spazio a scelta.Gli arrotondamenti non ti faranno andare in scoperto. Se il tuo saldo non è sufficiente a coprire l’arrotondamento, questo non verrà effettuato.Puoi avere solo un arrotondamento attivo alla volta quando trasferisci il denaro in uno spazio di tua preferenza.Puoi disattivare la funzione “Round-Up” in qualsiasi momento.Se chiudi uno spazio per cui sono abilitati gli arrotondamenti, la funzione “Round-Up” verrà disattivata fino a quando non la riattiverai.

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:・ iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
・ Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time. Remember—you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app—you’ll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember—you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you’ll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab). To unpair your old smartphone:Go to 👤 My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to 👤 My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: ¿Cómo cerrar la cuenta?
answer: Si por alguna extraña razón decidieras cerrar tu cuenta de N26, lo respetamos; y aunque te echaremos de menos, aquí puedes ver que hasta darse de baja también es fácil.Si tienes un plan premium, primero piensa si quieres realmente cerrar la cuenta o, mejor, si prefieres simplemente cancelar la suscripción (pestaña nueva) y quedarte con el plan Estándar gratis.Para cerrar la cuenta por completo, haz lo siguiente:Si tienes saldo positivo, transfiere tus fondos restantes a otra cuenta antes de iniciar el proceso. Si tienes saldo negativo, ingresa (pestaña nueva) el dinero que falte en la cuenta N26. El objetivo es dejar tu balance a 0 para que todo vaya mucho más rápido.Haz clic aquí para seguir los pasos del proceso electrónico de cierre de cuenta (pestaña nueva). Tendrás que iniciar sesión para verificar tu identidad y, después, la app te guiará por el proceso para dar de baja tu cuenta.Destruye tu tarjeta cortándola con unas tijeras (por ejemplo). Hay que cortar el chip y la banda magnética, y después deshacerse de los trozos por separado.ImportanteSolo si no puedes iniciar sesión en tu cuenta y, por lo tanto, el enlace del proceso electrónico te da error, puedes enviarnos un email a (pestaña nueva)support@n26.com (pestaña nueva) desde tu dirección de email registrada, adjuntando este formulario de cancelación (pestaña nueva), que requiere:La declaración donde solicitas el cierre de tu cuenta en una fecha determinada o «lo antes posible»;tu nombre;tu IBAN de N26;un IBAN diferente dentro de la zona SEPA (euro) para transferir tu saldo restante en caso de que sea positivo (tanto en Espacios como en tu cuenta principal).

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you’re able to see what’s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you’ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can’t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days. Sometimes you’ll see both payments at the same time–the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn’t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab). Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

question: Was sind Spaces?
answer:
Setze dir Ziele, erstelle, personalisiere und überweise Geld zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces in Echtzeit. Spaces ist in deiner App und WebApp (neuen Tab) verfügbar.Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder primären Space) kannst du beliebig oft zusätzliche Spaces anlegen und löschen, wobei die Anzahl der verfügbaren aktiven Spaces von deinem Kontotyp abhängt: bis zu 10 zusätzliche Spaces mit N26 You, N26 Smart und N26 Metal.Die Kontoauszüge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces überwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die Kontoauszüge kannst du online herunterladen.Nur dein Hauptkonto kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einen Dispokredit hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur Beträge überweisen, die dort jeweils auch verfügbar sind.Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem Hauptkonto für Kartenzahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld überweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf tätigen kannst.Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedrückt hältst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine Bestätigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf überweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen möchtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe dafür zum gewünschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".Du kannst jetzt Zahlungen von einem Space sperren. Gehe einfach zu den Einstellungen des entsprechenden Space und tippe auf Zahlungen an mein Hauptkonto oder anderen Space sperren. Bestätige dann mit deiner Bestätigungs-PIN.Du kannst jetzt einen Space auch löschen, wenn eine Karte damit verknüpft ist. Gehe dazu in die Einstellungen von deinem Space.Spaces enthält eine Funktion, die “Regeln” heißt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Round-up Savings:Mit der Funktion „Round-up Savings“ können Premiumkunden jede von ihnen getätigte Kartentransaktion auf den nächsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung führt nicht zu einer Überziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du über kein ausreichendes Guthaben verfügen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgeführt.Du kannst immer nur eine „Round-up“-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl überweisen.Du kannst die Funktion „Round-up“ jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schließt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die „Round-up“-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.IBANs für Spaces:Premiumkunden (N26 Smart, You und Metal), die ihr Konto in Deutschland eröffnet haben und über eine deutsche IBAN verfügen, können ihrem Space bzw. ihren Spaces nun eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen. Sobald einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde, können über den Space bestimmte Überweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften getätigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Zusammenfassung, wie du deine Spaces für eine noch bessere Übersicht über deine eingehenden und ausgehenden Überweisungen nutzen kannst: Überweisungen empfangen: Sobald du dem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, kannst du die individuelle IBAN angeben, um Überweisungen zu empfangen.Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift tätigen: Mit Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN kannst du Zahlungen per Lastschrift tätigen.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces mit einer individuellen IBAN erstellen, um noch mehr Kontrolle über deine eingehenden und ausgehenden Geldflüsse zu haben. Du hast insgesamt 10 IBANs zur Verfügung.Unseren speziellen Artikel mit weiteren Informationen zu IBANs für Spaces findest du hier.

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you, as you are already a N26 customer. Lookalike audiences allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so-called “Lookalike-Audiences” are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user. In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called “hashing” is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook (new tab).Facebook Ireland Limited transfers data to Facebook Inc., USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‘GDPR’) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available. You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.Data Processing in the framework of Google Customer MatchCustomer Match allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences. Custom audiences consist of N26 customers and internet users to display personalised content, or only internet users to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from certain of our advertisements across the Google Search Network, the Shopping tab, Gmail, YouTube, and Google Display Network. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Lookalike audiences allow us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Google users. These so-called ‘lookalike audiences’ are more similar to our customers than the average Google user.In order to profit from the benefits described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Google. The so-called “hashing” is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Google then matches this email address against your potential Google account email address. If this email address does not match, Google may still use it as part of a policy compliance check, but Google will not otherwise use it for Customer Match or any other Google product. The data is not retained by Google for any longer than 48 hours to create the Customer Match audiences, and promptly deleted afterwards. Google does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the support article How Google uses Customer Match data (new tab).Google Ireland Limited transfers data to Google LLC, USA. The USA is a country that - in the terms of EU Regulation 2016/679 (‘GDPR’) - does not provide an adequate level of protection of personal data; this implies, among other things, that governmental agencies in the USA may have the right to access your data without effective remedies being available. You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app and app at any time.

question: Comment faire un don avec N26 ?
answer:
N26 a toujours été impliqué dans la lutte contre la faim et les inégalités aux côtés d’organisations humanitaires. Il sera désormais encore plus facile de faire un don depuis votre compte N26. Vous pouvez désormais envoyer un don à une liste d’organisations caritatives que nous avons sélectionnées, directement depuis votre application N26. Le montant total sera envoyé par virement bancaire à l’organisation caritative sélectionnée.Pour envoyer un don à une organisation caritative, veuillez suivre les étapes suivantes :Depuis l’écran d’accueil de votre application, appuyez sur Envoyer.Sélectionnez Don et ContinuerChoisissez une organisation caritative dans la liste Sélectionnez Continuer pour faire un don.Saisissez le montant de votre don, puis confirmez la transaction avec votre code PIN.
Dans de nombreux cas, une preuve de paiement est suffisante pour demander l’abattement fiscal de votre don dans votre déclaration d’impôts sur le revenu. Cependant, si vous avez besoin d’un reçu officiel de don de l’organisation caritative, nous vous prions de la contacter directement (avec votre preuve de paiement), car seules les organisations caritatives peuvent délivrer des reçus de don et non N26.

question: Why isn't my video verification working?
answer: Tips for a successful video verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of our supported countries to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver’s licenses or residence permits can’t be used). Also, the document shouldn’t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'll need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery of your card. Please note that this is not a fee: your first card after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. Deliveries take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: How to use Google Pay?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, SwitzerlandGoogle Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don’t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We’ll ask you to confirm your payment via push message during checkout.How to get started:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app on your smartphone (it requires Android 5.0 or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone).Login to your N26 mobile app and go to Cards > Cards Settings > Add to Google Pay. You will then be redirected to Google Pay app.Some tips to keep in mind:Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn’t set it up yet, you’ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If you’re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don’t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn’t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

question: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benötigen
answer:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gemäß des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen Behörden in der Europäischen Union Informationen über Kundenkonten zur Verfügung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen Ländern steuerpflichtig sind.Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard für den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur Bekämpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen Behörden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher Vermögenswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 Länder haben sich erklärt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner über ihre Vermögenswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.Damit wir feststellen können, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen Behörden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, müssen wir dich fragen:In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen Ländern hast, greifen für gewöhnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden Länder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren Ländern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, müssen wir wissen, um welche Länder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen Behörden zuverlässige Informationen zur Verfügung stellen können.
Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (“TIN”) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den Ländern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung (neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten veröffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen Ländern identifizieren kannst.Falls sich deine Lebenslage verändert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich dafür einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Persönliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for support or have a question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a complaintWe’re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will thoroughly investigate your complaint and provide our findings and final response via email. Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Italian reclami@n26.com (new tab)It is also possible to write through a certified email message (PEC) to reclami@pec.n26.com (new tab).Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our Customer Support (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account.If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarized power of attorney form.Please only contact us via our app or via email, as we are unable to serve customers in person. If you cannot contact us via app or email, please send a written complaint (letters only) to the central postal address:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinComplaints filed in a manner other than those above, or sent to addresses other than those listed, will be considered received from the date they are delivered to the Complaints Office.If your complaint is upheld, we will inform you of the steps that we have taken and/or plan to implement, with the expected timeframes. If your complaint is not upheld, we will provide you with a clear illustration of the reasons for the rejection and, in addition, indications on the possibility of using alternative means for resolving the dispute.Complaint handling timesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within 35 business days. Otherwise, non-payment related complaints will be resolved within 60 calendar days.For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days Spain - 60 Calendar Days Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties. Customers who reside in Italy can also contact the following:Arbitro Bancario FinanziarioConciliatore Bancario FinanziarioAlternatively, you can go before a different arbitration or mediation body as long as they are enrolled in the appropriate register kept by the Italian Ministry of Justice. The full list of mediation bodies is available at: www.giustizia.itCustomers outside of Italy can also contact the following:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht – BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)For a full list of dispute resolution bodies, please see our Imprint (new tab) page.Annual reportsRendiconto sull'attività di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2019 (new tab)Rendiconto sull’attività di gestione dei reclami per l’anno 2020 (new tab)Rendiconto sull'attività di gestione dei reclami per l'anno 2021 (new tab)

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above €150 will be charged with a 12.50€ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than €150.The maximum fee is €100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: How to make N26 my main account?
answer: N26 offers you a series of services and benefits designed specifically for our customers in Italy. If you decide to use your N26 account as your main account to receive your salary and carry out your daily banking operations, simply provide your bank details to your employer.What services does N26 offer?As soon as you have opened your account, you can immediately start depositing and withdrawing cash with CASH26 (new tab) from over 1000 partner points of sale throughout Italy. Just open the N26 app, find the nearest CASH26 store on the map, create a barcode and show it to the person at the checkout.You’ll be able to top up your account by bank transfer, even instantaneous, from another current account, or by debit, credit or prepaid card or by crediting your salary.With your N26 account you will also have the possibility to set direct debits for your subscriptions for free, from the gym to streaming services, to debit your utilities (water, electricity, gas, telephony) and pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and make phone top-ups directly from your mobile app. Click here (new tab) to find out more.With your N26 Premium Mastercard you can also withdraw cash for free and without limits from all ATMs in Europe (up to 3 free withdrawals per month in Europe with N26 Standard).We also remind you that the tax on the account due in the event of an average stock exceeding € 5,000 (on an annual basis and subject to subsequent changes in the law) and equal to € 34.20, will be borne by N26 until 30/06/2022.What other benefits does N26 offer?From your N26 app, available for iOS and Android, you can make SEPA transfers for free and receive or make instant SEPA transfers, free of charge if you have an N26 premium account (N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal) and for € 0.99 if you have a N26 Standard account. In addition, you can set up standing orders for free both in the SEPA area and in foreign currencies and receive or make international transfers (SWIFT).Also remember that by opening your N26 account, you can immediately start using the Mastercard card associated with it and connect it to Apple or Google Pay. With N26 Standard you will immediately have a free virtual Mastercard that you can use for your online purchases and contactless payments. The additional physical card can be requested at any time without any monthly fee.With an N26 Premium account, you will also be able to create separate Spaces (new tab) from your main account to set aside money and share (new tab) it with other N26 customers to manage joint expenses.What to do if my IBAN is not accepted?We remind you that the IBAN of your N26 account, according to the European law of 1 February 2016, Article 9 of EU Regulation 260/2012 (new tab), must be accepted by every member state of the European Economic Area. If your employer or a merchant refuses to accept your IBAN, click here (new tab) for more information on how to report the incident.

question: ¿Has recibido un mensaje sospechoso?
answer: Durante el punto álgido de la pandemia global, EasyJet hizo público el robo de los datos personales y de vuelo de 9 millones de clientes en un sofisticado ciberataque. Durante el primer trimestre de 2021, los datos personales de más de 530 millones de usuarios de Facebook de más de 100 países salieron a subasta en internet. Unos días después, los datos personales de otros 500 millones de usuarios de LinkedIn aparecieron en la Dark Web. Entre estos datos había nombres, fechas de nacimiento, números de teléfono y direcciones de email.¿Qué tiene que ver todo esto con N26? Aunque esto no afecta directamente a N26 ni a la seguridad de tu cuenta bancaria, los ciberdelincuentes pueden utilizar información obtenida de sus ataques a otras empresas para llevar a cabo ataques de phishing a gran escala.El phishing es una técnica empleada para obtener datos sensibles que pueden utilizarse con fines fraudulentos. Los estafadores se hacen pasar por empresas de renombre para convencer a sus víctimas de que compartan sus datos personales. Lo consiguen dirigiéndose a ellas a través de los medios de comunicación digital que todos utilizamos a diario, por ejemplo: email, SMS, llamadas de teléfono y redes sociales.Como nuestro banco digital es cada vez más popular, los clientes de N26 están sufriendo campañas de phishing. Durante ellas, los atacantes envían mensajes que suelen contener enlaces a sitios web que se parecen mucho a la WebApp de N26. Aunque a primera vista puedan parecer convincentes, estos sitios web son maliciosos y no tienen ninguna relación con N26. En algunos casos, los atacantes falsifican un código abreviado para enviar sus SMS, por lo que sus mensajes pueden aparecer en el mismo hilo que los mensajes que N26 te ha enviado anteriormente. Te rogamos que prestes mucha atención y que nos contactes de inmediato si detectas algo que se salga de lo común.¿Qué hace N26 para combatir este problema? Nuestro personal de seguridad realiza un seguimiento constante para prevenir los ataques y garantizar que los sitios web fraudulentos se desactiven lo antes posible. De este modo, nuestra entidad mantiene tu cuenta segura.Mientras nosotros seguimos tomando precauciones para proteger tus cuentas y tus datos personales, tú también puedes adoptar medidas para protegerte. Esto es lo que debes hacer si recibes un mensaje inesperado:Si recibes un SMS de alguien que hable en nombre de N26, recuerda que nosotros nunca te contactaríamos a través de ese canal.Los mensajes de texto que te pidan hacer algo siempre son maliciosos. No hagas clic en ningún enlace ni indiques ningún dato personal. Nosotros nunca te pedimos que hagas nada por medio de un SMS.Si tienes alguna duda sobre la información que te comunican o sospechas que te han dirigido a un sitio fraudulento, actúa con cautela. Si te piden que llames a un número o que envíes un correo a una dirección de email, busca los datos de contacto para ver si coinciden con los de una empresa real.Si no sales de dudas, haz una captura de pantalla del mensaje y contacta con nuestro Servicio de Atención al Cliente a través del chat de la app N26, o envíala a support@n26.com. ¡Estaremos encantados de ayudarte!

question: Wie aktiviere ich meine Karte?
answer: Deine N26 Karte kam heute mit der Post? Bevor du sie nutzen kannst, musst du deine Karte aktivieren. Die Aktivierung deiner N26 Karte ist in wenigen Schritten erledigt. Stelle vorher jedoch sicher, dass du dein Smartphone bereits mit deinem Konto verknüpft hast.Um deine Karte in der N26 App zu aktivieren, führe folgende Schritte vom Startbildschirm aus:Gehe zum "Karten"-Tab.Wähle "Einstellungen" und wische so lange nach rechts, bis die Karte erscheint, die du aktivieren möchtest.Tippe auf "Aktivieren".Gib den Token – die 10-stellige Nummer auf deiner Karte – ein. Du findest den Token auf der Vorderseite unter deinem Namen. Bei N26 Smart, You und Metal steht er auf der Rückseite.Um deine Karte in der Web-App zu aktivieren, klicke einfach im Startbildschirm auf "Karte aktivieren".Du willst eine neue Karte bestellen, weil deine alte verloren gegangen, gestohlen oder beschädigt worden ist? Oder hast du dir ein Upgrade auf N26 Smart, You oder Metal geholt? In allen Fällen musst du die oben genannten Schritte zur Aktivierung deiner neuen Karte wiederholen. Damit du mit deiner Karte online oder in Geschäften kontaktlos (via NFC) bezahlen kannst, musst du sie an einem Geldautomaten oder in einem Geschäft vollständig aktivieren. Hierfür muss die Karte in ein Kartenlesegerät oder einen Geldautomaten eingesteckt werden und die Transaktion durch Eingabe der Karten-PIN erfolgen.Falls du mehrere Karten derselben Art hast (zum Beispiel, weil sich die Lieferung verzögert hat und du mehr als eine Karte bestellt hast), kannst du nur die neueste Karte aktivieren. Alle älteren Karten werden deaktiviert, wenn du eine neue bestellst. Das trifft nicht auf Zusatzkarten für Premiumkonten zu.

question: Comment faire une remarque ou suggérer une nouvelle idée de produit ?
answer: Nous envoyons fréquemment des sondages à nos utilisateurs pour avoir leurs retours. Les réponses sont évidemment anonymes. Vous pouvez à tout moment nous faire des retours et des suggestions en envoyant un email à ideas@n26.com (nouvel onglet). C’est grâce à vous que nous nous améliorons. Nous travaillons au quotidien pour vous proposer le meilleur produit et la meilleure expérience possible.Si vous n’êtes pas satisfaits de l’un de nos produits ou services, vous pouvez faire une réclamation.

question: Cos’è una carta virtuale?
answer: Se apri un conto N26 Standard avrai una carta virtuale gratuitamente (a condizione che tu abbia un saldo minimo una tantum di 10 € per attivare la carta).Una carta virtuale aggiuntiva è ideale per effettuare pagamenti online: puoi utilizzare e condividere i dati della tua carta extra senza ansia e separare i pagamenti ricorrenti, come i tuoi abbonamenti, dalle spese quotidiane.I clienti N26 Smart, YOU e Metal hanno la possibilità di ordinare una carta virtuale gratuitamente, oltre alla carta fisica gratuita che ricevono con la loro sottoscrizione premium. Buone da sapere: i clienti N26 Standard hanno la possibilità di ordinare una carta fisica pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 € (senza dover passare a una sottoscrizione premium).Come ordinare e attivare la mia carta virtuale?Effettua l’accesso e apri la scheda Carte nell’angolo in basso a destra.Tocca 'Ottieni una carta aggiuntiva'.Seleziona 'Virtuale' in alto, poi tocca 'Seleziona' in fondo.Leggi e accetta i termini e le condizioni, poi tocca 'Genera carta virtuale'.Aggiungi la tua carta virtuale a Apple Pay o Google Pay o salta questo passaggio.Come uso la mia carta virtuale?Pagare nei negozi fisici usando Apple o Google Pay: collega la tua carta virtuale ad Apple o Google Pay a seconda del tuo dispositivo.Prelevare contanti: una volta che hai collegato la tua carta virtuale al tuo wallet Apple o Google, puoi prelevare contanti dagli sportelli ATM che hanno la funzionalità contactless. Puoi anche utilizzare CASH26 per depositare o prelevare contanti (DE, AT, IT, ES e GR).Effettuare acquisti online: puoi vedere i dettagli della tua carta virtuale nell’app (numero di carta, data di scadenza e numero CVV). Per vedere questi dettagli:Effettua il log-in nell’app mobile N26Seleziona 'Carte'Trova la tua carta virtuale (scorri verso sinistra per trovare la tua carta virtuale se ne hai più di una)Seleziona 'Dati della carta'Dopodiché dovrai inserire il tuo PIN di conferma o effettuare un login biometrico per vedere le tue carte virtuali per 60 secondi.La Mastercard virtuale è disponibile solo per i conti N26 Standard aperti a partire dal febbraio 2021 e per tutti i conti N26 Premium a partire dal 9 ottobre 2021.

question: Who can sign up for N26 Business?
answer:
ℹ️ Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland. How do N26 Business accounts work? N26 offers a wide range of Business accounts (new tab), designed for freelancers and the self-employed, with a Mastercard linked to their account, entitling them to up to 0.5% monthly cashback on all their business payments.(The cashback offered by N26 Business accounts is not the Government Cashback, which can currently be activated for all N26 Mastercards.)If you are interested in Allianz coverage or other Premium perks, besides the N26 Business (new tab) account, you can also opt for N26 Business You (new tab) , N26 Business Metal (new tab), or N26 Business Smart (new tab).  N26 Business (new tab) accounts are reserved exclusively for:freelancers enrolled in a professional register or order (such as architects, lawyers, pharmacists, and nurses)other freelancers, i.e. the self-employed and individual entrepreneurs with a VAT number (such as designers, photographers, electricians, or owners of B&Bs and holiday homes with VAT numbers).sole proprietorships registered in the Business Register of the Chamber of CommerceHowever, it is not possible to sign up for an N26 Business in the name of a partnership (e.g., GPs and LPs), capital company (e.g., LLCs and INCs), or another entity, including subjects with legal status and liability. What is the VAT number and where can I find it?The VAT number is an 11-digit numeric code, which is used to uniquely identify the owner of a given professional activity, such as the personal tax code.
Under Italian law, anyone who carries out a continuous activity for more than 30 days, in fact, has the obligation to register for VAT. This can be of two types: ordinary or flat-rate tax regime, depending on the revenues and expenses incurred for the activity.
The opening of the VAT number takes place by submitting a specific form to the Revenue Agency:Model AA9 / 12 (new tab) for individuals;Model AA7 / 10 (new tab) for companies.The form must be submitted or sent online via the Tax Agency portal (new tab) within 30 days of starting the professional activity.
As soon as the opening application is approved and completed, you will receive the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number containing the relevant code assigned to you by post and in the reserved area of ​​the Tax Agency portal (new tab) .What is the ATECO code and where can I find it?The ATECO code is an alphanumeric abbreviation used to classify a commercial activity and to assign a risk level to that company, according to the ATECO 2007 classification (new tab)currently in force.
The code must be entered at the time of the request to open the VAT number, in order to communicate to the Tax Agency the type of activity that will be carried out.
It will also be possible to add different ATECO codes with the opening of additional VAT numbers.
You can find the ATECO code on the Certificate of attribution of the VAT number or on the Chamber of Commerce registration in the case of sole proprietorships.

question: What are “Messages” ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That’s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We’ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you’ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you’ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We’ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can’t initiate a conversation, but you’ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn’t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we’ll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
answer: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or WebApp (new tab) to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isn’t rewarded because the invited friend hasn’t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select Forgot? in the app or Forgot your password? (new tab) in the WebApp (new tab) during login. We’ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a “passphrase” rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase “hard to guess, easy to remember”. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you’ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: ¿Cómo cambiar mi dirección, número de teléfono u otra información personal?
answer: Es esencial mantener tu información personal actualizada. Por ejemplo, tener tu número de teléfono actualizado es necesario para vincular tu móvil (pestaña nueva) o para enviar y recibir un MoneyBeam (pestaña nueva). Así es como se hace:Dirección de envío e información de impuestos: Ve a 👤 Mi Cuenta > Información personalContraseña: Ve a 👤 Mi Cuenta > SeguridadNombre y sexo: Contáctanos por chat y envíanos 2 documentos nacionales de identidad: una copia de tu DNI o pasaporte junto con un documento oficial del cambio (licencia matrimonial o un certificado de nacimiento actualizado).Nacionalidad: Contáctanos por chat y envíanos una copia de tu DNI o pasaporte.Email: Necesitarás contactarnos por chat. Tenemos que verificar que eres realmente tú, por lo que no podemos hacerlo vía email.Número de teléfono Puedes modificar esta información cuando quieras desde la app N26. Ve a 👤  Mi Cuenta > Información personal > Datos personales.Para actualizar tu número de teléfono necesitas hacerlo desde el smartphone vinculado a tu cuenta.

question: Was sind Echtzeit-Überweisungen?
answer: Alle N26 Kunden haben nun die Möglichkeit, Echtzeit-Überweisungen zu verwenden. Im Gegensatz zu den üblichen SEPA-Überweisungen, die innerhalb von zwei Werktagen bearbeitet werden, werden Echtzeit-Überweisungen innerhalb von Sekunden übermittelt und empfangen.Eine Echtzeit-Überweisungen kann von Vorteil sein, wenn du eine dringende Überweisung tätigen musst (sie dauert etwa 10 Sekunden). Für unsere Standardkunden, die Echtzeit-Überweisungen nutzen, fällt jedoch eine Gebühr an, die vor der Bestätigung der Überweisung angezeigt wird. Wenn die Überweisung also bis zu 2 Tage warten kann, dann ist eine normale SEPA-Überweisung wahrscheinlich besser geeignet. Für unsere Premiumkunden ist die Echtzeit-Überweisungen gebührenfrei.Obwohl diese Überweisungen in Echtzeit durchgeführt werden, können sie sich aufgrund von Bearbeitungszeiten, Embargos usw. verzögern (genau wie reguläre Überweisungen). Bei wichtigen Zahlungen, wie z. B. Einzahlungen oder Anzahlungen sollte man deshalb am besten im Voraus zahlen, um externe finanzielle Verluste aufgrund von Verzögerungen zu vermeiden.Wie funktioniert das?Logge dich in die N26 App ein und tippe auf Geld senden > Banküberweisung.Gib als nächstes den Namen und die IBAN des Empfängers ein sowie ggf. einen Verwendungszweck.Tippe auf Überweisung und wähle zwischen Echtzeitüberweisung und Standardüberweisung.Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein.Bestätige die Überweisung in der App.Die Echtzeitüberweisung wird innerhalb von ca. 10 Sekunden verarbeitet und beim Empfänger eingehen.Bitte beachte: Wenn die Bank des Empfängers nicht am SCT-Echtzeitverfahren teilnimmt, hast du nicht die Möglichkeit, eine Echtzeitüberweisung durchzuführen. Wichtige Informationen:**Für die Nutzung von Echtzeit-Überweisungen wird bei N26 Standard eine Gebühr erhoben. Die Gebühr wird direkt im Anschluss als separate Transaktion verrechnet und die Gebühr fällt je nach Land unterschiedlich aus:Deutschland und Österreich – 0,49 €Spanien – 1,99 €Italien, Frankreich und Rest Europas – 0,99 €Der Höchstbetrag, den du mit per Echtzeit-Überweisungen versenden kannst, beträgt 2.000 € fünfmal pro Tag bei einem Tageshöchstbetrag von 10.000 €.Wenn du eine Echtzeit-Überweisungen für eine wichtige Zahlung (Einzahlung, Bußgeld, Anzahlung) verwenden möchtest, solltest du die Zahlung eventuell im Voraus vornehmen, um eine Verzögerung durch eine mögliche Ablehnung oder Sperrung zu vermeiden.Wenn du Waren oder Dienstleistungen per Echtzeit-Überweisungen bezahlst, achte immer darauf, dass du die Empfängerdaten und -legitimationen überprüfst, bevor du die Transaktion bestätigst. Es empfiehlt sich immer, vor Betrügereien auf der Hut zu sein.Bitte beachte: Derzeit nehmen nicht alle Banken am Echtzeit-Überweisungen teil. Wenn die Empfängerbank nicht daran teilnimmt, hast du nicht die Möglichkeit, deine Überweisung in Echtzeit durchzuführen.

question: How N26 Crypto works
answer:
In Austria, N26 Crypto is powered by Bitpanda GmbH (FN423018k) as digital asset servicing provider, registered with the Austrian Financial Market Authority and located at Stella-Klein-Löw-Weg 17, 1020 Vienna, Austria.The following statements do not constitute investment advice or any other advice on financial services, financial instruments, financial products or digital assets. They are intended to provide general information. The following statements do not constitute an offer to conclude a contract for the purchase or sale of financial instruments and financial products or an invitation to submit such an offer and to buy or sell any particular digital asset.Cryptocurrencies are subject to high fluctuations in value. A decline in value or a complete loss are possible at any time. The loss of access to data and passwords can also lead to a complete loss.Manage and monitor both cash and crypto in one place—from your N26 app. No need to download a new app or make a new account to start trading crypto, just scroll down from your bank account to check it out.Try N26 Crypto in your N26 app by following these steps:Tap the Finances tab and scroll to TradingSelect Get started with crypto and browse the coinsIf you’re ready, hit Buy and sign up in just a minuteTada — enjoy being a digital currency owner!Crypto may seem like a tough nut to crack—but, as always, we’ve got your back. Whether you’re wondering about the basics — like what is crypto? (new tab) and Is cryptocurrency safe? (new tab) Things to be aware of.
5 Things to Know Before You Start Trading Crypto | N26 (new tab)N26 Crypto Fees Buying crypto doesn’t need to be costly. You only need €1 to get started and with N26 Crypto, you’ll pay 1.5% in fees on Bitcoin and 2.5% on other cryptocurrencies.With a Metal account, you get a discount on trading fees — pay 1% for Bitcoin and 2% for other coins. Metal plans also come with a Mastercard made of stainless steel, comprehensive travel and tech insurance, and dedicated customer support via phone 7 days a week.The N26 Metal crypto fee discounts only apply to trading amounts up to €5,000 (including fees on purchasing and excluding fees on selling crypto) per calendar month. Above this amount, regular fees apply: 1.5% on Bitcoin and 2.5% on all other coins.Please note that fees are always rounded up to the nearest full cent—to a maximum of one cent—which may lead to a slight increase of the fee percentage shown in an order preview).The fees and cryptocurrency prices shown on the N26 app for every transaction and including a possible spread are not determined by N26 but provided by Bitpanda. N26's liability is expressly excluded for any claim or damage arising from the formation of the prices of the assets offered by Bitpanda.N26 Crypto Limitshe following limits apply to trading crypto on N26:A €50,000 limit on daily transactions by Personal customersA €100,000 limit on daily transactions by Business customers200 trades within 24 hours, per userUsers can only place buy and sell orders with a minimum of €1. This applies to all coins.If you have some questions burning a hole in your pocket, view our Crypto page with FAQs.Good to know before getting startedIn order to be able to buy and sell Crypto you have to have a correct, registered and valid Tax ID. In case you don’t know where to find your Tax ID or how to register it in your app, please visit our Support Page (new tab).

question: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
