answer: ℹ️ Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when considering N26 Metal (new tab):If you’re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times. Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card and we’ll send it to you. If you don’t see that message, don’t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you’ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don’t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost. How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card.

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised. In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure. One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a “trusted beneficiary” so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
answer: ℹ️ Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when considering N26 Metal (new tab):If you’re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: How does N26 Business Metal work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs €16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate. Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app. Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It’s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Perché il bancomat non ha erogato i contanti?
answer: Può succedere: vai ad un ATM, l’importo richiesto viene detratto dal tuo saldo, ma la macchina non eroga i contanti.Per prima cosa controlla i limiti della tua carta accedendo al Mio Account e selezionando Impostazioni Carte. Assicurati che i prelievi ATM siano attivi.Anche se non sappiamo dirti con certezza perché è successo, possiamo sicuramente aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi. L’importo che è stato detratto dal saldo è solo un’autorizzazione (una prenotazione o un importo stornato). Dato che la transazione non è andata a buon fine, l’importo prenotato scadrà entro poche ore o al massimo 12 giorni lavorativi e sarà riaccreditato al tuo saldo.Se l’importo prenotato non scadesse dopo 12 giorni lavorativi, per favore completa il modulo di contestazione. Faremo del nostro meglio per recuperare i tuoi soldi.Nel frattempo ti consigliamo di provare un altro ATM di un altro operatore. Raramente accade due volte di seguito.Non sono riuscito a ritirare dal bancomat il denaro richiesto. Come posso fare?Anche in questo caso possiamo aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi. L’importo che hai richiesto al momento del prelievo adesso comparirà sotto forma di autorizzazione sul tuo conto. Visto che, anche in questa circostanza, la transazione non è andata a buon fine, l’importo prenotato scadrà entro massimo 12 giorni lavorativi e sarà riaccreditato sul tuo conto.Nel caso in cui l’autorizzazione non scadesse e la trovassi addebitata nel tuo estratto conto, per favore compila il modulo di contestazione (nuova tabella). Ti ricordiamo infine che il limite massimo di prelievo giornaliero è di 1000€ e il limite di prelievo settimanale è di 2500€.

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand N26 Insurance allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the “Insurance” banner you find. You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp. How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim. Am I eligible? N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can’t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (“IRS”).FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website (new tab).The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we’ll need to ask you:Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States? 
Are you subject to tax in the U.S?
Being “subject to tax” in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you’re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don’t end up paying any U.S. tax.
If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?
As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (“SSN”) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website (new tab).Additionally, if your account shows:A U.S. place of birth, A U.S. telephone number,A standing order to the U.S.then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information

question: Pagos por adelantado de las cuentas premium N26
answer: El contrato de tu suscripción es válido por un año, después se renovará automáticamente de forma indefinida hasta que lo canceles; esto se puede hacer en cualquier momento (ver más abajo). Te avisaremos 2 meses antes de la fecha de renovación indefinida de tu contrato.¿Cuáles son las opciones de pago?Puedes elegir si quieres pagar tu suscripción mes a mes, cada 6 meses o todo el año de golpe (con las últimas dos opciones recibes un descuento). La opción que elijas no afecta a la duración del contrato, que será siempre de un año.Por ejemplo: si eliges pagar cada 6 meses, harás el primer pago al inicio del contrato y, 6 meses después, harás el segundo pago por los 6 meses restantes del contrato de 12 meses.¿Cuándo y cómo se paga?Tu suscripción se activará en cuanto realices el primer pago y obtendrás acceso a todas las ventajas premium. Puedes hacer el primer pago con tarjeta de débito o de crédito, con Google Pay o con Apple Pay; lo que te dará acceso inmediato a las ventajas premium en cuanto completes la verificación de tu identidad. También puedes pagar añadiendo dinero a tu cuenta de N26, y el importe se cobrará automáticamente.Si no hemos recibido el primer pago dentro de 15 días desde que completas la verificación de tu identidad, el importe se cobrará automáticamente de tu cuenta N26 y obtendrás acceso a las ventajas premium. Después del primer pago, todos los demás siempre se cobrarán automáticamente de tu cuenta N26, dependiendo de la opción que hayas elegido.¿Cómo se cancela la suscripción?Suspensión de la renovación automática: puedes detener la renovación automática de tu suscripción en cualquier momento antes de que finalice el primer contrato de 12 meses poniéndote en contacto con nosotros a través del chat. Si decides detener tu renovación, podrás seguir usando tu Mastercard N26 y todas las ventajas de tu suscripción premium hasta que esta caduque. Eso significa que mantendrás la cobertura de tu seguro (para cuentas N26 You y N26 Metal) mientras pagues la cuota de tu suscripción.Cancelación inmediata: puedes cancelar tu suscripción de inmediato en cualquier momento poniéndote en contacto con nosotros. Si eliges esta opción, tu tarjeta N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal se desactivará y emitiremos una tarjeta virtual cuando pases a N26 Estándar. Si eliges esta opción y eres cliente de N26 You o N26 Metal, la cobertura de tu seguro también se suspenderá de forma inmediata.Revocación: puedes revocar tu suscripción dentro de un período de 14 días desde el momento en el que se te cobra la primera cuota mensual. Desactivaremos tu Mastercard N26 y emitiremos una tarjeta virtual para usar con tu cuenta N26 Estándar.¿Puedo recibir un reembolso?Si cancelas tu suscripción dentro del periodo de revocación de 14 días (contactando con Atención al Cliente a través de tu app N26), te reembolsaremos el pago inicial. Si cancelas tu suscripción pasado el periodo de revocación de 14 días, te reembolsaremos los meses restantes que hayas pagado por adelantado.Sin embargo, ten en cuenta que si has pagado un precio reducido (por elegir el pago anual o cada 6 meses), te reembolsaremos los meses restantes, pero cobrando el precio completo por los meses que ya hayas disfrutado. Es decir, que solo recibes el descuento si completas el año entero del contrato.

question: Ma carte arrive à expiration, que dois-je faire ?
answer: Si votre Mastercard N26 a expiré ou arrive à expiration, vous trouverez dans cet article toutes les informations sur la commande d’une nouvelle carte, les coûts associés et les délais de livraison. Avant de commander une nouvelle carte, nous vous recommandons de vérifier que vos données personnelles sont correctes et à jour. Si votre carte arrive à expiration, veuillez vous connecter à votre compte N26 dans l’application N26, allez dans la rubrique Cartes et cherchez une bannière sous la carte correspondante. Suivez les étapes pour confirmer l’adresse où vous souhaitez recevoir votre carte de remplacement et nous vous l’enverrons. Ne vous inquiétez pas si ce message ne s’affiche pas. C’est probablement parce que votre carte est encore valable pendant un certain temps. Le moment venu, vous aurez la possibilité de confirmer votre adresse.Une fois votre carte reçue, vous devrez l’activer avant de pouvoir l’utiliser. N’oubliez pas de détruire votre ancienne carte et de la jeter conformément aux directives locales en matière de recyclage.Puis-je continuer à utiliser ma carte après son expiration ?Combien coûte le remplacement de ma carte arrivant à expiration ou périmée ?Ma carte est déjà périmée mais je n’ai jamais reçu de carte de remplacement

question: Públicos personalizados
answer: Tratamiento de datos en el marco de Custom Audiences de FacebookCustom Audiences nos permite crear audiencias personalizadas y parecidas. Las audiencias personalizadas se componen de clientes de N26 y usuarios de Internet para mostrarles contenido personalizado, o solo de usuarios de Internet para excluirte, como cliente existente de N26, de algunos de nuestros anuncios. No queremos mostrarte anuncios que sean irrelevantes, dado que ya eres cliente de N26. Las audiencias parecidas nos permiten definir un grupo objetivo relevante para el cual los anuncios mostrados tengan un mayor interés que para otros usuarios de Facebook. Estas denominadas "audiencias parecidas" son más similares a nuestros clientes que el usuario promedio de Facebook.Para beneficiarte de las ventajas descritas con anterioridad, le proporcionamos a Facebook una versión con hash de tu dirección de correo electrónico de N26. El llamado "hashing" es una forma de seudonimización que codifica tu dirección de correo electrónico para que no se te pueda identificar con esta dirección de correo electrónico con hash. Posteriormente, Facebook compara esta dirección de correo electrónico con tu posible dirección de correo electrónico de Facebook. Después de realizar la comparación, independientemente de si es positiva o no, Facebook elimina cualquier dirección de correo electrónico con hash en un plazo de 6 a 8 horas. Facebook no comparte estos datos con terceros u otros anunciantes ni otorga acceso a los mismos. Puedes encontrar esta y otra información en los términos de Custom Audiences de Facebook (pestaña nueva).Facebook Ireland Limited transfiere datos a Facebook Inc., EE. UU. EE. UU. es un país que, según los términos del Reglamento de la UE 2016/679 ("RGPD"), no proporciona un nivel adecuado de protección de los datos personales; esto implica, entre otras cosas, que las agencias gubernamentales de los EE. UU. pueden tener derecho a acceder a tus datos sin que existan recursos efectivos disponibles.Puedes revocar tu consentimiento a este tratamiento de datos, de acuerdo con el Art. 6 apartado 1 letra a del RGPD, en la aplicación web y la aplicación de N26 en cualquier momento . Tratamiento de datos en el marco de Customer Match de GoogleCustomer Match nos permite crear audiencias personalizadas y parecidas. Las audiencias personalizadas se componen de clientes de N26 y usuarios de Internet para mostrarles contenido personalizado, o solo de usuarios de Internet para excluirte, como cliente existente de N26, de algunos de nuestros anuncios en la Red de búsqueda de Google, la pestaña Compras, Gmail, YouTube y la Red de Display de Google. No queremos mostrarte anuncios que sean irrelevantes. Las audiencias parecidas nos permiten definir un grupo objetivo relevante para el cual los anuncios mostrados tengan un mayor interés que para otros usuarios de Google. Estas denominadas "audiencias parecidas" son más similares a nuestros clientes que el usuario promedio de Google.Para beneficiarte de las ventajas descritas con anterioridad, le proporcionamos a Google una versión con hash de tu dirección de correo electrónico de N26. El llamado "hashing" es una forma de seudonimización que codifica tu dirección de correo electrónico para que no se te pueda identificar con esta dirección de correo electrónico con hash. Luego, Google compara esta dirección de correo electrónico con tu posible dirección de correo electrónico de la cuenta de Google. Si esta dirección de correo electrónico no coincide, Google aún puede utilizarla como parte de una verificación de cumplimiento de políticas, pero Google no la utilizará de ninguna otra manera para Customer Match ni ningún otro producto de Google. Google no retiene los datos durante más de 48 horas para crear las audiencias de Customer Match y, a continuación, los elimina de inmediato. Google no comparte estos datos con terceros u otros anunciantes ni otorga acceso a los mismos. Puedes encontrar esta y otra información en el artículo de ayuda Cómo utiliza Google los datos de Customer Match (pestaña nueva).Google Ireland Limited transfiere datos a Google LLC, EE. UU. EE. UU. es un país que, según los términos del Reglamento de la UE 2016/679 ("RGPD"), no proporciona un nivel adecuado de protección de los datos personales; esto implica, entre otras cosas, que las agencias gubernamentales de los EE. UU. pueden tener derecho a acceder a tus datos sin que existan recursos efectivos disponibles.Puedes revocar tu consentimiento a este tratamiento de datos, de acuerdo con el Art. 6 apartado 1 letra a del RGPD, en la aplicación web y la aplicación de N26 en cualquier momento.

question: How to keep track of my daily spending?
answer:
We automatically sort your transactions and display our findings in Insights (top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we’ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn’t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags: We’ve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

question: Comment fonctionne 3D Secure ?
answer: 3D Secure est une technologie de sécurisation des paiements en ligne visant à limiter l’utilisation frauduleuse des cartes bancaires sur internet. Tous les e-commerçants qui utilisent cette technologie affichent le logo « Mastercard SecureCode » sur leurs sites.Lorsque vous faites un paiement en ligne, depuis votre téléphone, une tablette ou un ordinateur, vous avez 5 minutes pour confirmer la transaction en cliquant sur la notification que vous recevez sur votre téléphone.Attention : la notification push ne sera envoyée qu'au smartphone synchronisé au compte.Si vous ne confirmez pas immédiatement cette transaction, vous pouvez également la retrouver dans la liste de vos transactions. Elle apparaîtra en attente sur votre application. Une petit cloche vous indique que vous devez la confirmer. Vous pourrez alors appuyer sur cette transaction et la valider.Si vous ne voyez pas cette transaction dans votre liste, vous pouvez consulter l’article relatif aux raisons pour lesquelles un paiement en ligne peut échouer.

question: How to keep my banking data safe online?
answer: Whether shopping, banking or managing your inbox, here are some tips to keep you and your data safe in the digital space: Keep your N26 app and mobile OS updated with the latest bug fixesUse fingerprint scanning or facial recognition to log in Create strong passwords with letters, numbers and symbols - and never use the same one across multiple accountsNever post sensitive personal information online via social media platformsBe careful with public or shared WIFI connections - always choose secure WPA2 connections over WEP connectionsChoose email providers with security and spam filters and two-factor authentication like Gmail and Yahoo!Watch out for offers that are too good to be true - they probably areShop only at trusted websites of well-known retailersCheck that websites are secure - look for the lock by the URL and examine the credentials with a simple clickEnable location tracking on your N26 app, so we can spot irregular transactions that may not have been made by youIf you believe your account is compromised in any way, change your password immediately and refer to our article on What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How can I link my N26 account to PayPal?
answer: If you want, you can link your N26 account with your PayPal account, and have access to a series of benefits.You will be able to instantly top up your bank account, send and receive quick payments in complete safety and without the need to use your bank details or your N26 card number.Here's how to connect your N26 account, from the web version of PayPal:Click on Wallet at the top of the page.Select Link a card or bank accountClick Connect a bank account.Follow the instructions provided.If you use the PayPal mobile app instead:Click on Settings at the top rightSelect Link a card or bank accountClick on the + and select Bank accountEnter your bank details and confirmRemember to enter your name and surname exactly as it appears on your N26 account, otherwise the connection with PayPal will fail.As soon as your N26 account is confirmed, PayPal will make two small charges which will then be refunded to your account within 2-3 business days.At this point you will simply have to make a note of the charges received, log into your PayPal account and confirm the connection of your N26 account from your Wallet.

question: Information about the flex p-account
answer: A flex p-account allowance is based on incoming funds from certain entities, usually public institutions and/or your employer. Consequently, your monthly allowance is liable to change every calendar month.Whenever your salary is above the basic monthly allowance of 1.340€, your salary amount becomes the new allowance for the remainder of the month. Whenever the salary is below the amount of the basic allowance (1.340€) then your allowance remains as it is, and does not decrease.Until you receive your salary, your P-account allowance will be the basic one. All adjustments are made within 1-2 working days after you've received your salary.

question: Wie viel kostet ein N26 Konto?
answer: Ein N26 Bankkonto ist kostenlos.* Je nach Region können zusätzliche Gebühren anfallen: Preise in Deutschland (neuen Tab)Preise in Österreich (neuen Tab)Preise in Frankreich (neuen Tab)Preise in Spanien (neuen Tab)Preise in Italien (neuen Tab) Preise im übrigen Europa (neuen Tab)* Sofern unsere Mindestanforderungen (neuen Tab) erfüllt werden. Falls wir dir kein N26 Konto anbieten können, kannst du möglicherweise ein N26 Flex Konto eröffnen.

question: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?
answer:
Es gibt verschiedene Möglichkeiten, dich mit unserem Kundenservice in Verbindung zu setzen. Die beste Möglichkeit ist, einen sicheren Chat zu öffnen, während du in der App eingeloggt bist. So können wir deine Identität verifizieren und dir spezielle Informationen und Unterstützung anbieten.Im Chat erreichst du uns täglich von 07:00–23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.So kontaktierst du uns über die AppWie du mit uns chatten kannstÖffne einen Kundendienst-ChatDer Chat wird eröffnet, sobald du dich eingeloggt hastWie du uns anrufen kannst
(nur für Premiumkonten)Wir können dich nur mit unserem Kundenservice in Kontakt bringen, wenn du uns unter der in deinem Konto registrierten Nummer anrufst. Wenn du eine neue Rufnummer registrieren möchtest, befolge die Schritte auf dieser Seite: Wie ändere ich meine Rufnummer?Bitte beachte: Um uns telefonisch zu kontaktieren, brauchst du ein N26 Premiumkonto (You, Smart oder Metal).Unterstützung per Telefon (nur Premium)Du hast keinen Zugriff auf die App?Du bist noch kein N26 nutzer?Wenn du noch kein Konto bei uns hast, jedoch allgemeine Fragen zu unseren Produkten und Dienstleistungen hast, kannst du entweder unten einen Besucher-Chat eröffnen oder uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com schicken (die Wartezeit für E-Mails ist zurzeit länger als üblich).Du hast keinen zugriff mehr auf dein konto?Du hast dein Smartphone verloren oder ist es kaputt? Hast du Probleme, dich in die App einzuloggen und auf dein Konto zuzugreifen? Das tut uns leid und wir unterstützen dich bei der Lösung deines Problems, wenn du unten einen Besucher-Chat öffnest oder uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com schickst (die Wartezeit für E-Mails ist zurzeit länger als üblich).Du möchtest deine persönlichen Daten ändern? Befolge die Anweisungen auf dieser Seite:
Wie ändere ich meine Rufnummer, Adresse oder andere persönliche Daten?Bitte beachte: Zu deiner Sicherheit können wir dir bei Fragen zu personenbezogenen Daten nur helfen, wenn du einen Kundenservice-Chat startest, während du in der App eingeloggt bist.Öffne einen Besucher-ChatBitte beachte: Wir werden dir nicht helfen können, falls du unseren Standort besuchst. Bitte kontaktiere uns nur auf den genannten Kanälen. Vielen Dank für dein Verständnis.

question: ¿N26 admite transferencias SWIFT?
answer: Sí, pero de momento solo transferencias SWIFT entrantes.Todavía no pueden realizarse transferencias SWIFT salientes. Sigue las redes sociales de #N26 y nuestro Blog (pestaña nueva) para estar entre los primeros en saberlo cuando esto cambie.Te explicamos cómo hacer transferencias en divisas extranjeras con N26.Descubre cuánto tiempo tarda una transferencia SWIFT entrante.¿Cuánto cuesta una transferencia SWIFT?A las transferencias entrantes de más de 150 € se les aplicará una comisión de 12,50 € más el 0,1 % del importe recibido.A las transferencias entrantes de menos de 150 € no se les aplican comisiones.La comisión máxima es de 100 € por transacción.¿A quién se le aplica esta comisión?Si contrataste la cuenta antes del 07/07/2021 y tienes un IBAN alemán, la comisión se te aplicará si tienes una cuenta N26 Business Estándar, Business Smart o Business You. (Es decir, que no se aplica a N26 Estándar, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal y N26 Business Metal.)Si contrataste la cuenta antes del 07/07/2021 y tienes un IBAN español, la comisión se te aplicará si tienes una cuenta N26 Business Estándar, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Estándar, N26 Smart o N26 You. (Es decir, que no se aplica a las cuentas N26 Metal ni N26 Business Metal.)Si contrataste una cuenta después del 07/07/2021, la comisión se te aplicará independientemente de tu IBAN si tienes una cuenta N26 Business Estándar, Business Smart, Business You o N26 Estándar, N26 Smart o N26 You. (Es decir, que no se aplica a las cuentas N26 Metal ni N26 Business Metal.)

question: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
answer:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.Leave a Shared Space at any time.Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.
Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised. In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure. One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a “trusted beneficiary” so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

question: ¿Debo declarar mi cuenta de N26 en España?
answer: A la hora de hacer la declaración de la renta en España (pestaña nueva), la Agencia Tributaria ofrece mecanismos para que puedan declarar sus bienes en el extranjero aquellas personas que estén legalmente obligadas a hacerlo.En el caso de tu cuenta de N26, depende del tipo de IBAN que tengas:Si tu cuenta de N26 tiene un IBAN español (que empieza por ES), tu cuenta bancaria está en España a todos los efectos y no es necesario declararla.Si tu cuenta de N26 tiene un IBAN alemán (es decir, empieza por DE), entonces el depósito de tu dinero está en Alemania y, por lo tanto, estarías sujeto a esta obligación tributaria siempre y cuando tu caso concreto esté dentro de los requisitos establecidos legalmente.Para saber si tu situación corresponde a uno de estos requisitos, te recomendamos que recurras a un profesional en la materia para recibir el debido asesoramiento, ya que nosotros no estamos habilitados para ejercer como consejeros tributarios.Puedes consultar más información al respecto en el sitio web oficial de la Agencia Tributaria (pestaña nueva).

question: ¿Qué ventajas ofrece N26 Smart?
answer: Tarjeta Mastercard física de N26 gratuita: Elige entre cinco nuevos colores cuando pidas la tarjeta: pomelo, océano, arena, aguamarina y grafito.Tarjeta virtual adicional: ¡Pide una tarjeta virtual adicional gratis en la app!Tarjeta física adicional: Pide una tarjeta física N26 You adicional por una comisión única de 10 € a través de la app N26.Espacios: 10 Espacios (subcuentas) adicionales para organizar tus finanzas.Espacios Compartidos: Invita a amigos a tus Espacios (subcuentas) para que compartan y administren dinero contigo.Asistencia telefónica especial: Contacta con nuestra línea de atención al cliente si tienes alguna pregunta. Si te estás planteando contratar N26 Smart (pestaña nueva), ten en cuenta lo siguiente:La nueva tarjeta Mastercard N26 Smart no tiene relieve: los datos de la tarjeta, incluido el número, el código CVV y el “token” de 10 dígitos están impresos al dorso.Si te pasas a N26 Smart, la comisión mensual de 4,90 € se cobrará directamente de tu cuenta N26 cada mes, a partir de la fecha de contratación. Si eres nuevo cliente, la primera comisión se te cobrará 15 días después de que verifiques tu identidad (pestaña nueva). A partir de esa fecha, la comisión mensual se te cobrará en la fecha del contrato. Es decir, que si abriste tu cuenta a final de mes, las dos primeras comisiones mensuales se te cobrarán el mes siguiente.A partir de ahora, puedes decidir si quieres pagar la comisión premium cada mes o de antemano durante los próximos 6 meses o 1 año del contrato. Si escoges la opción de prepago, obtendrás un descuento del precio mensual de tu cuenta premium (Smart/You/Metal), que será proporcional al periodo de facturación que quieras abonar.Cuando contrates la cuenta, encontrarás las opciones de facturación con prepago y los costes relacionados en la app N26.

question: Perché ho un addebito doppio?
answer: Nel momento in cui effettui pagamenti con carta avvengono due principali tipologie di transazioni:La preautorizzazione, che è una transazione che prevede il blocco di un certo importo da parte di un venditore di prodotti o servizi per verificare la validità della carta o la presenza di fondi sul conto dei clienti. Le pre-autorizzazioni sono molto frequenti per confermare prenotazioni alberghiere oppure il noleggio di auto.L'addebito, che è la transazione con la quale l'importo viene effettivamente detratto dal conto.Nel momento in cui viene effettuata una preautorizzazione, questa può diventare un addebito sul conto, può essere respinta oppure scadere. Nell'ultimo caso, l'importo ritorna automaticamente sul tuo conto entro i successivi 12 giorni. Gli importi preautorizzati nel caso di noleggio auto possono richiedere fino a 30 giorni prima di essere nuovamente disponibili sul conto.Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:Talvolta sul conto appaiono sia l'autorizzazione che l'addebito. Questo accade, ad esempio, nel caso di pagamento offline, quindi non in tempo reale, oppure a causa di problemi tecnici al terminale di pagamento. Anche in questi casi, l'autorizzazione scadrà nei tempi indicati. Nel caso non dovesse succedere, contattaci via chat e ti aiuteremo a recuperare l'importo (nuova tabella).L'importo della preautorizzazione può essere diverso da quello dell'addebito finale del conto per diversi motivi (nuova tabella).

question: N26 Cashless - Competition for Italian customers
answer:
What is it?N26 Cashless is a new promotion designed for N26 customers residing in Italy whose purpose is to encourage the use of the N26 debit card for digital payments.The competition will be active from March 1st to June 30th, 2021.Who can participate?
Registration for N26 Cashless is open and automatic for all N26 customers residing in Italy (except N26 Business customers) and who have given their consent to marketing communications.In order to participate in the promotion and prize draw, customers must:Have an open and active N26 accountNot have incurred in foreclosures, seizures or other limitations of the current accountThe mentioned conditions are valid for the entire duration of the competition and failure to comply may lead to exclusion from the final prize draw.How does it work?
N26 customers enrolled in the program will reach the threshold to participate in the final prize draws by making transactions with their Mastercard associated with the N26 account via POS (either contactless, or with chip and pin) or with Apple Pay and Google Pay.Online payments and ATM withdrawals are excluded from the transaction count.What are the prizes?Based on the number of transactions carried out during the period of validity of the competition (1st March - 30th June 2021), participants will be able to access the draws for 3 prizes:At least 20 transactions > 20€ Amazon gift card At least 50 transactions > 50€ Amazon gift card At least 90 transactions > 90€ Amazon gift card If participants make a number of transactions that correspond to different thresholds, they participate in the drawing of prizes for both thresholds reached.(For example, if you carry out 60 payments during the duration of the competition, you participate in the draw for both 20€ and 50€ Amazon voucher.)The prize draw will take place by August 31, 2021.In the event of a win, customers will receive an official communication within their "Messages" inbox of ​​the N26 App.Prize competition valid from 01/03/2021 to 30/06/2021. Prize money 4,160 € F.C. VAT. To consult the complete rules, visit www.n26.com (new tab). Amazon.co.uk Gift Card is not a sponsor of this promotion. Restrictions applied. More details on amazon.it/gc-legal (new tab).

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits up to €100.000 held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud? N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Warum prüft N26 Transaktionen?
answer:
Wir haben die Aufgabe, Routineprüfungen von Transaktionen durchzuführen, um die Sicherheit deines Kontos zu gewährleisten (siehe GwG § 10 (neuen Tab)). Diese Überprüfungen betreffen einzelne Transaktionen und werden automatisch von unseren Systemen initiiert.Aus diesem Grund kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen. Wenn Du eine solche Anfrage erhältst, sende uns die angeforderten Unterlagen bitte via Nachrichten von N26. Es gibt keine Ausnahmen für solche Überprüfungen, und sie können auch nicht umgangen werden. Dabei handelt es sich um Standardprozesse wie sie bei Banken üblich sind, um die Sicherheit unserer Kundenkonten zu gewährleisten.Der genaue Prüfvorgang und das Ergebnis werden vertraulich behandelt und nur intern verarbeitet. Hier findest du einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:Hier sind einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:In der E-Mail, die du von uns erhältst, werden wir dir genau erklären, welches spezifische Dokument wir von dir benötigen. Du kannst uns eingescannte Dokumente, Bilder oder Screenshots zusenden (vorausgesetzt, der Originalinhalt des Dokuments ist deutlich lesbar). Bitte gib uns auch eine genaue Beschreibung über den Inhalt des Dokuments.Du kannst einen Beleg, eine Rechnung, einen Vertrag oder ein ähnliches Dokument einreichen, das es uns ermöglicht, die jeweilige Transaktion und deren Herkunft und Zweck eindeutig zu identifizieren. .Sei präzise in deinen Antworten, Details und Dokumenten. Nachdem wir deine Unterlagen erhalten haben, lassen wir dich wissen, ob sie für die Überprüfung ausreichend sind. In einigen Fällen kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach weiteren Details fragen werden, was zu Verzögerungen führen kann.Antworte so früh wie möglich, also vor der genannten Frist, direkt auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast und sende deine Unterlagen mit. Unserem Kundendienst liegen zu diesem Thema keine weiteren Informationen vor.Du musst die je nach deiner Situation gültigen Dokumente vorlegen. 
Einige Beispiele:Du hast finanzielle Hilfe von deiner Familie erhalten, um Projekte abzuschließen oder hast Grundstücke oder Geld von Verwandten geerbt.Ein Gewährungs-/Darlehensvertrag, ein offizielles Erbschaftsdokument oder ein offizielles Dokument über die Herkunft des Darlehens (z.B. Verkaufsunterlagen einer veräußerten Immobilie zur Finanzierung des Darlehens oder Kontoauszüge von Verwandten, von denen das Geld stammt).Du hast eine Immobilie veräußert oder deine Aktien an der Börse verkauft.Den Vertrag über die vereinbarten Geschäfte oder notarielle Beurkundung des Eigentumsübergangs.Du hast Geld erhalten oder gesendet, um Rechnungen zu bezahlen oder ein Produkt zu kaufen.Kontoauszüge über die Herkunft des Geldes oder Dokumente, die die Verwendung des Geldes und seinen Zweck belegen.Du hast eine Abfindung von deinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber erhalten.Dokumente, die das Ende deines Arbeitsverhältnisses belegen, mit einer Zahlungsbegründung und/oder einem Kontoauszug deines früheren Arbeitgebers.

question: Que faire si j’ai l’impression que mon compte a été piraté ?
answer: Si vous pensez que votre compte a été piraté, modifiez d’abord le mot de passe, puis, en fonction de la situation, prenez les mesures suivantes :Que faire en cas de transactions suspectes sur mon compte ?Si vous remarquez une transaction suspecte, référez-vous à notre article Comment contester une transaction ?Puis, contactez l’équipe du Service Client, soit directement via l’application N26, soit par email à support@n26.com (nouvel onglet).Notre Livechat est disponible depuis votre application et votre espace en ligne, ou encore à la fin de certains articles de notre Support Center, comme celui-ci. Pour démarrer une conversation, cliquez sur le bouton Démarrer un chat. Si vous préférez avoir une conversation téléphonique, vous pouvez le demander par chat. Nous organiserons un appel dans l’heure qui suit pour discuter de la situation avec vous. Une fois en relation avec un de nos agents, expliquez la situation en détails. Toute information sera importante pour nos services. Soyez assuré que nous prendrons toutes les mesures nécessaires pour vous aider.En plus de nos obligations légales en matière de prévention contre la fraude, et afin d'améliorer sans cesse nos mesures de sécurité, nous avons dédié une équipe qui analyse chaque cas de fraude.Les cas de fraudes sont souvent compliqués et doivent être étudiés dans les détails. Cela peut prendre quelques jours, ou même quelques semaines pour les cas les plus compliqués.Enfin, si vous avez des preuves ou des raisons sérieuses de penser que votre compte a pu être piraté, nous vous conseillons de déposer plainte auprès des autorités compétentes.Que faire si je perds ma carte, ou si je pense que les données de celle-ci ont été piratées ?Si votre carte N26 a été perdue ou volée et que vous craignez que ses données n’aient été piratées, vous devriez la bloquer immédiatement depuis votre application N26 afin que votre compte ne soit pas débité. Vous pourrez ensuite commander une nouvelle carte.Que faire si je n’ai plus l’appareil associé à mon compte en ma possession ? Quelqu’un peut-il y accéder ?Si l’appareil associé à votre compte est perdu ou volé, pas d’inquiétude : votre application N26 ne peut être ouverte qu’en utilisant le bon mot de passe, votre empreinte ou la reconnaissance faciale. Notre équipe du Service Client saura vous assister si vous souhaitez associer un nouvel appareil à votre compte N26.Et si j’ai des idées pour améliorer la sécurité chez N26 ?Pour en savoir plus sur la façon dont nous protégeons votre compte, visitez notre page sur la sécurité chez N26 (nouvel onglet).Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 à 23:00 h.Si vous n’avez pas accès à votre application mobile N26, ou si vous ne pouvez pas vous connecter à votre espace client en ligne, vous pouvez également demander à bloquer votre carte bancaire ou les transactions sortantes de votre compte en nous appelant au +33 1 88 45 02 39.

question: ¿Cómo hacer transferencias en moneda extranjera?
answer:
Nos hemos asociado con Wise para que las transferencias en moneda extranjera resulten sencillas. Wise ofrece tipos de cambio real y sin comisiones ocultas.Para realizar una transferencia en moneda extranjera, entra en la app N26 con tu móvil:Desde la pantalla principal, pulsa sobre la pestaña de ''Enviar dinero''.Selecciona "Transferencia en moneda extranjera".Introduce la cantidad que quieres enviar. Introduce los datos bancarios del receptor, y confirma la transferencia.Finaliza confirmando con tu PIN de confirmación.Si la divisa (pestaña nueva) que necesitas no aparece en la app, entonces visita la página de Wise (pestaña nueva) para tener todas las opciones posibles. 
Puedes crear tu cuenta Wise utilizando el email de tu cuenta N26 para realizar la transferencia desde allí:Pon el email registrado de N26.Escribe una contraseña cualquiera e intenta entrar.Dará error; pulsa en ¿Has olvidado tu contraseña?Recibirás un email con los pasos para restablecerla.Ten en cuenta que las transferencias internacionales en moneda extranjera no pueden llevarse a cabo desde la aplicación si tienes una cuenta N26 Business o Business You, o si el destinatario es una cuenta Business.Wise aplica sus propias comisiones según el tipo de transferencia, pero lo verás todo antes de confirmarla.¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 € por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Infórmate más sobre este tema (pestaña nueva).Wise solo admite transferencias en la moneda principal de un país. Esto significa, por ejemplo, que no se puede procesar ninguna transacción en USD en India.

question: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
answer: Direct debits returned to your account due to insufficient funds* are charged a €3 fee (the fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is €9) in accordance with our Terms & Conditions (new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee, overdraft interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.We suggest you use SEPA Instant credit transfers, MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts), CASH26 (if you live in Germany, Austria, Spain, Greece or Italy) or the Debit/Credit card option (new tab) to transfer the amount due. With these methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.If you don’t recognize a direct debit, you can request a refund in the app.IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. You can check the list of countries below:BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland

question: ¿Cuál es el máximo que puedo gastar?
answer: Pagos con tarjeta en establecimientos y onlineLímite diario: 5.000 €Límite mensual: 20.000 €Retiradas en cajerosSe aplica un límite de 1.000 € en: Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Alemania, Grecia, Italia, Islandia, Irlanda, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Países Bajos, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, España, Eslovenia, Suecia y Suiza.Se aplica un límite de 400 € en: Togo, Congo, Benín, Costa de Marfil, Kenia, Camerún, Nigeria, Senegal, Argelia, República Centroafricana, Gambia, Ghana, Ruanda, Túnez y Uganda.Se aplica un límite semanal de 2.500 € a todos los países. TransferenciasLímite diario para MoneyBeams: 1.000 €Transferencias SEPA entrantes: Sin límite Transferencias SEPA salientes: Sin límiteTransferencias SEPA inmediatas entrantes: 100.000 € por transferenciaTransferencias SEPA inmediatas salientes: 2.000 € por trasferenciaCash26El máximo es de 200 € por cada retirada y de 900 € cada 24 horas. No hay ningún mínimo de retirada, como si quieres sacar un céntimo.El mínimo es de 50 € por depósito y el máximo es de 999 € cada 24 horas.También hay un límite combinado de retiradas e ingresos de 999 € cada 24 horas.

question: How to change my phone number?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10€N26 Metal cards: 45€Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30€N26 Metal: 65€Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: ¿Cómo iniciar sesión en la cuenta con la autenticación de dos factores?
answer: Los dos factores de autenticación es un proceso de autenticación basado en el uso de dos o más elementos de seguridad. Además de tu contraseña personal, para iniciar sesión en tu cuenta vas a necesitar la confirmación desde el dispositivo vinculado o un código por SMS. Lee más información sobre la autenticación de dos factores.¿Cómo inicio sesión en la cuenta con la autenticación de dos factores? Cuando inicies sesión en tu cuenta de N26 desde la web app o un dispositivo no vinculado, recibirás un notificación emergente en tu dispositivo vinculado o puedes solicitar un código SMS a tu número registrado. Esto asegurará que solo tú puedes entrar en tu cuenta.Cuando inicies sesión desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticación ya están funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.¿Cuáles son los requisitos?  Necesitas actualizar el sistema operativo de tu teléfono y la app de N26 a la última versión. Si no puedes iniciar sesión en la cuenta, pero aún tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contraseña. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, contáctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte. ¿Qué pasa si no recuerdo mi contraseña?Lee en este artículo como restablecer tu contraseña.¿Qué pasa si he perdido o me han robado el móvil?Si has perdido el acceso a tu dispositivo vinculado pero tienes acceso a tu número de teléfono registrado, inicia sesión en tu cuenta de N26 y solicita un código de vinculación. Para ello haz lo siguiente:Inicia sesión en la WebAppCuando vayas a confirmar el acceso en tu dispositivo vinculado selecciona ''Ayuda''.Selecciona ''Enviar SMS''.Cuando hayas recibido el código por SMS, introdúcelo en la WebApp.Cuando confirmes el código ya tendrás los dos factores de autenticación automáticamente y podrás vincular tu nuevo dispositivo con la cuenta. ¿Qué pasa si tengo un nuevo número de teléfono o no puedo recibir el SMS?Si no puedes iniciar sesión en la cuenta, pero aún tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contraseña. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, contáctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte. ¿Por qué no me puedo descargar la última versión de la app en mi teléfono?Si tienes un teléfono que no soporta la última versión de la app, no podrás acceder a tu cuenta de N26 usando ese teléfono. Sin embargo, puedes utilizar la Web App para consultar tu cuenta. Para ello, tienes que confirmar el inicio de sesión con un código que te enviamos por SMS a tu número de teléfono registrado. Puedes seguir realizando pagos con tarjeta y retiradas en cajero utilizando tu Mastercard, pero debes tener en cuenta que no podrás enviar transferencias bancarias ni realizar pagos online hasta que no puedas confirmarlo por la app de N26.

question: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
answer: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience. You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the Apple App Store (new tab) or the Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

question: Perché il mio acquisto online non è riuscito?
answer: Se stai facendo un acquisto online e stai riscontrando un problema durante il pagamento, qui di seguito puoi trovare una lista di possibili inconvenienti e come risolverli. Se non riesci a confermare il pagamento tramite notifica push entro 5 minuti, è sufficiente riavviare il processo di pagamento sul sito web del venditore.Se non ricevi alcuna notifica push, assicurati che lo smartphone sia connesso e che le notifiche siano attivate nelle impostazioni generali. Ricorda: la notifica push sarà inviata solo allo smartphone collegato al conto.Se utilizzi un dispositivo iOS, assicurati di disattivare la modalità Non disturbare.Assicurati che i pagamenti online e quelli all’estero siano abilitati e che la carta che stai usando non sia bloccata nelle impostazioni della tua carta. È necessaria una connessione Internet stabileSe l’importo sul sito del venditore è diverso da quello indicato nel messaggio push, ciò può essere dovuto alla conversione di una valuta estera in euro. Assicurati di disabilitare tutti gli Adblocker in esecuzione sul tuo browser.La tua carta Maestro non può essere utilizzata per gli acquisti online.Se avessi bisogno di ulteriore assistenza per un pagamento online, non esitare a contattare il nostro Servizio Clienti via chat, dalla versione Web o mobile della tua app N26.

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier. You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: Comment fonctionne Google Pay ?
answer:
Disponible dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Grèce, Irlande, Italie, Lettonie, Lituanie, Norvège, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Suède et Suisse.Google Pay est une méthode de paiement qui vous permet de payer facilement vos achats depuis votre smartphone, sans avoir besoin de votre portefeuille ni de votre Mastercard.Google Pay est disponible chez tous les marchands qui proposent les paiements sans contact (NFC), y compris sur les sites de vente en ligne. En magasin, il vous suffit de déverrouiller votre téléphone et de le présenter au terminal de paiement sans contact. Le paiement sera alors automatique. Lorsque vous payez en ligne, sélectionnez Google Pay comme option de paiement, une confirmation de paiement vous sera demandée sous forme d’un message pop-up.Voici les étapes à suivre afin d'installer Google Pay :1. Veuillez télécharger l'application Google Pay sur votre smartphone (qui requiert minimum Android 5.0 ainsi qu'un smartphone compatible NFC).2. Connectez-vous à votre application mobile N26 et accédez à Cartes > Paramètres de la carte > Ajouter à Google Pay. Vous serez ensuite redirigé vers l'application Google Pay.
Si vous ne parvenez pas à installer Google Pay :Afin d’ajouter votre Mastercard N26 à votre Google Wallet, votre téléphone doit être équipé d’Android 5.0 (Lollipop) ou d’une version plus récente et compatible avec la technologie sans contact (NFC). Une fois l’application Google Pay installée, il vous faudra cliquer sur Ajouter une carte.Il est indispensable d’avoir un code de verrouillage sur l’écran de votre téléphone lorsque vous utilisez Google Pay. Si vous n’en avez pas, il vous sera demandé d’en configurer un avant d’ajouter votre Mastercard à votre Google Wallet.Si votre téléphone est protégé par une coque, il est possible que vous deviez la retirer pour pouvoir payer. Certains terminaux de paiement ne reconnaissent pas le téléphone si la coque est trop épaisse.Si le terminal de paiement vous demande de présenter à nouveau votre carte, il se peut que vous ayez retiré votre téléphone trop rapidement où que celui-ci n’ait pas été placé suffisamment proche du terminal de paiement.Utilisez votre carte avec Google Pay avant même de la recevoirN26 vous permet d’utiliser votre nouvelle carte avant même de la recevoir en l’ajoutant à votre compte Google Pay.Cette fonctionnalité est disponible si vous venez de recommander une carte (suite à l'ouverture de votre compte ou à un changement de type de compte). Cette fonctionnalité est utilisable pendant 30 jours à partir de la date de la commande de votre carte. Si vous n’activez pas votre nouvelle carte physique dans ce délai, vous ne pourrez temporairement plus utiliser les paiements mobiles.Dès que vous aurez reçu votre carte, activez-la depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne en suivant les étapes indiquées.Veuillez noter que cette fonctionnalité ne vous permet pas de retirer des espèces en DAB ni d’utiliser CASH26 (si disponible dans votre pays).

question: ¿Qué beneficios tiene N26 Metal?
answer: ℹ️ Disponible en España, Alemania, Austria, Francia, Italia, Dinamarca, Bélgica, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los Países Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, y Suecia.Tarjeta Mastercard física de N26 gratuita: Elige entre tres nuevos colores cuando pidas la tarjeta: ambra, negro y grafito.Tarjeta virtual adicional: ¡Pide una tarjeta virtual adicional gratis en la app!Tarjeta física adicional: Pide una tarjeta física N26 You adicional por una comisión única de 10 € a través de la app N26.Espacios: 10 Espacios (subcuentas) adicionales para organizar tus finanzas.Espacios Compartidos: Invita a amigos a tus Espacios (subcuentas) para que compartan y administren dinero contigo.Asistencia telefónica especial: Contacta con nuestra línea de atención al cliente si tienes alguna pregunta. Retiradas en cajeros gratuitas en todo el mundo: Paga con tu Mastercard de N26 Metal online y en establecimientos, evita comisiones ocultas y disfruta de cero comisiones por transacciones en el extranjero en todo el mundo. También puedes retirar dinero en efectivo de forma gratuita en cualquier divisa en cajeros de todo el mundo.Ofertas exclusivas de nuestros asociados: (pestaña nueva) Ofertas y descuentos premium de nuestros asociados con marcas de prestigio mundial.Paquete de seguros de Allianz Global Assistance*: Un seguro que incluye un amplio abanico de prestaciones personales y financieras, como:Seguro de viaje: Indemnización de gastos médicos en el extranjero, por cancelaciones de viaje tras una emergencia médica, gastos ocasionados por un retraso de más de 4 horas, gastos en caso de retraso de más de 6 horas del equipaje facturado y gastos de repatriación médica.Salvamento en nieve y montaña: Cubre los gastos de búsqueda, salvamento, primer transporte y gastos médicos en caso de accidente durante un viaje de montaña.Compartir vehículos, bicicletas y scooters: Cobertura por daños o robo de vehículos alquilados a empresas de vehículos compartidos.¡Puedes comparar N26 Metal con nuestros otros planes (pestaña nueva) para ver cuál se ajusta mejor a tus necesidades!Si estás pensando en suscribirte a N26 Metal (pestaña nueva), recuerda:Si te pasas a N26 Metal tendrás una mensualidad de 16,90€ y será deducida directamente del saldo de tu cuenta en N26. El cobro se realizará cada mes empezando el día que te suscribas. Si eres un nuevo cliente, la primera mensualidad será restada 15 días después de que verifiques tu identidad. A partir de ahí se te cobrará la comisión mensualmente el día que te suscribiste.Para recibir tu tarjeta, te pedimos que recargues la cuenta justo después de completar el registro con al menos una mensualidad de Metal. Si previamente eras de N26 You, recuerda que todas tus compras realizadas con N26 You siguen aseguradas.A partir de ahora, puedes decidir si quieres pagar la comisión premium cada mes o de antemano durante los próximos 6 meses o 1 año del contrato. Si escoges la opción de prepago, obtendrás un descuento del precio mensual de tu cuenta premium (Smart/You/Metal), que será proporcional al periodo de facturación que quieras abonar.Cuando contrates la cuenta, encontrarás las opciones de facturación con prepago y los costes relacionados en la app N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe nombre comercial de AWP P&C S.A. - Sucursal holandesa y miembro de Allianz Group.

question: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident? 
You are normally a “tax resident” and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally “tie-breaker rules” included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities. 
What is your taxpayer identification number (“TIN”) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries. In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you’re able to see what’s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you’ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can’t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days. Sometimes you’ll see both payments at the same time–the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn’t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab). Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

question: Why isn't my video verification working?
answer: Tips for a successful video verification:Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting).
