Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.You need to live in one of our supported countries to open an account with us.We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver’s licenses or residence permits can’t be used). Also, the document shouldn’t be damaged.Once your verification is complete, you'll need to reach a minimum account balance in order to trigger the production and delivery of your card. Please note that this is not a fee: your first card after opening your account or upgrading to a premium membership is free of charge!As soon as your account balance reaches the minimum requirement, your N26 card will be automatically produced and shipped. Deliveries take up to 15 days.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Comment alimenter mon compte ?
answer: Si vous avez ouvert votre compte N26 en France :Le premier versement effectué pour alimenter votre compte doit être un virement SEPA en euros provenant d'un autre compte bancaire à votre nom. Une fois ce premier virement effectué, vous pouvez alimenter votre compte de toutes les autres manières listées dans cet article.Pour les autres pays :Vous pouvez approvisionner votre compte en choisissant l’une des options disponibles dès le premier versement.Afin d'alimenter votre compte N26, rendez-vous dans la section Recevoir de l’application N26 afin de sélectionner une des options disponibles :1. Virement SEPA en euros (traité sous 1 à 2 jours ouvrés)Le virement doit provenir d'un compte en euros et domicilié au sein de l’espace SEPAVeuillez renseigner votre numéro IBAN ainsi que votre nom complet exactement comme il est mentionné sur la pièce d'identité utilisée pour ouvrir votre compte N26. Si vous avez un compte N26 Business, nous n'acceptons pas les noms de société.Un virement entrant est crédité en temps réel lorsqu’il a été réalisé en tant que virement instantané, sinon un virement bancaire est exécuté en un ou deux jours ouvrés. Depuis le 1er juillet 2020, les virements en temps réel sont soumis à une limite de 100.000 €. Aucune limite ne s’applique aux virements SEPA entrants normaux.2. Carte de crédit ou de débit (instantané)Le montant avec lequel vous pouvez alimenter votre compte à chaque transaction récurrente est de 20 € au minimum et de 450 € au maximum par mois.Le premier versement est gratuit. Les dépôts suivants sont facturés à hauteur de 3 % du montant total du dépôt.Veuillez renseigner les coordonnées de la carte de débit associée au compte émetteur.Ne sont pas acceptées : les cartes prépayées et les cartes de crédit American Express.3. Apple Pay (pour les smartphones dotés d'iOS) ou Google Pay (pour les smartphones dotés d'iAndroid) (instantané)Vous pouvez choisir de déposer entre 20 € et 450 €. Le premier versement est gratuit. Les dépôts suivants sont facturés à hauteur de 3 % du montant total du dépôt.Veuillez renseigner les coordonnées de la carte de crédit ou débit associée au compte émetteur Apple Pay ou Google Pay.Ne sont pas acceptées : les cartes prépayées et les cartes American Express.4. MoneyBeam (instantané)en recevant de l'argent d'un autre client N265. CASH26 uniquement en Allemagne, Autriche, Italie, Espagne et en Grèce (instantané)en déposant des espèces à la caisse de magasins partenaires une fois que votre carte est activée6. iDEAL (instantané): Uniquement disponible pour les clients basés aux Pays-Bas avec un compte iDEAL.7. GiroPay (virement instantané): Uniquement disponible pour les clients basés en Allemagne, selon les Conditions Générales allemandes, et titulaires d’un compte GiroPay.8. EPS (virement instantané) : Uniquement disponible pour les clients basés en Autriche, selon les Conditions Générales autrichiennes, et titulaires d’un compte EPS.9. Bancontact (virement instantané) : Uniquement disponible pour les clients basés en Belgique, selon les Conditions Générales belges, et titulaires d’un compte Bancontact.

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German). Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the “Owner”, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space: Owns all the funds within a Shared Space. Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime. Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner’s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they’ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space. N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Prueba Smart dos meses gratis
answer:
Elegibilidad: Todos los mercados europeosPrueba N26 Smart durante dos meses¿Alguna vez te has planteado probar una cuenta N26 Smart, pero no sabes si te gustará o no? Pues ahora puedes disfrutar de dos meses gratis y probarla sin compromiso antes de comprarla para ver si la cuenta Smart satisface tus necesidades.Si decides aprovechar nuestra prueba gratuita de N26 Smart, accederás a todos los servicios bancarios premium que incluye la cuenta Smart. Verás cómo le sacas más partido a tus actividades bancarias diarias.¿Qué incluye nuestra prueba gratuita de Smart?60 días de prueba gratis: Si acabas de contratar un plan N26 Estándar, puedes probar Smart gratis durante 60 días.Cancela cuando quieras: En cualquier momento durante tu prueba gratuita, podrás cancelarla y seguir disfrutando de sus ventajas durante los 60 días completos (trascurridos los cuales, se te cambiará automáticamente a un plan Estándar).Seguir con Smart: Si decides que la cuenta N26 Smart es lo tuyo, no hagas nada y seguirás suscrito a nuestra cuenta Smart por una comisión mensual de 4,90 €. Si cambias de opinión cuando finalice la prueba gratuita, puedes volver a cambiarte a Estándar cuando quieras.Disfruta de las ventajas de nuestra cuenta Smart: Puedes aprovechar las siguientes ventajas durante la prueba gratuita de 60 días de Smart:Espacios (hasta 10)Hasta 10 Espacios compartidosIBAN para EspaciosHasta 5 retiradas en cajeros gratuitas al mesAhorros redondeadosOfertas y descuentos exclusivosAsistencia telefónicaImportante:Te informamos de que, si sigues con la cuenta N26 Smart, la comisión de 4,90 € se te cobrará un día después de que finalice tu prueba gratuita. No obstante, podrás cambiarte a una cuenta de inferior categoría cuando lo desees.Por otra parte, cuando contrates la cuenta te ofreceremos la posibilidad de volver a pedir tu tarjeta virtual gratis (una vez) y esta vez recibirás una tarjeta de color. También podrás quedarte tu tarjeta transparente. Te advertimos de que tu tarjeta virtual se desactivará.¿Cómo acceder a la prueba gratuita de Smart?Si te han invitado a una prueba gratuita de nuestro plan Smart, podrás acceder a ella siguiendo estas instrucciones. Desde la notificación push: Pulsa en la notificación push.Cuando se abra la app N26, la invitación que te explica la oferta de prueba gratuita se abrirá automáticamente. Haz clic en «Seguir» para continuar.Verás un resumen de la oferta; lee y acepta los Términos y Condiciones; a continuación,
haz clic en «Confirmar compra»: a partir de ese momento estarás disfrutando de la prueba y recibirás un mensaje de confirmación. Desde la app N26: Abre tu app N26.Verás la oferta de prueba gratuita de Smart en la parte superior de la pantalla de inicio. Pulsa en «Más información». Se abrirá la pantalla de la invitación, que te explicará la oferta de prueba gratuita de forma detallada. Haz clic en «Seguir» para continuar.Verás un resumen de la oferta; lee y acepta los Términos y Condiciones; a continuación,
haz clic en «Confirmar compra»: a partir de ese momento estarás disfrutando de la prueba. Nota: Si has recibido un email de invitación a la prueba, te recomendamos que lo abras desde tu móvil y hagas clic en el botón «Iniciar prueba gratuita». De este modo, la app N26 se abrirá automáticamente y cargará la página de la invitación. Si lo prefieres, inicia sesión en la app del móvil de N26 y sigue las pautas para la app que te indicamos arriba.

question: Que sont les IBAN pour les Espaces ?
answer: Grâce à notre fonctionnalité IBAN pour les Espaces, vos Espaces individuels sont encore plus pratiques. Les Espaces ne peuvent pas être utilisés pour les virements entrants ou les prélèvements automatiques. Une fois que vous avez associé un IBAN à un Espace, celui-ci peut être utilisé pour recevoir des virements entrants et payer par prélèvement automatique.Comment ça marche?Les IBAN pour les Espaces permettent aux clients disposant d’une adhésion N26 premium (N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal), qui ont ouvert leur compte N26 en Allemagne et qui disposent d’un IBAN allemand, d’associer un IBAN unique à un Espace. Ce dernier peut ainsi être utilisé pour certains virements entrants et sortants.Vous trouverez ci-dessous un aperçu des fonctionnalités permettant d’associer un IBAN à votre ou vos Espaces :Ajouter un IBAN à vos Espaces : Vous pouvez associer un IBAN unique à un Espace existant ou créer un nouvel Espace. Les Espaces Partagés ne peuvent être associés à un IBAN.Espaces multiples avec IBAN : Vous pouvez créer jusqu’à 10 Espaces, chacun avec son propre IBAN, ce qui vous permet de contrôler encore mieux vos finances. Une fois qu’un IBAN a été associé à 3 Espaces, un délai de 24 heures s’applique jusqu’à ce qu’un nouvel IBAN unique puisse être associé à un Espace.Recevoir des virements bancaires : Vous pouvez recevoir des virements directement dans l’Espace auquel un IBAN est associé.Effectuer des virements bancaires : Vous pouvez effectuer des virements directement depuis l’Espace auquel un IBAN est associé.Payer par prélèvement automatique : Vous pouvez utiliser l’IBAN unique de votre Espace pour le paiement par prélèvement automatique récurrent, directement depuis votre Espace. Si vos fonds sont insuffisants pour couvrir le montant du prélèvement automatique, le virement sera rejeté et des frais seront prélevés sur votre compte courant.Consultez les détails de l’IBAN de vos Espaces : Vous pouvez utiliser chaque IBAN de vos Espaces pour recevoir des virements et payer par prélèvement automatique. Pour ce faire, il vous suffit de vous connecter à l’application mobile ou l’espace client en ligne, d’accéder à la rubrique « Espaces » et de sélectionner l’Espace pour lequel vous souhaitez consulter les détails de l’IBAN. Accédez aux « Paramètres de l’espace » pour consulter l’IBAN et le BIC en haut de l’écran.Comment ajouter un IBAN à un Espace :Pour ajouter un IBAN à vos Espaces, veuillez suivre les étapes suivantes :Connectez-vous à l’application mobile N26Appuyez sur « Espaces » pour accéder au menu EspacesSélectionnez l’Espace auquel vous souhaitez associer un IBAN uniqueAppuyez sur l’icône en forme de roue dentée en haut à droite de l’écran pour accéder aux « Paramètres de l’espace ».Naviguez dans l’application :Sélectionnez « Créer un IBAN »Lisez les informations et appuyez sur « Ajouter un IBAN à ... »Acceptez les Conditions Générales d’UtilisationSaisissez votre code de validationAppuyez sur « D’accord » sur l’écran final.Comment supprimer un IBAN d’un Espace :Pour supprimer un IBAN d’un Espace, vous devez supprimer l’Espace lui-même et transférer les fonds restants sur votre compte courant ou sur un autre Espace. Pour supprimer un Espace associé à un IBAN, veuillez procéder comme suit :Connectez-vous à l’application mobile N26Appuyez sur « Espaces »Sélectionnez l’Espace associé à un IBAN que vous souhaitez supprimer (cela supprimera complètement l’Espace et l’argent devra être transféré)Accédez aux « Paramètres de l’espace » (cliquez sur l’icône en forme de roue dentée en haut à droite)Sous « Gérer », vous trouverez l’option « Vider et supprimer l’espace »Appuyez sur cette option et confirmez que vous souhaitez supprimer l’EspaceSélectionnez votre compte courant ou un autre Espace pour y transférer le solde restantEnfin, appuyez sur « Supprimer » pour confirmer.Vous pouvez effectuer des virements SEPA sortants depuis vos Espaces auxquels est associé un IBAN. Pour ce faire, veuillez suivre les étapes suivantes :Rendez-vous dans l’Espace à partir duquel vous souhaitez effectuer un virement, puis appuyez sur « Envoyer ».Sélectionnez « Virement bancaire ».Sélectionnez le contact auquel vous souhaitez envoyer de l’argent.Confirmez le montant que vous souhaitez envoyer et saisissez une référence (facultatif).Saisissez votre code de validation, puis confirmez le virement.

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits up to €100.000 held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud? N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Was ist N26 Business Metal?
answer: Verfügbar in Österreich, Belgien, Dänemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Schweden.N26 Business Metal 16,90 € pro Monat und ist für Selbstständige und Freiberufler gedacht, die in eigenem Namen tätig sind. Das bedeutet, dass auf dem Konto oder der Karte kein Firmenname stehen kann.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: Wähle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fünf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zusätzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusätzliche virtuelle Karte!Zusätzliche physische Karte: Bestelle über deine N26 App eine zusätzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Gebühr von 10 €.Spaces: 10 zusätzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 Metal Mastercard online sowie in Geschäften, vermeide versteckte Bankgebühren und profitiere von gebührenfreien Auslandsüberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst darüber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit gebührenfrei Bargeld in jeder Währung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an persönlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: Rückerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, für Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugverspätung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Verspätung des aufgegebenen Gepäcks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten für medizinische Rücktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erhältst eine Versicherung für Such- und Rettungsmaßnahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unfällen während einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz für Schäden oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Es ist noch nicht möglich, zwischen Privat- und Geschäftskonten zu wechseln. Umso wichtiger ist es, zu wissen, ob N26 Business Metal das Richtige für dich (neuen Tab) ist:Das N26 Business Metal Konto ist für Selbständige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Das Konto kostet 16,90 € pro Monat. Das Premium-Konto beinhaltet: Ein Allianz-Versicherungspaket sowie gebührenfreie Abhebungen an Geldautomaten in Fremdwährungen.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur für den geschäftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erhältst monatlich 0,5% Cashback auf alle mit der Karte getätigten Zahlungen. Der Vorgang erfolgt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis er auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht möglich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu führen. Wenn du also auch eine Karte für private Ausgaben benötigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine Maestrocard zu bestellen (erhältlich in Deutschland und Österreich).Überweisungen in Fremdwährung sind mit N26 Business Metal nicht möglich.Du kannst direkt bei der Anmeldung Business Metal auswählen oder von einem existierenden N26 Business Konto upgraden.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und gehört zur Allianz Group.

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then “add a new recipient”,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You’ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you’ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select “Send Money” then choose “Bank Transfer”. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You’ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you reorder a card. You’ll then receive a tracking link by email. If you’re not home during the delivery and your mailbox can’t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it’ll be returned to us. We’ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It’s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It’s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it’s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn’t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can’t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25€Reordering your card: 30€Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30€N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25€Reordering your card 65€

question: What is the maximum I can spend?
answer: Card payments in stores and onlineDaily limit: €5,000Monthly limit: €20,000Cash withdrawalsA daily limit of €1,000 applies to: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.A daily limit of €400 applies to: Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal, Algeria, Central African Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Rwanda, Tunisia and Uganda.The weekly limit of €2,500 applies to all EU countries (except France).A weekly limit of €1,050 applies to France (including all customers with French T&Cs).TransfersDaily limit for MoneyBeams: €1,000Incoming SEPA transfers: No limit Outgoing SEPA transfers: No limitIncoming SEPA instant transfers: €100,000 per transferOutgoing SEPA instant transfers: €2,000 per transferCash26The CASH26 withdrawal limit is €200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to €900 in any 24-hour period. There’s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.The minimum CASH26 deposit is €50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to €999 in a 24-hour period.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.N26 customers with an Italian IBAN, can withdraw and deposit a maximum of 2000€ per week.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login. Your login details of both the mobile and WebApp (new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN. This 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then change it in the app yourself after that.Push messages. For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added 3D Secure to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we’ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we’ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We’ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters. Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved? Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you’re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action. If you have a feeling that something is off, don’t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don’t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender’s identity.If you’ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you’d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: How to upgrade to Metal?
answer: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the delivery and accept the N26 Metal T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you’re already a N26 You member, you don’t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: How does Spaces work?
answer: Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and WebApp (new tab).In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you’d like but the number of active Spaces available depends on your account type: up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Smart and N26 Metal.Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.Only your N26 main account can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and WebApp. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you’ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‘Hide space balance’.You can now block transfers from a specific Space. Just go to the Space's settings, tap on Block transfers to Main account or other Spaces and enter your Confirmation PIN.Now you're also able to delete a Space, even with a card linked to it, from the settings of the Space.Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.Round-up Savings:Round-Up Savings allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.IBANs for Spaces subaccounts:Premium customers (N26 Smart, You and Metal) who opened their account in Germany and who have a ‘DE’ IBAN can now assign a unique IBAN to their Space or Spaces. Once a Space has an IBAN assigned the Space can then be used to send and receive certain transfers. Below is a summary of how you can use your Spaces for even better control of your incoming and outgoing transfers:Receive incoming credit transfers: Once you have assigned an IBAN to Space, you can share your unique IBAN details to receive transfers.Pay your outgoing direct debits: Spaces with an assigned IBAN are able to be used to pay your outgoing direct debits.Multiple Spaces with IBANs: You can create up to 10 Spaces with a unique IBAN for even more control of where your money is coming and going.You can find our dedicated article with more information about IBANs for Spaces here.

question: Où est mon remboursement par carte ?
answer:
Dans la majorité des cas, votre remboursement sera visible sur l’application N26 le jour même de la transaction initiale, et non le jour du remboursement. Faites défiler vers le bas votre liste de transactions ou bien téléchargez vos relevés bancaires précédents pour le trouver.Vous pouvez consulter et télécharger vos relevés de compte sur l'application mobile : depuis l'écran d'accueil, cliquez sur les 3 traits en haut à droite et sélectionnez Relevés.Vous pouvez trouver vos relevés sur votre espace personnel en ligne (app.n26.com). Sur la page Transactions, cliquez sur l’icône nuage à côté du symbole “+”. Vous verrez ensuite la section Relevés de compte.Pour la location d’une voiture, le montant bloqué en dépôt de garantie peut prendre jusqu’à 30 jours à revenir sur votre compte.
En ce qui concerne le remboursement d’un paiement par carte, ce délai est de 14 jours maximum.

question: How can I credit my salary on my N26 account?
answer: Having your salary credited to your N26 account is easy, simply provide your N26 IBAN to your employer, who’ll transfer the amount to your account via SEPA transfer.SEPA transfers are the official payment method of the SEPA area, which includes most of the European countries. In case your employer refuses to credit your salary through SEPA transfer because you have a German IBAN and not an Italian one, please check the "What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted" article on our Support Center.

question: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
answer:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:In which country(ies) are you a tax resident? 
You are normally a “tax resident” and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally “tie-breaker rules” included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities. 
What is your taxpayer identification number (“TIN”) for each country?
The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country (new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries. In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information

question: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
answer: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you. This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

question: Wie kann ich eine Lastschrift sperren?
answer: Bevor du uns das Formular für die Sperrung des Lastschrifteinzugs schickst, beachte bitte Folgendes:Gläubiger-ID und Mandatsreferenz: Du musst sowohl die Gläubiger-ID als auch die Mandatsreferenz angeben. Diese Angaben kannst du in den Transaktionsdetails der letzten Lastschrift in der App einsehen oder indem du den Händler kontaktierst (bitte beachte, dass IBAN und Händlername nicht ausreichen).Anhänge kleiner als 25 MB: Wenn du über das erforderliche Formular antwortest, achte bitte darauf, dass deine Anhänge insgesamt nicht größer als 25 MB sind.Dokumentenunterschrift: Falls möglich, wäre es am besten, wenn du das von dir an uns gesendete Formular handschriftlich unterschreibst. Wir akzeptieren allerdings auch:Elektronische Unterschrift: Diese muss mit dem Dokument übereinstimmen, das du zur Eröffnung deines N26 Kontos verwendet hast.Digitale Unterschrift: Wenn du das Dokument mit einer digitalen Unterschrift versehen hast, die von uns verifiziert werden kann, dann wird die Unterschrift als gültig angesehen. Digitale Unterschriften können über Anbieter wie "DocuSign" erstellt werden.Zu guter Letzt ist zu beachten, dass das Stornieren einer Lastschrift nur die Zahlung, nicht aber den Vertrag mit dem Händler beendet.Bitte befolge die unten beschriebenen Schritte, fülle das Formular aus und nimm über den Live-Chat oder telefonisch Kontakt mit unserem Kundenservice-Team auf:Bitte lade dieses Formular (neuen Tab) herunter und fülle es aus.Fülle das Formular aus und trage ein, was du sperren möchtest, z. B. Gläubiger-ID, Mandatsreferenz oder vollständige Sperre. Bitte achte darauf, dass du einige dieser Informationen bereits in früheren Lastschriften desselben Händlers innerhalb deiner Transaktionsliste einsehen kannst.Stelle sicher, dass eine Unterschrift dabei ist (handschriftlich, elektronisch oder digital).Anschließend musst du per Live-Chat (zur nahtlosen Verifizierung) oder telefonisch Kontakt mit unserem Kundenservice-Team aufnehmen. Dort helfen unsere Spezialisten dir dabei, den Vorgang abzuschließen. Du kannst den Vorgang beschleunigen, indem du das Formular schon vorab ausfüllst!

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of €50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional €10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least €10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: Warum wurde mir eine Glücksspielgebühr berechnet?
answer: Die Glücksspiel-Gebühr in Höhe von 3% gilt für alle Privatkunden, die sich zur Kontoeröffnung nach dem 12. März 2020 angemeldet haben oder ein Business-Konto (unabhängig vom Datum der Kontoeröffnung) besitzen.Für Kunden, die ein solches Konto besitzen, wird die Glücksspiel-Gebühr im Zusammenhang mit folgenden Glücksspielanbietern fällig:LotterienSportwettenOnline-CasinosPferderennenSonstiges GlücksspielBitte beachte, dass dies sowohl für eingehende als auch ausgehende Transaktionen mit deiner Mastercard gilt. Die Glücksspiel-Gebühr in Höhe von 3 % wird nach der Abwicklung der entsprechenden Transaktion abgebucht. Wenn du zum Beispiel gewinnst oder deine verbleibenden Chips wieder in Geld umwandelst, überweist der Händler den entsprechenden Betrag in einer anderen Transaktion, bei der die Glücksspiel-Gebühr in Höhe von 3% erneut abgebucht wird.Gut zu wissen:Die Glücksspiel-Gebühr in Höhe von 3 % erscheint auf deiner Transaktionsliste und deinem Kontoauszug und bezieht sich jeweils auf die ursprüngliche Transaktion sowie jede nachfolgende Transaktion des Glücksspielanbieters.Die von uns erhobene Gebühr bezieht sich auf Transaktionen mit deiner Mastercard, die du bei bestimmten relevanten Händlern getätigt hast (unabhängig vom Land, in dem du deinen Tippschein abgegeben hast) und kann nicht zurückerstattet werden. Für einige unserer Kunden wird die Glücksspiel-Gebühr unter Zugrundelegung des Urteils vom BGH XI ZR 26/20 nicht mehr erhoben.

question: Alcune cose da sapere sull’IBAN italiano
answer:
IMPORTANTE - Tutti i clienti che aprono un conto N26 a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 riceveranno automaticamente un IBAN italiano. I clienti che hanno aperto il conto prima di questa data e sono in possesso di un IBAN tedesco verranno contattati una volta che il servizio sarà disponibile. 
Perché non è stato offerto un IBAN italiano fin dall’inizio?Secondo la normativa UE, tutti gli Stati membri devono garantire che i titolari di conti bancari non subiscano discriminazioni per ragioni di natura geografica. Questo significa che i gestori delle utenze, oppure i datori di lavoro sono tenuti ad accettare codici IBAN di conti aperti presso banche con sede in qualunque paese membro dell’UE. Tuttavia, abbiamo ascoltato i nostri clienti e sappiamo che questo non sempre accade. Per questo motivo abbiamo deciso di offrire ai nostri clienti italiani un IBAN locale.Posso ricevere l'accredito del mio stipendio?Certo! Puoi ricevere accrediti in Euro sul tuo conto N26 fornendo l'IBAN al tuo datore di lavoro.Posso ricevere l'accredito della mia pensione o del mio sussidio?Al momento non è possibile accreditare la pensione sul conto N26 per i clienti con IBAN italiano. Aggiorneremo tutti i nostri clienti e forniremo loro tutti i dettagli in merito non appena il servizio sará disponibile. Nel caso dovessi riscontrare dei ritardi nel pagamento, contatta il nostro Supporto Clienti tramite chat.Posso ricevere addebiti diretti?Certo! Basterà fornire l'IBAN del tuo conto N26 al beneficiario.Posso impostare ordini permanenti?Certo! Puoi creare ordini permanenti tramite l'app di N26, nella sezione Bonifico bancario.Nell’effettuare un bonifico verso il mio conto N26, la banca ricevente non riconosce i dettagli bancari. Perché?Molto probabilmente la banca emittente non ha ancora integrato il nostro BIC italiano nel suo sistema. Contatta la banca in questione in modo che possa aggiornare i dati in suo possesso ed elaborare il tuo bonifico.Posso depositare contanti sul mio conto N26 con IBAN italiano?I nostri clienti residenti in Italia possono usare CASH26 per prelevare e depositare contanti tramite i negozi convenzionati. Ci saranno variazioni relativi ai costi del conto?Avere un IBAN italiano non comporterà particolari variazioni dei costi associati al conto. Puoi controllare i nostri fogli informativi qui. (nuova tabella) É vero che se apro un conto adesso, non pago il bollo?L' imposta di bollo sull’estratto conto è dovuta in caso di giacenza media superiore a 5000 € (su base annua e salvo successive modifiche di legge) in misura pari a 34,20€. L’ imposta è a carico di N26 fino al 30/06/2022. Salvo estensione della promozione, sarà a carico del cliente dopo il 30/06/2022. In tal caso l'imposta verrà addebitata sul conto del cliente tramite addebito diretto (il cliente non dovrà fornire ulteriori documenti in merito).Per maggiori informazioni, leggi l'articolo (nuova tabella) sul nostro blog.

question: Puis-je ouvrir un compte N26 si je réside hors de la zone euro ?
answer: Si vous résidez en Pologne, Suède, Suisse, Danemark, Norvège, Liechtenstein et en Islande, vous pouvez ouvrir un compte bancaire avec N26. Voici un aperçu de ce que nous offrons : Le choix entre un compte personnel ou un compte N26 Business.Un compte en €, un IBAN allemand et les virements SEPA ou Moneybeam.Un taux de change avantageux et une carte de débit Mastercard.La livraison standard gratuite de votre Mastercard ou la livraison express à 25 €.Des virements bancaires en devises étrangères avec notre partenaire Wise (uniquement avec le compte personnel).0,1% de cashback sur tous vos paiements par carte (uniquement avec le compte N26 Business).5 retraits gratuits en euros dans l’Union européenne (des frais de 1,7 % du montant retiré pour les retraits en devises autres que l’euro s’appliquent).2 sous-comptes en plus de votre compte principal, avec Espaces.Une prime de parrainage à chaque fois que l’un des amis que vous avez invité ouvre un compte N26.Les paiements sans contact et mobiles grâce à Google Pay et Apple pay.Quelques conseils concernant vos virements entrants et sortants : Nous vous recommandons de sélectionner votre devise locale au moment d’effectuer vos paiements ou retraits avec votre carte Mastercard pour bénéficier du meilleur taux de change (dans le cas contraire des frais supplémentaires pourraient vous être facturés).Pour alimenter votre compte N26 en euros en utilisant votre devise locale, nous recommandons de convertir votre devise locale en utilisant notre partenaire Wise depuis leur site web ou de faire un virement SEPA vers votre compte N26 depuis votre banque locale.Pour effectuer des virements sortants vers un compte en €, vous pouvez simplement utiliser la fonctionnalité Virement de votre application N26. Pour vos virements sortants vers un compte en devise étrangère, utilisez la fonctionnalité Wise de votre application N26 en sélectionnant la devise du compte vers lequel vous envoyez votre virement*.*Rappel: Wise est uniquement disponible pour les comptes N26 Standard. Seuls les virements SEPA en euros peuvent être effectués.

question: Comment annuler mon adhésion N26 Premium ?
answer:
Les contrats N26 Smart, N26 You et N26 Metal ont une durée initiale d’un an avec renouvellement automatique, puis sa durée devient indéterminée.Vous pouvez mettre fin à ce renouvellement automatique à tout moment pendant les 12 premiers mois de votre contrat.Après ce renouvellement, la durée du contrat devient indéterminée, ce qui signifie que vous pouvez alors résilier votre adhésion à tout moment.Dans cet article, vous trouverez la différence entre annulation, résiliation et renouvellement de votre adhésion. Vous avez 3 options :Résilier votre contrat d'adhésion dans un délai de 14 jours après la signature du contrat (c’est un délai légal, vous pouvez le demander en nous contactant).Mettre fin au renouvellement de votre adhésion à tout moment avant la fin du premier contrat de 12 mois en nous contactant sur le Livechat.Annuler votre adhésion à tout moment (vous pouvez résilier immédiatement et sans limitation en nous contactant via le Livechat).Changer pour une formule Premium inférieureSi vous le désirez, vous pouvez désormais changer de formule Premium sans avoir besoin de passer par un compte Standard. Vous pourrez donc garder vos Espaces, vos Arrondis, vos répartitions de revenus ainsi que vos cartes et paiements actuels.Pour ce faire, connectez-vous à votre application mobile, allez dans ‘Mon Compte’ et cliquez sur les détails de votre formule d’abonnement. Sélectionnez ‘Changer d’abonnement’ et vous pourrez choisir une autre formule d’abonnement qui correspond à vos besoins.Annuler l'adhésionVous pouvez annuler votre adhésion pendant la période d’annulation de 14 jours. Cette période commence dès que les premiers frais mensuels sont prélevés. Il vous suffit de nous contacter et nous vous assisterons. Si vous résiliez l’une de nos adhésions Premium, vous pourrez de nouveau passer à la même ou à une autre adhésion si vous le souhaitez à une date ultérieure.Mettre fin au renouvellement de l'adhésionVotre adhésion N26 Premium a une durée initiale de 12 mois. À la fin des 12 premiers mois, votre contrat d’adhésion se renouvelle automatiquement et sa durée devient indéterminée, sauf si vous nous contactez pour mettre fin au renouvellement.Vous pouvez en faire la demande à tout moment avant la date de renouvellement de votre contrat de 12 mois. Nous vous enverrons un email vous rappelant le renouvellement de votre adhésion 8 semaines avant la date anniversaire de votre contrat.Si vous mettez fin à votre renouvellement, vous pouvez continuer à utiliser votre N26 Mastercard et à profiter de tous les avantages de votre adhésion Premium jusqu’à son expiration. Cela signifie que vous garderez votre couverture d’assurance (pour N26 You et N26 Metal) aussi longtemps que vous serez tenu de payer vos frais d’adhésion. Ensuite, une carte virtuelle vous sera délivrée à la date anniversaire du contrat immédiatement après la rétrogradation. Le solde minimum requis est de 10 €. Vous n’avez pas besoin de nous contacter à ce sujet, cela sera traité automatiquement.Résilier l'adhésion à tout momentSi vous souhaitez résilier votre adhésion à tout moment après la période d’annulation de 14 jours, veuillez nous contacter. Si vous choisissez cette option avec N26 You ou N26 Metal, vos avantages d’assurance et vos cartes Premium N26 Smart, N26 You et N26 Metal seront également désactivées.Pour clôturer votre compte définitivement, veuillez consulter notre article Comment clôturer mon compte N26?FAQ sur la résiliation de l’adhésion N26 PremiumDois-je clôturer mon compte pour résilier mon adhésion N26 Premium ?
Non, il vous suffit de passer à une autre adhésion depuis l’application N26 et votre nouveau compte sera immédiatement créé.Qu’advient-il de mon IBAN si je résilie mon adhésion N26 Premium ?
Le passage à une autre adhésion n’affecte pas vos coordonnées bancaires. Votre IBAN reste donc inchangé.

question: How to create a Shared Space?
answer:
To create a Shared Space:Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.
Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the ‘Learn more’ information and tap the ‘Invite new member’ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you’ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‘Accept power of attorney’ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the ‘Send Invite’ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times. Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card and we’ll send it to you. If you don’t see that message, don’t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you’ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don’t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost. How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card.

question: Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?
answer: Nein, das Ablaufdatum auf deiner Karte hat eine wichtige Funktion. Du kannst deine Karte nach Ablauf des letzten Gültigkeitsmonats nicht weiter verwenden. Du erhältst eine neue Karte mit einer anderen Nummer sowie einem neuen Ablaufdatum.Meine Karte läuft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte für meine ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

question: How to use Moneybeam?
answer: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to be visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam: Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is €1000 per transaction and €5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).   To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about our friend referral program.

question: What is a N26 Business Account?
answer: N26 Business is a simple and affordable solution for all your daily financial business needs. The N26 Business account is a safe and intuitive digital business current account that you can sign up to in minutes. It is beautifully simple, transparent and free*; allowing you to receive payments from clients, send money and spend confidently while keeping your business finances completely separate from your personal ones.Our business accounts are designed for self-employed and freelancers doing business under their own name (meaning you can’t have our company name on your account or card). It is currently not possible to switch from personal to business accounts, so make sure that this account is right for you before opening.What are the benefits of a N26 Business Account?Our N26 Business account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* business account: N26 Business is free to open online with no account management fees (*after a balance of €50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card intended for business use only. The virtual card has a full PAN number and is ready to add to your Apple or Google wallets for online and in-store purchases. You can also use contactless-enabled ATMs to withdraw money with Apple or Google pay.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional €10, you can receive a physical N26 Mastercard for business use (please note, you will need to have at least €10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Maestro card: If you also need a card for private expenses then customers with DE, AT and NL T&C’s, can order a Maestro card for an additional €10.Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.What are the maximum limits for N26 Business accounts?The maximum daily payment limits for the N26 Business Mastercard (total amount within 24 hours) are: ATM withdrawals: €2,500	In-store or online payments: €5,000 The monthly limit for payments is €20,000. You can set your limits (new tab) for ATM withdrawals and payments directly in the Cards section of the app.On top of this, if you open an N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands, you can apply for a Maestro card for your personal expenses The maximum daily limits (within 24 hours) for bank transfers are: MoneyBeam to N26 customers: €1,000Instant transfers: €100,000Outgoing transfers: No limits N26 Business doesn't support transfers in foreign currencies (new tab) made from the app but directly from the Wise (new tab) website. Please note that business-to-business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:・ iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
・ Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time. Remember—you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app—you’ll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember—you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you’ll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab). To unpair your old smartphone:Go to 👤 My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to 👤 My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: Bank information—your N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‘Add Money’ button.

question: ¿Cómo funciona Google Pay?
answer: Alemania, Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, España, Estonia, Eslovaquia, Francia, Finlandia, Grecia, Italia, Irlanda, Lituania, Letonia, Los Países Bajos, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia y Suiza.Google Pay es un método de pago que te permite pagar directamente desde tu dispositivo sin necesidad de llevar la Mastercard encima todo el rato.Google Pay está disponible en todas las tiendas que acepten los pagos sin contacto (NFC), así como en las tiendas online. Mantén tu teléfono cerca del terminal y el pago se realizará automáticamente. Cuando estés pagando online, tendrás que seleccionar Google Pay como método de pago y después confirmar tu compra mediante una notificación push al hacer el check out de la compra.Aquí tienes algunos consejos a tener en cuenta:Para añadir tu tarjeta N26 Mastercard, descarga la app de Google Pay y selecciona Empezar para introducir los detalles de tu tarjeta. Necesitarás la versión de Android 5.0 (Lollipop) o en adelante, además de un smartphone con tecnología NFC.Inicia sesión en tu cuenta N26 desde la app móvil y ve a la pestaña Tarjetas > Configuración de tarjetas > Añadir a Google Pay. Serás redirigido a la aplicación Google Pay.Google Pay requiere un bloqueo de pantalla seguro. Si todavía no lo has configurado, será necesario que lo hagas antes de añadir tu Mastercard a la app de Google Pay.Si proteges tu teléfono móvil con una funda o carcasa, puede que la tengas que quitar para pagar. Algunos terminales de pago no pueden reconocer tu teléfono si este posee una funda muy grande.Si el terminal de pago te pide que pases la tarjeta (otra vez), tal vez se deba a que hayas apartado el teléfono demasiado pronto o a que no lo hayas sostenido lo bastante cerca. Simplemente inténtalo de nuevo teniendo todo esto en cuenta.

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand N26 Insurance allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the “Insurance” banner you find. You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp. How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim. Am I eligible? N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can’t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: How to get a p-account?
answer: In order to get a p-account, please fill out this p-account form (new tab) and sign it. You'll also find this link in the in-app message you received from us regarding your garnishment in Messages from N26. Please send the form back as a direct reply to that email or from your registered email address to support@n26.com (new tab).Please note:We report your p-account conversion to Schufa Holding AG.If your account has been garnished and you have an open credit or overdraft at the time of conversion to a p-account, we will have to cancel your overdraft and/ or credit.You're allowed to have only one p-account. Having multiple p-accounts (even at other banks) is a violation of the law and can lead to an extraordinary termination without notice of your N26 account.

question: How to apply for an overdraft?
answer:
Available in Germany and AustriaYou can apply for an overdraft only in the N26 mobile app. You’ll know whether you qualify in real-time with no paperwork needed. You can apply for an N26 Overdraft as follows:Login the N26 mobile app.From the Homescreen, tap on the Explore-tab.Scroll down to Financial Products.Swipe to the side and tap on N26 Overdraft and follow the steps shown in the app.There you can also change the limits of your overdraft, view the interest you’ve accumulated or cancel your overdraft at any time. We offer an 10.15% p.a. interest rate deduct the interest from your account at the end of every quarter.When you apply for N26 Overdraft, we look at information on your personal and financial situation. We then decide automatically on your eligibility for N26 Overdraft and the limit
amount we can offer you, based on a mathematical-statistical method and our risk appetite
practiced at each moment in time. In this regard:We take into account several factors and assess the personal data we have about
you to make our decision on your N26 Overdraft application, as better detailed in our
Privacy PolicyIf you want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility or on the limits for
your N26 Overdraft and want to have a human review of this automated decision,
you can get in touch with us by contacting our Customer Support team, either via live
chat through your N26 mobile app, web app or via the N26 Support Center. Kindly
note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered
to your N26 account or from your Secure Inbox in your app.If you decide to activate your N26 Overdraft, we will report this to SCHUFA.Why didn't I get an overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method in order to assess and decide if we can offer you an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time.If you followed the steps above and didn’t get an overdraft, it means we probably can’t offer you an overdraft at the moment. The latter might particularly be the case if you have an active garnishment or previously did not fulfil your financial obligations. Making your N26 account your main account (new tab) also has a positive effect on your eligibility.If you live in Germany, when deciding on your N26 Overdraft eligibility and limits we look at
your SCHUFA Score, which can be up to 3 years old. If it’s older, we will request your most
recent SCHUFA Score after you have gone through our N26 Overdraft application flow. This
might appear on your SCHUFA report, but does not affect your SCHUFA score and will only
be visible to you. In this case, you may not be offered a N26 Overdraft. If you live in Austria,
we look at your CRIF Score.If you can’t get an overdraft, you can try again at a later point in time. In any case, if you are
not eligible for a N26 Overdraft, we will notify you as soon as you become eligible. If you
want to challenge the automated decision on your eligibility, please see above how to get in
touch with us.If you have further questions, please open a live chat directly in the N26 mobile app or your
Online Banking.You can find more information in our Overdraft Terms & Conditions (new tab).Why can’t I get a higher overdraft?As mentioned above, we apply a mathematical-statistical method model in order to determine the amount limit we can offer you for an overdraft. The result is determined automatically in real-time and depends on the personal and financial information we have about you and our risk appetite at each moment in time.We will notify you as soon as we may grant you a higher limit for your N26 Overdraft. If you want to challenge the automated decision on the limit we can offer you, please see above how to get in touch with us. In this case, please reach out to us before accepting the overdraft limit we offered you.Why was my Overdraft limit reduced or cancelled?We routinely review the overdrafts we offer to ensure sustainable overdraft protection for all our customers. This change is not necessarily permanent, and you may be able to request an increase in your overdraft limit in the future. If you need further information, please reach out to our Customer Support Team.Can my overdraft limit change? / Why did my limit get reduced?We routinely review the overdraft limits we offer to ensure adequate protection for our customers. We may reduce or cancel limits if:We make a change to our credit policyYou repeatedly forget to repay your overdraft for more than 90 daysYou repeatedly repay your overdraft lateYour credit score decreases significantlyYou use your overdraft for fraudulent or illegal activityIf changes are implemented that affect you, we will naturally ensure that you are informed.What happens if I cancel my Overdraft whilst having a negative account balance?Your overdraft balance and interest becomes due immediatelyYou lose the ability to borrow money when your account balance is 0To reenable, you will have to apply for overdraft again, reactivation is not always guaranteedAfter cancellation, you will have to repay your overdraft immediately to avoid any additional fees towards N26 caused by delay in repayment. You will also start receiving reminders to top up. Can I request a limit increase?While we don’t currently offer credit limit increases, we’re working to make this possible in the future.What can I do if I can’t pay back the money before the deadline?Limit change does not affect your current outstanding balance. You can continue to pay back the outstanding balance at least once every 90 days, as long as your usage is below your maximum limit.

question: Comment commander ma carte en livraison express ?
answer: Cette option est disponible pour vous permettre de recevoir votre carte dans de brefs délais si vous en avez besoin rapidement. La livraison express est également conseillée si vous avez déjà eu des difficultés avec la livraison de votre courrier.Vous pourrez sélectionner la livraison Express lorsque vous choisirez la méthode de livraison lors de la commande de votre première carte ou lorsque vous commandez une nouvelle carte.Vous recevrez ensuite un lien de suivi par email. Si vous n’êtes pas à votre domicile lors de la livraison et si votre boîte aux lettres est hors d’accès, la carte sera déposée dans un point relais à proximité de chez vous (vous pourrez consulter son adresse depuis le lien de suivi).La carte sera conservée en point relais pour une durée limitée. Passé un certain délai, elle nous sera retournée. Dans ce cas, nous vous tiendrons informé par email. Veuillez également noter que :Votre Mastercard N26 sera livrée dans un délai de 3 jours ouvrés (ce délai dépend de l’heure à laquelle vous commandez votre carte et du temps de fabrication de celle-ci).Les livraisons DHL Express interviennent entre 8:00 et 12:00, du lundi au vendredi. Une signature sera nécessaire lors de la réception du colis à domicile.L'expédition via DHL Express est possible dans tous les pays européens où N26 est présent. En dehors de ces pays, l'expédition n'est pas encore possible.Il n'est pas possible d'annuler ou modifier la méthode de livraison express une fois celle-ci validée.Pour clôturer un compte si vous avez déjà commandé votre carte, vous devrez payer les frais de livraison express de cette dernière.Dans le cas où votre carte ne vous serait pas parvenue 3 jours ouvrés après votre commande, veuillez cliquer sur le lien de suivi pour surveiller l'expédition. Ce lien de suivi vous permet aussi de fournir des informations supplémentaires à DHL concernant votre adresse de livraison ou de modifier cette adresse dans le cas où vous ne pourriez pas être à votre domicile à l'heure prévue.Combien coûte la livraison express?1. Cartes N26 Standard, N26 Smart et N26 You :a. Première carte à l'ouverture de votre compte : 25 €b. Carte de remplacement : 30 €c. Carte supplémentaire N26 You : 30 €2. Cartes N26 Metal:a. Première carte à l'ouverture de votre compte: 25 €b. Carte de remplacement : 65 €

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Facebook ermöglicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen. Benutzerdefinierte Zielgruppen bestehen aus N26 Kunden und Internetnutzern, denen personalisierte Inhalte angezeigt werden, oder nur aus Internetnutzern, um dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von bestimmten Werbungen von uns auszuschließen. Wir möchten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen, da du bereits N26 Kunde bist. Mithilfe von Lookalike Audiences können wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, für welche die angezeigte Werbung interessanter ist als für andere Facebook Nutzer. Diese sog. „Lookalike-Audiences“ sind unseren Kunden ähnlicher als der durchschnittliche Facebook Nutzer. Um die oben beschrieben Vorteile nutzen zu können, stellen wir Facebook eine “gehashte” Version deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse zur Verfügung. Das sog. “Hashing” ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung durch die deine Email-Adresse verschlüsselt wird, sodass du anhand dieser gehashten E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kannst. Deine gehashte E-Mail-Adresse wird von Facebook dahingehend abgeglichen, ob diese auch bei Facebook hinterlegt ist. Nach dem Abgleich, unabhängig davon ob dieser erfolgreich war oder nicht, werden sämtliche gehashte E-Mail-Adressen innerhalb von 6-8 Stunden gelöscht. Facebook teilt diese Daten nicht mit Dritten oder anderen Werbetreibenden oder gewährt diesen Zugang zu deinen Daten. Diese und weitere Informationen kannst du den AGB von Facebook (neuen Tab) entnehmen. Facebook Ireland Limited übermittelt Daten an Facebook Inc., USA. Die USA ist ein Land, das im Sinne der EU-Verordnung 2016/679 („DSGVO“) keinen angemessenen Schutz personenbezogener Daten bietet; das bedeutet unter anderem, dass staatliche Stellen in den USA gegebenenfalls berechtigt sind, auf deine Daten zuzugreifen, ohne dass wirksame Rechtsbehelfe verfügbar sind.Sie können Ihre Einwilligung in diese Datenverarbeitung gemäß Art. 6 Abs. 1 Buchst. a DSGVO in der N26 Web App und der mobilen App jederzeit widerrufen. Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Google Customer MatchCustomer Match ermöglicht es uns benutzerdefinierte und Lookalike Zielgruppen zu erstellen.
