N26 Versicherung ist derzeit für Kunden in Österreich, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Deutschland erhältlich.Diese Versicherung gilt nicht für Geräte, die außerhalb Europas gekauft werden.

question: Where can I use my Maestro card?
answer: Only available for customers with our German, Austrian or Dutch terms & conditionsLet’s get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can’t be used for online purchases and it’s not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).You can't use it for Apple Pay or Google Pay.But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each ATM transaction using your Maestro is €2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals). You can order your Maestro card directly in the app.If you’re having issues using your Maestro, first check that your card settings are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and we’ll look into it for you.

question: Come prelevare e depositare contanti con CASH26
answer:
Disponibile per i conti aperti in Spagna, Germania, Austria, Italia e Grecia.L'unica cosa di cui hai bisogno è avere il tuo smartphone collegato. Apri la mappa di CASH26 nell'app e ingrandiscila per trovare il negozio più vicino. Una volta in negozio, crea un codice a barre CASH26 e mostralo alla persona alla cassa dallo schermo del tuo smartphone:Come prelevare contanti senza carta con CASH26?Vai alla alla sezione Carte della tua app N26 e seleziona CASH26 > Prelievo.Scegli l'importo che desideri prelevare (massimo 200 € a prelievo e 900 € ogni 24 ore).Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma (nuova tabella) e conferma la transazione nella notifica. Mostra il codice a barre sullo schermo del tuo smartphone. Un addetto lo scansionerà e ti consegnerà i contanti.Come depositare contanti sul mio conto N26?Vai alla sezione Carte della tua app N26 e, seleziona CASH26 > Deposito.Scegli l'importo che desideri depositare (minimo 50 €).Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma (nuova tabella) e conferma la transazione nella notifica. Mostra il codice a barre sullo schermo del tuo smartphone alla persona alla cassa in modo che possa scansionarlo e consegna i contanti. Possono volerci fino a 10 minuti prima che il deposito sia visibile nel saldo del tuo conto nell'app N26.Importante!Il codice a barre ha una durata di soli 10 minuti. Se non lo usi in tempo, scadrà e dovrai generarne uno nuovo. Se sbagli l'importo, puoi cancellarlo facendo clic sull'icona del cestino in alto a destra (o lasciarlo scadere) e generarne uno nuovo.Non è necessario fare acquisti in negozio per depositare o prelevare denaro.I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti per un massimo di 2000€ a settimana.
Leggi questo articolo (nuova tabella) per saperne di più sui dettagli e i limiti di CASH26.Domande frequenti su CASH26
Perché non trovo punti CASH26 sulla mappa?Prima di tutto, verifica di aver accettato e attivato la geolocalizzazione della tua app N26. Se non vedessi ancora punti CASH26 vicino a te sulla mappa, probabilmente significa che non ce ne sono ancora nella tua zona. Ti consigliamo di riprovare presto, in quanto lavoriamo costantemente per aggiungere nuovi punti vendita convenzionati.Posso depositare un assegno sul mio conto?No, non accettiamo assegni. Ci sono tuttavia molti altri metodi per ricaricare il tuo conto come i bonifici SEPA, l’accredito dello stipendio, le carte di debito e credito, e molto altro ancora. Dai un’occhiata a "Come ricaricare il mio conto N26 (nuova tabella)" per saperne di più.
Posso depositare o prelevare contanti in tabaccheria o al bancomat?No, non è ancora possibile depositare e prelevare contanti in tabaccheria nè negli sportelli ATM, ma puoi farlo in uno dei nostri punti vendita CASH26 che sono più di 1900 in tutta Italia.Puoi controllare il punto CASH26 più vicino a te nella sezione Carte > CASH26 della tua app.

question: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
answer:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account. Adding money with a Debit or Credit cardOpen your N26 app and tap “Add money”Select “Card transfer”Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantly You can choose to deposit between 20€ and 450€ per top-up, for a maximum of 450€ per calendar month.Adding money with a Apple or Google PayOpen your N26 app and tap “Add money”Select “Apple Pay” or “Google Pay”Choose an amount Follow the steps to confirm the paymentThe money is available on your account instantlyAccepted cards: Debit cards.Credit cards (Except America Express).Prepaid cards (only for customers with Italian Terms & Conditions).To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article (new tab).Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods (new tab) we offer.For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

question: Combien de temps prend un virement bancaire avec Wise ?
answer: Une fois le virement en devises étrangères effectué, une date d’estimation du délai de réception par son bénéficiaire est indiquée.Veuillez vous assurer d’indiquer nom du destinataire exactement de la même façon qu’il apparaît sur  son  compte bancaire.Si un virement bancaire effectué via Wise échoue, vous recevrez immédiatement une notification sur votre téléphone pour vous prévenir. Le montant du virement sera automatiquement recrédité sur votre compte N26 quelques jours plus tard.Voici les raisons possibles de l’échec d’un virement via Wise :Les coordonnées bancaires ne sont pas correctes (comme le nom ou le RIB du destinataire).Vous avez entré des caractères spéciaux dans le nom du destinataire ou le texte de description.Les plafonds de votre carte ont été atteints ou les paiements en ligne ne sont pas activés dans les paramètres de votre carteLes virements en devises étrangères ne sont pas possibles depuis un compte N26 Business, N26 Business You ou vers le compte d’une entreprise.Important : Une fois qu’un transfert est effectué, il ne peut pas être annulé depuis l’application N26. Dans quel cas puis-je annuler un transfert ou modifier les coordonnées du destinataire ? Dans ces deux cas, uniquement si Wise n’a pas encore versé le montant de votre virement au destinataire.Nous vous invitons à contacter le Service Client de Wise pour leur demander s’il est possible de faire une exception. A savoir :Ni Wise, ni N26 ne facturent de frais supplémentaires pour un virement qui a échoué.Cependant, certaines banques partenaires peuvent prélever une commission. Dans ce cas, Wise déduira directement cette commission du montant qui sera recrédité sur votre compte, comme indiqué dans nos Conditions Générales (nouvel onglet).

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then “add a new recipient), some details like the recipient’s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn’t delete your transaction history with them

question: How much does an N26 account cost?
answer: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If we’re not able to offer you an N26 account based on our minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open an N26 Flex account.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (“tapping” your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions: Go to Cards. If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you’ve chosen.

question: Pourquoi ai-je été débité deux fois ?
answer: N26 propose une expérience bancaire en temps réel. Cela signifie que vous êtes au courant de toutes les transactions sur votre compte, ce qui n'est peut-être pas le cas dans toutes les banques.Un paiement en ligne ou en magasin physique s'effectue en deux étapes :L’autorisation (ou empreinte bancaire). La somme est simplement bloquée ou réservée pour le marchand. C’est le cas pour tous vos achats, de votre café du matin à la réservation de votre chambre d’hôtel en passant par la location d’une voiture. Dans le cas d'une location, par exemple, les cautions sont également prélevées par empreinte bancaire.Le débit. Le montant est prélevé de votre compte. Cela veut dire que votre café est bien débité de votre solde tandis que votre caution pourra vous être retournée une fois la voiture de location rendue en bon état.Une fois l’autorisation confirmée, nous ne pouvons pas l’annuler ou l’inverser. À ce moment, votre autorisation peut soit être débitée, soit être rejetée, soit expirer. Dans ce dernier cas, son montant sera automatiquement crédité sur votre solde dans un délai maximum de 12 jours. Dans le cas d'une réservation de voiture de location, ce délai peut aller jusqu'à 30 jours.Notez que :Parfois, il arrive que l’autorisation et le débit s'effectuent en même temps et s'affichent sur votre relevé de compte en temps réel en raison d’un incident technique avec le terminal de paiement. Quand cela arrive, vous recevez deux notifications simultanées d'un même montant. Dans ce cas, l’autorisation devrait normalement expirer automatiquement dans le délai de 12 jours comme indiqué ci-dessus, et votre compte est recrédité automatiquement sans que vous n'ayez rien à faire. Si ce n’est pas le cas, nous vous invitons à nous contacter par Livechat pour vous aider à récupérer l'argent (nouvel onglet) auprès du marchand.Afin de vérifier votre solvabilité, des marchands comme Itunes ou Google Play Store peuvent demander une autorisation (souvent d’un euro). Ce montant sera automatiquement recrédité sur votre solde.Le montant du débit effectif peut être différent du montant de l’autorisation pour différentes raisons (nouvel onglet).

question: Comment bloquer les paiements sans contact de ma carte ?
answer: Les paiements sans contact sont très pratiques. Il se peut cependant que vous souhaitiez désactiver cette option sur votre carte pour éviter toute transaction non autorisée. Voici comment désactiver les paiements via NFC sur votre carte :Accédez à Cartes.Si vous avez plusieurs cartes, il vous suffit de balayer à droite avec votre doigt sur l’écran jusqu’à ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez.Sélectionnez Paramètres de la carte.Basculer l’option Paiements sans contact.Les changements effectués sont directement appliqués sur la carte que vous avez choisie. Veuillez garder en tête que ces paramètres se réfèrent à votre carte physique. Nous avons aussi des articles concernant la gestion des paramètres Google Pay et Apple Pay. Si vous rencontrez des difficultés pour les paiements par carte sans contact, veuillez lire l’article suivant pour savoir comment faire en sorte qu’ils fonctionnent.

question: ¿Cómo pedir una tarjeta adicional?
answer: Si, además de la tarjeta N26 que ya tienes, quieres otra tarjeta de débito N26 adicional, puedes pedirla. Consulta este otro artículo si lo que quieres es pedir una tarjeta nueva en lugar de una adicional.Cómo pedir una tarjeta adicional:Inicia sesión en tu cuenta N26;ve a la pestaña Tarjetas;selecciona Pedir una tarjeta adicional;elige el color que más te guste y el tipo de envío;confirma la solicitud.La tarjeta adicional tiene un precio de 10 € con el envío estándar y 25 € con el envío urgente. Para poder producir y enviar la tarjeta, necesitas tener un saldo mínimo de 10 € en tu cuenta. Consulta más información sobre el envío de la tarjeta.ℹ️ La tarjeta adicional está disponible para clientes de cuentas premium (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) en los siguientes países: Alemania, Francia, Italia, España, Austria, Dinamarca, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Noruega, Polonia, Suecia, Bélgica, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Letonia, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Portugal, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Países Bajos.

question: Wie verdiene ich Geld, indem ich Freunde zu N26 einlade?
answer: Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald dein Konto vollständig eröffnet ist.Um zu erfahren welchen Betrag du für die Empfehlung deines Freundes erhalten kannst, schaust du einfach in der App unter "Freunde einladen":Logge dich in die App einAuf der Startseite gehst du zu “Entdecken” (App) oder “Mein Konto” (Web-App (neuen Tab))Gehe zu “Freunde einladen”Tippe auf deinen persönlichen Empfehlungscode, um ihn zu kopieren und wähle aus auf welchem Weg du den Code teilen möchtestDu kannst bei Bedarf eine Nachricht an deinen Freund hinzufügen oder die Vorgabe nutzen Tippe auf “Senden”!Damit du den Bonus erhältst, müssen deine Freunde auch alle unsere Voraussetzungen erfüllen:Die Anmeldung über deinen Empfehlungslink oder persönlichen Code abschließen.Abschluss der ersten Transaktion mit der Mastercard in mindestens der Höhe des Bonuses der Weiterempfehlung. Die Transaktion kann ein Kauf in einem Geschäft, eine Abhebung am Geldautomaten oder eine Online-Zahlung sein (außer PayPal).Wenn deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen erfüllt haben, wird der Bonus innerhalb von 60 Tagen ausgezahlt. Du kannst den Status jederzeit in deiner mobilen App oder WebApp einsehen.Ingesamt kannst du bis zu 1500€ erhalten, wenn du Freunde einlädstFalls dein Werbebonus noch nicht ausgezahlt wurde, haben wir auch einige Gründe dafür gesammelt.*Der Link verfällt nicht und kann jederzeit verwendet werden. Persönliche Einladungscodes und Links sollten nur für persönliche und nichtkommerzielle Zwecke verwendet werden. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Einladungslink über Social Media mit persönlichen Kontakten teilen kannst, solange du der Haupteigentümer bist. N26 hat das Recht, das Empfehlungsprogramm jederzeit zu beenden.Weitere Informationen findest du in den AGB (neuen Tab) des Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms.

question: Comment activer ma carte ?
answer: Activez votre Mastercard N26 directement depuis votre application N26. Vous devrez activer votre carte, qu'il s'agisse de votre première carte N26, d'une  carte de substitution ou de la carte que vous recevez quand vous passez à un compte premium N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal.Pour activer votre nouvelle carte, utilisez l'appareil associé à votre compte N26, puis :Ouvrez l'application N26Sélectionnez la rubrique Cartes et faites défiler l'écran jusqu’à ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez activer,Appuyez sur Paramètres de la carte puis sur Activer.Saisissez les 10 numéros du token qui figurent au recto (carte Standard) ou au verso (cartes Smart, You et Metal) de votre carte N26 puis définissez votre code PIN.Si vous activez la carte sur l'Espace Client en ligne, il suffit de cliquer sur Activer la carte sur la page d'accueil.Avant de pouvoir effectuer des achats sans contact avec votre nouvelle carte, vous devrez effectuer un paiement ou un retrait en utilisant le code PIN de votre carte.Si vous avez reçu plusieurs cartes du même type (par exemple si vous avez commandé plusieurs cartes en raison d’un retard de livraison), vous ne pouvez activer que la carte commandée le plus récemment, car les cartes commandées précédemment sont automatiquement invalidées dès qu’une nouvelle carte est commandée. Ceci ne s’applique pas aux cartes supplémentaires que vous pouvez commander avec un compte premium.

question: How to report an insurance claim?
answer: Your N26 You (new tab) and N26 Metal (new tab) membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to 👤 My Account > Your membership > Allianz Insurance Coverage, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your Allianz policy numberThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

question: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
answer: To receive a transfer, you'll need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN. You can find your IBAN on your balance statements and in 👤 My Account (in the mobile app or WebApp (new tab)).The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).The IBAN is incorrect.You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10 (new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.Supported incoming transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WiseSWIFT transfersSupported outgoing transfersSEPA transfersSEPA Instant transferForeign currency transfers with WisePlease note the estimated time frames for the various transfer types.

question: Was ist eine Sicherheitsfußzeile und warum haben wir eine solche eingefügt?
answer: Eine Sicherheitsfußzeile ist eine personalisierte Nachricht, die am Ende von E-Mails und digitalen Dokumenten eingefügt wird und als Echtheitssiegel dienen soll.Durch das Hinzufügen deines vollständigen Namens am Ende jeder E-Mail möchten wir dir helfen, zwischen legitimen E-Mails von N26 und Phishing-E-Mails von Betrügern zu unterscheiden. Auch wenn eine Sicherheitsfußzeile nicht eindeutig beweisen kann, dass eine E-Mail von einer verifizierten Quelle stammt, trägt sie dazu bei, das Risiko von Deceptive Pishing – der häufigsten Art von Phishing-Angriffen – zu verringern.Was ist Deceptive Phishing?Deceptive Phishing ist der illegale Versand von generischen Phishing-E-Mails an eine große Anzahl unbekannter Personen mit dem Ziel, unter Vortäuschung falscher Angaben an vertrauliche Informationen zu gelangen.Wie wird dies erreicht? Betrüger kontaktieren ihre Zielpersonen unter dem Vorwand, für renommierte Unternehmen zu arbeiten. Den Zielpersonen wird dann mit Markenbildern, zeitkritischen Szenarien und irreführender Sprache ein falsches Gefühl der Sicherheit vorgegaukelt. Sobald sie an der Angel hängen, versuchen die Betrüger, ihre Opfer dahingehend zu manipulieren, dass sie auf ihre Forderungen eingehen.Wie kannst du dich schützen?Achte besonders auf E-Mails, die du von Banken, Kunden, Arbeitgebern usw. erhältst. Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, etwas zu unternehmen, handele nie aus einem Impuls heraus, sondern überlege immer genau, bevor du handelst. Wenn du das Gefühl hast, dass etwas nicht stimmt, solltest du dieses Gefühl Ernst nehmen. Achte auf Rechtschreib- und Grammatikfehler, fahre mit dem Mauszeiger über versteckte URLs (klicke nicht darauf), überprüfe die Absenderangaben und informiere dich genauer darüber – ein schneller Online-Check kann dir helfen, die Identität eines Absenders zu verifizieren.Wenn du eine verdächtige E-Mail, einen verdächtigen Smartphone-Anruf und/oder eine verdächtige SMS im Namen von N26 erhalten hast, leite dein Anliegen an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com weiter. Wenn du Fragen zu deinem Konto klären möchtest, kannst du über unsere mobile App mit uns chatten.Erfahre mehr über:Wie du verdächtige Phishing-Angriffe meldest (neuen Tab)Wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und verhindern kannst (neuen Tab)So schützt du dich vor Social Engineering (neuen Tab)

question: Wie kann ich meine Identität schützen?
answer: Um deine persönlichen Daten zu schützen und deren Missbrauch zu vermeiden, beachte bitte Folgendes:Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identität im Namen anderer Personen oder Unternehmen zu überprüfen. Dazu gehören Überprüfungen für Wohnungsmietverträge, Kreditvergaben oder Stellenangebote (einschließlich Stellen bei N26). Führe den Verifizierungsprozess nur durch, wenn du ein N26 Bankkonto für dich selbst eröffnen möchtest.Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du allein deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen können. Erstelle niemals ein N26 Bankkonto mit einer vordefinierten E-Mail-Adresse und einem vordefinierten Passwort. Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, können diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine persönlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. Logge dich auch nie in ein N26 Konto ein, das nicht deines ist.Sende deinen Ausweis oder Reisepass nicht an unbekannte oder nicht überprüfte Empfänger.Es kann sein, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen, wenn deine Transaktion einer Routineprüfung unterzogen wird. Sende nur gültige Unterlagen an verifizierte N26 E-Mailadressen.Wir werden dich außerhalb der N26 App niemals nach deinem Benutzernamen, Passwort oder PIN-Code fragen. Stelle diese Informationen niemals auf einer externen Website oder App zur Verfügung, auch wenn sie N26 ähnelt.Solltest du jemals Zweifel haben, eine verdächtige Anfrage von einem Dritten erhalten, oder vermuten, dass dein N26 Login missbraucht worden sein könnte, zögere bitte nicht damit, uns zu kontaktieren.

question: Posso aprire un conto se vivo al di fuori della zona euro?
answer: Se vivi in Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Liechtenstein, Svizzera o Islanda puoi aprire un conto (nuova tabella) con noi. Ti offriremo:La scelta tra un conto standard e un conto business (nuova tabella).Un conto in euro, un IBAN tedesco e la possibilità di effettuare bonifici SEPA o trasferimenti tramite MoneyBeam (nuova tabella).Un buon tasso di cambio con la tua carta di debito Mastercard.La scelta tra spedizione standard (gratuita) oppure express (nuova tabella) (per un costo di 25 €) della tua carta di debito Mastercard. Trasferimenti in valuta estera tramite Wise (per i conti standard)3 prelievi bancomat gratuiti in € all'interno dell'eurozona (1,7% di commissione sui prelievi in valuta estera)0,1% di cashback per tutti i pagamenti effettuati con carta (per i conti Business).2 Spazi (nuova tabella) (sottoconti) in aggiunta al conto principale.15 € di bonus per ogni amico che avrai invitato con successo ad N26 con il nostro programma Invita un amico (nuova tabella).Pagamenti contactless tramite Google Pay e Apple Pay.Suggerimenti per i bonifici in entrata e in uscita:Ti suggeriamo di scegliere la tua valuta locale per ottenere il miglior tasso di cambio quando userai la tua Mastercard per acquisti o per prelevare contante (diversamente, potrebbero essere applicate commissioni aggiuntive).  Per ricaricare il conto nella tua valuta, ti consigliamo di usare Wise tramite l’app, il sito di Wise oppure di convertire la valuta tramite bonifico SEPA con la tua banca.Per bonifici verso conti in euro, puoi semplicemente selezionare bonifico SEPA nell'app stessa. Per bonifici verso conti non in euro, puoi usare Wise nell’app.Nota: Wise non è disponibile per conti N26 Business (sono permessi bonifici SEPA in euro)

question: Comment modifier mon numéro de téléphone ?
answer: Pour garantir l’accès complet à votre compte N26, il est important que vos données personnelles soient actualisées, notamment votre numéro de téléphone.Voici les étapes à suivre :1. Vous rendre dans la section: 👤Mon compte > Informations personnelles > CoordonnéesImportant : Votre smartphone doit rester synchronisé (nouvel onglet), donc lié à votre compte N26, ce qui vous permettra de vous authentifier.

question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: How to block my N26 card?
answer: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to the Cards tab and select Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Wo du deine Steuernummer findest
answer:
Deine Steuernummer (TIN) ist dir zugeordnet und wird von der Steuerbehörde bei der Anmeldung in dem Land ausgestellt, in dem du als Privatperson steuerpflichtig bist.
 
Wo du deine TIN findest, kann sich je nach Land unterscheiden, in dem du steuerlich berechtigt bist. Bitte beachte, dass sich der Begriff für die TIN in jedem Land unterscheiden kann. Wenn du etwa aus Großbritannien stammst, kannst du dir deine TIN-Nummer wie deine National Insurance Number (NIN) vorstellen., wenn du in der Bundesrepublik Deutschland wohnst:Wenn du in Deutschland wohnst und dich bei deiner Gemeinde angemeldet hast, erhältst du eine 11-stellige TIN oder Steueridentifikationsnummer. Verwechsle sie bitte nicht mit deiner 9-stelligen Steuernummer.
 
Eine TIN wird nicht in offiziellen Ausweisdokumenten angegeben, aber deine TIN kannst an in den folgenden Stellen finden:Im Brief, den du vom Bundeszentralamt für Steuern (BZSt) erhalten hast, mit dem deine TIN oder Id-Nr (Mitteilungsschreiben über die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer) ausgestellt wurde.EinkommensteuerbescheidLohnsteuerbescheinigungWeitere Informationen darüber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erfährst du hier (neuen Tab)., wenn du in Frankreich wohnst:Wenn du in Frankreich ansässig bist und dort eine Steuererklärung abgeben musst, weisen dir die französischen Steuerbehörden eine 13-stellige TIN oder SPI (Simplification des Procédures d'Imposition) zu, sobald du dich in der Datenbank der Steuerbehörde registriert hast. Diese Kennungen beginnen mit 0, 1, 2 oder 3.
 
Deine TIN ist an den folgenden Stellen zu finden:Auf deiner vorgedruckten EinkommensteuererklärungAußerdem kannst du sie in deinen Steuer- und Grundsteuerbescheinigungen einsehen.Weitere Informationen darüber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erfährst du hier (neuen Tab)., wenn du in Italien wohnst:Wenn du in Italien ansässig bist, ist eine TIN oder Steuernummer (aus 16 Zeichen bestehend) nur gültig, wenn du im italienischen Steuerregister eingetragen bist, das von der italienischen Finanzbehörde (Agenzia delle Entrate) verwaltet wird. Wenn du keine TIN besitzt, solltest du einen Antrag bei einem Amt der italienischen Finanzbehörde stellen.
 
Eine TIN wird nicht in offiziellen Ausweisdokumenten angegeben, aber deine TIN kannst an in den folgenden Stellen finden:Deine TIN findest du auf deiner persönlichen Krankenversicherungskarte (Steuer-ID-Nummer, Tessera sanitaria/Codice Fiscale).Deine TIN kannst du auch auf deiner TIN-Karte finden.Weitere Informationen darüber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erfährst du hier (neuen Tab)., wenn du in Spanien wohnst:Wenn du in Spanien ansässig bist, ist deine TIN für steuer- und zollrechtliche Zwecke gedacht. Deine spanische TIN besteht aus neun Zeichen (wobei das letzte Zeichen ein Prüfbuchstabe ist). Die TINs werden vom Ministerium des Innern ausgestellt und können abweichen, je nachdem, ob du eine natürliche Person mit spanischer Staatsangehörigkeit bist oder nicht.
 
Deine TIN kannst du je nach persönlicher Situation an den folgenden Stellen finden:PersonalausweisElektronischer PersonalausweisAufenthaltskarte für AusländerNeuer Führerschein (seit 2004)SteuerkarteSozialversicherungskarteWeitere Informationen darüber, wie du deine TIN findest oder ob du eine anfordern musst, erfährst du hier (neuen Tab).Wichtige Informationen:Das Format für die Steuernummer, das du in deiner N26 App vorfindest, hängt vom Land deines Aufenthalts ab. Wenn du also in Deutschland wohnst, musst du deine deutsche TIN eingeben.Die von dir für dein Konto gespeicherten Steuerdaten kannst du überprüfen, indem du auf:Mein Konto > Persönliche Details > Steuerinformationen.Wenn du das Land eingetragen hast, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist, aber nicht deine Steuernummer, lösche bitte das Land aus der Liste, gehe wieder in das Land ein und gib deine Steuernummer erneut ein.Mehr Informationen darüber, was wir mit deinen Steuerinformationen unternehmen, findest du hier (neuen Tab).

question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte étranger ouvert, utilisé ou fermé).Complete the Cerfa n° 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: Pagamenti anticipati per i conti N26 Premium
answer: Il tuo contratto di sottoscrizione è valido per un anno, dopodiché si rinnoverà automaticamente a tempo indeterminato fino a quando non lo annullerai. Quest'operazione può essere effettuata in qualsiasi momento (vedi sotto). Ti avviseremo 2 mesi prima del rinnovo automatico del tuo contratto.Quali sono i metodi di pagamento disponibili?Puoi scegliere se pagare la tua sottoscrizione annuale su base mensile o se ricevere uno sconto sul costo totale pagando anticipatamente, per esempio in un’unica soluzione o ogni 6 mesi. La tua scelta non influisce sul periodo di durata del tuo contratto.Se scegli di pagare in anticipo i primi 6 mesi della tua sottoscrizione, dovrai effettuare un primo pagamento all’inizio del periodo di validità del tuo contratto e un secondo pagamento 6 mesi dopo, all’inizio della seconda metà del tuo contratto annuale.Come e quando posso effettuare il pagamento?La tua sottoscrizione verrà attivata soltanto dopo che avrai effettuato il pagamento del tuo primo canone. Potrai pagare con una carta di debito o di credito, Apple Pay o Google Wallet: in questo modo potrai accedere a tutti i vantaggi del tuo conto premium subito dopo aver verificato la tua identità. In alternativa, puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto e procederemo a detrarre l’importo dovuto.Se non dovessimo ricevere il primo pagamento del tuo canone (su base mensile, semestrale o annuale) entro 15 giorni dalla verifica della tua identità, detrarremo automaticamente l’importo corrispondente dal tuo conto N26 per darti accesso ai tuoi vantaggi premium. In seguito, il canone verrà automaticamente detratto dal tuo conto N26 in base al metodo di pagamento che hai selezionato.Come posso cancellare la mia sottoscrizione a N26?Sospendi il rinnovo automatico: puoi interrompere il rinnovo automatico della tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento prima del termine dei 12 mesi di contratto, ti basterà contattarci in chat. Se decidi di sospendere il rinnovo automatico, potrai continuare a utilizzare la tua Mastercard N26 e tutti i vantaggi del tuo conto premium fino alla data di scadenza del contratto. Questo significa che potrai usufruire della copertura assicurativa (per i conti N26 You e N26 Metal) finché pagherai il canone del tuo conto N26.Cancellazione immediata: puoi annullare la tua sottoscrizione ad effetto immediato in qualsiasi momento, ti basterà contattarci. Scegliendo quest'opzione, la tua Mastercard N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal verrà disattivata, riceverai una carta virtuale e passerai a un conto N26 Standard. Se hai un conto N26 You o N26 Metal e scegli quest'opzione, anche la tua copertura assicurativa verrà immediatamente sospesa.Revoca: puoi cancellare la tua sottoscrizione durante il periodo di prova di 14 giorni, che inizia nel momento in cui ti viene addebitato il primo canone mensile. Cancellando la sottoscrizione passerai a un conto N26 Standard, la tua Mastercard N26 verrà disattivata e ne riceverai una virtuale.Posso ricevere un rimborso?Se scegli di cancellare la tua sottoscrizione utilizzando la chat del Supporto Clienti entro il periodo di 14 giorni in cui si applica il diritto di ripensamento, rimborseremo completamente il tuo pagamento.Se scegli di cancellare la tua sottoscrizione dopo il periodo di recesso di 14 giorni attraverso il recesso ordinario, rimborseremo solamente i mesi che hai  pagato in anticipo e di cui non hai usufruito.Nel caso in cui al tuo pagamento anticipato fosse applicato uno sconto, ti rimborseremo i mesi rimanenti applicando il prezzo ordinario della sottoscrizione e senza tenere in considerazione lo sconto. Il tuo diritto a usufruire dello sconto matura soltanto se mantieni la tua sottoscrizione per tutto il periodo coperto dal pagamento anticipato.

question: Was kann ich tun, wenn meine IBAN nicht akzeptiert wird?
answer: Deine IBAN enthält die DE-Länderkennzahl, eine zweistellige Prüfnummer, die achtstellige Bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige Kontonummer. Zum Beispiel: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Die teilnehmenden Länder des SEPA-Raums (Single Euro Payments Area) haben sich auf das IBAN-System geeinigt, um nationale und internationale Zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das Fehlerrisiko bei der Kommunikation und Abwicklung von Transaktionen zu reduzieren.Händler oder Arbeitgeber, die IBANs aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten des Europäischen Wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, verstoßen ab 1. Februar 2016 gegen europäisches Recht (Artikel 9 der Verordnung Nr. 260/2012 (neuen Tab)).Wenn du jemals von einer IBAN-Diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deine zuständige nationale Behörde (neuen Tab) und informiere diese über den Vorfall. Gib deine Kontaktdaten sowie den Namen des Händlers oder Unternehmens an, der deine IBAN nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze Beschreibung des Vorfalls bei (einschließlich eines Screenshot der Ablehnung oder einen anderen Kommunikationsbeleg).

question: Come posso richiedere la giacenza media?
answer:
Nelle prime settimane di Gennaio 2022, riceverai la tua giacenza media per l’anno 2021 nei tuoi Messaggi (nuova tabella), senza bisogno di richiederla personalmente. Stessa cosa per la giacenza media degli anni 2020 e 2019.Se avessi bisogno della giacenza media del tuo conto per gli anni precedenti al 2019, ti invitiamo a contattare il nostro Servizio Clienti in chat.A cosa serve?La giacenza media serve per compilare il modello ISEE, per dichiarare al fisco il tuo conto N26 con IBAN tedesco qualora questa sia superiore ai 5.000€, per dimostrare a qualcuno che sei solvibile o per accedere a programmi o benefici speciali concessi dallo Stato sulla base della tua situazione economica.Il modello ISEE puó essere richiesto tramite la compilazione della Dichiarazione Sostitutiva Unica, fondamentale per accedere a molte agevolazioni previste dallo Stato per il sostegno al reddito. Il valore della giacenza media, che sarà autocertificato dal titolare del conto senza bisogno di una documentazione cartacea, andrà inserito nel Quadro FC.2 del modello ISEE, denominato “depositi e conti correnti bancari e postali”. In questo spazio dovrà essere indicato il tipo di rapporto finanziario posseduto e l’ammontare del saldo contabile attivo sul conto corrente.Come si calcola?La giacenza media annuale è l'importo che si ottiene dividendo la somma dei saldi giornalieri del conto corrente per 365, indipendentemente dall'effettiva durata dell'anno solare (come negli anni bisestili) e indipendentemente dal numero di giorni in cui il conto è stato attivo o ha avuto un saldo positivo, come definito dall'Agenzia delle Entrate (nuova tabella) e nelle istruzioni (nuova tabella) alla compilazione della Dichiarazione Unica Sostitutiva 2020 del Ministero del Lavoro e delle Politiche Sociali.
Domande frequenti sul tema Giacenza mediaSe possiedo un conto con IBAN tedesco e la mia giacenza media è oltre i 5000€ , devo dichiararlo al fisco?Sì, dovrai compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi e versare l’Ivafe, un’imposta di importo fisso pari a €34,20. Clicca qui (nuova tabella) per maggiori informazioni in merito.Vorrei ricevere un documento PDF con il valore della mia giacenza media. E’ possibile?Ti ricordiamo che non sono in vigore disposizioni di legge che impongano alle banche di fornire questo genere di attestazioni. Abbiamo deciso di inviare la giacenza media come messaggio privato, in modo da rendere questo dato facilmente accessibile e scaricabile da tutti i clienti. Il tuo estratto conto tuttavia è sufficiente come prova ufficiale in caso di esplicita richiesta da parte delle Autorità, pertanto non siamo in grado di fornire alcun modulo firmato dalla banca in formato PDF o simili.

question: How to split shared expenses with MoneyBeam?
answer:
Eligibility: Available for EU Standard and Premium customers iOS. Android to be available in the coming weeks.Split the billWith our latest “Split the bill” feature, you can easily split shared expenses amongst friends and family using your N26 app. From splitting the bill at a restaurant to chipping in for a birthday gift, you can use it for any kind of purchase where you’re sharing the cost with others. You can even split the cost for home expenses, such as a utility bill or items for your home.For any card transaction you make, you have the option to split the bill evenly or enter custom amounts for each person who is contributing to the group purchase. You can split expenses with anyone, whether or not they are N26 customers.How to split the bill?You must use your N26 card to first make the purchase, then when you are ready to split the bill, follow the below steps:Following your purchase, open your N26 appFind the transaction on ‘Home’ tab, tap it and choose ‘Split the bill’Add the people you are splitting the cost with (for non-N26 customers, you’ll need to include their name)Once ready, tap the green button at the bottom of the screen to confirm the split amounts
Non-N26 customers will receive a message with your details and the amount you're requestingFinally tap ‘Confirm’ to send out the remaining requests to fellow N26 customers who will receive a request via MoneyBeamImportant:Requests to N26 customers: This will work just like a normal MoneyBeam request.Requests to non-N26 customers: You will receive a standard template with your IBAN details which you can edit. This can then be sent via any other messaging platform on your device (e.g. email, WhatsApp, Signal, etc.). Please note, these requests can’t be tracked in the app.View amount left to be paid: N26 customers and yourself will be able to see the total amount to split and how much of the total bill is left to be paid. If the total purchase amount does not equal the amount split, then you will see a warning message (but still have the option to continue anyway).Maximum of 20 open MoneyBeam requests: You can have up to 20 open MoneyBeam requests at any one time, and a maximum of 3 open requests with a single contact. If your limit has been reached, you will see a message explaining this.

question: Can N26 close my account?
answer:
In short: yes.As a fully licensed bank, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in N26 accounts are kept safe and secure.On occasion, the results of these routine checks may require us to terminate our business relationship with an account holder. Whenever this may be the case, the owner of the account will be fully informed of the situation via email. In every situation, N26 will contact you only at the email address associated with your N26 account. Clear instructions will be provided in this email on the next steps you should take. Always be vigilant and verify that such emails come from N26. We will only even contact you at the email address associated with your N26 account and never via SMS or phone, and we will never ask for your N26 account details, password or card details. 
How can N26 close my account?We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can’t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You’re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our T&Cs (new tab) or § 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These can include but are not limited to:Using a personal account for business purposes. According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you’d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We’re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don’t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don’t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our T&Cs (new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These can include but are not limited to:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's (new tab)).

question: Welcher Wechselkurs gilt für mich?
answer:
Wenn du mit deiner N26 Karte Einkäufe in anderen Währung machst, gelten für den ausgegebenen Betrag die Wechselkurse von Mastercard.Die gute Nachricht: N26 erhebt keine eigene Gebühren für Auslandszahlungen.Die Wechselkurse von Mastercard kannst hier einsehen: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (neuen Tab)
Du kannst auch den Wechselkurs, der für eine zurückliegende Transaktion galt, in der Umsatzanzeige deiner N26 App oder deinem Online Banking nachsehen. 
Bitte beachte, dass Wechselkurse Schwankungen unterliegen, sodass der tatsächlich abgebuchte Betrag von dem ursprünglich angezeigten Betrag abweichen kann.

question: Perché mi è stato addebitato più di quanto mi aspettassi?
answer: Tutte le transazioni avvengono in tempo reale. Ti avvertiremo tramite notifica push quando una qualsiasi transazione in entrata o in uscita avviene.A volte una transazione può sembrare sospetta perché l’importo finale addebitato può essere diverso dall’importo originale della transazione per alcuni motivi:L’esercente blocca un importo più elevato come deposito (es. alla stazione di benzina, per un noleggio auto o una prenotazione alberghiera), e la differenza viene accreditata sul tuo conto non appena il deposito non sarà più necessario.Le variazioni dei tassi di cambio possono comportare lievi differenze nel totale delle operazioni effettuate in valuta estera.In entrambi i casi, non applichiamo interessi per la differenza negli importi.Ma se sei sicuro di non aver autorizzato una transazione, potremmo aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi.

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier. You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: Expiration et remplacement des cartes : FAQ
answer: Si votre Mastercard N26 a expiré ou arrive à expiration, vous trouverez dans cet article toutes les informations sur la commande d’une nouvelle carte, les coûts associés et les délais de livraison. Avant de commander une nouvelle carte, nous vous recommandons de vérifier que vos données personnelles sont correctes et à jour. Ma carte arrive à expiration, que dois-je faire ?Si votre carte arrive à expiration, veuillez vous connecter à votre compte N26 dans l’application N26, allez dans la rubrique Cartes et cherchez une bannière sous la carte correspondante. Suivez les étapes pour confirmer l’adresse où vous souhaitez recevoir votre carte de remplacement et nous vous l’enverrons. Ne vous inquiétez pas si ce message ne s’affiche pas. C’est probablement parce que votre carte est encore valable pendant un certain temps. Le moment venu, vous aurez la possibilité de confirmer votre adresse.Une fois votre carte reçue, vous devrez l’activer avant de pouvoir l’utiliser. N’oubliez pas de détruire votre ancienne carte et de la jeter conformément aux directives locales en matière de recyclage.Remarque : une fois que vous aurez reçu et activé votre nouvelle Mastercard, n’oubliez pas de mettre à jour vos informations de paiement pour tous vos abonnements et virements permanents. Ainsi, vos paiements futurs ne seront pas rejetés.Puis-je continuer à utiliser ma carte après son expiration ?Non, la date d’expiration figurant sur votre carte remplit une fonction importante et vous ne pourrez plus l’utiliser après le mois d’expiration. Vous recevrez une nouvelle carte avec un numéro différent, ainsi qu’une nouvelle date d’expiration.Combien coûte le remplacement de ma carte arrivant à expiration ou périmée ?Les cartes de remplacement sont gratuites pour tous les clients N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal.Si vous avez ouvert votre compte avant les dates suivantes, la nouvelle carte et la livraison sont gratuites dans les pays où les services proposés par N26 sont disponibles (nouvel onglet) :16.02.2021 (clients domiciliés dans la Grande Europe)25.02.2021 (clients domiciliés en Italie ou en Espagne)11.03.2021 (clients domiciliés en France)18.03.2021 (clients domiciliés en Allemagne, en Autriche ou en Suisse)Si votre compte a été créé après cette date, votre carte de remplacement coûtera le même prix qu’une nouvelle carte.Si vous résidez dans un pays non supporté par N26, veuillez contacter notre Service Client via le Livechat ou par téléphone afin que nous puissions passer la commande pour vous. La livraison en dehors de ces pays (nouvel onglet) peut entraîner des frais supplémentaires. Combien de temps cela prendra-t-il ?Toutes les cartes de remplacement sont expédiées par livraison standard. Cette livraison est gratuite et peut prendre jusqu’à 15 jours ouvrés. Dans les zones rurales ou difficiles d’accès, cela peut prendre plus de temps. Pour suivre l’avancée de l’expédition, il vous suffit d’accéder à l’écran d’accueil de votre application mobile N26.Ma carte est déjà périmée mais je n’ai jamais reçu de carte de remplacementPas de problème, nous sommes là pour vous aider ! Si vous avez déjà confirmé votre adresse et que plus de 20 jours se sont écoulés, veuillez contacter le Service Client. Pour ce faire, consultez la rubrique Aide de l’application. Si vous n’avez pas encore confirmé votre adresse, connectez-vous à votre compte N26 dans l’application et cherchez une bannière sous votre carte expirée. Suivez les étapes pour confirmer l’adresse où vous souhaitez recevoir votre carte de remplacement.

question: ¿Cómo activar la tarjeta?
answer: Una vez recibes la tarjeta, lo siguiente que tienes que hacer antes de poder empezar a usarla, es activarla. La tarjeta se activa en 2 pasos muy sencillos, pero primero tienes que haber vinculado tu móvil a tu cuenta (pestaña nueva).Para activar tu tarjeta en la app N26, desde la pantalla de Inicio:Ve a la pestaña Tarjetas.Desliza hasta que veas la tarjeta que quieres activar.Selecciona Ajustes de las tarjetas y pulsa Activar (para activarla desde la WebApp (pestaña nueva), selecciona Activar tarjeta en la pantalla de Inicio).Cuando hayas terminado de activarla en la app, el último paso es hacer una retirada de efectivo en un cajero automático*.vale cualquier cajero, siempre y cuando esté en el mismo país donde se envió tu tarjeta;los pagos contactless (pestaña nueva) no se activarán hasta que introduzcas la tarjeta para que el cajero lea el chip y teclees tu código PIN correctamente.Deberás volver a seguir estos pasos cada vez que pidas una nueva tarjeta, ya sea por pérdida, deterioro, robo, o si te pasas a N26 Smart (pestaña nueva), You (pestaña nueva) o Metal (pestaña nueva).Si tienes varias tarjetas del mismo tipo (por ejemplo, porque el envío se retrasara y acabaras pidiendo más de una), solo podrás activar tu tarjeta más reciente, ya que las tarjetas anteriores se desactivan al pedir una nueva. Esto no aplica a las tarjetas adicionales (pestaña nueva) disponibles con los planes premium.

question: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
answer: Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You’re probably familiar with using only  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you’ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.Go here for more information on Two-Factor AuthenticationHow can I login with Two-factor Authentication? When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you’ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.What are the requirements I need to be aware of?  First, you’ll need to update your phone’s operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you’re unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don’t have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we’ll be glad to help you out.What if I can’t remember my password?Read more in our article on how to create a password.What if my phone is lost or broken?If you’ve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you’ll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:Login to the WebappWhen prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select HelpChoose Send SMS CodeOnce you receive the SMS code, input it into the WebappAs you've just confirmed the authentication code you’ve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.What if I have a new phone number, or can’t receive SMS for other reasons?If you don’t have access to your registered phone number – either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen – please contact our customer service via live chat and we’ll be glad to help you out.Why can’t I download the latest app version on my device?If you have an older smartphone that doesn’t support the latest app version, you won’t be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we’ll send to your account's registered phone number.You’ll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.Why is Two-factor Authentication being introduced?Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

question: How to request a refund for a direct debit?
answer: Refunding a direct debit does not cancel the contract you have with the merchant.You have the ability to request a SEPA direct debit refund in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. The direct debit will be credited to your account within 2 banking days.Requesting a direct debit refund in my main account:Login to the N26 mobile appOpen your transaction list and select the direct debit in questionChoose RefundRequesting direct debit refund in my IBAN Space (subaccount):You can also request a direct debit refund in your IBAN-assigned Spaces:Login to the N26 mobile appTap on SpacesGo to the Space you wish to refund a direct debitSelect the direct debit transaction in questionChoose Refund*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. This applies to the following countries: Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Hungary, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Romania, Sweden, Switzerland

question: Was ist ein verdächtiger Loginversuch?
answer: Warum habe ich diese E-Mail erhalten?Sicherheit hat für uns oberste Priorität. Wenn unser System einen ungewöhnlichen Anmeldeversuch erkennt, benachrichtigen wir dich sofort, sodass du Maßnahmen zur Sicherung deines Kontos ergreifen kannst. Wenn du eine Meldung erhalten hast und du denkst, dass jemand anderes versucht hat, sich in dein Konto einzuloggen, ist ein schnelles Zurücksetzen deines Passworts erforderlich. Dennoch weisen wir darauf hin, dass unser System lieber Vorsicht als Nachsicht walten lässt. Wenn du den in der Meldung angezeigten Anmeldeversuch erkennst, kannst du unsere Nachricht also einfach ignorieren.Wie setze ich mein Passwort zurück?Du kannst dein Passwort zurücksetzen, indem du dich über deine App oder einen Internetbrowser in dein Konto einloggst. Gehe zu Mein Konto → Einstellungen → Sicherheit.Wenn du nicht auf dein Konto zugreifen kannst, klicke auf dem Anmeldebildschirm auf Passwort vergessen. Anschließend musst du nur deine E-Mail-Adresse eingeben und einen Link zum Zurücksetzen des Passworts anfordern.Bei der Erstellung deines neuen Passworts bitten wir dich darauf zu achten, dass du es nicht schon bei anderen Plattformen verwendest. Bitte stelle sicher, dass du ein einzigartiges Passwort verwendest. Die mehrfache Verwendung derselben Passwörter ist die Hauptursache für ein kompromittiertes Konto.Wann sollte ich den Kundenservice kontaktieren?Nachdem du eine E-Mail über eine ungewöhnliche Anmeldung erhalten hast, hast du vielleicht Sorgen um die Sicherheit deines Kontos. Wir möchten dir jedoch versichern, dass die Änderung deines Passworts ausreicht, um den Schutz deines Kontos zu gewährleisten. Wenn du das Thema mit jemandem besprechen möchtest, steht dir unser Kundenserviceteam gerne zur Verfügung.

question: Warum zahle ich Kirchensteuer?
answer: Wir sind gesetzlich verpflichtet, Daten über kirchensteuerliche Abzüge anzufordern und diese gegebenenfalls vorzunehmen. Dies wird jedes Jahr vom 1. September bis zum 31. Oktober durchgeführt.Du hast das Recht, gegen die Weitergabe von Informationen über deine Religionszugehörigkeit durch das Formular „Erklärung zum Sperrvermerk“ (neuen Tab) Berufung einzulegen. Du kannst dies vor dem 30. Juni eines jeden Jahres tun. Wenn du Widerspruch einlegst, wird dein Finanzamt dich auffordern, eine Kirchensteuererklärung abzugeben.Weitere Informationen findest du auf der Website des Bundeszentralamtes für Steuern (neuen Tab).

question: Have you been victim of a fraud? Contact us.
answer:
Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please help us save you time and contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you’re an N26 customer and have an authorized or unauthorized card transaction which you want to dispute, please use our dedicated and complete service in the N26 mobile app. The hotline above exclusively helps in case of transfers to a suspicious account with an N26 IBAN.Did you get a SMS followed by a suspicious link?If so, DO NOT click on it! This is a phishing attempt. This is how the fraud works:You receive an SMS with spooky tones that invites you to open a link.The link has a different URL than our official one (new tab) The page obtained by opening the link mimics the graphics used by N26, the sharing of some personal data is requested, such as the email password, N26 password, card number, CVC, PIN codes, codes arrived via SMS , and so on. Never provide this data outside the N26 app or web app!After the SMS, an individual who claims to be an N26 agent might call you and try to convince you to carry out some suspicious operations, such as providing additional account data or authorizing unsolicited transactions via N26 App. Remember: never confirm a payment on N26 App if you do not recognize the beneficiary or the merchant!What to do if I clicked on a suspicious link?In this case you should, immediately change your login password.You can do this by going to the App> My Account> Settings >Security> Change Login Password. Or, during the login, you can click on Forgot? We will send you an email outlining the next steps.If you have shared any personal data via a phishing site, contact us via live chat from our app. Our agents will assist you in ensuring your account remains protected. Also,  send a screenshot of the SMS to support@n26.comIn the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab).I’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you’ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‘Cards’ tab. You can mark the reason as “lost” or “stolen” based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you’ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).How can I protect my account from fraud? Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behaviour.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.Useful links:What is phishing?What to do if my account may be compromised?

question: How to revoke my loan application?
answer: N26 Credit revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.We’ll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so it’s best to chat with us about this. We’ll take it from there and let you know via email when it’s done.Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

question: Dove trovo il mio IBAN o il numero di conto?
answer: Puoi visualizzare l’IBAN e il nostro numero BIC sul tuo estratto conto. In alternativa, li troverai nella sezione 👤 Il mio conto dell'app mobile o WebApp (nuova tabella).Puoi condividere facilmente questi due dati tramite il tasto Condividi. Se necessario, puoi scaricare le informazioni relative al tuo conto bancario in formato PDF accedendo alla WebApp (nuova tabella) e selezionando l’icona a forma di nuvola nell’angolo in alto a destra.I nostri IBAN italiani sono costituiti da 27 caratteri: iniziano con IT (codice Paese), poi seguono il codice di controllo di regolarità, il CIN, l'ABI e il CAB. Le ultime 12 cifre corrispondono al numero del conto.I nostri IBAN tedeschi sono composti da 22 caratteri e iniziano con DE seguito dal codice di controllo di regolarità, poi dal nostro codice banca 10011001 e terminano con il tuo numero di conto a 10 cifre (inizia dal 26).Preferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial (nuova tabella)sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube (nuova tabella).

question: How to use Apple Pay?
answer:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don’t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.We’ve made a video (new tab) to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If you’ve lost your iPhone and aren’t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won’t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you’re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you’re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

question: What is a suspicious login attempt?
answer: Why did I receive this email?At N26, security is our top priority. When our system detects an unusual login attempt, we alert you immediately so that steps can be taken to secure your account. If you’ve received an alert and you believe someone else may have attempted to log into your account, a quick reset of your password is all that’s needed. If you recognise the login attempt shown in the alert, you can simply ignore it.How do I reset my password?You can reset your password by logging into your account via your app or web browser, navigating to My Account → Settings → Security. If you cannot access your account, click Forgot Password on the login screen. From there, all you have to do is enter your email address and request a password reset link.When choosing a new password, we remind you not to reuse passwords across multiple platforms; please ensure you utilise a unique password for each of your accounts. Password reuse is a primary reason behind an account compromise.When should I contact Customer Support?After receiving an email about an unusual login, you may be concerned about the security of your account. We would like to reassure you, however, that changing your password is a sufficient measure which will ensure your account remains protected. If you’d like to discuss this topic with someone in the know, our Customer Support team is there for you.

question: Why was I charged more than expected?
answer: All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.In both cases, we don’t charge interest for the difference in amounts.But if you’re certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help get your money back.

question: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
answer: Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gemäß FATCA verpflichtet, dem “Internal Revenue Service” (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen geführt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische Staatsangehörige ausländische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden. Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier. (neuen Tab)Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer Staatsangehöriger unter anderem so definiert:Staatsangehöriger der USA (auch bei doppelter Staatsangehörigkeit)Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer gültigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den “Substantial Presence Test” erfüllt (siehe unten).Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer Staatsangehöriger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.“Substantial Presence Test” bedeutet:Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.ODERDu warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.Darüber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enthält:US-amerikanische Staatsangehörigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USAGeburtsort in den USAPostanschrift oder Postfach in den USAUS-amerikanische RufnummerDaueraufträge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wirdFür den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US Staatsangehörigen anzusehen:Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine ähnliche Eigenerklärung undeinen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine Staatsangehörigkeit oder Nationalität eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der Bestätigung über den Verlust deiner Staatsbürgerschaft.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive. Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What’s a “banking day”?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn’t arrived — where is it?So what if you’ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn’t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can’t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: Why do I need to update my personal information?
answer: Starting from mid-August 2022, we will contact our customers residing in Italy and holders of an N26 account with Italian Iban, with the aim of verifying and keeping their personal information up to date.As a bank, we are required by law to keep our customers' personal information correct and up-to-date, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing.This process involves the periodic verification and updating of personal data and the compilation of a due diligence questionnaire, which includes additional financial information about our customers.What information do I need to update?When you receive our communication regarding this, by logging in to your N26 app, you will be immediately directed to the process of updating your personal information.Before proceeding, make sure you have updated the app to the latest version available. The operation can only be done through the app associated with your smartphone (it will not be displayed when you log in from the WebApp).First of all, you will be asked to verify and confirm your personal data:Name and surnamePlace and date of birthNationalityGenderTax informationIn the next step, you will then need to validate your legal address and your shipping address, if different.As a last step, you will be asked to fill in the due diligence questionnaire, in order to ensure the integration and updating of relevant information required by banking legislation. This is a quick procedure, the operation will only take you a few minutes.Remember, the update and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Please note that, in accordance with the legislation in force, the updating of your data and the questionnaire must be completed even if your information has remained unchanged.Furthermore, the processing of your data is subject to the European regulation on data protection and privacy (GDPR). You can find more information on our privacy policy (new tab).What is the due diligence questionnaire?The anti-money laundering legislation referred to in Legislative Decree 231/2007 requires the bank to regularly collect updated information on its customers, with the aim of preventing the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and terrorist financing. and as a condition for maintaining relationships and transactions between customers and the bank.For this reason, we will submit a short questionnaire, within your N26 app, where we will ask you to answer a series of questions regarding your net worth, your current employment, the origin of the funds in your account and the use you make of your N26 account.We will check the data you have entered and, if necessary, we will contact you at a later time. For this, please make sure you have your app updated to the latest version available and always monitor incoming communications in the "Messages from N26" from the "Support" section of your app.What happens if I don't complete the procedure as required?We suggest you to complete the transaction as soon as possible, so that you can continue to have full access to all the features of your N26 account.In the event that the information is not updated within a reasonable period, N26 will be obliged to refrain from continuing the contractual relationship with the customer (Article 42 of Legislative Decree 231/2007).After the first 30 days, you will still be able to complete the questionnaire, but we will be forced to temporarily limit certain features of your account (e.g. incoming payments, such as salary) until you have met this regulatory requirement.

question: Qu’est-ce qu’une carte virtuelle ?
answer: Si vous ouvrez un compte N26 Standard, vous recevrez une carte virtuelle gratuitement (à condition de disposer d’un solde minimum de 10 € pour activer la carte). La carte virtuelle est idéale pour effectuer des paiements en ligne ou lorsque vous devez partager votre numéro de carte sur des sites web ou sur des applications. Elle vous permet également de gérer séparément certaines dépenses comme vos abonnements ou vos prélèvements automatiques.Les clients N26 Smart, N26 You et N26 Metal ont la possibilité de commander une carte virtuelle sans frais en plus de la carte physique gratuite fournie avec leur adhésion premium.
