Bon à savoir : Les clients N26 Standard ont la possibilité de commander une carte physique au prix unique de 10 € (sans avoir besoin de passer à une adhésion premium).Comment commander et activer ma carte virtuelle ?Connectez-vous à votre compte et allez dans l’onglet Cartes dans le coin inférieur droit.Appuyez sur « Obtenir une carte supplémentaire ».Sélectionnez « Virtuelle » en haut de la page, puis appuyez sur « Choisir » en bas de la page.Lisez et acceptez les conditions générales, puis appuyez sur « Générer une carte virtuelle ».Ajoutez votre carte virtuelle N26 à votre portefeuille Apple Pay ou Google Pay ou ignorez cette étape.Comment utiliser ma carte virtuelle N26 ?Paiement en magasin en utilisant Apple ou Google Pay : Associez votre carte virtuelle N26 à votre portefeuille Apple ou Google Pay selon votre appareil.Retrait en espèces : Une fois que vous avez associé votre carte virtuelle à votre portefeuille Apple ou Google, vous pouvez retirer de l’argent liquide aux distributeurs automatiques de billets sans contact. Vous pouvez également utiliser CASH26 pour déposer ou retirer de l’argent (DE, AT, IT, ES et GR).Effectuer des achats en ligne : Vous pouvez consulter les détails de votre carte virtuelle dans l’application N26 (numéro de carte, date d’expiration et code de sécurité). Pour consulter ces détails :Connectez-vous à l’application mobile N26Sélectionnez « Cartes ».Trouvez votre carte virtuelle N26 (faites défiler vers la gauche avec votre doigt jusqu’à ce que vous trouviez votre carte virtuelle N26 si vous en avez plusieurs)Sélectionnez « Détails de la carte ».Vous devrez ensuite saisir votre code de validation ou un identifiant biométrique pour consulter les données de vos cartes virtuelles pendant 60 secondes.La carte virtuelle Mastercard N26 n’est disponible que pour les comptes N26 Standard ouverts à partir de février 2021 et tous les comptes N26 Premium ouverts à partir du 9 octobre 2021.

question: How to invite friends to join N26?
answer: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You’ll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26’s public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API  & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as “pending” will be classified as “booked” transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We’ve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
answer: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to ideas@n26.com (new tab). We’re always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also file a complaint.

question: N26 Cashless - Promozione per i clienti italiani
answer: Cos’è?N26 Cashless è una nuova promozione pensata per i clienti di N26 residenti in Italia volta ad incentivare l’uso della carta di debito N26 per i pagamenti digitali.Il concorso sarà attivo dal 1° Marzo al 30 Giugno 2021.Chi può partecipare? L’iscrizione ad N26 Cashless è aperta e automatica per tutti i clienti N26 che risiedono in Italia (eccetto i clienti N26 Business) e che hanno dato il proprio consenso alle comunicazioni di marketing. Per poter partecipare alla promozione e al sorteggio dei premi, i clienti dovranno: Avere un conto N26 aperto e attivo Non essere incorsi in pignoramenti, sequestri o altre limitazioni del conto correnteLe condizioni citate sono valide per tutta la durata del concorso e la mancata osservanza può comportare l’esclusione dall’estrazione finale dei premi.Come funziona?I clienti N26 iscritti al programma raggiungono la soglia per partecipare alle estrazioni dei premi finali effettuando transazioni con la propria Mastercard associata al conto N26 via POS (sia contactless, sia con chip e pin) o con Apple Pay e Google Pay.I pagamenti online e i prelievi allo sportello ATM sono esclusi dal conteggio delle transazioni. Quali sono i premi in palio?In base al numero di transazioni effettuate durante il periodo di validità del concorso (1° Marzo - 30 Giugno 2021), i partecipanti potranno accedere alle estrazioni per 3 soglie di premi:Almeno 20 transazioni > Buono Regalo Amazon.it da 20€Almeno 50 transazioni > Buono Regalo Amazon.it da 50€Almeno 90 transazioni > Buono Regalo Amazon.it da 90€Se si effettua un numero di transazioni che corrisponde a diverse soglie, si partecipa cumulativamente all’estrazione dei premi per entrambe le soglie raggiunte.(Per esempio, se si effettuano 60 pagamenti nel periodo di durata del concorso, si partecipa all’estrazione dell’Amazon voucher sia da € 20 che da € 50.)L’estrazione dei premi avverrà entro il 31 Agosto 2021.In caso di vincita, i clienti riceveranno una comunicazione ufficiale nella casella "Messaggi" dell'app N26. Concorso a premi valido dal 01/03/2021 al 30/06/2021. Montepremi 4.160 € F.C. iva. Per consultare il regolamento completo, visita www.n26.com (nuova tabella). Buono Regalo Amazon.it non è uno sponsor della presente promozione. Restrizioni applicate. Maggiori dettagli su amazon.it/gc-legal (nuova tabella).

question: Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?
answer:
So erstellst du einen Shared Space:Erstelle im Spaces-Tab einen neuen Space und tippe darauf.
Tippe dann auf das Männchen in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms.
Lies dir aufmerksam die Informationen unter "Mehr erfahren über Shared Spaces" durch und tippe auf "Teilnehmer einladen".
Suche und wähle den Kontakt des N26 Nutzers aus, den du einladen möchtest. Wenn die Person, die du einladen möchtest, ein N26 Konto hat aber nicht in deiner Kontaktliste auftaucht, kann es daran liegen dass sie sich in der App nicht als N26 Nutzer erkennbar gemacht hat. Diese Option lässt sich unter Mein Konto < Einstellungen < Persönliche Einstellungen < Persönliche Daten aktivieren.
Falls nötig, trage deren vollen Namen an, wie in deren N26 Konto hinterlegt.
Sieh dir die Informationen unter Kontovollmacht erteilen (die rechtliche Übersicht) an. Wenn du die Nutzungsbestimmungen durchgelesen und akzeptiert hast, tippe auf das Kästchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".
Gib deine Bestätigungs-PIN ein.
Tippe auf den jeweiligen Teilnehmer aus der Teilnehmerliste.
Bestätige auf deinem verknüpften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Einladung senden".Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzufügen oder davon entfernen?

question: Cosa sono gli IBAN per Spaces?
answer:
Con la funzionalità IBAN per Spaces, i tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale diventano ancora più utili. Di per sé uno spazio non può ricevere bonifici in entrata e non può essere utilizzato per pagare addebiti diretti in uscita. Tuttavia, assegnando un IBAN a uno dei tuoi Spaces, sarà possibile ricevere bonifici in entrata direttamente su questo spazio. In questo modo potrai usufruire di questo IBAN per pagare gli addebiti diretti in uscita.Come funziona?Gli IBAN per Spaces permettono ai clienti con una membership premium (N26 Smart, You o Metal) che hanno aperto il loro conto N26 in Germania e hanno un IBAN che inizia con “DE”, di assegnare un IBAN unico a uno spazio separato dal conto principale; in questo modo sarà possibile utilizzarlo per ricevere e inviare direttamente alcuni bonifici.Di seguito puoi trovare una panoramica delle funzionalità che otterrai assegnando un IBAN a uno o più Spaces:Aggiungi un IBAN a uno dei tuoi Spaces: puoi assegnare un IBAN unico a uno spazio separato dal conto principale, nuovo o già esistente. Non è possibile assegnare un IBAN a uno Spazio condiviso.Spaces multipli con IBAN: puoi creare fino a 10 Spaces, ognuno con il suo IBAN ed avere così maggiore controllo sulle tue finanze. Ti preghiamo di notare che dopo aver assegnato un IBAN a 3 Spaces si attiva un limite di 24 ore prima di poter assegnare un nuovo IBAN a un altro spazio.Ricevere bonifici bancari: puoi ricevere i bonifici direttamente in uno spazio separato dal conto principale con un IBAN assegnato.Inviare bonifici bancari: puoi effettuare i bonifici direttamente da uno spazio separato dal conto principale con un IBAN assegnato.Pagamento di addebiti diretti: puoi utilizzare lo spazio con l’IBAN unico per pagare addebiti diretti in uscita ricorrenti direttamente dallo spazio separato dal conto principale. Se non hai fondi a sufficienza per coprire l’importo dell’addebito diretto, il bonifico verrà rifiutato e ti verrà addebitata una commissione sul tuo conto principale.Visualizzazione dei dettagli IBAN dei tuoi Spaces: puoi vedere i dettagli di tutti gli IBAN dei tuoi Spaces che puoi utilizzare per ricevere bonifici e pagare per gli addebiti diretti. Basta effettuare l’accesso nell’app mobile o su N26 Web, andare sulla sezione “Spaces” e selezionare lo spazio per vedere i dettagli dell’IBAN. Vai alle “Impostazioni Spaces” per vedere l’IBAN e il BIC sul lato superiore dello schermo.Come aggiungere un IBAN a uno spazio separato dal conto principale:Puoi aggiungere un IBAN a uno dei tuoi spazi eseguendo questi passaggi:Effettua l’accesso nell’app mobile N26Vai su “Spaces” per aprire il menu corrispondenteSeleziona lo spazio a cui desideri assegnare un IBAN unicoVai sull'icona dell’ingranaggio in alto a destra della schermata e poi apri “Impostazioni Spaces”Segui i passaggi consigliati nell’app:Seleziona “Imposta IBAN” »Leggi le informazioni e tocca “Aggiungi IBAN a ...” »Accetta i Termini e Condizioni »Inserisci il PIN di conferma »Seleziona “Va bene” nella schermata finale.Come rimuovere un IBAN da uno spazio separato dal conto principale:Per rimuovere un IBAN da uno dei tuoi Spaces dovrai eliminare del tutto lo spazio e trasferire i fondi rimanenti sul tuo conto principale oppure su un altro dei tuoi spazi. Per eliminare uno spazio con un IBAN procedi in questo modo:Effettua l’accesso nell’app mobile N26Clicca su “Spaces”Seleziona lo spazio con l’IBAN che vuoi cancellare (ricorda che questo cancellerà completamente lo spazio e che sarà dunque necessario trasferire l’intero importo da un'altra parte)Vai a “Impostazioni Spaces” (clicca sull’icona dell’ingranaggio in alto a destra)Sotto “Gestisci” trovi l’opzione “Svuota e cancella lo spazio”Clicca e conferma di volere cancellare lo spazio separato dal conto principaleSeleziona il tuo conto principale o un altro spazio per spostare il saldo rimanenteInfine, sullo schermo comparirà “Elimina”. Clicca per confermare.
Puoi inviare anche bonifici SEPA dai tuoi spazi separati dal conto principale a cui hai assegnato un IBAN. Per farlo, segui i passaggi qui sotto:Vai sullo Space da cui desideri trasferire del denaro e tocca "Invia denaro"Seleziona "Bonifico bancario"Seleziona il contatto a cui vuoi inviare denaroConferma l'importo che intendi trasferire e inserisci una causale (opzionale)Inserisci il tuo PIN di conferma e dai l'ok per completare il bonifico

question: Où puis-je effectuer des retraits gratuits ?
answer: Avec votre Mastercard N26, vous bénéficiez d’un certain nombre de retraits gratuits, conformément à notre Politique d’Utilisation Équitable.Les retraits via CASH26 sont toujours gratuits dans les magasins partenaires.Vous pouvez aussi utiliser l'outil de géolocalisation de DAB de Mastercard (nouvel onglet) pour trouver les DAB qui vous permettront de retirer sans frais.*Pour les clients résidant en Espagne : En Espagne, certains distributeurs automatiques de billets peuvent facturer des frais d’environ 2 €. À l’heure actuelle, nous ne pouvons pas empêcher ces frais de vous être facturés, mais nous pouvons vous aider à être remboursés si vous nous contactez directement via le LiveChat dans notre application. En attendant, voici une liste des banques dont les DAB peuvent être utilisés gratuitement : AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicajaVous avez quand même dû payer des frais de retrait ?

question: Come posso creare e modificare bonifici periodici?
answer: Quando effettui un bonifico dall'app mobile N26 o dalla Webapp (nuova tabella), hai la possibilità di creare un bonifico periodico.Ogni volta che completerai un bonifico in uscita, ti verrà offerta l'opzione di "Salvare come bonifico programmato". Se selezionerai questa opzione, potrai inviare il bonifico allo stesso beneficiario periodicamente. Nella schermata successiva, inoltre, potrai scegliere la frequenza dell'invio, la data di inizio e di fine dell'operazione. Ecco come puoi visualizzare e impostare i bonifici periodici nell'app mobile N26:Accedi all'app N26 e apri la tua lista dei movimentiClicca sui tre puntini in alto a destra per Android, o sulle tre lineette orizzontali i per iOS.Seleziona "Prossimi pagamenti"Qui potrai controllare i bonifici periodici esistenti o crearne uno nuovo In questo menu è possibile annullare e / o modificare i dettagli di tali transazioni. Per cancellare un bonifico periodico, trascinalo semplicemente fino all'icona del cestino. ℹ️  Ricorda che, nel caso in cui un trasferimento periodico fallisca per insufficienza di fondi, non effettueremo nuovamente il bonifico, ma dovrai effettuare il bonifico manualmente.

question: Was sind Shared Spaces?
answer: Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk für eure Liebsten organisieren möchtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es möglich.Premium-Kunden (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You oder N26 Business Metal) können einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.Alle N26 Nutzer können teilnehmen, unabhängig von ihren Kontotypen.Dem Besitzer gehören alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

question: How to upgrade to Metal?
answer: Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account, N26 Smart or a N26 You membership. To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.Check the conditions of the delivery and accept the N26 Metal T&Cs (new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 15 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If you’re already a N26 You member, you don’t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: How to make a SEPA transfer?
answer:
You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.From the Home screen choose the Send money tab,
Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then “add a new recipient”,
Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,
Choose the amount and select Next,
Add a message if required or select Skip It,
Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),
Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,
Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.You’ll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.Ensure that you use your paired device.Once your debit transfer is sent you’ll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:Go to your Transactions list.
Locate and select the specific debit transfer.
Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.You can also send outgoing SEPA transfers directly from your Spaces with assigned IBANs. Simply go into the Space with an assigned IBAN, select “Send Money” then choose “Bank Transfer”. This will then work like a regular outgoing payment.

question: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
answer: If your balance can’t cover a direct debit* when it’s due, it’ll bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee**. If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It’s not possible to delay a direct debit.To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you’re eligible for an Overdraft directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).IBANs for Spaces: If you have assigned an IBAN to a Space and you do not have enough funds to cover an outgoing direct debit, the direct debit will bounce and you’ll be charged a €3 fee** from your main account. Please note, it is not possible to go into an overdraft within a Space.*For Non-Euro countries only: If you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and the ultimate amount that is collected from us. See the below list of countries: BulgariaCroatiaCzech RepublicDenmarkHungaryIcelandLiechtensteinNorwayPolandRomaniaSwedenSwitzerland**The fee for customers with a Spanish IBAN is €9.

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then “add a new recipient), some details like the recipient’s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn’t delete your transaction history with them

question: Come ottenere il mio PIN?
answer: Innanzitutto, bisogna sapere che con N26 si hanno due codici PIN diversi: uno è il PIN di conferma e l'altro il PIN della carta. Ricorda: sei tu a creare entrambi.Il PIN di conferma (nuova tabella) deve essere inserito per confermare tutte le azioni eseguite all'interno dell'app, ad esempio bonifici, modifiche della password, CASH26, ecc. Crei questo PIN nell'app quando associ il tuo smartphone per la prima volta.Puoi modificarlo andando su Il mio conto > Sicurezza > Cambia il PIN di conferma.Il PIN della carta (nuova tabella) viene utilizzato per effettuare prelievi o pagare con la carta nei negozi. Puoi impostarlo tramite l'app non appena ricevi e attivi la tua carta N26.Puoi modificarlo andando su Carte > Impostazioni della carta > Reimposta il PIN. Dopo aver impostato il tuo nuovo codice PIN, dovrai prima effettuare un prelievo ATM affinché la modifica del PIN venga registrata (come quando attivi la tua carta per la prima volta).Importante:Non ti invieremo mai un PIN tramite posta o in nessuno dei nostri canali di comunicazione. Sei la sola persona che dovrebbe conoscere i tuoi PIN.Per ragioni di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN che contengano elementi della tua data di nascita, indirizzo o altre combinazioni con cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1994, 1331 o 1234). Se il numero scelto non è valido, ti preghiamo di riprovare con una combinazione diversa.Per ulteriori dettagli su questi PIN, dai un'occhiata agli altri articoli del Support Center sull'argomento tramite i link sopra indicati.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive. Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What’s a “banking day”?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn’t arrived — where is it?So what if you’ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn’t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can’t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: Was ist N26 Business Metal?
answer: Verfügbar in Österreich, Belgien, Dänemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Schweden.N26 Business Metal 16,90 € pro Monat und ist für Selbstständige und Freiberufler gedacht, die in eigenem Namen tätig sind. Das bedeutet, dass auf dem Konto oder der Karte kein Firmenname stehen kann.Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: Wähle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fünf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zusätzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusätzliche virtuelle Karte!Zusätzliche physische Karte: Bestelle über deine N26 App eine zusätzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Gebühr von 10 €.Spaces: 10 zusätzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Weltweit kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten: Bezahle mit deiner N26 Metal Mastercard online sowie in Geschäften, vermeide versteckte Bankgebühren und profitiere von gebührenfreien Auslandsüberweisungen auf der ganzen Welt. Du kannst darüber hinaus an Geldautomaten weltweit gebührenfrei Bargeld in jeder Währung abheben.Partnerangebote (neuen Tab): Profitiere von Premium-Partnerangeboten und Rabatten von renommierten MarkenVersicherungspaket von Allianz Global Assistance*: Versicherung, die eine breite Palette an persönlichen und finanziellen Leistungen umfasst, wie z. B.:Reiseversicherung: Rückerstattung medizinischer Kosten im Ausland, für Reiseannullierungen nach einem medizinischen Notfall, Kosten, die bei einer Flugverspätung von mehr als 4 Stunden entstehen, Kosten bei einer Verspätung des aufgegebenen Gepäcks von mehr als 6 Stunden und Kosten für medizinische Rücktransporte.Schnee- und Bergrettung: Du erhältst eine Versicherung für Such- und Rettungsmaßnahmen, erste Transportkosten und medizinische Kosten bei Unfällen während einer Bergtour.Car-, Bike- und Scooter-Sharing: Versicherungsschutz für Schäden oder Diebstahl von Fahrzeugen, die bei einem entsprechenden Sharing-Unternehmen gemietet wurden.Es ist noch nicht möglich, zwischen Privat- und Geschäftskonten zu wechseln. Umso wichtiger ist es, zu wissen, ob N26 Business Metal das Richtige für dich (neuen Tab) ist:Das N26 Business Metal Konto ist für Selbständige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.Das Konto kostet 16,90 € pro Monat. Das Premium-Konto beinhaltet: Ein Allianz-Versicherungspaket sowie gebührenfreie Abhebungen an Geldautomaten in Fremdwährungen.Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur für den geschäftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erhältst monatlich 0,5% Cashback auf alle mit der Karte getätigten Zahlungen. Der Vorgang erfolgt am 15. des Folgemonats sowie aller darauffolgenden Monate und es dauert bis zu 7 Tage, bis er auf deinem Kontoauszug erscheint.Es ist derzeit nicht möglich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu führen. Wenn du also auch eine Karte für private Ausgaben benötigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine Maestrocard zu bestellen (erhältlich in Deutschland und Österreich).Überweisungen in Fremdwährung sind mit N26 Business Metal nicht möglich.Du kannst direkt bei der Anmeldung Business Metal auswählen oder von einem existierenden N26 Business Konto upgraden.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und gehört zur Allianz Group.

question: Bank documents—a guide to what's available
answer: N26 is called The Mobile Bank for a reason—you can download your balance statement, account confirmation and other bank documents automatically. The following bank documents are official documents and they’re perfectly valid without a signature. Let's find out a little more about them:Your bank statement is a document that reflects your total balance and every incoming and outgoing transaction in your N26 bank account, including your full name, IBAN and BIC. Here’s how you can download it.Your bank information, aka Account confirmation is a document that confirms the bank account registered at your name. It includes your full name, date of birth, account IBAN and BIC, date of the account opening and—if you wish—it can also include your current account balance and card number (partially hidden). Here’s how you can request it.The statement of fees is a document that reports all the bank fees you’ve been charged at N26 in the past year.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, go to Statement of fees, choose whether you need a report of the past 6 or 12 months and click on Request. You’ll receive a PDF in your Messages inbox within 24 hours.The Transfer confirmation is a document that confirms that a transfer has been made from your N26 account. It includes your full name, address (as registered in your N26 account), IBAN and BIC, transfer amount, date, reference text, and the recipient’s full name, IBAN and BIC.In the mobile and WebApp: from the Home screen, choose the transfer and select Transfer confirmation—the PDF will be automatically generated.The card payment confirmation has the purpose to confirm that a payment has been made using your N26 Mastercard, you can provide the bank statement of the corresponding month.RIB (Relevé d'Identité Bancaire in French) is a document containing your main bank information—full name, legal address, IBAN and BIC—specific for the French authorities.In the WebApp: click on the download* (new tab) icon, scroll down to RIB and click on Request.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‘Add money’ button.

question: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
answer:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATM’s nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A €2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (we’ll remind you via push message when you’re running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we can’t reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, there’s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A €2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2€.

question: How to file a complaint?
answer: Looking for Support or have a Question?If you need assistance with your account, card payment disputes, changing your data, or just want to ask a question, find out how to contact N26 here.Raising a ComplaintWe’re sorry you wish to raise a complaint and would like to review this further. We will investigate your complaint in full, and provide our findings and final response via email. Our customer support team can help you submit a complaint via Live Chat, otherwise please write to one of the following addresses, based on your preferred language:English complaints@n26.com (new tab)Spanish reclamaciones.es@n26.com (new tab), or reclamaciones@n26.com (new tab) if you have a German (DE) IBAN.Please note these inboxes are for filing a complaint only. Our customer support team (new tab) is available every day and may be able to resolve an issue sooner.When filing a complaint, please always include:A comprehensive description of the complaint and the affected service or productThe date on which the problem first occurredAny supporting documents to accompany your complaint (e.g screenshots, emails etc)Your preferred outcomeKindly note, we can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered to your N26 account. If the complaint is raised through a representative, it must also be accompanied by a special notarized power of attorney form.In exceptional cases where you do not have access to send an email, we recommend reviewing your account terms and conditions or List of Prices to find the appropriate address for written correspondence. Our German postal address is: N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWe’ll contact you via email to confirm that we’ve received your complaint and will begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, we will reach out directly via email.Complaint Handling TimesAll complaints concerning payment services, such as transfers and card transactions will be resolved within 15 business days, per the European Payment Services Directive II (PSD2). If we need more time to assess your complaint, we will let you know but we must provide our response within one month. For all other complaints, different timescales apply based on the country of your account Terms and Conditions.Germany and Austria - 15 Business Days Greater Europe - 15 Business DaysIreland - 40 Business DaysFrance - 56 Calendar Days United Kingdom - 56 Calendar Days Spain - 60 Calendar Days Italy - 60 Calendar DaysWe may close your complaint if we do not receive a response from you. If you reach out to us again at a later date, we will open a new file and provide a new complaint reference number.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with our findings, you may wish to consider further advice from independent third parties. Customers with a Spanish (ES) IBAN can also contact the following:Banco de España - Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones located on Calle Alcalá 48, 28014 MadridCustomers with a German (DE) IBAN can also contact the following:An arbitration body via Deutsche Bundesbank (German Federal Bank)Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht – BaFin (German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority)Applicable LegislationThe applicable Spanish legislation related to customer rights and transparency regulations is available on the official website of the Bank of Spain (new tab).Rulebook:Reglamento para la defensa del Cliente de N26 Bank GmbH, Sucursal en España. (new tab)

question: How to rent a car with your N26 card?
answer:
In order to rent a car, the main driver is normally required to be a credit card holder, but recently an increasing number of car rental companies have been accepting debit cards due to their growing usage.As a result, our N26 debit card enables you to rent cars at a great number of companies. Here you’ll find some of the agencies that currently accept debit cards:
AlamoAvisCentaurEnterpriseEuropcarFireflyJoy rentLocautoGreaterSicilyByCarThrifty car rentalBefore renting a vehicle, we suggest you contact the company: conditions for the rental depend on the single agencies so requirements may vary locally and nationally.We also recommend checking if the agency accepts debit cards when you reserve the car as well as when you collect it, and whether they require the card to have embossed numbers.Please also consider that:in case an unexpected or unjustified amount is charged, you’ll first need to contact and possibly start a dispute with the agency. Only if the dispute has a negative outcome, we’ll be able to offer our assistance to start a new dispute via Mastercard.the security deposit will be charged (and not authorized, as with credit cards). The deposit will then be credited back to your account after returning the car and if no damage is reported.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (“tapping” your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions: Go to Cards. If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you’ve chosen.

question: Kann ich die N26 App auf mein Smartphone herunterladen?
answer: Jede App-Version kann ab Veröffentlichung 180 Tage lang verwendet werden. Innerhalb dieses Zeitraums werden neuere Versionen zur Verfügung gestellt. Bitte führe immer ein Upgrade auf die jeweils neueste Version durch, um stets von einem optimalen Kundenerlebnis zu profitieren. Die neueste Version der N26 App kannst du im Apple App Store (neuen Tab) oder im Google Play Store (neuen Tab) herunterladen.Bitte beachte, dass es für alle Smartphones Mindestanforderungen gibt, um eine ordnungsgemäße Nutzung zu gewährleisten. Diese Anforderungen sind unten aufgelistet:iPhone:Modell 5s und neueriOS 12 und höherDeine iOS-Version kannst du unter Einstellungen > Allgemein > InfoAndroid:Android 6.0 oder höher. Du findest deine Android-Version unter Einstellungen > Über dein GerätNative Unterstützung für Google ServicesDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm (neuen Tab).

question: Perché devo aggiornare le mie informazioni personali?
answer:
A partire dalla metà di agosto 2022, contatteremo i nostri clienti residenti in Italia e possessori di un conto N26 con Iban italiano, con lo scopo di verificare e mantenere aggiornati le loro informazioni personali.In qualità di banca, siamo tenuti per legge a mantenere le informazioni personali dei nostri clienti corrette e aggiornate, con l'obiettivo di prevenire l'utilizzo del sistema finanziario a fini di riciclaggio del denaro e finanziamento del terrorismo. Questo processo prevede la verifica e l’aggiornamento periodico dei dati personali e la compilazione di un questionario di adeguata verifica, che include informazioni aggiuntive di carattere finanziario sui nostri clienti. Quali informazioni devo aggiornare?Quando riceverai la nostra comunicazione in merito, effettuando il Login alla tua app N26, verrai immediatamente indirizzato al processo di aggiornamento delle tue informazioni personali. Prima di procedere, assicurati di aver aggiornato l’app all’ultima versione disponibile. L’operazione può essere effettuata solo tramite l’app associata al tuo smartphone (non verrà visualizzata al tuo accesso dalla WebApp).Come primo passaggio ti verrà chiesto di verificare e confermare i tuoi dati personali:Nome e cognomeLuogo e data di nascitaNazionalitàSesso anagraficoCodice FiscaleNel passaggio successivo, dovrai quindi convalidare il tuo indirizzo di residenza e il tuo indirizzo di domicilio, se diverso. Come ultimo passaggio, ti verrà richiesta la compilazione del questionario di adeguata verifica, al fine di assicurare l’integrazione e l’aggiornamento di informazioni rilevanti richieste dalla normativa bancaria. Si tratta di una procedura veloce, l’operazione ti richiederà solo qualche minuto.Ti ricordiamo che, ai sensi della normativa in vigore, l'aggiornamento dei tuoi dati e il questionario dovranno essere completati anche se le tue informazioni sono rimaste invariate.Il trattamento dei tuoi dati, inoltre, è soggetto al regolamento europeo in materia di protezione dei dati e della privacy (GDPR). Puoi trovare più informazioni sulla nostra politica di privacy. (nuova tabella)Cos’è il questionario di adeguata verifica?La normativa antiriciclaggio di cui al D.Lgs 231/2007 prevede che la banca sia tenuta a raccogliere regolarmente informazioni aggiornate sui propri clienti, con l'obiettivo di prevenire l'utilizzo del sistema finanziario a fini di riciclaggio e finanziamento del terrorismo.  e quale condizione per mantenere i rapporti e le operazioni tra i clienti e la banca.Per questo, ti sottoporremo un breve questionario,  all’interno della tua app N26, dove ti chiederemo di rispondere ad una serie di domande riguardanti il tuo stato patrimoniale, il tuo attuale impiego, l’origine dei fondi presenti sul tuo conto, il tuo reddito netto e l’uso che fai del tuo conto N26. Verificheremo i dati da te inseriti e, se necessario, ti contatteremo in un secondo momento. Per questo, assicurati di avere la tua app aggiornata all’ultima versione disponibile e di monitorare sempre le comunicazioni in arrivo nei "Messaggi da N26" dalla sezione "Supporto" della tua app.Cosa succede se non completo la procedura come richiesto?Ti invitiamo a compilare al più presto l’operazione, così da poter continuare ad avere pieno accesso a tutte le funzionalità del tuo conto N26. Nel caso in cui le informazioni non vengano aggiornate entro un congruo termine N26 sarà obbligata ad astenersi dal proseguire il rapporto contrattuale con il cliente (art. 42 D.Lgs. 231/2007).
Dopo i primi 30 giorni, sarai ancora in grado di completare il questionario, ma saremo costretti a limitare temporaneamente alcune funzionalità del tuo conto (ad esempio i pagamenti in entrata, come lo stipendio) fino a quando non avrai soddisfatto questo requisito normativo.

question: Cos'è N26 Business?
answer: Il conto N26 Business è un conto corrente business digitale, sicuro e intuitivo, che puoi aprire in pochi minuti. È incredibilmente semplice, trasparente e gratuito* e ti permette di ricevere pagamenti dai clienti, inviare denaro e spenderlo in piena sicurezza tenendo le finanze della tua attività completamente separate da quelle personali. I nostri conti Business sono riservati esclusivamente per:liberi professionisti iscritti ad un albo o ordine professionale (ad esempio architetti, avvocati, farmacisti, infermieri...), freelance, ovvero lavoratori autonomi e imprenditori individuali in possesso di una partita IVA (come designer, fotografi, elettricisti o i titolari di B&B e casa vacanza con partita IVA).ditte individuali iscritte al Registro Imprese della Camera di Commercio.Cosa include un conto N26 Business?Ecco tutte le caratteristiche e funzionalità offerte con N26 Business:Conto Business gratuito*: N26 Business è gratuito, senza commissioni di gestione del conto (*in caso di saldo pari o superiore a 50.000 € potrebbe essere applicata una commissione sulla custodia).Carta virtuale: il conto include una carta virtuale (nuova tabella) Mastercard gratuita, concepita esclusivamente per uso commerciale. La carta virtuale ha un numero PAN completo pronto per essere aggiunto ad Apple Pay o Google Pay per gli acquisti online e in negozio. Puoi anche utilizzare gli sportelli bancomat con funzionalità contactless per prelevare contanti con Apple Pay o Google Pay.Mastercard N26 fisica: al costo di 10€ aggiuntivi puoi avere una carta di debito fisica N26 per uso commerciale (ti ricordiamo che è necessario che il saldo del tuo conto sia di almeno 10€ per avviare la produzione e spedizione della carta).Carta Maestro: se hai bisogno di una carta anche per le tue spese private e apri il tuo N26 Business in Germania, Austria o nei Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro al costo di 10€.Pagamenti e bonifici: puoi inviare e ricevere bonifici SEPA utilizzando la tua app mobile N26. Inoltre, potrai inviare bonifici istantanei ad altri clienti N26 utilizzando MoneyBeam. A differenza di altri conti, N26 Business non consente di effettuare bonifici in valuta estera direttamente dall’app. Per eseguirli, vai su Wise (nuova tabella).Cashback aziendale: ogni mese riceverai lo 0,1% di cashback su tutti i pagamenti effettuati con la carta. Il conto N26 Business non supporta i pagamenti business to business (B2B).Quali sono i limiti di utilizzo dei conti N26 Business?I limiti massimi giornalieri delle Mastercard N26 Business (importo totale entro le 24 ore) per i pagamenti con carta sono:Prelievi bancomat: 2.500€ Pagamenti in negozio o online: 5.000€Il limite mensile per i pagamenti con carta è di 20.000€ .Puoi impostare i tuoi limiti (nuova tabella) di prelievo bancomat e di pagamento direttamente nell'app selezionando Carte.Ricorda: se apri il tuo conto N26 Business You o N26 Business Metal in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro per le tue spese personali. I limiti massimi giornalieri (nell'arco di 24 ore) per i bonifici bancari sono:MoneyBeam a clienti N26: 1.000 €Bonifici istantanei: 100.000 €Bonifici in uscita: Nessun limiteI bonifici in valuta estera (nuova tabella) non sono possibili con N26 Business dalla app ma direttamente dal sito di Wise (nuova tabella).I pagamenti B2B (transazioni tra imprese industriali e commerciali) non sono supportati.Link utili:Chi può aprire un conto N26 Business?

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn’t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: Does N26 support SWIFT transfers?
answer: Yes - but only incoming SWIFT-transfers thus far.Outgoing SWIFT-transfers are not yet possible. Follow us on social media #N26 and our Blog (new tab) to be among the first to know when that changes.Learn here how to make foreign currency transfers with N26.Learn here how long an incoming SWIFT-transfer takes.How much do SWIFT-transfers cost?Incoming transfers above €150 will be charged with a 12.50€ fee + 0.1% on the amount received.No fees apply to incoming transfers lower than €150.The maximum fee is €100 per transaction.Who does the fee apply to?If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a DE IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, or Business You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business Metal.)If you signed up before 07.07.2021 and have a ES IBAN, the fee applies to you if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)If you signed up after 07.07.2021 the fee applies regardless of your IBAN if you have an N26 Business Standard, Business Smart, Business You or an N26 Standard, N26 Smart, N26 You account. (This means it doesn’t apply to N26 Metal or N26 Business Metal accounts.)

question: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
answer: We offer repayment plans if you can’t repay your overdraft or loan with N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Please note we can't offer you a repayment plan if your account is already closed.Here’s how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you’re going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don’t accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It’s then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if it’s negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

question: How to change my phone number?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

question: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
answer:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account’s security (see GwG § 10 (new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems. As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks. This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you’ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description. Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments. Our Customer Support doesn’t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

question: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details.Tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app: take me there now (or go to 👤 My Account > Personal Details).Password: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account > Security.Name and sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate). We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: You’ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it’s really you changing your information so we can’t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go to 👤 My Account and select Settings then Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

question: How to close my account?
answer: We’re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We’d love to keep you as a customer—tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account. If you’ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here’s what to do:Make your account balance €0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is €0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You’ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you’re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or “as soon as possible”Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we’ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: How to use my card digitally?
answer: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
answer: Die kontaktlose Bezahlung mit deiner Karte erfolgt per Nahfeldkommunikation (NFC). Bei Problemen mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlung solltest du Folgendes beachten:Überprüfe, ob in deinen Karteneinstellungen die kontaktlose Bezahlung aktiviert ist.Wenn deine Karte neu ist, musst du sie zuvor einmal an einem Geldautomaten oder an einem Zahlungsterminal mit Chip & PIN benutzt haben. Erst danach kannst du sie auch für die kontaktlose Bezahlung verwenden.Bei kontaktlosen Zahlungen mit deiner Karte (NFC) bis zu 50 € ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich. Bei Zahlungen über 50 € oder kumulativen Zahlungen über 150€ musst du deine Karten-PIN eingeben.Frage den Händler, ob das Zahlungsterminal die kontaktlose Bezahlung auch tatsächlich unterstützt.Bei N26 Metal Karten befindet sich die NFC-Funktion nur auf der Rückseite der Karte. Achte darauf, dass du die Rückseite der Karte an das Terminal hältst, um kontaktlos zu zahlen (mit der Vorderseite funktioniert es nicht).Du musst deine Karte direkt an die NFC-kompatible Oberfläche des Zahlungsterminals halten. Wenn du deine Karte zu schnell weggezogen oder sie nicht nahe genug an die Oberfläche gehalten hast, versuche es einfach noch einmal.Wenn die kontaktlose Bezahlung nicht funktioniert, versuche bitte immer die Zahlung mit Chip & PIN abzuschließen.

question: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
answer: Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch für Kredite an unsere Kunden zur Verfügung zu stellen (sofern diese über eine entsprechende Bonität verfügen). Für die nicht im Kundengeschäft benötigte Liquidität ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europäischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschließlich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir öffentlich-rechtliche Kunden hauptsächlich in Deutschland (Städte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das heißt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.Und wir tätigen auch keine Spekulationsgeschäfte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

question: Wie funktioniert 3D Secure?
answer: 3D Secure schützt dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug. Die Funktion wird automatisch aktiviert, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Du brauchst keine zusätzlichen Passwörter.Wenn du eine Online-Zahlung mit deiner Mastercard vornimmst, bestätigt 3D Secure die Transaktion innerhalb von 5 Minuten durch eine Push-Nachricht. Wenn du die Transaktion nicht siehst, versuche es mit unseren Tipps zur Fehlerbehebung.Bitte beachten: die Push-Benachrichtigung wird nur an das verknüpfte Smartphone gesendet.Wenn du einen Kauf über dein Smartphone tätigst, siehst du die ausstehende Transaktion in der App. Tippe auf das Glockensymbol, dann wird eine Push-Meldung angezeigt, mit der du deinen Kauf bestätigen und abschließen kannst. Danach gehst du zurück zur Website des Händlers. Du solltest innerhalb weniger Augenblicke eine Bestätigung für deinen erfolgreichen Einkauf sehen.

question: Warum gibt es eine Warteliste für die Anmeldung?
answer: Um in Zukunft eine noch stärkere Grundlage für unser Geschäft zu schaffen, konzentrieren wir uns auf unser Serviceerlebnis, Produktangebote und unsere Prozesse.Angesichts der überwältigenden Nachfrage nach den digitalen Banking-Produkten von N26 werden wir die Anzahl der neuen Bankkonten, die wir jeden Monat anbieten können, vorübergehend limitieren. Darum müssen wir die Aufnahme von neuen Nutzern in bestimmten Märkten vorübergehend aussetzen. Wir bitten dich, dich in unsere Warteliste anzumelden. Wir werden uns bei dir melden, sobald wir dir das Konto deiner Wahl anbieten können.Wird sich diese Pause auf bestehende Nutzer auswirken?Diese vorübergehende Pause bei Neuanmeldungen hat keinerlei Auswirkungen auf bestehende N26 Nutzer – und als Nutzer kannst du auf deinem Smartphone dasselbe nahtlose, sichere und geschützte digitale Banking-Erlebnis erwarten, das du kennen und lieben gelernt hast.Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck daran, den Anmeldeprozess für alle Nutzer so reibungslos wie möglich zu gestalten und gehen davon aus, dass wir bald neue Konten für alle Nutzer eröffnen können.Wie erfahre ich, wann es für mich wieder möglich sein wird, ein Konto zu eröffnen?Wenn du versucht hast, ein Konto zu eröffnen und dies nicht möglich war, ist es am besten, wenn du dich auf unserer Warteliste einträgst. Wir melden uns bei dir, sobald wir dir das Konto deiner Wahl zur Verfügung stellen können.Da wir nach wie vor eine enorme Nachfrage nach unserem Produkt erleben, wollen wir sicherstellen, dass wir allen Nutzern in unserer Warteliste einen fairen Zugang zum N26 Banking-Erlebnis bieten können. Deshalb setzen wir uns in der Reihenfolge der Warteliste mit den Nutzern in Verbindung, sobald wir ihnen ein Konto anbieten können. Kann ich in meinem Land ein N26 Konto eröffnen?

question: Wie kann ich eine N26 Versicherung abschließen?
answer: Mit der neuen On-Demand-Versicherung von N26 können alle unsere Kunden ihr Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Smartwatch und andere elektronische Geräte gegen Diebstahl, Einbruch, Raub, versehentliche Schäden und Wasserschäden versichern lassen. Du kannst die Versicherung direkt in deiner N26 App oder Web-App (neuen Tab) abschließen und jederzeit auf Wunsch wieder kündigen – ganz ohne lästigen Papierkram.Wie funktioniert N26 Versicherung?Wenn du die Versicherung abschließen möchtest, melde dich einfach in deiner N26 App oder Web-App an, gehe auf Entdecken und klicke auf das dort angezeigte Banner "Versicherung".Du wirst anschließend aufgefordert, ein paar Details zu deinem Endgerät einzugeben. Wähle die monatliche oder jährliche Zahlungsoption aus und bestätige die Anfrage. Nach Abschluss der Versicherungspolice ist die Versicherung für dein Smartphone ab dem Folgetag aktiv und du kannst sie jederzeit über deine N26 App oder deine Web-App (neuen Tab) kündigen.Wie kann ich einen Versicherungsanspruch geltend machen?Du kannst einen Versicherungsanspruch über das Onlineportal von Simplesurance (neuen Tab) geltend machen. Dazu musst du dich mit deiner Zertifikatsnummer und Zertifikats-PIN anmelden. Diese findest du auf deinem Versicherungszertifikat, das du via Nachrichten von N26 erhalten hast.Jeder Kunde ist berechtigt, maximal zwei Ansprüche pro Jahr einzureichen. Nach der zweiten Inanspruchnahme der Versicherungsleistung erlischt die Versicherung automatisch. Weitere Informationen findest du in den Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen, die dir direkt nach dem Versicherungsabschluss an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse geschickt werden. Darüber hinaus kannst du dich jederzeit an support@simplesurance.de wenden, wenn du Informationen zu deinem Versicherungsschein oder einem gemeldeten Schadensfall benötigst.Bin ich dazu berechtigt?Die N26 Versicherung ist für alle unsere Kunden verfügbar. N26 Metal Kunden können lediglich nicht ihr Handy versichern, da sie bereits im Rahmen ihrer Metal-Mitgliedschaft eine Handyversicherung haben. Bitte vergewissere dich, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast. N26 Versicherung ist derzeit für Kunden in Österreich, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Spanien und Deutschland erhältlich.Diese Versicherung gilt nicht für Geräte, die außerhalb Europas gekauft werden.

question: How to use Spaces?
answer: To start using your Spaces, you’ll want to go to the ‘Spaces’ section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the ‘Spaces’ homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap ‘Create a new space’ in the ‘Spaces’ homepageSelect one of the below options:‘Saving for a goal’ - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).‘Sharing money’ - Allows you to create a ‘Shared Space’.‘Create now, decide later’ - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now let’s start using ‘Spaces’!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your ‘Main Account’ or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the ‘manage’Then press ‘Lock Space’ or ‘Unlock Space’Enter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the ‘Settings’ cog (top-right corner)Select ‘Hide space balance’.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap ‘Manage’:To create a savings goal, select ‘Create my goal’ (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then ‘Set goal’To enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select ‘Manage Round-UpsToggle ‘Enable Round-Ups’You will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap ‘Create a rule’Choose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

question: ¿Qué pasa si rechazan mi IBAN de N26?
answer: Si abriste la cuenta en España después del 17 de abril de 2019, tu IBAN es español. Dicho IBAN tiene el código de país ES, un código de control de 2 dígitos, luego los 10 dígitos del código de entidad financiera, después 2 dígitos de control y, por último, los 10 dígitos de tu número de cuenta. Por ejemplo: ES XX 1563 2626 XX 326XXXXXXX.En cambio, si la abriste antes del 17 de abril de 2019, o después de esa fecha pero fuera de España, tu IBAN es alemán. Este tiene el código de país DE, un código de control de 2 dígitos, el código bancario de 8 dígitos y, por último, los 10 dígitos de tu número de cuenta. Por ejemplo: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Los países que están en la zona SEPA (Zona Única de pagos en Euros) han acordado el sistema de IBAN para simplificar los pagos tanto nacionales como internacionales, y para reducir el riesgo de error en la comunicación y en el procesamiento de transacciones.Los comerciantes y empresas que no aceptan el IBAN de otros estados miembros del Espacio Económico Europeo (EEE), están violando la legislación europea desde el 1 de febrero de 2016 (Artículo 9 del Reglamento No. 260/2012 (pestaña nueva)).Si te ves afectado por una discriminación de IBAN, te pedimos que te pongas en contacto con las  (pestaña nueva)autoridades competentes (pestaña nueva) directamente y des parte del incidente. Facilita tu información de contacto, el nombre de la empresa o del comerciante que no acepte el IBAN y una descripción del incidente (incluyendo capturas de pantalla del rechazo o cualquier otra documentación de tu comunicación con ellos).

question: How to order my card with express delivery?
answer: Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.You’ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you reorder a card. You’ll then receive a tracking link by email. If you’re not home during the delivery and your mailbox can’t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it’ll be returned to us. We’ll inform you by email if that happens.If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:Your N26 Standard, Smart, You or N26 Metal card will be delivered within 3-5 working days. Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It’s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.It’s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it’s been selected as the delivery method.If you chose express delivery and wish to close your account, you'll still need to pay the express delivery fee.If your card hasn’t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can’t be there at the time of delivery.How much does express delivery cost?N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards:First card when opening your account: 25€Reordering your card: 30€Extra N26 Smart/ You card: 30€N26 Metal cards:First card when opening your account: 25€Reordering your card 65€

question: Was ist CASH26?
answer: Für Konten verfügbar, die in Deutschland, Österreich, Italien, Spanien und Griechenland eröffnet wurden.CASH26 ist ein integriertes Feature in deiner N26 App, mit dem du über dein Smartphone Geld von deinem N26 Konto abheben und einzahlen kannst – komplett ohne Karte und Geldautomat.Geh einfach in eines unserer über 12.100 Partnergeschäfte in Deutschland (inkl. REWE, Penny und dm) und 2.600 Partnergeschäfte in Österreich (inkl. dm, Billa, Billa Plus, und PENNY), erstelle einen CASH26 Strichcode auf deinem verknüpften Smartphone und zeige ihn an der Kasse vor.Wie du Geld mit CASH26 einzahlen bzw. über CASH26 Geld abheben kannst, erfährst du in diesem Artikel.Wie funktioniert CASH26?CASH26 EinzahlungDer Strichcode ist nur 10 Minuten lang gültig. Falls du ihn nicht innerhalb dieser Zeit nutzt, verfällt er und du musst einen neuen erstellen. Wenn du Geld über CASH26 einzahlst, kannst du sofort darauf zugreifen. Es kann jedoch sein, dass der Betrag erst bis zu 10 Minuten später in deinem Kontostand erscheint.Wie viel Geld kann ich einzahlen?Der Mindestbetrag für eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 €. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 € einzahlen.Es fällt eine Transaktionsgebühr von 1,5 % des Einzahlbetrags an – ganz gleich, wie viel oder wenig Geld du einzahlst.Zusätzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit für Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in Höhe von 999€ pro 24 Stunden.Mit CASH26 Geld abhebenSobald du den CASH26 Strichcode erstellst hast, wird der Betrag, den du abheben willst, von deinem Kontostand abgezogen.Falls du dich umentscheidest und den Code vor der Nutzung löschst oder ihn nach 10 Minuten verfallen lässt, wird der Betrag deinem Kontostand sofort wieder gutgeschrieben.Wie viel Geld kann man abheben?Das Abhebelimit beträgt 200 € pro Transaktion sowie 900 € innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag – du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Abhebungen mit CASH26 sind für alle unsere Konten kostenlos, außer für das N26 Flex Konto. Bei diesem entfällt auf jede Abhebung eine Gebühr von 2€. Zusätzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit für Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in Höhe von 999€ pro 24 Stunden.

question: Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?
answer:
Come aggiungere un partecipante ad uno Spazio Condiviso:Accedi allo Space e clicca sull'icona con il + in altro a destraSeleziona la persona che vuoi aggiungere dalla tua lista di contatti.Accetta le condizioni del servizio e conferma cliccando su 'Rilascia la procura'.
Come rimuovere un partecipante da uno Spazio Condiviso:Accedi allo Space e clicca sui 3 puntini in alto a destra.Dalla lista dei ‘Participanti’, tocca sulla freccia che si trova sulla destra del nome del partecipante che vuoi rimuovere. Seleziona ‘Revoca procura generale’.Conferma la notifica che appare in basso cliccando di nuovo 'Revoca procura generale'.Come partecipare ad uno Spazio Condiviso:Nella schermata dello Space, tocca lo Space con l'icona "In attesa" e l'icona dello Spazio Condiviso.Leggi le istruzioni su Spazi Condivisi e prosegui alla schermata della Procura.Una volta che hai letto e compreso le informazioni sulla Procura legale, spunta la casella e tocca il pulsante 'Concedi procura'.Inserisci il tuo PIN di Conferma.Conferma la notifica push ‘Accetta Procura Legale’ tramite il tuo smartphone associato.Dovrai avere abbastanza Space liberi per poter accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso. Se non ne hai, potrai procedere solo se cancelli altri Space(s) per fare spazio ad un altro.Inoltre, non potrai avere Space aperti con lo stesso nome o immagine dello Spazio Condiviso. Potrai accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso solo una volta cambiato il nome/immagine dell'altro Space. Come lasciare uno Spazio Condiviso:Nella schermata dello Space, clicca sul menù indicato dai 3 puntini in alto a destra.Nelle impostazioni, tocca su ‘Abbandona Spazio Condiviso’.Conferma la notifica che appare sullo schermo, e clicca di nuovo ‘Abbandona Spazio Condiviso’.Uno Spazio Condiviso può essere creato e modificato sia nell'app mobile N26 sia nella Webapp (nuova tabella).Questa funzione è al momento disponibile solo per conti Premium con IBAN Tedesco e Spagnolo. Scopri di piùCosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?Come si crea uno Spazio Condiviso?

question: Que faire face au rejet de votre IBAN N26 ?
answer: Votre IBAN N26 se compose du code du pays (DE), d'une clé de contrôle à 2 chiffres, du code banque (8 chiffres) et de votre numéro de compte (10 chiffres). Il se présente ainsi : DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.Les pays membres de l'espace SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area ou Espace unique de paiement en Euros) se sont mis d'accord pour utiliser un système basé sur l'IBAN afin de faciliter les paiements nationaux et internationaux et de limiter le risque d'erreurs dans la communication et le traitement des transactions.Les commerçants et employeurs qui n'acceptent pas tous les IBAN des pays de l’Espace économique européen violent en réalité la loi européenne du 1er Février 2016 (art. 9 de la directive européenne n°260/2012 (nouvel onglet)).Dans le cas où vous seriez victime de ce que l'on appelle une « discrimination à l'IBAN », nous vous prions de contacter votre autorité nationale compétente (nouvel onglet) en l'informant de la situation. Nous vous recommandons de toujours indiquer votre nom complet, vos coordonnées (email, numéro de téléphone, adresse…), le nom du commerçant ou de l’employeur qui refuse votre IBAN, une brève description du problème et si possible, des captures d’écrans prouvant que votre IBAN a bien été refusé.

question: Puis-je continuer à utiliser ma carte après son expiration ?
answer: Non, la date d’expiration figurant sur votre carte remplit une fonction importante et vous ne pourrez plus l’utiliser après le mois d’expiration. Vous recevrez une nouvelle carte avec un numéro différent, ainsi qu’une nouvelle date d’expiration.Ma carte arrive à expiration, que dois-je faire ?Combien coûte le remplacement de ma carte arrivant à expiration ou périmée ?Ma carte est déjà périmée mais je n’ai jamais reçu de carte de remplacement

question: Received a suspicious message?
answer:
In the height of the global pandemic, EasyJet revealed that the personal information and travel details of 9 million customers had been stolen in a highly sophisticated cyberattack. In the first half of 2021, the personal data of more than 530 million Facebook users, from more than 100 countries, was made available for purchase online. Days after, another 500 million LinkedIn users had their personal information appear on the Dark Web. This data included information like names, birth dates, phone numbers, and email addresses. What does this have to do with N26? While there is no direct impact on N26, or the security of your bank account, cyber-criminals may utilise information, obtained from attacks targeting other companies, to perpetrate large-scale phishing attacks.Phishing is a technique used to obtain sensitive information which can be used for fraudulent purposes.
