If the beneficiary bank is not present as a participant, you will not have the option to send your transfer instantly.

question: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-Überweisung?
answer: Ausgehende Überweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausführen. Ausgehende Überweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in deinem Online Banking erstellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Geld senden.Wähle Banküberweisungen und dann Neuer Kontakt.Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des Empfängers ein und wähle Weiter.Gib den Betrag ein und wähle Weiter.Gib bei Bedarf einen Verwendungszweck ein und wähle Weiter.Überprüfe die Zusammenfassung deiner Überweisung. Hier kannst du auch entscheiden, ob es eine Terminüberweisung werden soll oder ein DauerauftragKlicke Absenden und bestätige mit deiner Bestätigungs-PIN.Zum Schluss erhältst du in deinem verknüpften Handy eine Push-Mitteilung, um die Überweisung zu bestätigen. Sobald die Überweisung bestätigt wurde, können wir sie nicht rückgängig machen oder die Daten des Überweisungsempfängers ändern.Falls du die Überweisung nicht bestätigen kannst, überprüfe bitte, dass:Du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast.In den Einstellungen deines Handys Push-Mitteilungen aktiviert sind.Du dein verknüpftes Handy verwendest.Sobald deine Überweisung gesendet wurde, kannst du in der App eine Überweisungsbestätigung als PDF herunterladen:Gehe in deine Umsatzliste.Finde deine Überweisung und tippe auf diese.Scrolle nach unten zu den Informationen zur Transaktion tippe auf Überweisungsbestätigung.Du kannst ausgehende SEPA-Überweisungen auch direkt aus deinen Spaces mit zugewiesenen IBANs vornehmen. Gehe dafür einfach in den Space mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN, wähle "Geld senden" und dann "Banküberweisung". Das wird dann wie eine normale ausgehende Zahlung gehandhabt.

question: How to get push messages?
answer: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you aren’t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether you’re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

question: How to use Spaces?
answer: To start using your Spaces, you’ll want to go to the ‘Spaces’ section in your N26 mobile or web-app. In the ‘Spaces’ homepage, you can view, enter and create Spaces.Create a Space:Tap ‘Create a new space’ in the ‘Spaces’ homepageSelect one of the below options:‘Saving for a goal’ - Enter a saving goal amount and target date (optional).‘Sharing money’ - Allows you to create a ‘Shared Space’.‘Create now, decide later’ - Simply create a Space which you can add goals or rules to later.Then personalize your Space with a name and imageYou now have a Space sub-account to better control your finances. Now let’s start using ‘Spaces’!Move money between Spaces:Hold down on your ‘Main Account’ or another SpaceThen drag and drop into the Space you wish to move money to. You can then confirm the amount and the balance is updated right away.Lock your Space:You can lock and unlock a Space at any time from your mobile and web app. You are unable to move money into or out of a locked Space.Go into the Space you wish to lock/unlockTap the ‘manage’Then press ‘Lock Space’ or ‘Unlock Space’Enter your confirmation PINThe Space will be immediately locked or unlockedHide your Space balance:You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Go into the Space you wish to hide the balance for, Tap the ‘Settings’ cog (top-right corner)Select ‘Hide space balance’.Manage your Spaces:You can create rules, savings goals and enable Round-Up savings. Within the Space tap ‘Manage’:To create a savings goal, select ‘Create my goal’ (you can also edit this at a later date)Simply enter a goal amount and due date and then ‘Set goal’To enable/disable Round-Ups Savings, select ‘Manage Round-UpsToggle ‘Enable Round-Ups’You will have the option multiply your spare change by x1, x2, x3 and x5 the amount moved from the remainder of your card transactionsYou can set-up rules within a Space to automatically move money between your Spaces and main account:Tap ‘Create a rule’Choose the Spaces or main account you wish to transfer money betweenSelect the amount you wish to moveChoose the frequency and date, then confirmYou can also delete this rule by tapping edit and then the delete icon next to the rule

question: Documentos bancarios
answer: Como no podía ser de otra manera, en N26 puedes descargar tu extracto bancario, certificado de titularidad bancaria y más documentos de forma automática. Todos estos documentos son oficiales y perfectamente válidos sin firma:Extracto bancario: es un documento en el que se refleja tu saldo total y todas las transacciones entrantes y salientes de tu cuenta N26, además de tu nombre y apellidos, IBAN y BIC. Aquí te explicamos cómo descargarlo.Certificado de titularidad bancaria: es un documento que confirma que tu cuenta está registrada a tu nombre. Incluye tu nombre y apellidos, fecha de nacimiento, el IBAN de la cuenta, la fecha en que te diste de alta y, opcionalmente, tu saldo actual y número de tarjeta. Aquí te mostramos cómo solicitarlo.Estado de comisiones: es un documento en el que puedes ver detalladamente todas las comisiones que te hemos cobrado como banco durante el último año.Desde la WebApp: haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaña nueva), bajo Estado de Comisiones, selecciona si lo quieres de los últimos 6 o 12 meses y haz clic en Solicitar. Recibirás el PDF en la sección Mensajes dentro de 24 horas.Justificante de pago por transferencia bancaria: es un documento que prueba que has hecho una transferencia. Incluye tu nombre y apellidos, tu dirección registrada en N26, el IBAN y BIC de tu cuenta, el importe, fecha y concepto de la transferencia, nombre y apellidos del beneficiario, su IBAN y su BIC.Desde la app del móvil o la WebApp: en la pantalla de Inicio, elige la transferencia en cuestión y selecciona Confirmación de transferencia. El PDF se genera automáticamente.Justificante de pago con tarjeta: sirve para demostrar o probar que has hecho un pago con tu tarjeta. Puedes hacerlo presentando el extracto bancario del mes en cuestión.RIB (Relevé d'Identité Bancaire en francés): es un documento específico para las autoridades francesas donde se recoge tu información bancaria básica; nombre y apellidos, dirección legal, IBAN y BIC.Desde la WebApp: haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaña nueva), baja hasta el apartado RIB y haz clic en Solicitar.  * El icono de descargas es el cuadrado con una flecha hacia abajo que se encuentra a la izquierda del botón de Ingresar dinero.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You’ll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26’s public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API  & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as “pending” will be classified as “booked” transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We’ve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: How to order my extra card?
answer: Click here, if you would like to replace a card rather than ordering an extra card.How to order an extra card:Login to your N26 accountGo to: ExploreSelect: “Always losing things?” > MastercardChoose your preferred colour and delivery methodTap: Confirm and payThe extra card costs €10 for standard shipping and €25 for express delivery. In order to trigger the production and delivery of the card, you will also need a one-time minimum amount of €10 in your account. For more information on this, click here.ℹ️ The extra card is available for customers with a premium membership (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in the following countries: Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, the Netherlands.

question: How can I pay bills and top-up my phone from the app?
answer: Starting from the 1st of September, it will be possible for all the customers with Italian Terms and Conditions to pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and top-up their phone directly from their mobile app with the N26 debit card.This service is provided in collaboration with PayTipper SpA, a payment institution that has been a partner of the Enel X group since 2019.How to make payments to 3rd parties within the N26 mobile app:Log in to the N26 app and click on "Send money"Select "Other payments"In the menu, select the payment you want to make (Phone top-up, PagoPA, Postal bulletins, MAV or RAV, Car tax)You will then be redirected to the website of that service provider and will be able to perform the paymentThe service is not provided directly by N26 but by the 3rd party service providers. For this reason, by using this payment method, you will be subject to the processing of personal data, terms and conditions and any possible commissions not dependent on N26. In some cases the service might be offered only in Italian.If you need assistance with a payment or would like to receive a payment receipt, please get in contact with the customer support of the service provider you have chosen. Click here to get in touch with PayTipper (new tab)Below you can find customer support contacts for the main Italian network providers (please refer to the respective websites for opening hours and service costs):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

question: How long does it take to send money with Wise?
answer: Once you've initiated your transfer via Wise you'll be given an estimated time frame. When making a transfer, ensure that the recipients name exactly matches the name on their bank account! If a Wise transfer fails, we’ll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.You can't personally cancel a transfer, but if you get in touch with Wise support this way they can cancel the transfer for you. Keep in mind that the transfer can only be cancelled up until the point Wise pays out your funds. Once the money has been sent to the recipient, it's not possible to cancel the transfer anymore.The recipients details can only be changed up until the point that Wise has paid out your money. After your money has been paid out, the recipients details can no longer be changed. You can get in touch with Wise this way.Wise doesn’t charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case Wise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their Conditions of Use (new tab).Common reasons for a failed transfer:Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient’s name or account information).Special characters or too many characters in the recipient’s name or reference field.Limits have been reached or online payments aren’t active in card settings.Foreign currency transfers aren’t possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

question: ¿Cómo hacer la declaración de la renta y pagar impuestos con N26?
answer: N26 es el primer neobanco español que permite a sus clientes efectuar el pago de liquidaciones y deudas a través de la Agencia Tributaria (AEAT) desde la propia app. Esto significa que puedes usar tu cuenta N26 para hacer la declaración de la renta y pagar impuestos como el IVA y el IRPF, entre muchos otros.¿Qué impuestos puedo pagar con mi cuenta N26?Lo primero a tener en cuenta es que este proceso solo aplica a los ejercicios del año 2019 en adelante. A pesar de que N26 sigue sin ser una entidad colaboradora de la Agencia Tributaria, puedes pagar la inmensa mayoría de impuestos. De los más de 700 tributos de la AEAT, puedes pagar todos excepto los modelos: 576, 602, 696, 770, 771, 003, 060, 061, 069, 790, 990, 791 y 991.Por desgracia, todavía no es posible pagar los impuestos de la Seguridad Social, como la cuota de autónomos, ni recibir prestaciones, como el paro o la jubilación.¿Cómo puedo pagar impuestos de la AEAT con N26?Este proceso es igual tanto para clientes con IBAN español (que empieza por ES) como para clientes con IBAN alemán o italiano (que empieza por DE o IT, respectivamente):Clica en el siguiente link (pestaña nueva)para acceder a la página de la AEAT donde podrás rellenar tus datosSigue las instrucciones para cumplimentar el formulario del impuesto y, al elegir la modalidad de pago, selecciona Reconocimiento de deuda y pago por transferencia.En este punto, la AEAT te mostrará los datos bancarios para hacer la transferencia desde N26: IBAN, BIC/SWIFT, importe, concepto y fecha límite de recepción.Vuelve a tu app N26 y selecciona Enviar dinero > Transferencia bancaria.Introduce los datos bancarios de la AEAT y asegúrate de añadir el código indicado como concepto de la transferencia.Selecciona si quieres enviar una transferencia ordinaria o una transferencia inmediata (gratis para clientes premium o 1,99 € para cuentas Estándar).Ten en cuenta que una transferencia ordinaria tardará entre 24 y 48 horas laborables en llegar a la cuenta de destino y saldar la deuda. De modo que si tienes un plazo muy justo, te recomendamos seleccionar la transferencia inmediata.Encuentra aqui una breve explicación visual sobre como pagar impuestos o hacer tu declaración desde la AEAT.Renta 2021 - Opciones de pago (pestaña nueva)

question: What is CASH26?
answer: Available for accounts opened in Spain, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Greece.CASH26 lets you deposit and withdraw money at thousands of retail stores by generating a scannable barcode right in your N26 app––no debit card or ATM required! Just head to one of our CASH26 partner stores, generate your barcode in the N26 app, show it to the cashier to scan, and complete your transaction in-store––it’s that simple. Plus, you don’t have to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash with CASH26. CASH26 is available in:12,100 participating REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam’s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann stores in Germany2,600 participating dm, Billa, Billa Plus, and PENNY Austria stores in Austria2,000 participating Carrefour (Iper, Market, Express), PENNY, and PAM & Panorama stores in Italy1,255 participating BonPreu, Condis, Grupo MAS, Gadisa supermarkets in Spain150 participating Bazaar supermarkets in GreeceFor a step-by-step guide to making deposits and withdrawals with CASH26, check out this article.CASH26 featuresMake cash depositsYou can deposit cash at the cashier of any CASH26 partner store. Keep in mind that your barcode will only be valid for 10 minutes. After that, your barcode will expire and you'll have to generate a new one.Your money will be available for use as soon as your deposit is made, but it can take up to 10 minutes for the deposit to show up on your account balance in the N26 app.How much cash can you deposit with CASH26?The minimum CASH26 deposit is €50 per transaction, and you can deposit up to €999 in a 24-hour period.Regardless of your deposit amount, you’ll be charged a transaction fee of 1.5% on the total amount.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.Withdraw cash without your N26 cardAs soon as you generate the CASH26 barcode in your N26 app, the withdrawal amount will be deducted from your account balance immediately. If you change your mind and decide not to complete your CASH26 withdrawal, simply delete your barcode. The money will be added back to your account balance right away.How much cash can you withdraw with CASH26?The CASH26 withdrawal limit is €200 per transaction, and you can withdraw up to €900 in any 24-hour period. There’s no minimum amount for CASH26 withdrawals.CASH26 withdrawals are free of charge charge except for customers with an N26 Flex account where a fee of €2 applies for each withdrawal.There also is a combined limit for withdrawals and deposits of 999€ per 24 hour.

question: Qu’est-ce qu’un compte N26 Standard ?
answer: Le compte N26 Standard est un compte courant numérique sûr et intuitif que vous pouvez ouvrir en quelques minutes, directement depuis votre smartphone. Il est d’une grande simplicité et transparence, vous permettant de recevoir, d’envoyer et de dépenser de l’argent en toute confiance. Le compte N26 Standard est gratuit*, vous offrant une solution simple et abordable pour tous vos besoins financiers. Que comprend un compte N26 Standard ?Notre compte N26 Standard présente les avantages et fonctionnalités suivants :Compte courant gratuit* : Notre compte N26 Standard est gratuit (*si le solde du compte est de 50 000 € ou plus, des droits de garde peuvent être prélevés).Carte virtuelle N26 : L’ouverture du compte N26 vous donne droit à une carte virtuelle gratuite qui comporte un numéro PAN complet et qui peut être ajoutée à Apple ou Google Pay pour les achats en ligne et en magasin.Carte physique N26 Mastercard : Pour 10 € supplémentaires, vous pouvez recevoir une carte de débit physique N26 Standard (veuillez noter que vous devez disposer d’au moins 10 € sur votre compte pour la fabrication et l’envoi de la carte).Paiements et virements : Vous pouvez effectuer et recevoir des virements SEPA en utilisant votre application mobile N26. Vous pouvez également envoyer de l’argent instantanément à d’autres clients N26 en utilisant Moneybeam.Autres services financiers : Si vous êtes éligible, vous pouvez également demander d’autres services financiers, tels que les découverts autorisés, N26 Crédit, N26 Épargne, etc.CASH26 : Effectuez des retraits et dépôts en utilisant notre fonctionnalité CASH26 (Conditions générales d’utilisation DE, AT et IT).Service Client : Vous pouvez contacter notre incroyable équipe de service client en utilisant le livechat de l’application ou en démarrant un chat depuis notre site internet ou votre espace client N26. Notre nouveau compte N26 Standard vous donne droit à une carte de débit virtuelle gratuite. Un compte N26 Standard actif vous permet d’effectuer des paiements en ligne et en magasin. En outre, vous pouvez ajouter votre carte virtuelle à votre portefeuille Apple ou Google Pay.Vous trouverez les détails de votre carte virtuelle et votre numéro PAN complet dans votre application N26 pour effectuer des achats en ligne.

question: Wie bestelle ich eine extra Karte?
answer: Klicke hier, wenn du deine Karte ersetzen willst, anstatt eine zusätzliche Karte zu bestellen.So kannst du eine extra Karte bestellen:Logge dich in dein N26 Konto einGehe zu: Entdecken Wähle: Zusatzkarte > MastercardWähle deine bevorzugte Farbe und VersandartTippe: Bestätigen und BezahlenDie Zusatzkarte kostet 10€ per Standardversand und 25€ per Expresslieferung. Um die Produktion und Lieferung der Karte auszulösen, benötigst du außerdem einen einmaligen Mindestbetrag in Höhe von 10€ auf deinem Konto. Mehr dazu erfährst du hier.ℹ️ Die Zusatzkarte ist verfügbar für Kunden mit einer Premium-Mitgliedschaft (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You, N26 Business Metal) in den folgenden Ländern: Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Österreich, Dänemark, Island, Liechtenstein, Norwegen, Polen, Schweden, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Griechenland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Niederlande.

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: How to create and manage standing orders?
answer: When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you’ll have the option to make it a standing order.Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:Go to your transaction list (the main screen).Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.ℹ️  Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

question: Warum zahle ich Kirchensteuer?
answer: Wir sind gesetzlich verpflichtet, Daten über kirchensteuerliche Abzüge anzufordern und diese gegebenenfalls vorzunehmen. Dies wird jedes Jahr vom 1. September bis zum 31. Oktober durchgeführt.Du hast das Recht, gegen die Weitergabe von Informationen über deine Religionszugehörigkeit durch das Formular „Erklärung zum Sperrvermerk“ (neuen Tab) Berufung einzulegen. Du kannst dies vor dem 30. Juni eines jeden Jahres tun. Wenn du Widerspruch einlegst, wird dein Finanzamt dich auffordern, eine Kirchensteuererklärung abzugeben.Weitere Informationen findest du auf der Website des Bundeszentralamtes für Steuern (neuen Tab).

question: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business ?
answer:
Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Grèce, Irlande, Islande Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Norvège, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slovénie, Suisse et Suède.Le compte N26 Business est conçu spécialement pour les auto-entrepreneurs et non pour les entreprises ou autres personnes morales. Ce compte permet de gérer vos dépenses professionnelles avec un compte bancaire et une carte de débit à votre nom. Le compte et la carte ne peuvent donc pas porter le nom de votre activité.Pour le moment, il n’est pas possible de passer d’un compte Business à un compte Standard, You ou Metal (ou vice versa). D’emblée, il est donc important de savoir si ce type de compte répond à vos besoins quotidiens.Le compte N26 BusinessCe compte est gratuit et vous bénéficiez, selon votre pays, d’un certain nombre de retraits mensuels gratuits en distributeurs d’après notre Politique d’Utilisation Équitable.Le compte N26 Business vous permet de :recevoir, en votre nom, les paiements de vos clients.régler vos dépenses professionnelles (déplacements ou fournitures) ou votre loyer professionnel, toujours en votre nom. bénéficier de toutes les fonctionnalités et avantages offerts par le compte N26 Standard. Quelques points à considérer :Les virements en devises étrangères ne sont pas possibles depuis l'application N26 avec un compte Business. 
Si vous souhaitez toutefois faire un virement en devises étrangères, vous pouvez le faire en vous rendant sur le site de Wise (nouvel onglet) en y créant un compte professionnel. Pour le moment, les prélèvements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business. La carte Mastercard N26 BusinessLa carte Mastercard du compte N26 Business est uniquement destinée à un usage à des fins commerciales. Vous recevez chaque mois 0,1 % de remise en argent ou cashback sur vos paiements effectués avec cette carte. Le montant du cashback est calculé de façon mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois. Il faut alors compter jusqu’à 7 jours avant que le montant du cashback apparaisse sur votre relevé de compte.Si vous avez besoin d'une carte supplémentaire pour vos achats privés, nous vous conseillons d'opter pour la carte Maestro (disponible en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas).

question: Marketing Communication Settings
answer: As a N26 customer, you can toggle our Marketing Communications on or off within the N26 mobile & web apps, allowing you to choose whether or not you would like to receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, as well as, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations. You can access the Marketing Communications Settings in the mobile & web app as follows:My AccountApp SettingsMarketing CommunicationsBelow you will find an explanation on each marketing communications toggle so you can better manage your desired settings. You can find information on the associated data processing in the N26 privacy policy.Push NotificationsWhen you enable the push notifications toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via push notifications. When you disable the push notifications toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via push notifications. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via push notifications. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive push notifications containing information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). In-App Updates:When you enable the in-app updates toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via in-app updates, which are small banners seamlessly displayed within the transaction feed. When you disable the in-app updates toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via in-app updates. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via in-app updates. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive in-app updates on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Emails:When you enable the emails toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via emails. When you disable the emails toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via email. Please note: Enabling/disabling the toggle only affects content related to personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations but has no effect on any other content you may receive via emails. Therefore, even when you turn this toggle off, you will still receive emails on information which is relevant to your usage of your N26 bank account (e.g. recent transactions, new features of your bank account). Support chat:When you enable the support chat toggle, you will receive personalised offers for N26 products and features, updates about N26 partner deals and other recommendations via support chat, e.g. towards the end of a conversation with the N26 customer service. When you disable the support chat toggle, you will no longer receive the above mentioned content via support chat. Please note: This toggle has no effect on your accessibility to the N26 customer service, including the N26 support chat. You will in any case still be able to access the customer support chat and will receive support upon your inquiries. Marketing Partners:When you enable the Marketing Partners toggle, you agree that N26 can send your hashed email address to our Marketing Partners (Google Ireland Limited & Facebook Ireland Limited) in order to exclude you from N26 advertisements and to help N26 better define their audience groups. If you turn this toggle off, N26 will not send your email address to our Marketing Partners and you may receive N26 advertisements that are irrelevant for you. Please also refer to this article for further information on Marketing Partners.

question: Was ist Phishing?
answer: Phishing ist eine einfache und wirksame Methode, mit der Hacker Menschen dazu bringen, sensible persönliche Daten preiszugeben. Sobald sie an diese Informationen gelangt sind, können sie diese für verschiedene Betrügereien nutzen, indem sie im Namen ihrer Opfer auftreten. (neuen Tab) Hier (neuen Tab) kannst du mehr darüber erfahren. In unserem Blogbeitrag erklären wir dir, wie du Phishing-Angriffe erkennen und dich davor schützen kannst.Wie du verdächtige E-Mails und Textnachrichten meldestN26 versendet niemals Textnachrichten oder E-Mails, die dringliche Warnungen enthalten und dich dazu auffordern, dich in dein Konto einzuloggen und persönliche Daten herauszugeben. Wir stellen dir niemals ein Ultimatum, noch bitten wir dich je darum, dich außerhalb unserer sicheren Kommunikationskanäle zu authentifizieren oder deine Daten zu verifizieren.Verdächtige E-MailsKlicke keine Links an und lade keine Anhänge herunter, wenn du eine verdächtige E-Mail erhältst. Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich:die verdächtigen E-Mails unter support@n26.com an uns weiterzuleitenODERdie verdächtige E-Mail wenn möglich als „eml“-Datei zu speichern und an uns zu senden. Die meisten E-Mail-Anbieter speichern die Datei automatisch in diesem Format, wenn du sie herunterlädst. Wenn du uns die verdächtige E-Mail in diesem Format zusendest, können wir den wahren Ursprung der Nachricht ermitteln und den Vorfall den zuständigen Behörden melden. Wenn du Schwierigkeiten hast, die E-Mail in diesem Format zu speichern: kein Problem. Leite dann die verdächtigen E-Mails einfach an die obige Adresse weiter. Bitte sende uns keine Screenshots, da wir damit nichts anfangen können. Lösche danach die E-Mail aus deinem Postfach.Verdächtige TextnachrichtenKlicke keine Links an und gib keine Daten ein, wenn du eine verdächtige Textnachricht erhältst.Um uns bei unseren Nachforschungen zu helfen, bitten wir dich: einen Screenshot der erhaltenen Nachricht zu machen und an support@n26.com zu senden;achte bitte darauf, dass die komplette Nachricht, einschließlich Telefonnummer des Absenders und Datum/Uhrzeit, sichtbar ist;blockiere die Telefonnummer, wenn du eine Bestätigung von uns erhältst, dass es sich um eine Phishing-Nachricht handelt;lösche die Nachricht von deinem Mobiltelefon. Verdächtige TelefonanrufeWenn du einen verdächtigen Anruf erhältst, unabhängig davon, ob dieser von einer unserer Telefonnummern ausgeht oder nicht, gib keine personenbezogenen Daten an, die sich auf dein Konto oder die damit verbundene Karte beziehen. Wir weisen darauf hin, dass Betrüger in einigen Fällen mit der "Spoofing"-Technologie die Telefonnummer des Absenders verschleiern können, so dass diese so aussieht wie die Telefonnummer der Bank.Wenn du also den Verdacht hast, dass du einem Telefonbetrug zum Opfer gefallen bist oder deine persönlichen Daten weitergegeben hast, wende dich bitte umgehend an unseren Kundenservice unter support@n26.com.Wie du eine gefälschte Website meldestMöglicherweise findest du dich irgendwann einmal auf einer fragwürdigen Website wieder, die vorgibt, im Namen von N26 für Dienstleistungen zu werben. Oder du siehst unser Logo auf vermeintlichen Partnerseiten. Möglicherweise bieten sie Kredite an oder zeitlich begrenzte Werbeangebote. Bitte behalte Folgendes im Hinterkopf: Die Tatsache, dass „N26“ Bestandteil einer URL ist, bedeutet nicht unbedingt, dass die Webseite seriös ist.Wenn du vermutest, dass du dich auf einer betrügerischen Webseite befindest, solltest du einen Moment innehalten und Folgendes tun:Überprüfe die Adresszeile und vergewissere dich, dass die URL https://app.n26.com/login lautet. Ist das nicht der Fall, kopiere die URL bitte und melde sie sogleich hier: support@n26.com.

question: Kann ich meine Karte mit Expressversand schneller bekommen?
answer: Die Expresslieferung ist eine gute Wahl, wenn du deine Karte schnell benötigst. Wenn du deine erste Karte bestellst oder eine neue Karte bestellst, steht auch die Option Expressversand zur Verfügung. Die Karte ist nicht nur schneller bei dir, du erhältst auch noch einen Tracking-Link per E-Mail. Wenn du bei der Zustellung nicht zu Hause bist und dein Postfach nicht erreichbar ist, wird die Karte an einen Zugangspunkt in deiner Nähe geliefert (den du über den Tracking-Link findest). Die Karte bleibt nur für eine begrenzte Zeit dort, danach wird sie an uns zurückgesandt. Wir informieren dich in diesem Fall per E-Mail.Wenn du die Expresslieferung wählst, beachte bitte:Deine N26 Standard-, N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Karte wird innerhalb von drei Werktagen ausgeliefert. Die Zustellung erfolgt zwischen 8 und 12 Uhr.Lieferungen können per DHL Express in alle von uns unterstützten Länder innerhalb Europas erfolgen. Lieferungen in andere Länder sind derzeit nicht möglich.Wenn Expresslieferung als Versandart ausgewählt wurde, kann die Lieferung nicht storniert oder geändert werden.Falls du die Expresslieferung gewählt hast und dein Konto nun schließen willst, wird die Gebühr für die Expresslieferung dennoch fällig.Wenn deine Karte nicht innerhalb von 3-5 Werktagen nach deiner Bestellung eingetroffen ist, überprüfe bitte den Tracking-Link auf mögliche Updates. Du kannst den Tracking-Link auch verwenden, um DHL direkt über die Details deiner Lieferadresse zu informieren oder die Sendung umzuleiten, wenn du zum Zeitpunkt der Lieferung nicht zuhause bist.Bei N26 Standard und N26 You kostet eine neue Karte 10€ inklusive Standardversand oder 30€, wenn du dich für eine Expresslieferung entscheidest. Wie viel kostet die Expresslieferung?N26 Standard, N26 Smart & N26 YOU-Karten:Erste Karte bei Kontoeröffnung: 25€Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 30€N26-YOU-Zusatzkarte: 30€N26 Metal-Karten:Erste Karte bei Kontoeröffnung: 25€Bestellung einer neuen Karte: 65€

question: Come bloccare la mia carta N26?
answer: Puoi bloccare e sbloccare le tue carte in qualsiasi momento nell’app. Accedi, seleziona Carte e poi Impostazioni della carta. Qui puoi decidere se vuoi limitare temporaneamente o disattivare i prelievi bancomat, i pagamenti online o all’estero, o bloccare del tutto la carta di debito.In questo modo hai il pieno controllo della tua carta e puoi proteggerti da transazioni non autorizzate. In caso di sospetto, blocca immediatamente la carta. Puoi sempre sbloccarla successivamente.Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

question: How to change my phone number?
answer: It’s important to keep your personal data up to date, for example, your phone number is necessary to connect your smartphone or to send and receive MoneyBeams. Here's how you can change it in your app:Go to: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Personal InformationTo be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account (new tab).

question: How does N26 protect my money?
answer: Compensation Scheme:The 'Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks (new tab)' (new tab)protects all deposits up to €100.000 held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank is legally required to be a member of a compensation scheme. N26 is a member of the Compensation Scheme of German Private Banks.How does N26 detect and monitor fraud? N26 has a specialised team focused on monitoring and identifying suspicious transactions on our platform. With the help of advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavioural analysis, our team of experts help ensure that your money is always in safe hands.What does N26 do when fraudulent behaviour is detected within its customer base?When our team of experts detect irregular activity, we take all mitigation measures, as per regulatory law, to prevent further damage - this includes: closing and reporting offending accounts to the authorities. When suspicious transactions indicate the existence of money laundering, terrorist financing, or any other criminal offence, N26 immediately reports these activities to the German Financial Transaction Investigation Unit (FIU) or local supervisory entities.What are some of the ways that N26 has invested in security?In late 2019, we built our Trust and Safety team. They work within IT Security and their job is to safeguard users, their accounts and their data, against cybercriminals. Additionally, N26 doubled the size of its AML team and financial crime unit, and established new transaction monitoring processes and platforms. These enable us to detect and prevent malicious activity based on historical data, which ultimately allows us to remain several steps ahead of malicious actors. We invest heavily in technology and AI to run advanced statistical models and algorithms, alongside human behavior analysis.

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come. With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we’re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We’re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account. Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: Comment passer au compte bancaire N26 Smart ?
answer: ℹ️ N26 Smart est disponible dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Grèce, Irlande, Islande, Italie, Lettonie, Liechtenstein, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Norvège, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slovénie, Suède.Vous pouvez souscrire au compte premium N26 Smart :lors de l’ouverture de votre comptesi vous avez déjà un compte bancaire N26 Standard :accédez simplement à l’onglet Découvrir.Sélectionnez N26 Smart.Lors de votre commande, vous pouvez choisir l’une des cinq couleurs disponibles pour votre carte bancaire : Rhubarbe, Océan, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.Ensuite, indiquez la méthode de livraison de votre choix, acceptez les Conditions générales de N26 Smart et votre nouvelle carte sera en route.Bon à savoir :La livraison standard a un délai de 15 jours ouvrés maximum.La (nouvel onglet) livraison express vous permet de recevoir votre carte N26 sous 3 jours ouvrés.Les frais d’adhésion de 4,90 € sont prélevés directement de votre compte N26 chaque mois, en fonction de la date de votre souscription à N26 Smart.Vous pouvez commander une carte supplémentaire N26 Smart directement depuis l’application N26, moyennant un paiement unique de 10 €.

question: Comment bloquer la bande magnétique de ma carte ?
answer: Il y a différentes manières de payer par carte bancaire : sans contact (en approchant votre carte du terminal), avec le code PIN, avec la bande magnétique de votre carte en glissant votre carte dans un lecteur. Même si les transactions effectuées avec la bande magnétique sont de moins en moins communes, certains commerçants vous demandent encore de payer avec ce mode de paiement.Pourquoi devrais-je bloquer mes transactions avec bande magnétique ?Les paiements avec bande magnétique représentent une grande partie des fraudes à la carte bancaire. Certains commerçants ont des systèmes frauduleux qui copient les informations de votre carte pour ensuite les utiliser afin d’effectuer des transactions frauduleuses, ce processus est appelé « clonage de carte ». En bloquant les transactions avec bande magnétique, vous pouvez vous protéger de ces risques de fraudes.Comment puis-je bloquer/débloquer mes transactions avec bande magnétique ?Pour bloquer vos transactions avec bande magnétique : Accédez à Cartes. Si vous avez plusieurs cartes, il vous suffit de balayer à droite avec votre doigt sur l’écran jusqu’à ce que vous trouviez la carte que vous souhaitez.Sélectionnez Paramètres de la carte.Cliquez sur bande magnétique.Basculer l’option Activer la bande magnétique.Ici, vous pouvez aussi désactiver la bande magnétique. Les changements effectués sont directement appliqués sur la carte que vous avez choisie.

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10€N26 Metal cards: 45€Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30€N26 Metal: 65€Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: Round-Up Savings
answer: allows Premium customers to have each card transaction they make rounded up to the nearest euro, with the difference transferred to a Space of your choice.Round-Ups will not put you into overdraft. If you don't have sufficient balance to cover the Round-Up, the Round-Up will not take place.You can only have one Round-Up active at a time moving money into one Space of your choiceYou can disable the Round-Up feature at any pointIf you closes a Space that has Round-Ups enabled on it, the Round-Ups feature will be turned off until they enable it again.How to use ?Enabling Round-Up is quick and easy, just log into the N26 mobile application or Webapp:Go to 'Spaces'.Select the 'Space' that you want the Round-Up to go into.Tap/Click on 'Manage' --> 'Manage round-ups'.Set the 'Manage round-ups' toggle to green.Choose your multiplier, then tap/click on 'Confirm'.Start saving with your next N26 debit card purchase!

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier. You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
answer: We have partnered with Wise to make foreign currency transfers easy. Wise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees. For N26 Business, Business You or Business Metal, foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible, nor are transfers to businesses.Wise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer. For detailed information about eligible recipients, please check Wise's available currencies (new tab).To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app:From the home screen choose 'Send money'.Select 'Foreign Currency Transfer'.Select the desired currency and enter the amount you would like to send in € (it will automatically convert into the foreign currency below). After that, you add a new recipient or select an existing payee.Finalise the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.If we don’t currently offer the foreign currency (new tab) you need, please visit Wise (new tab) for more currency options. To gain access to your Wise account for the first time: Go to the Wise (new tab)website and go to the login page. Enter your N26 account email and select 'Forgot password?'.You’ll receive an email from Wise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there. Please note that in order for this process to work, you need to create a Wise profile via the N26 app first, meaning that you need to try to go through the in-app foreign currency transfer flow. Otherwise you won't receive an email from Wise to reset the password.Wise supports transfers in a country's primary currency only. This means, for example, that no USD transactions can be processed to India.

question: How does N26 Business Smart work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.The N26 Business Smart account costs €4,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Smart?A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions.Cashback: Pay with your N26 Mastercard and get 0.1% cashback every month. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.It’s not yet possible to switch between accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business Smart is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Smart:If you upgrade to N26 Business Smart, your membership fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Business Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s availale in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business Smart. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
answer: We collaborate with many partners. That’s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn’t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).You’re taxable in the United States. If so, you won’t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).The product or service is not yet available in your country.

question: Wo kann ich kostenlos Bargeld abheben?
answer: Mit deiner N26-Mastercard hast du eine bestimmte Anzahl kostenloser Abhebungen am Geldautomaten gemäß unserer Fair-Use-Policy.Außerdem kannst du den Mastercard ATM Locator (neuen Tab) benutzen, um kostenlose Geldautomaten zu finden.Abhebungen via CASH26 sind immer kostenlos in teilnehmenden Partnergeschäften.*Kunden in Spanien: Einige Geldautomatenbetreiber in Spanien erheben eine unabhängige Gebühr von ca. 2€. Diese Gebühr können wir nicht verhindern, aber wir erstatten sie zurück, wenn du in im per Chat in deiner App kontaktierst. In der Zwischenzeit kannst du bei den folgenden Banken kostenfrei Geld abheben:AbancaArquiaBanco CaminosBanco PichinchaCaixa OntinyentCaja de IngenierosCajasurCarrefourDeutsche BankEVO BancoIbercajaINGKutxabankOpenbankUnicaja Hier findest du weitere Gründe, warum Ihnen eine Geldautomatengebühr berechnet werden könnte.

question: Was genau sind Karten für Spaces?
answer:
Mit unserer neuen Funktion Karten für Spaces kannst du deine individuellen Unterkonten mit einer eigenen N26-Karte verknüpfen, sodass Zahlungen von dem verknüpften Space-Unterkonto abgerechnet werden.
Wie funktioniert das?Mit Karten für Spaces können N26 Nutzer mit einem Premiumabo (N26 Smart, You oder Metal) ihre physische oder digitale N26-Karte mit einem Space-Unterkonto verknüpfen und das Guthaben auf dem Unterkonto für persönliche Ausgaben nutzen. Im Folgenden erhältst du einen Überblick über die vielen Möglichkeiten, deine N26-Karte mit deinen Spaces zu verknüpfen: Du kannst deine N26-Karte mit einem deiner Spaces und wieder mit deinem Hauptkonto verknüpfen.Du kannst mehrere Karten mit einem Space oder mit verschiedenen Spaces verknüpfenWenn du eine physische N26 Mastercard mit einem Space verknüpfst, kannst du mit dieser Karte automatisch Apple und Google Pay nutzen. (Dies gilt nicht für Maestro-Karten.)Die Funktion steht noch nicht für Shared Spaces zur Verfügung.Wie verknüpfe ich meine Karte mit einem Space?Du kannst deine bestehenden digitalen und physischen Karten mit deinem gewählten Space verknüpfen.Dafür gibt es 3 Möglichkeiten:Im Tab Karten siehst du unter jeder Karte die Schaltfläche, mit der du den gewünschten Space auswählen kannst.In den Karteneinstellungen kannst du auch den gewünschten Space auswählen und diesen mit deiner Karte verknüpfen.In den Einstellungen jedes Spaces kannst du die Karte auswählen, die mit dem jeweiligen Space verknüpft werden soll.Immer wenn du deine Karte mit deinem Hauptkonto oder einem anderen Space verknüpfen möchtest, wählst du einfach "Hauptkonto" oder den anderen Space im Dropdown-Menü aus.

question: How to cancel my N26 premium membership?
answer: N26 Smart, N26 You or N26 Metal contracts have an initial term of one year with an automatic renewal after the first 12 months, and then move to an indefinite contract term. You can choose to stop this automatic renewal at any time during the first 12 months of your contract.After this renewal, the contract becomes indefinite - but you can cancel your membership at any time.In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period (this is a legal time frame, you can request this by contacting us).Stop your membership renewal at any time before the end of the first 12-month contract by contacting us via chat.Cancel your membership at any time (you can cancel immediately at any time without limitation by contacting us via chat).Premium to Premium downgradeIf you want, you’re now able to downgrade to another Premium account without having to downgrade to Standard, and so keeping all your Spaces, round-up rules, income sorter, and existing card and payments.To do so, login to your mobile app, go to My Account and open your Membership details. Select Modify Membership and you’ll then be able to choose another Premium Membership that suits your needs. RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. This period starts as soon as the first monthly fee is charged. Simply contact us and we'll assist you from there. If you revoke any of our Premium membership tiers, you will be able to upgrade again to the same or another tier.Stop the renewal of your membershipYour N26 premium membership has an initial 12-month contract period.  At the end of the first 12 months the membership will automatically renew and move to an indefinite contract period, unless you contact us and ask to stop the renewal.You can request this at any time before your 12-month renewal date, and we’ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you choose to stop your renewal, you can continue to use your N26 Mastercard and all your premium membership benefits until your membership expires. That means you’ll keep your insurance coverage (for N26 You and N26 Metal) for as long as you’re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, a Virtual card will be issued to you on the contract anniversary date immediately upon downgrade. There is a minimum balance requirement of €10. No need to contact us about it, it will be processed automatically.Cancel your membership at any timeIf you want to terminate your membership at any time after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us. If you choose this option with N26 You or N26 Metal, your insurance benefits will stop and your Smart, You and Metal Premium cards will also be deactivated.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.FAQs about the N26 Premium subscription cancellationDo I have to close my account to cancel my Premium subscription?No, you can simply change your subscription in the N26 app and your new account will be set up immediately.What happens to my IBAN if I cancel my Premium subscription?Changing your subscription does not affect your bank details, so your IBAN will remain unchanged.

question: Was sind “Nachrichten”?
answer: Die Sicherheit deiner Daten hat für uns höchste Priorität. Deshalb haben wir einen Posteingang direkt in deiner N26 App erstellt, an den wir Nachrichten schicken können. Alle Inhalte, die personenbezogene Daten enthalten, werden an Nachrichten geschickt. Deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse benutzen wir weiterhin für allgemeine Informationen. Was sind personenbezogene Daten?Personenbezogene Daten sind solche Daten, die dich identifizierbar machen oder anhand derer man dich identifizieren könnte. Dazu zählen deine Kontodaten, deine Adresse (E-Mail oder postalisch), Ausweisdokumente, Meldebescheinigung, aber auch Mitteilungen über anfallende Dispokreditzinsen oder über Daueraufträge.Wie funktioniert’s?Wenn wir dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken, erhältst du eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknüpften Gerät und eine E-Mail an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn du dich in die WebApp einloggst, wirst du ebenfalls durch eine Info-Karte über neue Nachrichten informiert.Wir werden dir eine Nachricht an Nachrichten schicken und bitten dich, direkt von dort zu antworten.Diese Funktion ist in unserer mobilen App verfügbar, indem du oben rechts auf das Support-Symbol klickst. Stelle sicher, dass du die neueste Version der N26 App installiert hast.Du kannst keine E-Mail-Unterhaltung starten, aber du kannst antworten, sobald wir dir die erste Nachricht geschickt haben. Wenn es darum geht, uns ein Dokument zu schicken, wähle Datei anhängen. Bitte stelle sicher, dass die gesamte Größe der Anhänge pro Nachricht nicht größer ist als 25 MB.Nachrichten ersetzt nicht unseren Live Chat und du kannst uns weiterhin per E-Mail von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse kontaktieren. Wie du als erstes mit uns in Kontakt treten kannst, erfährst du in unserem Artikel: Wie kontaktiere ich N26? Falls wir dich für dein Anliegen verifizieren müssen, bitten wir dich, einen Chat mit uns zu starten.

question: Which foreign exchange rate will I get?
answer:
When you use your N26 card to place transactions in foreign currencies, Mastercard’s exchange rates will be applied to the full purchase amount.Good news: N26 doesn’t charge any extra fees for foreign transactions!You can check Mastercard’s rates here: https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/personal/get-support/convert-currency.html (new tab)
You can check the exchange rate and currency markup rate applied to a past transaction on N26 app and website via transaction details on the feed.Please be aware that exchange rates are dynamic, so the transaction value can change until the final purchase amount is charged due to currency variation.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
answer:
BackgroundThe second EU Payment Services Directive (PSD2) introduces some changes to payment services within the European Union. The objective of PSD2 is to create a more uniform, transparent and open EU payment market and bring innovation, competition and security to all the market players.If you are a third-party service provider seeking access to N26 PSD2 interfaces, you must be licensed by a national regulatory authority. In Germany, this is the Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. You’ll also need a qualified certificate (QWAC). Such certificates can be obtained from Qualified Trusted Service Providers (QTSP (new tab)).Dedicated InterfaceOur dedicated interface is the REST API which conforms to Berlin Group Implementation Guidelines version 1.3.6 (new tab) and we also provide a testing environment called Sandbox, with the same specification for testing purposes.Authorisation protocol: oAuth 2.0 (new tab).Note: A valid QWAC Certificate is required to access the Berlin Group API. The official list of QTSP is available on the European Commission eIDAS Trusted List (new tab). For the N26 PSD2 Dedicated Interface API, the QWAC Certificate must be issued from a production certificate authority.Contingency Mechanism As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following:Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);Secure and authorised access to an accountTPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deAccess to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.DocumentationTPPs can find the following documentation in N26’s public GitHub repository (new tab):AISP & PISP documentation for the Dedicated InterfaceAccess documentation for SandboxAISP & PISP documentation for the Fallback InterfaceOpen API  & Sandbox postman collectionFAQsWe advise that TPPs refer to the repository for the latest information regarding technical documentation and specification.For inquiries and support related to N26 Open Banking, please use this form (new tab).Interface Availability and Performance DataThe reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the PSU interface:Q3 2019 (new tab) / Q4 2019 (new tab)
Q1 2020 (new tab) / Q2 2020 (new tab) / Q3 2020 (new tab) / Q4 2020 (new tab)Recent News*For any API changes communicated below, we ask that you kindly refer to our API documentation and FAQs for more details, and make any required changes to your systems in advance, to avoid any disruptions to your use of our interface(s).**If you would like to be directly informed of any upcoming changes, kindly subscribe to our mailing list here (new tab).August 26, 2022 SEPA and SEPA instant transfers can now be initiated without specifying the debtor account, in the Dedicated InterfaceAugust 01, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Fallback InterfaceJuly 29, 2022 Funds confirmation endpoints are now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceJune 30, 2022 Initiation of SEPA instant transfers is now supported in the Dedicated InterfaceMay 17, 2022 New Spaces endpoint /api/v3/spaces is live in the AIS Fallback Interface; old Spaces endpoint /api/spaces will be disabled from Aug 17th, 2022.April 25, 2022 the additional Information field has been included in the transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, as an ID that links all card transactions related to a single purchase.Jan 24, 2022 the following parameters will be added to transaction information we provide, in the Dedicated Interface, from Apr 25th, 2022: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured. Dec 13, 2021 transactions previously classified as “pending” will be classified as “booked” transactions, in the Dedicated Interface, from Mar 14th, 2022.Nov 17, 2021 /api/v2/spaces endpoint in AIS Fallback Interface disabled.Feb 3, 2021 token.io interface (deprecated from Nov 4, 2020) will be fully disabled from Mar 1st, 2021 Nov 4, 2020 The N26 PSD2 PISP Open Banking API has been released (Berlin Group 1.3.6 conformity). Token.io interface is deprecated.Oct 22, 2020 We’ve just released the brand-new version of our PSD2 AISP Open Banking API, compliant with the Berlin Group 1.3.6 specification.

question: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
answer: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte étranger ouvert, utilisé ou fermé).Complete the Cerfa n° 3916 (new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.Find more detailed information on this article (new tab) in our blog.

question: ¿Qué beneficios tiene N26 You?
answer: Tarjeta Mastercard física de N26 gratuita: Elige entre cinco nuevos colores cuando pidas la tarjeta: pomelo, océano, arena, aguamarina y grafito.Tarjeta virtual adicional: ¡Pide una tarjeta virtual adicional gratis en la app!Tarjeta física adicional: Pide una tarjeta física N26 You adicional por una comisión única de 10 € a través de la app N26.Espacios: 10 Espacios (subcuentas) adicionales para organizar tus finanzas.Espacios Compartidos: Invita a amigos a tus Espacios (subcuentas) para que compartan y administren dinero contigo.Asistencia telefónica especial: Contacta con nuestra línea de atención al cliente si tienes alguna pregunta. Retiradas en cajeros gratuitas en todo el mundo: Paga con tu Mastercard de N26 You online y en establecimientos, evita comisiones ocultas y disfruta de cero comisiones por transacciones en el extranjero en todo el mundo. También puedes retirar dinero en efectivo de forma gratuita en cualquier divisa en cajeros de todo el mundo.Paquete de seguros de Allianz Global Assistance*: Un seguro que incluye un amplio abanico de prestaciones personales y financieras, como:Seguro de viaje: Indemnización de gastos médicos en el extranjero, por cancelaciones de viaje tras una emergencia médica, gastos ocasionados por un retraso de más de 4 horas, gastos en caso de retraso de más de 6 horas del equipaje facturado y gastos de repatriación médica.Salvamento en nieve y montaña: Cubre los gastos de búsqueda, salvamento, primer transporte y gastos médicos en caso de accidente durante un viaje de montaña.Compartir vehículos, bicicletas y scooters: Cobertura por daños o robo de vehículos alquilados a empresas de vehículos compartidos.¡Puedes comparar N26 YOU (pestaña nueva) con nuestros otros planes para ver cuál es la que mejor se ajusta a ti!Si estás pensando en suscribirte a N26 You (pestaña nueva), recuerda:La tarjeta N26 You Mastercard no tiene grabado en relieve: los detalles de la tarjeta, incluído el número, el código CVV y el token de 10 dígitos están impresos en negro.Si te pasas a N26 You tendrás una mensualidad de 9,90€ y será deducida directamente del saldo de tu cuenta en N26 cada mes empezando el día que te suscribas. Si eres un nuevo cliente, la primera mensualidad será debitada 15 días después de que verifiques tu identidad. A partir de ahí se te cobrará la comisión mensualmente el día que te suscribiste.A partir de ahora, puedes decidir si quieres pagar la comisión premium cada mes o de antemano durante los próximos 6 meses o 1 año del contrato. Si escoges la opción de prepago, obtendrás un descuento del precio mensual de tu cuenta premium (Smart/You/Metal), que será proporcional al periodo de facturación que quieras abonar.Cuando contrates la cuenta, encontrarás las opciones de facturación con prepago y los costes relacionados en la app N26.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe nombre comercial de AWP P&C S.A. - Sucursal holandesa y miembro de Allianz Group.

question: Do I have to declare my N26 account in Spain?
answer: The Agencia Tributaria offers assistance to those who need to declare their taxes and assets in a foreign country.   In regards to your N26 account, this will depend on the type of IBAN you have: If you have a Spanish IBAN (starting with ES), your account is Spanish and you don’t need to declare it. If you have a German IBAN (starting with DE), your account and money is situated in Germany. In this case you would be obligated to declare it, following specific legal requirements. To know if one of the above scenarios applies to your N26 account, I’d recommend that you inquire with a professional in regards to this matter as we’re not eligible to give tax advice.  Read more information about this in the official website of the Agencia Tributaria (new tab).

question: Wie kann ich zu Metal upgraden?
answer: Verfügbar in Deutschland, Österreich, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Irland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Polen, Schweden, Dänemark, Norwegen, Island, Liechtenstein.Wenn du bereits ein N26 Standard-Konto hast, oder ein N26 Smart / N26 You Mitglied bist, kannst du in der App auf N26 Metal upgraden: Um dich zu upgraden, logge dich einfach in die App ein, tippe auf den "Entdecken" am unteren Bildschirmrand und wähle dann "Entdecke N26 Metal". Du kannst zwischen einer Karte in Quarzrosa, Platingrau oder Carbonschwarz wählen.Nachdem du deine bevorzugte Versandmethode und die Farbe (Quarzrosa, Platingrau oder Carbonschwarz) ausgewählt hast, musst du nur noch die N26 Metal AGB (neuen Tab) akzeptieren und den Auftrag mit deiner Bestätigungs-PIN abschließen. Schon ist deine Karte auf dem Weg!Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu 15 Werktage.Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 16,90 € wird jeden Monat von deinem Konto abgebucht, gezählt ab dem Tag deines Upgrades.Alle Käufe und Reisen, die du mit deiner N26 You Mastercard bezahlt hast, bleiben versichert.Wenn du bereits N26 You Mitglied bist, musst du die You-Gebühren nicht zusätzlich zahlen.Du kannst eine zusätzlich N26 You-Karte für eine einmalige Gebühr von 10€ in deiner N26 App bestellen.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to reorder a card?
answer: If you are already waiting for a card, please wait until the estimated delivery time has elapsed. You can check it on the home screen of your mobile app.You can request a new card in case yours is lost, broken, stolen or if there is a problem with the sending of your first card (new tab).If you need to reorder a card, please check your shipping details: 👤 My Account > Personal Details > Addresses > Shipping address.It must be a residential address (business addresses are not accepted).Your name must be on the mailbox (If a different name is on the mailbox, please add it to the additional address info in your mobile app).Enter your postal code without any spaces.If applicable, add your building number, stairwell number and door code to the additional address info in your mobile app.If your address contains special characters then please contact our customer service from within the app.If you are moving soon then consider the express delivery option and make sure to select the country and address where you will be moving.If your very first N26 card did not arrive within the estimated timeframe then please open a live chat from within the mobile or web app and we will help you from there.If you had an activated card before then follow these steps:Go to the 'Home Screen' and then 'Cards'.From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder.Then tap 'Card Settings'.Finally, select 'Reorder'.Use your card before it physically arrives:Before your N26 card even arrives in the mail, you can begin using it through your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet. This way you can make purchases with your smartphone at merchants that support this payment method. Learn more about this option in our dedicated article (new tab).How much does it cost to reorder my card?Standard delivery:N26 Standard, N26 Smart and N26 You cards: 10€N26 Metal cards: 45€Express Delivery:N26 Standard and N26 You cards: 30€N26 Metal: 65€Please note: If you're waiting for your first card and your shipping address is correct then please contact our customer service.

question: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business You ?
answer: Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Irlande, Islande, Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Norvège, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slovénie et Suède.N26 Business You coûte 9,90 € par mois et est conçu pour les auto-entrepreneurs et les indépendants qui exercent leur activité en nom propre. Le nom de votre société ne peut donc pas figurer sur votre compte ou votre carte.Une Mastercard N26 physique gratuite : Choisissez entre cinq nouvelles couleurs en commandant votre carte : Rhubarbe, Océan, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.Une carte virtuelle supplémentaire : Commandez une carte virtuelle supplémentaire gratuitement dans votre application !Une carte physique en plus : Commandez une carte physique N26 You supplémentaire pour la somme de 10€ via votre application.Espaces : 10 Espaces en plus (sous-comptes) pour organiser vos finances.Espaces Partagés : Invitez vos amis à partager un Espace (sous-comptes) pour gérer vos fonds à plusieurs.Une ligne téléphonique dédiée : Contactez notre Service Client dédié par téléphine si vous avez la moindre question.Retraits d'espèces gratuits dans le monde entier : Payez avec votre Mastercard N26 You en ligne ou en magasin, évitez les frais cachés et profitez d'une absence totale de frais de transaction dans le monde entier.
