Vous pourrez aussi retirer des espèces gratuitement en devises dans des DAB partout autour du globe.Des offres partenaires exclusives (nouvel onglet) : Profitez d'offres partenaires premium et de remises pour des marques de classe mondiale.Ensemble d’assurances proposées par Allianz Global Assistance* : Une assurance qui inclut une large gamme d’avantages personnels et financiers tels que :Assurance-voyage : Remboursement des frais médicaux à l’étranger, des frais liés aux annulations de voyage après une urgence médicale, des frais engagés en cas de retard de vol de plus de 4 heures, des frais en cas de retard de bagages enregistrés de plus de 6 heures et des frais d’expatriation sanitaire.Sauvetage dans la neige et en montagne : Profitez d’une couverture pour les frais de recherche, de sauvetage, de premier transport et les frais médicaux en cas d’accident lors d’un séjour en montagne.Voitures, vélos et scooters en libre-service : Couverture en cas de dommages ou de vol de véhicules loués auprès de sociétés de moyens de transport en libre-service.Pour l’instant, il n’est pas possible de passer d’une offre de compte personnel à un compte Business (ou vice versa). Il est donc important de savoir si le compte N26 Business You correspond à vos besoins (nouvel onglet).Important :Votre compte N26 Business You ne vous permet pas d’effectuer de virements en devises étrangères directement depuis l'application N26. Si vous souhaitez effectuer des virements en devises étrangères, vous pouvez vous rendre directement sur le site internet de TransferWise ou le faire depuis leur application mobile. Veuillez noter que pour effectuer des virements à titre professionnel, vous aurez besoin de créer un compte pour entreprise depuis votre espace en ligne TransferWise.La carte N26 Business You est une Mastercard conçue exclusivement pour une utilisation professionnelle. Vous bénéficiez de 0,1 % de cashback sur tous vos achats effectués avec votre carte N26 Business. Le montant du cashback est calculé de façon mensuelle, le 15 de chaque mois. Il faut alors compter jusqu’à 7 jours avant que le montant du cashback apparaisse sur votre relevé de compte.Pour le moment, les prélèvements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business You. *Allianz Global Assistance Europe, dénomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise membre du Groupe Allianz.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
answer: No problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card. My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

question: Que sont les Espaces Partagés ?
answer: Espaces Partagés est une nouvelle fonctionnalité qui permet aux utilisateurs de N26 d’organiser leurs dépenses communes ou d’économiser pour un projet commun avec leurs amis. Ces espaces peuvent être utilisés pour partager des factures entre colocataires, pour prévoir le budget de ses prochaines vacances entre amis ou faire un pot commun pour le cadeau d’anniversaire d’un proche, par exemple.Les espaces partagés sont disponibles pour les utilisateurs premium (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You et N26 Business Metal), qui peuvent créer et inviter des participants à contribuer à un espace partagé.Tous les utilisateurs N26, quel que soit le compte qu’ils possèdent, peuvent être invités à rejoindre un espace partagé.L’administrateur de l’espace partagé possède l’argent contenu dans ce dernier.L’administrateur peut inviter jusqu’à 10 participants dans un espace partagé.Comme pour tous les espaces, les espaces partagés ne sont ni rattachés à un IBAN ni à une carte.

question: Comment signaler un sinistre à l'assurance ?
answer: Votre adhésion à N26 You (nouvel onglet) ou N26 Metal (nouvel onglet) vous donne droit à un ensemble d'assurances proposées par Allianz Global Assistance Europe*.Pour signaler un sinistre, connectez-vous à votre application mobile N26, puis rendez vous dans la rubrique 👤 Mon compte > Votre Compte > Couverture d’assurance Allianz. Vous y trouverez :Un guide pour signaler votre sinistre (par exemple, un retard de vol ou de bagages, les extensions de garantie ou l’annulation voyage).Vos informations de compte N26, dont le numéro de votre police AllianzLa possibilité de contacter Allianz directement en cas d’urgence.Si vous contactez Allianz Global Assistance* en cas d'urgence, veillez à avoir sous les yeux les informations suivantes :L'adresse complète et le numéro de téléphone de votre lieu de séjour actuelLes noms de tous les interlocuteurs officiels (médecins, hôpitaux, police)La description précise des événements survenus*Allianz Global Assistance Europe, dénomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise, membre du Groupe Allianz.

question: Come invitare i miei amici a N26?
answer: Dall'1 ottobre abbiamo iniziato a lavorare al miglioramento del nostro programma Invita un amico. Fino a che queste modifiche non saranno definitive, le informazioni a riguardo non saranno più disponibili sull'app. Gli inviti e le iscrizioni avvenuti prima dell'1 ottobre continueranno a essere ricompensati come prima. Attualmente non sappiamo dire con precisione quando torneremo ad offrire questa funzionalità.

question: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
answer:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here (new tab). In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the “Substantial Presence Test” (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.“Substantial Presence Test” means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 
(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6. In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you: A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

question: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
answer: If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may open an account with us. We offer:The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.Accounts in €, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.Free shipping of your Mastercard or €25 for express.Foreign currency transfers with Wise (with the standard account).3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals in € in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).2 Spaces in addition to the main account.A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using Wise (on their website (new tab)) or using your local bank.For outgoing transfers to € accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-€ accounts, use Wise in the app.**Please note: Wise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

question: Wie mache ich N26 zu meinem Hauptkonto?
answer: Wir können dir helfen, N26 zu deinem Hauptkonto zu machen, indem wir dein tägliches Bankgeschäft von einem anderen Konto übernehmen: Wir informieren alle Zahlungspartner, die wiederkehrende Lastschriften (z. B. für deine monatlichen Abonnements oder Rechnungen) berechnen oder Geld auf dein Konto überweisen (z. B. deinen Arbeitgeber), und wir erklären dir, wie du Daueraufträge einrichtest oder Restbeträge überweist.Es gibt drei Möglichkeiten, deine Bankkonten auf N26 umzustellen:Kontowechselservice powered by finleap connect GmbHGemeinsam mit unserem Partner finleap connect GmbH (neuen Tab) bieten wir dir eine Plattform, auf der du deine Bankkonten einfach online wechseln kannst. Das ist ein automatisierter Prozess und völlig kostenfrei.Logge dich in die mobile N26 App ein und gehe zu Mein Konto > Zu N26 wechseln. Tippe Jetzt starten und folge den Anweisungen.Alternativ kannst du unser Formular (neuen Tab) benutzen. Logge dich mit deinen bisherigen Kontodaten ein. Sobald du alle erforderlichen Informationen eingetragen hast, dauert es 5 bis 7 Werktage, bis wir alle Benachrichtigungsschreiben verschickt haben. Deine Zahlungspartner benötigen möglicherweise zusätzliche Zeit, um deine Bankverbindung für zukünftige Transaktionen zu ändern.Kontenwechsel durch unseren Service SupportDu kannst deine Zahlungspartner auch selbst informieren. Dazu musst du den Brief zur Informierung von Zahlungspartnern (neuen Tab) ausfüllen und an den jeweiligen Zahlungspartner versenden. Damit kannst du auch die Kündigung deines Bankkontos bei deiner vorherigen Bank beantragen.Auch dieser Service ist kostenlos. Wenn du Hilfe bei diesem Prozess benötigst, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can’t be used for online purchases.

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters. Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved? Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you’re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action. If you have a feeling that something is off, don’t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don’t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender’s identity.If you’ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you’d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it’s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Perché il mio bonus per i referral non è arrivato?
answer: Ricorda: per ricevere il tuo bonus, il tuo amico deve eseguire una prima transazione con carta (acquisto in negozio, prelievo bancomat o pagamento online - PayPal escluso) pari almeno al valore del bonus di riferimento. Il premio può richiedere fino a 60 giorni per essere accreditato sul tuo conto.Una volta che il tuo amico ha completato tutti i criteri di ammissibilità del nostro Programma Invita un amico, verificheremo la tua ricompensa. Puoi sempre accedere al tuo conto nell'app o WebApp (nuova tabella) per verificare lo stato della tua ricompensa.Nella maggior parte dei casi il bonus non viene accreditato perché l'amico invitato non ha effettuato una prima transazione Mastercard Transazioni almeno del valore della ricompensa o superiori. Ad esempio, per una ricompensa di 15 € il valore della transazione deve essere di almeno 15 € o superiore. Assicurati di informare i tuoi amici di questi requisiti.Tieni presente che il processo di ricompensa potrebbe richiedere fino a 60 giorni.N26 si riserva il diritto di trattenere la ricompensa in caso di attività sospette che violano i Termini e condizioni (nuova tabella).

question: Bank information—your N26 account ownership certificate
answer: What is a bank account ownership certificate?A bank account ownership certificate, also known as a bank account certificate or account confirmation, is a certificate confirming that your bank account is registered in your name, along with relevant bank information. It includes your first and last name, date of birth, the IBAN of your account, and the date you opened it.Your certificate may also include your current account balance and the card numbers of your active cards, if you choose. For security reasons, these will be partially hidden with asterisks.How do I request a bank account ownership certificate?From the web app, click on the download (new tab) icon* and choose Download Bank Information. A PDF will be generated automatically.To request the bank account ownership certificate including your account balance and card number, click on the download (new tab) icon*. Then, under Account Confirmation, select whether you want to include your current balance and/or the card numbers of your active cards and click Request. The PDF will appear in the Messages from N26 (new tab) section of your app within 24 hours.* The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing downward, to the left of the ‘Add Money’ button.

question: Wird meine Lastschrift abgebucht, wenn ich kein Geld auf dem Konto habe?
answer: Wenn dein Guthaben nicht ausreicht, um eine fällige Lastschrift zu decken*, wird sie zurückgegeben und dir wird eine Gebühr von 3 € berechnet. Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus gerät, werden Überziehungszinsen in der Höhe von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verzögert werden.Um diese Gebühr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App prüfen, ob dir ein Dispokredit zur Verfügung steht.IBANs für Spaces (Unterkonten): Hast du einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen, jedoch nicht genug Guthaben, um eine ausgehende Lastschrift zu decken, wird die Lastschriftüberweisung abgewiesen und dir eine Gebühr in Höhe von 3 € berechnet. Bitte beachte, dass es ist nicht möglich ist, deinen Space zu überziehen.*Für Länder mit einer anderen Hauptwährung als den Euro: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landeswährung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempfängers die Gebühren für den Währungsumtausch sowie den endgültigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird. Siehe die folgende Liste:BulgarienKroatienTschechienDänemarkUngarnIslandLiechtensteinNorwegenPolenRumänienSchwedenSchweizDu willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you’ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don’t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‘Sharing Money’Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:“Advanced electronic signature” will pop-up. Tap “sign”Check both “Advanced electronic signature” and “Power of attorney”, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: Lutto e successione
answer:
Come faccio a informare N26 in caso di decesso? In caso di decesso, gli eredi si trovano ad affrontare molte sfide burocratiche. Una di queste è la risoluzione dei conti correnti del defunto. Il modo più semplice per contattare N26 a riguardo è via email. In alternativa, è possibile inviare la richiesta per lettera o (se applicabile, via fax):Email: servizio.successioni@n26.comPEC: successioni@pec.n26.com Fax: +49 (0) 30 / 959 984 490N26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana  
-Servizio Successioni-
Via Filippo Sassetti 32, 20124 Milano (MI) ITALIAN26 Bank AG, Succursale Italiana 
c/o N26 Bank AG -Servizio Successioni-
Klosterstr. 62, 10179 Berlin - GERMANYTi preghiamo di informarci su: Chi è il defunto? Se possibile, allegare un certificato di morte poiché questo è il modo più affidabile per identificare qualsiasi conto corrente associato. Come possiamo contattare i beneficiari?Ti chiediamo di fornire il nome completo, indirizzo di spedizione e indirizzo email di chi si occuperà di comunicare con noi. Non sarà possibile organizzare una chiamata.C'è qualcosa che dovremmo sapere in anticipo? Se stai affrontando determinate procedure (ad es., rifiuto dell'eredità o compilazione di un inventario) o hai già documenti specifici a disposizione, può essere utile condividerli con noi. Ricontatteremo te o i beneficiari per informazioni relative alle procedure successive. Ti preghiamo di non inviarci i documenti originali per posta in questa fase. Ti informeremo se ci occorrono gli originali in ogni singolo caso. Cosa succede a un conto N26 se il titolare del conto viene a mancare?A causa delle differenze locali tra le leggi e i regolamenti, la procedura può variare a seconda del Paese. Tuttavia, tutti i conti con N26 Bank GmbH, Succursale Italiana sono in Italia. Non appena veniamo informati del decesso di uno dei nostri clienti, le carte associate, l'online banking e qualsiasi accesso all'app verrà disabilitato. Allo stesso modo tutti i pagamenti regolari come bonifici periodici o bonifici SEPA per gli addebiti diretti, non verranno più eseguiti.Ti preghiamo inoltre di notare che, in linea di principio, siamo tenuti legalmente a informare l'autorità fiscale responsabile dell'imposta di successione dei beni appartenenti all'eredità. Potresti dover rispondere ad alcune domande per svincolare i beni con N26.Ti consigliamo di metterti in contatto con le autorità fiscali competenti nel tuo Paese per adempiere ai requisiti fiscali locali (se ne esistono).In ogni caso, comunicheremo ai beneficiari quali documenti esatti devono fornire per regolare il conto del defunto con N26.Sono un cliente, posso prendere misure precauzionali in caso di decesso? Ci sono diversi modi per assicurarti che i tuoi beni siano distribuiti secondo le tue esigenze. Per questo motivo, consigliamo caldamente a chiunque sia coinvolto più intensamente nella redazione di un testamento, di chiedere assistenza legale a un avvocato, notaio o un consulente fiscale. Questo vale soprattutto nel caso in cui nell'eredità siano inclusi beni più importanti. Il nostro Supporto Clienti o gli esperti del nostro reparto successioni non possono offrirti ulteriori consigli su questo argomento.Per ulteriori informazioni su situazioni specifiche, ti preghiamo di chiedere l'assistenza professionale di un servizio di consulenza adeguato.

question: Wie verhindere ich Betrug via SMS?
answer: Hast du eine SMS mit einem verdächtigen Link erhalten?Falls ja - nicht den Link öffnen! Das ist ein sogenannter Phishing-Versuch, machmal Smishing (neuen Tab) genannt. Diese Masche funktioniert wie folgt:Du empfängst eine unheilvoll klingende SMS, in der du aufgefordert wirst, einen Link zu öffnen.Der Link hat eine andere URL als unsere offizielle URL: https://app.n26.com/login (neuen Tab) Die geöffnete Seite (nicht empfohlen!) ahmt das Design von N26 nach und du wirst aufgefordert, deine persönlichen Daten zu teilen wie deine E-Mail-Adresse, dein N26 Passwort, deine Kartennummer, CVC, PIN Codes, SMS Codes usw. Gib deine Zugangsdaten nie außerhalb der N26 App bzw. deinem Online Banking ein.Nach Erhalt der SMS kontaktiert dich jemand, der vorgibt, für N26 zu arbeiten. Diese Person versucht, dich zu verdächtigen Handlungen zu bewegen, z.B. zusätzliche Kontodetails preiszugeben oder eine ungeplante Zahlung in der N26 App zu bestätigen. Bestätige nie eine Zahlung in der N26 App, wenn dir der Zahlungsempfänger nicht bekannt ist!Was tun, wenn ich einen verdächtigen Link geöffnet habe?Ändere sofort dein Anmeldepasswort. Um das zu tun, logge dich zunächst ein une gehe zu Mein Konto > Sicherheit > Anmeldepasswort ändern. Alternativ kannst du im Login–Bildschirm auf Vergessen tippen und wir schicken dir eine E-Mail mit den nächsten Schritten.Falls du persönliche Daten auf einer Phishing-Website geteilt hast, kontaktiere uns direkt im Chat in der N26 App. Wir helfen dir sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto geschützt bleibt. Bitte schicke außerdem einen Screenshot der SMS zu support@n26.com (und fasse Sachverhalt in der E-Mail kurz zusammen).Muss ich in der App eine Zahlung bestätigen, um eine Rückerstattung zu erhalten?Nein! Wir werden dich nie auffordern eine Zahlung zu bestätigen, die du nicht getätigt hast. Wenn du den Namen oder die IBAN des Empfängers nicht kennst, bestätigt die Zahlung niemals. Das gilt auch für die E-Mail-Adresse oder Telefonnumer bei MoneyBeams und den Firmennamen bei Kartenzahlungen.Wie erkenne ich offizielle Nachrichten von N26?Wir werden dir nie einen Link per SMS schicken! Wir schicken nur Verifizierungscodes via AUTHMS, die nur von dir angefordert werden können. Mit diesen Codes bzw. Einmalpasswörtern (OTP) kannst du dich in die App einloggen oder dein Gerät verknüpfen. Teile deine OTP mit niemandem!Unsere meistgenutzten Kommunikationskanäle sind Chat, E-Mail und unsere Hotline für Premium-Kunden. Wir rufen unsere Kunden nicht an, außer ein Kunde bittet um einen Rückruf. Falls du also Nachricht erhältst, dass wir dich demnächst anrufen, nachdem du auf einen verdächtigen Link geklickt hast, solltest skeptisch sein! Hier findest du weiter Informationen dazu, wie N26 mit dir kommuniziert. (neuen Tab)Wie finden Betrüger meine persönlichen Daten heraus?Heutzutage sind deine persönlichen Daten wahrscheinlich online in sozialen Medien wie Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc zu finden. Häufig werden sensible Daten nicht ausreichend gesichert. Betrüger nutzen das zu ihrem Vorteil.

question: How to dispute a card transaction and request a chargeback
answer: Have you noticed a card transaction on your N26 bank account statement that you don’t recognize? Did you place an order online, but never receive it? Read on to find out how to request a chargeback in these instances..What is a chargeback? Simply put, a chargeback is the return of a card payment to a customer by the merchant following a transaction dispute. The chargeback is paid out once the transaction dispute is successfully resolved in favor of the customer.  N26 offers a chargeback service through Mastercard, which allows you to dispute transactions made by someone other than yourself, or when a mistake occurs on the merchant’s part. For example, if you ordered goods online and didn’t receive them by the expected delivery date, you may be eligible to file a chargeback to request your money back.How to dispute a transaction with N26 You can dispute a transaction from your N26 mobile app, or the N26 WebApp. Go to the ‘Home’ tab, and select the transaction you want to dispute Tap ‘Get help with this transaction’ and follow the steps provided. Important: If your dispute is about an unauthorized transaction, you’ll need to block and reorder your N26 card to prevent further fraud before we can process your request. You’ll be guided through the steps in your N26 app.  If you select a transaction but the ‘Get help’ button doesn’t appear, this means that the transaction is still in authorization. In this case, you’ll need to wait until the charge becomes a presentment. Read this article (new tab) to learn about the difference between authorizations and presentments.If you’ve already closed your N26 account and no longer have access to the N26 app, you’ll need to contact customer service from your registered email address at support@n26.com (new tab).To make things easier, we’ve compiled a list of frequently asked questions about chargebacks (new tab).

question: What are “Messages” ?
answer:
The security of your personal data is our priority. That’s why we created an inbox in the N26 app that allows us to share any communication. Any content that includes personal data is communicated in Messages. We’ll still use your email address to communicate general information.What is personal data?Personal data is any information that relates to you as a person and identifies or could possibly identify you. It could be your account details, your address (email or postal), ID documents, proof of residence, but also the notification about your accrued overdraft interest or your monthly standing order.
How does it work? When we send you a message to Messages, you’ll receive a push notification on your paired smartphone and an email to your registered email address. Once connected to the Webapp, you’ll also be notified by an info card of any new messages.We’ll send you a message that you can find in your Messages from N26, and ask that you reply directly from there.This feature is available in our mobile app, by clicking on the Support icon on the top right hand corner. Make sure you downloaded the latest app version. You can’t initiate a conversation, but you’ll be able to reply as soon as we send you the first message. If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn’t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we’ll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
answer: Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (from the Home screen choose the Send money tab, followed by Bank Transfer and then “add a new recipient), some details like the recipient’s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts:iOS: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Android: click on the three dots to the left in order to delete the contact.Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn’t delete your transaction history with them

question: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
answer: To get the most out of ‘Shared Spaces’ you can add participants so that everyone can start contributing towards your upcoming purchases, whether that be a vacation or simply splitting bills. You can also remove participants who no longer wish to be a part of the ‘Shared Space’.Before we jump into adding or removing participants from a ‘Shared Space’, it is important to keep in mind the following:Only the ‘owner’ or the person who created the ‘Shared Space’ can add or remove participants.The owner can only invite people who are in their contact list, have an N26 account and are marked as ‘visible’ to other N26 users within their account settings.If the name from the owner’s contact list does not match the participants N26 account name, then the owner will need to fill in the full name of the participant whilst going through the ‘Shared Spaces’ add participant flow.You’ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up … Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).How can I add a participant to my Shared Space:Once a Space has been created, go within the Space you wish to add participants:Tap the 3 dots at the top right of the page inside the Space.Read the ‘learn more’ information and tap the ‘invite new member’ button.Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you want to invite (they must have an N26 account and be marked as visible within their account settings).If needed, enter their full name as it is shown on their N26 account.You are now in the “legal screen” so be sure to read all the information within the ‘Grant Power of Attorney’ page.Tick the box to confirm you have read and agree to the T&C’s then tap ‘Grant Power of Attorney’ button.Tap ‘Send invite’ on the push notification and enter your confirmation PIN.Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.Confirm the ‘send invite’ push notification on your paired mobile device.How can I remove a participant from my Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the ‘Participants’ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant’s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap ‘revoke power of attorney’.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‘revoke power of attorney’.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to Create a Shared Space?

question: Wie viel kann ich maximal ausgeben?
answer: Kartenzahlungen in Geschäften und onlineDas Tageslimit liegt bei 5.000€Das Monatslimit liegt 20.000€Abhebungen mit der KarteDas Tageslimit i.H.v. 1.000€ gilt in: Österreich, Belgien, Dänemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Griechenland, Island, Irland, Italien, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Spanien, Slowakei, Slowenien, Schweden und der Schweiz. Das Tageslimit i.H.v. 400€ gilt in Togo, Kongo, Benin, Elfenbeinküste, Kenia, Kamerun, Nigeria, Senegal, Algerien, Zentralafrikanische Republik, Gambia, Ghana, Ruanda, Tunesien und UgandaDas Wochenlimit liegt in allen EU Ländern bei 2.500€. Das Wochenlimit liegt in Frankreich bei 1.050€.ÜberweisungenDas Tageslimit für MoneyBeams liegt bei 1.000€Ausgehende SEPA-Überweisungen: Kein LimitEingehende SEPA-Überweisungen: Kein LimitEingehende SEPA-Echtzeitüberwiesung: 100.000€ pro ÜberweisungAusgehende SEPA-Echtzeitüberwiesung: 2.000€ pro ÜberweisungCash26Das Abhebelimit beträgt 200 € pro Transaktion sowie 900 € innerhalb von 24 Stunden. Es gibt jedoch keinen Mindestbetrag – du kannst auch nur einen Cent mit CASH26 abheben, wenn du magst.Der Mindestbetrag für eine CASH26 Einzahlung ist 50 €. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden kannst du bis zu 999 € einzahlen.Zusätzlich gilt ein gemeinsames Limit für Einzahlungen und Abhebungen in Höhe von 999€ pro 24 Stunden.

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times. Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card and we’ll send it to you. If you don’t see that message, don’t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you’ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don’t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost. How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card.

question: Come mantenere al sicuro i miei dati bancari online?
answer: Ecco alcuni consigli utili per stare sempre al sicuro ogni volta che sei online, che sia per lo shopping, il banking o semplicemente per gestire la tua corrispondenza:Tieni la tua app N26 e il sistema operativo del tuo cellulare sempre aggiornati in modo da evitare che possano verificarsi bug;Utilizza metodi di autenticazione biometrici come la scansione dell’impronta digitale o il riconoscimento facciale per effettuare l'accesso;Crea delle password complesse contenenti lettere, numeri e simboli ed evita di usare la stessa password per accedere a diversi conti;Non pubblicare mai informazioni personali sensibili online o sui social media;Fai attenzione quando utilizzi una rete WiFi pubblica o una connessione condivisa e scegli sempre connessioni WPA2 sicure invece di connessioni WEP.Prediligi fornitori di servizi email con filtri per la sicurezza e per lo spam e che dispongono di un sistema di autenticazione a due fattori, come Gmail e Yahoo!;Stai in guardia di fronte a offerte troppo belle per essere vere: probabilmente è proprio così!Effettua acquisti solo presso siti web affidabili di venditori riconosciuti;Assicurati che i siti web siano sicuri, controlla che ci sia il simbolo di un lucchetto accanto all’URL e verifica le credenziali con un semplice clic;Consenti la geolocalizzazione sulla tua app N26, così possiamo individuare transazioni irregolari non effettuate da te.Se sospetti che il tuo conto o i dettagli della tua carta siano stati compromessi, cambia subito la tua password e fai riferimento al nostro articolo Cosa fare se il mio account viene hackerato?

question: How to use Moneybeam?
answer: MoneyBeam enables you to send money to your contacts instantly, without having to enter their bank details. You can also request a MoneyBeam from your contacts, in order to receive money. To use MoneyBeam, you and your contacts have to be visible as N26 users.To send a MoneyBeam: Select Send money, then MoneyBeamSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Enter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.To request a MoneyBeam:Select Add moneyTap Request from friendsSelect a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.As soon as your contact confirms your request, you will receive the amount you asked for.The limit for MoneyBeams is €1000 per transaction and €5000 every 24 hours.Add a GIF as an additional reference:You can send GIFs as an additional reference text when using MoneyBeam. Once the MoneyBeam is complete, the recipient will be able to see a film emoji as a prefix on the received transfer in the home screen, letting them know the transfer has an attached GIF. The recipient can view the gif within the transfer details along with the reference text.The GIFs are provided to you directly by Giphy, Inc. and not by N26. Be aware that Giphy is a US-based company who may process your personal data in the US. You can find information on how Giphy processes your personal data when you attach and send GIFs in the Giphy Privacy Policy (new tab).   To send a MoneyBeam with a GIF:Select Send money, then MoneyBeam.Select a contact from your list or add one by entering their phone number and email address.Enter an amount and a reference.Select Attach GIF, and either search or scroll for the GIF you want to attachEnter your confirmation PIN and confirm the push notification that you will receive.Would you like to tell your friends about us and earn some money at the same time? Learn more about our friend referral program.

question: I wasn’t approved for my loan, but my account was still debited
answer: Before approving a loan, credit agencies will perform a check to verify your creditworthiness. To do this, an authorization hold is often charged to your card— generally equivalent to the first monthly installment of the requested loan.Because installment payments from third-party credit organizations aren’t possible with an N26 debit card, you may be rejected for your loan despite the transaction showing up on your account.The good news is that the amount in question won’t actually be debited to your card, despite appearing on your transaction list in the N26 app. The charge will expire within 12 days and the amount on the hold will be automatically refunded.If you don’t receive the money back, please contact our Customer Support as soon as possible.

question: Wie bestelle ich eine neue Karte?
answer: Falls du zurzeit auf eine Karte wartest, warte bitte den geschätzten Lieferzeitraum ab, die im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App angezeigt wird.Wenn du eine neue Karte bestellen musst, überprüfe zunächst deine Lieferanschrift unter: 👤 Mein Konto > Persönliche Details > Adressen > Lieferadresse. Bitte beachte:Es muss eine Wohnadresse sein (Unternehmen werden nicht akzeptiert)Dein Name muss auf dem Briefkasten stehen. Falls ein anderer Name darauf steht, füge diesen unter Zusätzliche Informationen zur Adresse hinzu.Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.Falls zutreffend, gib deine Haus-, Etagen- und Türnummer unter Zusätzliche Informationen zur Adresse an.Falls Adresse Sonderzeichen beinhaltet, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner App.Falls du zeitnah umziehst, zieh die Express-Lieferung in Erwägung und gib die künftige Wohnadresse an.Falls deine erste N26 Karte innerhalb des geschätzten Lieferzeitraums nicht angekommen ist, öffne bitte einen Live Chat direkt in deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online Banking.Falls du schon mal eine aktivierte Karte hattest, kannst du deine neue Karte so in der App bestellen:Tippe im Homescreen auf Karten unten rechts.Wähle aus der Liste deiner Karten diejenige Karte aus, die du nachbestellen willst.Tippe auf Karteneinstellungen.Tippe auf Neue Karte bestellen.Wie kann ich schon mit meiner Karte bezahlen, bevor sie physisch bei mir ankommt?Schon bevor dich deine Karte mit der Post erreicht, kannst du beginnen, sie durch Apple Pay oder Google Pay zu benutzen. Auf diese Weise kannst du mit deinem Handy bei Anbietern bezahlen, die diese Zahlungsmethode unterstützen. Erfahre mehr über die digitalen Nutzungsmöglichkeiten deiner N26 Karte.Wie viel kostet eine neue Karte?Standardlieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 10€N26 Metal: 45€Express-Lieferung:N26 Standard & N26 You: 30€N26 Metal: 65€Bitte beachte: Falls du auf deine erste N26 Karte wartest und deine Lieferanschrift von Anfang an richtig war, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice via Live Chat direkt aus deiner mobilen N26 App oder deinem Online-Banking.

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‘Forgot Password’ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can’t be used for online purchases.

question: Wo finde ich meine IBAN oder Kontonummer?
answer: Deine IBAN und deinen BIC benötigst du, um SEPA-Überweisungen auf dein Konto zu erhalten oder per Lastschrift zu bezahlen. Eine IBAN besteht aus mehreren Elementen: Alle unsere IBANs beginnen mit DE, ES oder IT, gefolgt von der zweistelligen Prüfziffer, unserer Bankleitzahl (10011001), und schließlich deiner 10-stelligen Kontonummer (beginnend mit 26). Die IBAN wird bei der Kontoeröffnung erstellt und zugewiesen und kann nicht geändert werden.Deine IBAN und deinen BIC findest du an 3 Orten:In deiner mobilen N26 App und deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab) unter: 👤 Mein Konto. Tippe bzw. klicke auf das Kopieren-Symbol, um die IBAN zu kopieren.Im Online Banking (neuen Tab) kannst du deine Bankverbindung als PDF herunterladen. Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Bankdaten auf Bankdaten herunterladen.Auf deinen herunterladbaren Kontoauszügen: Tippe im Homescreen deiner mobilen N26 App auf das Burgermenü oben rechts und wähle Kontoauszüge. Oder in deinem Online Banking (neuen Tab): Klicke im Homescreen auf das Download-Symbol und klicke unter Kontoauszüge auf einen gewünschten Monat.Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial (neuen Tab)auf unserem N26 Support YouTube (neuen Tab) Kanal an.Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

question: Comment rembourser mon crédit avant la date prévue ?
answer: Vous pouvez tout à fait rembourser votre crédit par anticipation, c’est à dire avant la date initialement prévue.Nous vous rappelons que 1 % de frais s’applique à tout remboursement anticipé. En revanche, si la période de remboursement restante est de moins de 12 mois, les frais de remboursement anticipé seront de 0,5 %.Pour demander un remboursement par anticipation, contactez-nous par Livechat et nous vous communiquerons le calcul précis de votre paiement anticipant incluant les frais mentionnés ci-dessus.*Les informations ci-dessus sont uniquement valables pour les crédits fournis par N26. Si votre crédit est fourni par l’un de nos partenaires, veuillez les contacter directement : Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) en Allemagne et Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) en France.

question: Que faire si je ne peux pas rembourser mon crédit ou mon découvert ?
answer: Si vous ne pouvez pas payer votre crédit N26 ou votre découvert (uniquement disponible en Allemagne et en Autriche), nous pouvons vous proposer différents plans de remboursement. Cela peut arriver si votre autorisation de découvert autorisé a été annulée ou si vous avez besoin de plus de deux mois pour rembourser la somme que vous nous devez.Veuillez noter que nous ne pouvons pas vous proposer de plan de remboursement si votre compte N26 est déjà clôturé.Voici la marche à suivre : contactez-nous par Livechat avec une proposition précise de votre plan de remboursement. Cette proposition doit expliquer, clairement comment et en combien de temps vous pouvez rembourser votre crédit ou votre découvert en totalité. Sachez que nous refuserons toute proposition de payer la somme due “ultérieurement” sans autre détail.Ensuite, nous pourrons accepter, refuser ou vous proposer une solution alternative. Vous pourrez alors accepter ce plan de remboursement..À noter : Votre compte N26 sera fermé si votre solde reste négatif pendant une longue période. Toute décision de clôture de compte est définitive, sauf si vous remboursez la somme due avant la date de fermeture annoncée. Si vous ne le faites pas, votre dette sera directement prise en charge par une agence de recouvrement.Ce qui précède concerne uniquement les crédits N26. Pour les crédits Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) ou Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99), veuillez contacter le partenaire approprié.

question: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
answer: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet our requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: What are N26 Installments?
answer: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments for France is currently only available for customers who’ve opened their account in France, and who have a DE IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note there is a fixed fee depending on the loan value. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing froPricing: This will be an interest rate of 7.49% of 10.49%. And will be charged with your first instalment amount. Eligible purchase amount: From €20 - €199N26 Installments Duration: The installments duration is 3 months minimum and maximum, with the option of early loan repayment.Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment Automated cancellation of the loan when >105 days in arrearsHow to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the ‘Explore’ tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting ‘Options’ (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap ‘N26 Installments’When you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using ‘N26 Installments’:First you will be provided with information about ‘N26 Installments’Then you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, you’ll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. We’ll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (you’ll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in full

question: Comment commander une nouvelle carte ?
answer:
ℹ️ La livraison de votre carte peut prendre jusqu’à 15 jours ouvrés. Si la livraison de votre carte est en cours, nous vous demandons de bien vouloir patienter jusqu’à la date de livraison estimée avant d’envisager de la recommander. Vous pouvez consulter l’écran d’accueil de votre application N26, où figure la liste de vos transactions.Avant de recommander une carte, veuillez vous assurer que votre adresse de livraison est à jour, depuis votre application N26 :👤 Mon Compte > Informations personelles > Adresses > Adresse de livraison.Nous envoyons les cartes uniquement à des adresses résidentielles (les adresses d’entreprises ne sont pas acceptées).Votre nom doit apparaître sur la boîte aux lettres. Si un nom différent est affiché, merci de l’ajouter dans la section Complément d’adresse N'entrez pas d'espace dans le code postal de votre adresse de livraison.Assurez-vous d’indiquer les informations complémentaires d’adresse dans la section Complément d’adresse (par exemple, votre numéro de bâtiment, numéro de cage d'escalier...). Si votre adresse contient des caractères spéciaux, veuillez nous contacter via le Livechat depuis l’application N26.Si vous déménagez bientôt, vous pouvez choisir la livraison express. Sinon, assurez-vous de sélectionner le pays et l'adresse où vous allez déménager et souhaitez recevoir votre carte N26.Est-ce votre première carte N26 ou en aviez-vous activé une dans le passé ? S'il s’agit de votre première carte N26 et que le délai de livraison de votre carte N26 est dépassé : veuillez nous contacter sur le Livechat depuis votre espace en ligne ou votre application N26 pour que nous puissions la recommander.Si vous aviez activé une carte N26 dans le passé, veuillez en recommander une depuis votre application N26 :Ouvrez l’application et allez dans l’onglet “Cartes”.Sélectionnez “Paramètres de la carte” puis la carte que vous souhaitez recommander (si vous en avez plusieurs, faites glisser l’écran vers la gauche).Une fois la carte choisie, faites glisser l’écran vers le bas afin de sélectionner “Commander une nouvelle carte”.Choisissez la raison pour laquelle vous recommandez votre carte et laissez-vous guider.
Frais de remplacement des cartes :N26 Standard, N26 Business, N26 You et N26 Business You : 10 € en livraison standard 30 € en livraison expressN26 Metal et N26 Business Metal :45 € en livraison standard65 € en livraison expressVous pouvez utiliser votre carte avant même qu’elle n’arrive chez vousN26 vous permet d’utiliser votre carte N26 avant même de l’avoir reçue, en l’ajoutant à votre compte Apple Pay ou Google Pay. Il est donc possible de faire des achats avec votre smartphone, en utilisant la version digitale de votre carte auprès de commerçants acceptant ce moyen de paiement.

question: How to make a donation with N26?
answer: N26 has always been involved in the fight against hunger and inequality alongside humanitarian organizations. From now, making a donation from your N26 account will be even easier. You can now send a donation to a list of charity organizations we selected, directly from your N26 app. The full amount will be sent via bank transfer to the selected charity.To send a donation to a charity, please follow these steps:From the Home screen of your app, tap on Send MoneySelect Donate and ContinueChoose a charity organization from the list Select Continue to donateEnter the amount of your donation and confirm the transaction with your PINPlease note: In many cases, a proof of payment is sufficient for claiming tax deduction of your donation as part of your personal income tax return. However, in case you require a formal donation certificate from the charity, we would ask you to contact the charity directly (together with your proof of payment) as only charities may issue donation certificates and not N26.

question: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
answer: From 1st October 2021 we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: Cards expiration and replacement: FAQs
answer: If your N26 Mastercard has expired or will expire soon, in this article you will find all the information on how to order a new one, the related costs and shipping times. Before proceeding with reordering a new card, we recommend that you check that all your personal details are correct and up to date and.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?If your card is expiring soon, please log into your N26 account in the app, go to Cards Tab and look for a banner under the corresponding card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card and we’ll send it to you. If you don’t see that message, don’t worry. This is probably because your card still has some validity time ahead, when the time is right you’ll have the option to confirm your address.Once your card arrives, you will have to activate it before you can begin using it. Don’t forget to destroy your old card and dispose of it according to your local recycling guidelines.Please note: when you have received and activated your new Mastercard, remember to update your payment information for all your subscriptions and recurring payments. By doing this, you will prevent your future payments from being rejected.Can I keep using my card after it has expired?No, the expiration date on your card serves an important function and you won’t be able to use it after the expiration month is over. You will receive a new card with a different number, as well as a new expiration date.How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost. How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card already expired but I never received a replacementNo problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card.

question: What are Shared Spaces?
answer: Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Smart, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.Italian IBAN and Shared SpacesShared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 customers to share expenses and set money aside together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.You can use Shared Spaces with your Italian IBAN: simply follow the N26 Shared Spaces app flow, and invite your close friends and family members to start using this feature.Shared Spaces is available to N26 premium users (N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Metal, N26 Business Smart, N26 Business You and N26 Business Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their space.Participants can have any N26 account, regardless of the membership type.N26 Standard and N26 Business Standard customers can only participate in up to two Shared Spaces.The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants from their space at any time.How to create Shared Spaces:To create Shared Spaces, follow these steps (if you have already a premium account with N26):Open your N26 and go to the Spaces section in the bottom navigation bar. Tap the + icon and click on ‘Sharing Money’Read the Learn more information and click on ContinueGive a name to your Shared Space Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to other N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Settings > Personal Information.If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.You will then need to review and sign the Terms & conditions:“Advanced electronic signature” will pop-up. Tap “sign”Check both “Advanced electronic signature” and “Power of attorney”, then confirmEnter your confirmation PIN and confirmYou can then send the invite to your N26 contacts. You will immediately be able to start adding money or managing the Shared Space to add more people.

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters. Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved? Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you’re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action. If you have a feeling that something is off, don’t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don’t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender’s identity.If you’ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you’d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Smart?
answer: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: Wähle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fünf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zusätzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusätzliche virtuelle Karte!Zusätzliche physische Karte: Bestelle über deine N26 App eine zusätzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Gebühr von 10 €.Spaces: 10 zusätzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Du kannst N26 Smart mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du mit N26 Smart liebäugelst, beachte bitte unsere AGB (neuen Tab) sowie folgendes:Deine N26 Smart Mastercard hat keine Prägung: Die Kartendetails, einschließlich der Nummer, des CVV-Codes und des 10-stelligen Tokens sind auf der Rückseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du von N26 Standard zu N26 Smart upgradest, wird die monatliche Gebühr von 4,90 € wird beginnend mit dem Datum deines Upgrades jeden Monat direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Gebühr 15 Tage nach der Verifizierung deiner Identität eingezogen. Danach wird dir deine monatliche Gebühr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet. Wenn du also dein Konto gegen Monatsende eröffnet hast, werden die ersten zwei Monatsgebühren im Folgemonat abgebucht.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgebühr monatlich oder im Voraus für die nächsten 6 Monate oder für 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich für die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig für den von dir gewünschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt. Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Prepaid-Abrechnungsoptionen und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.

question: Quanto ci mette un bonifico ad arrivare?
answer: I bonifici istantanei SEPA in entrata verso conti N26 avvengono in maniera istantanea, purché il bonifico provenga da una banca che supporta i bonifici istantanei. Tuttavia, talvolta i bonifici possono avere ritardi se devono essere verificati a causa delle direttive bancarie SEPA.I bonifici SEPA normali in entrata arrivano entro al massimo 2 giorni lavorativi. Ricorda che se un bonifico viene effettuato poco prima di un fine settimana o un giorno festivo, il periodo di tempo sarà esteso fino a un massimo di 3 giorni lavorativi.La ricezione di bonifici SWIFT in entrata richiede fino a 4 giorni lavorativi. I bonifici SEPA istantanei in uscita arrivano all'istante. I normali bonifici SEPA in uscita richiedono fino a 2 giorni lavorativi. Per i bonifici in valuta straniera con il nostro partner Wise occorrono fino a 4 giorni lavorativi. I bonifici SWIFT in uscita non sono supportati.Cos'è un "giorno bancario"?Un giorno bancario corrisponde a due giorni lavorativi a causa dell'orario di ufficio delle banche coinvolte. Ogni giorno settimanale che non sia un giorno festivo è considerato giorno lavorativo.Il mio bonifico non è arrivato: dov'è?Pur tenendo in considerazione quanto detto sopra, il bonifico non è ancora arrivato? In questi casi, solo la banca emittente può aprire un'indagine interna.Sfortunatamente, noi di N26 non possiamo indagare sui bonifici in entrata, ma solo su quelli in uscita. Ma puoi comunque consultare questa lista di possibili motivi per cui un bonifico potrebbe non andare a buon fine.Informazioni aggiuntiveIl sistema con cui inviamo tutti i nostri bonifici SEPA si chiama TARGET2 (nuova tabella), elabora i pagamenti ogni giorno lavorativo dalle 7.00 alle 18.00 ed è chiuso nei seguenti giorni: 1° gennaio (Capodanno), Venerdì Santo, Lunedì dell’Angelo, 1 maggio, 25 dicembre (Natale) e 26 dicembre.

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (“PSD2”) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you’ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them. *applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: How to get a bank statement?
answer: A bank statement is a document that shows the total balance of your account and all incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers, direct debits, card payments, etc. It also shows the name and surname of the account holder, and the IBAN and BIC numbers of the account. Here’s how to find yours:From the mobile app (PDF): on the Home screen, tap the 3 horizontal bars in the top right-hand corner and select Balance Statements.You can also download a statement for a specific space: go to Spaces, choose one of your spaces, tap the settings icon in the top right corner and select Balance Statements.From the web app (PDF): click the download (new tab) icon* and select the relevant month under Bank statements.From the web app (CSV): click the download (new tab) icon* and, under CSV, select the start and end dates you need and click on Download CSV.   * The download icon is the square with an arrow pointing down, placed on the left of the ‘Add money’ button.

question: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
answer: Die kontaktlose Bezahlung mit deiner Karte erfolgt per Nahfeldkommunikation (NFC). Bei Problemen mit der kontaktlosen Bezahlung solltest du Folgendes beachten:Überprüfe, ob in deinen Karteneinstellungen die kontaktlose Bezahlung aktiviert ist.Wenn deine Karte neu ist, musst du sie zuvor einmal an einem Geldautomaten oder an einem Zahlungsterminal mit Chip & PIN benutzt haben. Erst danach kannst du sie auch für die kontaktlose Bezahlung verwenden.Bei kontaktlosen Zahlungen mit deiner Karte (NFC) bis zu 50 € ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich.
