If you need to provide us with a document, simply select Add Attachment. Please make sure that the total file size of your attachments per message doesn't exceed 25MB. Messages doesn’t replace our chat and you can still send us an email. If you need to get in touch with us first, visit our page How to contact N26? If we need to verify you, we’ll ask you to open a chat with us.

question: ¿Qué es una tarjeta virtual?
answer: Si contratas una cuenta N26 Estándar, obtendrás una tarjeta virtual gratis (siempre y cuando tengas un saldo mínimo extraordinario de 10 € para activar la tarjeta). Una tarjeta virtual adicional es ideal para tus compras online, lo que te da un extra de tranquilidad al compartir los detalles de tu tarjeta en internet. También es perfecta para mantener tus suscripciones y pagos recurrentes separados de tus compras del día a día.Los clientes de N26 Smart, YOU y Metal tienen la opción de pedir una tarjeta virtual gratis además de la tarjeta física gratuita que reciben junto con su contrato premium. Recuerda: Los clientes de N26 Estándar tienen la opción de pedir una tarjeta física por una comisión única de 10 € (sin necesidad de contratar una cuenta premium).¿Cómo pedir y activar mi tarjeta virtual?Inicia sesión en tu cuenta y abre la pestaña Tarjetas, en la esquina inferior derecha.Pulsa «Obtener una tarjeta adicional».Selecciona «Virtual» en la parte superior y pulsa «Elegir» en la parte inferior.Lee y acepta los términos y condiciones y pulsa «Generar tarjeta virtual».Añade tu tarjeta virtual a Apple Pay o Google Pay u omite este paso.¿Cómo uso mi tarjeta virtual?Pagar en un establecimiento empleando Apple o Google Pay: Vincula tu tarjeta virtual a tu Apple o Google Pay, dependiendo de tu dispositivo.Retirar dinero en efectivo: Cuando hayas vinculado la tarjeta virtual a tu wallet de Apple o Google, podrás retirar dinero en efectivo en cajeros que tengan función contactless. También puedes utilizar CASH26 para ingresar o retirar dinero en efectivo (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR).Realizar compras online: Puedes consultar los datos de tu tarjeta virtual en la app (número de tarjeta, fecha de caducidad y número CVV). Para consultar estos datos:Inicia sesión en tu app móvil de N26Selecciona «Tarjetas»Busca tu tarjeta virtual (desliza hacia la izquierda para buscar tu tarjeta virtual si tienes más de una)Selecciona «Información de la tarjeta»Tendrás que introducir el PIN de confirmación o utilizar el inicio de sesión biométrico para ver los datos de tus tarjetas virtuales durante 60 segundosLa Mastercard virtual solo está disponible para cuentas N26 Estándar abiertas a partir de febrero de 2021 y para todas las cuentas premium de N26 a partir del 9 de octubre de 2021.

question: What is the N26 Webform for GDPR requests?
answer:
Safeguarding personal and financial data of our customers is one of our highest priority. For this reason we provide our N26 webform for GDPR requests which enables all N26 customers, former N26 customers (whose account is now closed) and their authorized representatives, who have enquiries about personal data, to contact N26 in a secure way. How does it work? The webform (new tab) should be used when a N26 customer or N26 former customer wants to exercise their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") themselves or through an authorized representative. 
In particular, you will be able to exercise:Right of access, under Art. 15 GDPR (new tab)Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"), under Art. 17 GDPR (new tab)Right to object to processing, under Art. 21 GDPR (new tab)You can expect to receive an answer from our dedicated team within a maximum of 30 calendar days.When filling out the webform, you will be asked to enter:Your country of residenceYour N26 status (customer, former customer, authorized representative thereof)Your request typeName, last name and email addressAs a N26 former customer or an authorized representative, is there anything else I need to provide? Former customers and their authorized representatives are required to upload further documentation in order to legitimize their identity and ensure that the receiver of the data is actually entitled to do so.Here is the documentation required:Former customers: copy of the ID / PassportAuthorized representatives: copy of the ID / Passport and a signed Power of Attorney Once the form is filled out in its entirety, click on Submit and send your request.Why is a manual ID / Passport review needed for N26 former customers or authorized representatives?Essentially, we request a copy of the ID / Passport for identity validation purposes and to ensure personal data, including financial information, does not fall into the wrong hands.A manual ID review is carried out when there is a need to verify a person’s identity, and it’s not possible for us to do so in accordance with our standardised verification framework. As the identity of former customers and authorized representatives is not verifiable via their interactions with our WebApp or App, since they have no access to the WebApp or App, we need to be able to verify their identity by using alternative means. Questions or concerns about this topic?Feel free to contact our Customer Support team. We can be reached at support@n26.com (new tab).

question: Comment N26 protège mon compte ?
answer: Même si nous souhaitons vous offrir une expérience bancaire simple et mobile sur votre smartphone, nous ne faisons aucun compromis sur la sécurité. Notre architecture de sécurité en trois étapes nous permet de sécuriser votre compte et votre argent :Connexion sécurisée. Les données nécessaires pour se connecter, c'est-à-dire le nom d'utilisateur, le mot de passe ou l'empreinte digitale ou le système de reconnaissance faciale (selon le type de smartphone) sont identiques pour l'application mobile N26 et votre espace personnel sur notre site internet (nouvel onglet). Veillez à définir un mot de passe sûr et à ne partager vos données de connexion avec personne.Code de validation. Il s'agit d'un code à 4 chiffres à définir soi-même après la première synchronisation de votre smartphone avec votre compte. Il doit être saisi à chaque fois que vous réalisez une transaction depuis votre application N26 ou depuis votre espace personnel sur notre site internet.Push notification. Il s'agit d'une notification sécurisée envoyée sur le smartphone associé à votre compte. Si cette notification est envoyée pour une validation de transaction via 3D Secure, vous devez vous connecter à l’application pour confirmer la transaction.À chacun de vos contacts, nous vous poserons quelques questions afin de nous assurer que vous êtes bien le bénéficiaire du compte.En aucun cas nous ne vous demanderons votre numéro de carte (16 chiffres), votre cryptogramme de sécurité (CVV), votre mot de passe, votre code de validation ou code PIN de carte. Vous êtes l’unique personne qui doit connaître ces informations et N26 ne vous demandera jamais de les communiquer.Par ailleurs, nous assurons également la sécurité de votre compte en conservant un minimum de données vous concernant. Nous le faisons uniquement pendant la durée qui nous est imposée par la loi. Nous supprimons toutes vos données dès lors qu’elles ne sont plus nécessaires pour les produits ou services que nous vous offrons.Pour trouver plus d’information concernant la protection de vos données, nous vous invitons à lire notre Politique de confidentialité (nouvel onglet).

question: What is Phishing?
answer: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If you’d like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. We’ll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an ‘eml’ file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above. Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we can’t use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following: Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone. Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the “phone spoofing” technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website that’s being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps they’re offering limited-time promotional deals. It’s important to note that just because “N26” is part of the URL, this doesn’t necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect you’re on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesn’t, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.

question: Paiement anticipé de votre abonnement Premium
answer: Votre contrat d'adhésion est valable pour un an, après quoi il sera automatiquement renouvelé pour une période indéfinie jusqu'à ce que vous décidiez de l'annuler. Vous pouvez le faire à tout moment (voir ci-dessous). Nous vous informerons 2 mois avant la date de fin de votre contrat que celui-ci sera désormais renouvelé indéfiniment.Quelles sont mes options de facturation ?Vous pouvez choisir de régler vos cotisations tous les mois ou en plusieurs mensualités anticipées (6 ou 12 mois, par exemple) afin de profiter d'une réduction. Cela n'affectera pas la durée de votre contrat annuel.Si par exemple vous choisissez de payer 6 mensualités d'avance en un seul paiement, vous effectuerez un paiement pour les 6 premiers mois de votre contrat annuel au début de votre adhésion, et un deuxième paiement 6 mois plus tard, pour la deuxième moitié de votre contrat annuel.Quand et comment puis-je payer ?Votre adhésion sera activée et vous accéderez à tous vos avantages Premium dès que vous aurez réglé la première cotisation de votre adhésion. Vous pouvez effectuer votre premier paiement avec une carte de crédit ou de débit ou avec Apple Pay ou Google Wallet. Vous accéderez alors à vos avantages Premium dès l'instant où vous aurez vérifié votre identité. Sinon, vous pouvez choisir d'alimenter votre compte et nous déduirons automatiquement de votre solde le montant de la première cotisation de vos frais d’adhésion.Si nous ne recevons pas le premier paiement de votre adhésion (c'est à dire votre première mensualité ou les cotisations payées en avance) dans les 15 jours qui suivent votre vérification d'identité, nous déduirons la somme correspondante de votre compte N26 et vous donnerons accès à l’ensemble des avantages Premium à ce moment-là. Par la suite, vos cotisations seront prélevées automatiquement sur votre compte selon le mode de facturation que vous avez choisi.Comment annuler mon adhésion à N26 ?Mettre fin au renouvellement de l'adhésion : vous pouvez arrêter le renouvellement automatique de votre adhésion à tout moment avant la fin de votre contrat d'adhésion de 12 mois en nous contactant sur le LiveChat. Si vous mettez fin au renouvellement, vous pourrez continuer à utiliser votre carte N26 et profiter des avantages de votre adhésion jusqu'à l'expiration de votre contrat d'adhésion. Pour les comptes N26 You et N26 Metal, cela signifie que vous continuerez à profiter des couvertures d'assurance tant que vous vous acquitterez de vos frais d'adhésion.Annulation immédiate : vous pouvez mettre fin à votre adhésion à tout moment en nous contactant. Si vous choisissez cette option, votre carte Premium N26 Smart, N26 You ou N26 Metal sera désactivée et nous émettrons pour vous une carte virtuelle au moment où vous passerez à un compte gratuit N26 Standard. Les clients N26 You et N26 Metal perdent immédiatement leur couverture d'assurance. Révocation : vous pouvez révoquer votre adhésion pendant une période de 14 jours suivant le prélèvement de vos premiers frais mensuels. Il vous suffit de nous contacter et nous vous assisterons. Nous désactiverons alors votre Mastercard N26 et émettrons une carte virtuelle associée à votre compte N26 Standard.Est-ce que je peux me faire rembourser ?Si vous annulez votre adhésion durant la période de rétractation de 14 jours, nous vous remboursons intégralement le montant que vous avez versé initialement. Si vous résiliez votre adhésion au-delà de la période de rétractation de 14 jours, nous vous rembourserons toute mensualité restante que vous auriez payée en avance.En revanche, si vous avez bénéficié d'une réduction pour les mensualités payées en avance, nous vous rembourserons les mensualités restantes mais la réduction dont vous avez bénéficié sera déduite du montant de votre remboursement. En effet, vous ne pouvez bénéficier de la réduction que si vous maintenez votre adhésion durant toute la période payée en avance.

question: How does N26 Business work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.It’s not yet possible to switch between accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive (0.1% | 0.5%) cashback every month on all payments made using the card. All payment refunds received during the month will be discounted from the total payments amount in order to calculate the cashback. The refunds might be related to a payment made on the same or a previous month. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).The cashback is issued on a monthly basis, processing eligible transactions of a given month the following natural month, starting from day 15th. Please expect a 7 days delay for the cashback to be credited into your N26 Business account.As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account.

question: Why is N26 secure?
answer: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login. Your login details of both the mobile and WebApp (new tab) consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN. This 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then change it in the app yourself after that.Push messages. For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added 3D Secure to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us we’ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we’ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.We’ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can download your personal data up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our Privacy Policy (new tab).

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of €50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional €10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least €10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: ¿Cómo descargar el extracto bancario?
answer: El extracto bancario es un documento en el que se refleja el saldo total de tu cuenta y todas las transacciones entrantes y salientes (transferencias, domiciliaciones, pagos con tarjeta, etc.). También aparecen el nombre y apellidos del titular de la cuenta, el IBAN y el BIC.Desde la app del móvil (PDF): en la pantalla de Inicio, pulsa en las 3 barritas de la esquina superior derecha y selecciona Extractos.También puedes descargar el extracto de un espacio concreto: ve a Espacios, elige un espacio, pulsa en el icono de configuración en la esquina superior derecha y selecciona Extractos.Desde la WebApp (PDF): haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaña nueva) y selecciona el mes en cuestión bajo Extractos bancarios.Desde la WebApp (CSV): haz clic en el icono de descargas* (pestaña nueva), bajo CSV, selecciona las fechas de inicio y fin que necesites y haz clic en Descargar CSV.* El icono de descargas es el cuadrado con una flecha hacia abajo que se encuentra a la izquierda del botón de Ingresar dinero.

question: Con quale frequenza posso prelevare contanti gratuitamente?
answer: Il numero di prelievi gratuiti di contanti con la tua Mastercard dipende dal tipo di conto che possiedi e dai Termini e condizioni del tuo Paese di riferimento (quello in cui è stata originariamente spedita la carta).Per i possessori di conti N26 Standard (nuova tabella):3 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese, in ogni paese (prelievi sempre gratuiti utilizzando CASH26)Per i possessori di tutti gli altri conti N26 Premium (nuova tabella):Germania: 5 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese in Germania (prelievi sempre gratuiti utilizzando CASH26)Austria e Italia: Prelievi gratuiti illimitati (compreso CASH26)*Francia, Spagna, Paesi Bassi e resto d'Europa: 5 prelievi ATM gratuiti al mese nel Paese di residenza e nell'EurozonaSvizzera: Da 3 a 5* prelievi gratuiti al mese nella zona europea e 1,7% di commissione sui prelievi localiSi applica sempre una commissione di 2 € se si utilizza la carta Maestro per prelevare contanti (disponibile solo in Germania, Austria e nei Paesi Bassi). Se hai il nostro conto N26 Flex, ogni prelievo costa 2 €. Controlla i nostri listini prezzi se ti è stata addebitata una commissione per un prelievo da uno sportello bancomat.*I clienti con IBAN Italiano posso prelevare e depositare contanti con CASH26 per un massimo di 2000€ a settimana.

question: How to block my N26 card?
answer: You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to the Cards tab and select Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Cos'è N26 Rate?
answer: Requisiti d'idoneità: N26 Rate è attualmente disponibile solo per i clienti che hanno aperto un conto con IBAN tedesco.N26 Rate ti permette di suddividere una transazione da 3 fino a 6 rate mensili dello stesso importo direttamente nell'app. Se hai effettuato un acquisto importante e vorresti ammortizzarne il costo nel tempo, puoi utilizzare N26 Rate. Puoi suddividere in questo modo le transazioni idonee che hai effettuato nelle ultime 4 settimane. Avrai così maggior controllo delle tue spese e potrai gestire il tuo budget mensile come preferisci.Caratteristiche di N26 Rate:Leggi qui sotto le caratteristiche di N26 Rate. Ti preghiamo di notare che i tassi di interesse dipendono dalla valutazione di rischio di credito effettuata da N26. Inoltre, il servizio può essere utilizzato solo con transazioni considerate idonee per la suddivisione, il che dipende sia dal tipo di transazione che dall'esercente presso cui l'hai effettuata.Tasso annuo effettivo globale (TAEG): dal 7,99% al 13,99% (a seconda della valutazione di rischio di credito)Importo: tra 20 € e 200 €Durata di N26 Rate: la durata del finanziamento N26 Rate è compresa tra 3 e 6 mesi, con addebito della prima rata il giorno della sottoscrizione e l'opzione di rimborso anticipato (la rata viene addebitata mensilmente).Idoneità dell'esercente / della transazione: N26 Rate è offerto per un'ampia gamma di acquisti in diverse categorie, inclusa l'elettronica, l'arredamento, biglietti aerei e ferroviari, moda e addirittura pagamenti effettuati presso il tuo negozio di quartiere preferito!Ulteriori informazioni:Suddividi in rate gli acquisti attraverso il finanziamento nella tua app N26Torna indietro fino a 4 settimane per suddividere gli acquisti passatiPossibilità di rimborso anticipato del finanziamento Addebito diretto in rate mensili Pagamento manuale dei pagamenti saltatiPromemoria automatico un giorno prima della scadenzaPromemoria automatico quando salti un pagamentoCome usare N26 Rate?Dopo aver portato a termine una transazione, se è idonea, puoi accedere a N26 Rate in diversi modi:Vedrai una scheda pratica nel tuo feed delle transazioniScorri fino alla fine della scheda 'Esplora' e tocca N26 Rate sotto Prodotti finanziari.Una volta che il finanziamento è stato creato, puoi vedere la sezione con le rate seguendo questi passaggi:Seleziona 'Opzioni' (i tre puntini in alto nel feed delle transazioni)Vai su 'N26 Rate'Dopo aver selezionato una transazione idonea che vuoi rateizzare, verrai guidato attraverso gli step sottostanti per confermare l'utilizzo di N26 Rate:Per prima cosa ti verranno fornite informazioni su N26 RatePoi vedrai l'analisi dettagliata del Tasso Annuo Effettivo Globale (TAEG) applicabile, l’importo totale da restituire e in fondo allo schermo troverai uno slider che ti permette di scegliere la durata (anche le rate mensili verranno mostrate sullo schermo)In seguito vedrai la schermata finale, dove ti sarà richiesto di prendere visione e sottoscrivere la documentazione contrattuale per confermare l’operazione.Dopo aver confermato un finanziamento con N26 Rate ti verrà accreditato l'importo corrispondente al tuo acquisto direttamente sul tuo conto principale. Addebiteremo contemporaneamente l'importo corrispondente alla prima rata. I pagamenti delle rate restanti ti verranno addebitati automaticamente sul conto principale a scadenza regolare ogni mese (riceverai un promemoria 1 giorno prima della scadenza del pagamento).Come gestisco N26 Rate?Puoi gestire il tuo finanziamento con N26 Rate navigando nella sezione corrispondente dell'app e selezionando il menu delle opzioni (i 3 puntini in alto a destra nel feed delle transazioni) e poi andando su N26 Rate. Dopodiché potrai vedere:Il saldo totale dei finanziamenti da restituireLe rate dei finanziamentiDettagli sulle ratePiano di rimborsoL'opzione per rimborsare l'intero importo

question: Why do I need to send additional documents?
answer: Once you have started the verification process to open your N26 Bank Account and you receive an email from us requesting additional information to continue with your sign-up, please read the below information to help you with your application.N26 is a regulated bank, and in certain scenarios we may need additional pieces of information from our customers to continue with your sign-up. This is a standard request that aligns with legal and regulatory requirements. We will need you to provide us with specific documents in-order to open a N26 Bank Account.We appreciate that this information is very personal to you and the information you send us will remain strictly confidential. And will only be used to fulfil our legal obligations.What documentation do I need to send?For all the Italian IBAN account holdersIf you have an N26 account with an Italian IBAN and you have received a communication from us with the request to provide additional documentation, please reply to the message within the indicated deadline. Below, you can find a list of the documents that may be needed in order to verify the requested information. We remind you that if you do not respond to our request or if the documents sent are not valid or legible, some features of your account may be restricted.1. A document certifying your residence, such as:Certificate of residenceVisa documentationDocumentation on ongoing study activities (university enrollment or long-term professional course)Registration certificate of your vehicleAny other document issued in the last 90 days and in your name that can prove your residential addressResidents in Italy can download the residence certificate at this link (new tab) if in possession of SPID / CIE or CNS → Certificates → "Request for yourself" → flag "of Residence" → "Stamped with exemption from paying tax until 31/12/2022 pursuant to art. 62, paragraph 3, of the CAD" → and select "I wish to receive the certificate by email" to receive it by email or "I want to download the certificate" to download it.2. A document that certifies your home address, if different from that of residence, such as:Gas, water, internet or electricity bill issued in the last 90 days and in your nameLeaseAny other document in your name that can prove your home address3. Any document that can certify the main source of income, such as:Most recent employment contract or pay slipTax return (Single Certification or Model 730 or Income Model for Individuals)Proof of old age pension or unemployment benefit (NASpI / Citizenship Income)Receipt of occasional performanceBalance sheet and income statement (e.g. bank statement)Real estate lease / real estate deed of sale / passive income / accrued annuities supported by any public deeds and / or contractsDeclaration issued by the main provider of services related to virtual currencies (VASP) used from the date of opening the account4. Any document that can certify your primary source of your funds, whether additional to or different from your source of income, such as:Bank statement and / or deposit / securities brokerage statementInformation on sales of financial assets, capital gainsInheritance / Bequest / DonationTrust / Equity FundOther contracts that can certify the origin of your funds5. If you have an N26 business account, we also need proof of your VAT number, such as:Certificate of attribution of VAT numberExtract from the Chamber of Commerce / Chamber of Commerce registration (only for sole proprietorships)An invoice issued in the last 90 days in the name of your unique companyWe assure you that your data will remain strictly confidential and will only be used in the execution of the activities prescribed by law.How do I send you this information?First of all, log into your N26 mobile app, select the Support> Messages from N26 icon.Here you will find our communication. Please read the instructions in the message carefully, and select Reply.When you reply, you will need to send scans, photographs and / or screenshots of each requested document, with a detailed description. Everything must be clear and legible and not exceed 25 MB in total.Important: Sending false and / or inaccurate information is a criminal offense. If the information is not true or incomplete we will not be able to accept your request.

question: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
answer: For iOS customers who are not receiving our Pairing SMS, you may have a feature enabled that filters our SMS. To find our message in iMessage, go to the Filters option in the top left and select the Unknown senders folder.A pairing code is required to connect your smartphone to your account. If you didn’t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you’ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it’s likely that you’ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of €50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional €10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least €10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: How long does a bank transfer take?
answer: Incoming SEPA instant transfers to N26 accounts are instant, as long as they are sent from a bank that supports instant credit transfers. However, transfers may sometimes be delayed if they need to be checked due to SEPA banking regulationsIncoming regular SEPA transfers arrive within a maximum of 2 working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer is made just before a weekend or holiday, the time frame will be extended to a maximum of 3 working days.Incoming SWIFT transfers take up to 4 working days to arrive. Outgoing SEPA instant transfers arrive instantly. Regular outgoing SEPA transfers take up to 2 working days. Outgoing foreign currency transfers with our partner Wise take up to 4 working days. Outgoing SWIFT transfers are not supported. What’s a “banking day”?One banking day is equivalent to two working days due to the opening hours of the banks involved. Any weekday that is not a holiday is considered a working day.My transfer hasn’t arrived — where is it?So what if you’ve factored in all of the above, and the transfer still hasn’t come through? In such cases, only the issuing bank can launch an internal investigation.Unfortunately at N26, we can’t investigate incoming transfers, only outgoing ones. But you can still consult this list of potential reasons why a transfer might fail.

question: PSD2 - Open Banking für Drittanbieter
answer:
HintergrundDie Zweite EU-Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (PSD2) bringt einige Änderungen für Zahlungsdienste innerhalb der Europäischen Union mit sich. Ziel der PSD2 ist es, einen einheitlicheren, transparenteren und offeneren EU-Zahlungsmarkt zu schaffen und allen Marktteilnehmern Innovation, Wettbewerb und Sicherheit zu bieten.Wenn Sie als Drittanbieter Zugang zu den PSD2-Schnittstellen von N26 erhalten möchten, müssen Sie von einer nationalen Aufsichtsbehörde lizenziert sein. In Deutschland ist dies die Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in Bonn. Außerdem benötigen Sie dafür ein qualifiziertes Zertifikat für die Website-Authentifizierung (QWAC). Solche Zertifikate können Sie bei qualifizierten Vertrauensdiensteanbietern (QTSP (neuen Tab)) beantragen.Dedizierte SchnittstelleUnsere dedizierte Schnittstelle ist die REST API, die mit Version 1.3.6 der Implementierungsrichtlinien der Berlin Group (neuen Tab) konform ist.Autorisierungsprotokoll: oAuth 2.0 (neuen Tab).Anmerkung: Hinweis: Für den Zugriff auf die API der Berlin Group ist ein gültiges QWAC-Zertifikat erforderlich. Die offizielle Liste der qualifizierten Vetrauensdiensteanbieter ist auf der Vertrauensliste der Europäischen Kommission auf Grundlage der eIDAS-Verordnung (neuen Tab) verfügbar. Für die dedizierte PSD2-Schnittstelle (API) von N26 muss ein QWAC-Zertifikat von einer qualifizierten Zertifizierungsstelle ausgestellt werdenNotfallmechanismusIm Rahmen seiner gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen gemäß der PSD2 hat N26 einen Notfallmechanismus implementiert, der Folgendes vorsieht:Zuverlässige Identifizierung eines Drittanbieters über den Besitz eines gültigen QWAC-Zertifikats (Qualifiziertes Zertifikat für die Website-Authentifizierung).Sicherer und autorisierter Zugriff auf ein KontoDrittanbieter können über die folgenden URLs auf unseren Notfallmechanismus zugreifen:https://aisp.tech26.dehttps://pisp.tech26.deDer Zugriff auf die obigen URLs und der Aufbau der TLS-Verbindung erfordern die Nutzung eines qualifizierten Zertifikats.DokumentationTPPs finden die folgende Dokumentation im öffentlichen GitHub-Repository von N26 (neuen Tab):AISP- und PISP-Dokumentation für die dedizierte SchnittstelleGreifen Sie auf die Dokumentation für Sandbox zuAISP- und PISP-Dokumentation für die Fallback-SchnittstelleOffene API- und Sandbox-PostbotensammlungHäufig gestellte FragenWir empfehlen TPPs, sich auf das Repository zu beziehen, um die neuesten Informationen zu technischer Dokumentation und Spezifikation zu erhalten.Für Anfragen und Support im Zusammenhang mit N26 Open Banking verwenden Sie bitte dieses Formular (neuen Tab).Daten zur Verfügbarkeit und Leistung der SchnittstelleIn den folgenden Berichten werden die Verfügbarkeit und Leistung unserer dedizierten PSD2-Schnittstelle mit dem PSU-Interface verglichen:Q3 2019 (neuen Tab) / Q4 2019 (neuen Tab)
Q1 2020 (neuen Tab) / Q2 2020 (neuen Tab) / Q3 2020 (neuen Tab) / Q4 2020 (neuen Tab)Aktuelle Neuigkeiten*Für alle unten mitgeteilten API-Änderungen bitten wir dich, weitere Einzelheiten in unserer API-Dokumentation und den häufig gestellten Fragen nachzulesen und alle erforderlichen Änderungen deines Systems im Voraus vorzunehmen, um Unterbrechungen in der Nutzung unserer Schnittstelle(n) zu vermeiden.**Wenn du direkt über bevorstehende Änderungen informiert werden möchtest, trage dich bitte hier (neuen Tab) in unsere Mailingliste ein.26. August, 2022 SEPA und SEPA-Sofortüberweisungen können jetzt initiiert werden ohne das Debtor-Konto zu spezifizieren, im vorgesehenen Interface.01. August, 2022 Die Initiierung von SEPA-Sofortüberweisungen wird jetzt im Fallback-Interface unterstützt.29. Juli, 2022 Betragsbestätigungsendpunkte werden jetzt im vorgesehenen Interface unterstützt.30. Juni, 2022 Die Initiierung von SEPA-Sofortüberweisungen wird jetzt im dafür vorgesehenen Interface unterstützt.17. Mai 2022 Neuer Spaces Endpunkt /api/v3/spaces ist live im AIS Fallback Interface; alter Spaces Endpunkt /api/spaces wird am 17. August 2022 deaktiviert.25. April 2022 Das Feld “Zusätzliche Informationen” wurde zu den bereitgestellten Transaktionsinformationen im dedizierten Interface als ID hinzugefügt, die alle Kartentransaktionen im Zusammenhang mit einem einzelnen Kauf verknüpft.24. Januar 2022 werden die folgenden Parameter zu den Transaktionsinformationen hinzugefügt, die wir ab dem 25. April 2022 im Dedicated Interface bereitstellen: mandateID, creditorID, remittanceInformationUnstructured.Weitere Informationen findest du in der AISP-Dokumentation für das Dedicated Interface. Bitte führe alle erforderlichen Änderungen vor dem 25. April 2022 durch, um eine unterbrechungsfreie Nutzung unserer Schnittstelle zu gewährleisten.13. Dezember 2021 Transaktionen, die zuvor als „ausstehend“ eingestuft wurden, werden ab dem 14. März 2022 in der dedizierten Oberfläche als „gebuchte“ Transaktionen klassifiziert.17. November 2021 /api/v2/spaces-Endpunkt in der AIS-Fallback-Schnittstelle deaktiviert03. Februar 2021 Die Token.io-Schnittstelle (gilt seit 04. November 2020 als veraltet) wird ab dem 01. März 2021 vollständig deaktiviert.

question: Comment se connecter avec l’authentification à deux facteurs ?
answer:
L’authentification à deux facteurs est une procédure d’identification qui constitue une protection supplémentaire en établissant une authentification à deux ou plusieurs facteurs pour vous connecter à votre compte.
En plus d’utiliser votre mot de passe, vous aurez maintenant besoin soit d'une confirmation depuis votre appareil synchronisé soit d'un code SMS pour vous connecter à votre compte.
 
Découvrez également comment fonctionne l’Authentification Forte du Client (SCA).Comment me connecter avec l’authentification à deux facteurs ?Lorsque vous vous connectez à votre compte N26 à partir d’un navigateur Web ou d'un appareil non synchronisé à votre compte, vous serez invité à confirmer votre connexion depuis une notification envoyée sur votre téléphone synchronisé ou vous devrez saisir un code envoyé par SMS au numéro de téléphone lié à votre compte. Après avoir confirmé votre connexion, vous pourrez alors vous connecter à votre compte N26.
Lorsque vous vous connectez à votre compte N26 à partir de votre appareil synchronisé, l'authentification à deux facteurs est déjà automatiquement activée. Par conséquent, il vous suffit de saisir votre identifiant et votre mot de passe pour vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronisé.Quelles sont les conditions requises ?Dans un premier temps, veuillez télécharger la dernière mise à jour de l'application (minimum version 3.31) et essayer de vous connecter depuis votre appareil synchronisé.
Si vous ne pouvez toujours pas vous connecter à votre compte mais que vous avez toujours accès à l'adresse e-mail liée à votre compte N26, veuillez essayer de réinitialiser votre mot de passe.
Si vous n'avez pas accès à l'adresse e-mail liée à votre compte N26, veuillez contacter notre service client depuis le Livechat pour que nous puissions vous aider.Que dois-je faire si je ne me souviens plus de mon mot de passe ?Vous trouverez plus d’informations sur l’article Comment créer un nouveau mot de passe ? de notre Support Center.Je n'ai plus accès à mon appareil synchronisé. Comment puis-je me connecter à nouveau à mon compte ?Si vous n'avez plus accès à votre appareil synchronisé mais que vous avez toujours accès au numéro de téléphone lié à votre compte N26, veuillez vous connecter à votre compte N26 et demander un code d'authentification :Connectez-vous à votre compte depuis votre espace client en ligne ou un appareil non synchroniséSélectionnez Aide au moment où l'on vous demande de confirmer votre connexion depuis votre appareil synchroniséChoisissez Recevoir un code par SMSDès que vous aurez reçu le code par SMS, rentrez-le dans l'espace indiquéAprès avoir confirmé votre connexion grâce au code d'authentification, vous aurez donc terminé l’authentification à deux facteurs et vous pourrez synchroniser votre nouvel appareil à votre compte.Que dois-je faire si j'ai un nouveau numéro de téléphone ou si je ne suis pas en mesure de recevoir des SMS ?Si vous n'avez pas accès au numéro de téléphone lié à votre compte - soit parce que vous avez un nouveau numéro de téléphone, soit parce que votre téléphone a été perdu ou volé - veuillez contacter notre Service client depuis le Livechat pour que nous puissions vous aider.Et si mon téléphone n’est pas compatible avec la dernière version de l’application ? Si vous possédez un téléphone qui n’est pas compatible avec la dernière version de l’application, vous ne pourrez malheureusement plus accéder à votre compte N26 depuis votre application mobile sur ce téléphone.
Vous devrez confirmer votre connexion via le code SMS que nous enverrons au numéro de téléphone lié à votre compte N26 pour vous connecter à votre compte depuis votre espace client en ligne.
Vous pourrez effectuer vos transactions habituelles avec votre Mastercard, cependant veuillez noter que vous ne pourrez effectuer aucun virement tant que vous ne pourrez pas le confirmer dans l'application N26 depuis votre appareil synchronisé.

question: Why is there a waitlist to sign up?
answer: To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes to become an even better bank for you in the years to come. With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. With this, we have had to temporarily pause new customer onboarding in certain markets. We encourage you to sign up to our waiting list and will be in touch as soon as we’re able to offer you the account of your choice.Will this pause affect existing customers?This temporary pause in new signups will not affect existing N26 customers at all and you can expect the same seamless, safe and secure digital banking experience on your smartphone you know and love.We are working hard to make the process as smooth as possible for anyone trying to sign up and we do expect to be able to open new accounts for all customers soon.How will I know when I can open an account again?If you tried to open an account and were unable to do so, the best way to stay updated would be to sign up to our waiting list. We’re going to get in touch as soon as we are able to make the account of your choice available to you.As we continue to see tremendous demand for our product, we still want to make sure to offer all customers on our waiting list fair access to the N26 banking experience by contacting them on a first-come-first-served basis once we are going to be able to offer them an account. Can I open an N26 account in my country?

question: What are N26 Installments?
answer: Eligibility requirements: N26 Installments is currently only available for customers who’ve opened their account in Spain, and who have a ES or DE IBAN.N26 Installments allows you to split a transaction directly in the app after it has been made into 3 to 6 equal monthly repayments. If you are making a large purchase and wish to spread the cost over time, you can use N26 Installments to do so. You can split eligible transactions made in the past 4 weeks. Giving you greater control with managing your monthly budget in a convenient way.N26 Installments Characteristics:Please see below for N26 Installments characteristics. Please note, rates are dependent on your financial situation. Additionally, the transaction must be eligible to be split, this is dependent on both the transaction made and the merchant you are purchasing from.Effective Annual interest rate: From 7.49% to 13.99% (financial situation dependent)Eligible purchase amount: From €20 - €200N26 Installments Duration: The N26 Installments duration is from 3 to 6 months, with the option of early loan repayment (the interest rate is charged monthly).Merchant / Transaction eligibility: N26 Installments is offered for a wide range of purchases in various categories, including electronics, furniture, plane and train tickets, fashion, and even payments made at your favorite small local store!Additional Information:Split purchases into installments within your N26 appGo back in time up to 4 weeks to split past purchasesFull early repayment of the loan Direct debit of monthly installments Pay missed payments manuallyAutomated reminder one day before due dateAutomated reminders when missing a payment Automated cancellation of the loan when >105 days in arrearsHow to use N26 Installments?Once you have completed the eligible transaction and if you are eligible, you can access N26 Installments in a number of different ways:You will see an Infocard in your transaction listScroll to the end of the ‘Explore’ tab and tap on N26 Installments under financial productsOnce an Installments loan has been created you can view the Installments section by:Selecting ‘Options’ (3 dots at the top of your transaction feed)Tap ‘N26 Installments’When you select the eligible transaction you want to split, you will be taken through the below steps to confirm using ‘N26 Installments’:First you will be provided with information about ‘N26 Installments’Then you can see a breakdown of the effective annual interest rate, the total cost you will have to pay and at the bottom of the screen there is a slider allowing you to choose the duration (your monthly payments will also show on this screen)Last you will see the confirmation screen where you will need to accept both checkboxes and then confirmAfter confirming your N26 Installments payment plan, you’ll be reimbursed for the total of your purchase amount directly into your main account. We’ll also take out your first installment payment at this time. The rest of the payments will then be automatically charged from your main account on the due date each month (you’ll receive payment reminders 1 day before your next payment is due).How to manage your N26 Installments?You can manage your N26 Installments by navigating to this section of the app by selecting the options menu (3 dots at the top right of the transaction feed) and then going into N26 Installments. There you will be able to:Total outstanding balanceCurrent installmentsInstallments detailsRepayment scheduleThe option to repay the amount in fullHow do we decide on your N26 Installment request?In order to swiftly and efficiently decide on your request for N26 Installments we evaluate your creditworthiness. In order to evaluate your creditworthiness, we generate an internal credit score. Within the scoring process we calculate how probable it is that you as a customer meet your payment obligations. For such calculations we process your personal data: your salary, your expenses, existing obligations, experiences of former contractual relations, repayment of former credits as agreed upon. Your scoring is the result of a mathematical-statistical procedure. Based on the data processed and the respective outcome of the internal scoring process, we determine whether we may offer you a N26 Account or N26 Installments and establish the conditions we can offer you for those products. Therefore, our scoring process is necessary to offer you an account with us (Payment services framework agreement - N26 Account) and to manage the offer of our credit contracts to you (as N26 Installments) according to Art. 22 (2) (a) and Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR. This information should already be helping you to understand the mathematically and statistically validated decision making process we offer to swiftly and efficiently perform and reply to your request for N26 Installments. You can get in touch with us here and explain why you think that we may have not yet sufficiently considered your point of view in our decision and why we should take further necessary information into account.After you get in touch with us regarding the respective automated decision, the decision will be reviewed by one of our employees. However, this does not guarantee a different decision by N26.

question: Where does N26 invest my money?
answer: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

question: Wie viel kostet es, eine Ersatzkarte für meine abgelaufene Karte zu erhalten?
answer: Ersatzkarten sind für alle Smart, You oder Metal Kunden kostenlos erhältlich.Wenn du dein Konto vor den folgenden Daten eröffnet hast, sind sowohl die neue Karte als auch der Versand an deine Adresse in den Ländern, in denen N26 verfügbar ist (neuen Tab), kostenlos:16.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz im europäischen Raum)25.02.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Italien oder Spanien)11.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Frankreich)18.03.2021 (Kunden mit offiziellem Wohnsitz in Deutschland, Österreich oder der Schweiz)Wenn dein Konto nach dem entsprechenden Datum erstellt wurde, kostet deine Ersatzkarte genauso viel wie die Bestellung einer neuen Karte.Wenn du derzeit in einem Land ansässig bist, das nicht von N26 unterstützt wird, wende dich bitte per Chat oder Telefon an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Bestellung für dich vornehmen können. Der Versand außerhalb dieser Länder (neuen Tab) kann mit zusätzlichen Kosten verbunden sein. Wie lange dauert die Lieferung?Alle Ersatzkarten für ablaufende oder abgelaufene Karten werden per Standardversand verschickt. Die Lieferung dauert bis zu 15 Werktage und ist kostenlos. In ländlichen und schlechter zu erreichenden Gebieten kann dies auch länger dauern. Um über den aktuellen Lieferstatus auf dem Laufenden zu bleiben, gehe einfach auf den Home Bildschirm deiner mobilen App von N26.Meine Karte läuft bald ab. Was kann ich tun?Kann ich meine Karte nach Ablauf weiter verwenden?Meine Karte ist bereits abgelaufen, aber ich habe keine Ersatzkarte erhalten.

question: Why did my Wise account linking fail?
answer:
If you are currently unable to link your existing Wise account, one of the most common reasons why this could have happened is due to incomplete personal details on your Wise account.
 
If you have set up an account in the past directly with Wise using the same email address as that registered on your N26 account and you did not fill out all the personal details, we will not be able to link your account within N26
 
You can follow the below steps to get access to your Wise account:Please login (new tab) to your Wise account by going to their website or via their app.Check your details and ensure that your full name, address, date of birth and phone number are complete.If you cannot remember your password go to their website (new tab) and follow these steps:Select ‘Forgot Password’ to reset your password.Follow the instruction sent to you and then access your account.If you cannot remember creating an account with Wise, you should still try to log in by resetting your password. It could be that it was created via another partner or some time ago.

question: Wie kann ich die Bestätigung einer SEPA-Überweisung herunterladen?
answer: Wenn du eine Überweisung getätigt hast und eine Bestätigung der Überweisung benötigst, kannst du diese als PDF-Datei inklusive der Transaktionsdaten in deiner mobilen App oder Web-App herunterladen. Das geht so:Logge dich in deiner N26 App einWähle aus der Transaktionsliste die Banküberweisung aus, für die du die Bestätigung herunterladen möchtest.Klicke auf "Überweisungsbestätigung herunterladen".Nachdem du diese Option auswählst, wird das Dokument automatisch auf dein Smartphone oder PC heruntergeladen.Welche Daten werde ich in der Überweisungsbestätigung finden?In der Überweisungsbestätigung findest du die Bankverbindung des Überweisenden und des Begünstigten der Überweisung, einschließlich des Transaktionsbetrags und des Datums, an dem die Überweisung stattgefunden hat.

question: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
answer:
The amount of free cash withdrawals you have with your N26 Mastercard depends on your T&C Country (the country you originally shipped your first card to) and which account type (new tab) you have.
 
To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator (new tab) and select 'no access fee' to find free ATM’s nearby. 
 
If you are charged an ATM fee this could be for a number of reasons and you can find out more below:A €2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. You can identify this fee in your transaction history as a separate transaction (we’ll remind you via push message when you’re running low on free withdrawals).Some ATM providers may charge independent fees which we can’t reject or reverse. The ATM should display the fee before you complete the withdrawal. In your transaction list the fee is added on top of the withdrawal amount. N26 fees on the other hand appear as separate transactions. Customers in Spain can find a solution here.Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 Standard, N26 Business and Smart account, there’s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You, Business You or N26 Metal and Business Metal members.Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A €2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands.If you have our N26 Flex account, all withdrawals cost 2€.

question: Come posso collegare il mio conto N26 a PayPal?
answer:
Se vuoi, puoi collegare il tuo conto N26 al tuo account PayPal, e avere così accesso a una serie di vantaggi. Potrai ricaricare istantaneamente il tuo conto corrente, inviare e ricevere pagamenti rapidi in tutta sicurezza e senza il bisogno di usare i tuoi dati bancari o il numero della tua carta N26.Ecco come collegare il tuo conto N26 dalla versione web di PayPal:Clicca su Portafoglio nella parte superiore della pagina.Seleziona Collega una carta o un conto bancarioClicca Collega un conto bancario.Segui le istruzioni fornite.
Se invece utilizzi l’app mobile di PayPal:Clicca su Impostazioni in alto a destraSeleziona Collega una carta o un conto bancarioClicca sul + e seleziona Conto bancarioInserisci i tuoi dati bancari e conferma 
Ricorda di immettere il tuo nome e cognome esattamente come riportato sul tuo conto N26, altrimenti il collegamento con PayPal non andrà a buon fine.Non appena il tuo conto N26 sarà confermato, PayPal effettuerà due addebiti di piccolo importo che saranno poi rimborsati sul tuo conto nel giro di 2-3 giorni lavorativi. A questo punto dovrai semplicemente prendere nota degli addebiti ricevuti, accedere al tuo account PayPal e confermare il collegamento del tuo conto N26 dal tuo Portafoglio.

question: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
answer: Please note: in order to receive your reward, your friend must perform a first card transaction (i.e. in-store purchase, ATM withdrawal or online payment - PayPal excluded) worth at least the value of the referral bonus. The reward may take up to 60 days to be credited into your account.Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or WebApp (new tab) to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isn’t rewarded because the invited friend hasn’t made a first 'Mastercard' transaction of at least the value of the reward or higher e.g. for a reward of 15 EUR the card transaction needs to be for 15 EUR or higher. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the Terms and Conditions (new tab).From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.

question: FATCA - Perché richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
answer: Come previsto dalla normativa FATCA, N26 ha l’obbligo di fornire informazioni finanziarie al Dipartimento del Tesoro e all’Internal Revenue Service (IRS) degli Stati Uniti sui conti di contribuenti statunitensi e di società estere in cui contribuenti statunitensi detengono interessi considerevoli.La normativa FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act) è stata introdotta dall’IRS con lo scopo di prevenire l’evasione fiscale di contribuenti statunitensi mediante l’apertura di conti presso istituti finanziari esteri. Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA sul sito www.irs.gov (nuova tabella) A differenza della maggior parte dei paesi del mondo, il sistema fiscale statunitense prevede la tassazione dei propri cittadini anche nei casi in cui abbiano la residenza fiscale all’estero.  Per stabilire se il tuo conto deve essere riportato all’IRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:1. Sei (anche) un cittadino statunitense o titolare di una Green Card (permesso di soggiorno permanente) per gli Stati Uniti?2. Sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti? Essere “soggetto a tasse” negli Stati Uniti non significa necessariamente pagare imposte sul reddito negli Stati Uniti. Implica, piuttosto, che le normative fiscali richiedono la compilazione della dichiarazione dei redditi (inerente tutti i redditi percepiti al di fuori degli Stati Uniti) da presentare all’IRS.  3. Se sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti, qual è il tuo Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)?Puoi fornire il tuo Social Security Number (SSN) statunitense oppure il tuo Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). Ti informiamo, inoltre, che se il tuo conto presenta un luogo di nascita statunitense, un numero di telefono statunitense oppure se hai impostato un ordine permanente verso gli Stati Uniti, secondo la normativa FATCA, verrai considerato un soggetto ai sensi del FATCA fino a quando non verrà dimostrato il contrario. Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. Basterà eseguire l’accesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.

question: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
answer:
To use your N26 account, you need one of the following smartphones:・ iPhone (5s or newer, with at least iOS 11 installed)
・ Android (6.0 or newer)Unfortunately, Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS versions aren't compatible with N26 at this time. Remember—you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.When do I need to pair my smartphone?You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you create an N26 account for the first time or when you get a new device or phone number.How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?Pairing my smartphone for the first timeTo connect your account to your smartphone for the first time, follow these steps:Log in to the N26 mobile app—you’ll be asked automatically to confirm your phone numberEnter the 4-digit code you receive from us via text (new tab) and your phone will pair automaticallyPairing a new deviceRemember—you can only pair one smartphone per N26 account.If you want to pair a new device to your N26 account, you’ll first have to unpair your old smartphone for security reasons (new tab). To unpair your old smartphone:Go to 👤 My Account (in the mobile app) or through the WebApp (new tab) (new tab)Then go to SecurityTap Unpair phoneIf you no longer have access to your old smartphone:Log in to 👤 My AccountGo to SecurityCheck your email for more directions on how to proceed.If you log in to your account with a new device, you'll receive two codes via text:The 6-digit code for logging inThe 4-digit code for pairing the smartphone to the accountYou'll need the 6-digit login code to access your account. You can then pair your device using the 4-digit code.Remember that if you change your SIM card but keep using the same smartphone, you won't need to pair/unpair your device.

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: With N26, you get real-time access to your bank account. This means you’re able to see what’s going on in your account as it happens. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once you’ve checked out of that hotel room or returned your rental car safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can’t cancel or reverse it. At that point, only three things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires. In the last two scenarios, your money will automatically return to your account within 12 days. Sometimes you’ll see both payments at the same time–the authorization and the presentment. This happens if they become disconnected, or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire, and if it doesn’t expire within 12 days, we can help you get your money back (new tab). Please note:Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account (instead of 12).Some merchants perform verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) in order to check whether your card is active and not empty. This money will always return to your account.The amount of an authorization may differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons (new tab).

question: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
answer: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience. You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the Apple App Store (new tab) or the Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

question: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
answer: ℹ️ Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between three new colors when ordering the card: Amber, Black and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 Metal with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Keep these in mind when considering N26 Metal (new tab):If you’re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: How to invite friends to join N26?
answer: From 1st October we have started to rework and improve our Friend Referral program. Until these changes have been completed, we have removed this information from the app. Invites and sign-ups before the 1st October will still be paid out as before. We do not have a current time frame on when we will be back to offering sign-up referrals.*Currently our friend referral program is only active in Germany and Austria (new tab) as well as in Spain (new tab).

question: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
answer: From the 17th March, customers from other banks can request—at their bank institution—the return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, you’ll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you don’t have sufficient funds in your Main Account, you’ll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

question: Come evitare le truffe via SMS
answer:
Hai ricevuto un messaggio SMS seguito da un link molto sospetto?Se sì, NON cliccare su quel link! Questo è un messaggio di phishing.Come funziona la truffa?Ricevi un SMS dai toni allarmanti che ti invita ad aprire un link.L’SMS contiene un link con un URL diverso da quello ufficiale di N26 https://app.n26.com/login (nuova tabella)La pagina che si apre cliccando su quel link fraudolento ha una  grafica simile a quella usata da N26 e richiede la condivisione di alcuni dati personali, come 
la password dell'e-mail, la password, il numero della carta, il CVC, il codice PIN o i codici arrivati via SMS.. Non fornire mai questi dati fuori dall' App o dalla WebApp di N26!Dopo l’SMS, un finto operatore chiama la vittima e prova a convincerla a svolgere alcune operazioni sospette, come fornire ulteriori dati relativi al conto o accedere all’App di N26 per autorizzare delle transazioni non richieste. Ricorda: non confermare mai un pagamento all’interno dell’App di N26 se non riconosci il beneficiario o l’esercente!Cosa fare se hai cliccato su un link sospetto?In questo caso, cambia immediatamente la tua password di accesso al conto.Puoi farlo accedendo alla App > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Sicurezza > Modifica la password di accesso. Oppure, durante il Login, puoi cliccare su Reimposta la password. Ti invieremo un’email con la procedura da seguire.Se hai fornito i tuoi dati personali tramite quel link, contattaci via chat dalla tua App N26. I nostri operatori ti assisteranno nel ripristino delle credenziali dia sicurezza del tuo conto. Se puoi, inviaci lo screenshot dell’SMS a support@n26.comDevo confermare una transazione attraverso l’App di N26 per poter ricevere il rimborso?Assolutamente no! Non ti chiederemo mai di autorizzare una transazione attraverso l’App di N26 se non sei stato tu a disporla. Non confermare mai delle transazioni se non riconosci il nome o l’IBAN del destinatario nel caso di un bonifico, l’email o il numero di telefono nel caso di un MoneyBeam, il nome dell’esercente nel caso di una transazione con carta. Ti ricordiamo che la conferma delle transazioni avviene attraverso apposita notifica ricevuta all’interno dell’App di N26.Riconosci le comunicazioni ufficiali di N26?N26 non invia mai link all’interno dei propri SMS, non fidarti se il messaggio che ricevi ne contiene uno!I messaggi di N26 arrivano solitamente dal mittente “AUTHMSG”, compresi i codici di verifica e di associazione OTP (One Time Password).I principali mezzi di comunicazione usati da N26 sono la live chat, le email e le chiamate in entrata da parte dei nostri clienti Premium. Non telefoniamo mai ai nostri clienti, a meno che non sia stato il cliente stesso a richiedere la telefonata.Come fanno i truffatori a conoscere i miei dati?Pensa ai tuoi profili social, come Facebook o Instagram: alcuni tuoi dati personali sono sicuramente online. Nome e cognome, data di nascita, indirizzo email, numero di telefono, sono tutti dati che utilizziamo per identificarci, ad esempio, nella creazione di account su internet. I truffatori sanno sfruttare la vulnerabilità delle persone per raccogliere queste informazioni tramite tattiche di social engineering.

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it’s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Where to find your Tax ID
answer: Your Tax Identification Number (TIN) is unique to you, and issued by the tax authority upon registration with them in the country where you as an individual are a taxpayer. Where to find Your TIN can differ depending on which country you are tax eligible. Please be aware that each country's TIN name can be different, e.g. If you’re from the UK you can think of your TIN number like your National Insurance Number (NIN). for German residents:If you’re a resident in Germany and you have registered with your local tax authority, you will be provided with an 11 digit TIN or Steueridentifikationsnummer. Do not confuse this with your 9 digit Tax Number or Steuernummer.TIN’s are not reported on official identification documents, but you can find your TIN in the following places:The letter you received from the Federal Central Tax Office issuing your TIN or IdNr (Mitteilungsschreiben über die Zuordnung einer Identifikationsnummer).Income tax assessmentWage tax statement For more information on locating your TIN, or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for French residents:If you’re a resident in France and obligated to declare taxes there, then the French tax authorities will issue you with a 13 digit TIN or SPI (Simplification des Procédures d'Imposition) once you've registered in the tax authorities’ database. These numbers begin with a 0, 1, 2 or 3.You can find your TIN in the following places:On your pre-printed income tax declaration formAdditionally, you can locate it on your tax and property tax noticesFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Italian residents:If you’re a resident in Italy then a TIN or Codice fiscale (consists of 16 characters) is only valid if registered in the Italian Tax Register managed by the Italian Revenue Agency (Agenzia delle Entrate). If you do not have a TIN, you should submit a request to any Office of the Italian Revenue Agency.TIN’s are not reported on official documents of identification, but you can find your TIN in the following places:Your TIN is located on your personal health card (Tax Identification Number, Tessera sanitaria/Codice fiscale).You can also locate your TIN on your TIN card.For more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab). for Spanish residents:If you’re a resident in Spain, your TIN is unique for tax and customs purposes. Your Spanish TIN consists of nine characters (with the last character being a letter for control). TIN’s are issued by the Ministry of Internal Affairs and can differ depending on whether you're a natural person with Spanish nationality or without.You can find your TIN in the following places depending on your circumstances:Personal identity cardElectronic identity cardForeigners resident cardNew driving licence (since 2004)Tax identification cardSocial security cardFor more information on locating your TIN or if you need to request one, you can learn more here (new tab).Important information:The tax ID format allowed to be entered in your N26 App is determined by the country you're in. Meaning if you are a resident in Germany, you must enter your German TIN.You can check the tax information you've saved in your account by going to: My Account > Personal Details > Tax info.If you’ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.You can find out more information about what we do with your tax information here (new tab).

question: Custom Audiences
answer: Data Processing in the framework of Facebook allows us to create custom and lookalike audiences.
