Eine reguläre Rückerstattung einer Kartenzahlung dauert bis zu 12 Tage. Die Kaution für eine Autovermietung erhältst du nach maximal 30 Tagen zurück. Wie Kartenzahlungen genau funktionieren, kannst du in unserem Artikel nachlesen.Du hast nach 12 Tagen noch keine Rückerstattung erhalten? Dann kannst du in deiner N26 App eine Reklamation starten. Folge dazu einfach dieser Anleitung.

question: Comment télécharger la confirmation d’un virement SEPA ?
answer: Si vous avez effectué un virement bancaire depuis votre compte N26 et que vous avez besoin d’une confirmation de l’envoi ou de la réception, vous pouvez télécharger le fichier PDF contenant les données de la transaction depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne. Pour cela :Connectez-vous à l’application N26Dans la liste de transactions, sélectionnez le virement bancaire pour lequel vous souhaitez télécharger la confirmation.Appuyez sur « Télécharger une confirmation de virement ».Une fois cette option choisie, le document sera automatiquement téléchargé sur votre smartphone ou votre PC.Quelles données puis-je trouver dans la confirmation de virement ?Dans la confirmation de virement, vous trouverez les coordonnées bancaires de l’expéditeur et du bénéficiaire du virement, y compris le montant et la date de la transaction.

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you’ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‘Cards’ tab. You can mark the reason as “lost” or “stolen” based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you’ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).  How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here’s a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you’ll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don’t arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard’s chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date 
In this scenario, Mastercard’s chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place. You received a delivery, but it doesn’t correspond with what you ordered 
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn’t receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here’s some guidance on what to say:Dear XX, I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction: Amount: €{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank. If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help––this is the fastest way to get your money back. Here’s a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them: Dear XX, I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below: Merchant name: {insert merchant name} Amount of original, authorized transaction: €{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: €{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward. The merchant told me that they’ve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven’t received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction. How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That’s why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits––all right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‘Discreet Mode (new tab)’ option to securely access your account in public. Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you’re always aware of what’s happening on your account. Plus, we’re always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud. How does card fraud occur? A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that’s been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if: You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase Your online shopping account is hacked Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud? Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Smart?
answer: Eine kostenlose physische N26 Mastercard: Wähle bei der Bestellung der Karte aus fünf neuen Farben: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Zusätzliche virtuelle Karte: Bestelle in der App kostenlos eine zusätzliche virtuelle Karte!Zusätzliche physische Karte: Bestelle über deine N26 App eine zusätzliche, physische N26 YOU Karte gegen eine einmalige Gebühr von 10 €.Spaces: 10 zusätzliche Spaces (Unterkonten) zur Organisation deiner Finanzen.Shared Spaces: Lade deine Freunde in deine Spaces (Unterkonten) ein, gemeinsam Geld zu teilen und zu verwalten.Telefonischer Support: Bei Fragen wende dich an unsere dedizierte Kundenservice-Hotline.Du kannst N26 Smart mit unseren anderen Konten vergleichen (neuen Tab), um zu sehen, welches am besten zu dir passt!Wenn du mit N26 Smart liebäugelst, beachte bitte unsere AGB (neuen Tab) sowie folgendes:Deine N26 Smart Mastercard hat keine Prägung: Die Kartendetails, einschließlich der Nummer, des CVV-Codes und des 10-stelligen Tokens sind auf der Rückseite aufgedruckt.Wenn du von N26 Standard zu N26 Smart upgradest, wird die monatliche Gebühr von 4,90 € wird beginnend mit dem Datum deines Upgrades jeden Monat direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Gebühr 15 Tage nach der Verifizierung deiner Identität eingezogen. Danach wird dir deine monatliche Gebühr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet. Wenn du also dein Konto gegen Monatsende eröffnet hast, werden die ersten zwei Monatsgebühren im Folgemonat abgebucht.Ab sofort steht es dir frei, ob du deine Premiumgebühr monatlich oder im Voraus für die nächsten 6 Monate oder für 1 Jahr im Rahmen der Vertragslaufzeit bezahlst. Wenn du dich für die Prepaid-Option entscheidest, profitierst du von einem Rabatt auf die monatlichen Kosten deines Premiumkontos (Smart / You / Metal), der anteilig für den von dir gewünschten Abrechnungszeitraum gilt. Nach der Anmeldung kannst du die Prepaid-Abrechnungsoptionen und die damit verbundenen Kosten in deiner N26 App einsehen.

question: Why can’t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
answer: To carry out real-time transactions such as MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone’s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone’s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.If you don’t see your friend’s name on MoneyBeam but you know they’re an N26 user, they most likely haven’t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don’t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

question: Perché non posso accedere ad alcuni prodotti e servizi?
answer: Collaboriamo con molti partner, pertanto, per alcuni prodotti e servizi, devi soddisfare anche i loro requisiti. I motivi più comuni per cui potresti non essere idoneo per determinati prodotti sono:Documenti d'identità scaduti o non supportati (ad esempio certi passaporti per la mancanza delle caratteristiche di sicurezza).Sei soggetto alle imposte negli Stati Uniti. In tal caso non potrai utilizzare determinati prodotti d’investimento o di risparmio. Se non è il tuo caso, contatta la nostra Assistenza clienti tramite chat, che verificherà i dettagli del tuo conto. Potresti dover cambiare il tuo numero di telefono se inizia con un prefisso del Nord America (+1).Il prodotto o il servizio non è ancora disponibile nel tuo Paese.

question: Come dichiarare il conto N26 nella mia dichiarazione dei redditi in Francia?
answer: (si applica ai clienti residenti in Francia)Secondo il Codice generale delle imposte francese, tutti i residenti in Francia sono tenuti a dichiarare i conti bancari che hanno aperto, utilizzato o chiuso nell'anno di riferimento della dichiarazione dei redditi. Questo si applica anche al conto N26. Come procedere:nella dichiarazione dei redditi, constrassegna la casella Conto estero aperto, utilizzato o chiuso (8UU) (Compte étranger ouvert, utilisé ou fermé).Compila il modulo Cerfa n° 3916 (nuova tabella) e allegalo alla dichiarazione dei redditi.Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni su questo articolo (nuova tabella) del nostro blog

question: Account in conjunction with §§ 30 ff. ZKG
answer: The account ICW §§ 30 ff. ZKG is not our N26 standard account. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6€ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists (new tab). If you don’t have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request.  Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 Smart, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto. To request a Basiskonto:Download the request form (new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form you’ll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to: N26 Bank GmbH Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto Klosterstraße 62 10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce we’ve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we’ll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs (new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract we’ll open a Basiskonto for you. You’ll receive a notification.Why can't I get a Basiskonto?Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That’s the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent.Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years.Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance.You didn’t meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

question: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
answer: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (not available for residents in the DOM/TOM), Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.To lay even stronger foundations for our business in the future, we are increasing our focus on our service experience, product offering and processes.With the overwhelming demand for N26’s digital banking products, we will be making a temporary limitation to the number of new bank accounts that we can offer each month. UPDATE: 25th Oct at 11:00Markets open for all tiers: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Lichtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden & SwitzerlandMarkets open only for Premium accounts: N/AMarkets closed for all tiers: N/AMarkets closed: ItalyYou can open your account only if meet our requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.

question: Quando arriverà la mia carta?
answer:
La consegna standard impiega fino a 15 giorni lavorativi ed è gratuita, se si tratta della tua prima carta dopo l'apertura del conto (eccetto per N26 Standard) o l'aggiornamento ad una sottoscrizione premium.Per rimanere aggiornato sull'avanzamento della consegna, accedi alla schermata principale della tua app mobile N26.La consegna express impiega fino a 3 giorni lavorativi.
Oltre al banner nella schermata principale della tua app mobile N26, riceverai anche un'email con un link di tracciamento per rimanere aggiornato sull'andamento della spedizione della tua carta. Scopri di più nel nostro articolo dedicato alla consegna express (nuova tabella).Ti consigliamo di attendere che sia trascorso il tempo di consegna stimato prima di intraprendere ulteriori azioni. La tua prima carta dopo l'apertura del conto o dopo l'aggiornamento ad una sottoscrizione premium è sempre gratuita. Per le carte che ordinerai successivamente potrebbe essere applicato un costo aggiuntivo (nuova tabella).Come assicurarti che la tua carta sia stata spedita1. Dovrai verificare la tua identità (nuova tabella) quando apri un conto N26. Assicurati di aver completato questo processo accedendo al tuo conto. Una volta completato questo passaggio, il tuo conto sarà attivato e potrai ricevere la tua carta N26.2. Controlla i dettagli della spedizione: 👤 Il mio conto > Profilo > Indirizzi > Indirizzo di spedizione:L'indirizzo che indichi deve essere residenziale (i recapiti di attività commerciali non sono accettati).  Il tuo nome deve essere indicato sulla casella della posta: se fosse presente un nome diverso, aggiungilo alle informazioni sull'indirizzo nella tua app mobile. Inserisci il tuo codice di avviamento postale senza spazi. Se possibile, aggiungi il numero dell'edificio, il numero della tromba delle scale e il codice della porta alle informazioni aggiuntive sull'indirizzo nell'app mobile. Se il tuo indirizzo contiene caratteri speciali, contatta il nostro servizio clienti dall'app. Se ti trasferirai presto, considera l'opzione di consegna express e assicurati di selezionare il tuo nuovo indirizzo di residenza.
Nel caso in cui i tuoi dati fossero errati, aggiornali direttamente nell'app (nuova tabella) mobile.
Se quella che stai aspettando è la tua prima carta N26, apri una chat dall'app mobile o dall'app web.
Se eri già in possesso di una carta attivata, puoi riordinarla direttamente nell'app.
3. La tua prima carta è gratuita con N26 Smart, You e Metal. Con N26 Standard sarà una carta virtuale gratuita (a meno che tu non scelga una carta fisica al costo di 10€). La tua carta verrà prodotta e spedita a condizione che il saldo del tuo conto sia pari o superiore a 0 € dopo l'addebito della commissione mensile. In caso di passaggio a un conto premium, la prima commissione verrà addebitata immediatamente. Se hai aperto direttamente un conto premium, la prima commissione verrà addebitata dopo aver trasferito abbastanza denaro sul tuo conto da coprire la commissione ma, al più tardi, 15 giorni in seguito alla convalida dell'identità. Se dopo l'addebito della prima commissione il saldo del tuo conto è negativo, dovrai trasferire denaro sul conto per avviare la produzione e la spedizione della tua carta.Ti verrà inviata una notifica nell'app tramite i Messaggi e attraverso un banner nella schermata Home che mostrerà i progressi nella consegna. Ti preghiamo di notare che:L'importo minimo una tantum non è una commissione, ma un requisito necessario per avviare la produzione e la spedizione della tua carta.Per la consegna express la commissione è di 25 € e verrà detratta dal tuo conto non appena la carta viene spedita. Assicurati che il saldo del tuo conto copra queste commissioni.Ricorda che:Il saldo minimo richiesto non è una commissione, ma è solo necessario per attivare la produzione e la consegna della tua carta. Per i titolari di conto premium: le prime quote mensili vengono addebitate il 15 ° giorno dall'inizio della sottoscrizione e verranno addebitate sul tuo conto. Per la consegna express: la commissione di 20€ verrà addebitata sul tuo conto non appena la carta verrà spedita. Assicurati che il saldo del tuo conto sia sufficiente a coprire anche questa commissione.
Inizia a usare la tua carta anche prima che arrivi 
Anche prima che la tua carta sia consegnata per posta, potrai iniziare a usarla tramite il tuo wallet digitale Apple Pay o Google Pay. In questo modo potrai effettuare acquisti con il tuo smartphone presso i commercianti che supportano questo metodo di pagamento. 
Non hai ricevuto la tua carta entro i tempi previsti? 
Controlla la data di consegna stimata nella schermata principale dell'app N26 o dell'app Web. Se la data di consegna stimata è stata superata, contattaci tramite live chat dall'app mobile o dall'app web.

question: How to get N26 Insurance?
answer: The new on-demand N26 Insurance allows all N26 customers to get coverage for their smartphone, tablet, laptop, smartwatch and other electronics for theft, burglary, robbery, accidental damage and liquid damage. You can purchase the insurance directly in your N26 app, without going through any paperwork, and cancel it anytime you want.How does it work?If you want to subscribe for the on-demand N26 Insurance for electronics, just login to your N26 app, go to Explore and click on the “Insurance” banner you find. You will then be asked to enter a few details about your device, select the monthly or yearly pricing option and confirm the request. The coverage for your device will be active from the day after you purchased the policy and it can be cancelled anytime from your N26 mobile app or your WebApp. How to file a claim?Once you have initiated a claim in the N26 app, you will be redirected to file the claim on Simplesurance's online portal (new tab). Log in with your Certificate Number and PIN which you can find in your insurance certificate you received via Messages from N26.Every customer is eligible to file a maximum of two claims per year. After the second successful claim, the insurance will automatically expire.For any further information, always refer to the Terms and Conditions document that will be sent to your Messages in the app right after the purchase of your coverage. Additionally, you can always reach out to support@simplesurance.de for any information regarding your policy or claim. Am I eligible? N26 Insurance is available for all our customers. N26 Metal customers can’t sign up for the phone insurance, however, as they already have a phone insurance as part of their metal membership. Please make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app. Currently, N26 Insurance is available for N26 customers in Austria, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Germany.This policy does not cover devices that are purchased outside of Europe.

question: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?
answer: Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login über mindestens zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Zusätzlich zur Eingabe deines persönlichen Passworts musst du deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch dein verknüpftes Gerät oder einen SMS-Code bestätigen.Mehr zu diesem Thema erfährst du in unserem Artikel: PSD2 - Starke KundenauthentifizierungWenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verknüpften Gerät einloggst, musst du deinen Login-Versuch zusätzlich bestätigen. Das kannst du tun, indem du entweder eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknüpften Gerät bestätigst oder indem du einen SMS-Code anforderst, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Wenn du dich von deinem verknüpften Gerät in dein N26 Konto einloggst, liegt damit schon Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung vor. Das bedeutet, der Login-Prozess ändert sich bei deinem verknüpften Gerät nicht.Welche Voraussetzungen gibt es?Stell sicher, dass das Betriebssystem deines Handys auf dem neuesten Stand ist und die neueste Version der N26 App installiert ist. Falls du dich nicht mehr einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, versuch bitte, dein Passwort zurückzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugang mehr zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Was mache ich, wenn ich mein Passwort vergessen habe?Mehr Informationen darüber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?Was mache ich, wenn mein Handy kaputt oder verloren gegangen ist?Wenn du keinen Zugang mehr zu deinem verknüpften Gerät, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten Handynummer hast, kannst du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen und zur Authentifizierung einen SMS-Code anfordern:Logge dich in die WebApp oder von einem nicht verknüpften Gerät einWenn du aufgefordert wirst, deinen Login-Versuch durch dein verknüpftes Gerät zu bestätigen, wähle HilfeWähle SMS-Code schickenNachdem du den SMS-Code erhalten hast, gib ihn in der WebApp ein.Dadurch ist die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und du kannst dein neues Gerät wieder mit deinem Konto verknüpfen.Was, wenn ich eine neue Handynummer habe oder aus anderen Gründen keine SMS erhalte?Falls dir deine registrierte Handynummer nicht mehr zur Verfügung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue hast oder dein Handy verloren gegangen ist oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.Warum kann ich die neueste Version der N26 App nicht auf mein Handy herunterladen? Wenn du ein älteres Smartphone benutzt, das die neueste Version der App nicht mehr unterstützt, kannst du dich mit diesem nicht mehr in die N26 App einloggen.Du kannst dennoch die WebApp benutzen, um Zugang zu deinem Konto zu erhalten. Dafür musst du deinen Login-Versuch mit einem SMS-Code bestätigen, den wir dir an deine registrierte Handynummer schicken.Mit deiner Karte kannst du nach wie vor Geld abheben und Zahlungen tätigen. Bitte beachte aber, dass du keine Überweisungen ausführen und kein CASH26 mehr benutzen kannst, solange du diese in der N26 App nicht bestätigen kannst.

question: Cosa sono i bonifici istantanei?
answer: Tutti i clienti N26 ora hanno la possibilità di inviare bonifici istantanei. Al contrario dei normali bonifici SEPA, che vengono elaborati entro 2 giorni lavorativi, i bonifici istantanei vengono inviati e ricevuti nell'arco di pochi secondi.Bonifici istantanei può essere utile per inviare un bonifico urgente (occorrono circa 10 secondi), tuttavia verrà applicata una commissione per i nostri clienti Standard che utilizzano questo servizio, che verrà mostrata prima di confermare il bonifico. Quindi, se il pagamento può aspettare altri 2 giorni, un bonifico SEPA normale è probabilmente la soluzione migliore. I nostri clienti premium possono usare bonifici istantanei senza commissioni.Nonostante sia istantaneo, questo tipo di bonifico può comunque subire ritardi dovuti a tempi di elaborazione, embarghi ecc. (proprio come un bonifico regolare), per cui è sempre meglio effettuare pagamenti importanti, ad es. per cauzioni, acconti, con il giusto anticipo per evitare qualsiasi perdita finanziaria dovuta a eventuali ritardi.Come funziona?Per inviare un bonifici istantanei, basta effettuare l'accesso nella tua app mobile e selezionare Invia denaro dal mio conto > Bonifico bancario.Dopodiché ti verrà chiesto di inserire il nome e l'IBAN del destinatario, aggiungere un messaggio.Seleziona poi Bonifico istantaneoIl bonifico verrà elaborato e ricevuto entro circa 10 secondi.Attenzione: se la banca del destinatario non fa parte dello schema SCT per i pagamenti istantanei non potrai inviare questo tipo di bonifici.Informazione importante:Per i conti N26 Standard verrà applicata una commissione per l'utilizzo di bonifici istantanei. La commissione viene addebitata subito dopo aver effettuato il bonifico come transazione separata e il suo importo varia a seconda del paese:Germania e Austria: 0,49 €Spagna: 1,99 €Italia, Francia e resto dell’Europa: 0,99 €L'importo massimo che puoi inviare con un bonifico istantaneo è 2.000 €, 5 volte al giorno per un massimo di 10.000 € al giorno.Se utilizzi il bonifico istantaneo per un pagamento importante (cauzione, multa, acconto), ti consigliamo di inviare il pagamento in anticipo per evitare eventuali ritardi a causa di un possibile rifiuto o embargo.Se stai pagando per un prodotto o un servizio tramite bonifico istantaneo, assicurati che i dettagli e le credenziali del destinatario siano corretti prima di confermare la transazione. Fai sempre attenzione a possibili truffe.Ti preghiamo di notare che non tutte le banche hanno adottato lo schema per i bonifici istantanei. Se la banca del destinatario non partecipa allo schema, non ti sarà possibile inviare il bonifico in maniera istantanea.

question: How can I pay bills and top-up my phone from the app?
answer: Starting from the 1st of September, it will be possible for all the customers with Italian Terms and Conditions to pay postal bills, PagoPA, MAV / RAV, car tax and top-up their phone directly from their mobile app with the N26 debit card.This service is provided in collaboration with PayTipper SpA, a payment institution that has been a partner of the Enel X group since 2019.How to make payments to 3rd parties within the N26 mobile app:Log in to the N26 app and click on "Send money"Select "Other payments"In the menu, select the payment you want to make (Phone top-up, PagoPA, Postal bulletins, MAV or RAV, Car tax)You will then be redirected to the website of that service provider and will be able to perform the paymentThe service is not provided directly by N26 but by the 3rd party service providers. For this reason, by using this payment method, you will be subject to the processing of personal data, terms and conditions and any possible commissions not dependent on N26. In some cases the service might be offered only in Italian.If you need assistance with a payment or would like to receive a payment receipt, please get in contact with the customer support of the service provider you have chosen. Click here to get in touch with PayTipper (new tab)Below you can find customer support contacts for the main Italian network providers (please refer to the respective websites for opening hours and service costs):Vodafone: 190Tim: 187Wind Tre: 159Iliad: 177Kena Mobile: 181Ho.Mobile: 19.21.21

question: Come guadagnare soldi invitando amici in N26?
answer: Dall'1 ottobre 2021 abbiamo iniziato a lavorare al miglioramento del nostro programma Invita un amico. Fino a che queste modifiche non saranno definitive, le informazioni a riguardo non saranno più disponibili sull'app. Gli inviti e le iscrizioni avvenuti prima dell'1 ottobre 2021 continueranno a essere ricompensati come prima. Attualmente non sappiamo dire con precisione quando torneremo ad offrire questa funzionalità.

question: How to create a password?
answer: If you forgot your password or want to change it, select Forgot? in the app or Forgot your password? (new tab) in the WebApp (new tab) during login. We’ll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.We tend to recommend to go with a “passphrase” rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase “hard to guess, easy to remember”. If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you’ll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

question: Residential address and taxes in France
answer:
If you are currently living in France, you are most likely a French tax resident. In general, your tax residence is the country/jurisdiction in which you live. In some cases you may be a tax resident in more than one country/jurisdiction at the same time or not be a tax resident of FranceFor more information on tax residence, please consult your tax adviser or the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).If you have a tax residence outside France, we may be legally obliged to pass on certain information with respect to your financial accounts to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) and they may exchange this information with tax authorities of another jurisdiction or jurisdictions pursuant to intergovernmental agreements to exchange financial account information or local law. 
As a financial institution, we are not allowed to provide tax advice. Your personal tax advisor may be able to assist you in answering specific questions related to your tax residence. You can also find out more, including a list of jurisdictions that have signed agreements to automatically exchange information, along with details about the information being requested, on the OECD automatic exchange of information portal (new tab).
The Decree n°2016-1683 in date of December 5th, 2016 based on the OECD Common Reporting Standard (“CRS”) requires N26 France to collect and report to the French tax authorities (Direction des Finances Publiques) certain information about an account holder whose has a tax residence outside of France. Each jurisdiction has its own rules for defining tax residence, and jurisdictions have provided information on how to determine if you are resident in the jurisdiction on the following website: OECD AEOI Portal (new tab).

question: How does N26 Business You work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business You account costs €9,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business You?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Cashback: You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It’s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you (new tab):Keep these in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Business Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of €9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business You. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up during registration or if you’re already an N26 Business user.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Warum ist meine SEPA Überweisung fehlgeschlagen?
answer: Um eine Überweisung zu erhalten, musst du dem Absender deinen vollständigen Namen (so, wie er auf dem von dir zur Verifizierung bereitgestellten Ausweisdokument steht) und deine IBAN angeben. Deine IBAN findest du in deinen Kontoauszügen und in 👤 Mein Konto (in der mobilen App oder der Web-App (neuen Tab)).Der Name des Empfängers auf dem Überweisungsauftrag unterscheidet sich von dem Namen auf seinem Konto (der Name muss auf seinem Ausweisdokument stehen).Der Name des Empfängers ist ein Firmenname und nicht ein persönlicher bzw. Kontoname (gilt für N26 Business).Die IBAN ist falsch.Du erhältst keine Push-Nachricht zur Bestätigung deiner Überweisung.Es wurde ein unzulässiger Verwendungszweck festgestellt. N26 ist dazu verpflichtet, routinemäßige Transaktionsprüfungen durchzuführen (siehe § 10 GwG (neuen Tab)). Infolgedessen können wir Unterlagen zur Überprüfung des Ursprungs oder der Herkunft dieser Transaktionen anfordern. Das kann dazu führen, dass die Gutschrift verzögert oder nicht stattfindet.Unterstützte eingehende ÜberweisungenSEPA-ÜberweisungenSEPA-EchtzeitüberweisungenÜberweisungen in Fremdwährungen mit WiseSWIFT-ÜberweisungenUnterstützte ausgehende ÜberweisungenSEPA-ÜberweisungenSEPA-EchtzeitüberweisungenÜberweisungen in Fremdwährungen mit WiseBitte beachte die geschätzten Zeitrahmen für die verschiedenen Überweisungsarten.

question: How to use my card digitally?
answer: You can make purchases with your smartphone:Simply add your N26 card to your Apple Pay or Google Pay wallet in order to make purchases at merchants who support this payment method.You can enable this feature before your card arrives in the mail to start using your N26 account straight away but also once you have received your card and activated it.To add your card to your wallet follow these steps:Login to your N26 accountGo to 'Cards'Select 'Card Settings' and swipe to select the card you want to addSelect 'Add to Apple Pay' or 'Add to Google Pay'Good to know:This feature is not enabled if you reorder your card or upgrade to a premium membership without blocking your current card. In these cases your current card will continue working with 'Apple Pay' or 'Google Pay' until you activate your new card.How to view my complete card details in the N26 app?If you need your card details but aren't carrying your card with you at the moment then don't worry. N26 allows you to view your complete card details in the mobile app if you have an active card and paired device.To view your card follow these steps:Login to the N26 mobile appGo to 'Cards'From your card list swipe until you see the card you want to useTap 'Card Details'Confirm with your fingerprint, face ID or phone lock PINYou will be able to view your complete card details for 1 minute. Please note, you won't be able to take screenshots whilst your card details are being displayed.

question: What is a N26 Standard Account?
answer: The N26 Standard account is a safe and intuitive digital current account that you can sign up to in minutes, right from your smartphone. It is beautifully simple and transparent, allowing you to receive, send and spend money confidently. The N26 Standard account is free*, giving you a simple and affordable solution for all of your financial needs.What are the benefits of a N26 Standard Account?Our N26 Standard account comes with the following benefits and features:Free* current account: Our N26 Standard bank account is free (new tab) to use (*after a balance of €50,000 or higher a deposit fee (new tab) may apply).Virtual card: The account comes with a free virtual card that has a full PAN number and is ready to add to Apple or Google Pay for online and in shop purchases.Physical N26 Mastercard: For an additional €10, you can receive a N26 Standard physical debit card (please note, you will need to have at least €10 available in your account to trigger card production and shipment).Payments & Transfers: You can send and receive SEPA transfers using your N26 mobile app. Additionally, you can send money instantly to other N26 customers using Moneybeam.Additional financial products: If eligible you can also apply for our additional financial products e.g Overdraft, Credit, Savings etc.CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Customer Support: You can get in touch with our incredible customer service team using the in-app chat feature or opening a chat from our website or web-app.Our new N26 Standard account comes with a free virtual debit card. With an active standard account, you can make online and in-store payments. Additionally, you can add your virtual card to your Apple or Google pay wallet.

question: Perché N26 fa controlli sulle transazioni?
answer: N26 ha la responsabilità di effettuare controlli su conti e transazioni per garantire la sicurezza del tuo conto corrente (vedi GwG § 10 (nuova tabella)). Questi controlli vengono avviati automaticamente dal nostro sistema.In seguito a questi controlli, potremmo chiederti di fornire alcuni documenti. In tal caso, sarà sufficiente inviare quanto richiesto tramite Messaggi da N26. Non ci sono eccezioni o modi per evitare questi controlli. Si tratta di una procedura bancaria di routine ed è finalizzata a garantire la sicurezza dei nostri clienti. Procedura ed esiti di questi controlli sono confidenziali e gestiti internamente. Qui di seguito troverai alcuni suggerimenti per velocizzare la procedura:Nell'email che riceverai da N26 verrà specificato quale documento occorre inviare. Accettiamo screenshot, fotografie o scansioni di documenti. Assicurati che il contenuto originale del documento sia leggibile e di allegare una descrizione dettagliata di quanto richiesto Sii preciso nelle tue risposte, nei dettagli e nei documenti. Se quanto inviato non dovesse rispondere ai nostri requisiti, potremmo richiedere ulteriori chiarimenti. In tal caso, la procedura avrà una durata maggiore. Invia quanto richiesto in risposta alla nostra email il prima possibile o, comunque, entro la scadenza indicata. Il nostro servizio clienti non ha alcuna informazione aggiuntiva su questo argomento.Fornisci documentazione in corso di validità.Ecco alcuni esempi:Hai ricevuto aiuto finanziario dalla tua famiglia per completare progetti o hai ereditato terreno o denaro da un familiare deceduto: puoi fornire un documento ufficiale che attesti un prestito, un finanziamento, un'eredità (es. documento di vendita di proprietà per finanziare il prestito oppure l'estratto conto di un garante).Hai venduto una proprietà o le tue azioni in borsa: puoi fornire la documentazione attestante il trasferimento della proprietà oppure la vendita delle azioni.Hai inviato o ricevuto denaro per pagare utenze o comprare un prodotto: puoi fornire un estratto conto che attesti la provenienza del denaro oppure altra documentazione che attesti l'uso del denaro e la finalità.Hai ricevuto un pagamento dal tuo precedente datore di lavoro: puoi fornire un documento che attesti la natura del pagamento e ulteriori prove sul rapporto terminato.

question: My card already expired but I never received a replacement
answer: No problem, we got your back! If you have already confirmed your address and more than 20 days have passed since, please reach out to Customer support. You can do it in the Support section in the app. If you haven’t confirmed your address yet, log into your N26 account in the app and look for a banner under your expired card. Follow the steps to confirm where you’d like to receive your replacement card. My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?

question: How much does an N26 account cost?
answer: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If we’re not able to offer you an N26 account based on our minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open an N26 Flex account.

question: What is a Virtual Card?
answer: If you sign up for an N26 Standard account you’ll get a virtual card for free (provided you have a one-time minimum balance of 10€ to activate the card). An extra virtual card is ideal for shopping online, giving you added peace of mind when sharing your card details on apps and websites. It's also great for keeping your recurring subscriptions separate from your everyday transactions.N26 Smart, You and Metal customers have the option to order a virtual card for free in addition to the free physical card they receive along with their premium membership. Good to know: N26 Standard customers have the option to order a physical card for a one-time fee of 10€ (without having to upgrade to a premium membership).How to order and activate my virtual card?Log into your account and open the Cards-tab in the bottom right corner.Tap on ‘Get an additional card’.Select ‘Virtual’ at the top, then tap ‘Choose’ at the bottom.Read and agree with the terms and conditions, then tap ‘Generate virtual card’.Add your virtual card to Apple Pay or Google Pay or skip this step.How to use my virtual card?Pay in-store using Apple or Google Pay: Link your virtual card to either your Apple or Google Pay depending on your device.Withdraw cash: Once you have linked your virtual card to your Apple or Google wallet you can withdraw cash from ATM machines that are contactless-enabled. You can also use CASH26 to deposit or withdraw cash (DE, AT, IT, ES & GR)Make online purchases: You can view your virtual card details in the app (card number, expiry date and CVV number). To view these details:Login to your N26 mobile appSelect ‘cards’Locate your virtual card (swipe left to find your virtual card if you have more than one)Select ‘card details’You will then need to enter your confirmation PIN or use biometric login to view your virtual cards details for 60 secondsThe virtual Mastercard is only available for N26 Standard accounts opened from February 2021 and all N26 Premium accounts beginning from the 9th. of October 2021.

question: Perché N26 è sicuro?
answer: Per proteggere il tuo conto, utilizziamo un’architettura di sicurezza a 3 livelli:Accesso sicuro. I dati di accesso dell’app mobile e della WebApp (nuova tabella) sono costituiti da un nome utente e una password o dal riconoscimento delle impronte digitali/del volto (a seconda dello smartphone). Scegli una password sicura e non rivelare i tuoi dati di accesso a nessuno.PIN di conferma. Questo codice a 4 cifre è necessario ogni volta che invii un bonifico, un MoneyBeam o quando associ/disassoci il tuo smartphone. Dovrai impostarlo la prima volta dopo aver collegato lo smartphone al conto e puoi modificarlo da solo nell’app.Messaggi push. Per ogni pagamento in entrata e in uscita, verrà inviato un messaggio push allo smartphone collegato. Viene utilizzato anche per confermare e finalizzare le tue transazioni. Abbiamo anche implementato 3D Secure per proteggerti dalle frodi online con carta.Ogni volta ci contatti ti chiederemo alcune domande di sicurezza per assicurarci che tu sia realmente l'intestatario del conto. Non ti chiederemo mai il numero della tua carta di debito, il codice di sicurezza della carta (CVV), password, o il tuo PIN della carta o di conferma.Abbiamo anche fatto progressi per proteggere i tuoi dati: custodiamo meno informazioni possibili su di te, solo finchè siamo legalmente obbligati, e cancelliamo i dati quando non sono più richiesti per un prodotto o un servizio. Puoi scaricare i tuoi dati personali fino a 6 mesi dopo aver chiuso il tuo conto. Puoi trovare più informazioni sulla nostra politica di privacy (nuova tabella).

question: Cos'è un tentativo di login sospetto?
answer: Perché ho ricevuto questa email?Per noi di N26, la sicurezza è la massima priorità. Quando il nostro sistema rileva un tentativo di login insolito, ti avvisiamo immediatamente in modo da poter intraprendere delle misure per mettere al sicuro il tuo conto. Se hai ricevuto un avviso e credi che qualcun’altro abbia tentato di accedere al tuo conto, ti basterà reimpostare velocemente la tua password. Se il tentativo di login mostrato nell'avviso fosse il tuo, puoi semplicemente ignorare il messaggio.Come ripristinare la password?Puoi ripristinare la tua password accedendo al tuo account tramite app o WebApp, andando poi su Il mio conto → Impostazioni → Sicurezza.Se non riesci ad accedere al tuo conto, clicca su Password dimenticata sulla schermata di login. A questo punto, non dovrai fare altro che inserire il tuo indirizzo email e richiedere un link di ripristino della password.Quando scegli una nuova password, ti ricordiamo di non riutilizzare le password su più piattaforme; ti preghiamo di assicurarti di utilizzare una password unica per ogni tuo account. L’utilizzo di una password già usata in precedenza o poco sicura può causare la violazione del tuo profilo.Quando devo contattare il Supporto Clienti?Dopo aver ricevuto un'email di notifica su un login insolito, dovresti preoccuparti della sicurezza del tuo conto. Ci teniamo a rassicurarti, tuttavia, che cambiare la tua password è una misura sufficiente per garantire che il tuo account rimanga protetto. Se vuoi discutere di questo argomento con uno dei nostri esperti, il nostro team di Supporto Clienti è a tua disposizione.

question: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
answer: Your IBAN includes the 2 digit country code (e.g. DE), a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of Regulation No 260/2012 (new tab)).If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please contact your relevant national authority (new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn’t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

question: Wie lange dauert eine Überweisung mit Wise?
answer: Wenn du eine Überweisung mit Wise machst, wird dir ein geschätztes Eingangsdatum angezeigt. Stelle bei sicher, dass der Name des Empfängers exakt mit dem Namen auf seinem Bankkonto übereinstimmt.Falls eine Wise-Überweisung fehlschlägt, benachrichtigen wir dich mit einer Push-Mitteilung. Der Betrag wird einige Tage später automatisch auf dein Konto zurückgebucht.Du kannst eine Überweisung nicht manuell abbrechen. Aber wenn du den Kundenservice von Wise kontaktierst, können sie deine Überweisung für dich abbrechen. Bitte beachte, dass die Überweisung nur solange abgebrochen werden kann, bis Wise den Betrag an den Empfänger überwiesen hat. Sobald der Betrag überwiesen wurde, kann die Überweisung nicht mehr abgebrochen werden. Auch die Empfängerdaten können geändert werden, indem du dich mit Wise in Verbindung setzt. Bitte beachte, dass die Empfängerdaten nur solange geändert werden können, bis Wise den Betrag an den Empfänger überwiesen hat.Weder wir noch Wise berechnen zusätzliche Gebühren für eine Rückzahlung. Einige teilnehmende Banken erheben jedoch Gebühren; in diesem Fall zieht Wise gemäß seinen Nutzungsbedingungen (neuen Tab) diese Beträge von dem zurückgezahlten Geld ab.Häufige Gründe für eine fehlgeschlagene Überweisung:Fehler in den Überweisungsangaben (z. B. bei der Eingabe des Empfängernamens oder der Kontoinformationen).Sonderzeichen oder zu viele Zeichen im Namen des Empfängers oder im Feld für den Zahlungszweck.Limits wurden erreicht oder Online-Zahlungen sind in den Karteneinstellungen nicht aktiv.Überweisungen in Fremdwährungen sind mit dem N26 Business oder N26 Business You Konto nicht möglich; zudem darf das Empfängerkonto kein Geschäftskonto sein.

question: How much does it cost to get a replacement for my expiring or expired card?
answer: Replacement cards are free of charge for all N26 Smart, You or Metal customers.If you opened your account before the following dates, both the new card and shipping to your address are free of charge within the countries where N26 is available (new tab):16.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Greater Europe)25.02.2021 (Customers with legal address in Italy or Spain)11.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in France)18.03.2021 (Customers with legal address in Germany, Austria or Switzerland),If your account was created after that, your replacement card will have the same cost of getting a brand new card.If you are currently located in a country that is not supported by N26, please reach out to our Customer Service via chat or phone so we can place the order for you. Delivery outside these countries (new tab) might carry an extra cost. How long will it take?All replacements for expiring or expired cards are shipped via Standard delivery. It takes up to 15 business days and is free of charge. In rural or harder-to-reach areas it can take longer. To stay up-to-date on the delivery progress simply go to the home screen of your N26 mobile app.My card is expiring soon, what do I have to do?Can I keep using my card after it has expired?My card already expired but I never received a replacement

question: Shared Spaces - Vertrauenswürdiger Empfänger
answer: Vertrauenswürdige Empfänger eines Shared Spaces können:Geld von ihren eigenen Spaces (inklusive anderer Shared Spaces, in denen sie Teilnehmer sind) zu einem Shared Space überweisen.Jederzeit frei auf das Guthaben eines Shared Spaces zugreifen.Einen Shared Space jederzeit verlassen.Überweisungen zwischen vertrauenswürdigen Empfängern und einem Shared Space müssen nicht mit einer PIN und Push-Nachricht autorisiert werden. Das bedeutet, dass die Empfänger per Drag-and-Drop Geld verschieben können, ähnlich wie bei normalen Space-Transaktionen in der N26 App oder WebApp.Warum muss ich einen Besitzer oder einen Teilnehmer als vertrauenswürdigen Empfänger bestimmen?Das europäische Bankrecht regelt, wie Banküberweisungen autorisiert werden müssen. Hiernach ist die Anwendung einer starken Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA) eine Maßnahme, um Online-Zahlungen sicherer zu machen. Eine Ausnahme hiervon bildet die Klassifizierung einer Person in einem Shared Space als "vertrauenswürdigen Empfänger". Überweisungen an diese Person bedürfen keiner starken Kundenauthentifizierung.Erfahre mehrWas sind Shared Spaces?Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzufügen oder davon entfernen?

question: Chargeback: Häufig gestellte Fragen zu Reklamationen
Comment savoir quel est mon code PIN ?
answer: Tout d’abord, chez N26, il existe deux codes PIN : le code de validation et le code PIN de votre carte. L'avantage, c'est que vous créez vous-même ces deux codes.Le code de validation (nouvel onglet) est utilisé pour confirmer toutes les actions effectuées dans l’application N26, comme les virements, les changements de mot de passe, CASH26, etc. Une fois votre téléphone synchronisé, vous pouvez définir votre code de validation depuis l’application N26.Vous pouvez le modifier à tout moment depuis la rubrique Mon compte > Sécurité > Changer le code de validation.Le code PIN de votre carte (nouvel onglet) est celui que vous utilisez pour effectuer des retraits et faire des achats avec votre carte N26. Une fois votre carte N26 activée, vous pouvez le définir depuis l’application N26 (si vous n'avez pas encore activé votre carte, rendez-vous ici (nouvel onglet)).Vous pouvez changer votre code PIN dans Cartes > Paramètres de la carte > Réinitialiser le code PIN. Après avoir défini votre nouveau code PIN, vous devrez d'abord effectuer un retrait à un guichet automatique pour que le changement de code PIN soit enregistré (comme lorsque vous activez votre carte pour la première fois).Important :Nous ne vous enverrons jamais de code PIN par voie postale ou l’un de nos canaux de communication. Vous êtes la seule personne à devoir connaître vos codes PIN.Pour des raisons de sécurité, les codes de validation composés des éléments de votre date de naissance, de votre adresse, de répétitions de chiffres ou de suites de chiffres (par exemple, 1111, 1994, 1331, or 1234) ne sont pas acceptés. Si le code que vous avez choisi est refusé, nous vous invitons à essayer une combinaison de chiffres différente.Pour plus d’informations sur ces codes PIN, consultez les articles du Support Center avec les liens ci-dessus.

question: Pour quelles raisons n’ai-je pas encore reçu ma prime de parrainage?
answer: Une fois que votre ami aura bien rempli toutes les conditions nécessaires à l'attribution de la prime de parrainage, nous vérifierons la validité de votre invitation. Vous pouvez suivre le statut de vos invitations depuis votre application N26 mobile ou sur sa version web.Dans la plupart des cas, si vous n’avez pas encore reçu votre prime, cela signifie que votre ami n’a pas encore activé ou utilisé sa Mastercard Transaction d’un montant égal ou supérieur à celui de la récompense. Par exemple, pour une récompense de 15 €, la transaction par carte doit être de 15 € ou plus. Assurez-vous d’avoir bien expliqué ces conditions à votre ami pour être sûr de recevoir votre prime.La vérification de l’éligibilité de votre parrainage et le versement de votre prime peuvent être effectués dans un délai de 60 jours ouvrés.N26 se réserve le droit de ne pas attribuer de prime de parrainage en cas de suspicion d’activités qui violeraient les Conditions d’utilisation du programme de parrainage (nouvel onglet).

question: How to protect my account?
answer: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it’s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Security > Change login Password. Please choose a secure password and don’t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

question: Why is my account temporarily blocked?
answer: In accordance with European banking regulations, N26 must carry out routine technical checks on customer accounts. As a regulated institution, this helps us ensure that the funds held in your N26 account are kept safe and secure.The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion, this may take a longer time, during which your account may be temporarily unavailable to you. This process is overseen by a dedicated team specialized in conducting technical reviews of this nature, who work diligently to minimize any disruption. For this reason, our N26 Customer Support team is unable to provide further information on your account via live chat, or expedite the process.Please be patient with us as we complete the steps, and our team will contact you proactively once the technical review process is complete.

question: How to close my account?
answer: We’re sorry to see that you want to close your N26 account. We’d love to keep you as a customer—tell us what we can do better!If you have a premium N26 account, you can simply cancel your premium membership (new tab) and switch to the free N26 Standard bank account. If you’ve decided to permanently close your N26 account, here’s what to do:Make your account balance €0. If you still have money left in your N26 account, you should transfer the money to another bank account (new tab). If your account balance is negative, make a deposit (new tab) to your N26 account so that your account balance is €0.Tap here to begin your account closure process online (new tab). You’ll first need to need to log in to verify your identity. The app will then guide you through the account closure process.Destroy your N26 card. For example, by cutting it up with scissors. You should cut the chip embedded into your card and the magnetic stripe on the back of your card, then dispose of the parts separately.Still having trouble closing your account?If you have an Italian IBAN or you’re unable to log in to your N26 account, please email (new tab)support@n26.com (new tab) from your registered email address with this cancellation form attached (new tab). This cancellation form includes:A declaration requesting the closure of your N26 account on a specific date, or “as soon as possible”Your full legal nameThe IBAN of your N26 accountIf you have funds remaining in your main account or your Spaces sub-accounts, we’ll also need an IBAN of another bank account within the SEPA area (eurozone) for us to transfer your remaining balance.

question: How to upgrade to N26 Smart?
answer:
Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 Smart during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account.
 
To upgrade to N26 Smart in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Smart. You can choose between one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 Smart T&Cs and your new card will be on the way.Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days.If you upgrade to N26 Smart, the monthly fee of €4,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer who signed up to N26 Smart, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee is charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 Smart card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zurückzahlen kann?
answer: Wir bieten Rückzahlungspläne an, wenn du deinen Dispo oder dein Darlehen mit N26 Credit nicht zurückzahlen kannst. Das kann passieren, wenn dein Dispo storniert wurde oder du mehr als zwei Monate gebraucht hast, um deinen negativen Saldo auszugleichen.So geht es: Chatte mit uns und schlage einen detaillierten Plan vor, wie du deinen Dispokredit oder dein Darlehen in Raten zurückzahlen willst, z. B. jeden Monat einen bestimmten Betrag, bis dein Darlehen abbezahlt ist. Es ist nicht möglich, einfach den Gesamtbetrag zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt zurückzuzahlen.Bitte beachte, dass wir dir keinen Rückzahlungsplan anbieten können, wenn dein Konto bereits geschlossen ist.Wir werden dann entweder akzeptieren, ablehnen oder einen alternativen Plan vorschlagen. Es liegt dann an dir, diesem zuzustimmen.Übrigens: Dein Konto wird geschlossen, wenn es über einen längeren Zeitraum im Soll ist. Alle Kündigungsdaten sind endgültig, es sei denn, du zahlst dein Darlehen vor diesem Datum zurück. Wenn nicht, wird der Fall an ein Inkassobüro weitergeleitet.Obiges gilt nur für Kredite mit N26. Für Kredite von auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) oder Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) wende dich bitte direkt an den jeweiligen Partner.

question: Wie lege ich eine Beschwerde ein?
answer: Brauchst du Hilfe oder hast du eine Frage? Wenn du Hilfe mit deinem Konto benötigst, eine Kartenzahlung reklamieren willst oder persönliche Daten aktualisieren willst, kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter!Eine Beschwerde einreichenWir bedauern, dass du eine Beschwerde einreichen möchtest. Wir werden dein Anliegen prüfen und dir unsere Ergebnisse und die endgültige Antwort per E-Mail übermitteln.Unser Kundenservice kann dir beim Einreichen einer Beschwerde per Live-Chat behilflich sein. Möchtest du die Beschwerde jedoch per E-Mail einreichen, schreibe bitte an eine der folgenden E-Mail-Adressen in deiner bevorzugten Sprache:Deutsch beschwerden@n26.com (neuen Tab)Englisch complaints@n26.com (neuen Tab)Bitte beachte: Diese Adressen sind lediglich für die Einreichung einer Beschwerde gedacht. Für Kundenanfragen bitten wir dich, den Kundenservice (neuen Tab) zu kontaktieren. Unser Kundenservice ist täglich für dich da und kann dein Problem schnell lösen.Wenn du eine Beschwerde einreichst, benötigen wir folgende Informationen von dir:Das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung, mit dem bzw. mit der  du nicht zufrieden bistEine Beschreibung des Sachverhalts und wann das Problem aufgetreten istDu kannst auch Unterlagen einreichen, die im Zusammenhang mit deiner Beschwerde stehen Das gewünschte Ergebnis der BeschwerdeWir können kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur an die E-Mail-Adresse übermitteln, die mit deinem N26-Konto verknüpft ist. Wird die Beschwerde durch einen Vertreter eingereicht, muss ihr auch ein spezielles notariell beglaubigtes Vollmachtsformular beigefügt sein.Bitte kontaktiere uns via App oder per E-Mail, da wir dir nicht helfen können, wenn du unser Büro aufsuchst. Falls du uns nicht via App oder per E-Mail kontaktieren kannst, schicke uns bitte eine schriftliche Beschwerde (per Brief) an folgende Adresse:N26 Complaint Management10026 BerlinWir bestätigen dir den Erhalt deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail und prüfen anschließend den Sachverhalt. Sofern wir weitere Informationen von dir benötigen, wird sich unser Complaint Management Team direkt per E-Mail an dich wenden und dir erklären, welche Informationen wir zusätzlich brauchen. Sobald unser Team dein Anliegen geprüft hat, teilen wir dir per E-Mail eine endgültige Entscheidung mit.Bearbeitungszeit einer BeschwerdeAlle Beschwerden, die Zahlungsdienste wie Überweisungen und Kartentransaktionen betreffen, werden innerhalb von 15 Werktagen gemäß der Europäischen Richtlinie über Zahlungsdienste II (PSD2) gelöst. Falls wir mehr Zeit bei der Bearbeitung deiner Beschwerde benötigen, dann werden wir dich darüber informieren. Wir müssen dich innerhalb von 35 Werktagen über unsere Entscheidung informieren.Für alle anderen Beschwerden gelten unterschiedliche Fristen. Diese sind abhängig von den AGB jenes Landes, in dem du dein N26-Konto eröffnet hast. Deutschland und Österreich - 15 WerktageAndere europäische Länder - 15 WerktageIrland - 40 WerktageFrankreich - 56 KalendertageVereinigtes Königreich - 56 KalendertageSpanien - 60 KalendertageItalien - 60 KalendertageWenn wir keine Antwort von dir erhalten, schließen wir möglicherweise deine Beschwerde. Wenn du dich zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt wieder meldest, erstellen wir einen neuen Fall und teilen dir die neue Referenznummer für deine Beschwerde mit.Wenn du mit dem Ausgang deiner Beschwerde unzufrieden bistSolltest du mit der von uns angebotenen Lösung nicht zufrieden sein, hast du die Möglichkeit, dich an eine unabhängige dritte Instanz zu wenden. Es stehen dir beispielsweise folgende Schlichtungsstellen zur Verfügung:die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbankdie Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin)Eine vollständige Liste von Streitbeilegungs- und Schlichtungsstellen findest du in unserem Imprint (neuen Tab).

question: Wie kann ich meine Karte sperren?
answer: Du kannst deine Karten jederzeit in der App sperren und entsperren. Tippe bzw. klicke im Homescreen auf Karten wähle dann Karteneinstellungen aus. Dort kannst du entscheiden, ob du deine Abhebungen am Geldautomaten, Online- und Auslandszahlungen vorübergehend einschränken, deaktivieren oder deine Karte komplett sperren möchtest. So hast du die volle Kontrolle über deine Karte und kannst dich vor unberechtigten Transaktionen schützen. Du solltest deine Karte sofort sperren, wenn dir etwas verdächtig vorkommt. Du kannst sie später jederzeit wieder entsperren. Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

question: Warum funktioniert meine Foto-Verifizierung nicht?
answer: ℹ️ gilt für alle Regionen außer DeutschlandVergewissere dich zuerst, ob deine Ortungsdienste aktiviert sind. Dann sieh dir diese kurze Anleitung (neuen Tab) an, in der wir dir erklären wie du das perfekte Foto machst. Die meisten Foto-Verifizierungen scheitern an einer schlechten Bildqualität.Führe den Prozess in einer hellen Umgebung durch und verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera.Falls du ein Android-Gerät verwendest, gehe sicher dass der Auto-Fokus richtig eingestellt ist.Schalte den Blitz aus. Nimm das Selfie auf Augenhöhe auf.Stelle sicher, dass du die einzige Person auf dem Foto bist.Überprüfe dein Ausweisdokument.Wir akzeptieren nur Fotos deines Originalausweises (Kopien oder Screenshots sind nicht zulässig).Lege deinen Ausweis auf eine ebene Oberfläche und stelle sicher, dass er vollständig sichtbar ist und die Ausweisdaten gut lesbar sind.Wir können nur nationale Ausweise und Reisepässe akzeptieren (Führerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zulässig).Stelle sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbeschädigt ist.Wenn du deinen Ausweis abfotografiert und das Selfie gemacht hast, aber der erste Versuch fehlschlägt, kannst du einfach nochmal von vorne anfangen.Sobald deine Identitätsprüfung abgeschlossen ist, senden wir dir deine N26 Mastercard zu. Die Lieferzeit beträgt 10 Tage.Du erreichst uns im Chat von Montag bis Sonntag von 07:00-23:00 Uhr.

question: Suis-je imposable aux États-Unis ?
answer:
En tant que banque détentrice d’une licence bancaire, nous sommes tenus de communiquer directement à l'”Internal Revenue Service” (IRS). Nous leurs fournissons des renseignements sur les comptes bancaires détenus par les contribuables américains, conformément au FATCA. Cette loi a été établie par le département du Trésor américain et l'IRS pour favoriser une meilleure conformité fiscale. Elle empêche les ressortissants américains de recourir aux banques et autres organismes financiers étrangers pour éviter de payer l’impôt sur le revenu et les actifs.
Vous trouverez plus d’informations à propos du FATCA ici (nouvel onglet). 
Dans le cadre du FATCA, un ressortissant américain est défini comme :Un citoyen des Etats-Unis (y compris les binationaux)Un résident des Etats-Unis, par exemple en tant que titulaire d'une carte verte en cours de validité ou en tant que personne ayant réussi le "Substantial Presence Test" (voir ci-dessous).
Si vous n'êtes pas certain de savoir si vous êtes un ressortissant des Etats-Unis, veuillez consulter un conseiller fiscal.
“Substantial Presence Test” signifie:Que vous avez été physiquement présent aux États-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours de l'année civile en coursOUQue vous avez été physiquement présent aux États-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours des trois dernières années civiles :
(31 jours ou plus dans l'année civile en cours) + (le nombre de jours de présence physique aux États-Unis l'année dernière) divisé par 3 + (le nombre de jours de présence physique aux États-Unis l'avant-dernière année) divisé par 6.
De plus, si votre compte présente l'une des caractéristiques suivantes :Citoyenneté ou résidence aux États-UnisLieu de naissance aux États-UnisAdresse postale ou de résidence aux États-Unis, y compris les boîtes postalesNuméro de téléphone aux États-UnisOrdres de virements permanents ou paiements récurrents à un compte domicilié aux États-Unis
Dans ce cas nous sommes obligés de vous considérer comme ressortissant des Etats-Unis, à moins que vous ne nous transmettiez les documents suivants : Un formulaire d'auto-certification W-8BEN ou un document similaire agréé, etUn passeport ou une autre pièce d'identité délivrée par un autre gouvernement attestant votre citoyenneté ou de votre nationalité dans un pays autre que les États-Unis.Si vous êtes né aux États-Unis, merci de nous transmettre une copie de votre certificat de perte de nationalité.

question: How to upgrade to N26 You?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 You during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's (new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. If you upgrade to N26 You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of €9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.

question: Come posso cambiare il mio numero di telefono?
answer: È importante tenere i propri dati personali aggiornati, come per esempio, il tuo numero di telefono, necessario per associare il tuo smartphone o per inviare e ricevere trasferimenti via MoneyBeam. Ecco come puoi aggiornarlo nella tua app:Vai a 👤 Il mio Conto > Profilo > Informazioni personaliPer aggiornare il tuo numero di telefono nell'app, dovrai usare lo smartphone associato al tuo conto.

question: What to do if my account may be compromised?
answer:
Fraud hotline - Contact us.Have you made a SEPA or SWIFT transfer to a fraudster who has an N26 IBAN? Call us!
+49 30 22957300. Service hours: Mo. - Fr. 9:00 - 18:00. Please note, our fraud hotline only handles the described cases of fraud! If you have different issues or questions, please contact our customer service.Please note that N26 will never call you from this number. If you do receive a call that appears to be from this number, please do not answer as this is a third party imitating N26.If you believe your account may be compromised, first change your password, then there are some actions you can take in different situations:What should I do if I spot a suspicious transaction on my account?If you notice a suspicious transaction, refer to our article on How to dispute a transaction?Then contact our Customer Support team, either directly through the N26 app, or by emailing support@n26.com (new tab). If you’d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We’ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us. Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that we’ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.What should I do if I’ve lost my card, or believe that my card details may have been compromised?If your N26 card has been lost, stolen or you believe your card details have been compromised, you should lock your card immediately in your N26 app, and reorder a new one to keep your money safe. What if I’ve lost my paired device? Could someone access my account?If your paired device is lost or stolen, rest assured that your N26 app can only be accessed when the right password is entered, or with fingerprint or facial recognition. Our customer service team will be able to assist you in pairing a new device to your N26 account when you have one. Where can I learn more about security at N26?To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article (new tab).
