Spaces ist in deiner App und WebApp (neuen Tab) verfügbar.Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder primären Space) kannst du beliebig oft zusätzliche Spaces anlegen und löschen, wobei die Anzahl der verfügbaren aktiven Spaces von deinem Kontotyp abhängt: bis zu 10 zusätzliche Spaces mit N26 You, N26 Smart und N26 Metal.Die Kontoauszüge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces überwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die Kontoauszüge kannst du online herunterladen.Nur dein Hauptkonto kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einen Dispokredit hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur Beträge überweisen, die dort jeweils auch verfügbar sind.Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem Hauptkonto für Kartenzahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld überweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf tätigen kannst.Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedrückt hältst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine Bestätigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf überweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen möchtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe dafür zum gewünschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".Du kannst jetzt Zahlungen von einem Space sperren. Gehe einfach zu den Einstellungen des entsprechenden Space und tippe auf Zahlungen an mein Hauptkonto oder anderen Space sperren. Bestätige dann mit deiner Bestätigungs-PIN.Du kannst jetzt einen Space auch löschen, wenn eine Karte damit verknüpft ist. Gehe dazu in die Einstellungen von deinem Space.Spaces enthält eine Funktion, die “Regeln” heißt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzählen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erfahre mehr über unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.Round-up Savings:Mit der Funktion „Round-up Savings“ können Premiumkunden jede von ihnen getätigte Kartentransaktion auf den nächsten Euro aufrunden lassen, wobei die Differenz einem Space ihrer Wahl gutgeschrieben wird.Die Aufrundung führt nicht zu einer Überziehung deines Kontos. Solltest du über kein ausreichendes Guthaben verfügen, um die Aufrundung abzudecken, wird sie auch nicht ausgeführt.Du kannst immer nur eine „Round-up“-Funktion gleichzeitig aktivieren und dabei Geld in einen Space deiner Wahl überweisen.Du kannst die Funktion „Round-up“ jederzeit deaktivieren.Wenn du einen Space schließt, in dem die Aufrundung aktiviert war, bleibt die „Round-up“-Funktion so lange deaktiviert, bis sie wieder aktiviert wird.IBANs für Spaces:Premiumkunden (N26 Smart, You und Metal), die ihr Konto in Deutschland eröffnet haben und über eine deutsche IBAN verfügen, können ihrem Space bzw. ihren Spaces nun eine individuelle IBAN zuweisen. Sobald einem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen wurde, können über den Space bestimmte Überweisungen empfangen und Lastschriften getätigt werden. Im Folgenden findest du eine Zusammenfassung, wie du deine Spaces für eine noch bessere Übersicht über deine eingehenden und ausgehenden Überweisungen nutzen kannst: Überweisungen empfangen: Sobald du dem Space eine IBAN zugewiesen hast, kannst du die individuelle IBAN angeben, um Überweisungen zu empfangen.Ausgehende Zahlungen per Lastschrift tätigen: Mit Spaces mit einer zugewiesenen IBAN kannst du Zahlungen per Lastschrift tätigen.Mehrere Spaces mit IBANs: Du kannst bis zu 10 Spaces mit einer individuellen IBAN erstellen, um noch mehr Kontrolle über deine eingehenden und ausgehenden Geldflüsse zu haben. Du hast insgesamt 10 IBANs zur Verfügung.Unseren speziellen Artikel mit weiteren Informationen zu IBANs für Spaces findest du hier.

question: Was ist ein N26 Flex Konto?
answer: Unser N26-Flex-Konto ist weder ein N26-Standard-Konto (neuen Tab) noch ein Premium-Mitgliedschaftskonto (neuen Tab). Wir bieten dir das Flex-Konto an, wenn deine SCHUFA-Bonität nicht ausreicht, um ein N26-Standard-Konto zu eröffnen. Du kannst das N26-Flex-Konto nicht selbst auswählen; es wird dir am Ende der Anmeldestrecke angezeigt. Die Entscheidung, dir das Flex-Konto anzubieten erfolgt automatisch auf Grundlage deiner SCHUFA-Bonität, die wir von der SCHUFA erhalten, wenn du versuchst, dein Konto bei uns zu eröffnen.Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass der uns vorliegende SCHUFA Score nicht korrekt sein kann und aufgrunddessen eine menschliche Überprüfung dieser automatisierten Entscheidung wünscht, kannst du dich mit unserem Kundenservice (neuen Tab) in Verbindung setzen. Dies ist entweder per Live-Chat, über deine mobile N26-App oder Web-App oder über das N26-Support-Center möglich. Bitte beachte, dass wir kontobezogene Angelegenheiten nur von einer E-Mail-Adresse aus besprechen können, die für dein N26-Konto registriert ist.Nach deiner Kontaktaufnahme teilen wir dir mit, ob die uns vorliegende SCHUFA-Bonität Grundlage für das Angebot eines N26 Flex Kontos war, damit du bei Bedarf die SCHUFA bezüglich deiner SCHUFA-Bonität ansprechen kannst und mit der SCHUFA klarstellen kannst, ob der dort vorliegende Score deine Kreditwürdigkeit korrekt abbildet. Wir können dir nur dann ein N26-Standardkonto (neuen Tab) und ein Premium-Mitgliedschaftskonto (neuen Tab) anbieten, wenn und sobald deine SCHUFA-Bonität auf einen höheren Score geändert wird. Du kannst es dann erneut versuchen und wir werden erneut prüfen, ob wir dir ein N26-Standardkonto oder ein Premium-Mitgliedschaftskonto anbieten können.Wenn du eine menschliche Überprüfung dieser automatisierten Entscheidung wünscht, setze dich bitte mit uns in Verbindung, bevor du das Angebot des N26-Flex-Kontos annimmst. Bitte beachte:Das N26-Flex-Konto kostet 6€ monatlich. Über die monatliche Gebühr wirst du vor Eröffnung deines Kontos informiert. Diese Gebühr werden wir direkt von deinem Konto abbuchen. Die erste Gebühr wird berechnet, sobald dein Kontostand 6€ beträgt, spätestens aber 15 Tage nach deiner Kontoeröffnung. Ab der ersten Abbuchung wird die Gebühr dann monatlich berechnet. Um zu vermeiden, dass Überziehungszinsen berechnet werden, stelle bitte sicher, dass dein Konto über ausreichende Mittel zur Deckung dieser Gebühr verfügt.Das N26-Flex-Konto kann nicht mit einem N26 Business-, N26 Business You-, N26 Business Metal-, N26 Smart-, N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Konto kombiniert werden.Bargeldabhebungen an Geldautomaten oder in einem unserer 9.000 CASH26-Partnershops (neuen Tab) kosten jeweils 2 €. Beide Auszahlungsarten werden sofort belastet.

question: What is a security footer, and why have we included one?
answer: A security footer is a personalised message added to the bottom of emails and digital documents, the purpose of which is to act as a seal of authenticity.By adding your full name at the bottom of each email, our aim is to help you to differentiate between legitimate emails sent by N26 and phishing emails sent by fraudsters. Although a security footer cannot definitively prove an email has originated from a verified source, it aids in mitigating the risk of deceptive-phishing - the most common type of phishing attack.What is deceptive-phishing?Deceptive-phishing is the illegal practice of sending generic phishing emails to large quantities of unknown individuals, the objective behind which is to obtain privileged information under false pretences.How is this achieved? Fraudsters contact their targets under the guise of working for well-known companies. Targets are then lured into a false sense of security with brand imagery, time-sensitive scenarios, and misleading language. Once hooked, fraudsters will attempt to manipulate their targets into complying with their demands.How can you protect yourself?Pay close attention to emails you receive from banks, clients, employers, and so on. If you’re asked to do something, never act on impulse; always think carefully before taking action. If you have a feeling that something is off, don’t ignore it. Take notice of incorrect spelling and grammar, hover over (don’t click) hidden URLs, check sender details, and do some research - a quick online check can help you to verify a sender’s identity.If you’ve received a suspicious email, phone call and/or SMS, in the name of N26, forward your concerns to our Customer Support team at support@n26.com. If you’d like to discuss account-related issues, chat to us via our mobile app.Learn more about:How to report suspected phishing attacks (new tab)How to recognize and avoid phishing attacks (new tab)How to protect yourself from social engineering (new tab)

question: Pourquoi ai-je été débité d’un montant qui ne correspond pas à ma transaction ?
answer: N26 fonctionne en temps réel. Nous vous informons grâce à des notifications push dès qu’une transaction apparaît sur votre compte.Il arrive parfois qu’une transaction semble suspicieuse car le montant débité ne correspond pas au montant de la transaction. Voilà les raisons pour lesquelles cela peut arriver :Le marchand a émis une empreinte bancaire pour une caution (dans une station essence, pour une location de voiture ou un hôtel par exemple). Dans ce cas, le montant de cette caution sera recrédité sur votre compte dès qu’elle ne sera plus nécessaire.L’évolution du taux de change peut influencer légèrement le montant des transactions faites en monnaies étrangères.Dans les deux cas, aucun frais sur la différence entre ces deux montants ne seront prélevés.Si vous êtes certain qu’il s’agit d’une transaction frauduleuse, veuillez prendre contact avec le Service Client par Livechat pour obtenir de l’aide.

question: Comment annuler ma demande de crédit ?
answer: Vous pouvez annuler votre demande de crédit N26 gratuitement pendant la période de rétraction de 14 jours à compter de la signature de l’offre de crédit.Faites simplement votre demande en nous contactant par Livechat. Une fois votre confirmation écrite reçue, nous traiterons votre demande et nous confirmerons l’annulation de votre crédit par email.Veuillez vous assurer que le montant total de votre crédit est disponible sur votre compte au moment de votre rétractation et jusqu’à ce qu’elle soit effective.Si votre crédit est fourni par l’un de nos partenaires, veuillez les contacter directement, Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) en Allemagne et Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) en France.

question: Why did my online purchase fail?
answer: Here you can find some reasons as to why your online payment failed and some troubleshooting steps to help you solve the issue.If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website (if you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone). Please note: the push notification will only be sent to the smartphone connected to the account.Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.A stable internet connection is required.If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.Your Maestro card can’t be used for online purchases.

question: Why might N26 block or close my account, and what can I do about it?
answer: ℹ️ In the event that the business relationship must be terminated (new tab), N26 shall act in accordance with section 13* of the General Terms & Conditions (new tab) which define the relations and rights between the customer and the bank.There are several reasons why N26 may block or close an account. These reasons come from our decision as a business to act in line with our risk management policies, as well as our need to comply with relevant statutory obligations. In simple terms, this means that N26—as a bank—needs to act in line with laws that exist to combat illegal activities such as money laundering, financing terrorism, tax fraud, and abusive or fraudulent use of the account. In these cases, access to an N26 account may be restricted, or the account may be closed.Other reasons why an account could be closed include: improper usage of the account, a serious breach of any of the Terms and Conditions, orany behavior that goes against the general rules of conduct set between the customer and the bank.We may also limit access to an account or a part of the funds within the account, if we are obliged to do so by the relevant authorities.Access to my account has been restricted. How can I contact N26 to resolve it?Because N26 is a regulated financial institution, there are many regulations that we must follow and comply with. This means that we’re required to review some of our customers’ transactions and account activities periodically—and as a result of these reviews, we may limit access to your N26 account. Please bear in mind that this process is entirely lawful—it’s a part of how we ensure that our customers and their accounts are kept safe. If you find yourself with restricted access to your N26 account, we’ll send you an email to your in-app inbox to let you know of the steps that you need to take. Of course, we understand that you may have questions about this process, and we’re here to help. If you wish to contact us about restricted access to your N26 account, please reply directly to the email in your in-app inbox (new tab) that you received with instructions on your next steps. Here’s how you can reply: Log in to your N26 AppGo to My Account > Help > Messages from N26Open the relevant message and press the Reply button at the end of the message.If you can’t access your account via the N26 App anymore, you may also reply directly from your email.I received a notification that my account was closed. What should I do?If you have any questions about the status of your account or your remaining funds, please contact us by replying directly to the email that notified you of your account closure. Please note that our Customer Support specialists will not be able to assist you via chat, as we cannot share information regarding this process in a chat message due to legal and data protection reasons. * If you opened your account before April 17, 2019 and have an IBAN starting with DE, this information is set out in section 19 of the respective General Terms & Conditions (new tab).

question: What if my balance is negative?
answer: If you have an overdraft, your balance can be negative as long as you stay within your overdraft limit.Your balance can also become negative if you have to pay N26 fees, e.g., for our express delivery or our premium memberships. Furthermore, your balance can become negative if an offline card payment is received and needs to be debited. These could be, for instance, payments made on aircraft or ships, which were not taken from your balance at the time of payment authorization but must still be debited. In accordance with our terms and conditions, you are obligated to balance your account. You will receive a reminder via email and we ask that you balance your account as quickly as possible. You cannot make any further payments or withdrawals while your balance is negative.What happens if my balance remains negative?Your account will remain active for 60 days from the date your balance becomes negative. During this period:You will receive two reminders.If you have an overdraft, it will be canceled after the second reminder and you will have to repay the amount immediately (or you can apply for a repayment plan).If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal or N26 Business You account, all services will be canceled after 60 days and your account will be converted into a standard account.Once this 60-day period has passed, we are entitled to close your account if you have still not taken action to rectify your negative balance.

question: What are the benefits of N26 You?
answer: A physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between five new colors when ordering the card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app.Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 Metal Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.You can compare N26 YOU with our other plans (new tab) to see which one suits you the best!Please keep the following in mind when considering N26 You:The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 Business You from N26 Standard or Smart, the monthly fee of €9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 You, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.From now on, you can decide whether to pay your Premium fee monthly or in advance for the next 6 months or 1 year of the contract. If you choose the prepayment option, you will benefit from a discount on the monthly cost of your Premium account (Smart / You / Metal), which will be proportional to the billing period you want to pay.Upon signing up, you will find the prepaid billing options and related costs in your N26 app. It's currently not possible to change the billing option for the membership renewal.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Ricarica con carta, Apple Pay e Google Pay
answer:
Adesso puoi trasferire denaro utilizzando una carta di debito o di credito oltre ad Apple e Google Pay. Questo è il modo più semplice e veloce per ricaricare il tuo conto N26.Come trasferire denaro con una carta di debito o di creditoApri l’app N26 e vai su “Aggiungi denaro”Seleziona “Trasferimento da carta”Scegli un importo e inserisci il tuo nome sulla carta, il numero della carta, la data di scadenza e il CVC (non memorizziamo mai i dati della tua carta)Segui i passaggi per confermare il pagamentoIl denaro è disponibile sul tuo conto all’istanteIl servizio di accredito istantaneo del Conto consente di ricaricare un importo compreso tra 20 € e 450 € per ogni transazione e fino a un massimo di 450 € al mese.Come trasferire denaro con Apple o Google PayApri l’app N26 e vai su “Aggiungi denaro”Seleziona “Apple Pay” o “Google Pay”Scegli un importoSegui i passaggi per confermare il pagamentoIl denaro è disponibile sul tuo conto all’istanteCarte accettate: Carte di debito.Carte di credito (ad eccezione di America Express).Carte prepagate (solo per i clienti con Termini e Condizioni Italiani).Per saperne di più sulla differenza tra carte di debito, credito e carte prepagate leggi questo articolo (inglese). (nuova tabella)Costo:
Sebbene questo sia il modo più semplice e veloce per trasferire immediatamente fondi sul tuo conto N26, per noi, l’elaborazione di queste transazioni di ricarica istantanee è più costosa di altri metodi di ricarica del conto (nuova tabella) che offriamo.Per entrambi i metodi, il primo deposito è sempre gratuito, ma per i depositi aggiuntivi viene addebitata una commissione del 3% sull’importo del deposito. Caricando una carta o un portafoglio digitale, i tuoi soldi non vengono inviati immediatamente a N26 e la commissione copre i costi aggiuntivi associati alla ricarica del conto prima che i soldi vengano ricevuti, in modo che siano immediatamente disponibili per l’uso.

question: Perché mi è stata addebitata una commissione sui prelievi ATM?
answer: Le commissioni bancomat possono avvenire per vari motivi:Si applica una commissione di 2€ su qualsiasi prelievo aggiuntivo oltre la nostra politica di utilizzo (solo per nuovi possessori di N26 Standard). Riceverai una notifica push quando stai per esaurire i prelievi gratuiti.Alcuni operatori ATM possono applicare commissioni proprie che non abbiamo modo di rifiutare o rimborsare. Prima di procedere con il prelievo, sullo sportello ATM dovrebbe essere visualizzata la commissione. Nell'elenco delle tue transazioni, la commissione viene aggiunta all'importo del prelievo. Le commissioni N26, invece, appaiono come transazioni separate. I clienti in Spagna possono trovare una soluzione qui:I prelievi ATM in valuta estera a volte includono commissioni. Con il conto N26 Standard e N26 Smart si applica una commissione dell’1,7% dell’importo del prelievo. Questa commissione non si applica ai possessori di N26 You e N26 Metal.Utilizzo della carta Maestro per i prelievi ATM. I prelievi nazionali o internazionali sono soggetti a una commissione di 2 €. Maestro è disponibile solo in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi.Per evitare le commissioni, soprattutto in viaggio, puoi utilizzare il localizzatore di ATM Mastercard (nuova tabella) per trovare i dispositivi da cui prelevare gratuitamente nelle tue vicinanze.Trovi una panoramica delle nostre commissioni nel listino prezzi (nuova tabella).

question: Wie kann ich zu N26 Smart upgraden?
answer: ℹ️ Gilt für Belgien, Dänemark, Deutschland, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Island, Italien, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Österreich, die Niederlande, Norwegen, Polen, Portugal, Schweden, die Slowakei, Slowenien und Spanien.N26 Smart ist über die Erstanmeldung eines Kontos oder über ein Upgrade in der mobilen App verfügbar, wenn du bereits ein Standardkonto hast.Um das Upgrade auf N26 Smart in der App durchzuführen, öffnest du einfach die Registerkarte Entdecken und wählst Entdecke N26 Smart aus. Mit der Bestellung einer neuen Karte kannst du aus unseren fünf neuen Farben wählen: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.Wähle dann deine bevorzugte Versandmethode, akzeptiere die Geschäftsbedingungen von N26 Smart und schon ist deine neue Karte zu dir unterwegs.Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu 10 Werktage, Expresslieferungen 3 Werktage.Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 4,90 € wird jeden Monat am Tag des Upgrades direkt von deinem Konto abgebucht.Die Mindestvertragslaufzeit für die N26 Smart Mitgliedschaft beträgt ein Jahr. Deine Mitgliedschaft verlängert sich automatisch, wenn du sie nicht spätestens vier Wochen vor Vertragsende kündigst.Über deine N26 App kannst du eine zusätzliche N26 Smart Card für eine einmalige Gebühr von 10 € bestellen.

question: Pourquoi la liaison avec mon compte Wise a échoué ?
answer: Nous sommes navrés d’apprendre qu’il n’est actuellement pas possible de lier votre compte N26 à Wise. La raison la plus courante est que les informations personnelles sont incomplètes du côté de Wise.Nous ne pourrons pas lier votre compte dans N26 si, dans le passé, vous aviez créé un compte directement auprès de Wise en utilisant la même adresse e-mail que celle enregistrée sur votre compte N26 et que les informations personnelles sont incomplètes.Voici comment lier votre compte N26 à Wise :Veuillez vous connecter à votre compte Wise sur www.wise.com/login, ou via leur application.Assurez-vous que votre nom complet, votre adresse, votre date de naissance et votre numéro de téléphone sont complets.Si vous ne vous souvenez plus de votre mot de passe ou même d'avoir créé un compte avec WiseAccédez à www.wise.com/login et essayez de vous connecter.Sélectionnez « Mot de passe oublié » pour réinitialiser votre mot de passe et accéder à votre compte.Il se peut qu'il ait été créé via un autre partenaire ou il y a quelque temps.

question: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
answer: Any app version can be used for 180 days since its release. Within this period, newer versions will be available. Please always upgrade to the newest version for a seamless customer experience. You can check and download the latest version of the N26 app from the Apple App Store (new tab) or the Google Play Store (new tab).Please be aware, there are minimum requirements for all phones to ensure proper usage. These requirements are listed below:iPhone:Model 5s or newer.iOS 12 or above:(You can find your iOS version under "Settings" > "General" > "Informations").Android:Android 6.0. or above. You can find your Android version under "Settings" > "About your device"Native support of Google Services

question: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
answer: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German). Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the “Owner”, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space: Owns all the funds within a Shared Space. Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime. Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner’s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, they’ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space. N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces?How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

question: How to change my debit card PIN?
answer: You set your debit card PIN when you activate your card. N26 never sets a PIN code for your card, so if you forget it or just want to change it—you can easily reset your PIN right from the N26 app.Before setting or changing your PIN, make sure your smartphone is paired with your account and that you’ve activated your card. Then follow these steps:Open the N26 app and choose ‘Cards’ from the bottom right-handTap ‘Card Settings’ and select the relevant cardSelect ‘Reset PIN’Enter the 10-digit number that appears on the front or back of your cardChoose a new PIN code and confirmFYI, before making an online purchase or a contactless (NFC) payment with a newly activated card, you’ll first have to make a chip-and-PIN transaction—in a store or at an ATM.Invalid or wrong PINFor security reasons we don’t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences—such as 1111, 1234, or 4321. If the number you chose isn’t accepted, simply try again a different combination. If you enter the wrong PIN code three times in a row, the card will be automatically blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via in-app chat so we can unblock it for you.Your debit card PIN is not the same as your confirmation PIN, (new tab) although you can choose the same PIN code for both if you want.If, after changing your PIN code, you have trouble paying with your card, please ensure that you’ve activated it using the chip or at an ATM (see step 6 above).

question: Come modificare i limiti della mia carta?
answer: Puoi impostare i limiti per le tue carte nell’app mobile N26 oppure nella tua WebApp (nuova tabella). Tutte le modifiche apportate verranno applicate immediatamente alla carta che hai selezionato.Modifica dei limiti tramite l’app mobile:Effettua il log-in e vai a CarteScorri lateralmente fino a che non appare la carta desiderataVai a Impostazioni carteVai a Limiti giornalieriModifica dei limiti nella WebApp:Effettua il log-in (nuova tabella) e vai su Il mio accountSotto la categoria Carte clicca sulla carta desiderataLimiti per le carteIl limite giornaliero si riferisce alle 24 ore precedenti (e non al giorno di calendario):1.000 € per prelievi agli sportelli ATM5.000 € per pagamenti nei negozi o onlineIl limite mensile è fissato al mese di calendario ed è pari a:20.000 € per pagamenti nei negozi o onlinePreferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial (nuova tabella) sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube (nuova tabella).

question: How does N26 Business Metal work?
answer: Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.The N26 Business Metal account costs €16,90 per month and is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.What are the benefits of N26 Business Metal?Physical N26 Mastercard for free: Choose between 3 new colors when ordering the card: Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, Slate. Extra virtual card: Order an extra virtual card for free in the app!Extra physical card: Order an extra, physical N26 YOU card for a one-off fee of 10€ through your N26 app. Spaces: 10 additional Spaces (subaccounts) to organise your finances.Shared Spaces: Invite friends to your Spaces (subaccounts) to share and manage funds together.Dedicated phone support: Contact our dedicated customer support hotline if you have any questions. Cashback: You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. CASH26: Withdraw and deposit cash using our CASH26 feature (DE, AT and IT T&C’s).Free ATM withdrawals worldwide: Pay with your N26 You Mastercard online and in stores, avoid hidden fees and benefit from zero foreign transaction fees around the globe. You can also withdraw cash for free in any currency from ATMs worldwide.Exclusive partner offers (new tab): Enjoy premium partner offers and discounts with world-class brandsInsurance package by Allianz Global Assistance*: Insurance which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.Snow and mountain rescue: Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing: Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.It’s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it’s important to know if N26 Business Metal is right for you (new tab).Keep these in mind when considering N26 Business Metal:The N26 Business Metal account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can’t have your company’s name on the account or card.If you upgrade to N26 Business Metal from another membership, the monthly fee of €16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you’re a new customer that signed up to N26 Business Metal, your membership will be active as soon as the first fee was charged. This happens when you topped-up your account to cover the first monthly fee, but at the latest 15 days after you proved your identity. From then on, you’ll be charged your monthly fee on the same date every month.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.5% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. The process will start on the 15th of the following month and each month after and it will take up to 7 days for this to show in your balance statement.It’s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it’s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).Transfers in foreign currencies aren’t possible with N26 Business Metal. You can visit Wise (new tab) for this.You can sign-up to N26 Metal during your registration or by upgrading from a lower N26 Business membership.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

question: Perché mi è stata addebitata una commissione per l’addebito diretto?
answer: Agli addebiti diretti respinti sul tuo conto a causa di fondi insufficienti viene addebitata una commissione di € 3 in conformità ai nostri Termini e condizioni (nuova tabella). Puoi evitare queste commissioni assicurandoti di avere fondi sufficienti sul conto (nuova tabella) per coprire gli addebiti diretti in entrata entro le ore 18.00 dello stesso giorno lavorativo.Ti consigliamo di utilizzare i bonifici SEPA istantanei (nuova tabella), MoneyBeam, (tra utenti N26) CASH26 (se vivi in Germania, Austria, Spagna, Grecia o Italia) o l'opzione Carta di debito, credito o prepagata (nuova tabella) per trasferire l’importo dovuto. Con questi metodi, l’importo sarà accreditato sul conto istantaneamente.Se non riconosci un addebito diretto, puoi richiedere un rimborso (nuova tabella) nell’app.*Solo per i paesi fuori dall'Eurozona: Se stai impostando un addebito diretto nella tua valuta nazionale, sarà la banca ricevente a dettare il tasso del cambio e l'importo finale che verrà riscosso da noi. Di seguito puoi trovare l'elenco dei paesi:BulgariaCroaziaRepubblica CecaDanimarcaUngheriaIslandaLiechtensteinNorvegiaPoloniaRomaniaSveziaSvizzera

question: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
answer:
What is PSD2?Payment Services Directive 2 (“PSD2”) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.How does it work?If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you’ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.In our Privacy Policy (new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.FAQsWhy can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them. *applies to all countries in the EEA.

question: Chargebacks and card transaction disputes FAQ
answer:
In the event of an unauthorized transaction or even eligible authorized transactions, N26 customers can dispute a payment made with their N26 debit Mastercard and get their money back. Read on for answers to our frequently asked questions on chargebacks, and learn how to dispute a transaction (new tab) in this step-by-step article.I’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on my account. What should I do?If you’ve noticed an unauthorized transaction on your account, you’ll need to order a new card in order to keep your account secure and prevent further unauthorized transactions from occurring. Go to your N26 app, and re-order your card in the ‘Cards’ tab. You can mark the reason as “lost” or “stolen” based on your situation. If your card was in your possession at all times, you’ll need to re-confirm that you did not make the transaction yourself. Then, if necessary, report the fraud to the police, and follow the instructions to initiate a payment dispute (new tab).  How do I file a dispute for goods I ordered online?The process for filing a dispute for goods ordered online depends on the circumstance. Here’s a breakdown of the most common scenarios:You ordered goods online but never received them, and the merchant provided an expected delivery date
First, you’ll need to wait until the estimated delivery date has passed. If the goods don’t arrive within this timeframe, you can dispute the transaction from the date you expected to receive the goods. Mastercard’s chargeback guidelines state that you must file the dispute within 120 days of the anticipated delivery date.You ordered goods online but never received them, and you were never provided with an expected delivery date 
In this scenario, Mastercard’s chargeback guidelines allow you to file a dispute 30 days after the transaction date, kicking off a 120-day window in which the filing must take place. You received a delivery, but it doesn’t correspond with what you ordered 
Here, you may file the dispute right away, provided you aren't able to resolve the issue with the merchant. You have 120 days from the date you received the goods.I tried to withdraw cash at an ATM. I was charged, but I didn’t receive the cash. What should I do?First, try contacting the bank that owns the ATM. This is the fastest way to get your money back. Here’s some guidance on what to say:Dear XX, I attempted to withdraw cash from an ATM owned by your bank. I did not receive the cash, but was still charged. Below, you can find information about the transaction: Amount: €{insert amount}ATM name: {insert ATM/bank name} ATMDate and time of transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)ATM location: {ATM address - include the name of the street, or shopping mall}Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank. If the bank that owns the ATM is not helpful, follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, and merchant, as well as your reason for contesting this transaction.I have a previously authorized payment with a merchant who has charged me again without my authorization. What should I do?First, reach out to the merchant to see if they can help––this is the fastest way to get your money back. Here’s a basic template you can use to raise this issue with them: Dear XX, I authorized a transaction to {merchant name}, but {merchant name} has issued an additional charge without my authorization. Please find information about the transactions below: Merchant name: {insert merchant name} Amount of original, authorized transaction: €{insert amount}Amount of non-authorized transaction: €{insert amount}Date & time of original, authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Date & time of non-authorized transaction: DD/MM/YYYY at {insert time} (CET)Please return the funds to my account, or I will be forced to file a chargeback with my bank and initiate a complaint to the police/authorities.If the merchant is unresponsive or uncooperative, you can follow the instructions here to initiate a chargeback with N26. Be sure to include the transaction date, amount, merchant name, and the reason for contesting the transaction so that we have all the information we need to move your case forward. The merchant told me that they’ve issued a refund to my N26 card, but I never received the refund. What should I do?Refunds can take up to 15 calendar days from the date they were issued by the merchant. If 15 days have passed and you still haven’t received your refund, simply follow the instructions to initiate a dispute (new tab). Please include the transaction date, amount, merchant and your reason for contesting this transaction. How does N26 prevent fraud?At N26, protecting your account is our top priority. That’s why we offer a variety of features to keep your money safe, including the option to block your card in seconds, activate or deactivate payments abroad, enable or disable online transactions, and set spending limits––all right from your N26 app. We also offer biometric authentication for a secure login, 3D Secure technology for safe online payments, and a ‘Discreet Mode (new tab)’ option to securely access your account in public. Instant push-notifications help you stay up-to-date on all your incoming and outgoing payments, so you’re always aware of what’s happening on your account. Plus, we’re always improving our internal processes and tools to detect and prevent card fraud. How does card fraud occur? A: When it comes to debit cards or credit cards, there are 3 main ways in which fraud occurs:Your card is skimmed and counterfeited. This may happen when you use your card at an ATM that’s been tampered with in order to steal card details.Your card details are stolen online. This may happen if: You ordered something from a fraudulent websiteYour details are stolen while making a legitimate purchase Your online shopping account is hacked Your physical card is stolen and used to make purchases.How can I protect my account from fraud? Here are a few ways you can protect your account from fraud:Only use ATMs that belong to trusted banks Only place orders with trusted online retailers and websitesChange your online passwords and PINs regularly Never trust text messages or emails that appear to come from N26 which ask you to provide your card details, account details, or include suspicious links. N26 will never ask for your card or account details outside of the N26 app or the N26 WebApp.Change your card settings within your N26 app. For example, disable online payments, ATM withdrawals, payments abroad, and set spending limits that correspond with your regular spending behavior.Avoid making Magnetic Stripe transactions if possible. Instead, opt for the safer NFC chip-based or digital wallet transactions where available.Always keep your card in a safe place.

question: Come annullare la mia sottoscrizione Premium?
answer:
I contratti N26 Smart, N26 You o N26 Metal hanno una durata iniziale di un anno con rinnovo automatico dopo i primi 12 mesi, per poi passare a un contratto a tempo indeterminato.Puoi scegliere di annullare questo rinnovo automatico in qualsiasi momento nei primi 12 mesi di contratto.Dopo questo rinnovo il contratto diventerà a tempo indeterminato, ma puoi disdire la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento.In questo articolo troverai la differenza tra revoca e cancellazione della sottoscrizione e disdetta del rinnovo della tua sottoscrizione. Hai 3 opzioni a disposizione:Revocare la tua sottoscrizione entro il periodo di revoca pari a 14 giorni (il lasso di tempo previsto per legge, puoi richiederla contattandoci).Disdire il rinnovo della tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento prima della scadenza del primo contratto di 12 mesi contattandoci via chat.Cancellare la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momento (puoi terminare la tua sottoscrizione immediatamente e senza limitazioni contattandoci tramite chat).Passaggio da Premium a PremiumSe vuoi, ora puoi eseguire il passaggio ad un altro conto Premium senza dover eseguire il downgrade a N26 Standard, mantenendo così tutti i tuoi Spaces, le regole di arrotondamento, la tua carta e i pagamenti esistenti.Per farlo, accedi alla tua app mobile, vai su Il mio conto e apri i dettagli della tua iscrizione. Seleziona Modifica abbonamento e potrai quindi scegliere un altro conto Premium adatto alle tue esigenze.RevocaPuoi annullare la tua sottoscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni. Questo periodo inizia non appena viene addebitata la prima commissione mensile. Basta contattarci per ricevere assistenza da lì. Se revochi una delle nostre sottoscrizioni Premium in futuro potrai comunque passare allo stesso conto o ad un altro conto N26 Premium.Disdire il rinnovo della tua sottoscrizioneLa tua sottoscrizione N26 premium ha un contratto iniziale di 12 mesi.  Alla fine dei primi 12 mesi l'abbonamento si rinnoverà automaticamente e passerà a un periodo di contratto indefinito, a meno che non ci contatti e richiedi di interrompere il rinnovo.Puoi richiederlo in qualsiasi momento prima della data di rinnovo di 12 mesi e ti informeremo del rinnovo via email 8 settimane prima dell'anniversario. Se decidi di annullare il rinnovo, potrai continuare a usare la tua Mastercard N26 e tutti i vantaggi della tua sottoscrizione premium fino a che la tua sottoscrizione non scadrà. Ciò significa che manterremo la tua copertura assicurativa (per N26 You e N26 Metal) fintanto che ti verrà chiesto di pagare la commissione di sottoscrizione. Dopodiché, verrà emessa una carta virtuale in data dell'anniversario del contratto, subito dopo il downgrade. Per ricevere la carta virtuale è necessario avere un saldo minimo è di 10€. Non occorre contattarci a riguardo, la richiesta verrà elaborata automaticamente.Cancella la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momentoSe in un qualsiasi momento in seguito al diritto di revoca dalla tua sottoscrizione vuoi cancellare la tua sottoscrizione premium, ti preghiamo di contattarci. Se scegli questa opzione con N26 You o N26 Metal, finiranno i tuoi vantaggi assicurativi e le tue carte premium Smart, You e Metal verranno disattivate. Se cancelli una delle nostre sottoscrizioni premium in futuro potrai sempre passare allo stesso o un altro conto premium.Disdire il rinnovo della tua sottoscrizioneLa tua sottoscrizione N26 premium ha un contratto iniziale di 12 mesi.  Alla fine dei primi 12 mesi l'abbonamento si rinnoverà automaticamente e passerà a un periodo di contratto indefinito, a meno che non ci contatti e richiedi di interrompere il rinnovo.Puoi richiederlo in qualsiasi momento prima della data di rinnovo di 12 mesi e ti informeremo del rinnovo via email 8 settimane prima dell'anniversario.Se decidi di annullare il rinnovo, potrai continuare a usare la tua Mastercard N26 e tutti i vantaggi della tua sottoscrizione premium fino a che la tua sottoscrizione non scadrà. Ciò significa che manterremo la tua copertura assicurativa (per N26 You e N26 Metal) fintanto che ti verrà chiesto di pagare la commissione di sottoscrizione. Dopodiché, verrà emessa una carta virtuale in data dell'anniversario del contratto, subito dopo il downgrade. Per ricevere la carta virtuale è necessario avere un saldo minimo è di 10€. Non occorre contattarci a riguardo, la richiesta verrà elaborata automaticamente.Cancella la tua sottoscrizione in qualsiasi momentoSe in un qualsiasi momento in seguito al diritto di revoca dopo 14 giorni dalla tua sottoscrizione vuoi cancellare la tua sottoscrizione premium, ti preghiamo di contattarci. Se scegli questa opzione con N26 You o N26 Metal, finiranno i tuoi vantaggi assicurativi e le tue carte premium Smart, You e Metal verranno disattivate.Se vuoi chiudere definitivamente il tuo conto, dai un'occhiata al nostro articolo Come chiudere il mio conto N26?Domande frequenti sulla disdetta dell'abbonamento a N26 PremiumDevo chiudere il mio conto per cancellare la mia sottoscrizione premium?
No, puoi semplicemente cambiare la tua sottoscrizione nell'app N26 e il tuo nuovo conto verrà creato immediatamente.Cosa succede al mio IBAN se annullo la mia sottoscrizione premium?
La modifica del tuo abbonamento non inciderà sulle tue coordinate bancarie, quindi il tuo IBAN rimarrà invariato.

question: ¿Cuántas veces puedo retirar efectivo gratis?
answer: El número de retiradas gratuitas en cajeros automáticos utilizando tu Mastercard depende del país al que se envió tu tarjeta originalmente.Cada retirada de efectivo adicional a las que se ofrecen gratis cada mes, tiene una comisión de 2 €.Con N26 You y Metal, las retiradas en moneda extranjera no tienen comisión por tipo de cambio; mientras que con N26 Estándar y Business, tienen una comisión del 1,7 %.Italia, España, Francia, Países Bajos y el resto de EuropaN26 Estándar y Business: 3 retiradas gratis al mes en euros.N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Business Smart y Business You: 5 retiradas gratis al mes en euros.N26 Metal y Business Metal: 8 retiradas gratis al mes en euros.En España y Grecia también puedes retirar efectivo gratis de forma ilimitada usando CASH26 (pestaña nueva).AlemaniaN26 Estándar y Business: 3 retiradas gratis al mes en euros.N26 Smart, N26 You, N26 Business Smart y N26 Business You: 5 retiradas gratis al mes en euros.N26 Metal y Business Metal: 8 retiradas gratis al mes en euros.Fuera de Alemania, las retiradas gratis en la eurozona son ilimitadas. También puedes retirar efectivo gratis de forma ilimitada usando CASH26 (pestaña nueva).Las retiradas en cajeros realizadas con la tarjeta Maestro (disponible en Alemania, Austria y Países Bajos) tienen siempre una comisión de 2 €. Si tienes nuestra cuenta N26 Flex, cada retirada cuesta 2 €. Revisa nuestra lista de precios (pestaña nueva) si te han cobrado comisión (pestaña nueva) en algún cajero automático.AustriaRetiradas de efectivo gratis ilimitadas.También puedes retirar efectivo gratis de forma ilimitada usando CASH26 (pestaña nueva).SuizaLas retiradas en Suiza en euros son gratis.Las retiradas en la eurozona son gratis de 3 a 5* veces al mes.Las retiradas en Suiza en francos tienen una comisión del 1,7 %.

question: Come funziona N26 Business Metal?
answer: Vale per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna e Svezia.N26 Business Metal costa 16,90 € al mese ed è pensato per lavoratori autonomi e freelance che hanno un’azienda a proprio nome. Ciò significa che il conto non sarà in nome della tua azienda e la tua azienda non comparirà sulla carta.Una Mastercard N26 fisica gratis: ordinando la carta, scegli tra cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina e Antracite.Carta virtuale aggiuntiva: ordina una carta virtuale aggiuntiva gratuitamente nell’app!Carta fisica aggiuntiva: ordina una carta N26 YOU aggiuntiva fisica direttamente dalla tua app N26 pagando una commissione una tantum di 10 €.Spaces: 10 Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) aggiuntivi per organizzare le tue finanze.Spazi Condivisi: invita i tuoi amici nei tuoi Spaces (spazi separati dal conto principale) a condividere e gestire insieme i fondi.Supporto telefonico dedicata: contatta la nostra hotline dedicata al Supporto Clienti in caso di domande. Prelievi ATM gratuiti in tutto il mondo: paga con la tua Mastercard N26 Metal online e in negozi fisici, evita commissioni nascoste e approfitta di zero commissioni per transazioni all’estero in tutto il mondo. In più, puoi prelevare gratuitamente in tutto il mondo, anche in valuta estera.Offerte partner esclusive: (nuova tabella) offerte partner premium e sconti su marchi famosi in tutto il mondoPacchetto assicurativo di Allianz Global Assistance*: assicurazione che include un’ampia gamma di vantaggi personali e finanziari come:Assicurazione di viaggio: rimborso di spese mediche all’estero, per cancellazioni dei viaggi in seguito a un’emergenza medica, spese sostenute durante ritardo di volo superiore a 4 ore, spese in caso di ritardo bagagli imbarcati di più di 6 ore e spese di rimpatrio medico.Salvataggio neve e montagna: ricevi una copertura per ricerca, salvataggio, costi di primo trasporto e spese mediche in caso di incidenti durante una gita in montagna.Condivisi auto, bici e scooter: copertura in caso di danni o furto di veicoli affittati da aziende di car sharing.Ancora non è possibile passare da conti privati a conti business, quindi è importante sapere se N26 Business Metal fa al caso tuo (nuova tabella).Puoi selezionare questa tipologia di conto in fase di registrazione oppure richiedere il passaggio a Metal se possiedi già un conto N26 Business.È concepito per lavoratori autonomi e liberi professionisti: non è possibile intestare il conto né la carta a nome di un'azienda.Il canone mensile è pari a 16,90 €.La Mastercard N26 Business Metal è destinata esclusivamente ad un uso commerciale. Ogni mese ti verrà rimborsato lo 0,5% di tutti i pagamenti effettuati con carta. Il processo inizierà il 15 del mese seguente e ogni mese successivo. Passeranno fino a 7 giorni prima che questo appaia nel tuo saldo.Non è possibile avere contemporaneamente due conti N26 ma se hai bisogno di una carta per le spese personali e apri il tuo conto N26 Business Metal in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe è un nome commerciale di AWP P&C S.A. - filiale olandese, parte di Allianz Group.

question: How to block a Direct Debit?
answer: Before sending us the form to block a direct debit, please note the following:Creditor ID and Mandate Reference: You will need to specify both the creditor ID and Mandate Reference. You can find this information in the transaction details of the previous direct debit in the app or by contacting the merchant (please note, IBAN and merchant name is not sufficient).Attachments less than 25MB: When you reply with the necessary form, please make sure that the total sum of your attachments don't exceed 25MB.Document signature: If you can, it is best to hand sign the form you send to us. However, we can also accept:E-Signature: Needs to match the document you used to open your N26 account.Digital Signature: If you have a digital signature on the document that can be verified by us, then the signature is considered valid. Digital signatures can be created through providers such as “DocuSign”.Finally, it is important to note that cancelling a direct debit only stops payments, it won't cancel the contract you have with a merchant!How do I block a Direct Debit?Please follow the below steps, complete the form and get in touch with our customer support team via live chat or phone:Please download and complete this form (new tab).Fill the form and specify what you want to block e.g. Creditor ID, Mandate Reference and full block. Please note, you can already find some of this information in previous Direct Debits from the same merchant within your transaction list.Make sure to include a signature (handwritten, e-signature or digital signature).You then need to get in touch with our customer support team via live chat (to be seamlessly verified) or phone, where our specialists can help you to complete the process. Completing the form beforehand will help speed up the process!

question: What is Phishing?
answer: Phishing is a simple and effective tool hackers use to deceive people into handing over sensitive personal information. Once they have obtained this information, they can use it to perpetrate various types of fraud while impersonating their victims. If you’d like to learn more, please click here (new tab) to read our blog post about how to recognise and avoid phishing attacks.How to report suspicious emails and text messagesN26 will never send text messages or emails containing time-critical warnings instructing you to log in to your account and share privileged user data. We’ll never issue you with an ultimatum, nor will we ask you to authenticate yourself or verify your data outside of our secure communication channels.Suspicious EmailsIf you receive a suspicious email, do not click on any links or download any attachments. To help us in our investigation, we ask that you either:Simply forward the suspicious email thread to us at: support@n26.com.ORIf possible, please save the suspicious email as an ‘eml’ file and send it to us. Most email service providers will automatically save the file in this format when you download it. Sending the suspicious message to us in this format allows us to determine the true origin of the suspicious message and report it to the relevant organizations. If you have any difficulty saving the email in this format, no problem. Please simply forward the suspicious email thread to the address above. Please do not take screenshots and send them to us, as we can’t use this information. Delete the email from your inbox.Suspicious Text MessagesIf you receive a suspicious text message, do not click on any links or provide any data.To help us in our investigation, we ask that you do the following: Take a screenshot of the message you received and send it to: support@n26.com.Ensure that the full message, including the sender's phone number and the date/time, are all visible.After our confirmation that you have received a phishing text, block the phone number.Delete the message from your mobile phone. Suspicious Phone CallsIf you receive a suspicious call, whether or not it comes from one of our phone numbers, do not provide any personal data, or relating to your account or the card associated with it. Please note that in some cases, with the “phone spoofing” technique, scammers are able to disguise the sender's phone number, making it appear the same as that of the bank.For this reason, if you suspect that you have been the victim of a phone scam or have provided your personal data, please contact our customer support immediately at support@n26.com.How to Report a Fake WebsiteAt one point or another, you may find yourself on an illegitimate website that’s being used to falsely advertise services on behalf of N26. You may also see our logo displayed on alleged affiliate sites. They may be offering credit, or perhaps they’re offering limited-time promotional deals. It’s important to note that just because “N26” is part of the URL, this doesn’t necessarily indicate that a site is legitimate.If you suspect you’re on a fraudulent site, we suggest that you pause for a moment and do the following:Check the address bar and make sure the URL reads: https://app.n26.com/login. If it doesn’t, copy the URL and report it immediately to: support@n26.com.

question: ¿Cómo crear y modificar transferencias programadas?
answer: Crear una transferencia programada es muy fácil y puedes hacerlo desde la app o la WebApp. Cuando haces una transferencia saliente desde tu cuenta, tienes la posibilidad de convertirla en una transferencia programada. Para ello, marca la casilla verde que aparece en la parte de abajo de la pantalla y confirma los datos del beneficiario y la cantidad. También puedes elegir con qué frecuencia se va repetir y hasta qué fecha.Puedes consultar tus transferencias programadas desde la app:1. Ve a la lista de transacciones (o sea, la pantalla principal).2. Pulsa en los tres puntos situados en la esquina derecha superior (Android) o encima de la lista de transacciones (iOS).3. Aparecerá una ventana donde estarán todas tus transferencias programadas.Desde esa sección vas a poder modificar o cancelar dichas transferencias. Para cancelarla, simplemente pincha sobre la transferencia que quieres eliminar y arrástrala hasta la papelera. ℹ️ Ten en cuenta que, si una transferencia no se realiza por falta de fondos en la cuenta, no habrá otro intento automáticamente y será necesario enviar la transferencia de forma manual. La siguiente transferencia ya se volverá a emitir de forma normal.

question: What are Cards for Spaces?
answer: With our new Cards for Spaces feature, your individual subaccounts acquire a brand new functionality that allows you to link your N26 Mastercard to one of your Spaces and spend directly from there.How does it work?Cards for Spaces allows N26 customers with a Premium membership subscription (N26 Smart, You or Metal) to link their physical or virtual Mastercard to a Space and use the funds in the subaccount for personal expenses. Below you can find an overview of the features available with attaching your N26 Mastercard to a Space: You will be able to link your Mastercard to one of your Spaces and back to your Main Account in one clickYou can link more than one card to a Space or to different SpacesIf you link a physical card to a Space, this will automatically allow you to use Apple and Google Pay with that cardThe feature is not available for Shared Spaces yetHow can I link my card to a Space?You will be able to link your existing virtual and physical cards to your chosen Space.There are 3 ways to do it:In the Cards tab, you can find under each card the button to select your chosen Space.In Card settings, you can also select your chosen space and link it to your card.In each Space settings, you will be able to select the card to link to that specific Space.Whenever you want to relink your card to your main account or to another Space, just select ‘Main account’ or the other Space in the dropdown menu.

question: How to request the average annual balance
answer:
In the beginning of January 2022, you will receive your average annual balance for 2021 in your (new tab)Messages (new tab). You do not need to submit a request. Same thing for the average annual balance of the years 2020 and 2019.If you need your average annual balance for a year prior to 2019, please contact our Customer Service team via chat.Why do I need it?The average annual balance is used to fill out the ISEE form, report your N26 bank account with a German IBAN to the Italian tax authorities when this balance is greater than 5.000€, prove your creditworthiness, and access programs or receive special benefits from the Italian government based on your financial situation.You can request the ISEE form by filling out the DSU form, which is essential for accessing some of the tax breaks offered by the Italian government.The value of the average annual balance, which is self-certified by the bank account holder without the need for paper documentation, must be entered in the FC.2 section of the ISEE form, under “bank and postal accounts and deposits”. You should enter the type of financial asset held and the bank account balance into this field.How do I calculate it?The average annual balance is the amount obtained by dividing the sum of the daily balances of the current account by 365, regardless of the effective duration of the calendar year (leap years), and of the number of days in which the account has been active or had a positive balance, as defined by the italian Tax Authority (new tab) and in the instructions (new tab) for completing the Single Tax Declaration 2020 of the Ministry of Labor and Social Policies.FAQs on Average annual balanceIf I have an account with a German IBAN and my average balance is over € 5,000, do I have to declare it to the tax authority?Yes, you will have to fill in the Rw part of the tax return and pay VAT, a fixed amount tax of € 34.20. Click here (new tab) for more information on this.I would like to receive a PDF document with the value of my average annual balance. Is it possible?We remind you that there are no legal provisions that require banks to provide this type of certification.
We have decided to send the average annual balance as a private message, in order to make this data easily accessible and downloadable by all customers.
However, your bank statement is sufficient as official proof in the event of an explicit request by the authorities, therefore we are unable to provide any document signed by the bank in PDF or similar format.

question: Pourquoi des frais ont été prélevés après un prélèvement automatique ?
answer:
Comme mentionné dans nos Conditions Générales (nouvel onglet), si un prélèvement automatique est refusé en raison d’un solde de compte insuffisant, des frais de 3 € sont appliqués. Si votre solde devient négatif à cause de ces frais, les taux d'intérêt appliqués au montant du découvert (agios) s'élèveront à 8,9 %.Vous pouvez éviter ces frais en vous assurant d’avoir les fonds suffisants sur votre compte. 
Veuillez alimenter votre compte avant 18 heures le jour même du prélèvement, en recevant un virement par exemple.Nous vous conseillons d'alimenter votre compte de façon instantanée afin qu'il soit crédité immédiatement. Vous pouvez le faire de ces trois façons différentes :un virement SEPA instantané un MoneyBeam (entre deux comptes N26) CASH26 (uniquement disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Espagne, Grèce ou Italie)Carte de crédit ou de débit  (nouvel onglet) Si vous souhaitez demander le remboursement d'un prélèvement automatique, vous pouvez le faire depuis votre application mobile N26.Bon à savoir pour les pays en dehors de la zone euro : si vous mettez en place un prélèvement automatique avec un marchand et qu’il est facturé dans la devise locale de votre pays, le taux de change appliqué (et donc le montant final débité sur votre compte N26) est défini et collecté par la banque qui reçoit votre paiement. 
Voici la liste des pays concernés : BulgarieCroatieDanemarkHongrieIslandeLiechtensteinNorvègePologneRépublique TchèqueRoumanieSuèdeSuisse

question: Come posso bloccare i pagamenti contactless sulla mia carta?
answer: I pagamenti contactless sono davvero pratici. Ma potresti preferire la disattivazione di questo metodo di pagamento per evitare transazioni non autorizzate sulla tua carta. Per questo motivo è ora possibile disattivare i pagamenti NFC della tua carta. Ecco come:Vai su Carte.Se possiedi più carte, fai swipe verso destra finché non compare la carta interessata.Tocca Impostazioni della carta.Disattiva Pagamenti contactless.Le modifiche vengono applicate istantaneamente per la carta selezionata. Ricorda che queste impostazioni riguardano la tua carta fisica. Puoi leggere i nostri articoli dedicati alla gestione delle tue impostazioni Google Pay e Apple Pay. Se hai riscontrato delle difficoltà con i pagamenti con carta contactless, ti preghiamo di leggere il seguente articolo per scoprire come farli andare a buon fine.

question: How to block the magnetic stripe on my card?
answer: There are multiple ways to make a card payment: contactless (“tapping” your card), chip & PIN and Magnetic Stripe, where you swipe your card through a reader. While magnetic stripe transactions are less and less common, some merchants still require you to pay with this method.Why should I block magnetic stripe transactions?Magnetic stripe payments make up a relatively high proportion of fraud related card transactions. Some merchants have fraudulent systems to copy the information of your card and subsequently use it to make fraudulent transactions - this process is known as "card skimming". By blocking magnetic stripe transactions you can protect yourself against this risk.How can I block/unblock Magnetic Stripe transactions?In order to block magnetic stripe transactions: Go to Cards. If you have multiple cards, swipe to the right until you see the card you want.Tap Card settings.Tap magnetic stripe.Toggle Enable magnetic stripe.Here, you can also unblock the magnetic stripe again. The changes you make are applied instantly to the card you’ve chosen.

question: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
answer: What is Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You’re probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you’ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you’ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account.When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.Go here for more information on logging in with Two-Factor Authentication Why is Two-Factor Authentication being introduced?SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers’ data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated blog post (new tab).

question: Comment puis-je renvoyer un virement SEPA à son expéditeur ?
answer: Depuis le 17 mars, les clients d’autres établissements bancaires peuvent demander à leur banque le retour d’un virement SEPA envoyé sur un compte N26.Dans ce cas, le client N26 reçoit une notification push sur son téléphone synchronisé l’informant de la demande de rappel de fonds. Tout comme lorsque vous effectuez un virement depuis l’application N26, vous aurez le choix entre accepter le renvoi du virement, ou le refuser.Si vous acceptez le renvoi du virement, les fonds seront débités de votre compte et vous ne pourrez pas en demander le rappel ultérieurement.Si vous ne disposez pas des fonds suffisants sur votre compte principal (hors espaces), vous ne pourrez pas confirmer le renvoi du virement.Si la notification reste en attente, la demande sera automatiquement rejetée après 15 jours.

question: How to use Apple Pay?
answer:
Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and SwitzerlandApple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don’t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.We’ve made a video (new tab) to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If you’ve lost your iPhone and aren’t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won’t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you’re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you’re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support (new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

question: How much does an N26 account cost?
answer: An N26 bank account is free (new tab).*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany (new tab)Pricing in Austria (new tab)Pricing in France (new tab)Pricing in Spain (new tab)Pricing in Italy (new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe (new tab)*If we’re not able to offer you an N26 account based on our minimum requirements (new tab), you may be able to open an N26 Flex account.

question: How to open my N26 account?
answer: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web (new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported IDdon't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.If you open your account in Spain, please make sure to provide a valid Tax ID (as per art. 202, Ley General Tributaria 58/2003).This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, you’ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don’t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.

question: Probiere N26 Smart 2 Monate kostenlos
answer:
Du wolltest schon immer mal unser N26 Smart Konto ausprobieren, bist dir aber nicht sicher, ob es etwas für dich ist? Jetzt kannst du 2 Monate lang kostenlos und unverbindlich testen, ob unser Smart Konto zu dir passt!Wenn du es ausprobierst, erhältst du Zugang zu allen Premium-Banking-Funktionen, die in unserem Smart Konto enthalten sind. Entdecke, wie du mehr aus deinen täglichen Bankgeschäften herausholst.Was ist in der kostenlosen Testphase für Smart enthalten?60 Tage kostenlos testen: Wenn du ein Neukunde von N26 Standard bist, kannst du von unserem 60-tägigen kostenlosen Test von Smart profitieren.Jederzeit stornieren: Du kannst während deiner kostenlosen Testphase jederzeit stornieren und trotzdem die Vorteile über die vollen 60 Tage hinweg genießen (nach 60 Tagen wirst du automatisch wieder auf Standard zurückgestuft).Bei Smart bleiben: Wenn du dich für unser N26 Smart Konto entscheidest, dann brauchst du nichts weiter zu unternehmen. Die monatliche Gebühr in Höhe von 4,90 € wird automatisch abgebucht. Wenn du deine Meinung änderst, kannst du nach dem Ende der kostenlosen Testphase jederzeit wieder auf Standard zurückstufen.Profitiere von den Vorteilen unseres Smart Kontos: Während deines 60-tägigen kostenlosen Tests von Smart stehen dir folgende Vorteile zur Verfügung:Spaces (bis zu 10)Bis zu 10 Shared SpacesIBAN für Spacesbis zu 5 kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten pro MonatRound-up SavingsPartnerangebote und RabatteTelefonischer Support
Wichtig:Wenn du bei deinem N26 Smart Konto bleibst, wird die Gebühr in Höhe von 4,90 € am ersten Tag nach der kostenlosen Testphase abgebucht. Ein Downgrade ist aber trotzdem jederzeit möglich.Zusätzlich erhältst du nach dem Upgrade ein Angebot, deine digitale Karte einmalig kostenlos als bunte Karte nachzubestellen. Gleichzeitig behältst du deine transparente Karte. Bitte beachte, dass deine digitale Karte dann deaktiviert wird.Wie erhalte ich Zugriff auf die kostenlose Smart-Probemitgliedschaft?Wenn du eine Einladung für eine kostenlose Testversion unserer Smart-Mitgliedschaft erhalten hast, kannst du auf diese zugreifen, indem du folgende Anweisungen befolgst.Von der Push-Nachricht aus: Tippe auf die Push-Nachricht.Wenn sich die N26 App öffnet, erscheint automatisch deine Einladung, in der das kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft erläutert wird. Klicke auf "Bestätigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke anschließend auf "Kauf bestätigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen. Eine Nachricht bestätigt dir, dass der Abschluss erfolgreich war! Von der N26 App aus: Öffne die N26 App.Der Zugangspunkt für die kostenlose N26 Smart-Probemitgliedschaft wird dir oben auf deinem Home Bildschirm angezeigt. Tippe auf "Mehr erfahren". Daraufhin erscheint ein Fenster mit der Einladung, in der das kostenlose Testangebot im Detail erklärt wird. Klicke auf "Bestätigen", um fortzufahren.Dir wird dann eine Zusammenfassung des Angebots angezeigt. Bitte lies dir die Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen durch und stimme diesen zu.Klicke auf "Kauf bestätigen": Du hast nun offiziell eine Probemitgliedschaft abgeschlossen! Anmerkung: Wenn du eine E-Mail mit einer Einladung für eine Probemitgliedschaft erhalten hast, empfehlen wir dir, diese von deinem Smartphone aus zu öffnen und auf die Schaltfläche "Kostenlose Probemitgliedschaft starten" zu klicken. Dadurch wird automatisch die N26 App geöffnet und die Einladungsseite aufgerufen. Alternativ kannst du dich in die mobile App von N26 einloggen und den obigen Schritten für den Zugriff von der App aus folgen.

question: Wie melde ich einen Versicherungsfall?
answer: Deine N26 You (neuen Tab)- und N26 Metal (neuen Tab)-Mitgliedschaft umfasst eine Vielzahl von Versicherungsleistungen, die von unserem Partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe abgedeckt werden.*Um einen Versicherungsfall zu melden, logge dich in deine App ein, gehe zu 👤 Mein Konto > Deine Mitgliedschaft > Allianz Versicherung.Dort findest du:Einen Leitfaden, wie du einen Versicherungsfall einreichen kannst (z. B.
